name: Lash Volumizing Mascara
about: What it is:.What it does:.What it is formulated WITHOUT:.What else you need to know:.Research Results:
ingredients: Water, Beeswax, Butylene Glycol, PVP, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax, Sucrose Polystearate, Acrylates Copolymer, Stearic Acid, Tribehenin, Behenyl Alcohol, Polysorbate 80, Triethanolamine, PEF-800, Rose Centifolia Flower Water, Rhodochrosite Extract, Tocopheryl Acetate, Squalane, Sorbitan Sesquioleate, Magnesium Aluminum Silicate, Disodium EDTA, Bisabolol, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Hematite, Hexylene Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Caprylyl Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Potassium Sorbate. May Contain (+/-): Mica, Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499), Ferric Ammonium Ferrocyanide (Ci 77510).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-After applying mascara, use the tip of the nylon brush to push and lift..-Use the brush to push inner corner lashes toward the bridge of the nose..-Use the brush to push center lashes toward the middle of your brow..-Use the brush to push outer corner lashes toward your hairline.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am only going to give it a four star because it wasn't exactly what I was looking for--I wanted something that volumized and coated my eyelashes a little thicker because I have big eyes/eyelashes. HOWEVER I can see why someone would love this mascara--it darkens the eyelashes in a super natural way that makes it look like your eyelashes are just that way without makeup. It also separates them well without any clumps. I use it on my bottom lashes and recommend to someone looking for that natural look!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this mascara! Every time a new mascara is on the market I try it but I always come back to Buxom. It separates and makes my lashes look long without clumping or flaking.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this brush.  Gets at the difficult lashes in the corners!  And it accentuates the natural length a lot and thickness just a little unless you layer it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best mascara! I’ve tried many others but always come back to this one. This one doesn’t clump and gives a natural looking boost to your lashes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i have used so many tubes of these in the last 10+ years. the wand gets every lash and always gives me that false lash look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've tried so many mascaras and this is the only one that works for me. I have super blonde, long, and thin eye lashes. I also have a lot of lashes that curl inwards. This is the only one that didn't clump or flake on me but also makes them look full. It goes on smoothly and holds them in place throughout the day. I've been using this one for years and have also tired giving other mascaras a chance but find myself always going back to this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This has been my new favorite mascara for a couple months now! It honestly works so similarly to Lancôme Idole, but it removes so much easier. It lengthens and separates beautifully!

reviews.review_title: Once a staple now a different wand :(
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has been my go to mascara for at least 10 years. I’ve always come back to it even when I’ve attempted something new. I’m SO sad that the wand has changed. My lashes used to look full and long but the new wand makes them look slumpy. Bring back the old wand! Please!! makes  makes them look clumpy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I will never understand why this mascara doesn’t get more  hype. Been using it for years and have tried countless others but always come back to this one. The brush is unmatched by any other!otherother.thbestjob at separating. I

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was hopeful but unforch it’s not great. Leaves raccoon eyes and flakes off. My lashes drop by the end of the day as well. I’ve been struggling to find a good mascara so I’m pretty disappointed. Don’t rec

reviews.review_title: My go to mascara of all time
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Favorite mascara of all time. Separates lashes and doesn’t get clumpy. I hate when lashes stick together. Have been using this for years and WISH they would make it in brown but would cry if they ever discontinue.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This used to be so much better. I used this product for many years. I’m not sure if I changed or the product changed, but now, when I use it, it’s smudges under my eyes almost immediately. Just raccoon eyes right away. ￼
I have tried so many different mascaras, and I always end up going back to this one!  It’s great for volumizing and I don’t need to apply more than 2-3 layers and done!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Have been using this for years. Favourite mascara for volume and spreading the lashes! A+

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this mascara for almost ten years, and it’s the one. It elongates, adds volume, and creates such full looking lashes. I have tried a million other brands and styles, but always come back to buxom.
Love this product! I have been waiting to get another one. They sell out quickly. The consistency is great. It last long and makes my natural lashes look even longer.

reviews.review_title: Don't waste your $$$ or your time!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It had a very dry formula like I couldn't get enough product on the the lash brush, so it didn't make any difference really. It simply looks like you're not wearing mascara at all.. The price is disgusting for this low of quality.. 8$ drugstore & 1$ mascara from the Dollar tree has a better quality formula... 2/10. the one positive about it was the quantity it looked like it had . looked like there was a lot of product with it being such a big tube.. except you could barely see anything on the brush or on the lashes. it was a complete waste of 28$

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, notSure skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing, I made a Tiktok post wearing this mascara and thousands of comments were asking what mascara I use and complimenting my lashed
This mascara is the best! Adds tones of volume. It is great with one coat to look natural or you can build on it with no clumping! I highly recommend!

reviews.review_title: Please make a brown version of this exact mascara!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I would be a loyal buyer if this exact mascara was offered in a BROWN color not black/brown but BROWN! PLEASE BUXOM MAKE A BROWN MASCARA IN THIS EXACT FORMULA AND WAND!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Unfortunately, even though I love the way this mascara coats and makes my eyelashes big, I have to stop using it.  The formula transfers to my skin making me look like a raccoon.  I tried setting powders and curling my lashes.  Sad to give it up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am a loyal Buxom mascara fan - I have repurchased more times than I can count! Not clumpy, not flaky - simply lengthens and separates the lashes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best mascara for long lashes I’ve ever used! Brush is perfect and let’s me get to all of the lashes from a couple different angles for better coverage. Never goopy or flaky. No under eye residue  residue as the day goes o

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely my favorite Mascara. Makes my lashes look thick and full and lasts all day with no issues.

reviews.review_title: Very light, great for sensitive eyes
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The wearing of it feels so weightless I forgot I put mascara on. The most natural looking possible. It is very easy to remove it. Do not buy this if you're looking for a long-lasting product; It will be gone as ashes after 3 hours. I have sensitive eyes, this is the best option for me

reviews.review_title: The only mascara I’ve used for years!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this mascara for years. I love the wand and brush. The formula goes on super smooth and doesn’t feel thick or heavy. It’s buildable without clumping.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has been my go-to mascara for years. It really separates your lashes unlike any other brand I've used, and it makes them look longer but natural. It stays in place well. The only con for me is that a new tube seems to hit its peak pretty quickly and then I don't see the same wow-factor separation that sets this brand apart, maybe from the product thickening and/or build up on the wand.
This mascara is not very buildable and only looks okay for about an hour. After that, it flakes off until my undereye area is completely black.

I don’t understand how this has such high reviews, it is literally the WORST mascara I have ever used. If your only goal is to have jet black lashes, sure, get this. However, if you expect any sort of lift, thickening or hold, don’t bother. This is watered down shoe polish with a shotty wand. I am almost offended this product even exists.

reviews.review_title: Once a holy grail… now a flakey mess
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This used to be my absolute go to. Lashes are pin straight and it held curl. But the formula has changed. It’s dry, flakey and uncurls my lashes like crazy. I’ve got flakes within a couple of hours of wear and it’s so sad :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The best mascara for hooded eyes. Non-smudging, easy to layer no clumps!! Love it. My #1 !!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this one for years. I've tried so many others, but this is the only one that really doesn't give me any clumping. Gives long, natural-looking lashes.

reviews.review_title: Great for long natural looking lashes!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my holy grail mascara! If you like a natural, long lash with minimal under eye smudging definitely try out this mascara.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite base mascara but now it comes out thicker from the tube and goes on more clumpy than it used to. Did something change and can we go back? That was the reason I would buy this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The best mascara around 100% Every time I use this I get asked if I’m wearing false lashes!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was looking for a new mascara and bought this because of the reviews and have to say this was the worst mascara I've ever used. Within 30 minutes of application my lashes fall flat and it doesn't even look like I'm wearing any mascara. I've tried doing a single coat and multiple coats and neither seem to work.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: All time favourite mascara! Have tried so many mascaras over the years but this is still my favourite.
I don’t love this mascara. Barely any applies and it makes my lashes look like spiders…

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Great mascara I ever had , just wished Sephora store still have this as this is only available in online , this is my life time favorite mascara,

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this mascara since 2011 & honestly it's STILL the best mascara I've tried thus far. I've tried to venture out with cheaper drug-store brands and I'm literally always so disappointed. My lashes are long to begin with, but this product is the cherry on top and has never failed me ;)  I would definitely tell you guys to try it out if you've been thinking about it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was looking for a new mascara to try and had high hopes reading the reviews but this did nothing for my lashes. You could barely even tell I’m wearing any mascara and that’s after layering it on. I also find it quite messy.

reviews.review_title: Please don't ever stop making this!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought the mascara mini trial box and this was by far my favorite! I didn't see it last time I went into my local Sephora. I'm glad it's still available online. It does some magic on my lashes! I don't know if its the applicator or the formula, but I don't ask questions, lol!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very underwhelmed with the wand and the formula runs with the slightest bit of humidity. Goods forbid you’re caught in the rain! I wanted to try something new, but I will stick with Dior and Lancôme.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Nothing ever looks as good as this one. It is incredibly underrated but I kind of hope it stays that way so I can keep buying it every few months.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: great mascara!! I got this as a free sample and has been sitting in my makeup bag forever and I am pleasantly surprised! I used my Lancôme lash primer (as always) and applied this after. I really love how it made my lashes look and this photo was taken after an 8 hour work day and there is very minimal smudging (if any at all!) and that’s a problem I have with many mascaras

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The best mascara I’ve ever used.  I’ve tried many many brands and this is hands down the greatest.  Gives volume and length with no flaking or smudges.  Lasts all day and night.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product was underwhelming for me. I will coat and coat and coat my lashes and they’ll barely change. Every time I give this another shot I end up needing a second mascara to create a look I want, and it’s not even for an extreme look!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: While this mascara does provide volume and length, I’m just not a fan of the formula compared to other high end mascaras I’ve tried. It takes several coats to get the length I desire and the formula takes a while to dry. Not a big fan of the wand given how messy application can become.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love Love Love this Mascara - I have straight shorter lashes and this really adds volume and some length as well. Does not flake & I can easily layer it if desired.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Best mascara I’ve ever used. It’s exactly what I want mascara to be. A little volume, a lot of lengthening and separating, no clumps, long lasting - it’s all I’ll buy!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I rarely write reviews (and I rarely buy mascara—because I get makeup subscription boxes + always feel like I have sample sizes and am trying things out). The last time I bought mascara it was due to the Lash princess hype (which, btw is great upon initial apply, at least for me, then gets flaky and a mess by the end of the night.) I can confidently say this Buxom mascara is a ride or die. I wouldn’t wear it alone for an event. It layers nicely with other mascaras, but the best part about it is : no fall out, flakiness, curls and separates lashes—doesn’t get clumpy. The way the product comes out is better than 99.99% of mascaras. You know how you have to wipe away some of it on most? Totally unnecessary with this one. It pulls the product out at just the right amount.   I don’t know about you, but when I’m getting ready to go to work I do not have the time for a random eye flutter and waiting for mascara to dry on my lid or under my eye to brush off. My time in the morning is limited (I.e., no time for mistakes or a heart attack<—dramatic, yes). I’m any case, I’m actually buying a full size—pigs must be flying.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: One of my top mascara. Give long voluminous lash that last all day even when I cry!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly the best mascara ever. I can’t sing its praises enough.  You need it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Make my eyes pop!!! Love the separation it gives to my lashes!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best mascara I ever used! I have really short, thin, and flat eyelashes, I noticed while wearing the face masks my eyelashes would go flat from steam coming out of my mask, I would buy eight drugstore mascaras a month trying to find something that held my eyelashes in place. So I’m really glad I found this, I haven’t had any clumps or such

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Always had black marks under my eyes from this and doesn’t wash of easily with water and face wash. Prefer Diorshow much more.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is my go-to mascara since I was 17, I love it. It's buildable and I don't find it clumpy or flaky. Doesn't feel like you're wearing anything either.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A good mascara for short eyelashes. One of the better kinds of mascara I’ve tried

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Je l’adooore !!!! Il sépare bien les cils, j’adore la brosse aussi ! Ça fais des années que c’est un de mes mascaras chouchou

reviews.review_title: Always come back to this one
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a GOOD mascara. Maybe not as volumizing as better than sex or some other mascaras...but it doesn't clump/smudge or flake and so It gets a huge win from me.

reviews.review_title: Nothing Special - Not Great for the Price
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very middle of the road when it comes to mascaras - goes on thin and is buildable, but not particularly lengthening or volumizing. Won't be repurchasing - there are drugstore mascaras I prefer to this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got a mini sample of this and I’ve got to say this is the best mascara to use when going for a natural look. It doesn’t clump and lengthens them to perfection. I am probably going to by the full size version thats how much I’ve fallen in love with this mascara

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the BEST mascara ever.  Leaves lashes long and beautiful.  it is also easy to remove at the end of the day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I never leave reviews but I’ve repushed this mascara time and time again. You NEED this mascara if you’re looking for the blackest, glossiest, longest, clump free lashes. So good. It doesn’t bikini either THAT much but I’ve learned a trick where I just layer a volume mascara underneath ;)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is my holy grail mascara, I always return to it. It gives me the volume and length of false lashes, but doesn't look spidery like other mascaras I've tried.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not a big fan of this mascara. It doesn’t do much for lengthening or volumizing and I feel like it flakes off and smudges under your eyes after not much wear. Definitely better mascaras out there for the price. I’m going to stick to Benefit because they never let me down! This was like a cheap drug store product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is BY FAR the best mascara I have ever used. I got a sample size a while back and it changed my entire view on mascara. No more need for fake lashes when you use this mascara, I swear! I got so many compliments on it! It’s a game changer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I saw the reviews when I was browsing mascaras and thought I would give this a try. It was so disappointing. Not only did it not volumize, it barely coated my lashes, even after multiple coats. I actually returned it for a product I truly love. Don’t buy this, it’s a waste of money.

reviews.review_title: Okay if you can get used to the brush
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Takes two or three coats to build up a good amount of lash (nothing crazy, just natural looking). But for me the major con was the chunky brush. I can’t tell you how many times I poked myself and just never got used to it. Going back to my favorite Benefit mascara.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this mascara. Why? I love the wand. Depending on how I turn the wand when applying, I can create varying looks with my eyelashes. Easy to apply and lasts throughout the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It doesn't meet my expectations at all. Doesn't volumize, doesn't do much of anything. I'm a busy working mom (who loves makeup)- I do not have time to go over my lashes again and again 15 times. Even doing that, I get a barely there look. I appreciate that this mascara removes easily with soap and water. That's the only plus I can think of. If you want a nice volumizing mascara, go with Lancome Hypnose or Tarte Lights Camera Lashes

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: literally one of the best mascaras ive ever used. it will NOT clump up ur lashes!!!!! i've given this to so many family members bc they always ask what mascara i use

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this mascara! Received voucher from one of the Sephora Favourites kits and this was by far my favourite so I got the full size. It is great for a natural look, and can be built up to be more dramatic. It wears great throughout the day, no smudging, no flaking! It's a bit too pricey to purchase as there are many drugstore mascaras that can do the same thing for a fraction of these price. That being said, I would happily use this mascara in the future.

reviews.review_title: Not worth the $$ - Doesn’t hold a curl
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this product almost daily for 2 months now and I can conclusively say it is not worth the money. It does not hold my eyelash curl whatsoever, there is transfer and smudging throughout the day when not doing anything laborious (I sit at a desk 9hrs/day and somehow it smudges). Save your money, but something else. What really sent me was when I decided to try a drugstore Covergirl mascara to see how it held up against a $22 mascara - the Covergirl lashblast mascara lasted all day, minimal transfer, and held the curl like a champ! Very disappointed in this Buxom mascara.

reviews.review_title: My favorite mascara for natural makeup
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my go to mascara for everyday makeup. I have thick long eyelashes but they face downwards and clump, so I like to curl with a curler then use this. It separates each lash perfectly with no clumping and never runs on me, even when I got caught in it in the rain the other day! I don’t like mascaras like Better than Sex that make my eyelashes look like massive eye curtains - I think it looks like tacky internet  makeup. But if you love a natural lash with subtle enhancement you’re going to love this mascara.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this about 5 years ago and it was amazing so I thought why not buy it again , I opened it and used it a few times and it is not the same as I remember it was like I bought a $5  regular mascara , it did nothing for me and I ended up returning it , I bought a drug store brand and it does the job this was supposed to , maybe if they make it like they use to I would buy it again

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Favorite mascara. I have been using this mascara for years and will occasionally try a different mascara, but I always come back to this mascara. It doesn't clump or flake.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bleeds like a mother! I end up looking like a raccoon an hour in.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this mascara and have tried many mascaras, but this is the mascara I have always gone back to the past 5 years! I have long lashes, but they grow straight so keeping curl In my lashes w mascara is really hard but this one does it! It has a “drier” and light formula which is good for me, really wet, heavy formulas always make my lashes fall. It doesn’t get clumpy either, but is really good about defining each lash and adding volume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this mascara, I did not buy it at Sephora (found it at Winners for 12.99) and I’m really happy with it. It’s brush is really unique and separates each lash really well which gives them a lengthened look. I used to say Marc Jacobs or Too Faced were my favourites but this has taken the lead. It stays on well throughout the day but is easy to remove at the end of the day which I love; I can’t stand mascaras that look amazing but are torture to wipe off. Overall, this is my new go-to!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve bought many, many mascaras. Both drug store and high end. This is the one I’ve stuck with. I have very fine, blonde lashes that clump easily and I find this mascara adds length and definition without clumping together. I’ve used it on its own but I find it works even better over a lash primer (my fav is Mac False Lashes Maximizer). I have a pronounced brow bone so I often get mascara transfer regardless of what kind I buy, and the primer helps prevent that and adds length.   But again, this mascara is great on its own as well. I’m on my 4th tube and won’t be looking for anything else any time soon.
I hate it. Won't ever buy it again. It sticks my lashes together and leaves flakes all over.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have used this mascara, solely, for the past nearly  10 years of my life... thought it’d finally be a good time for a very tested review? Lol I do have naturally thick long lashes and this stuff honestly makes them look so insane - I’ve never found anything that remotely compares. Put 3 best friends on it for years too. Buy it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this on a whim and love this! I have super long eyelashes and it helps detangle and make them look great.

Did not lengthen, curl, volumize. Ended up clumping after a few coats. Will not purchase again. Very disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this mascara for 3 years and every time I buy something different I always come back. Seriously maximizes volume without making my eyelashes feel and look thick and clumpy. You also wont have to reapply this mascara as it stays put all day.

Well, I've been talked into other (often more expensive) brands enough to know for sure that this is my fave.  Maybe it depends on individual differences, but this is my #1 fave, and has been for a loooong time.  And it's sometimes out of stock, so I stock up. Doesn't clump, easy to use, plumps and fills in, and doesn't irritate the eyes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The best mascara ever. Last year it came in a sample pack with a number of tubes of mascara and this was by far my favourite.  Lengthening, separating, perfect for enhancing. I prefer natural makeup looks.

Best mascara ever! Keeps your lashes separated and lengthens them extremely well

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It’s just like better than sex by too faced but just 10x better, more natural looking lashes with the separation form the wand but still lengthy and bold. Absolutely love it!

reviews.review_text: I can layer it up & keep my lashes fluffy, gives volume + length, and works with my sensitive eyes - love it !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried almost every top brand mascara and this is the BEST! You can control the amount of product used. The brush is perfect size, not too big! This does not smudge at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Did absolutely nothing for me other than flake and give me raccoon eyes. It gave me no volume and doesn’t hold a curl even after eyelash-curling a couple of times

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the only mascara I’ve been buying for the past 5 years. It’s very volumizing and does not smear throughout the day. The brush is the perfect size for my eyelashes and it does not clump them up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This mascara was a miss for me! I've been using Better Than Sex mascara for years, which I love! I felt like trying something new though to switch it up and decided on this one based on reviews.       This mascara did do a good job of separating the lashes but did a mediocre job at best at lengthening and definitely did not add an ounce of volume. I had to add about 3 layers for it to even look like I had some mascara on and found the brush very dry.       Overall, if you like a very subtle look for your mascara you may like this, but if you like  volume and a more bold look this mascara isn't for you! I'll definitely be sticking to the Better Than Sex mascara!

reviews.review_title: Doesn't make your eyelashes fall after application
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this mascara, and this doesn't happen often. If you know me you know I hate a wet mascara that makes my lashes fall as soon as the product is applied. I received this mascara as a sample and I am about to purchase the full size product as I'm almost finished my sample! I have never received a sample and went to go purchase the full size product other than now. What I like about this mascara is firstly the brush, its simple and that's what I like about it. It reaches all your lashes and when you remove the wand from the bottle the excess product is removed leaving you with a ready to apply wand. This mascara is dry wet consistency which sold me on the product. If your eyelashes fall very easily after curling them and applying as mascara I'd highly recommend trying out this one. It is dry enough that it keeps my eyelashes standing up without making them clumpy. Want a longer eyelash look? Wiggle the want at the top of your lashes and the job is done. Want a fuller eyelash look? Apply more starting at the root of the eyelash! I cannot say enough good things about this product, the other bad reviews surprise me honestly. I guess it's the same as how some other high-end mascaras from Sephora just don't work for my eyelashes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It’s odd for me to see other reviewers say that it’s wet because my tube was so dry that it made my lashes look like they had split ends. In fact, I pulled out an old mascara (different brand) after trying this one for several weeks and my old one was wetter than this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The best! This mascara is lengthening and lash defining to the point where it borderline looks like false lashes, but it also looks super natural. I’m a big fan of enhancing my blonde eyelashes while not looking like I’m obviously wearing makeup. This does the trick! It has never clumped on me, which is amazing since 75% of the brands I try are trashed immediately due to lash clumping.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this in the mini size as a christmas gift last year in a set with the mini lipgloss and I LOVE it! I use it every day and I am just reaching the end of the tube now. One dip in the tube gets both my eyes covered without having to go in for more product and I love how it makes my eyelashes look! It’s not clumpy at all and it darkens the lashes while also lengthening them. I always curl my lashes and that combined with this mascara leaves them looking long and dark all day! I have naturally thick eyelashes though so if you have sparse eyelashes this might not be great for volume

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly, nothing special. I could have gotten a better mascara at the drug store. I will not repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Natural looking lashes. Did a bunch of layers and not really impressed. I wanted it to be noticeable difference and this is not giving me that

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really lengthening and add a lot of volume. I used Lancôme Hypnose Drama for years and now will switch to this one

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I first bought this mascara in 2009 in LasVegas on a girl trip. Love it and I received so many compliments over the years, that it looks natural and doesn’t clump up. I will continue to buy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don’t like this mascara. You do not get much volume at all and it gives the look of spider lashes. It doesn’t separate your lashes very well at all. I would say save your money, there are many other mascaras out there that perform way better than this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Clearly defines lashes without clumps. Easily layers. Doesn't flake!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Got a trial size of this product (5ml) in a subscription box. The formula itself is great - truly no clumps, good length and definition, but I have a real problem with the brush! The plastic brush is good for separating my lashes but I have a real problem with transfer onto my eyelid! Without a doubt every single time I use this quite a bit of mascara is smudged onto my eyelid, especially when I attempt to even go near the base of my lashes. I also find it takes a little longer to dry and even if I fix it up afterwards with a dry or damp Q-tip it's quite difficult to remove. Granted, I've really only started wearing mascara this last year, so maybe it's my poor technique, or the shape of my eyes? But for the price and hassle I would not repurchase this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great mascara, it layers easily and has a great brush! No clumps

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE how this mascara is with my lashes. I have super long lashes that easily tangle together but this really separates them and gives them the volume my lashes deserves. The only thing I don’t like is that by the end of the day I have mascara under my eyes, I feel like every mascara kinda does that it’s just this is the only one where I really noticed it. Super great tho!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: this has been my go-to mascara for years. i love how it makes my lashes pop, especially after the first few uses.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I don’t write reviews—honestly—but this mascara is perfect, and I’m very picky. Never clumps, perfect volume, never flakes or irritates my eyes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use to love this mascara! I tried out some new brands and I don’t like it as much. The brush applicator isn’t a good shape for my large, almond-shaped eyes. Does a good job of lengthening but didn’t do much for volume for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has been my holy grail mascara for a few years now. I'm blessed with fairly full and long lashes and this is the only mascara (drug store and luxury) that doesn't just turn my lashes into clumpy spider legs. It gives just the right length and volume for me! I also love the bristles on the wand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have used a lot of different mascaras over the years, and some have been good, others a disaster. This is the best.  Bar none. I like to use a lash primer underneath this to give a little more length but even without it, it is terrific It really comes down to the brush and to the fact it doesn't flake or fail on me throughout the day. The brush does a good job of removing any clumping, a look I am not a fan of. My lashes look longer, fuller, and all around better and it just stays put. Don't stop making this one.  It is a keeper.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is hands downs my favorite mascara. This mascara builds volume and length perfectly without leaving my lashes stiff and crunchy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lengthening and defining. Really like this brush but not super thickening.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I never write reviews, but I've been worried they might discontinue this mascara. PLEASE DON'T. It is my absolute all-time, cult favorite for everyday wear and I can't live without it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this mascara for years and absolutely love it. Whenever I've tried to switch it up I always end up going back to Buxom. The wand does a great job of applying an even coat of mascara while adding volume.   In my experience this mascara doesn't Clump, flake, burn my eyes which is a major plus.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this and think it is one of my favorites for a suttle lengthening mascara. It is a bit shiny so gives you a healthy look and boost. It is very black so it offers a depth that I prefer. There is no strong chemical smell and it is a tad buildable. I love that it doesn't flak. it's staying power is okay and lasts about 6-8 hours depending on your activity and level of sweating. It lasts me a while and did not dry out quickly. If you are looking for a natural looking healthy boost this is it. If you want dramatic, then this is not the formula. I have sensitive skin and eyes and this did not irritate me what so ever. I have purchased this numerous times and the product is consistent. I am 37 and own a ton of makeup and cosmetics. This is my go to. My lashes are blonde, short, and not very dense, this gives me lashes! No spider effect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing product. I have tried soooo many mascaras over the years..but this most definitely has been my favorite so far. The brush is perfect- longer and not too wide that it will hit into your eyelid when applying. It’s also a nice consistency- not super thick like some of the other volumizing mascaras. I may try out the waterproof version of this at some point (I live in Oregon, so super rainy winters), but for now I’ve been happy with this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow. I have short and straight lashes so most mascaras in the US doesn't work for me, since they either are too wet, or it clumps. But this one is ANOTHER STORY! I got a travel size and I'm totally in love! Separates my short lashes and holds the curl all day, and visibly gives more volume.  If you have short and straight lashes like me, this is the one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This was completely useless. I saw absolutely no difference between this and a crappy drugstore mascara.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolute favorite for 6 years now! Long and full lashes

reviews.review_title: I always return to this one!
reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Buxom is the BEST for the natural, separated lash look. It doesn’t clump and it lasts all day. I often have to use a lash brush with other brands, but this puts precisely the right amount of mascara on each lash. I love it and I’m loyal to it. I have tried other mascaras over the years, including Sephora top brands, and I always come back to this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: best mascara overall but it doesn’t seem to hold curls

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin

My eyelashes like to stick together but this separates them really well. I wore it on a hot day and had no issues with smudging or running. I normally have issues with mascara bleeding onto my top eyelid, but this doesn't seem to do that. Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

Doesn’t darken, lengthen or add any volume. It is a liquidy product and if you’re not careful it will easily get in your eyelids. I have to put on 4 coats to really get no where. My lashes are naturally long so I just need something to darken and volume them up and this doesn’t do it. It easily smudges onto the lower lid too. There are PLENTY of drugstore brands that perform better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’m obsessed with this mascara. It is the best mascara I have EVER used. No clumps! Amazing volume! Looks nice all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this thick lush mascara. Bought a time of trial sizes and that is what caused me to want full size. However I felt trial size was way better than full size. Seemed thinner.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Guys, I have been buying this mascara since 2011.  I am COMMITTED.  I have tried others, don't get me wrong, but I always come back to Buxom.  I prefer a no-makeup look, and these enhance my natural lashes perfectly. I don't find that it gets flaky throughout the day.  If I am going for a bolder make-up look, it's easy to apply more than one coat for even more volume.  So great.  Please never change!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the jet black color/intensity of this mascara... however you do need to apply a few coats to get the thickness but overall liked it! worth a try

Gives no curl. Texture is very watery. Gets all over eyelid etc. I have never had issues with not curling my eyelashes. This made my lashes stick out straight. Hourglass mascara is a couple dollars more and way worth it. So upset and hoping I have no issues returning.

reviews.review_title: Best mascara I have ever tried so far!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I did not get this from sephora, it was actually a mini size from the beauty subscription box IPSY. It was an amazing mascara, when I run out of my mini sample I will be buying a full size for sure. It is not clumpy and makes my eye lashes lift more than other mascaras.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got the sample size of this in a beauty subscription box, and it is so perfect. I found it significantly lengthened my lashes and separated and shaped them nicely. Made them so fluttery. For those who really like volume, doing a few coats while letting the mascara dry in between will do the trick.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Bought this once because they were out of Dior. Now its my first choice, both daughters use it, my mom uses it! It stays on until I take it off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I noticed that this mascara does smudge or transfer by the end of the day. This usually occurs when I put it on my bottom lashes. Personally that doesn’t bother me because it really isn’t horribly noticeable it’s just more me being picky. Overall, I do love this mascara minus the occasional transfer. I use a lash serum and this mascara enhances the growth of my lashes. This mascara does not clump on me either which I absolutely love. I think it’s worth the money and I’ve definitely repurchased it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: Won't repurchase.  Does a decent job of darkening and thickening, but its very Clumpy and runs easily.  Wand is also not a great shape for my asian eyes - dont have a problem with other brands wands.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely fantastic, does not clump at all. this was the second mascara I have ever used and I always come back it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great mascara! I think the wand does a lot to help with the volume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best mascara ever! I absolutely love the wand and love how it makes my lashes look long without clumping.

reviews.review_text: Don’t believe the ratings! This mascara is horrible! It stays wet and moist on my lashes, and at the end of the day, it went to my lower lash line. I just tried this one because it has good ratings. dont believe it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this mascara received a sample size in a subscription as i did many others that i didnt like. I had my doubts because i have always been sensitive to mascaras and i had used the same brand since i was 12 besides samples i had gotten here and there. This mascara is the best for my sensitive eyes. Stays on all day with out smudging or flacking. I like my lashes to look long but not clumpy and artificial. i also have natrual blonde lashes so its nice and dark and covers them well. I also like that it comes off easily with my makeup remover/wash with out wripping my lashes out or burning.

reviews.review_title: If you like flat skinny lashes, this is for you!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Had very high hopes, so disappointed. One of the least volumizing of volumizing mascaras I’ve tried. Even despite curling my lashes, layering on coats, couldn’t get lashes to keep their curl or lift. Or bulk up at all really. Went on smoothly but simply can’t get any volume. Thank goodness I received a free trial size and didn’t spend the money! Will be going back to Lancôme’s Monsieur Big.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
