It’s like my eyelashes are just wet with black stuff. They don’t stay up even when I curl them. Just horrible. I’ll be going back to my go to better than sex

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is just the best mascara hands down, lengthens and volumizes with no clumping

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was looking to try out a new mascara so I decided to try this out because of the ratings and I did not like this at all. I ordered this online and when I finally received it and applied it to my lashes, it was extremely dry. I had to apply many coats and it was very flakey. I don’t like to give bad reviews, but this product was very disappointing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Arrived hella dented today - hopefully the dented cap doesn’t let air in to ruin the mascara, seems okay for now.  The mascara is good though!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Terrible mascara, it flakes a lot and give no volume to the lashes. I would not recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My go-to mascara for length and volume.  The brush is fantastic and the application flawless. It is pricey, but I think it's worth it!

reviews.review_title: Best mascara ever, this I promise.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this mascara. I first got it in a makeup subscription years and years ago (8+ yrs ago) and it was a travel size one. Loved it so much I came and got another one, then another one and then another etc. I’m probably on my 6-7th tube now. It doesn’t clump when you apply, gives great long lashes, lasts all day long and the brush has many little spikes on it to really help separate your lashes when applying. Only draw back is on the full size tube after about 5-6 months it does like to clump a little. Just wash your brush real good and it helps. That really is the only drawback I’ve come across. I have sensitive eyes (like seriously wearing eyeliner/eyeshadow can bother me greatly and cause red eyes and irritation) and this mascara doesn’t bother my eyes at all. I can wear everyday and have no issues. Usually I just wear a light bb cream, blush/highlighter and this mascara most days and I have no issues. Even have people here and there compliment my eyelashes. I don’t wear falsies either.   If you’re looking for a great mascara I seriously suggest you try this out. You can always get the travel size first and then go from there. I bet you come back and get the full size tube. Today I’ll be buying another since my little niece decided my mascara wand was a “magic wand” and wanted to clean it off with soap and water because it was dirty and then color all over my bathroom counter and sink and walls etc. my husband asked by not just get something from Fry’s or Walgreens etc it’s cheaper?! I’m like are you serious, they suck that’s why. Buxom is the only one I use and it’s what I’m getting if I have to order it online and wait for it! So I’m seriously not pulling your leg with my review. Store is closed for corona crap so I’m ordering it online and waiting for it and have no product in the meantime.
best mascara ever. never looks clumpy, always looks amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has been my favorite mascara for years, I’m always sad when it’s out of stock. It doesn’t clump or dry out while you wear it, the brush and formula give you an even application great for lengthening and curl. No spider lashes. I recommend this to everyone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Really liked the brush it was great at separating the lashes and lengthening

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve tried so many different mascaras and this one is The best. I used to have lash extension and I won’t be getting them again this mascara makes lashes so so long and the thin bristles separate lashes really nice. Buy this!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this mascara. The wand allows for a equal layers to applied to the lashes. The only complaint I have is that it starts to clump and build up but its after many months (I should probably just buy the travel sizes!). Bought this for my mom as a gift: she has very sensitive skin and eyes and had no problems/red eye from this mascara.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: its ok the brush is a little thick for me and it flakes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this mascara! The spoolie is amazing, the product doesn’t clump and doesn’t flake throughout the day. I use a lash curler and a primer and those combined with this mascara really do hold the curl all day. The only thing I don’t like is the color-it wish it was more of a vibrant black.

reviews.review_title: First good one in a while
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I gasped when I saw the wand in person (pics don’t really show) there is so many spikes on it that really literally combs through every lash. My only concern is that it doesn’t seem to grab a lot of product on the tube but I’ve had issues with other mascaras having too much product on it so I’ll take it. Literally does not clump and makes your lashes look naturally voluminous. I would recommend if you are tired of mascaras clumping too where it looks like you have 9 lashes....

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this mascara for years and years because I cannot find one I like more. The formula great for adding volume and length. You can reapply after it dries for some added volume without worrying about clumps. The brush itself is AMAZING. I feel like I’m actually brushing and defining my eyelashes in the best way. Also this stuff lasts forever and I always keep an empty clean brush around for extra defining if needed. If you are sick of the clumpy thick brushes and want something smooth and defining, but this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this mascara I’m buying my fifth one right now and I had to write a review. You MUST apply it looking down bc the wand is so big it will leave mascara on your lash line so easily. Put your mirror beneath your face for the upper lash line and above your head for the lower. I apply is slowly in about three thin layers and trust me it’s worth the time for sexy lashes. Could not recommend enough.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best mascara I have used in awhile!!! Not clumpy, has a good spoolie and comes out with a good amount of product. I use this everyday and it stays on for hours. I recommend this for anyone that is looking for a good mascara. This is it buy it!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this mascara! I’m very very picky when it comes to mascara and I love this one. It leaves my lashes looking long and full with no clumps

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Obsessed with this mascara, this is the one mascara that I tried once and never purchased a different one again! The wand itself makes your lashes look so natural yet full! I used the mascara in this picture!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This mascara is so adorable and works so well for me! My lashes look more full and lengthy without any clumps. It removes easily with makeup remover but doesn’t flake off during the day. Would definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: applicateur précis.  défini les cils sans grumeaux. ajoute volume et longueur sans lourdeur

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this is my favorite Mascara. I use it everyday for every occasion. its buildable, though I prefer to use it lightly for a more natural look. my favorite aspect of it is how it separates every single lash. it makes my natural lashes look extra long, as if I'm not wearing makeup.   its mildly easy to take off, I have to use a makeup remover and wash my eye area twice to get it off, but all of my cleansers are gentle and dont lather so that might be the reason.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I first bought this years ago. Someone working at Sephora pushed one on me. I have yet to every go back to a different mascara. First of all, it's moderately priced but will last you MONTHS of daily use. It always goes on full, but I'm never digging out clumps. I gave one to my mom, and this is the only mascara she buys too now.

I really love this mascara! I’ve had it for a long time and it’s my favorite! It’s super easy to take off and comes off when I wash my face, it doesn’t run or splotch throughout the day and it definitely enhances my eyelashes in a very natural way. I naturally have long eyelashes but I love the way this brush curves them and how it separates my lashes. I would definitely buy this again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was really hoping to love this but no. Brush is amazing, it gives you the perfect wide & long look, like fake lashes BUT it seems like there is not enough product in the tube. It feels like a month old mascara after the first use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not sure what the hype is about. I only bought this since for whatever reason they stopped selling stilla huge extreme mascara. Since this had such good reviews I bought it. This is not a good alternative. It doesn’t build product over time and it definitley does not volumize.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this mascara! I think this will be my go to for the future. I like that it doesn't clump especially when I wear falsies. I love that it has an easy use applicator! Glad I bought the full size and will definitely be purchasing again since it does add volume to my straight bland lashes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My fave mascara that I come back to again and again.  The brush is lovely, it goes on thin enough that you can build up to more drama but it doesn't take ages to apply.  It doesn't flake off during the day like some other mascaras or smudge onto my under eye. It makes my lashes look naturally gorgeous.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great every day mascara.  It separates out each individual lash without clumps.    I wouldn't say it adds much by way of volume (which is what I was looking for) and I can't really speak to its lengthening effects because my lashes are long already.  However, it doesn't leave marks on my brow bone from my lashes once it's on and that is a plus for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Only mascara I will ever use. I have strangers come up to me and ask me what mascara I use all the time. I do have naturally longer lashes but I am telling you this wand is amazing. It combs through every lash to make then pop. Every time I go to the store they recommend Benefit better than sex or some other brand and I’ve tried them all and this one is by far my fav!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is amazing! it made my eyelashes look fuller and separated without adding clumps. I can layer the mascara very well

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this mascara since 2016 and it’s the perfect everyday mascara! I’ve bought this mascara at least 5 times and have absolutely no complaints. The wand is plastic and spaces out my lashes without clumps (I personally hate bristled wands for this reason). If you’re looking for volumizing, this is probably not going to be your favourite. It’s 10/10 for length but probably 6/10 for volume. Since I use this for my everyday look, I prefer the more “natural” look this mascara gives so I don’t mind the lack of volume. I’ve worn this mascara for up to 18 hours and it wears amazing! It doesn’t flake or run. Also the application is by far the easiest and quickest of any mascara I’ve tried! I can easily apply to both eyes in 5 minutes! Overall I’ve had an amazing experience with this mascara and would highly recommend it to anyone who’s looking for an easy, quick and natural mascara!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: this is my go to mascara! i’ve bought it 3 times because it doesn’t flake, it’s not clumpy, and it’s really easy to layer depending on what type of look you want!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The absolute best mascara created! I’ve been a mua for a while so I’ve tried so many formulas but this is the all time best. Not clumpy, not watery, makes lashes look full and voluminous

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: All time favorite mascara!  Thinner formula with the perfect applicator allows you layer multiple layers with absolutely no lumps!  I try others and come back to this mascara time and time again.  I also feel like this mascara last months longer than others because it does not dry out after a few months.  You won't regret buying this one!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is my all time FAVORITE mascara!!! I have used pretty much every single mascara and this one is unlike any other. it lifts and lengthens my lashes and makes then look fake!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When I apply mascara I use 4 different kinds at one time. One to elongate and separate, one to add volume, one to then separate into feather like lashes, and one to curl, then I repeat this process until I get long curly full feathery lashes. When I want this look I ONLY have to use Buxom! I received a sample of this in a Play Box. I have used all kinds of mascaras between drugstore (L’Oreal, Maybelline, Rimmel) to Avon to department store (Clinique, Clarins) to different ones from Sephora (Too Faced - Better Than Sex, Benefit - They’re Real, Milk - Kush). This is the by far the BEST mascara I have EVER used!! It applies flawlessly and leaves no clumps or dry flakes. Try it, you won’t be disappointed!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Long beautiful lashes with no clumps. I stopped using younique mascara for this stuff. It’s. Amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A friend recommended this to me and it is my Holy Grail mascara. Goes on clumpless and lengthens and adds volume without looking unnatural. The brush is a scientific marvel.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this mascara!  Lengthens and thickens, without any clumps (even the bottom lashes). The brush is awesome for reaching all the little lashes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Black and volume galore! Beats oht the others and underrated tot the max

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this because I saw almost a 5 start rating ... very disappointed this was poo poo mascara

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It's my second time I purchased this product. I fell in love after first use. But my second mascara doesn't work so good I found it more dry. Anyway I fill that it doesn't damage my lashes opposite it makes them grow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve actually bought this mascara twice in my life a year apart from each other because I forgot the reason why I stopped using it the first time..Bottom line, the results are near to perfect with one giant downfall- makes your lashes break!!!!! I’ve even tried to use with a primer and still cracks my lashes off. I think because the formula makes my lashes look so good I had forgotten it chips away at them with each use. Always see so much fall out in my makeups wipes, I’m very gentle when taking off my makeup so I was shocked to see so many lashes when I take this off. This is not something that normally happens to me as I’ve used many different mascaras in the past, seriously so many. I’ve actually talked to a rep in the store who told me this wasn’t the first time she’s heard this happen with this mascara.. Proceed with caution, you have been warned

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: If I could rate this zero stars I would.  Honestly I'm wondering if there was any product in the tube I received.  This was the worst mascara I have ever used.  Could barely tell there was anything on my eyelashes.  Certainly didn't make them longer or fuller.  Complete waste of money.  Threw it out after 3 attempts at wearing it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Worked fine but nothing special, disappointing for the price worked as well as any drug store mascara.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got this in my play subscription box and it's not my favorite. it's a good mascara but I'm not a fan of the formula. I find that it smudges under my eye & it doesnt really volumize like it says.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this mascara for years, and people have asked me if my lashes are real many times. It’s a great lengthening and natural looking volumizing mascara. The wand separates lashes very well, and even gets the corner lashes. I also like that it moves a little. I have really sensitive eyes so this mascara is really great for that as it has more natural ingredients and doesn’t flake. I have deep set eyes that are between almond and round, and I have fairly long blonde eyelashes. It’s great for my eye shape, but if you have smaller eyes the wand will probably give you some smudges.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Literally the worst mascara I’ve ever used. I have pretty long lashes and this mascara did nothing at all for them. No lift, no volume. AT ALL. Will be returning.

reviews.review_title: Truly the B E S T
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried almost every mascara out there. This is the best! Full lashes, volume and length. Doesnt clump. Doesn’t smudge easily either. Saw it on a sales person in another store and thought she had false lashes on. NOPE! Asked her and bought this - 0 regrets.   All of these other gimmicky named mascaras can’t hold a candle to this mascara. (please, what 12 year is buying into Benefits name? Cause BTS it is not) The waterproof version is ok. It’s drier, as most waterproof versions are and flakier by the end of day.  For waterproof, I would suggest L’Oréal Double Wear.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried a lot of mascara's and fell in love with this one.  It lives up to its name.  Comes in a waterproof version too.  Long lasting and non irritating.  Highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Combs well but Doesn’t give me the lift or volume I need and have seen in other products. Better than Sex mascara is better.

reviews.review_title: A solid choice, if used with a primer
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I typically use this mascara with a lash primer, otherwise it doesn’t give me quite enough oomph for my liking. With a primer, it is excellent: great separation and nice volume. Doesn’t clump up and wears all day.

reviews.review_title: Bought based on reviews, not impressed!
reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Eh. I have tried nearly every tube of mascara known to man. I use several different brands a week, combining them for the optimal look as far as length and volume. I like the brush, but it comes out way too dry and doesn't coat my lashes enough to create the length and volume I was hoping for in a more expensive mascara (and what does actually coat my lashes seems flaky and sparse). I have drugstore mascaras that honestly do a better job. I'll probably end up using just the brush.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: BEST MASCARA I HAVE EVER TRIED!!!  this is the best mascara I have ever tried, and I can no longer live without it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My FAVOURITE mascara ever! I have used maaaaany different mascaras in the past. I have long but straight eyelashes so once I curl them, this mascara gives me volume and thickness. A little goes a long way so be sure to wriggle the brush as you move from root to tip.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wasn’t impressed by this mascara. It didn’t give me the volume I was looking for and the brush was almost too big, which I didn’t think was possible. I returned it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I find this mascara gets on the bottom of my eyes and gives me “raccoon eyes”.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i am a mascara freak and this is my holy grail. i have selected this product three times over the past few years (so sad they took this product out of 'lashstash to go'!!!)  the key aspect of mascara for me is that it should not flake. this product lasts until the three month point, and even then there are fewer flakes than some high end mascaras on day one. better than diorshow, better than sex, tarte, clinique... huge lashes that are moisturized but do not smudge. btw i am 32 with naturally long lashes and slightly 'ageing' and oily eyelids, only wear on top lashes (bottom makes me look tired)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Can we talk about how underrated this mascara is in the Beauty Youtube Community?!   I have never seen anyone talk about it, granted I usually watch the same 8 people, HAHAHA, but seriously I have never seen anyone talk about it.   It is fantastic, I have been using it for about 3 years and its great. It does not flake on me being a contact lens wearer and its also not a pain in the butt taking it off. It is also the only mascara that holds my apparently heavy lashes, which BS they just don't stay curled with anything else.   I am one to easily get bored of buying the same thing, and trust me I have tried ALL the mascaras to try something new, but I always hate the new ones I try and go back to this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my go to! No matter how many times I try something different, I always go back to this mascara. It adds volume, it spreads my lashes evenly, and doesn't get weighed down or fall onto my under eye by the end of the day. Amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Separates, thickens, stays put...I buy 2 just to make sure I don't run out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got this in the trial size from an IPSY subscription package a couple months ago. I had never heard of the brand prior so I was rather skeptical. The package (just the same as shown on Sephora's website here) looked cheap to me and I thought that this brand was from somewhere like Walmart. Judging by appearances, I figured it would be basic and low quality. I gave it a try and ended up liking it a lot. It gave length and volume, but most importantly it also provided a smooth and even coat on each lash without clumping and sticking together. I also found that it didn't flake by the end of the day and it seemed to hold out quite well on long-wear days too. I prefer mascara that is gentle on your lashes - one that won't cause them to fall out or break over time. I don't know if this one is actually formulated for clean ingredients but I didn't have issues with my lashes while I was using this mascara. I am tempted to buy a full size in this product now since my first experience was quite positive.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this mascara!  It gives my lashes volume and length.  It lasts all day long and goes on without clumping.  I've tried dozens of mascaras and it's hard to find a good one.  I'm glad I found this mascara.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The formula on this mascara is amazing and I really wanted to love the product but it always caused flakes on my eyelid. I'm super duper careful with how I apply my mascara but the brush was just too big and it didn't work for me. I sadly had to return it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing mascara. This is my second time purchasing and I love the separation!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Not clumpy and makes lashes look full and volumized

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This Mascara is a must-have in my makeup bag. i have tried many different mascaras, but hands down this is THE best. It does not go on clumpy. It doesn't flake throughout the day. And I am never left with raccoon eyes after wearing it all day. I wear it daily, and the bottle will last quite a while.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Tried to find a mascara similar to loreal telescopic which was my HG for years. Only trying to find another alternative as I found it wore under my eyes for awhile and I wanted something I could order from Sephora with the rest of my products. I have hooded eyes so it's hard to find the right kind of brush that won't transfer all the product onto my lids. This is by no means the perfect mascara for what I'm looking for but with a little effort it creates a falsie look that lasts ALL DAY with no under eye smudging.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I already have long curly lashes, but I don’t have many of them, so I really don’t tolerate clumping. Buxom mascara has a nice thin formula that easily coats my lashes and the molded bush separates every. single. one. Very easy to remove with your cleanser without having to rub at your eyes, but this means you’ll definitely want to go for the waterproof variety if you habitually cry at work lol.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This wasn’t as volumizing as I had hoped. Actually, not volumizing at all. It didn’t clump which was nice. But the brush didn’t allow me to apply enough product so I ended up getting mascara on my upper lid from trying to apply more. Not the right mascara for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I Love this product. I apply 2-3 coats when I want a more dramatic look and It doesn’t clump at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this mascara. Worn alone, it gives my lashes gorgeous separated volume. I always use it on my lower lashes and it’s perfect. But, layered over Benefit They’re Real (which is how I normally wear it), I have perfect lashes. TR gives me tons of length and oomph, and this separates and gives them volume. I regularly get asked what mascara I use. Layering is the way to go.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve used this mascara exclusively for probably more than 10 years. I’ve tried all the different samples I’ve acquired in my Play boxes over the years, but this one is my far my favorite. Doesn’t clump, the brush is amazing, and gives a very natural look. I don’t know what I would do if they ever discontinued it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this mascara for free after buying like $300 worth of stuff at ulta a while ago and I've used it all up! I just recently re-purchased this from sephora in the store. They got rid of their buxom stand at this particular store, but one of the workers helped me find the full version. I will never use another mascara again. I do have fairly long eye lashes, so applying it is easier and I see better results so I may be a bit biased, but it doesnt make my lashes stick together when applied correctly. (very gently and from top to bottom)  and makes them look super long!! I feel like i have lash extensions on when I use this. (I would never lol)

reviews.review_title: Always come back to this one
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Wow, I have been using this product for years and this is the first time I've looked at the reviews. Did not realize it was so popular. I try different mascaras every other time, and I already come back to this one. It doesn't leave my lashes dry, flaky or clumpy. I love the way it seperates them.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: honestly my favorite mascara, gives a really nice curled and flared lash look.  I always try something else when I run out of this one but I always come back!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's awesome! Super volumizing and separates those clashes hunny. I have short, blonde lashes and this mascara makes me feel confident

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Believe the hype! I’ve been using Benefit’s “They’re Real” for years with nice results, but I wanted to see if there was a better product in the same price range (under $30). So I try Buxom, and WOW. I’m not sure how this stuff works, but my lashes look fuller, longer, AND more sharply defined than ever. I never have problems with clumping, and even after multiple coats my lashes feel soft and almost natural. This is BY FAR the best mascara I have ever used! I’ll never go back!! Seriously, TRY IT.

reviews.review_title: Claims Are True, But Falls Short of Favorites
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have really mixed feelings about this mascara. It is very black and provides buildable volume that looks really amazing. It looks thick without veering spidery with 2 or 3 coats. However, this mascara smudged very quickly no matter how I wore it or what I put on my undereyes. The wand was also painfully spikey on my sensitive and very watery eyes. Buxom lip glosses are my favorite formula with no close second, and I wanted to love this mascara.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_text: This is my go-to mascara. At first I hated it because it made my lashes clump, but once I got used to the brush it became easier and clumping was a thing of the past. Also! It's cruelty free so that's dope.

It wasn’t awful, though. I will keep searching for my holy grail mascara.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this complimentary mascara from Influenster for testing purposes and it’s a great product. The brush is amazing, so many little plastic bristles, in the hourglass form, catches every single lash. The volume is great and it makes them look thicker and longer with not one clump.

Amazing mascara. Doesn’t clump and has an amazing plumping affect when you wear it with a primer. Couldn’t complain at all about this mascara. I always get compliments saying my eyes look “mesmerizing” :)!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have to say, my favorite thing about this mascara is the silicone applicator! I love how it separates my lashes and gives them a pretty natural look for every day wear. It doesn’t give much volume or thickness however the length and separation of the lashes is definitely there. I also love how I can wear this mascara all day long without it flaking or falling out. When it comes to removing it at the end of the day, it slides right off with makeup remover and doesn’t tug on my lashes. Love it!   ***i received this product complimentary for testing purposes in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The volumizing mascara is great! It doesn’t clump and feel like it does add volume as well as make them look fuller. It’s one of my favorites now! I received this product complimentary for testing purposes

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This mascara is my new favorite. I don't have many eyelashes, but this definitely made it look like I did. It does exactly what it says it will. I like the brush alot. It keeps it from getting all clumpy. I received this for testing purposes. I'm so glad I did.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: In love with the wand. It coats every lash without clumping. It didn’t smudge even though it’s not waterproof. I received this complimentary for reviewing purposes and I am hooked. Will definitely be picking up more tubes of this

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this mascara. I received it complimentary through Influenster and fully expected to try it and toss it like I have with hundreds of others before. I’ve been using the same mascara for the last 17 years with no plans to switch now, but this mascara proved me wrong. While I DO wish there was a waterproof option, this mascara blew me out of the water. I have tried so many only to be disappointed with how they drag my poor straight lashes down but to my utter amazement, this one did not. I LOVE the wand and that alone had me ready to switch from my old true.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This mascara has two stars only for the reasons that the mascara wasn’t waterproof so my lashes just didn’t look good! I felt like that wand was to big and it didn’t get all my lashes . I did love that the mascara was very black and it didn’t smear on my lower lashes. I was able to review this mascara thanks to influenster but unfortunately this mascara was not on my top list .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this mascara for free in my Influenster VoxBox! I really liked how it made my eyelashes look, I think it looked more natural than other mascaras I’ve used. I prefer this style rather than clumpy mascara. The only reason I’m giving it 4 stars is because it kind of smudges after a few hours.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great, great mascara for really fanning out and separating lashes. The brush is a rubber wand, but a similar shape to the Lash Paradise wand. Works very well at defining and separating lashes. It doesn’t make them very thick, but is extremely good at defining and fanning the lashes!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Not a huge fan - I don’t wear fake lashes so Iook for a lot of results from my mascara and I didn’t see a ton of lift or curl from this product, and definitely not much volume. I received this product complimentary for review purposes

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free as a tester. I really didn’t like the way this product worked on my lashes. I have short lashes and I like to use mascara that will enhance the length but this product was a disappointment..

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was sent this product and I overall enjoy it! The formula is on point and really coats my lashes when applied. You do have to add a couple of layers but it builds beautifully. May be my new mascara on the go!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried the Buxom lash volumizing mascara and I absolutely like it I really saw it made my eyelashes long and gave them volume not only that but the brush was able to separate nicely my eyelash. I didn’t noticed much clumping of mascara which is always good! I received this product for free for testing purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this in my voxbox from influencer.  I like the mascara for the days that I want to have a natural makeup look. It helps fan out your lashes without any heaviness. Unfortunately, I have tiny eyelashes, so I was not satisfied since it did not extend my lashes only added a touch of color with pretty separation. I think that if this product had helped lengthen my eyelashes, I would have liked it a lot better.

I received this product complimentary for testing purposes and I am in love. It is a great mascara and looks great with or without my false lashes. No transferring and the wand is easy to work with. 10/10 would recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Infused with glossy, patent leather pigments, vitamins, and antioxidants, this mascara nourishes and softens for fierce, flexible, fanned-out lashes you know they care about the product and ingredients  because they know everyone is looking for great lashes. Its def an amazing product with great coverage. I find it easier to apply and get quick results. I was able to receive this complementary!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed this mascara and found it to be very lengthening. I think mascara is a very personal thing since everyone is different but I quite like this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great mascara!! I love the wand, the little spindle things are very fine so it does an amazing job and separating your lashes to coat them individually.  I love the big tube so it’s easy to hold/handle and you get more product. I’m not sure if it’s quite worth $22 as it’s not anything incredibly spectacular but I think the price point is comparable to other mascaras of this caliber.  I definitely recommend!! Disclaimer: I received this product complimentary in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this mascara. It gave me whispy lashes without even having to put on fake lashes. I love the shape of the brush. It like how long the lashes look after applying. This is now one of my go to mascara’s. Thank you Influenster for sending me this complimentary gift to test!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was really excited to try this product as I'm a sucker for anything voluminous on my lashes. I have semi-sparse asian lashes and needed at least 5-6 coats to get the thick and full look. Even then, it didn't do much for me other than neatly separated most of my lashes. This look will only work if I'm going for an all natural no make up/makeup look. I received this complimentary product for testing purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The mascara worked pretty good. It made my eyelashes pretty black with one time using it. (I received this product complimentary for testing purposes)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first time trying out any Buxom mascaras and sadly I wasn’t that impressed. It did define my lashes nicely  without any clumpyness but that was about all it did. I did also try to prime my lashes first to see if that made a difference at all, it did not. It did stay put even when the humidity outside which was obviously a plus! This is a good everyday simple natural look mascara. I received this mascara for reviewing purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE THIS MASCARA FOR MY BOTTOM LASHES. This brush is everything, it separates the lashes sooooo nicely. I received this in my influenster box and I’m obsessed. Will deff repurchase when it is empty!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this mascara. I received this product as a free sample but I would buy it again. It really lengthens your lashes and makes them super voluminous!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE THIS MASCARA ! another fave in my list . will I buy next time ? I could buy can’t afford at the moment. worth it ? YES ! !  . It also separates my lashes unlike the others brand I’ve tried and this one doesn’t get clumpy so that’s a bonus. easy to remove & doesn’t damage my lashes . smells fine not chemical like some I’ve experienced. So far I love it. Never had problems .   I received this product for free for testing purposes**

reviews.review_text: Lightweight mascara and buildable! I wear false lashes all the time because I have short eyelashes. This is perfect to coat the lashes before that, but I really like them for my bottom lashes! They never clump, yet coat them perfectly.

reviews.review_text: Love this mascara. It goes on smoothly and doesn’t flake off. It does wonders for my lashes. It really makes them pop and look fuller. I received this product free for testing purposes.

The bristles are perfect for reaching every eyelash and not clumping them together. It glides on to the eyelashes and doesn’t clump. Makes them nice and adds volume. I am definitely going to continue using it as well as the lipstick because well...I’m obsessed

reviews.review_text: I really like the Mascara. It’s very bold and definitely gives your eyelashes volume. Love the way it makes my eyes look after applying. I received this products complimentary for reviewing purposes

reviews.review_text: very comparable to the formula of definicils, but maybe just a little bit better. it has a very long wear time and it's applicator, albeit plastic, combs through lashes and gives a dramatic lengthening effect with zero clumping.  *I received this via influenster

reviews.review_text: It definitely gave my lashes length and separated them great but it did not give me the volume I was looking for. I will definitely use this this for my lower lash line. I received this product for free testing purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is A nice mascara it was A bit dry at first but it works I received this complimentary from influenster.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: After using this mascara my lashes looked thicker and longer. I think that the formula is amazing because it does not give any clumps and the pigmentation is straight up ultra black. The applicator brush was great for the reason that it gave my lashes intense volume in just one simple stroke. Lastly the packing is luxurious. An application tip that I have when applying this mascara is to wiggle the wand around from lash line to the ends to be able to have a nice curl. I received this product complimentary for testing purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the brush on this mascara! The formula is nice and thickening to the lashes. I have extremely short lashes so I usually don't gravitate towards mascara like this, but surprisingly I like this one.  I recieved this product for free for testing purposes.

reviews.review_text: It’s a good mascara! Not blown away but it is definitely something worth trying since everyone’s lashes are different. I do love how clean and non clumpy it is. Love the bristles.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product! Makes my lashes long and when i use it with falsies it blends them really well. Product is way bigger than i expected which i am happy about! Doesn’t flake or wear off fast, would definitely recommend to a friend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Everything about this product is good. It glides on

reviews.review_text: Okay, when I first used it I loved it on my bottom lashes, but not my top! The second time I used it was even better. The third time I used a primer underneath and SOLD!!! I love it! I doesn’t leave my lashes clumpy and out of control. It is volumizing!  I received this product complimentary for testing purposes.

reviews.review_title: great brush but doesn’t meet my needs
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m half Asian with decent length, but no curl. The brush for this mascara is AWESOME! It is really great for separating your lashes if that is your primary concern. However, after applying the mascara, my curl flattens. It also has very light “coverage” so it doesn’t build at the length of your mascara. It’s decent and I want to love it, but it’s not for those who really need curl and length.   Picture is one eye natural, one eye curled with mascara.  I received this product for free to review from Influenster-thanks!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Great little mascara for every day use. It does not clump which is an issue I’ve had with other brands. I received this product for free or complimentary for testing purposes.

It was also easy to wash off which was great! I received this mascara complimentary of influenster for testing purposes

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complementary for testing purposes how ever I have previously purchased this mascara ! My lashes tend to stick together more so this really helps to separate them!

reviews.review_text: I received this complimentary in exchange for my honest review. I am still testing how it holds up after being open but so far I like it! It coats my lashes evenly and seems to last a decent amount of time. I got this in black and am pleased with the color!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was very excited to receive this in the mail! Im very picky with my mascaras but this one blew my mind. Lets just say its the only non waterproof mascara i use!:)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary  product testing. I love how light this formula is! Long lasting and doesn’t flake!! I will be buying the waterproof version!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Adding mascara is my favorite part of doing my make up ! This mascara fits perfect into my last routine! This adds soooooo much volume to your lashes. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a complimentary gift by Influenster. I felt like I didn’t have to wear lashes because the mascara did it’s job very well. The mascara gives your lashes amazing volume and holds it for a very long time. I wore for my cousins wedding and everyone complimented asking me what mascara I used! Highly recommend this to all my friends and family!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have a very high maintenance lash routine, and this mascara fits in perfectly! My lashes are very long, but straight and not thick. After curling my lashes with a heated Shiseido lash curler, I need a mascara that will separate my lashes and hold the curl. I was so happy that this mascara does that! Clump free, and helps enhance my lash length. I do follow with 1-2 coats of Too Faced Better Than Sex for volume, but after this lash routine my lashes look perfect all day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: just received my Full Force Plumping Lipstick in shade Dolly Dreamer and I am already liking it a lot! Right away I thought the packaging was really pretty and sturdy and I could tell it was not made of cheap plastic. I also love the kiss print that is embedded into the lipstick! I applied the lipstick and immediately felt a tingling feeling on my lips. The tingles turned into a cooling effect, but after some time I didn’t ever notice my lips look any plumper. That’s the only real down side to this formula. It wore really well after hours of me drinking/eating! I really love the shade I received and I think that the lipstick provided very opaque coverage. My pro- application tip would be to add some lipliner before you use this lipstick to give the perfect pout! I received this product complimentary for testing purposes ❤️

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This mascara works amazing for me! It doesn’t clump up like other mascaras can. It wears all day and elongates my eyes lashes really well. The wand I really love and think is unique it really grasps onto the lashes but is also gentle. Highly recommend this mascara.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: This mascara is great! It doesn't flake and it doesn't make your eyelashes clumpy. I've never liked mascara, but I love this one.

reviews.review_text: Well worth it. This mascara is waterproof, doesn't dry out, works really well to give me a goo mix of volume and length. I love it and will be buying it forever. I was using Better Than Sex mascara and it dried and flaked on me. I will never go back!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This mascara is INSANELY good!! It gives such amazing length, volume, and coverage without making you look like you have spider legs on your eyes, like some mascaras do.  It's really the best, it feels super light on application and I love the way it gives you the perfect amount of volume, just enough to go from natural to glam, and I love the feathery look too. It does not clump at all, my lashes look smooth, and they look pretty real! I use eyeliner and my lashes still stand out so much. The perfect mascara. I don't think I will ever stray from this mascara. Thanks, Buxom.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I naturally have long, full lashes, and this mascara just amplified them to absolute perfection!! Firstly, the packaging itself is beautiful, and the component is lighter (weight wise) than I had expected which is the sole reason I gave a 4/5 star review. The mascara formula is amazing because clumps? No where! Absolutely great formula that beautifully separated my lashes, while giving them volume and making them appear even longer! I use it daily now and when night time comes to remove it, it comes off nice and easy! Also, if you happen to get a little of product elsewhere on your face, let it dry and then use a q-tip to sweep it away-voila!! I love personally using the beautiful wand shape by blinking and wiggling the mascara wand upward (or downward for my lower lash line) which gives me the full effect of the mascara. I DEFINITELY recommend this beautifully formulated mascara to anyone wanting longer, volumized lashes without the clumpy mess many leave behind! I received this Buxom Volumizing mascara complimentary of Influenster for reviewing purposes.

reviews.review_text: This could be a great mascara if you have the lashes for it, I have shorter sparse lashes and its hard to apply and get even a semi-decent outcome. I repeatedly stabbed myself in the eye trying to get close to the base of my lash line and only ended up with a look that barely looks like I applied mascara. Or if I keep adding they look spidery, sadly I will be going back to my previous brand!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my number one, all-time favorite mascara. I love the way this mascara separates my lashes, fanning them out to a dream. I do like to use this with a lash primer, as it does not add much for length. The primer I use is white, so to cover it well, I first apply with normal strokes, brushing up from underneath the lashes, then I’ll bring the brush down from the top of my lashes - trying only to hit the tips, because any closer and I get mascara all over my kids- and I twirl the brush as I’m bringing it down to catch the lashes and get them all coated really well. I finish with another couple swipes from underneath to separate again.   The brush is the best part - the bristles are stiff (silicone I believe) and separated well, this is what gives the great fanning effect. I mush prefer this over a typical wiry brush because I think it helps prevent smearing/smudging the mascara as well.   Great formula too. Not too thick, not too runny, and doesn’t flake. It’s not waterproof, but I have cried with this before and it didn’t go bleeding down my face either.   Overall, EXCELLENT product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This mascara just glides onto my lashes. I find it gives an enhanced natural look. It's not insanely volumizing, but it definitely lengthens! There is never any clumping (a problem I had with the Too Face 'Better than Sex' mascara) which is awesome, because the last thing I need is flakes or chunks of mascara falling in my eye and causing irritation. My skin is incredibly sensitive to just about everything, and Buxom is one of the few brands that doesn't cause a reaction. Even with some mascaras, I'll notice my eyelids puff up or become red and irritated, but this one has caused me no problems. The only downside is when it is freshly applied, my lashes will sometimes stick together, so I comb them out before the mascara dries.

reviews.review_text: LOVE!! I've been on the hunt for a new mascara - I somewhat liked Smashbox, although it clumped a bit and seemed to flake somewhat during a long day. Buxom, though is much better in so many ways!! It lengthens like crazy, is buildable, and has a good amount of volume without looking heavy or fake. I feel like my lashes look stellar but still super natural. I tried the waterproof version first, but found it too difficult to remove with normal make-up remover. This one, though, comes off very easily with remover at night. It does transfer a tiny amount if you wear it for over 9 hours (which I do with work), but it's very durable and easy to touch up under your eyes after a work-day if you need to move straight into the night and keep it going. Buy it - you won't regret it!!

reviews.review_text: Makes my lashes long but it does smudge as the day goes on and leaves dark marks underneath my eyes.
