reviews.review_text: I love this mascara. I bought it first for my mom and then I borrowed it once in a pinch and it changed my life. It doesn’t come off under the eyes through out the day. I have very long eyelashes so the rubbing off under the eyes has been a problem for me with other mascara. It goes on very very smoothly. It the quickest and least messy mascara I’ve used. it’s also buildable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely LOVE this mascara!! it has excellent volume and no flaking. that's what I love the most that it doesnt flake through out the day. and it also doesnt look clumpy. I always get compliments, asking if they are real or fake, like how do you get your eyelashes like that? I'm like it's this amazing mascara!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This mascara does not stick lashes together hence lashes look naturally dark and dense. I got one from the Play! box and I love it.

reviews.review_title: Why is no one talking about this mascara?
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I know mascara is a very personal makeup product- what may work for me may not work for you and vice versa. But, for the life of me, I do not know why more influencers are not talking about this mascara. Gives beautiful length, formula is not too dry or too wet. I can apply multiple coats without clumping and the best part, it doesn't flake! And I am someone that is always using my eyelash curler to pep up my lashes later in the day! Received this in a gift set, and will be repurchasing in larger size when I run out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: in love with this product!! lengthening and volumizing while still looking natural!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Got it on sale. I really like the brush, they really comb my short straight thick lashes. Lengthen effect ok, might come back if I can't find a good mascara with a good BRUSH…

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this mascara. Great wand. Separates well and let’s your lashes look feathery and sharp at the tip. Nice deep black color. I use two coats with a lash primer, waiting a few mins between coats. Been purchasing for awhile now and have no complaints.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is by far my favorite mascara.  I have tried many others over the years and none compare (both expensive and drug store).  This one never clumps and goes on so smoothly.  Nothing else compares!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this mascara! I’ve tried so many different name brands in the past and they never made my lashes look nearly as good as buxom lash volumizing mascara makes them look. I would buy this over and over again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'll admit I was a bit hesitant when I saw how large the brush was on this mascara. I thought it would make application messy or difficult, but I was wrong! The brush works wonders for separating lashes. I did find that it takes a few coats to build up the coverage; this is definitely more of a natural, everyday look mascara. Also, it does not irritate my eyes, which is a plus. I will say it takes a few minutes for the formula to dry down, so for some people that can be a drawback. Overall, it's a good mascara (no flakes or smudges).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have purchased this mascara numerous times,it is by far the best mascara on the market at a fair price point.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Best Mascara I've ever had. It works so well. Never clumps, and makes my lashes look great.  I usually have difficulty with a longer wand (still prefer the short sample wands) but this one makes it work some how.  It's also really easy to add some eyedrops to it to keep using it so you use it all instead of leaving some behind.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great mascara! The waterproof one is perfect and isn’t hard to take off! Makes your lashes long and gives lots of volume. Easy, good mascara. It takes a little work to get it all coated on the lashes because the wand is kind of big but it’s not too much effort.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Flaked, was not a fan at al! I would skip this one

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve tried many mascaras at Sephora, generally the more hyped about products. I’m always disappointed. I never even thought about trying this one until I received a sample, and I was blown away. All those things the other mascaras are advertised to do, is what this one actually does.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I keep coming back to this mascara! The brush and formula are awesome. My lashes are medium-short and straight, this mascara really pumps them up and lasts all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best mascara! Goes on beautifully.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you are someone who, like I, cannot use waterproof mascara, Buxom Lash Volumizing Mascara is excellent. It does make your eyelashes darker. If you wear dark eyeglasses, it is a good idea to apply this mascara twice for beautiful effects. I hope Sephora will never stop selling Buxom!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this for years. I try other brands and wands from time to time and none of them give me the color, plumping, and separation of this mascara. It is truly the best. To make it even more dramatic, I apply it staged and it works wonderfully.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This mascara is great! I tried so many to try to get to what I wanted, and I finally found my perfect match!! Would highly reccomend this to anyone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I decided to try this mascara since I already love big tease and I'm so happy with my choice!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best mascara I’ve ever used hands down. I have blonde eyelashes that are on the fine side but naturally long. This mascara adds volume without clumping, separates, and adds the perfect amount of product. The brush is amazing. It doesn’t irritate my eyes or flake. I was previously using Chanel’s Le Volume de Chanel mascara which worked well but I would notice it flaking off after a few hours. This is my new go to! It works better than the Chanel and is much cheaper.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been buying this mascara since it came out, and nothing beats this brush.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was using Dior Show Dramatic Overcurl for years when I was given a sample of this product and made the switch after trying it.  I haven’t looked back - I’ve been so happy with the performance of this mascara. It does not flake at all and separates lashes so well.  It has excellent coverage without needing to apply multiple coats and it lasts all day.  All this at a lesser price than I was used to paying!

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I  returned it because it gave me raccoon eyes

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So when I tried this out the tube of mascara it seemed to have missed the mascara during production.  I emailed Sephora and the kindly sent me out a new one.  Upon receipt of the 2nd tube which did have a little more mascara but not much, makes it super hard to even know if the mascara is worth the money.  I will never try a Buxom product again.  Waste of money for me and Sephora.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: A great product I cannot just get enough of! It makes my lashes full and long, but also does not make them heavy and clumpy. Recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This mascara is my absolute favorite. Buxom is such an underrated company, so this product is not as well known as Too Faced's Better than Sex or Benefit's They're Real!, but this mascara holds it's own. The wand has many little bristles which not only grab each lash, but prevents clumpiness. The formula promotes lash length and stays all day. All of this combined gives your eye makeup a natural and dramatic look. I've gone through at least ten bottles of this, and I don't think I'll ever switch up!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really the best mascara I've used in awhile.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this mascara.  I am a mascara snob and this one is one of my favs.  I put this on as my base.  I have long lashes and this separates them perfectly.  I love the thick wand.  If you have long lashes I highly recommend this one for you!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's good when using too faced better than sex mascara first, then using the buxom to remove clumps. Other than that I wouldn't buy it again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Tried this mascara years ago in college and have kept coming back for more! Love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It is so good, it is the best mascara I have ever had. It makes your lashes super long and there are almost no clumps. It’s a very natural looking mascara and I really enjoy it. It doesn’t have the best volume but no clumps makes it worth it.

reviews.review_title: Amazing Mascara but hard to achieve volume
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Very nice mascara! I bought this mascara in the mini size and it came as a value pack allow with a full sized lip cream. Really like that it does not clump up. There are lots of thin long bristles that help to thoroughly coat you lashes. However I find that it takes quite a few coats to actually achieve volume. But it is one of my favourite mascaras and I love Buxom!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I honestly really like this mascara. It gives me volume that I never had with other mascara’s. It really does do the job if you want long and full lashes. I would recommend to anyone. The only problem is that it gets dry quick and I saw a dramatic decrease in volume when the bottle wasn’t even close to finishing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Barely okay. Leases were still stubby and not voluminous

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: my favorite mascara to date!!! it perfectly separates and lengthens my lashes but still gives them volume. two coats and i feel amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The formula for this mascara is so wet and messy that it gets all over my lids. I don’t like it on the top lashes for that reason, but I found that it looks so good on the bottom lashes. When I used it on only the bottom, they looked out of the world. I would only recommend getting this if your willing to spend money for a good mascara for your bottom lashes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I just tried this and its horrible.  No Volume at all, little length.  If anything, it just look like I have eyeliner on.  I just opened it out from the box and it seem dried out.  I want my $ back.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am really impressed with this mascara. I received two mini ones in two different gift duos I received as gifts, so I’m glad I have another after I run out of the first. This mascara is easy to apply, lengthens your lashes, and gives them volume without it looking unnatural and clumpy. This is the type of mascara that you can really go all out with or just swipe some on and run out of the door. :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This mascara provides a very clean look with no clumping and definitely highlights every single lash.  The volumnizing/lengthening effect is definitely minimal though, so it’s better for everyday or workwear versus a night out. I still prefer my scandal eyes retro glam for fully noticeably volume/length.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Has been my holy grail for 10 years at this point! I am blessed with naturally long dark thick lashes but this baby gets them lifted and separates like no other. I do usually layer a more volumizing mascara on top but def not necessary!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this mascara because it has a very long lasting wear and never smudges under the eye. It only enhances your normal lashes, it doesn't give you extreme volume or length, just a nice enhancement of your normal look. Also, I was able to get an entire year's use out of one bottle!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Great mascara but easily replaceable with drug store mascaras!
It takes a lot of layers to get a good coat and it flakes something crazy!! Flakes all down my face

reviews.review_title: The only mascara I will use
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this exact mascara for probably two years maybe more! The little bristles really help separating lashes and the formula is fantastic it is literally the only thing I will ever use

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great mascara great length and definition

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My all time favorite mascara.  Never clumps, great brush.  Lasts all day

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I actually don’t care for this product. It doesn’t seem to give me much volume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I keep trying others and coming back to Buxom.  It's one of the few mascaras I've tried that doesn't clump but still noticeably improves the appearance of my pale, somewhat sparse lashes.  Nice that it adds volume without length, since my lashes are already long and I wear glasses.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this mascara!! I've tried alot of different mascara high end and economical! None have given me lashes this great. Even after I lost alot of lashes I still can get alot of volume and length.  I won't switch my mascara!!! Its a holy grail for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've tried so many mascaras. And been disappointed a lot. For night-out dramatic I like Lancome Hypnose Drama and Too Faced Better Than Sex, but they both still clump. This is the only mascara I've found that lengthens, adds drama, doesn't flake, AND still looks natural because it keeps your eyelashes separated. This is my day-to-day go-to mascara

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ohmygod!!! This is the cheapest mascara I’ve ever bought but it is way better than most high end brands. It makes my lashes look long and dark, giving me the fake lashes effect! Absolutely in love with this and will be using for a loooong time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Gives me spider eyes ,I didn’t like it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: 5 stars for 5 Reasons 1. Conditioning. I feel as if this mascara conditions my eyelashes and keeps them healthy 2.Long Lasting. Definitely all day long, no dryness, it doesn't flake or smudge.  3. the more you use it, the better it goes on..literally! 4.Applicator. The applicator bush ensures to grab each and every eyelash, root to tip. 5.Volumizing. Magnificently so... my eyelashes have never looked so full and long, with any other mascara.   Bonus 6. you can use the whole bottle and it won't dry out... I have used other mascara's in the past that would clump or dry out before i got halfway thru it. But not Buxom. I use it all up, every time.

reviews.review_title: Transfers are for banks, not mascaras.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this mascara! I often facilitate discussions with adults and there’s nothing more annoying than finishing a day, only to look in the mirror and see dark lines from your mascara transfer.  This mascara completely changed that!! Even after 10 hours, I might see a tiny shadow of it.  Love this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This mascara works best for my blonde lashes. Makes them longer and thicker.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product! Makes my eyelashes look v long! I rope with lights camera lashes to make them look fuller

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my absolute favorite mascara. I first bought it a decade ago with a gift card I got for Christmas. I’ve never looked back! Any time I’ve tried another mascara, they just don’t live up. I find that my lashes look fuller and more defined after I apply it. It does flake after extended wear, but it doesn’t really bother me. I only wish they still carried it in stores.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this mascara. I have short, stubby Asian eyelashes and this makes it look like my lashes doubled in length. Doesn't smudge throughout the day or clump up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've used many different mascara's and this is by far one of the best especially for the price I absolutely love it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I'll be the first to admit that I am a mascara snot. I like what I like and its pretty much impossible to talk me into switching brands. I first received this brand as a sample and ONLY used it because I was running late and didn't want to run upstairs and grab my original (Tarte: Lights, Camera, Lashes) brand. From the moment I put it on I will never go back to a different brand. I have naturally long and full lashes and this mascara just enhances every aspect of them. It doesn't get clumpy and washes off with ease. BUXOM mascara for the win.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nothing special, really. It works if you already have great lashes... is black.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how long this mascara makes my lashes look and also thickens them. The brush is a little on the bigger side, so it takes a bit to get used to it. I have repurchased this mascara a couple of times because it's my go-to.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Even though i have only used 2 different mascaras in my life, i knew the difference. The loreal mascara made my lashes clumpy and heavy. But at the time I didn't know so. But when i decided to buy a mascara ,I saw this one and bought it, cause from the advirtising it sounded pretty good. From the moment i put it on i knew it was an amazing mascara. The wand hugs your lashes and coats every one of them indivisually. Its the perfect mascara.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has been my go-to mascara for over 10 years. I love the brush. It lifts, volumizes and lengthens my lashes without clumping or flaking. I've been asked on more than one occasion if I was wearing fake lashes because of the length and volume of my lashes when wearing Buxom.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow makes the lashes POP. I love the wand. I only took a star away because it does smear a little bit in my Lower lashes, but other than that it’s great

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve bought many mascaras before including Benefit’s They’re Real and Too Faced Better than Sex and this one is my all time favorite. It applys very smoothly and has lasted for 2 months so far and still applys strongly. Only con it that it has residue above your lashline, but most mascaras do that any way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used to bounce around and try a new mascara every time I ran out but I've been permanently stuck on this stuff for a few years! It never gets clumpy, even if the tube is getting low, and it's easy to layer multiple coats. I recommend it to my friends all the time and everyone who gets it loves it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this mascara! It lengthens and gives me volume! The best part is NO clumping!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Not sure if I received a bad tube or not but this felt very dry. I even tried it on my hand and it seemed like it was dried up or almost empty. Don't think I'd buy again without opening in store and trying.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Nice. I first applied an eyelash primer, than curled my lashes, and finally applied this mascara. I’m not mad at the results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The brush is amazing, it makes my lashes appear long, curled, dark, and separated but it smears under my eyes like crazy.

reviews.review_title: Can't believe I'm this blown away by a mascara!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Never thought I could justify paying over $20 for a mascara but I swear it is worth every penny!  Amazing brush, high quality non-clumping formula, no flaking or smudging and looks great all day!  Not sure what to make of the bad reviews as this is literally the most awesome mascara I have ever used in my life.  Tube seems to last a long time as well and never turns funky or clumpy over time.  I hope they never stop making this mascara! <3

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE this mascara. It's the best in terms of providing thickness and length. I will never buy another mascara again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don’t know if it gave me more volume than other brands, but I love this mascara for the brush! Super awesome. Does not clump or flake at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: There's really nothing special about this mascara. Your lashes look just okay, they dont last the whole day, the tube doesnt really seem like it's completely filled with product, as you run out pretty quick and the brush never seems like it has enough product. It's a major letdown, and other mascaras at Sephora (and drugstores, quite frankly) are 100% more worth your money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this mascara for so many reasons. I have tried a million different brands, and I still find myself coming back to this one. It gives your lashes a natural lift, and it doesn't leave a big clumpy mess.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It’s okay for a mascare. Probably wouldn’t purchase again. It did voluminous but it wasn’t worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I keep trying other mascaras and I keep going back to this one. It’s priced smartly, it lengthens my lashes, gives me great volume. The wand separates my lashes. So no spider lashes over here. No flaking, no clumps. It’s the best mascara I’ve found and I’ve tried so many.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite mascara, doesn't clump up on me and doesn't flake off though out the day! Makes my lashes look way longer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Best mascara ever. I have fairly full lashes and generally curl them before applying. Two coats and my lashes are solid for the whole day. The wand is awesome and gets perfect distribution of product without clumping. Gives a really nice fanned out look and has never given me the spider leg look 12/10 would recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This mascara isn't my favorite. It needs several coats to look thick and clumps. I had to add water to make the application go on right.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has been my staple mascara since several girlfriends raved about it. And it truly is a GREAT mascara! Goes on smooth (not a single clump) and no flaking. One coat to look natural, two or three for a more dramatic look. Also, run the tube under hot water for 2-3 mins before application and it goes on even smoother! (Best trick a friend ever taught me!)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: One of my favourite mascaras ever, I swear by it and recommend it to all my friends.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was very underimpressed with this mascara. It really didn’t do much for volume or length. I’m surprised at it is as popular as it is.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Recommended by a friend, but I was hesitant because of the cost. So happy I tried it. Truly fantastic quality mascara. No flaking. Goes on like a dream. Creates gorgeous long, thick lashes. (If Buxom ever considers any other color options, I vote for medium brown, please.) Highly recommended!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this! Doesn’t run under my eyes, gets every lash and is super black!! Definitely recommend!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My favourite Mascara.  It is rich and makes the lashes nice and fluffy and long.  Also doesn't leave them feeling dried out.

reviews.review_title: I have been using this mascara for 3 years!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My eyelashes do not curl whatsoever but this mascara does wonders for me! After curling my eyelashes, I apply this mascara and they stay curled the entire day. Also, the thin separated bristles on the wand help separate the lashes (no clumps at all!). The only downside is that it gives a more natural look, meaning that it doesn't make your lashes look really dark (I usually just lightly coat my lashes with another mascara to darken them more).

reviews.review_title: Great for long fine lashes! lightweight
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Finally settled on the mascara for me with Buxom. I have long, fine eye lashes, and the aren't plentiful. I find so many mascaras are too heavy for my eye lashes and will clump my lashes together (tacky). This is light enough and with the brush, I never have clumped lashes. They looks so long and don't irritate my lashes /eyelids like some others do.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have naturally long curly lashes so most mascaras work great on me but unfortunately I was highly disappointed in this mascara. The wand is so big that I can’t help but get mascara all over my eyes when I’m applying and my eyelashes look stubby :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to like this mascara, since I normally love buxom products. So  many positive reviews so got me thinking maybe I just got a bad one? From first use this mascara felt dried out and I find myself putting multiple coats on to see any difference... same quality as a drug store mascara...one perk is it forsure doesn’t flake!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So glad I received this in my Sephora box. After using up my sample, I immediately purchased the full size version!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE this mascara!  No matter how many samples of other brands I've tried, this one stays my favorite!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Excelente textura y me encanto

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this mascara! I believe it came in one of my Sephora subscription boxes as a sample size and it’s been a favorite of mine ever since. I love how large the applicator is; I feel like it covers all of my lashes in one swipe and it makes for an even coat. The formula lengthens & gives so much volume, even when I don’t curl my lashes before, never “spider” like, and my lashes are still quite soft even after a few coats. SO happy with my sample that I bought a full size at the next chance I got! 10/10!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this mascara-It lengthens my lashes  while adding volume without clumps! I would highly recommend this mascara to anyone!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Every time I wear this mascara people think I have false lashes on. I fell in love with it and every time i try a new mascara I go back to this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love mascaras, but this one wasn’t as impressive as I had hoped. It worked well without a doubt, but overall it doesn’t do much more than any drug store mascara. It gets very clumpy when it dries out, but if you extend the life of the product with saline, it becomes and good combing out type-top coat type- mascara. (If that makes sense) I would recommend it, however I think as far as affordability goes this gets 4 stars.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Separates and defines my lashes while adding a little volume. If you want long dramatic lashes this stuff is great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great mascara for sparse eyelashes and not clumpy or goopy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a really good mascara for this price point. It makes my lashes look nice, long, separated, and natural. It works better if you take a more gentle approach. I kind of roll the wand upwards from the bottom of my lashes. Easy enough to remove. I just bought my second tube

reviews.review_text: This mascara is nice for a natural look but it comes off quickly, especially in the summer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I keep trying other mascaras and end up coming right back to Buxom because it just works so well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Fattens those tiny short lashes right up and makes them appear at least twice as long. I love it being buildable also!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This mascara makes me happy. the big brush is great for big eyes. I struggled with never being satisfied with my mascara application. this product has changed my life, 2 coats gets you full coverage! literally no clumps. I mean it!!!

reviews.review_text: nice formula, applies smoothly, I love the brush once I got used to it. Just wish it didn't smudge on my bottom towards the end of the day. Does take a bit to dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: had to get used to not smudging it while applying, but I absolutely love this mascara, it’s dark and make my eyelashes longer. Only downside is that it’s not waterproof.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Hands down this is the BEST mascara I have used. Drugstore mascaras don't cut it and of the higher end brands I've tried this is the best formula. The application is even and separates lashes well. The mascara doesn't really clump or flake. Tart has a mascara from their clay line and its the bomb as well, really similar to this, but it gets goopy on the lash and you can scrape it off with your finger nails. This stuff STICKS and makes the eyes POP. BUXOM never disappoints.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite mascara EVER. I love how black it is, how nicely it applies, and the brush. God, the brush. It's got plastic bristles which i vastly prefer, since I live in a climate with cold weather and snow i feel like the fiber bristles always stick together and I can't apply, so plastic bristles are a must. The shape of the brush is great too, it gives great volume and length, without being such an odd shape that even application is impossible. This mascara is the most important part of my daily makeup routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It says volumizing but it truly lengthens. I didn’t get the desired thickness from this but it’s really great at separating and lengthening your lashes. The formula isn’t heavy but it is pretty wet and can be a mess.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: worst mascara ever, to clumpy, I wasted money on a useless product. doesn't ever deserve one star

reviews.review_text: Amazing! This mascara lengthens and seperates my lashes like no other! I've tried so many and always come back to this. Definitely my all time holy grail mascara. Perfect if you wear false lashes as it blends them in and doesn't clump or flake.

reviews.review_title: The best mascara I've tried in a years!

reviews.review_text: I love the Buxom Mascara brush; it grabs even the little lash hairs on the outside of my lash-line (which other brushes fail to grab). And the formula itself is so smooth; even after months of use, it's still so smooth. I own lots of different mascaras at the same time, and I alternate them (meaning I don't use one entire mascara, finish it, and then start a new one), I use one today, and a different one tomorrow, and the difference it's remarkable. Buxom is by far superior. I'm getting ready to order a new one at regular price. It's every dollar worth it.

The formula is a little wet at first but once you let the first coat dry the rest goes on smoothly!

reviews.review_text: I have been loyal to this mascara for about 2 years and I have never been disappointed. It not only holds my curl but adds so much length as it separates every lash. Defenitly a worthy buy!

reviews.review_text: I used to LOVE this mascara. It was my go to. I recently re purchased after about 8 moths and the formula seemed different and I noticed my lashes looked less volumized and lengthened. Tried the Tarte tarteist lash paint mascara and it is my new go to, it’s phenomenal!!!!

reviews.review_title: Okay... next time I will put a normal headline
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So there is a love hate relationship between me and mascara. Looks good, but I debate the trouble it’s worth because it is hard to find a great formula. You never know if what works for someone else will work for you. So here’s the skinny on this product. Granted experiences may differ depending greatly on preference and the time from when you first open the product to using it. Also other various factors, but trying to keep this short as possible. I will admit. When I first tried the mascara, it was clumpy. But I was warned it would be this way! It was recommended to me by a coworker and fellow Sephora junkie that when it is first opened the product is not that great. She advised me to use another mascara in conjunction with it. Generally the formulas in the “fatty” mascaras as she called it helped when starting out on it. I’m not sure if that mattered, but I used my old cover girl one that was starting to run empty. Apparently the more air exposed to Buxom’s mascara the better it becomes, but it can take a bit so starting it was tricky. Now I use just the Buxom mascara and no complaints. It will flake after long hours of wear like a day+ of wear. If you are an avid mascara wearer new to this product I would sample before buying and keep in mind that even still a full-size one may need to be aerated if you find it’s clumpy. I also recommend twirling the brush when applying, and making sure to skim the excess off back in the tube as it comes out with a lot. Thank you! Wishing you success on this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This has been my ride or die mascara for years. I’ve tried others and can’t find anything like it. It gives you a natural look but definitely adds length and volume. You can build it up too. I work out and sweat in this all the time and have no flaking or running EVER. Comes off so easily too. It’s magic!

reviews.review_text: This mascara is extraordinarily good. I have never had anything like this. It gives incredible length without clamps, your lashes look so long, full and natural.

reviews.review_text: I used to be a die hard Dior Show fan, but this just might have to replace it.

reviews.review_text: This mascara is so amazing. About a month ago, I picked up a Sephora mascara sample set and discovered this mascara. It was by far my favorite - it creates the most fluffy, beautiful lashes. It’s seriously great stuff. It lasts all day without smudging and doesn’t irritate my eyes.

I’ve been using drugstore mascara for a while and have previously tried higher end mascaras and loved them too. Hadn’t tried this one yet so I bought it. Doesn’t seem to build onto the lashes or create much volume. Does separate lashes very well, but I was not a fan of what it did for me. Barely noticeable with just one coat.

It does sell out sometimes online and in store didn't have it either so I had to get it from another beauty store.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this mascara, it does what it says it will do. It makes my lashes look fullet and darker.  Add lots of volume! LOVE

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of Buxom Lash Mascara in one of my Sephora PLAY! boxes and I am so glad that I did! I have tried many, many, many mascaras and this is without question the best value all around! It is the best mascara I’ve ever used - longs lashes with no clumps! This is an outstanding product; I highly recommend you try it out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great mascara! Doesn’t clump on me, and my lashes look super lush! Can sometimes move around if it’s super humid, but either way it’s one of my go-to’s for sure.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I simply love this mascara, you can use it for a more natural look because it leaves a thin layer on your eyelashes . It’s the perfect mascara to go.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this did lengthen my lashes but provided little volume. would only recommend if you want super natural looking lashes

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Received this product as a free sample. Since I started using it I noticed eyelashes falling out. I know everyone loses eyelashes but I’m talking 5/6 at a time clumped together. I had extremely full long eyelashes prior to using this and now I’m missing sections of lashes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the BEST mascara I have ever used. I have been using it now for almost 7 years and I don't think I will ever switch to any other kind. Delivers full lashes with no clumps. Amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved this mascara for my lower lashes, made them separate and look full. However, for my upper lashes they also did a great job separating each lash, but did noting to make them look “full”. So with that said what I did is go in with the buxom first and then follow with a Lancôme mascara that I have , and BOOOM gorgeous eyes! Will buy again for sure !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Easy and great to us.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this mascara for years....hands down, the best I’ve used! Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m glad more people are finally recognizing the wonder that is this mascara. I’ve been using it for years after picking it up on a whim after a frustrating search for a non-clumpy mascara that wouldn’t burn my sensitive eyes. This mascara lengthens, thickens, AND holds a curl. It seems a bit wet right out of the box but after a few days use, the formula thickens up juuuust enough to make it perfect. The wand is great too! Not too big. Not too stabby. Good stuff.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this as soon as my Play! arrived.  The mascara had me looking like a raccoon before lunch.  I tried it again with a bit of powder under my eyes and the same thing happened.  I just tossed it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've never heard anyone talk about this mascara, and bought it totally on a whim at the recommendation of a Sephora employee. It's one of the only mascaras that barely transfers above my eyes on 12 hour workdays in Arizona.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This mascara gives plenty of volume and length with no clumpiness! I can wear it all day and it never flakes off. Love the size of the brush as well.

reviews.review_title: Lovely, but needs a bit more black
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this for the first time and I really like it! I have medium-length, light, straight lashes and this mascara fans out my lashes and holds a bit of curl with a curler. Definitely elongates them. I do follow this mascara with Benefits They're Real because I don't think this mascara is black enough, I like a bit more drama. However, you can do several coats and NO CLUMPING! It's a nice formula that isn't wet or gooey, as Benefit's is, which was why I wanted to try something new.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing! Lashes look full and stay looking fresh all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely loved this mascara. It defines and separates lashes very well. Lots of added volume and length.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this mascara in a sample size in the Sephora Lash Stash Kit that included (Bobbi Brown Eye Opening Mascara, Lancôme Hypnose Drama Mascara, Urban Decay Perversion, Tarte Lights, Camera, Lashes and Buxom Mascara). I have light-colored naturally long lashes so I prefer mascara that adds a little length and darkens them.  Although a good mascara, I wasn't wowed by this product like many other reviewers. It wears nicely most of the time but smudges occasionally under the eyes and on rare occasions I would see a couple flakes. My favorite part is that this gives a very nice curl to the lashes when I roll the brush while applying. I didn't like getting poked with the wand bristles when applying mascara to my lower lashes. It gives raccoon eyes during a workout which isn't flattering and since I work out most days but don't want to wear waterproof mascara daily, this isn't going to be a staple for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Was not blessed with long , thick full lashes. Buxom mascara is fabulous.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best mascara to lengthen, separate, and lift lashes! I'd run out of my trial size and was dipping the brush into another tube to continue using this perfect bristle configuration before my full size arrived! The mascara is easy to remove but not crumbly like many non-waterproof products. Love Buxom!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Good but not the best.  Super reliable but not holy grail quality.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great daily mascara for people like me with long but sparse lashes. My lashes are prone to falling out with formulas that are too thick. It leaves my lashes feeling soft and natural. Only downside is that if you're looking for a dramatic lash look, this isn't the mascara I'd recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of this and I have become a fan. I’ve used all kinds of mascara, high and low end and this one just works the best. The brush makes is easy to apply without clumping or getting it all over the place. I don’t wear lashes and I don’t put to much energy into making my lashes look thicker but this definitely makes them more dramatic and noticeable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Must be pretty good because I got a sample, used it three times, got compliments all three times so I bought the full-size. The prize is awesome too. Chanel Inimitable Intense will always be my holy grail but this is a great day to day.
All time BEST mascara! I’ve been using it since it launched and could never use anything different!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: To start off, I have very long lashes but they are thin. Although this mascara does at some volume to then, I find it is more length. It does not clump which is great however, I find it transfers easily. For sensitive eyes I find this great because it does not make them itchy. Removing the product is no hassle and does not leave you with raccoon eyes. I think this is a good first, expensive mascara especially for how much you get for the price.

reviews.review_title: Love it but it melts in hot weather
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great volume and definition!  The wand is really good at separating lashes once you get the hang of the formula.  At first it looks like they clump together but keep brushing it out OR take off excess mascara on the wand before applying.  Looks amazing with a second coat.  The only reason I can't give this mascara a higher rating is because it transferred to the area below my eye which made me look like I had been crying or just had terrible under-eye circles.  I'm in Hawaii so I'm guessing that those in dryer or cooler climates won't have this problem.   Like some of the other reviews, I noticed that the mascara started to get clumpier as time went on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product!! It gives me great volume and amazing length.  The only thing I would say that when I was cuddling with my boyfriend, he got way too overheated and it did leave mascara all over his chest...

reviews.review_title: Large curling wand and great formula
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The formula of this mascara reminds me of Benefit’s rollerlash but less clumpy and thinner so it spreads and coats each lash easily. I do find that it is not longwear and after about 6 hours I find it start to fall off in little bits which is why I gave it 4 stars instead of 5. The wand is amazing and huge! It is silicone so it grabs the lash and coats it while lifting and curling. I really like this mascara and I hope they release a waterproof version.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This mascara does nothing. It does not hold a curl, my lashes fell flat as soon as this went on and it does not add volume. Waste of money and so ticked I bought it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great purchase! No flakes at all which was amazing and no clumps. On my 3rd bottle now and would recommend.

reviews.review_title: Loved, but on the hunt for a New Fav!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this mascara for 5 years now and for all that time it was my favorite.  I've tried all the top mascaras including the Sephora cult fav, Better Than Sex. However, I've noticed in the last year it seems to flake heavily. I will get flakes  under my eyes and little specs around my nose and even above my lip. Therefore, I'm looking for a new fav. I loved it because it was easy to remove, the brush is NEVER clumpy, and the final look is great. And being a blonde with more fragile lashes, it was moisturizing and not harsh. However, the flakes are a bother. If you can get past the flaking after a full day's wear, its perfect (unless you like that false lash look).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Adds definition to your lashes, it definitely makes your eyelashes stand out more.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Does define and is clump-free, but should not be advertised as Volume. My eyelashes are pretty long and blonde on the ends so I need something to give me that full look. Depends on what you want out of mascara.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this mascara. It is waterproof and makes your lashes long.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have very thin, short, skimpy eyelashes and after applying this, I was blown away by how nice my lashes looked. Whether that was due to the actual mascara or the awesome brush, I’m not sure.

reviews.review_title: a win for those who don't do false lashes
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: wow got this in my play box. this mascara is amazing for those girls who don't do false lashes. they separate your lashes beautifully and like any other mascara after applying about 4 to 7 coats your lashes look awesome !! totally recommend and will be buying a full size in the bear future.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Literally the best mascara I’ve ever used. Doesn’t smudge, get too dry, and holds a curl! The best part is that it never gets clumpy. Defines the lashes without making them spidery.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: While I LOVE Buxom lip polishes, this mascara was so-so. It might be good though if you have long full lashes. I can see this being a good mascara if you’re not trying to get in at shorter sparse lashes. Then you might not run the risk of poking yourself in the eye with the rather sharp rubber bristles either.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Got this as a sample from Sephora play. Nope! I tried multiple coats to get some kind of length or volume. They looked clumpy and stubby. I’ve never thought to try this brand before as nothing ever peaked my interest. Point taken.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this mascara in my play box and I'm hooked!! One coat is all I need for everyday looks. 2 coats give me that fuller effect I want when dressing up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The brush is perfection -- grabs hold of the lashes and separates them really well while delivering just the right amount of mascara.. No clumping, no heavy-handed goop.  I'll never buy the drug store brands again.  Get this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've tried a vast array of mascaras over the years and this is the first non-tubing (and cruelty-free) mascara that I can truly call Holy Grail.  I have severely oily eyelids and mascara transfers to my brow bone very easily (so much so that I can only use this mascara or tubing mascara when I'm going to be doing anything physically active that may cause me to sweat or if I'm just going to be wearing my makeup for over 12 hours). I also have naturally long lashes, but they are very straight and very light at the ends, so for an everyday mascara I'm looking for something that will darken, lengthen, separate, and hold a curl. This checks all the boxes for me.  I curl my lashes first, then apply one coat of this mascara and it makes it look like I have lash extensions. (It still looks nice with two coats but I've always been a 'one-coater' kind of girl.) It never clumps, the stopper in the tube is actually fantastic so you never get too much mascara on the wand that you need to scrape off or waste, and the wand design (though it may look a tad stabby) really helps separate and define my lashes. And of course, best of all for anyone with oily lids, it does not transfer throughout the day (that being said, I never have issues with any mascara transferring under my eyes so I can't comment on that specifically but I imagine it would hold up in that regard as well.)  Also, I've tried both the mini and the full size and I can say they really do perform the same (unlike a lot of mascaras).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Loved it... i have long lashes and they looked like i have fake eyelashes on

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A true dark black. Personally doesn't do it for me though. There is little lift. The end result are long, thin, and sparse lashes. Very spidery. The mascara does a great job lengthening, but provides no volume or thickening.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This mascara is so lengthening. I can apply 2-3 coats without clumping.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love the wand, Love the amount of product on the wand, Love the deep black thickening and separating action it’s got going on! Soo nice!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this mascara. I received a sample and then bought the full-size. It does not clump up on my short lashes at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked this at first, but I noticed it started to get clumpy after the first two weeks of use. The application was great and it made my lashes look great, but I was really disappointed when by week three it just wasn’t applying like it had the week-two weeks before. If it were a $10 mascara, I would be less disappointed. My sister would only use it on a weekend night out and didn’t have that problem. To me, that’s not worth the money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's okay. Not as much lift as I would have liked. Some smudging at the end of the day but it's not bad. It does fan out your lashes though for that fluttery look but really need to pile it on in order to get it to look va-va-voom ready for special events. For reference, I need around 3-4 coats to get the effect that I get with 2-3 coats of MUFE Smoky Lash for event looks and 2 coats vs 1 coat for day to day wear.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: smooth and glossy...doesn't clump...great applicator for getting to the both ends of the eyelashes

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this mascara! Great brush that evenly spreads over your eyelashes without crazy clumpage!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: this is my favorite mascara!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Extremely underrated and under hyped - zero clumsiness or flakiness, can wear without falsies and still look good

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I think this is great it is so pretty and volumes your lashes and makes them really long I would definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: best value for your money! This mascara wears well, isn't clumpy and is great for even short lashes like mine.  This mascara doesn't flake during the day, which is a huge thing I was looking for in a product. It last well, but will still come off with a cleanser or makeup remover. I hate the mascaras that you have to scrub yours eyes for minutes just to remove them.  This is long-lasting, but still able to remove. I would recommend this products for a quality mascara that is at a slightly lower price point than many prestige brands. This is my go-to

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I first got this as a sample size in one of my Ipsy bags months ago and have used only this since. It's finally on it's last legs so I figured it was time to invest in the full size. I have naturally long eyelashes and this mascara takes them to the next level. It creates length and volume, and doesn't leave my lashes clumpy. The wand is amazing. I highly recommend this mascara!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It does everything perfectly. Adds volume, lengthens, holds curls, and is clump free. The applicator is amazing and it gives a natural looking eyelash

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this mascara exclusively for at least 4 years and it's definitely my all time forever favorite!  It doesn't flake off or clump my lashes together.  I don't end up with furry looking lashes either.  I do find that it takes at least 2 coats, but it dries pretty fast.  I don't know what I'll do if they ever discontinue it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite mascara of all time. It's lifting, curling and elongating. I only buy minis of mascara because the shelf life is only six months...please make this in a mini version!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best mascara ever, I’ve bought the full size 6 times. Separates and coats lashes perfectly and works even better with an eyelash curler beforehand.

reviews.review_title: This really is the best mascara!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I don’t write many reviews, but I have tried many mascara brands over the years, and none of them are ever as good as this one!   I keep coming back to it because I love the smooth and easy application.  If you are someone who can’t stand clumping of your mascara, this is the product for you.  Consistent perfect lengthening and shaping, never a clump.   Try this, you will love it... unless you like thick clumpy mascara :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Buxom makes your lashes so long.  It doesn't clump up and doesn't run when you cry.  This is the best mascara I've every purchased/used.  It is worth the cost.  I feel that it even helps your lashes grow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this as a part of a sampler and was surprised for Buxom to be the winner, as I'd only known them for lip. My lashes are LONG, voluminous yet defined, and stay curled all day (after using a curler first). I've been asked if I'm wearing falsies!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've tried every kind of mascara I could get my hands on, and Buxom is THE. BEST. for my easily irritated eyes. Looks great and feels great all day, and I like the versatility of the brush too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Best mascara ever!  Lengthens your lashes without making them spidery!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’m on a hunt for the best mascara as I heavily use mascara daily and this one has been the best since the beginning.  Although it doesn’t make your eyelashes too voluminous, it does lengthen, coat and separate the lashes. I use this Buxom mascara combined with other mascaras usually as the base coat before the other mascara and to separate lashes if they become clumped.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve received multiple compliments on this mascara. It does not flake or run. It gives me amazing length and volume! I have tons of mascara samples from ordering online and from Sephora play and none of them have compared to this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for YEARS. It's the only mascara that doesn't gross me out or annoy me. I like non clumpy, feathery eye lashes that don't weigh my eye's down as the day wears on. This mascara is the bomb. But, if you like to apply multiple coats or like spidery thick mascara opt for any other brand cus this one is too flawless for you! BAM! Wish they had a brown burgundy colour too *sigh*

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I saw this on a co-worker the next day after buying it, before I used it. Her lashes were super defined and beautiful, and when she told me it’s because of this, I used it the next day. I’m surprised this is not hyped up more? It’s so good! Separates, coats every lash, lengthens, holds the curl. Amazing all around.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: was looking for a mascara that isn't super clumpy and also doesn't smudge all under my eyes after a few hours. this definitely fits the bill! One swipe leaves no clumps, however I apply multiple times (short lashes!) so there is some clumping - it's not that magical. However it's easily fixed with a lash brush. I would say this is more of a lengthening than a volumizing mascara, the brush is not as amazing as some others but that is what you sacrifice for not a lot of clumping. It still makes your lashes look great though and I love it for an everyday look mascara. This does leave some smudges under my eyes after around 6 hours of wear but they are not as bad as some other mascaras I have tried. This may be less of a problem with the waterproof version but I have not tried that because I hate trying to take off waterproof makeup! Finally this mascara removes easily with makeup wipes, micellar water, or cleansing oil so I'm very satisfied with this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve tried every mascara out there and this one is definitely the best by far. I get comments on my eyelashes and recommend this product to people all the time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: By far my all time favorite mascara!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am VERY picky about my mascara. Everyone is different, but on me: This doesn't flake off, this doesn't smear under my eyes, this makes my lashes separated and long and beautiful.   personally, this is my holy grail mascara.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: One of my favorites for my short, fine lashes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Always buy this mascara! I use it every day, Love that it is buildable for lots of volume or just a single coat for every day wear.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Thin or short lashes? This is for you. This will define and lengthen your lashes without clumping. It's also a wonderful formula that does not smudge or flake, but is still easy enough to get off with a standard makeup remover. The brush is to die for – the perfect amount of sturdiness vs. flexibility that will never lose its structure over time.

reviews.review_title: Loved the sample, not the actual size
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample size of this mascara and couldn’t believe how lush, long and thick my eyelashes looked.   So I ordered the full size in my next order.   What a disappearing act!   As the day went on, the mascara disappeared.  I do wear contacts but this has never happened with other mascaras.   Also, I have long bottom lashes and several mascaras end up on my face like raccoon eyes.   This one as the worst for the raccoon eyes so I use Lancôme Defincils on my bottom lashes with no problem.   I was so disappointed when I got the full size of this and returned the second tube.  I can’t explain the difference in the sample and full size but maybe I just got a bad tube ;(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Best mascara ever! Leaves such a natural look!

reviews.review_title: Loyal for 10 Years to Buxom Lash!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this mascara for 10 years- it is truly amazing! Even when I worked at Sephora and was exposed to/tried every other mascara, I am loyal to this girl. This mascara is far superior to any other out there. It lengthens, curls and separates. My lashes are full, long and beautiful because of this mascara.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I only use this on my lower lashes because it's not as thick to use on the top lashes. They perfectly brush through the bottom lashes and apply a light layer of product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
