reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I regret buying it. It’s very light and doesn’t really give s nice effect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is by far my favourite mascara if you want to really extend your lashes to its full length. It's great because its not too clumpy but I recommend getting a different that helps spread the lashes first then use this for added length.

reviews.review_title: Amazing for Dramatic Lashes Without Clumping
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Tied for my favorite mascara of all time; Diorshow.  This brush is amazing, doesn't overcoat the lash with too much mascara but still let's you build volume at your discretion. I ALWAYS get compliments on my lashes with this mascara.  I use the Aucoin eyelash curler and then this immediately afterwards.  My only wish would be for it to dry slightly faster.  I'm a fan of drier mascaras, (which I think most people would consider this formula between and medium and dry one.)  Just purchased my third tube, and I'm sure it'll not be my last.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a sample with another purchase and I didn't know if I'd like it. I had never tried anything Buxom but I really liked this mascara. It helps with curling. My lashes aren't as lifted as I would like naturally, so I use a curler and try to find a mascara that has a good hold. This worked well without clumping my lashes. It helps define them better than some other mascara I've used.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite mascara from bare escentuals. I have been using it since they first introduced it. It thickens and lengthens wonderfully.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite mascara. After I tried it, I couldn't use anything else.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Excellent for preventing clumps, although not as volumizing as some of the other mascaras available (such as Dior).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have very short lashes and have tried tons of different mascaras to make my lashes appear longer. This one has by far been the best I’ve ever used. It layers well, I put on about 3 coats. Doesn’t clump much, and I love how long the wand is. Makes it very convenient and easy to apply.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite mascara ever! Love the fine wand that separates and never clumps. Stays in place all day but washes away nicely at night with a good cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Does't break apart onto my cheeks and it layers nicely

reviews.review_title: The only mascara that I will ever use
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Such a great mascara! Does not clump up and make my eyelashes look like spider legs. The wand is AMAZING!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve tried so many mascara’s ranging from drugstore to high end and I find myself always going back to this one! It’s the perfect mascara!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This mascara is amazing. When I get a few drinks in me I tend to cry happy tears. So after crying and wiping my eyes every few minutes this mascara still did not run and it didn’t give me any raccoon eyes. When I apply it on my lashes it gives it so much life. It looks like I have thick beautiful lashes when I have this mascara on. I got my roommates and friends on this mascara and they also fell in love. I apply the Dior mascara primer first and then I apply this mascara on and MY GOD it’s AMAAZZINNG. I definitely recommend using it with a primer first if you want a more dramatic look but even without a primer it still looks amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best mascara - I've tried others but always come back to Buxom. It makes lashes long and separate, and doesn't flake or smudge. I go for a more natural/long look and can't speak to it's layering ability/big volume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: More natural than I was looking for but still a great mascara

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this mascara!  Not too thick, no clumps, and I can actually see my lashes.  The best I've used since MAC fibre lash, which has been discontinued.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Awesome, smooth application with no clumps. Not the boldest, volumizing formula but solid, simple coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This mascara is SOOO UNDERRATED!! Swipe up some of this baby and you will not regret it! I absolutely cannot stand mascaras that clump your lashes together. Pet peeve is when you can actually count your lashes because that's how clumped together they are. THIS mascara DOES NOT do that! It gives each lash volume and length, giving an incredibly poppin' look all day long without the issue of flaking either!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this mascara, doesn’t clump or smell or irritate the eyes. The wand is amazing too, my eyelashes just look so beautiful after applying this. Nothing bad to say about it other than I wish it came in brown!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very disappointing. I really love Buxom products so I was super excited to try their mascara. I ordered it online about a month ago. I can’t tell if it just doesn’t stick to my lashes or it’s too old? I’m not sure either way, I’ve tried many coats and get nothing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hands down the best mascara I've ever had and I've had A LOT. Lengthens, thickens and separates lashes.

Best mascara I’ve used!! Seriously, the only mascara I can wear that doesn’t flake off and end up in my eye, only to drive me crazy for hours. Other mascaras make my eyes all red and watery, but not this one.  No flakes, no smudges, no running!! Obviously it’s not drugstore affordability but i find it totally worth it. Try this mascara!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Best mascara Ive used. I have sensitive eyes and find that most mascaras flake and irritate my eyes, but this one doesn't flake and looks awesome all day. Makes my lashes look dark and voluminous too.

reviews.review_title: The only mascara I will ever use
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Most days my makeup routine consists only of mascara, so I've tried hundreds of mascaras over the years and not one can compare to Buxom. I have very thin, blond eyelashes and most mascaras don't seem to work for me, meaning they clump and don't cover evenly. This mascara is the ONLY mascara that I can use with confidence, knowing it will apply smoothly and evenly while making my lashes look long and full.
This product base is very runny and extremely clumpy not worth the money

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've used this product for a few years now and love it.  I've tried others and they just can't compare.  I love the brush and I have control to how little or how much I want to put on. My lashes stay separate and not clumped. It doesn't flake.  It lasts quite a while the cost may be more than a drugstore buy, it goes a long way and is so worth it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this mascara. it doesn't let my eyelashes stick and and makes my eye pop. I always get compliments with it. The reason I gave it 4 stars is because it doesn't hold the curl.

reviews.review_text: I'm really picky when it comes to mascara, and Buxom meets my expectations every time. The brush coats lashes evenly, applies smoothly, and almost never leads to clumps. The formula is good too - it's richly black and easy on my sensitive eyes. Though this mascara isn't going to make it look like you have falsies on, it does the trick when it comes to curling and volumizing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_text: Honestly I have been using this mascara for nearly a decade and I love it. I tried to be adventurous and get a new mascara recently and I hated everything else and came back to this one and gave up on my dreams of being an adventurous person.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Best mascara ever. I got this as a free sample and it was soooo good I am buying it full size now! I have the shortest eyelashes ever but this really makes them look so naturally long!!!!

reviews.review_text: I'm picky with my mascara, since I prefer a natural look and hate anything that goes on too thickly or clumps. This mascara does the trick, and I credit the brush for that! It separates each lash, and never leaves random globs or clumps. With many other mascaras I wipe the excess off the brush with a tissue, but this one is just dip and go - always comes out perfectly.

reviews.review_text: BEST mascara I’ve ever used and at this point I feel like I’ve used them all. This thickens, lengthens, and doesn’t flake off, even after a gym class. Nuff said.

reviews.review_text: I got this as a free sample and I have to say I have fallen head over heels for this mascara this is one of the few mascaras that I can build up and not get clumpy definitely going back to purchase a full size

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried lots of mascaras and this one falls a little short. It does a decent job on extension but there is no volume at all. I wouldn't try this again

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: By far my favorite mascara! It extends but also grabs onto the smaller lashes. I can use a light coat for the day and heavier for night. Highly recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of the best for amount of mascara with how much you pay and it's totally affordable. I really like that it separates your lashes well while still applying enough volume. I'm a regular user of this and have been for a few years. Haven't found a better one out there.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The wand separates my lashes well and mascara lasts all day. Sometimes mascaras weigh my lashes down but with this one keeps my lashes up all day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this product as I am a big fan of Buxom's Full-On lip polishes, but instead am leaving my first negative review. I don't know if my sample was old or I got a dud, but never before have I opened a brand-new mascara and had it be dry as dust! I think a couple of flakes came out when I pulled the brush out for the first time. After a few swipes on my lashes, there was no visible product whatsoever, so I ran the brush across the back of my hand and hardly any pigment came off. I decided to try my Diorshow sample instead, which I loved and could instantly see in one swipe! This is hands-down the worst mascara I've ever tried (including cheap drugstore ones I bought as a teenager)... the sample definitely didn't make me want to buy full-size!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I started using this mascara about a year ago. I still buy it. It’s my favorite mascara for the type of brush it has. It’s a little pricey but it works well for me. I only use one other mascara (different type of brush) but this one is my go-to.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: In love! This mascara makes my lashes look long and the brush is great and doesn’t give a “clumpy” look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Clumsy . It’s not what I expected.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Separates lashes really well, and gives volume and definition. However... I prefer the vanity lash due to it's drier formula. This stuff looks amazing, but goes on quite wet. I have to carefully get smudges off every time i use it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried almost every mascara out there and this is the best! This separates and extends lashes so well that my lashes don’t clump anymore

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this at Sephora and it was amazing so I bought it! It has become one of my favorite mascaras for a natural look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's a great mascara and typically my go-to. But I am finding lately that it dries out so fast (in the tube) It feels like it goes on really nicely initially and then 2 weeks later it's done.

reviews.review_title: Stunning results, but requires many coats.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wish I could rate this product 4.5 stars. I decided to round up, because this mascara provided me with the most beautiful lashes I have ever been able to achieve without falsies. It lengthens more than any other mascara I've tried without getting spidery, while also adding incredible volume and lift. To say I looked like I was wearing falsies wouldn't be quite right. Rather, I looked like I had such naturally amazing lashes that I didn't need them.  Why, then, do I feel the need to remove half a star? Because getting there requires a ton of effort. More specifically, this mascara feels like it takes you from 0-100. While many coats lead to the glamorous look I described, two coats do not look like anything, due to how fine and thin the bristles are. This is a problem for me, because I do not always have ten minutes to spend on my lashes. Because two coats don't cut it with this mascara, it's difficult to integrate into my busy morning routine. This is a stunning mascara, but the amount of effort required to achieve full results limits its versatility.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This mascara is just okay. I got in in a favourites set and i only use it if I can't find any other mascara and this is literally the only thing I see. Yes its very smooth but its almost too liquidy, doesn't give enough volume at all. Also the wand is ginormous so forget about trying to do your lower lashes, and top lashes you have to be very careful or else you will get mascara on your blended eyeshadow that you worked so hard on. I would pass and go with something else since I like volume and length, and all this really does is give my lashes a slightly blacker look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This mascara is so great. I have problems with smudging and flaking with mascara, but not with this. And it makes my lashes look great. I got it as a mini sample and then went out and bought the full size. I completely recommend it!! So good!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favourite mascara I first started using it when I got a trial size in the 4 pack of mini mascaras. Separates your lashes beautifully and lasts a long time :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have extremely watery eyes, so with mascara I have to be careful.  I loved this mascara at first because it looked beautiful and I loved the brush, but it didn't last even 2 hours until I had a smudges all over my under eye. It was terrible!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my all-time favorite mascara. It's not clumpy and the brush is the perfect size. I wear it every day and the tube has lasted surprisingly long!!

reviews.review_title: I will never use another mascara again
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have used Buxom's Lash Mascara for about 8 years now, and I will never go back to any drug store mascara or any other mascara I've tried at Sephora. Nothing compares to the smooth application and lush, non-clumping lashes this mascara gives me. I typically apply 2-3 coats, and each one goes on as smoothly as the first, giving me the length, volume and thickness without the sticky, clumpy look that most mascaras do. The only downside is that it rubs off pretty easily (cold weather, rain, snow, a sneeze, etc.), but I've tried that waterproof version and love it just as much--definitely recommend if you have allergies or in the winter. I've recommended this mascara to almost everyone I know. Do yourself a favor and give it a try--I promise you won't look back!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Best mascara ever !!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I went out on a limb and bought this mascara to try something new. I fell in love with the mascara formula and wand. My only complain is that the end of the wand gets very clumpy so you can't define your lower lashes as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: WOW! This is the best mascara I have ever used! The stiff brush makes it easy to go for a natural look, but also makes t easy to layer for special events. The formula guides on smoothly and leaves my lashes long and thick for the entire day, it doesn’t flake either. I first tried it in the sample kit, and then I just HAD to buy another. 100% sure I am never buying a different mascara!

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has been my go to mascara for years. I am always trying out new mascaras, and this is the only one i keep repurchasing. The wand is huge and takes some getting used to, and the formula is very wet. Iv'e figured out how to keep it form getting messy, though that was a problem when i first started using it. This layers very well, and creates very long eyelashes that are clump free. This lasts all day and once it's dry it doesn't flak off or smudge. I highly recommend trying this mascara!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I SWEAR by this mascara. The brush makes the biggest difference because of how smooth it is. I will never use another mascara!

I have very small lashes and this mascara really amps them up at 2-3 coats. Flaking has never been an issue for me until about 10-12 hours of wear.

reviews.review_title: Crying? That's no problem for this mascara.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My daily makeup routine is mascara and brows. I was looking for a mascara that would last the whole day, not apply clumpy, and would give my lashes a natural and subtle-yet-noticeable look (I know, I'm picky). After using this mascara, I found that it is everything I was looking for. It gave my lashes a nice and natural look but wasn't overpowering, it lasted through me bawling my eyes out from a movie, and fulfills its promise to be clump free. Now, if I'm being honest, I'm not the best at applying makeup, especially eye makeup. This mascara was easy to apply although it does take a bit to dry. I will definitely be buying again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: Love this mascara! My new fav! I've tried the they're real which I also like. But this does not clump my lashes and keeps them nicely curled naturally.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I like this mascara if you put on a few coats. It wears nice all day without flaking or clumping, but I honestly feel like it’s comparable to a good drug store mascara. I wouldn’t spend the money on it again... nothing to run home about.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best mascara. I keep trying others and always come back to this one. Defines lashes, doesn't flake, lasts all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this mascara!! Great separation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Made my lashes thick and lush

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hands down the best mascara I have ever found. Applies smoothly for months. You’ll notice it gets harder to apply and a little clumpy when it’s time to replace the tube.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favourite mascara. It's perfect for long lashes that need separation and length. It's not a volume mascara but does add enough volume without clumping your lashes. Lasts months without drying or flaking.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Best mascara ever! Doesn’t get clumpy. Defines each lash so lashes look full but not fake. I always come back to this brand and type.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Never before have I given a mascara a 5-Star review.  I have been buying (and wearing) mascara for at least 25 years and this is by far the best I’ve used in a long time.  I keep getting samples either with my purchases or in the Play! boxes.  This defines without clumping.  Without clumping!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is horrible. Barely lengthened my eye lashes. It also made them very clumpy at times... disappointed

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: New favourite mascara!! Dries fast. Doesn't flake. Doesn't smear. I'm only taking a star off since it's a bit harder to remove. I've always hated plastic wands but I'm SO glad I took a chance on this! Love.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this mascara for about 2 years now and I’ve never been able to find another one that compares. My lashes are very straight and have a hard time staying curled up but this mascara makes them stay up all day long. I use it with a lash curler and it’s perfect!! Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've been looking for a good mascara for a while, and this came as part of the Sephora's Favorites set. Boy, was I surprised when this turned out to be my favorite.  Despite a kind of weird applicator (I usually prefer a brush to the plastic spikes), the mascara goes on evenly without clumps. You can put on several layers easily, and it doesn't come off until you take it off. Best of all, it doesn't cost a fortune!
Great go to mascara !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have very fine, light coloured and short lashes. This product is not very effective for my type of lashes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love this product! Tried the sample and after i went through that, bought the full size mascara.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Best mascara I've ever used... even better than the Benefit Cosmetics They're real. Strong color, doesn't  dry or flake and make lashes thick and LONG! I got it as a sample and decided to buy the full size. This is my go to and a must have for your makeup bag!

reviews.review_title: The only one I've bought in years
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my absolute favorite mascara. I very rarely buy the same products twice (except for skincare) because I like to try out different products, but honestly I haven't bought another mascara than this one in forever. Instantly thick, lucious, crumb-free lashes and a great formula that doesn't smell too chemical. You can layer it without it crumbling to it is as good in the day than at night. Five stars

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my absolute favorite mascara in the whole world.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this mascara, might be on my 3rd one! I like how the formula is really dark and lengthening. I also like how this mascara isn’t very hard to take off (like They’re real by benefit or Better than sex). One thing I don’t like about this mascara: while it does a great job of curling and lengthening, it doesn’t really volumize

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this mascara!  I have purchased several of these over the years and it is my favorite.  It never clumps and always looks great.  Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great mascara! It’s a pretty basic wand, but it really gives you volume and thickness!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This mascara is amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite mascaras, ever! Gives AMAZING length AND volume! I’m also a very emotional human and cry fairly often but this stuff usually stays looking decent, especially since it’s not waterproof! The wand is similar to “better than sex” and I personally think this formula is much better!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have straight, fine Asian-type eyelashes.  As long as I curl my lashes first, this mascara hold my lashes in place all day without weighing my lids down and making my eyes feel tired.  It separates and defines lashes, making it a wonderful and not too showy day-to-day mascara.  It makes my lashes look longer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the subtle look I get from this mascara. Will/have repurchased.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My “go to” mascara!!! LOVE!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my absolute favorite mascara! works so well, length and volume are unbelievable!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is hands down the best mascara I've EVER purchased! The wand perfectly coats each lash making them distinct/separate (no clumps!) and making them look naturally full. No falsies needed with this! Luv it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my fav mascara as of right now. Lengthens and long lasting definitely would recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This mascara is AMAZING. It's totally underrated. It lifts and separates with no clumps!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely LOVE this mascara. I have at least six backups because I use this every day. I don't use it alone, but it does not matter what mascara I pair it with, whether it's goopy, dry, etc, something about this brush and formula fixes all other mascara issues. My lashes always look long, separated, and voluminous. It isn't water proof, but i've worn it white water rafting and it stays in place. I would buy this mascara in bulk if I could.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: FANTASTIC! Easily glide onto my lashes without clumps. 1-2 application give great fullness to my Asian eye lashes. I adore this mascara!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this! It's great layered with other mascaras or on its own

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Just an absolute favorite. Long wearing, holds your curl, and applies a beautiful amount to your lash to add volume but not look chunky. Never flakes. Never disappoints. Forever my favorite mascara!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've tried many, many types of mascara, and this one is my favorite. I keep coming back to it. It doesn't clump on me, which is what I have to have. No clumps. This separates and volumizes my lashes - which are blonde and need all the help they can get. The color is true black, and the formula lasts yet comes off with your normal remover.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love the brush of this product, but I did not find the mascara itself to really do too much in terms of lengthening and defining. I found the actual product to be too light - I like my mascaras to be a bit thicker. The tip of the applicator is amazing though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This mascara is the best ever. It makes my eyelashes look great. It glides on perfect and does not clump at all!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: In love with this mascara, it’s formula is amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great mascara, great color, and lasts forever !!!!!!

reviews.review_title: Forever one of my must havs!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this mascara for years! No clumping EVER and I can wear it for hours and it doesn't quit. Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Definitely one of my favourite mascaras of all time, lengthens, volumizes, adds definition and NEVER clumps!! I’m definitely weary with high end mascaras, a lot of the time I don’t find them to be worth it because I know some drugstore ones that are great as well, but to me this is SO worth it. It’s better than Better Than Sex, Lights Camera Lashes, YSL Babydoll, and more. Seriously sooooo good,

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This mascara was one of my first Sephora purchases years ago, and to this day it is still my every day mascara, I love the way it separates my lashes (I LOVE the brush!) and the way they look. It may take some layers (because its not cakey!!!), and can take a second to dry. But worth the way my lashes look!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great mascara and decently clump free which is usually my main concern. The brush is too thick on the end to reach my little inner lashes near the corner of my eye so that’s my only complaint.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I never thought to try this brand out for mascara. I always think Buxum=Lip Products. I'm pleasantly surprised by this stuff. No clumping of lashes, stays on all day and adds volume and length. Super great Product and at a nice price point.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have naturally long lashes so I need large brush that can grab everything and separate. This brush is great. I do not use on my bottom lashes as it does transfer throughout the day but LOVE the way it makes my top lashes look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Easy to apply a lot or a little and lasts all day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of my favorite mascaras. Thickens and lengthens without clumping your eyelashes. I've encountered mascaras that have some fallout by the end of the day, this one does not. It's amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is by far my favourite mascara ever. I usually use tarte’s lights camera lashes (still love it), but i was looking for a new one to try. I found this one on sephora’s mascara favourites area in the store, and immediately fell in love! It make my lashes soooooo long!!!!!! I used to have extensions (which f*cked them up, don’t do it) and this mascara just gives my lashes a whole new meaning! If you’re not sure about it, just do it. You won’t regret it. And the price point is hard to beat for such a good product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite mascara. I've bought it several times now and I love it. It's not clumpy and the bristles really separate and elongate my lashes and I've received compliments from people I see every day! The ONLY thing that brings it down one star is that it seems to dry out really fast. I don't pump the brush and I keep it closed tight but it dries out faster than my other mascaras.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favourite mascara so far!  It separates my lashes without clumping or flaking. It volumizes and lengthens and wears throughout the day. It's easy to wash off and doesn't smudge. I have tried , what I feel like is hundreds of mascaras and this is my favourite so far.  It's not cheap but it's the standard price for a good mascara these days. I hope Buxom doesn't change it or discontinue it.

I've been using this mascara for a while now. I am a long-time contact lens wearer and this is the best mascara for me. It makes my lashes look thick and long and NEVER flakes into my eyes. I've tried a ton of different mascaras over the years and this is my all time favorite.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was receiving a lot of mascara samples but this one was my most favorite and I ordered one, before ordering something that really got my eyes was that it had over 8K reviews and everybody seemed so happy, the next highly reviewed mascara has about 2K reviews!! anyways. I was always looking for a product that doesn't fall of into my eyes after a couple of hours and drying on the lashes, this so far has been good. I would buy it over and over.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried soooo many mascaras and still searching for “the one” This is one of my favorites. Makes my black but short and scarce lashes stand out. Good volume and length, love the deep black tint. The brush is too big for my eyes and if it can get messy

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I could get a mascara that works a lot better at the drug store to be honest. It wasn't bad but it didn't have that wow factor.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am obsessed with this mascara ❤️

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: absolutely love this product! adds both length and volume! definitely a good daily mascara!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this mascara!!! Only one I will use. Not clumpy at all, doesn’t flake on me, and I love the brush.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not for me. It makes my lashes look nice but the formula just doesn't stay on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: With out a doubt my favorite mascara of all time. I’ve used Dior show, better than sex by Benefit, and a MYRIAD of other ones—but each have an issue like too clumpy, no length, etc. I never get clumps, I can do a couple layers to get big, ridiculous lashes and it washes off so easy (I hate having to use a degreaser to get mascara off). This is my staple mascara and I use it daily.

Got this as a sample and I have never gotten so many compliments about my eyes. So many people have said that my makeup looks great and this is the only thing that has changed. I will be purchasing the full size!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I will never use another mascara, this one is amazing! No clumping, doesn't bother my eyes like some other ones do. Makes your lashes look fantastic.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Hands down my favorite mascara, I've tried so many over the years but I always come back to this one. It gives volume and length. One coat is perfect for a wispy natural look or you can do a few coats for more drama. No flaking.

I really like this mascara. It doesn't do a whole lot in the way of adding length, but it makes up for it by lasting all day without flaking or smudging. It's my everyday go-to for a natural/non-dramatic look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love the way it gives my lashes length and volume!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love it! Minimal effort and maximal results mascara.

1- a million coats later and it still doesn’t look like I’ve got mascara on. 2- face wash, a makeup wipe and gel makeup remover later and I still have dark circles around my eyes from removing it. Definitely not a fan.
One of the best Mascara especially for the price. Very clean finish (never clumping) even if you apply multiple layers and every lash is evenly covered due to their unique brush.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Didn't last long. After a couple hours the mascara was leaving black smudges on my eyelids. Disappointed since the price was right and usually love Buxom products. Returned it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I decided to try this mascara because of all the amazing reviews. It's a great product at a good price point. It makes my lashes long and full without clumping. Just bought one for my mom, too.

I have been using this product for about 7 years now and it is my ride or die mascara. My lashes are long, but naturally straight and heavy. So, I have to curl them. Every other mascara I have tried would not keep my lashes up, but this one does without much effort. Amazing mascara, always recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was surprised that I liked this mascara so much. I don't normally like this kind of wand but something about this one works.   The formula doesn't dry quickly so I can really build it up without making my eyelashes all gross and spidery. I don't have watery eyes so I don't have a problem with it running, but I can see how it might not work for some people.   Very volumizing and lengthening, easy to work with, and can be touched up throughout the day without getting weird.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I actually really love this mascara and I'm super picky when it comes to mascara. It was the only mascara I liked in the Sephora Favorites Lash Stash box. It separates, lengthens, and adds volume to my lashes. It doesn't flake throughout the day and it's easy to apply several layers to create a more dramatic look. I've had a lot of people ask if my lashes were fake with this mascara on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's kind of light for me and doesn't really last all day. It does not dry up quick though and goes on smoothly.
My favorite mascara.  Super easy to use.   Brush allows good root coverage for lighter lashes.

reviews.review_title: Great mask for day and night!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my go to mask. I always clean it the applicator with a tissue before using it every day for longer lashes and to prevent product buildup.

reviews.review_title: Great on the bottom but not on the top
reviews.review_text: Excellent bottom lash mascara! Horrible top lash mascara. It's more of a lash tint.

I love this mascara for my natural days. It defines and lengthens your lashes and will stay put all day. If you like mascaras that give you a ton of volume, I would say this one isn't for you. But, if you enjoy lengthening mascaras that will always look good I would definitely say go for this mascara!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried many different types/brands of mascara over the years and I always end up going back to the Buxom Lash Mascara. The brush is amazing! Never clumpy and always satisfied with the length and volume that this mascara gives my lashes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this with 100 of my points and it's honestly the best mascara ever! It's good for people who want to make their lashes look longer too!
Love love the brush, gives length to my eyelashes & isn't clumpy at all, doesn't come off under my eyes, one of my favourite mascaras so far

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: While you get a lot of product for your money compared to other $20 mascaras at Sephora (.37 oz), I'm not crazy about the mascara itself. It does the job, but there is not a significant difference between the Buxom Lash Mascara and any over the counter brand mascaras that are significantly cheaper.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: 4.5 stars rounded up.   A little while ago, I decided to switch all my products from another company to products from Sephora. While looking for a replacement for my long-term beloved mascara I encountered a number of issues for my numerous, but fine and short lashes. Buxom Lash has enough teeth/projections to actually catch all of my lashes rather than clumping them together.   My only point of contention with this mascara is that the wand has a sort of hourglass shape, which seems to be lending itself to a bit of mascara on my lid near the tear duct.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hands down, my favorite mascara. Looks beautiful, better than natural, but still natural. I've tried all of the mascaras from the mixed box set and this is my favorite.
My favorite mascara. Never going back. I use it everyday.

This is one of my favourite mascaras. The brush spreads out my lashes so I never get that clumpy look and when I apply right after curling my lashes it actually helps to keep my lashes lifted even more

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The best mascara I've ever owned!! Never clumps and the brush is the best at separating, lifting, and lengthening! The only problem with it is that I hadn't found it sooner, I'll never switch mascaras as long as they keep making this one

I've tried tons of mascaras both high ends and drugstore brands and this is my favorite mascara ever! It makes my lashes super long and full looking. It never feels heavy or irritates my eyes or clumps. It's not water proof but I prefer that. If your curious about this mascara try it! Everyone I've recommended it too loves it too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this mascara for years and I still LOVE it. It doesn't clump, it doesn't get dry and make your eyes itchy, you can get great coverage and volume, and overall it's basically amazing. I highly recommend it.

I love this mascara. I usually layer mascaras so I usually start with a very wet, volumizing mascara. I use this one right after because the bristles do an excellent job at separating my lashes and making them longer. I only gave 4 stars because it does say the mascara is meant to add volume which it doesn't do, but I do love it for other reasons.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a sample once and really like to use it with more natural makeup. It doesn't clump on my lashes and feels light weight. It's very nice for a light, natural look. And it's buildable if you want a darker look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This mascara is great. It's one of my favorite go-to's. It is extremely lengthening and volumizing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I redeemed my points for a sample of this mascara and I have no regrets at all! In fact, this is my new favorite palette! I feel like besides lengthening them, it thickens them! Today, I saw a picture of me that someone took earlier and my eyelashes looked false! This is coming from the girl where her eyelashes always look so small and uses falsies if she really wants to appear decent in a photo. I love this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Got this as a free sample and I absolutely love it!  My lashes look almost as great as they do with the Better Than Sex mascara, but WITHOUT all the flaking and smudging.  Will definitely purchase again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My everyday mascara. Never has any clumps and the wand gets to every single lash. I have red hair, so the mascara getting as close to the root as possible is important for me. Lasts all day, doesn't flake or get sticky.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I discovered this mascara thanks to the Lashstash To Go sampler.  It is the perfect balance of volume and length without being overly dramatic, though you can build to a heavier look.  No clumps.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: One of my top mascaras!

reviews.review_buyer_description: red hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'll never use another mascara again.   Tried dior show, tried better than sex, wasn't nearly as impressed. I get compliments on this at least once a week.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is my fav mascara (even better than Diorshow!)!
By far my favorite mascara. Separates and  lengthens while adding volume. Builds up great !! My secret weapon

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best mascara I've ever tried. I can finally use something that doesn't clump my sparse lashes together. It truly elongates them and gives an elegant, natural look. This thing is 10000x better than Too Faced Better Than Sex.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this mascara! First got it in the lash sampler kit! And had to buy the full size! Perfectly coats each lash!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: YES. This mascara is essential for those of us with super fine, non-existent lashes. Definitely brings defininition to the eyes in a dramatically natural way. Received this as a sample and went on to purchase full size. Will buy again.

This is my OG mascara that I've been using for years. No matter how much I try to see what else is out there, I always come back to this one. The brush is one of a kind. I'm always skeptical about plastic wands but this one is great at separating each lash. The formula is almost gel like, very lightweight but keeps my lashes lengthened & curled all day. As an Asian woman with straight hair, finding a mascara that can keep my lashes curly & long is almost impossible. Buxom has never left me down.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This mascara is perfect. It gives full coverage and isn't clumpy. It's easy to apply and creamy in the best way!   I was a big fan of Tartiest before, but now I'm a Buxom lash girl

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this mascara. The brush is the best I have ever used. It lengthens and separates lashes without making your lashes look like spider legs. Amazing finish. My favorite!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: J'aime beaucoup ce mascara qui s'étend bien et ne laisse pas de dépôts. Il allonge les cils et n'est pas difficile à enlever lors du démaquillage.
My favorite mascara yet. Makes my lashes super long & defined.
This is the best mascara. The brush keeps lashes from sticking together and it lengthens lashes.

I used my points to buy the trial size, even though I've never tried the brand. I usually grab sample mascara since it has to be replaced so often, so I've tried a few brands. Not sure what the hype is over better than sex because this blew that one out of the water! The brush is a perfect shape and the bristles are angled in a way so that it catches every little lash. I achieved amazing definition even for the small lashes in the center and underneath. It is easy to build on so you can go for more than 1 coat without clumping. It's great for a natural look too, so some days you might not need eyeliner. The brush is actually long enough so you don't have to worry about avoiding corners with the dreaded mascara filled tip of the wand like you do with other products. The ratings are only out of 5 so that's what I gave this product, but in all fairness I would rate it about 9/10. I will be buying the full size!
Very natural mascara, would definitely purchase again.
Terrible mascara...it makes your lashes beautiful, but couple hours later it smudges under my eyes. Drugstore mascara works much better
This is the BEST mascara ever!!!!!! Been using it for years. It's so fantastic. It separates out the lashes while lengthening and volunizing them at the same time. Ugh I'm obsessed!!!!!!

Love this mascara--brush is rubbery with tiny teeth which ensures every last lash is reached.  It is one of the only mascaras that NEVER clumps.  I only wish they offered in a travel size for on the go...
This mascara isn't for a bold look. i got with a set of other mascaras and it said that this is for a intense lashes. it looks more natural to me

I really expected more from this mascara. It does give excellent definition, and it is a rich soot-black colour. It gives my eyelashes a nice fluttery effect. But is it lengthening or volumizing? No. This is almost more like a lash tint on me than mascara.
Absolutely amazing! I got this as a mini for Christmas and it is my favourite mascara I have ever used, goes on smoothly and doesn't clump my eyelashes together!

I've been using Maybeline Define-a-lash for years, I loved Buxom immediately. Its very similar which at first made me concerned that I spent some much more on it. But so far the Buxom hasn't started to dry up at all. - I've had it from 6 wks where Maybeline tends to starting drying up after 2 wks. Buxom may be more expensive out-right but I highly recommend it.

I've replaced this mascara many times over the years and will continue to do so.  I would pick this if I was only allowed one mascara for the rest of my life.  The formula is buildable while wet and is incredibly clump-free for a volumizing mascara.  It adds tons of volume and the perfect amount of length for everyday or special occasion looks.  It also dries relatively quickly on your lashes but does not dry out in the tube like other products tend to.
This mascara is amazing. It's easy to apply and my friends use and love it too.
Made my eyelashes look Yzma. Length but no volume.

This is such an underrated mascara. I've always had such issues with clumping, or getting volume and length. This mascara is my absolute favorite, it helps with all three issues and it looks very natural!
This is my holy grail for mascara. This mascara does an amazing job at fanning my eye lashes without making them clumpy. It makes them look full and sexy!
This mascara is my new favorite. At first glance I wasn't a fan of the wand, but I was able to get some good volume without clumping.

Unfortunately I'm not gifted with naturally long and curled eyelashes so mascara is always a challenge for me. However, this mascara gives my eyelashes the illusion of being as long as my friend's natural eyelashes are (I wish it made them better than the average natural), and I don't have to curl them after I put the mascara on for the curl to stay.

I got the travel size as a point perk, wasn't expecting much but it's now my favorite for day to day. Very lengthening and black, no clumps at all, but is easy smudged. Love combining it with the better than sex to get volume added to the length.
I got a sample and won't use it anymore. Worst mascara ever had

I have been using this mascara for the past month and one thing thats great about this is that if you do at least three coats it gives your lashes length, but I do not see much volume only downfall of this mascara.
I love this mascara so much. It doesn't clump and it's a very reasonable price especially because of how high quality it is. The brush is amazing and makes my eyelashes look super long.
Received this as a reward and was surprised by how long my lashes were after using this! No clumps either! Awesome product.
I've been loyal to the roller lash mascara but I received this as a sample and I think I found my new favourite!!  The brush is so packed that it makes your lashes look super full!

reviews.review_title: Worst mascara I have ever used
reviews.review_text: This mascara is the WORST. I don't know what it is about this formula...but if I curl my lashes before applying, for SOME reason it just takes the curl right out and makes my lashes stick straight down...which they never do. I didn't find it lengthened, volumized, or did anything good at all. If anything it made my lashes look super sparse and stringy. Maybe I got a bad batch or something but I hate this mascara and I returned it.
I will usually pass over all my other mascaras for this one. I even have bare minerals and they're real by benefit. Out of all the mascaras I've tried and have this is the one I love the most.

I got this one as a gift from the points bazaar of Sephora.  I couldn't wait to try it on my lashes and so I did.  So happy to finally see my lashes not clumping anymore.  Will definitely buy it in the future;)
Makes my lashes so much longer. Will buy again

After I bought this, I was hoping to not like it so o could get my. money back. But it's actually my new favorite mascara! It's similar to Benefit's Rollerlash in that it seperates the lashes and makes them dark, long, and adds just the right amount of volume. I will say though that this mascara isn't super dramatic, but is absolutely perfect for day-to-day wear
Its good for darkening lashes. It never clumps or flakes. I don't notice any lengthening or volume from this formula though. Glad I got a sample to try, but not what I am looking for in a mascara.

This came in a lashstash box of mascara I got a while back. Waited to try it because I'd never heard of the brand. Wish I hadn't waited, it is hands down my favorite! I use it when I'm going for a more simple look because it really doesn't give length or volume. But, it gets all my lashes, and doesn't clump at all. The brush is fantastic. I use my other mascaras (benefit, perversion, better than sex) for my more dramatic looks, but this is easily a favorite of mine.

I've loved this mascara for several years now - it gives your lashes a natural fluttery look. It is volumizing, natural, and it never clumps on me. If you are looking for something dramatic this probably won't be your pick, but this is perfect for an everyday natural look. I love that it never clumps on me!

This is the first and only volumizing mascara I have been able to use. Volumizing, has always meant clumpy in my experience. My lashes looked like falsies, no clumps, amazing volume and length. I have found my holy grail mascara!!!

My mom has been using this mascara for years and won't use anything but. She has very small lashes with no curl to them and this makes them long and full with just a few coats. I recently purchased it while missing my mom and use it daily now too. The brush is large and only takes 60 seconds to apply multiple coats on both eyes. It makes my lashes so dark, full, and long. I have 8+ other mascaras and I always use this one. Shy one star because the formula is very wet and transfers to my eyelid right at the base of my lash line no matter how I apply it. It dries quickly but I can't wear it with eyeshadow because I know it will transfer. I know there are solutions, like the tool that covers my lid as I apply mascara, I may need to try that next. Overall, this product is priced well, has a wonderful brush, tons of product, and does its job.

Love this mascara and have been using it for years! I have long but thin lashes and this product adds a layer of thickness without looking clumpy- enough for a subtle/daytime look . I have friends with thinner and shorter eyelashes who also swear by this mascara. It is a must try for everyone!

I love this mascara. it separates and lengthens without being stiff, flaky or dry.  only four stars because the tube and wand are ridiculously bulky and hard to handle. I think I will just buy the sample size from now on.

This coats every individual lash so unbelievably well and never flakes off under my eyes making them all dark underneath like every other mascara I've ever tried I'll purchase this over and over again forever.. full days use of it while it always looking freshly applied!!!
I love this mascara! I have tried a lot of mascaras in the past and this is one of my top ones. It works well and I see a huge difference in my eyelashes during the before and  after

I received a sample of this mascara months ago, and I am ordering the full size today. I love the length and definition I get with this product, and I can use multiple coats without it clumping or looking too severe.

I like the consistency and look of this mascara but, the wand is so bulky that it is nearly impossible not to get mascara on my eyelid. I have relatively long eyelashes so maybe this is better suited for someone with shorter lashes.
I have received a sample of this mascara, and i felt in love. it makes your lashes look very long like u are wearing some fake lashes. Definitely will purchase it.

I wanted a new mascara after my go to was discontinued and Sephora had a test kit with 5 high end brands that included a voucher for the mascara you like the most. This was the surprise winner, for me. I have long eyelashes. Average thickness. I had never even considered this because of the wand. I normally go for the thick (Urban Decay Perversion type) wands that really grab and layer on the product. This wand is gentle in comparison but it is super efficient. It works into every little hair and coats evenly. I think that is why this is the first mascara I've ever used that really is clump proof with patient application. No flaking. A bit of transfer after 6-8 hours because I wear sunscreen but minimal compared to others. I love how a quick coat or two gives my lashes a natural look with volume the roots and a nice tapered end. The thick blocked off tarantula leg tips on eyelashes are a pet-peeve, for me. I really didn't expect the vitamin enriched formula to pay off but after using this for the last month my lashes are getting a little thicker. I can see how this would not work for anyone with lashes on the shorter side. It really isn't a dramatic mascara. You aren't going to get false lash thickness or super extended length but if you're going for natural at it's best, this is something you should try.

reviews.review_title: Only Mascara I will ever use
reviews.review_text: this mascara I tried as a sample a few years ago and last month I finally bought. it's better than how I remember it. it defines and lengthens my lashes so smoothly. the brush really separates my lashes and does not clump at all.
Basic mascara brush, clumped. Would not recommend.

I stick to the cheap drug store mascaras because they do the job. Whenever Sephora has samples of higher end mascaras I get them to try. I've tried a few so far but none have wowed me enough to spend $30 on mascara. This buxom one was the game changer for me. The bristles are so soft and don't hurt your eyelid like some other cheap plastic Wands. The brush is straight and gives you that perfect cat eye look. I loooove the formula- non clumpy, doesn't transfer, adds perfect amount of volume and amazing length. I have pretty decent lashes for a girl, they can easily hold a .15 extension. So this mascara works great for me and is so buildable that I can make it look like I have extensions. Love it and will totally spend the money on a full size.

As someone who has been through a variety of different mascaras, both high end and drug store types, and someone who regularly wears fake eyelashes, I was a bit skeptical about trying this. I was definitely wrong! This mascara is AMAZING! Gives you a great, natural look without flakey-ness throughout the day. One comment: be cautious putting it on before you spray a setting spray. Any time I've put the mascara on before I used a setting spray, I'd always get mascara rub-off on my eyelids. No biggie, I just put mascara on after setting spray now, but something to be aware of.

reviews.review_title: For feathery and full lashes, this is it
reviews.review_text: I have struggled with finding a mascara that gives me full lashes without being clumpy or too spidery. This DOES NOT CLUMP at all! My eyelashes look so natural and soft. It perfectly coats my lashes too so they start thick at the root and fade out towards the end. There's always a trade-off with mascara: either you get out of this world volume and curl, or you sacrifice some of that for soft and natural lashes. I prefer the latter, and if you do too, get this product. It's perfect for every day wear.
I LOVE THIS STUFF. Like seriously OBSESSED. It makes my lashes look amahzannggg!!! no clumps, wide, long and beautiful lashes. Will ONLY use this from now on!
The best I have been able to find and I have tried A LOT of mascaras!!  Never flakes, separates and gives natural volume.

This mascara is my favorite! the formula is super smooth. Exactly what you would expect from this product. Im never changing my mascara again. This is my first BUXOM product and i love it! I tried this product as a sample at first. I loved it. This product may not be what you look for in a mascara, but for me.. this is by far the best! Enjoy!!!

I have tried ALL the different mascaras and this is the only one I have gone to buy a second time, it covers all the bases. It lengthens, volumizes, plumps and doesn't even clump! Even if you happen to apply a second day coat, still looks amazing.

I did not care this mascara. I got in a great sample pack, and this was one of only 2 that I would not use again. It gives a great, long, full look, but flakes pretty bad. Most of the mascara had flaked off by the end of the day, but it was easy to remove. It would be OK for going out on the town at night, no good for a long day at work though. Great for the Goth look, if that's what you're going for.

The buxom mascara stays on throughout your day and works well as a natural looking mascara. For me it keeps my lashes separated and voluminous.  Just be aware if you have short eye lashes that the brush is rather big and you will get it on your eye lids and ruin your eye shadow if you're not careful :)
Perfect combination of length, separation and volume.  I've been using this mascara for years and still come back if I ever try to stray away.
Lengthens lashes amazingly! My eyes are quite sensitive and this mascara does not irritate them or flake off. It also washes off easily even without makeup remover. This will be my new go to mascara.
I got this mascara as part of a LashStash from last year and absolutely love it. It makes my eyes look huge, yet natural. Doesn't smudge even after working out.

It does not give my lashes any volume what so ever. On top of that, the brush is so huge. The mascara will get all over the lids because of the huge brush which is a huge bummer. For the price, i am not happy with it.

I switched to this product from Dior's Diorshow. I prefer Buxom as it actually comes off with makeup remover, whereas Diorshow left a residue. The formula is creamy, clump-free, and does not smell like many other mascaras do. Perfect for every day, but you can easily add drama and volume with multiple layers. I usually wear two layers and find that the product does a great job lengthening my lashes and adding volume.

This was my pick for full size from the Sephora mascara trial pack. It does not clump at all and doesn't budge or flake through out the day. I like the natural look I get from this mascara. The wand is very different than what I'm used to and man, it really hurts if you accidentally poke it in your eye it does however do an excellent job of separating lashes. I will probably repurchase.
I love this mascara! It defines and lengthens beautifully. It gives a great natural look. No clumps.

Love this mascara...i've tried many. This one has a more natural look (it seems somewhat build-able though)...but there is something about it...it defines and lengthens my lashes like no other...my husband came home and seemed mesmerized by my eyes, he was just staring at me...when I asked what was the deal (Lol)...he said, your eyes look so pretty what did you do...yep, this mascara is a keeper!
this is my holy grail mascara. My first high end mascara was this one and no matter how many mascaras I try out, I keep going back to this one. It lengthens, volumizes and curls wonderfully
This mascara works for lengthening the lashes, but that's about it. I prefer a fuller look to my lashes, which this mascara did not provide. Also, the brush is HUGE, which can be hard to use.

My favorite mascaras are from Lancôme, but their mascara brushes drive me crazy because they're too soft and the mascara clumps the brush and on my lashes (I know I can get separate brushes but I don't). I received this project as a reward or sample at one point and was instantly impressed with the brush; it's stiff enough to comb mascara evenly onto lashes but pliable enough to use easily. The mascara itself provides good length but not great volume, in my opinion. Bought the full size because I like it, but I have never been able to commit to one mascara forever :)
Good, not blown away by any means. Fans out nicely but not very volumizing.
love this mascara..good lenghtening and thickening formula. love how it separates the lashes.

i've tried SOOO many mascaras, drugstore and high end. too faced, ysl, lancôme, benefit, urban decay, smashbox, bobbi brown, etc. and this is HANDS. DOWN. THE. BEST. i absolutely hate clumps and this gives flawless length and volume with no clumps at all. its lasted me months and i use it everyday. i always get compliments when i wear it. i'll never go back!!!

Every time I've worn this mascara I get compliments on my lashes. I have tried other mascaras and this one is my favorite. It really separates, lengthens and voluminousness my lashes and that's only with one coat! I also like it because it does not feel heavy. I have naturally curled lashes so I am not sure how it will work if you don't. I love the brush and the consistency of the product. It is very easy to take off too. I use the neautrogena wipes and it does the trick.

This is the greatest mascara I have ever put on my lashes, it's volumizing, and doesn't clump but still easy to take off which for me was hard to find with other mascaras. One thing that I would say is that its not pitch black dark so if you wanted a really dramatic look I wouldn't recommend this mascara. 13/10 would buy for literally the rest of my life.
Love the brush and the product, makes lashes full and long!
I got it as a sample and I love it! It doesnt clump your lash and give you the impression of fake lashes! Would definetely buy the full size

This mascara gives really great definition and wears well, no flaking or clumping. I just found that it really didn't give me any volume and only minimal length. Overall it's nice, just not what I am looking for. I ha e blond lashes and need some serious volume and length.
I received a sample/travel size, and I LOVE it! I haven't yet gotten the full size. But the sample was enough to give me full looking lashes.
I got this as a sample and like my title says, it's just okay. It took several coats to lengthen my lashes and the brush is nothing special. It also smudged off easily.

This mascara is amazing!!! I've gone through so many different types of mascara and this one has been the winner! I just purchased this a few days ago and I'm obsessed I already told all my friends about this mascara and they went out and purchased it and they fell in love with it! I love that it doesn't make the ends of your mascara all clumpy looking, it actually smoothes your lashes out to make it look flawless. It's amazing and I DEFINITELY recommend
This looks good on my but it smudges and flakes off when it touches my eye lids

I love this mascara SO much. It makes my lashes look super separated and lifted them so much. With this mascara you don't even have to curl your lashes it makes them look curled. It layers nicely and the wand is just amazing!
One of my favorite go to mascaras. Lifts and separates and adds volume. You definitely can't go wrong with this stuff

honestly the best mascara i've ever tried, was not disappointed at all. i'm really picky with mascaras and my lashes clump a lot but they didn't clump at all, and they made my eyelashes actually look like beautiful lashes, would definitely buy again!!!
Looked nice going on but was all over my lower lash line by the end of the night
This mascara has surprisingly lasted a long time without drying out. It is not clumpy and it makes your lashes look long. I'm onto my second tube :)

This is the best mascara I've ever used! Received a travel size and had to buy the full size when I ran out. Not clumpy, does not flake, and coats lashes perfectly. Does not have as much volume as Too Faced BTS, but I definitely favor this one more!Highly recommend and worth the price!

I absolutely love this mascara. I never have issues with clumping or drying. It makes your lashes look beautiful and spread out. It's my go-to, you can glam up even the natural look, and works for everyday or for nights out. I've tried so many mascaras but I always come back to this one!

reviews.review_title: people asked if I was wearing falsies
reviews.review_text: This mascara is amazing!! I don't even know where to begin. I have really voluminous and long eyelashes naturally, and therefore I struggle with clumping mascara a lot. But this mascara is amazing!! It gives more volume and length, and no clumps! Also, I curl my eyelashes cuz they are super straight, and this mascara does a pretty good job keeping them curled.   Also, I can see how this mascara would be good for people with shorter and/or thinner lashes as well, since the brush has short bristles, making it very precise, and allowing it to get all the way to the end of your lashes to make them as long as possible. I definitely recommend this mascara and regret not buying it sooner!!

I'm a bit of a mascara junkie, trying high end and drugstore brands, but I always come back to Buxom. None of the others can compare to how great this makes my lashes look. It lengthens and thickens without leaving clumps. And it doesn't irritate my sensitive eyes. I won't be without it!

The brush combined with the formula work amazing together for me! I have been using this product for over 2 years and I always come back to my holy grail! My lashes are fuller, but also tend to stick straight; but when I use this mascara after curling my lashes, it does a great job of keeping them curled, separated, and lengthened. I always apply this mascara in THIN coats starting mid-lash, and then finishing root to tip. I've had no smudging or flaking issues, only concern is I have to reapply sometimes around the 4-5 hour mark.

Oooooh girl! I love this mascara! It gives me volume without making my lashes clumpy. My lashes look long and voluminous ALL WITH NO CLUMPS!! :-) ALSO... NO FLAKING! Which is the most important part. By the end of the day I do NOT have little flakes of mascara under my eyes. It doesn't smudge either once is dries. So, I never look like a raccoon lol. I love this mascara! It is worth the price!!

This mascara is incredible.  It gives your lashes length, volume, and drama without being clumpy or flaky.  A  for it's ability to last all. night. long.  Would recommend to anyone looking for a new mascara.

I love how natural and uplifting this mascara looks. I wear it every day and have not found a mascara to rival it. I love it so much I bought it for my sister and now she uses it every day! 10 out of 10 would recommend!

reviews.review_title: get this if you want awful lashes!
reviews.review_text: I hate this so much. No volume. No length. It's so hard and uncomfortable. Takes so much effort to actually get a decent coat on. Tried with different brushes and was a little better. So disappointed though .. the search for amazing mascara continues!
After a few hours, this mascara is already running off under my eyes.  The brush does not separate my lashes or lengthen them.  Avoid wearing this mascara in humid environments.
This mascara goes on so nicely and looks super natural I'll definitely be repurchasing!

So I wanted to try a new mascara and I bought this after reading all the great reviews, but I have to say that I am really disappointed in this mascara. It felt already dried out and did nothing to help make my eye lashes look lush or long. It does stay on really well, especially during a workout,

why have i never heard of this mascara before?? i recently purchased a sephora favorites set with 5 mini mascaras and this mascara was one of them. used it and immediately fell in love! gives BEAUTIFUL volume without any clumping. seriously, absolutely no clumping at all while also giving crazy volume. not to mention, it lengthens my short stubby lashes insanely! volume, lengthening, separating, conditioning, curling, this mascara has it all. love love love it

I bought this a little while ago and didn't leave the review until I really had a good feel for it. You know, take the time to get to really know the product.
