Plus sides.. it's not clumpy which I think gives you the more natural look (love!). The product extends to the very ends of my eyelashes so they actually look as long as the are. It doesn't flake off through out the day and lasts as long as my work day which can range 5-9 hours (outside).   Kind of Cons... it is slow drying so I have to keep my eyes mostly closed while it drys otherwise I get black spots on my eyeshadow and brows. The non water proof is exactly that, not water proof so don't get caught in the rain or a sob story or you'll be a racoon. The wand is huge and takes some getting used to, but once you do.. WABAM! Eyelash on fleek  Over all I love this product, and recommend it to all my friends and everyone else.

This mascara is not popular for its ability to hold a curl but my eyelashes stay curled and separated all day long! I always get complimented when I wear this mascara and that says a lot considering I wear mascara everyday. I have tried soooo many high end and drugstore mascaras and this is the best by far.
I keep coming back to this mascara! It's seriously the BEST! I use a primer to give it even more UMPH!

I've been using Better Than Sex for a while, but I was disappointed that it flakes off easily after a few hours, so I decided to try this. My lashes are naturally long and curled, but they're pale, so I need volume as well as definition. This didn't give me volume. It did separate and lengthen my lashes, and they looked nice and natural, but the only thing that separates this from a good drugstore mascara is that it doesn't clump. It didn't flake off, though, which was nice. I'm not sure if I'm going to keep it.
The applicator is huge so it makes applying hard and the mascara is clumpy. Also it takes forever to dry.

This mascara is absolutely one of my all time favorites ! Up there with the Lancôme mascaras . I don't know why this mascara is so underrated because it is a clump free , lash boosting , lash thickening mascara that will have you saying  fake lashes who ?  THIS IS AMAZING and it's only $20 . Yes yes and yes . It doesn't flake off throughout the day or give me raccoon eyes when I use it on my lower lash line . I just wish it was water proof . One of my holy grail mascaras and it lasts FOREVER . Seriously I probably bought this mascara sometime last year (late last year ok) and it's still going . Don't hesitate !
Doesn't clump or flake. Makes lashes look full and long. A new staple in my makeup routine.

I really love this mascara & always hear about other mascaras and end up trying them and ALWAYS come back to this buxom lash mascara. I don't think I will ever give up this mascara. It goes on so evenly and I love the rubber brush. Also, with the big brush it is surprisingly easy to put on my bottom lashes.
I've tried so, so many mascaras !!!  FINALLY found one I really like. Would like a milder color (dark brown / brown-black) so it wouldn't be quite so drastic on my old eyes :-)

I have been using this for a few years after my previous all time favorite Calvin klein was discontinued.. I have a drawer full of other brands and this is my all time go to mascara. I am blessed with long but thin lashes and this stuff is amazing, my thin lashes go va va voom!  And it is very very black. Easy to fix if you get a clump too.
wasn't impressed with this , it didn't do anything to my eyelashes . it's just like drug store mascara.

Best mascara I've ever used. I keep buying this no matter what, can't seem to find any product better than this and it seems to stay under the radar which I think is crazy. Its not extremely natural but it's also not too intense
I've been using this for years and it still continues to outdo them all when I try something different.
The best mascara out there. I've tried them all. I always have this in my makeup box.

This is the first mascara where I've actually loved everything about it! The formula isn't too wet or too dry, the wand coats every lash making them look long, and thick, but nicely separated too. I've also never had issues with this flaking or wearing off. I've never worn this on my bottom lashes so I don't know how it performs on the lower lash line it terms of it fading or running, but it's excellent on the top lashes! Definitely worth a try.

I've been desperate to find a mascara that didn't fall off my lashes over the day and leave mascara dust on my cheeks. Bought a sampler set of 10 or so from sephora and this was an immediate standout and now the only mascara I use. Color is great. I have quite long and naturally curled, but nearly invisible lashes. This mascara gives good volume and great separation. And NO FALLOUT. I've probably tried 25  drugstore and high-end mascaras in the last year, trying to find my perfect fit, and this is it. Was actually a bit surprised, because I'd never heard about it and associated this brand with lip products. So happy it came in sampler bc wouldn't have discovered otherwise.

really dislike this mascara. does not give any volume to your lashes, nor does it have any curling effect. i have naturally long, curly lashes and this mascara creates clumpy straight lashes. worst mascara i have ever used

I LOVE this mascara. I used to be an avid better than sex user, but I went in store to find an alternative, as I find the better than sex mascara is clumpy, flakes easily, and the tubes dry out quickly. I instantly fell in love with this. The formula is smooth and the perfect consistency, it rarely smudges. It separates my lashes and adds insane length and a bit of volume, yet they still look natural and pretty; no clumps at all. The wand shape is quite similar to the hourglass shape of better than sex's applicator, however the bristles are rubber. The only complaint I have about this to date is that I tend to find that applying this sometimes hurts my eyes, but I'm pretty sure that it is more my skill level than the wand itself :).
Ugh  everytime it's 50.50 Whether its going to be a dry tube or not- always dries out on me in a couple days :( I love this stuff so much wish it would last and not dry out on me :(  whyyyyy
This mascara is the stuff of unicorns. I thought I would hate it because the wand is rubbery, but it does everything a mascara should- it lengthens, separates, volumizes and curls your lashes.
if there could only be one mascara, this is it  especially the travel size...the smaller brush gives more control in application
Très bon mascara allongeant et qui se travaille bien j'en met plusieurs couches VrAiment des yeux de biches j'adore

I've been trying to find the PERFECT MASCARA for 2 years or ever since I started to use makeup. I love how this mascara does not make my lashes thick (which also means it creates clumps) and I love how healthy and natural they look! They also stick out :)

This mascara does not clump at all and gives the appearance of healthy long natural lashes so it's great as an everyday mascara. The only problem is sometimes it makes my eyes water but my eyes are sensitive. The shape of the wand is also so good!
No spidery nasty lashes. this gets every lash and can build. No crumbling debris like the better than sex.
Gave it a chance. Used the entire bottle. Never fell in love :( if you don't really like mascara that gives you big thick lashes I guess this could be for you.

I will never not have this mascara! it is a God send. I have thick and long eyelashes which I know is a gift however, they're heavy and quickly lose curl so they'll just lay flat, ugh. This amazing formula uses a wax to keep my eyelashes up and curled all day! I'm always getting people asking me if my eyelashes are fake. I personally use the non waterproof for everyday wear.

Love this mascara! I've tried many and this one is by far my favorite. I use it with a lash primer and noticed my lashes look much better this way than when I wear it alone. That doesn't mean it doesn't look great when used alone. It really depends on the look you're trying to achieve,  but with the primer the lashes stand out more.
I really did try to love this but it was not for me. I have naturally long eyelashes and this did nothing for them.

Me and my friends agree: this mascara is BEST used for freshening up the mascara you've been wearing all day. It turns your day time lash into night time lash. Great at layering, lengthening and thickening without clumping, flaking off, or drying out. Confession- I've even worn this to a sweaty vinyasa class. It seals everything in, did not run down my face in an inky black river. I only really bust this baby out for going out at night when I want that fake lashes look.

reviews.review_title: Better than any other mascara I've tried
reviews.review_text: Beats any high end/luxury or drugstore mascara I've tried. It has a great price point and does it all. It does not flake or clump-- gives me fluttery long lashes with a curl that last all day.
Excellent product. Stands out amongst all products both high end and low cost ones. Continue to produce it
I got dry and had a weird smell

reviews.review_title: WHY IS THIS NEVER TALKED ABOUT!!!???
reviews.review_text: I got this in a mini along with 2 other products as a deluxe promo. AND IT IS NOW MY FAVORITE MASCARA I OWN!!! It's wiped out the better than sex mad at for me. It's so amazing and I don't know why it's never talked about!

I want to love this product so bad!! But I am not a big fan of hard bristle brushes, so this was a one time purchase for me. I already have longer lashes, so this helped with keeping my lashes clump free. But other than that, nothing too drastic
I love this mascara!! It never got clumpy once and made my lashes super long. It's a really nice everyday mascara and gives your lashes a little flick! I would 100% recommend this to a friend.

I'm a mascara lover. I've tried them all from expensive to cheap. But I have extremely sensitive eyes so I have to be picky, as they absolutely cannot flake.  I can't believe I'm going to say this but I will never use another mascara formula again. This one is perfect for volume and length and doesn't stick to the eyelash curler if you need and end of the day curl. Wish they made it in black brown but that's the only negative I can say about this amazing mascara. It's perfection.
Love this mascara!  Have been using it since it first came out.  Panicked when I couldn't find it at the Bare Minerals store, but thanks to Sephora, I'm in heaven!

This mascara is seriously amazing! The formula is great, just the right consistency, and goes on smoothly with NO clumping! That alone is enough to make me love it, but it also makes my eyelashes look longer and fuller. I've tried lots of different mascaras, but this is def my fave. And it's less expensive than a lot of other brands that don't give the same results!

reviews.review_title: Why did I ever leave you?
reviews.review_text: This is my absolute favorite mascara. It's gentle on my sensitive eyes, gives me major volume and length. People constantly ask me if one wearing fake lashes, even my mom! It's long-wearing, but easily comes off with makeup remover. I normally wear Clinique, and I used their High Impact mascara when my local Sephora was out of Buxom. What. A. Mistake. Nothing compares to Buxom!!!!

I don't think this mascara needs another positive review, hahaha, but I just wanted to share that it's my favorite mascara so far. This mascara doesn't irritate my eyes at all and I just love that it does its job at making my lashes look longer.

For a while, mascara was the only type of make up I would wear so I spent all of my time and energy trying different brands to get the perfect lashes. I tried this mascara and have not changed since! I'm always getting compliments on my lashes, many asking what lashes I use, and I'm like no honey, they're mine and they're REAL! Doesn't clump, spreads lashes perfectly and gives the right amount of length and volume. I'd give 10 stars if possible!

So I have tried famous mascaras like too faced better than sex and benefit they're real! Overall, I wasn't happy with the way my lashes turned out but everyone's lashes are different. Let me say that I LOVE THIS MASCARA! It makes my lashes long and have volume. I tightline my eyes so that's helps making them full and this mascara adds the perfect touch. I love it, I'm not sure if I'll ever buy another one. I'm in love with this one.  For $20 this is such a great price. This is the first Buxom product I'm trying, I will have to look into the other products if the mascara is this good!
This really gives your eyelashes a nice voluminous look while separating the eyelashes instead of clumping them
This mascara is literally my favorite omg it's so good I highly recommend

I've purchased the mascara sampler kit, as well as tried many other brands, and I keep going back to this mascara. After using another product for a few months, I purchased this again and was asked twice in one day if I was wearing fake eyelashes. It doesn't clump, stays in place, and gives my lashes the perfect amount of length and volume.

I usually use 'they're real' by benefit, but wanted to try something different. This mascara was just ok, I was looking for a mascara that would thicken and lengthen my lashes. I just didn't get that from buxom. My lashes were not very dramatic and just looked minisculy longer, one plus I found was that this mascara does not clump. I don't think I'd re-buy however and go back to benefit. This mascara is probably good if you want a day mascara that is not obvious.

This has been my go-to mascara for years! I've tried Dior, Too Faced, Marc Jacobs, Clinique, and numerous drug store brands but they either clump or don't volumize/lengthen. Definitely recommend this mascara- it's totally worth it!

I don't like the cakey look, this is very light and gives my extensions an extra boost without over doing it or without making my extensions clump together. Plus removal is so easy with just water it comes right off without tugging at all on the extensions. I use it everyday!

This Buxom mascara is the only one I will use. It has been my favorite for about 3 years now. I adore the brush. It is the only formula that has never looked clumpy on my lashes. The formula is smooth, applies easily and looks great.

Great product.  The wand is the rubber-type and normally they're not very good but this one is fantastic.  It applies evenly and can layer very well.  It's easy to build up to get a dramatic look.  I like that the formula isn't super thick so I don't have the goopy/clumpy eyelash problem.  I get long, feathery lashes instead!

I've tried dozens of mascaras and this is the best I've tried so far. My lashes are a mile long and feathery with this stuff. It's the brush that gives it that look. There are other mascaras that have similar shaped brushes and will give you the same look, BUT I've never had this mascara flake at all, which is the tipping factor for me. It's amazing. For those that say it does nothing for them, I feel like it's an operational error. The mascara brand  is far less of a factor in how your lashes look as how you apply it. You have to do it right! Start all the way at the base and work all the way to the top, then, after a couple of coats, just hit the tips a little, which gives you the length.
I suppose if you're interested in a very natural look then you may enjoy this.  Otherwise, save your money.  Any mascara from the drug store can give you the same or better lashes.

I have been using this mascara for a decade. I love it! Never clumps, makes my lashes look like they are a mile long. Some people may dislike the fact that it isn't waterproof, but since it makes my lashes so long, it makes it easy for me to clean up any mascara that ends up near my eyebrows (yes, it makes lashes THAT long!) and on my glasses.   I recommend it with enthusiasm!
I have super long lashes and it's hard to find a mascara that doesn't clump my lashes into looking like spiders legs. This mascara is the best!!!!!!!
I love this mascara! I got it as a sample and will definitely purchase the full size when I run out. It's very lengthening and volumizing without being clumpy :)

First review ever because of how much I love this product! I have tried SO many different mascaras, and I have always come back to this. It NEVER clumps, makes my lashes look double as long, and I get the 'flared-out' look I love. The brush and formula are amazing, buy this!!

this formula is thin and wet and never clumpy (if you apply it correctly). I have naturally long lashes that don't hold a curl very well but this mascara never weighs my lashes down and the brush coats every lash and really lengthens. After 2-3 coats I usually achieve my desired volume. The brush is also amazing, I always use my old wands as a de-clumper/backup eyebrow spoolie because it grabs hairs so well. People always ask if I wear fake lashes when I use this mascara.
Ive tired many - and for me, this is my fav. Goes one easy and stays on. No flake.  If you dont like a thinner mascara - you may not like this one.

I don't wear a lot of make up but always like mascara that doesn't clump or look chunky.   This mascara lengthens, separates and looks quite natural but gives your eyes natural look, yet made up at the same time.   The more you put on the longer, thicker your lashes will be. Works well with lash extensions also!!
This mascara is my favorite mascara i've used! It gives you full and lengthy lashes with just 1-2 coats! Lasts a long time too!
I love the brush and the mascara doesn't clump. One of my fave mascaras!
I tried this and did not notice a whole lot of difference with regards to volume and length.  Of course, I'm not someone to do 4 layers in order to achieve both either.
I originally bought this as a special offer having never used it.  I now buy it regularly as it is a fantastic mascara.  It lengthens, volumizes and separates.  It does not flake or run.
I was looking forward to trying this mascara but it just didn't do much for me.   It clumped up my lashes and didn't give me the volume or length that I was hoping for.
Great mascara but I hate that it smudges when it gets wet.

I love love love this mascara. It doesn't clump and it doesn't make my eyelashes feel heavy either. Although the description says tis a volumizing mascara, I personally find it does more for the length of my eyelashes than the volume but I still go out and buy it every single time I run out.
This is a great formula. It's never clumpy, goes on so smoothly, and I love the wand. Will definitely repurchase.
Love this Mascara! I've tried others, but none compare.

I received as a sample and really liked it. My eyelashes are getting short and sparse due to age, so it's really hard to make them look good without smearing mascara onto your top or bottom eyelids. This brush made it a lot easier to grab my lashes and give them a good coat with no smudging. With a 2nd coat, my lashes actually looked decently long and full! The only thing that disappointed me, and I didn't give it 5 stars for, was after wearing for several hours, I came home and saw that there was black smudging under my eyes. It wasn't horrible, but I do use powder to prevent that. I'll continue to use it and keep an eye on the situation before deciding to purchase full size.

I had high hopes for this but it makes my lashes look very thin. Also the product does not get on every lash. Overall I have a very hard time applying the mascara and am very upset of how it looks when I have finished putting it on. Definitely not worth what I paid. :(
I will only wear this mascara. I have been using it for 8 years, and no other product compares to this! No clumping, great separation, and volume!
Dream mascara, no clumps, perfect for me.
This is probably my favorite mascara

This takes several coats to get any volume or length. The brush is nice, and the formula doesn't clump, but there are plenty of other mascaras that offer that with better colume and length in one coat.

I've tried so many different mascaras from Sephora and drug store brands. I've been using the Buxom Lash Mascara for about 6 months now with no complaints. It goes on evenly, doesn't clump, makes my lashes look super long... the only thing is I wish it was waterproof but it lasts all day.
Separates and gives volume ! Really makes ur lashes look longer and fuller. Recommend using two coats

So I am trying to be a ethically responsible consumer and have tried to turn to companies that do not test on animals. I did some research because I was trying to find a good mascara and good primer that fell in line with my consumer morals. I had actually tried the Buxom as a sample I got once and loved it so it's no surprise as I did my research I came across it again.   I wore it today for the first time with Tarte's eyelash primer and that's all it took for me to know I hit the jackpot! Most mascara's I've worn flake and fall into my eye which is so uncomfortable and so far nada!  My eye lashes look longer and fuller and I feel like I could easily wear this with no eyeliner and have a beautiful eye look. Love it and it's on my must have lists now.

I have used this mascara for years and have never been disappointed. I am a firm believer that mascara is only as good as the applicator brush. This applicator is a miracle worker. I would recommend this brush and this mascara to anyone that asks! I can wear this mascara all day and both the water proof and regular will not flake or smudge.

I got this as a sample with my order and first tried it today. I'm purchasing the full size ASAP.  The brush is amazing. At first I was nervous because it's so big but it's amazing. It separates my lashes, and makes them look full! When I came on the website and saw the price and was blown away. Sooo worth the money!!!

I received a sample of this as a reward and I can honestly say I am blown away! It has a fantastic wand and makes your lashes big and full with no clumps. Best one I have tried so far at Sephora. I will definitely be buying a full size.

I love the brush for this mascara. The mascara itself last very long too, even when you cry. I gave it 4 stars because I do feel like the mascara dries my lashes and it takes me a little longer to take the mascara off at night.

I have been using this for years and it has always been my favorite. It really gives you that long, full look. I always got compliments whenever I used this mascara. Great brand, I definitely recommend you try it.

Have to give five stars because I am really surprised on its effect ! It gives you volume instantly for the first brush and if you want more volume go for another brush. It also lengthens my lashes. I receive this as sample and I will definitely purchase this when the sample runs out

I really like this mascara. It lasts all day, it makes my lashes look long, curled, full, and very black. That said, after the sample size I received was empty, I didn't feel the need to go out and purchase it right away. I probably will buy a full size once my current mascara is finished, but it wasn't so great that I had to have a new one immediately.

I received this as part of a 500 point reward and I absolutely love it.  It isn't clumpy on my lashes at all and the brush does a wonderful job of separating the lashes and making them look more sleek and defined.  I've also found that this works great on my lower lashes as well.  I'm currently still using the sample, but plan on buying a full size once I'm in the market for a replacement mascara.
I've used this mascara for a while and never found anything better than it!

I feel as if this mascara is highly underrated. i have been using this product for years now and I've never been disappointed! such a good quality product that I will never stop using. Ive used many other mascaras such as benefit they're real multiple tarte mascaras and even Dior and none of those compare to Buxom..

This is a good mascara overall. I got it as a deluxe sample, and I was very happy with the sample size. The brush is good, a little bit big for me but very effective.  I found the formula to be very good, build-able and not clumpy, though maybe a little thin. Although I didn't find it to be spectacular for volume on me, it was very good for length and definition. Colour is very dark, which was what I wanted. I'd say it's worth checking out the full size.

reviews.review_title: LOVE LOVE LOVE ALL OF MY BUXOM PRODUCTS
reviews.review_text: This is a repurchase for me. The Sephoras in my city carry a very small collection of Buxom in store so I always order online. I love ALL of their products that I've tried
This is my go-to mascara for every occasion
My favorite mascara of all times! It makes my lashes definitly longer and it separates all of them also! I'm in love with the brush :D
I do believe this is my favorite mascara. I'm not sure why the ratings aren't five star? The product goes on really smoothly, dark and thin, not clumpy. One of my favorites.

I am head over heels in love with this mascara. I have been on the hunt for the perfect mascara for years, and I have finally found one for a great price (I purchased the duo that comes with the travel sized mini).   I have long eyelashes as it is, so I wasn't looking for a lengthening mascara so much as I was a defining one. While it does add some length, it separates and defines my lashes perfectly and it is not clumpy in the slightest. I tried the They're Real mascara and it was also great, but it is impossible to take off (as in after two days and two showers plus waterproof make up remover it still wouldn't totally come off), and this stuff comes off in one go. I should also note I love the rubber applicator. It's great.

I'm not sure why there's negative reviews.. I have a hard time finding the perfect mascara. I've tried pretty much every brand under the moon and never found one that really stuck out to me.. until I tried this. This mascara is my holy grail! It doesn't the brush is awesome and it doesn't clump into a cakey mess but still applies enough product to make your lashes pop. I would definitely recommend trying it

This is literally the worst mascara I have ever used. When I took the wand out of the tube, it was coated in mascara, and when I scraped it against the side of the tube, at least a teaspoon of mascara came off on the side, however, there was still a large amount of mascara on the wand. When I applied it, my eye lashes became ultra black, which was nice, but they clumped together and immediately fell out of their curl. I could feel how wet the mascara was on my eyes, and about 20 seconds after I put the mascara on, I blinked and my eyelashes stuck together and the mascara transferred onto my lower lash line, causing me to have every beauty junkies nightmare, raccoon eyes. I'm so glad I got this in the lashstash sampler kit and I didn't buy the full size.
This mascara is too watery, it don't do nothing for my eyelashes. The formula felt like a drugstore mascara. I don't recommend it.

This is my right hand go to mascara. It's extremely underrated and I'm surprised no one has really heard of this. I've tried better than sex by too faced but it's extremely heavy and flaky. This mascara has a superb applicator as well as formula to make any lashes look bomb af

reviews.review_title: A cheaper version of Benefit They Are Real
reviews.review_text: Same performance. Intenser but sometimes gives you fly legs if not properly applied.
No volume, no length. This mascara defined my lashes but not much else. No drama!

This is without a doubt the best mascara I've ever had in my life. And trust me when I say I've tried to compare dozens of other ones to this they didn't even hold a candle. Understandably every product has customers that care for it and I think the reason is because this seems to be more for medium to lashed people. I have naturally long curled lashes and I put this on and my lashes hit my eyebrows when I look up. It never clumps or flakes on me. For the price range it is expensive for someone who is on a budget but in my opinion it is worth it. Take this as you will but I don't think I'll ever switch to another one and if you buy one I hope you enjoy it too.
Much better than Tart or drugstore mascara.

I read a lot of reviews on here of everyone's mixed feelings about this mascara but there's ways around the negative findings with his mascara, I've used it for yearrrrs and a tube last me 6months without drying out. The best way to use it is when you pull out the brush scrap the excess off back into the tube and when applying if you rotate the brush against your lashes as you go from root to tips it give the best results without having to apply multiple coats and without clumps and it also helps with the curl in the lash and fans them out better!

I am always trying different mascaras and when I discovered this one, I fell in love. It separates lashes and leaves no clumps. It also adds tons of length to my lashes. I have previously loved the urban decay perversion mascara and too faced better than sex and I would rate buxom mascara higher than them. 10/10 would recommend!

I've been using this product for years. It lengthens and plumps without making my eyelashes stiff. Perfect for defining each lash. I recommend this mascara to everyone i know and they all love it. Stays on well, but is not waterproof which i like since waterproof mascaras tend to be too hard to get off. Love this!!

reviews.review_title: holds a curl but ho hum
reviews.review_text: The only good thing I like about it is when I curl my eyelashes most mascaras will straighten that curl. This will hold it in place quite well. It's nice if I want a natural look but if I want drama, I will have to layer a different mascara on top.

I bought the sample size a few months ago just to have enough money to get the free gift at the time. I absolutely fell in love with it!! I have naturally long lashes, but this adds the volume everyone strives for, 10/10 would recommend!
Very average. Takes several coats to look thick enough for a night out. Fine for everyday wear. Best feature is no flaking or smearing. Otherwise, too expensive for what you get.
All time favorite. This mascara coats my lashes so well and doesn't get all flaky throughout the day. My number 1!
Lashes looked great. Except I'm allergic..ugh
Love love love this mascara. Stays on and adds super length and volume!
This mascara is great. It makes my lashes look longer while also adding volume.

Everytime I think I want to try a new mascara, I keep coming back to this one. Nothing compares! I have very short thin lashes and with this mascara, I don't need false lashes. It builds to whatever length I need. Great product!

I love it! I've tried countless mascaras and brands. I found this one about 2 years ago and I haven't looked back. Even though it is not waterproof, it lasts. The mascara glides on easily, adds volume and doesn't make my lashes look clumpy. It is my go-to mascara and the only one I wear. :)
If you have short lashes that dont a hold a curl then this mascara is the worst thing for you. I love buxom but this mascara is the furthest thing from waterproof!

I bought a Sephora Last Stash with this in it and it was my favourite mascara in the whole set so I went and bought the full size one. Well I went on vacation for 2 weeks and brought a smaller mascara. I came back and it is sooo clumpy and no better than a poor drugstore brand. Pretty disappointed because I thought I had found the perfect mascara!

I like this mascara for a more subtle day look, but you definitely won't achieve that super luscious Better Than Sex look with this product. It coats and darkens your lashes, but doesn't make them look much longer or thicker.

I was given this as a gift and I could't be happier! It seems to coat each lash perfectly and immediately makes my eyes seem larger. It never seemed clumpy and is now my favorite product sold here. I never leave the house without it now!
I like the way this mascara applies and looks once applied. But it is beyond the hardest mascara to get off - I won't be buying it again
Although it may make my eyelashes long and curled like I like them- this mascara is runny and loses that voluminous look as the day goes on. Wouldn't spend another 20$ on it.
perfect for everyday and nightout.  never disappointing!  make lashes fuller and longer and I do not use a curler.

This is my go-to mascara. I've tried a number of mascaras from Sephora thanks to deluxe samples and I always come back to Buxom. I have very thin blonde lashes, and I find most other mascaras just clump them together. I am always impressed by how this mascara separates and lengthens my lashes. I also really appreciate the sleek packaging - I hate mascaras with big, bulky, textured containers.
My all time favourite mascara! Lengthens and volumizes my lashes. Have bought it like 10 times and will buy again
This mascara is the best thing I've ever used. I love how it coats each lash and just lasts even without being water proof
I've tried a lot of mascaras, and this is my favorite. My biggest goal with mascara with volume, and this brush/formula is perfect for that. Not clumpy, or flaky.
Definitely made my lashes fuller and no clumps. Wish it lengthened them a bit more though. Overall a good product.
My favorite mascara love it!! Won't buy anything else!
My all time favorite mascara! It lengthens and volumizes with absolutely no clumping. One coat is all you need!
Good for lengthening and didn't flake, even towards the end of the day.  I like it and will most likely purchase again, but I am not completely in love with it.
I love this mascara! It's probably my favorite daytime mascara! Does not clump and is great for a more natural look!

It's a good mascara that gives natural length. I would give it a 4/5 except I found that if I didn't clean the wand often enough, I would get clumps. I feel like there are better mascaras out there that don't need to be wiped as often.

This is one of my favorite mascaras. It works well alone but I like it best as a mascara topper. It separates beautifully and reaches even the innermost lashes (which many mascara wands can either miss or place too much product). I use this to comb through my lashes regardless of which mascara I use as a base coat. It never clumps up on me and does a great job to remove clumps from any other mascaras. It never streaks nor smudges under my eyes, even though it's not marketed as waterproof. Whether I want natural or dramatic lashes, I always use this. My favorite combo is either Diorshow Overcurl or Lancome Hypnose Drama followed by this.

Throughout the day you might see some flakes, but very few. This definitely doesn't clump, And makes my lashes look like they are fake (in a good way). This to me isn't very good for bottom lashes because the wand is a little bulky.
Got a sample and I love it! Adds volume and length to my already long lashes. Haven't worn it all through the day yet, but i think it'll live up to my expectations. Definitely love this mascara!

I have used Buxom Lash Mascara for many years and have always loved it. I separates lashes perfectly and with a second coat, makes lashes longer. I recently purchased Too Faced Better Than Sex mascara because the sales associate told me it's their best seller and it's amazing. I hate it! My lashes look awful. So back to my favorite, Buxom! It really is a great mascara!
reasonable price，good performance，high definition which is perfect for my need. Love it！Be impressive！

Love this mascara. Switched from Too Faced Better Than Sex because I couldn't deal with the clumpiness. Without too many coats, this mascara never clumps and it really makes my lashes look great. Only complaint would be that it doesn't hold my lash curl, but that may just be the nature of my specific lashes. I do recommend this product for everyday!
I love the bristles but it makes my lashes look shorter :(
I've been using this for years now I've strayed away a few times but always come back to this mascara

I have tried all sorts of mascaras, expensive & cheap.  I find some are clumpy, some are too thin, do not build, etc.  This mascara makes my lashes look longer, fuller, thicker, and stays curled.  My favorite!

This mascara is so nice I really like it, good volume & length and it's so nice to have in your bag or purse its just so nice! Simalar to too faced better then sex but I like this maybe a little bit more

reviews.review_title: the best. tried everything. this is the best.
reviews.review_text: amazing. bought multiple sample mascara packs & none have beat this one, no matter how luxury the brand name. layers well. great for length & separation. not clumpy.

My eyelashes are thin and sparse and this mascara gives them substance like nothing else I've tried. It's smooth and clump-free to apply and doesn't require a million coats to look amazing. Definitely my holy grail mascara. Love it!

It took me awhile to get this mascara to work for me but I think it totally does now. I curl my lashes and apply one coat - wait a minute and then apply a second. The curl holds all day, my lashes look longer and fanned out. Cant get enough! :)

I have very few lashes and they aren't the longest, so I decided to try this mascara based on the reviews. Sadly, it did not work for me and I looked like I didn't have any mascara on at all (even with multiple coats). The  drugstore brand mascara I use off and on actually gives me more volume and fullness than this Buxom mascara. Will not buy in the future.
Great product!! Gives lashes body and volume! My only complaint is that mine dried out pretty fast but other than that i love the product!
Great product and the fact that this brand is cruelty-free makes me love it even more!!!
I have tried so so many mascara's but I have finally settled on Buxom. I like that it lengthens and adds fullness to your lashes.
This mascara is perfect for my eyelashes. The brush works perfectly. Lasts a long time and doesn't get clumpy. Nice long and full lashes

reviews.review_title: So underrated for such a great product
reviews.review_text: This isn't a glam KAPLOW mascara, but it is the PERFECT mascara for a light daily pop.
All-around best mascara! Never any clumps and I can get right to the root of the eyelashes to make them look smoky.

I originally got this mascara in a sample size a month ago and didn't even really think to use it at first but I instantly fell in love with it! This mascara will separate your lashes to give you long beautiful full almost false looking lashes. This mascara is by far my favorite so far, and I have already gone and bought the full size product. I recommend this product to anyone looking for nicely separated lashes!

I have been blessed with the shortest eyelashes you can find. Been looking all my life for a mascara that will make my eyelashes longer and fuller, a little more emphasis on the longer part. I hate those mascaras that have faux lashes in them because they do work but I always have the fibers getting in my eye. This mascara makes my lashes long and gives a lot of volume. Love it... best mascara hands down.

Disclaimer: I am a bold eyeliner gal, and prefer a more natural eyelash.  This mascara gives me exactly that: it separates my lashes, it really opens up my eyes, and adds that extra touch of delicacy to my otherwise dramatic eye look. On the days I opt for a more natural look, this mascara helps me look polished and wide awake. If you prefer a bold lash, it might not be the greatest, though I find it is easily buildable.  No clumps, no flakes, no problem! Also, the brush is really soft- it feels like a massage to your lashes! Definitely my favorite mascara out there.
Love it! Lasts all day doesn't flake off! Isn't clumpy, good brush.
Just purchased this mascara and so far it's great. Does not flake off or smudge at all, even after a full day of wear. The brush helps to lengthen the look of lashes. Will definitely buy again.
best mascara I've used.

I hate this mascara. The very first time I pulled the brush out there was so much excess. You can't even apply it smooth to your lashes. It gets clumpy immediately. My eyelashes looked and felt disgusting. I will never buy this product again.
Best mascara! I love it!
Since I use more than one mascaras.. this one gets the clumps out and truly makes my lashes look full. This will forever be my favorite.

I love this bold and beautiful mascara. I've not had a flaky or cakey experience with it ever. I generally save this for a night out as for my blond self, it's a bit much for daytime. And even with a few coats, you don't get a clumpy effect.

I really loved the Buxom Lash Mascara, it gives you a powerful natural look, I feel like every eyelash gets coated! And it doesn't smudge or leave little drops of product on your eyelashes. If you like a thick coat that maybe an issue, what I do is that I apply the product twice if I wan't a more dramatic effect.
100% perfect, feels soft, build-able and never clumps.,
Great mascara, buxom is the only mascara I'll use just because it works so well with my lashes. Definitely recommend!
I love this mascara. I have been wearing it for years. I get asked all the time if I am wearing fake lashes!
I like it and I'm using for every day! Like it very ,much
i bought this cause it was on sale. it is AMAZING. Separates like no other, and my lashes were pretty thick and they looked soooooo long. i used a primer underneath. definitely gonna buy this again.

I got this as part of a Christmas gift. That's the only reason I'm using it until it's done. That and the price. I use this and then use one of my favourite mascaras over on top of it. I love to have thick long lashes and this just separates them. No volume or length for me. I would not recommend this. I would give this a 3 stars but it loses one because this is pricey.

This is definitely my go to mascara. I have tried all the mascaras, and this one is the best! I have short eyelashes and this totally lifts them completely and you can't even tell how short they are. The product is best used when your lashes are curled though, because it really makes them lifted, voluminous, and bold. I totally reccomend to all!! Please buy!!
My everyday mascara go to. I have fairly full lashes so this works wonders for enhance my natural look.

This mascara was recommended to me by a Sephora rep. I was excited to use it for a special occasion and when it came to it, this mascara fell short of the hype. My lashes are naturally long and lay straight flat. This mascara has a hard time lifting my lashes. It takes me using multiple applications and the help of other mascaras for it to work. When worn by itself, this mascara will leave flakes around your eyes going through the day, so be prepared to wipe your eyes. Not a mascara I would recommend for long wear without reapplying throughout the night/day.
I was a bit hesitant to get this because I have always used drug store mascara, but O M G amazing, makes my long lashes look even longer and thicker!
I love this mascara! It makes my eyelashes so long and it doesn't clump at all. Definitely my new favorite mascara and probably will always be my favorite mascara.
The tube dried out in just a few weeks, and went on clumpy and flaky. Didn't use more than a month before tossing. Most drugstore mascara are better than this. Very disappointed for the price point.

When I first tried out this mascara in a sample size, I immediately fell in love with it. The bristles are spaced out just enough to get in between all the lashes and don't feel like I'm scratching my lash line. The product itself gives me the darkest and longest looking lashes since I have short, sparse lashes. It's my holy grail mascara!
This is like the best mascara ever . Nothing compares to this ! I would never purchase any other again

I tried this out at Sephora and the mascara looked great and I bought it. The next day the mascara was ALL over the brush and it was somewhat of a thick  consistency. The brush itself is partially why I got it but the product was too thick and trying to get it off the brush was just a mess. Returning it tomorrow.

This is absolutely my favorite mascara to use. I've used more expensive ones in the past (YSL, Chanel) and this one does a great of a job in keeping the lashes curled and volumizing my lashes. Also, I hardly have any clumping issues.

Favorite mascara ever. I'm picky, too. Things I love about it: It doesn't irritate my sensitive eyes. It doesn't flake off. Makes my lashes look amazing. I hope they don't change the formula because I've tried most of the best mascaras and this one stands out.

I have used this mascara for over 7 years not and I cannot find anything better! I usually don't write reviews but this mascara definitely deserves my time and effort. This is the only mascara I've found that keeps my lashes curled all day. There's no smudging, flaking, or clumping. And not to mention the bottle lasts FOREVER. I will always be a die hard fan.

Best mascara EVER based just upon the wand itself- coats every single eyelash individually, never clumps (even when it gets old). And the actual mascara product is great as well; doesn't smudge but still comes off without special removers. I refuse to wear anything else, and I've tried A LOT of brands.

My favorite mascara ever!!! It builds so nicely and gives me the look I desire. I have very thin, blonde eyelashes. I have to put on many layers to achieve the look I want but this product is the best one I've ever encountered. I've been using it for years now!
Had gotten this as a sample and this mascara transferred. Gave me that black eye/dark circle look. Gave a star bc I had to give one.

Great mascara for volume. Glides on easily and I like how the brush does a good job at separating my lashes. I have naturally straight lashes that I need to curl every morning. It was important for me to find a mascara that didn't straighten my lashes back out. This fit the bill. However, I picked up this formula by mistake as I was seeking the waterproof version. I have combination skin and my eyelids get oily by midmorning, which affects my mascara and eyeliner. This mascara gave me raccoon eyes by the afternoon so it went back.
I have been using this mascara for a couple of years and I haven't found anything better! It's a great value and the best for making your lashes thick and long! I would recommend to anyone!!

I have searched and searched for a mascara that doesn't give me raccoon eyes, or rub off on my brow bone. I finally found the one! This makes my eyes look amazing, full, and long, and it stays on! So happy!! I have very oily skin, so most other rub off onto my eyelids and under eye area. This stays put! I will buy this again and again!

this mascara changed my life. If you are looking for a mascara that emphasizes fullness without clumping then this is the mascara for you. I use this mascara every day and I've never had a problem with it. I apply a light coat to give my lashes an extra lift and I get many compliments from people assuming they're natural!

I received this last year for Christmas and it has become my go to mascara! I love it. it separates my lashes and makes them look longer and fuller! I've recommend this mascara  and given it to my friends and they love it!
I absolutely love this mascara! I use it pretty much everyday.
I usually find something about the products I'm using to complain about after 6 months or so and then I switch it up, but I've been using this mascara for 5 years and still love it!

After many years of trying many different mascaras and often switching. I've found my favorite and go to mascara. I'm a sucker for volume and this is by far the best mascara I've used for volume. Been purchasing this for over a year and will continue to do so.

I always get questioned about my lashes and my response is always It's boxum's mascara. I love this mascara so much!! I also bought the waterproof one once (by accident) but it also worked amazingly and still looks great after a sweaty work out (even after a spin class).

I can honestly say that this is my favorite all time mascara! Every time I run out you know I'm going back to sephora to buy a new one. It lasted me so long. It never clumps my eyelashes which is exactly why i bought it because of the brush type, it fans them out perfectly. I definetly recommend this mascara! Its worth the $20 :)
Gives great volume!!! And I love it so much wear it almost everyday.

a worker in store recommended this to me and I absolutely love it! It makes your lashes extremelyyyy long and black and keeps them curled all day.  It doesn't clump, but it also doesn't have a fully natural look, so it's a good glam mascara without looking overly clumpy.  I've never received so many compliments on my lashes than when I'm wearing this!

This is my go-to mascara! The best one I have ever purchased! I just re-purchased mine after getting one in January. I'm absolutely in love with this one. It's adds volume and length to my lashes! Definitely worth buying, you won't be disappointed with this one!

I absolutely fell in love with this mascara after first coat. It not only lengthened my lashes, but it caught each lash and curled it. I kept bragging about it to my friend who has really short lashes and after she finally tried it she was so surprised how much the mascara lengthened her lashes. This is definitely a mascara everyone needs to try!
You'll get some volume but it clumps up very easily. It's no better than buying a $10 mascara at the drugstore. In fact, some of those mascaras are better.

This mascara is amazing! I've been using it now for about 4 months and I can't get enough! It works better if you curl your lashes before you apply the mascara, but works GREAT even without curling them!!

I've tried many mascaras from high end to drugstore brands. Buxom is by far the best I've come across.  My lashes are very sparse and this mascara not only gives my lashes length and volume but never clumps. Definitely my Holy Grail mascara.

I have been a big fan of this mascara since I first used it, five years ago. It's wonderful! The formula is nowhere near clumpy or watery. My lashes look longer and defined and the mascara lasts all day, with no flake. I couldn't recommend this enough!

reviews.review_title: One Of My All Time Favorites!
reviews.review_text: I am a total mascara junkie and have tried so many brands from drugstore and high end brands.. Not many compare to the quality of Buxom. I've bought 3 tubes and will definitely buy again when I run out!
This mascara has to be the best one I've used so far! I'm very impressed by the quality and I'm definitely going to purchase it again!!
This mascara is definitely quality and long lasting! It is not clumpy at all.
I've been using this for about 5 years. It separates and lengthens without sacrificing volume. I always get compliments on my lashes when I wear it :)

Although almost all of my children are grown, I still give them Easter baskets and the like.  The Buxom mascara has been a staple in my oldest daughters Christmas stocking and Easter basket for years. I ran out of my favorite mascara (Tarte Gifted) so I raided the stash I keep for my kids.  The Buxom brush separates really well, the mascara didn't flake and while I will continue to use my regular mascara, I will add the Buxom to my beauty stash as well.

This holds a curl really well and doesn't irritate my eyes as well. It doesn't add a lot of length or volume, so if that's what you want in a mascara, I would look elsewhere. However, this is perfect for day to day use and on 'no makeup' makeup days. I wish they had a waterproof formula though, by the end of the day I notice that it has smudged a little bit on the lower lash line. It's not too terrible, but just something to be aware of.
I have tried every mascara under the sun and NOTHING has beaten Buxom. I think the key is the brush. Seriously though it's my holy grail
This is the perfect everyday mascara. It has great volume and it doesn't get Cakey when you build layers
Like this mascara a lot. I have sensitive eyes and this doesn't irritate my eyes.

This is my favorite mascara of all time, even compared to the 6 other brands I have tried from Sephora. It doesn't clump, goes on smooth, lasts all day and night, and comes off easy with my makeup remover wipes. For the last six months this has been my go-to! Can't survive without it!

I'm really impressed with this product. I have extremely sensitive eyes and skin allergies, so I tend to use whatever mascara I'm not allergic to — not want looks best. This product looks good and doesn't irritate my eyes. Amazing!   This mascara and wand create a natural look with separated lashes that are soft to the touch. It doesn't flake but it does run a little (it's not waterproof) if you cry or laugh so much that your eyes water.   I've achieved the best results with this product when I curl my lashes first and then apply several coats of mascara. I allow a few seconds for the mascara to set in between coats. I highly recommend it!
Best mascara I've tried! Rebought multiple times and keep going back. Only issue I have is that by the end of the day it's usually smudged some
Best mascara on the market. Doesn't flake and long-wearing! Highly recommend.
I've gone through almost every mascara out there and finally have found one I LOVE!

wear it everday, gives me natural looking long and full eyelashes. this has no clumps. I don't even need to use an eyelash curler either. it curls them for me. definitely saves time in the morning, and lasts all day. Definitely recommend it
Gives me thick, full, long lashes that last all day!

I've been using this mascara for about 6 years. I've tried other mascaras during that period but so far I haven't found one that holds a candle to this one. It only takes two layers and my lashes look longer, separated, and very buxom! I always get compliments on my lashes with this mascara. It's almost as good as wearing falsies.

THIS IS MY HOLY GRAIL MASCARA!! omg zero clumps. this mascara is absolutely amazing it's a gift from God himself. I absolutely love love love this. it gives my lashes so much volume and spreads my lashes apart perfectly!! I recommend this to EVERYONE!!
It's my absolutely favorite mascara ever. I've tried on basically every other mascara there is and always end up buying this one. Highly recommend
This mascara changed my life. It really spreads out the lashes and gives me volumous lashes that look great.
I got this as a free sample. It flaked off and looked like I had raccoon eyes. Will not be purchasing again.

It's seriously the best thing that happened to my lashes. I have long but very flat eyelashes. A lash curler and this mascara does for me what I thought was only possible with false lashes! The brush is great for separating and lengthening. I like a lighter formula that doesn't weigh my lashes down so this is perfect for me. This also leaves me lashes looking hydrated and luscious- there's nothing worse than dry, spidery lashes! It's absolutely worth every penny.

When I initially put this mascara on my lashes, I was satisfied with how they looked... full and long, just like promised.  However, 2 minutes later, my lashes had fallen FLAT, and looked worse than they did with out mascara. The formula is almost heavy on my lashes, and no matter how many or how few layers I apply, my lashes look awful. I highly recommend you passing on this product, and choosing a different mascara. This one just does not get the job done.

This has been my go to mascara for about three years now. I highly recommend it for everyday casual daytime makeup. Can be built up for a more dramatic look but I have other mascaras I like better for that.
I have bought this mascara at least 5 times. Love it!
I love this mascara! It doesn't flake, always goes on evenly and makes my lashes look much longer and thicker than other mascaras I have tried. Definitely a 5 Star mascara for me!

This is the BEST mascara for creating the appearance of lashes! My lashes are short and sparse, but this mascara (when layered on) makes my lashes full, long and beautiful!! No need for fake lashes here; this mascara gives you the same look! It's awesome!!

I'm always on the hunt for a new mascara, unfortunately this wasn't for me. It was clumpy and my lashes didn't look like I really had anything on. Even after multiple coats and using another mascara with it, still nothing.

The best mascara I've ever used.  I ha e bought and tried everything.  And I mean everything.  Even in foreign countries.  Makes my lashes full and adds great length.  I think the people that don't like it are in need of a lesson.  Worth the price

Was looking to try some new mascara so decided to give this a try. It's a really thin formula which I like but doesn't do anything for your lashes, it didn't define mine at all just added a little bit to them but this is coming from someone who love big dramatic lashes. If you're looking something that's not very dramatic for day time you will love this mascara another plus is that it is extremely black! I'm going to keep it but will not repurchase.

very light mascara. I personally prefer something more dramatic but this was still nice. I think it's more of a daytime mascara when you're just looking for a little color. I ended up returning it because it irritated my eyes, which can be very sensitive.

Initially, I was ticked off that I spent the money on this mascara... Doesn't work as well as I thought it would .I will say that it does separate your lashes well but it takes a lot of building up/layers to create the full look that I enjoy.. My lashes are short and I prefer long/full lashes.. OK but don't know if i'll repurchase.
This mascara is the best I've ever used. Makes my lashes look long and luscious and it stays well.

I had been trying mascara after mascara and couldn't find any I liked. I finally tried BUXOM and LOVE it! The tip makes it so much easier to get a good coat on both the inside and outside lashes, which can sometimes be annoying to do. Just bought the waterproof version and will continue to buy both!
I've been using this mascara since it came out. I have sensitive eyes, and this never irritates my eyes. Will never use a different mascara.

I tried many mascaras from drug store to more expensive and they are pretty much all the same some worse then others but this is feels the same as any other mascara I tried nothing really different tbh..
I have tried several mascaras and always come back to Buxom. It is easy to wash off, this is very important to me. Yet it stays on no problems.
The best mascara. Not clumpy, separates lashes well.

I'm somewhat of a mascara fantastic. From designer to drugstore, I've tried them all and this is the only one that I continously rebuy. The brush is wonderfully crafted, creating such beautiful volume and separating each of my lashes. I've even been asked if I'm wearing falsies! One coat creates a clean soft look but pile it on and watch your lashes become super pronounced. Its one of the best mascaras I've had, even better then cult favorite Benefits one. Will continue to buy.

Year after year, this is the only mascara I repurchase & the one that will never leave my vanity. When people throw out Ride or Die & Holy Grail they know what's up. It defines beautifully- grabs and separates every single lash a la false lash style. It lengthens, volumizes, and doesn't flake. Contact wearers rejoice! I easily have 15 sample-sized versions of all the top-selling mascaras and none of the have been able to pull me away yet.
This mascara is amazing!

While this product is not perfect, I do think it is the best mascara, so I have to give it five stars. For Christmas of 2014, I got the Lash Stash. This was hands down my favorite! It is important to remember that certain mascaras work better or worse for certain people. I have medium length, completely straight lashes. I curl them straight up, and they immediately look long. This mascara is quite lengthening, somewhat volumizing, not curling, and is light. They don't make my eyelashes fall, which is EXTREMELY important. It becomes noticeably drier after about 2 months, and is pretty much unusable by 4 months.

I have extremely high standards for mascara. It is the product that I do not go one day without. This one is great! My lashes are full and fabulous when I use it. This mascara separates so well and does not flake. I highly recommend it.
I really love this mascara!!! It makes my lashes look longer and it also separates them. This is my favorite mascara!

I originally bought this to be a base or volumizer for Benefits They're Real but I ended up just using it alone. It makes me look like I'm wearing falsies! My lashes literally are touching my glasses and look amazingly thick! This is seriously the best mascara I've ever used and I have tried a ton!
Love this mascara!! Been looking for one that does it all and this finally solved my problems

This has been my top mascara for years now. Occasionally I'll get samples of other mascaras but none of them wear/apply like this one. Amazing formula for defining and adding volume to my lashes. It never looks spidery or clumpy and doesn't transfer throughout the day. I also love that it is formulated without parabens and synthetic dyes.

I am so bummed I didn't  get into better quality makeup  until up to a few years ago (I am 38 now)! This is my favorite mascara and wish I knew about it back then! This formula goes on flawless for me and gives me the definition  I need and doesn't clump  my lashes. The brush is my favorite type. A longer wand that has soft bristles. When  I want more of a dramatic look I use  this masacara and layer on the TARTE Tartiest  mascara as well!
This product is amazing. I love it so much. It's the only mascara I use now. It makes your lashes look great and it last all day.
This is hands down the best mascara. I am the go to girl in my group when it comes to mascara and this is my top recommendation. Love love love!
Great every day mascara
I have tried many different brands in order to find the best that works for me, and time after time I come back to Buxom. Lengthening, volumizing  and never clumpy!

This mascara does absolutely nothing for my lashes. You can hardly tell I have mascara on when I wear it. Definitely no volume and only slight lengthening.  I gave mine to my roommate and she likes it so some people out there might enjoy it, but I'm not one of them.
I have been using this mascara for years and I love it!!!

My coworker had recommended this mascara to me for my wedding and everyday use. After my local store was sold out 3 trips in a row, I ordered it online. It was worth the wait! This is by far the best mascara I've ever used. Not too thick or clumpy and you barely have to shimmy the brush.
The buxom mascara adds both volume and length to your lashes in a way that no other mascara has.

I have thin, fine lashes that clump when they meet mascara. Buxom is, as another reviewer put it, the holy grail of mascaras. It's non-clumping, buildable and—bonus!—doesn't make my lashes break off when I remove it as Urban Decay does. Love it!

I bought a sampling of trial/travel sized mascaras. The first one I pulled out was the buxom mascara. I love it. Application goes on easy, no clumps, and it really makes my lashes look fuller and longer. Although it's a travel sized mascara, I've used it over a month and it hasn't dry out. I've bought other full sized expensive mascaras and they dry out in about a month. I'm a patron for this mascara now.

I have fairly long eyelashes and the mascara 1) would not keep them curled and 2) would then rub off where it was touching underneath my eye (like bags or dark circles) especially if I had under-eye moisturizer on.
This macara is ok.. Not the best .. Not the worst.. Still looking for an affordable good mascara

I feel like I've already reviewed this - but maybe not.  I'm a super hardcore fan of Buxom Lash Mascara.  I try lots of different brands, but I always have at least one tube of this at hand.  I do wish it came in brown and burgundy (not purple), then I'd never have to stray again.

I've been looking for a good all day no clump mascara, because my previous clinque one was causing  A LOT of eye lash shedding {bare eyelids here} and saw all the great reviews for this product. Since its only $20 I decided to take the bullet and just buy n try. Let me tell you that this is worth every single penny. My lashes look thick, full, long and the best part of it all there are NO CLUMPS. Like seriously none. In love!!! My new favorite mascara! The look of falsey without the weight.
I bought this off of reviews from here. You might as well buy a wet n wild mascara. No volume no length. Waste of money honestly
This separates and lengthens perfectly! I love fluffy eyelashes.

This is my go to mascara - it provides length and volume like no other. It separates your lashes well and you can coat on a few layers to achieve extra thickness. If you're a mascara junkie - you need this in your makeup bag.

reviews.review_title: Just what I've been looking for
reviews.review_text: Before I used this, I would always use MAC falsies mascara. It would make them super long, but that volume wasn't there. Buxom not only gave me that amazing length, but the extra thickness. It truly gives my lashes is the best of both worlds.

I feel like I've been on a crusade trying to find the perfect mascara and I've tried most of the big name brands. Buxom was the most disappointing of them all. The extremely large brush had no purpose as even after using a primer, 4-5 coats, and every trick I know I was left with subpar lashes. The best part was when it started to flake and run after only 4 hours. Save your money and do not buy this.

The more I use this mascara, the more I love it (but not as much as Lancôme Hypnose, thus the reason for only 4 stars). This mascara opens up my eyes, lengthens my lashes and defines them, almost too much definition though, if that's a thing. Separates my lashes more than I would prefer, making them seem less full than they actually are. Color depth is great though, can get by with using only one coat on most days.

I love this mascara. A friend recommended it to me about 6 years ago and I have been in love ever since! The formula never gets clumpy. It never flakes off into my eyes like other mascaras do. The formula is so great that I can never tell if my tube is getting old or not. The formula doesn't change at all as you are using the tube. Provides great volume and separation. I am able to add many coats to my lashes without them being clumpy! I love this mascara!

I am a mascra junky, but willing to give everyone a chance.  But this mascra is not worth 20 dollars sorry. Will not be buying this  again. Hate the brush and the consistency as well as how it applies.  Just not good.

I've been using this mascara for over four years and I cannot see myself ever using anything else. I've tried other mascaras, but I always end up going back to this product. It lengthens and volumizes my lashes. It helps if you curl your lashes, but I can easily get away with out curling them with this mascara.

I recall having a sample size previously, and liked it. This does nothing for me and isn't worth the money. Not even halfway through the day, it looks like I am not wearing any mascara. It doesn't volumize, and it actually gets all over my lid. Just an awkward, giant, plastic brush.
I liked this product. I have not used it since my tube dried out only because I wanted a mascara for volume. This was great for length and separation. I liked this over They're Real
This mascara makes my lashes very thick and voluminous. It is also extremely black and I would definitely repurchase this product.

It's crazy to me that this is so many people's HG mascara. It made my lashes clump together in a weird way and look rather thin (to be clear, they're pretty thin naturally, but a good volumizing mascara usually fixes that!). Also, I use an eyelash curler before mascara, and it made the curl totally droop right away.  The brush is nice and I could imagine it working well for people who already have fuller lashes. But it was just horrible on me. The formula seemed to weight my lashes down.

I have extremely sensitive eyes and struggled for years to find a mascara that wouldn't irritate my eyes after wearing it all day. This mascara is it!!! I've been using it for 3 years now. Not only does it not irritate my eyes, but it's also just a great product past that. Definitely gives volume and the applicator works great. I also have completely blonde eyelashes so I have to be able to reach all my eye lashes easily and this applicator allows for that! My only caution would be it does smudge, so let it dry completely before touching or trying to fix. Still gets five stars from me because my eyes can't handle waterproof mascaras so the smudge is to be expected and doesn't bother me :)

I have been using this mascara for 5 years and I absolutely love it. It isn't clumpy yet still makes your lashes fuller. My eyelashes aren't very long and this adds length. For me personally this is the best mascara ever! I will never use anything else as long as this isn't discontinued. I have converted many friends and family members to this awesome product :)
I've tried everything from maybellen to Lancôme and this is the best mascara I've come across no clump extends lashes and isn't harsh.
Love this stuff. Stays on for a long time and doesn't flake. It doesn't clump when putting it on and is easy to get off skin. Only stuff I use!

I really want to like this mascara but every time I give it another try I remember why I stopped using it--because it's smudged on my face by noon. The brush is awesome though, so I'll just use it with another mascara!

Love this mascara, and the brush is amazing. It is truly clump-resistant.  I have this in water-proof formula too. My lashes stand out and works well with contact lenses (no flaking off into your eyes).
Good, lightweight, hardly clumps. I just wish it made my eyelashes a little more voluminous but it's an all around good mascara
This mascara was way to dry in the formulation.  Could hardly see it. I returned it

I've used this mascara everyday for years and I love it. My eyelashes are long but somewhat thin and it really helps give them volume and length which I can't complain about. However my mom who has short eyelashes says that it makes her eye lashes clump together. This is a more liquidy mascara so it is meant for those who do have longer lashes. I have no complaints whatsoever
I have long eyelashes, but they're not very thick. Most mascaras end up just clumping my eyelashes together. This mascara does not clump and does a great job thickening them.
Love this mascara! It's easy to get a natural look or even a more intense look based on the amount you use. It's a deep black color, doesn't clump and is easy to apply. Will probably repurchase!

This is a great mascara for everyday use. I am allergic to the ingredients in some mascaras and they can make my eyes itch and give me problems all day, but this one for the most part does not bother me. The rubber wand is nice too for getting all of my lashes coated. I gave four starts because sometimes at the end of the day my eyes get a tad itchy but I also wear contacts so it is probably the combination of wearing eye makeup all day and my contacts becoming dry. I would recommend overall!
this mascara runs...I looked like a raccoon after 2-3 hours.
Perfect brush, perfect formula. Long thick lashes, in just one or 2 coats. Stays on but still washes off easily, and doesn't irritate.

I love this mascara, it has been one of my favorites over the years. I really like the wand, I am a big fan of the smaller wands with little bristles. It is a rubber/plastic wand that really coat your lashes individually creating excellent volume. This mascara is pretty lengthening as well. I am a mascara junkie, it is my number one makeup item, and I find myself always going back to Buxom.

I don't know why this mascara isn't talked about more. Its absolutely amazing. I have thin and somewhat short lashes. It definitely makes my lashes look thicker and longer. One of my favorite mascaras.

I absolutely love this mascara. Does an amazing job at lengthening my lashes. I've never had a problem with clumping. It's not too liquids. It's long lasting, stays on all day. My go to mascara. Highly recommend

Best mascara! It doesn't clump, gives you a fanned lush look, with volume. The mascara doesn't smudge when you rub your eyes when you forget you have make up on or leave black marks on your eyelids at the end of the day. Perfect in every way!
Love this mascara. Will never use any of other mascara again.
This mascara works pretty good. I would recommend.
I've tried mascaras from probably 15 brands and this is my favorite. The formula is great and remains smooth throughout its use. No clumps, no flakes, but lots of length and volume!
I love this product, I works really well and it gives you length and volume. It is worth the money.

This mascara is literally the BEST one I think I've ever tried. My lashes are very blonde and short and this mascara a lash curler make them look so long and voluminous! The brush makes it so the lashes don't look clumpy and it's probably my holy grail mascara ❤️

One of my favorite mascaras that I keep going to. Love the brush. Applies easily. Doesn't clump or flake. Holds the curl after using an eyelash curler. Lengthens and volumizes but not to a dramatic effect. I use a different mascara when I'm going for dramatic lashes. But I use this when I need fluffy fanned out but natural lashes. Worth the price!
I swear I have tried every mascara from Covergirl to Marc Jacobs and this by far is my favorite mascara. It makes me lashes longer, fuller, and defined. Never going back
WOW THIS IS MY FAVORITE MASCARA EVER!!! It separates my eyelashes evenly and makes my eyelashes thick and long. I always get compliments on my eyelashes. No need for fake eyelashes with this.
I've tried a ton of mascaras, and this is the only one that gives me long, separated, pigment-covered lashes every time. So easy to control the amount you apply to, due to the brush. Love it.

It is nearly impossible to make this clump and makes my lashes like look super plush and feathery, which I love. It also FLAKES like CRAZY which makes it pretty unwearable for me. I always reach for something else because as pretty as it looks for the three minutes after I apply, it's not worth the snowstorm of black crumblies that inevitably coat my cheeks for the rest of the day.

This mascara is a perfect go to, literally, when I did not know which mascara to choose that day (usually going with what mood I'm in) this mascara is the one I tend to reach for. Does NOT clump because of the bristles and lengthens amazingly to my liking, this is definitely something I love in my collection

This is my go-to mascara! It looks great on even me, who has thin eyelashes that grow downward. I just use this with an eyelash curler, and bam! The best lashes I've ever had! Highly recommend to everyone!

I have tried many different mascaras. From the cheapest to the most expensive ones and by fa this is my FAVORITE. It does clump like other mascaras. My lashes look fabulous. I recommend this to everyone!
i never even knew i had lashes on my eyes until this!! made them stand out, not clumpy and really long lasting. and NOT animal tested! will but again and again.
Love love love just love it

I love this mascara. I've bought samplers and tried many brands but come back to Buxom time after time. I've had strangers ask me what kind of mascara do you use or are your lashes just that long? I had a co-worker as l if I had extensions...really it is that good. Full disclosure, I do naturally have long lashes but they are blonde and skinny. This mascara gives them full oomph and doesn't get clumpy at all.

reviews.review_title: Still my go-to mascara after many years
reviews.review_text: I don't leave many reviews, but I rely heavily on them for purchases. This is a staple I can't be without. It's my go-to for quick, flawless, long lasting eye opening lashes. The curl stays with the help of my Ta*te eyelash curler, and it never flakes or let's me down after a whole day. For volume and drama, I stick with my le Volume, but for instant flattering flawless eyelashes, this mascara delivers. I usually swipe a mascara with tissue prior to applying, but there's no need with this. It checks every box for me.
This is always my go to! The brush is perfect for removing clumps and it's super volumizing! It stays on all day and does''t flake much.
One of my all time faves
This is by far my favorite mascara, ever. It does seem to dry out faster than others and get clumpy. I would love to learn the best way to thin it out a bit when it starts to thicken.
Love this mascara!! Gives my lashes full volume and stay that way all day!!
Seriously, I never need to wear false lashes again!  Buxom is the perfect word to describe how this product makes your lashes look!  Fantastic!
I bought this while out of town because I was in Sephora anyway and wanted to try a new mascara. This was awful. Th brush was bad, the formula was bad. Just a bad mascara all around.
Can build volume with several coats without lashes becoming clumpy or straightening the curl.
Love this! The big brush acts like a comb to pull & separate my lashes making them as long as they can be.
Love this mascara, lots of definition and won't dry out too fast
I love love love the brush!!! It separates perfectly. I never have clumps. Just wished the mascara had some curl power!
I have probably tried every mascara out there and I always come back to this. It doesn't clump, gives nice definition and wears well all day.
HOLY GRAIL MASCARA! I have pretty long lashes, but not a ton of volume. This mascara just fans every lash out beautifully without clumps or smearing under my eyes. Also works great with false lashes.

This mascara did not do it for me. I have used several drug store mascaras better than this. It didn't curl, volumize or lengthen my lashes. AND it ended up falling under my eyes within hours. Will not buy again and wish I could return it.
Very disappointed. Dried out after two uses! Didn't do anything spectacular either.
Really lengthening !! Super easy to take off and doesn't flake or anything! Got a sample and will definitely get the full size when I run out.

I received this product as part of Sephora's Lash Wardrobe set and I loved how lengthening it was and how well it separated my lashes. It's only downside is that it's not very volumizing. It needed an extra coat of a volumizing mascara on top to make my lashes look full enough, but destroyed clumps. Overall good product but not enough on its own!

I wasn't happy with this mascara. I felt that it didn't really make a difference to my lashes, other than make them a little darker (didn't hold a curl, no noticeable volume.) My lashes felt softer than with other mascaras, though. If you want a very natural eye look,t his may be okay for you. I wanted something with more drama.
Best brush I've ever used, separates perfectly! Doesn't clump, dry out, or flake. I use it with a lash primer. Outstanding
