i promise you won't regret buying this mascara! the brush is especially great it allows you to do numerous strokes without clumping! what I also do is I use another mascara as a base coat and then use the buxom - this will make the product last longer and can add more to the overall look!!

i received a trial size of this for christmas and i really didnt think i would like it. i am very picky when it comes to mascara. i want dramatic length and volume but i also want my lashes to appear soft and separated, like false lashes. this mascara delivers PERFECTLY. i love the results i get! so happy with this.
LOVE IT. GIVES SO MUCH VOLUME! DEFINITELY BUYING THIS MASCARA OVER AND OVER AGAIN

reviews.review_title: Best mascara ever in the whole wide world!!!
reviews.review_text: Always have to have at least 2 of these... one at home and one in my bag. LOVE THIS MASCARA!!!
The best! I have short, thin eyelashes and Buxom adds immediate volume and thickness. It holds all day without flaking.
Loved the way this looked, but at the end of the day I found that it was sliding off and left me with raccoon eyes. Kind of disappointing as this guy came recommended.

I was looking for a cruelty-free alternative to my usual mascara, and happened to pick this up on a whim. I have really long eyelashes and this spread them out and thickened them wonderfully! No clumps and no mess, acually easier to use than most other mascaras I have tried.

After doing a TON of research on here, other beauty websites & review sites, I thought I found my next HG mascara. Buxom doesn't test on animals! Yay! (though I recently found out their parent company does--eek!)  I have oily eyelids and I don't rock the smoky eye/water line look, so when this mascara started to smudge, that's when I knew I had to return it ASAP. On the other hand, if you're going to do a smoky eye or line your water line anyway, you can't tell your mascara is smudging. Sad it didn't work out...

I have used this mascara for almost two years and I haven't tried anything else since. I get compliments on my eyelashes all the time asking if they're falsies. Very easy to build up and NEVER clumps on me! Overall amazing product and would recommend it to anyone and everyone!
I found this mascara to be just mehh. I like the wand but found the forum to be very dry. The tube went bad very quickly. Didn't repurchase.

I love this mascara! A friend gave it to me and she said before she gave it to me she had it for a year and it wasn't dry! So I used it for a whole other year and I used it everyday. Yea the texture wasn't the same but I used it for length and volume and my benefits mascara for thickness. It was so great that I had to buy it not again, but it will be my second tube that I have owned.

Nice mascara for light fluttery lashes but lacks the drama. Also my lashes wouldn't stay curled, they fell even though this seems like a light formula. Like to wear it to work for a simple look but that's about it.

Really love this mascara. My eyelashes look so long and full. Only problem is that the mascara dries SO quickly! Like within maybe a week it was dry and flaky. I run it under hot water for a few mins before use and it seems to do the trick!
This mascara makes my lashes look fake! It goes on nice and it doesn't clump up or anything. The brush it comes with is super nice and helps with application. Definitely recommend this mascara.
I looked high and low for years for a good mascara, and this one is it! I have been using it for about two years now, and you could not get me to switch!

I've played around with a lot of mascaras and there are a lot of good formulas out there, but this is a good formula with a fool-proof brush that really grabs your lashes. I got the sample and purchased the full size. It's now my fave in the non-waterproof category!
Never clumps, stays put, doesn't flake, crazy length. The brush gives the cleanest application. My only hang up is the lack of volume.
I love this stuff. Best mascara ive ever used.
extends. doesn't clump AND it's not heavy. I typically curl my lashes and heavy mascaras tend to bring my lashes down. I LOVE this mascara. makes my lashes voluminous and long :)
Doesn't do anything for the lashes. Returned.

I love this mascara! It's amazing and gives you length, volume, and it's not clumpy. The only thing is, is that some days it makes my eyelashes clump together. But it's weird because 99% of the time it's great, but 1/10 tries it sometimes gets clumpy. But overall a great mascara!!

reviews.review_title: Separates, doesn't flake, lasts all day!
reviews.review_text: I LOVE THIS MASCARA. The applicator is a tiny bit too long for my taste, but the bristles are perfectly spaced for separating lashes. I work 10+ hour days, and this stuff lasts all day without flaking, smearing, etc.  It isn't the most volumizing mascara ever, but it does enough and lengthens and is a beautiful black color.  It is easy to remove, too! Any time I don't have to use a ton of eye makeup remover is great. I haven't cried in it, but I imagine it probably doesn't hold up--which is why there is a waterproof version, I'm sure!
Unimpressed. Delivers drugstore makeup results and did nothing in regards to volumizing or lengthening. Also, it's super heavy feeling.

reviews.review_title: An essential in my makeup bag
reviews.review_text: LOVE this mascara, it makes my eyelashes super long. I usually layer it with Too Faced better than sex mascara for nights out.
Amazing, doesn't get the hype it should!
One of the best mascaras I've used. Great for lower lashes. The product does not dry out and distributes evenly with the brush.
This mascara makes my lashes look thick and long! Definitely buying again
Adds a ton of Volume and last longer than expected.

I've used this product for as long as its been out (8 years?) and I've tried using other mascaras and nothing compares. I have very short eyelashes naturally, and whenever I wear this everyone asks if I'm wearing fake lashes. I do make up, and after I apply this the woman always goes out to buy it for herself.

I saw this in the store and was drawn to the size of the brush. It's great for volume! I really like the formula as well. It's not too wet so your eyelashes don't clump together, doesn't flake during the day, and you don't have to rip your eyelashes out trying to remove it. I wear mascara almost everyday and it lasted much longer than expected. TBH I prefer this one over Tarte, Smashbox, Benefit, Urban Decay... even Diorshow (gasp)
This is the first mascara that truly does what it says for me! Its also the first mascara that doesn't flake and bother my contacts!
i loooooove this mascara! came in a huge box with several other samples, (YSL, Marc Jacobs) and this one by far was the best! definitely will be purchasing the full size when i run out!

If you want longer, thicker looking lashes why pay more than you have to? I haven't found a mascara that lengthens or maximizes my lashes like this product. So, point is, it does the same job without the hefty price, so save your money and buy this!

This is the first mascara I have ever found that does NOT clump when you put it on. I have liked many other brands but my eyelashes would always clump. The only thing I don't really like about this mascara is that it doesn't give much volume by itself, but I will most likely purchase again!
One of my favorite mascaras. Not quite HG but pretty darn close!

I had to go through MANY mascara brands and types, before meeting my perfect match, and falling deeply in love with Buxom! This is the best mascara I've ever had. I have long lashes, but they're thin, and are usually all over the place. This stuff brings the length in my lashes out, while soeerating and keeping them clean. I always get asked what mascara I use, I wish I could post a photo!

If you know how to properly apply mascara to get the greatest result, this mascara is perfect for you. I have gone through so many different brands, expensive and cheap and this is worth the result. The wand separates the lashes smoothly and the formula does not flake. It's good for any occasion, if you want something natural or build up to a more dramatic look.
Good for subtle but defined lashes. No problems with clumping and it goes on smooth. Not the most volumizing formula on the market, but really nice for an everyday look.
Loved the mascara when it first came out, but now they skimp on the mascara so much it's like buying old, dried-up product. Money for nothing.

I love this mascara! It doesn't clump and one layer looks very natural. I already have pretty dark, long lashes, so I typically don't want a mascara to do too much. Layering definitely pumps this mascara up if you want to though!
Not what I expected, it is very clumpy and its huge not exactly what I prefer, it does the job

I use this mascara daily. It works pretty well and I get a lot of volume from it. I usually apply two coats. The only problem I have it that it starts to flake by the end of the day and is hard to wash off your skin with out makeup remover after you wash your face. Kind of similar to waterproof.

This is a great mascara. I initially received a sample of it but then later bought my own tube. I do think the sample seemed to be better covering/coating, but I like it regardless. The brush does get a good clump at the tip when pulling it out of the tube, but once that's wiped back off into the tube, it's very easy to apply. My lashes are a bit long so I can transfer it to my lower lid a little. It gives me nice full, separated lashes.

I love this mascara, it's my favorite & I always go back to it, love the full brush , it separates & makes my lashes look. nice and full, I never had a problem with it getting under my eyes, always stays put until I take it off, comes off easily with face wash, no extra rubbing, just wish it came in other colors, being fair skinned & blonde, sometimes the blackest black seems really intense, but one coat for a day looks beautiful !!!
Best mascara ever!! I've been using this mascara for 3 years now and it is hands down The Best!! It covers great with no clumping!! I love this stuff!!

reviews.review_title: received this as a sample and...
reviews.review_text: I honestly think it's the best mascara I've ever had! I have very long lashes that are real and I love what this mascara does for my lengthy lashes! It's not super clumpy and goes on very smooth. I also like the definition in the wand part because some other mascaras even from Buxom don't create definition between lashes. I will confess I use it with Tarte mascara as well but this one as the base is excellent!!!

have used roller lash, they're real, better than sex, and basically every mascara at sephora. This is by far the best. It lengthens on the first swipe of mascara and then volumizes as you apply more coats without looking chunky or like a 6th grader who wears albs of eye makeup. I do wish it was blacker but hey not every product is perfect. This mascara also hasn't dried out on me after 4 months which is great!!

It's ok, nothing to brag about. Doesn't lengthen or give volume to my eyelashes. I'm a one coat gal and this mascara doesn't do much like others I've tried. What I do like about it, is it does not flake.
Totally love this mascara. The brush really separates my lashes and they are long and luscious!

I am very picky about mascara, and many brands easily irritate my eyes. What I like about this, is that it goes on silky and light, but is easily buildable if you want a more dramatic look. You can re-apply over dried mascara and it doesn't clump or stick, it just glides on and adds more volume. It doesn't irritate or dry my eyes. It doesn't smudge or melt/run, and it comes off easily with my cream eye make-up remover without fuss! Love it!

I love this mascara! The Boxum is very volumizing, lengthening, and defining. Especally love the brush. Boxum dose not clump or make my lashes stick together. I love that there is not a sent which is a plus for people who are sensitive to smells. Great for any party/event. My only disclaimer is that it is not water proof. When I am in gym I do not like my mascara running down my eyes. Other than that great product. Hit a home run Boxum!

I am addicted to finding the best mascaras that are out there and this is definitely one of them! I always apply two coats of my mascaras and this one really only needs one. It is volumizing and lengthening. It really does wonders for my eyelashes, they almost look fake. I love it!!

reviews.review_title: Perfect for me but not the most voluminous
reviews.review_text: I love this because its really lengthening and defining. However, it is not the most volumizing (which isn't my main requirement from a mascara). Lately I've gotten really into Buxom, every single product is consistently good and becomes a part of my daily/weekly routine. Really nice mascara that doesn't irritate my eyes or make my lashes feel dry!!

I have no loyalty to Buxom's cosmetics- it's a brand I regularly overlook, so I assure you my review on this mascara is very sincere. I only ended up using this mascara because it came in one of those mascara samplers Sephora puts out every year. I buy one of those samplers every year and it never fails that this is the only mascara I find myself buying full size.  The brush has so many soft, rubbery bristles that every lash gets coated and combed through. I have short, straight lashes and yet this mascara leaves me looking like I have thousands of feathery lashes. It adds length and volume without clumping, feeling gunky or looking spidery. Holy grail mascara for sure.

This mascara is my favorite mascara in the world by far. I naturally have pretty long eyelashes, and most mascaras cause them to clump up into spider legs. My personal preference for mascara is for it to look like I'm not wearing mascara, like I just have naturally amazing lashes. Buxom does just that. Furthermore, I have sensitive eyes, and this formula doesn't irritate them at all. Minimal to no flaking as well. Some people prefer the wall of lashes you can get from a thicker formula, so if that's you, I would go for something thicker and more volumizing. This one is perfect for achieving ultra-separated, long, dark lashes. I've had people ask me before if I'm wearing false lashes and then clarify that I didn't seem to be wearing mascara but have impossibly great eyelashes. So, bam. Best mascara in the world.

This mascara is amazing!! I love how it's 20$ so I don't have to worry about it being too expensive when I have to but it again, it's the perfect price! Additionally, I have naturally decent lashes that get me compliments but this mascara really helps to separate my lashes and thicken them without clumping or looking overdone! My lashes look natural when I wear this mascara
Nothing really awesome about this for me but I'm 36 and have the thin lashes at both ends so this is a pass for me

I had never been a big mascara fan as most mascara I tried leaves big lumps even with just one coating, but this one is different! I got this mascara as a holiday sample, and I was surprised to find how natural this mascara looks! It creates no lumps and doesn't weigh down my lashes. With one coating, it looks like I have naturally long and thick lashes! Perfect for those who likes a natural touch up for the eye.

I can't tell you how many mascaras I have tried. I'm a mascara junkie! I LOVE the false lash look without the false eyelashes because I wear contacts and it irritates my eyes like no bodies business. I used lancome hypnose drama for a while which was great for volume, but not for lengthening. i also used the lancome cils booster primer and it still wasn't what i wanted. i finally switched to Dior Maximizer primer and i LOVE it. i tried Dior Extase, Iconic Overcurl, and the OG Diorshow and none of them gave me what i wanted. Lots of clumping, and not very long. I finally tried this because of the brush. i figured a plastic/rubber brush would help with clumping. I heard this didn't have much volume though. so i use this on top of my dior primer and it's amazing! clump free, separated, VOLUMIZED, LONG, lashes. it's absolutely perfect. and it holds curl so amazingly!
I bought this mascara based on the reviews and am so please. This is without a doubt the best mascara I've ever used! Will definitely keep purchasing this product.

I have been working in the makeup industry for several years and have always had this OCD when it comes to my lashes. After countless trials and free mascara samples from my coworkers, I realized there literally is not a better mascara out there. Forget the 30/40 dollar mascaras. This is an amazing product!! Definitely will lengthen, volumize, and separate. NO CLUMPS!! (*cough* Dior *cough*). I love the buildable formula and would recommend to everyone.

I LOVE this mascara. I have been using it for 4 years, and I always get compliments. The brush makes it easy to apply without getting clumpy, and the consistency is not too thick so you can build. I use the Diorshow Maximizer as a primer, and this mascara works really well with it. I highly recommend this product.
The the more I used this the more I liked it. I love too faced better than sex normally but I find myself grabbing this for my everyday looks and the too faced for night looks.

I'm super picky when it comes to mascara because I like my lashes to look natural and fanned and this mascara really is the best thing ever! It fans out my lashes and leaves them looking natural at the same time that it gives them great length and does not knock them down once I've curled them like many others do
North a big fan of Bare Minerals, but this mascara is absolutely great. Beautiful lashes already with one coat , great brush and formula. Go for it.

I have used the travel size product again and again so I decided to commit to the full size and I could not be happier. My lashes receive great volume with minimal clumping. This is great for both and night looks.

honestly the best mascara i've ever used. i stick to waterproof formulas as they last longer and tend to be much less clumpy due to the oil in it.  this mascara separates, blackens and volumizes my lashes in a way that i can't help loving. in fact, if any other mascara of mine applies clumpy, i can even use the wand from this one to clear it up.  the formula is dryer than some other mascaras i've used, but i prefer it that way since liquidy mascaras seem to run and bother my contacts.  five stars from me, buxom!

So, I am admittedly a mascara-fiend. It is by far my favorite kind of make-up to buy. Buxom mascara is a staple in my massive collection. It's satisfying by itself, although I haven't found it to be too volumizing (which is what I look for) but this wand separates lashes like nobody's business. I usually use a base mascara that volumizes and then come in and make sure my lashes are separated and set with this mascara. Highly recommend this product.
does what it says but i've used this mascara 4 times and it smears under my eye throughout the day and make it look like i have super dark eye bags.

My friend gave me a travel size version of this mascara to try out, and I absolutely loved it. It is probably the best mascara I have ever used. My lashes looked awesome when I used this. They were separated, volumized, and lengthened all at once. I will definitely be buying this for myself.

I originally got this mascara two months ago, but wanted to wait a while before writing a review in case my opinion changed from the initial use. I had very very high expectations on this mascara from all the great reviews I read, and it not only met my expectations, but greatly exceeded them! Before buying this mascara, I was a huge fan of the Benefit They're Real mascara, and I still am, however this is now my new go to mascara for a number of reasons. 1) I got way more length in my eyelashes than I ever got with They're Real 2) The formula goes on A LOT smoother and as the mascara dries out (which isn't as fast as They're Real so it might last a little longer) I don't have nearly as much flaking as I did with They're Real 3) I only need to use one layer for my lashes to suit my preferences whereas I would have to use two layers for They're Real 4) I can be REALLY clumsy when applying my mascara and tend to accidentally stab myself in the eye more often than I'd like to admit, and the brush on this wand is sooo much softer and less pokey than the brush for They're Real, and yet I still find it applies mascara a lot better I honestly have an endless amount of good things to say about this mascara, so I'm just gonna skip to the bad.... This mascara can be quite runny and I always notice that when I've been yawning a lot that day, I have black streaks under my eyes from the mascara running, and I realize its not the waterproof one, but neither is the Benefit They're Real mascara, and I never had this problem with that mascara. However I think this problem could be easily solved by just opting for the waterproof version of this mascara instead. And on a side note, I didn't notice too much extra volume with this mascara so if you want one that's volumizing, this may not be the mascara for you despite the description saying that its ultra-volumizing.
I adore this mascara! Not only for the simple and cute packaging, but the mascara itself is great! I love it.

I bought this after reading all of the great reviews and was so disappointed. My tube was dry and no matter how many coats I put on, I couldn't get much product on my lashes. I MUCH prefer Perversion, I will not stray again!
This is the only mascara I buy anymore. It's perfect!

I have thick, long eyelashes naturally, so it's always been difficult to get a mascara that enhances them without making them look super-fake. This is a must-have for those who want great eyelashes without looking like they have multiple layers of mascara on - it coats individual lashes and doesn't clump them together. I've been using this brand solely for 4 years now and everyone always asks me what I use! Love it!
This mascara is so amazing for lengthening. Two coats and my usually short lashes are long and beautiful.
I use this during the week for not so bold but noticeable lashes
I love this mascara! If I want a darker fuller lash, I use more. If I want a lighter look, I use less!

reviews.review_title: MY RIGHT HAND. MY GO TO
reviews.review_text: this mascara is the bomb dot com. I love it and it's definitely my go to!

reviews.review_title: does not do what mascara should do
reviews.review_text: unfortunately, this mascara didn't work out for me. It was very clumpy, and made my lashes look worse then with no makeup at all.

I really do LOVE this mascara! I discovered it when I purchased a set that had many to sample a while back. My eyelashes look great, I've been asked if I wear falsies. Even on days I don't wear makeup, I don't leave the house without this mascara.

This did nothing for me. Barely looked like I had anything on my eyelashes, which for $19 just didn't seem reasonable to me. Stayed on fine but I've used better mascara from the drugstore that cost a fourth of what I paid for this. So back it went!

Every time I try something else, I always end up back with this. I even keep an old clean Buxom brush to use as a lash brush because NOTHING separates as well as this brush. I've yet to find ANYTHING better than this mascara. It lengthens, separates, defines, volumizes, doesn't clump, and stays put. What more is there??

Love Buxom mascara! It does what it claims to do! However, when I bought it there was barely any in there. I will purchase it again because it is a great product. However, I will make sure to check it!!!
Love these ...I recommend it all the time and I buy two at a time. Great brush, excellent coverage ..never gets gloppy! Never cakes, lashes stays fluffy
This product is a miracle worker, I don't even bother with false lashes anymore!

This is my absolute favorite everyday mascara. It lengthens and thickens with one coat. It never smudges or flakes. Its also easy to get off at the end of the day. I have naturally very curled lashes so I'm not sure how well it would hold a curl.
This is hands down one of my favorite mascaras. The length and volume is perfect and never any clumping, even after adding a couple coats.

I've been using this mascara for over a year. It's my go to!! Can always make if light for just going to school and thicker for going out. But either way my lashes are always long and evenly spread out. No clumps :)

reviews.review_title: Good Mascara But Awful Staying Power
reviews.review_text: This mascara gives my lashes amazing volume and length. I never had any issues with it clumping or anything. However, this thing flakes like crazy! When I was not out of the house for even an hour, I had so much flakes under my eyes. It nearly made me look like a raccoon and that is what disappointed me. I wish I could repurchase it again, but I cannot bear to see so many flakes on my face at the end of the day.
I have purchased a ton of mascaras from Sephora and was very impressed with this one! Wish I had purchased sooner! What a great find!!

I have several favorite mascara and this is one of them. I love the brush. The mascara adds volume and length. It stays put until I wash it off at night. Other great mascara's are They're Real & Better Than Sex Mascara.

I have been searching for a great mascara and I finally found it. I read the reviews on this and decided to give it a try, and I loved it after the first use. No clumps, no flakes, its lengths and after using two costs it looks amazing! I'm thinking about buying it for my sister for christmas.
perfect bottom lash mascara! Lengthen, thickening,adds volume!

I love this mascara! I have been looking for a good everyday mascara and I have tried every drug store brand out there because I didn't want to spend too much money. My friend recommended this brand and I absolutely love it. Well worth the $19

I've used this for years and love the way it lasts. No little black specks under my eyes or on my cheeks and comes off easily with any eye-makeup remover.  For added oomph at night I use it over one coat of a fiber-lash mascara or false eyelashes. The wand is perfect for both upper and lower lashes (yes, it took a little getting used to as it seems a tad longer than other brands).  Builds easily with NO clumping and dries quickly so it's easy to get multiple coats on, but not too quickly that the brush sticks or pulls lashes.  I love this mascara and highly recommend it!

Have tried lots and lots of mascaras over the years and have some sensitivities so try and stay with something water soluble. I have always felt this is a trade-off because i've found this kind of formula to lose a bit of its staying power. Well. Meet Buxom Lash. Fabulous going on - no clumps, easy to manage wand - and easy coming off. In the meantime i have gorgeous long lashes all day long, perfectly separated and just the right punch of drama.No clumps, no flakes, no transfer....all performance, all the time. Love love love it. Price and performance beats Diorshow, UD Perversion, NARS..... and not tested on animals either. Also-freaking-lutely perfect.

This product does not volumize or lengthen. It does define but I have to put so many coats on. I LOVE mascara and this does not perform as well as Perversion or They're Real. I do not use this on my natural lashes. I do use this on my falsies to help blend my natural lashes into the falsies because it goes on so thinly. For that it's perfect. I do like that it doesn't clump but again I can't use this everyday.

This product does not get enough love and I cannot express what an incredible Bumon has created here! I am absolutely a mascara junkie but this is the best one I've ever tried!!! Length, separation, multiplied lashes with never a clump!!! I will be repurchasing this for a long time to come!
I absolutely loooooove this mascara it is my all-time favorite! It's not really wet and makes my natural lashes look fake. I barely use anything else. Worth the money.
i'm very picky about mascara, but i love this one! it isn't too wet or too dry & i've never had it clump! amazing!!

This mascara is my daily mascara. It doesn't clump my lashes at all and goes on quick and easy. This mascara definitely lengthens but doesn't thicken. Mascara that thickens tends to clump which is why this one doesn't clump. I added a drop of lavender oil to this mascara tube and I think this enhances the formula. I get so many compliments on my lashes/eyes with this mascara. Definitely will repurchase!

I am a huge mascara snob. I try just about all of them. But this is my favorite, hands down the best. Thick, separated and long lashes. No clumping or spidery looking lashes. I do find that I go thru a tube fairly quickly or it dries out fairly quickly but it's not bad enough to knock it down any stars. Just love this product.

I received this as part of a gift set. The sample sat in my drawer for a while and when I pulled it out I couldn't believe I had gone without it so long! It separates my lashes beautifully, never clumps, and never seems to dry out in the tube. It's not super volumizing (although it does add a decent amount of volume) so for special occasions I layer a high volume mascara on the tips but I love this mascara more than any other I've tried. Even more than They're Real by Benefit! The brushes are very similar for the two. I normally hate rubber brushes but this one is made wonderfully.
I love this mascara, but it dries out SO DARN QUICKLY! ugh. I have been buying this for years, and they must have changed the formula or something, because it lasts like a month max now. :(
I personally love this mascara! it makes my lashes super long and gives them volume. Also, the brush is plastic and rigid so it separates all the lashes. I LOVE THIS PRODUCT!!!!
Awesome mascara. One of the very few expensive mascaras I would buy. Don't need Too many coats to see results. It's great
Super volumizing and light. I don't need more than a coat to have full, sultry lashes. Makes my eyes just pop out! Similar to clinique's High Impact Extreme Volume Mascara.

I'm asian and my eyelashes are light and straight. This is one of my favourite non-waterproof mascara. I have to curl my lashes first before I apply, but it's because I have straight asian eyelashes. It adds length and volume that I can wear everyday.

I LOVE this mascara! I was a little hesitant to switch from my go-to Dior ItLash, but I was looking for a cheaper option. Buxom is absolutely amazing! I looked for a mascara with a similar brush to Dior, which this had, and it was about $8 cheaper. Not only that, I actually prefer it to its expensive counterpart. Dior's is too wet when you first get it that it clumps and smears easily. This mascara is the exact opposite. It lengthens and thickens without clumping. In fact, I literally only have to use about 3 coats. I used to use like 10 coats of Dior to get the same effect. For anyone looking for a less expensive option, Buxom will not disappoint!
Yup, exactly what I said! my eyelashes look like a peacocks tail :) love this mascara

reviews.review_title: Only pricy mascara I will buy!
reviews.review_text: I am usually very cheap when it comes to mascara, but I tried Buxom in a miniature mascara set I had and fell in love. It lasts a good amount of time so the price doesn't seem so bad but I it lengthens and separated my lashes very nicely.
The brush interested me and I had high hopes, but this mascara didn't do anything special.
I have tried many mascaras, this is the best one for your bottom lashes. But I have had much better volume and length with other mascaras. Doesn't flake for the most part & does not clump

i get sephora favorite's lashstash every year, so that tells you i've tried MANY masacaras. this is one of my fav. the thin bristles is a great design, 1, it picks up product inside the tube better, 2, it gets through and between individual lashes easier so you get a more even coat around each hair and prevents clumps. use the more dense tip for the corners, and the more sparse middle part for the center of the eye lashes. sephora buying guide also listed it as all-in-one, very true. i like it! i recommend!

I got this as a free gift with a recent sephora order and i love it!! I have short, sparse, eye lashes with very little color and am always searching for a mascara that makes me look like I have lashes and doesn't clump - and this does just that. I used 2 coats of this and one coat of They're Real and it looks like I'm wearing false eyelashes. The best I have ever looked!
This is my holygrail of mascaras. Nothing else compares!
Absolutely in love with this mascara! I have tried many different kinds including many high end from Sephora & this one is by far my favourite

reviews.review_title: Want beautiful looking eyelashes?Buy this mascara!
reviews.review_text: *Long wear mascara *Lengthening *Thickening *No clumping *Build-able without clumping *No crumbling *Long lasting *Worth every dime :)

My friend has a sample size of this mascara and everytime im at her house it try to steal it, its that good! I have very troublesome lashes so getting the look i want is challenging. This makes my lashes look fluffy and curled without a lash curler. The only downside is it doesn't hold the curl :9 although Im still going to buy this next time i go to sephora
the mascara is quite heavy when it is put on, it makes my eyelash flat instead of having a certain angle. But it really make my eyelash thick and look better.

I bought this following rave reviews by a you-tuber. It didn't wow me as much. Good product but I would like a more lengthening product. Volumizes well (which is not important to me) and holds a curl. No flaking nor irritation noted. Great product, just not my forté.

I think this mascara is fine. It's a bit waxy, which I don't like the feel of, but it means that it stays put really well. It's not as voluminizing as I'd like - my lashes aren't really that full, though they do look good. I wouldn't repurchase.
If this mascara is ever discontinued I will be one sad person. The applicator is perfect for coating and separating the lashes without EVER clumping. I will use this stuff forever.

It was alright I guess, application was really nice and the formula was pretty awesome, but the down side to it is that it's HORRIBLE at holding your curled eyelashes, it lengthened my lashes nicely and it wasn't clumpy, it's just bad with holding curl.
I'm always trying new brands of mascara but I always have one of these in my makeup bag because it never lets me down!!! One of my favorites.
This mascara is great at separating the lashes and making them thicker but is not lengthening. Super long wearing but easy to remove. Just wish it could add some more length

In my opinion this is the best mascara ever! I feel that my lashes are skimpy due to years of using contact lenses, and a lot of mascaras that promise more fullness seem to clump and make it seem like i have a total of 3 eyelashes! I use the regular formula of this Buxom mascara (not the waterproof) and it does not smudge or run even if it gets wet or from tearing. Im not very good at putting on makeup, but this goes on perfectly without much effort. Originally i had bought the mini version with some points, and thats when I fell in love. I wish they made that size available again, i would buy like 10 of these and keep one in every bag, my car, etc. And one more awesome thing -- the tube lasts a REALLY long time. I use it at least once a day, if not twice, and have had the same tube since march! Cannot recommend this more. Better than dior show, WAY better than Benefit they're real. Try it you will not be sorry!

I have tried a lot of different mascara brands and this is my favorite. The applicator is fantastic, it is able to hit every lash, even the tiny ones at either corner of my eye which is a first. It is never clumpy and makes my lashes thick and full. I will buy this mascara again.

I discovered this mascara in the Sephora favorites Lashstash set. It is the best mascara I've ever tried, and I'm a mascara junkie!!! It makes your lashes sooooo long and voluminous while keeping them separated. This will definitely be my new go to!!!

I love Buxom lip products, so thought I would love the mascara as well. The product itself is fine, but the brush is too...flimsy for lack of a better word. For my lashes, i require a stiffer brush to define and lengthen.

I LOVE mascara, and wear it daily. For a while it seemed like all of the good mascaras were expensive (meaning over $30!) and then I received this as a sample. This is one of the best mascaras that I have ever used. My lashes are normal in volume, but thin. This perfectly accentuates each lash, without the clump factor. And it comes off easily with my makeup remover (MUFE Sens'eyes). I was crushing on Benefit's They're Real mascara until I found this one!

This is my first review after years of shopping at Sephora because I really love this mascara. I was looking for something I could wear every day, and this is the one. I have about 10 other brands, and this is my favorite for daytime. It's lengthening and does the best job separating individual lashes. It's not particularly volumizing or dramatic, just great for a very natural look with all types of makeup.
I like the brush but I found it was way too clumpy and I couldn't layer it.
This is HANDS-DOWN. THE. BEST. MASCARA. EVER!

I got this as a sample a couple years ago and bought it recently when I saw it again. This is an excellent mascara! It really is more of a natural-look; nothing extremely bold. It lengthens and the brush separates PERFECTLY. No clumps. Doesn't flake and stays on even after I've washed my face I have to remove the rest with a lotion. LOVE IT!

I love this mascara I have naturally long eyelashes and I'm really picky about the mascara I use. Until I found this one I can layer it on without it clumping up. It makes my lashes look amazing people always ask me what mascara I'm using and I always recommend this one.
I found this formula to be very flaky. It was not easy to layer and it took a few layers to achieve the volume I was after.

I really am in this weird phase where I am trying all types of mascara's to find my holy grail tube. I think that this mascara is great for everyday use, but again this is my opinion, I think that it doesn't show a dramatic difference. I have long thick eyelashes and keeping a curl is not a problem, I want more length and volume than anything else. This mascara is very black which I like, but only lengthens, it does not volumize. I guess I am looking for a permanent mascara that will allow me to transition from day to night with a few swipes. Other than that, I like that it goes on semi-wet, dries quickly, and the bristles are great to coat the bottom lashes. I included a pic to compare MUFE Smoky Extravagant wand, which is my most reached for mascara, and Buxom's Lash Mascara.

I found the travel size in the liquid eyeliner section. I loved it and searched the store for it. I normally would have gotten the Benefit but this really did a great job. I wear it all the time now and it never smears. I'm in acting and whenever I cry its fine and its not even waterproof!!! I never get any clumps! This is my new favorite brand and i will purchase more in the future.

Mascara is the one bit of make-up that I am super picky about and I'm always on a quest to find a better one than the last. I tried Buxom since I was so impressed with their lip glosses so I was hoping for the same quality with their mascara. Unfortunately their mascara doesn't even come close to their other products. The wand is small making it difficult to apply, the formula dries very quickly, it's a bit flaky, and the worst part is the smudge factor - this does not last all day. I work in an office and am constantly having to wipe it from below my eyes because it can't seem to stay on my lashes. I ended up throwing it away after a handful of uses. There are many mascaras out there at the same price point which work a lot better.
I really wanted to love this mascara but it wasn't anything special. It weighed down my lashes and didn't stay curled for long.

This mascara has a great formula. It's creamy, rich, and doesn't bother my sensitive eyes! It def does what it says, (full, thick lashes).  The only downfall is if you aren't quick enough building it, it will clump.

I have used this mascara for the last five years and I just love it. I have tried to use other mascaras, drugstore mascara to be specific, to save a few bucks, but I always come back to this one. This mascara makes my lashes so full and gives them so much volume. I always have people comment/compliment me on my lashes being so full and long.  The only con I can say about it is that it takes a bit for it to dry once applied. This is a con if you, like me, use an eyelash curler to give you the extra oomph. Oh, and it starts to flake once the mascara tub is getting old, but that is normal.  Best mascara! I will use no other.
I always come back to this one! Volume and length
The length, volume, and definition this mascara gives my lashes is incredible. Not heavy or clumpy, it doesn't flake off either. I will definitely buy this again!
The wand is just the right shape and size for excellent volume and zero clumping. Lasts a long time too!

Discovered this years ago in a Sephora favourites kit and have continued to repurchase ever since! Great length and definition with just the right amount of volume for my short lashes. Stays all day and doesn't flake away. My current tube isn't the best as it gathers a load of product on the end of the brush which won't rub off without disturbing the rest of the mascara on the wand. But this is the first time this has happened to me so hopefully it's just a bad tube and not new packaging!!
Love the wand and it looks great! Great formula! My go to mascara

reviews.review_title: Lashes Look Good but Eyelids are Smeared
reviews.review_text: Great product once you wipe all the excess mascara off your eyelids. I returned this product.
By far, my favorite mascara! It lengthens and feathers them out perfectly! It also isn't super thick or gooey.

I absolutely adore this mascara! It is the only one that I ever purchase. It makes my lashes so lengthy and voluminous. I am so happy that I received this item as a sample because it has been my all time favorite since then. And did I say that I love it?!

I've tried many mascaras and this one is definitely a favorite of mine. I have very short lashes and this mascara grabs hold of each one. It gives me volume which I need. Howevr, I did notice that as the day went on I have black smudges under my eyes. Once I paired it with a lash primer (Clinique's) I haven't had a problem since.
This mascara goes on so smooth. No clumps at all. Not too intense and dark. Lengthens lashes perfectly
Makes my lashes longer and doesn't clump up!
I have long lashes and this mascara just adds on nicely and separates them really well! Overall a great and long lasting product

One of the few mascaras I've used that keeps my lashes curled. I love it because it separates all my lashes as well. For my lashes, it is the perfect base mascara. I use one coat of this and then a coat of Better Than Sex, which makes them long, full, and dark. Definitely recommend this product.
Works great on my eyelashes. Makes them long and full.

I can't remember how I first tried this, maybe a Sephora sample? But I've used this mascara for about 3 years now and I'm on my 5th tube (using it almost every day). It isn't cheap, and I'm not always one to splurge on makeup, but I definitely think this is worth it. It lasts a long time, doesn't dry out, it's nice and dark and it coats smoothly. I've received samples of other mascara brands from Sephora but none have tempted me away from Buxom yet :) I just ordered another tube today!
Doesn't give my lashes any volume. Very disappointed.

Got a small sample of this to try in a kit and quickly fell in love with the formula. It has a large wand and gives great volume. A mascara that I grabbed frequently to use - the only downfall was that some of the product pushed up from the barrel so it became messy over time to use. Would definitely purchase the full size once I use up some more samples - hopefully the larger size doesn't have any packaging issues!

The best mascara I've ever had. I first had a small sample size, and after using it for a week, I knew I had to buy this mascara. It gives my lashes a fan-out effect that leaves the outer-corner lashes longer, which I love. Volumizing, lengthening, black– it's a winner.
This mascara is so amazing- it is the perfect every day mascara (nothing too dramatic), but adding a couple more coats makes it the perfect evening look. Definitely recommend to all my friends.

I love this mascara. It never clumps and always gives me a natural, long look. I hate mascara that is too thick and leaves your lashes looking like spiders, this mascara will never do that. It isn't heavy at all and it makes your eyelashes look flawless!
Excellent mascara for the price. Really good at volumizing lashes without leaving them stiff.

After using and trying tons of mascaras over the years I still come back to you. This mascara is amazing! Love how beautiful, thick and long it leaves my lashes after only one coat. I love how a little goes a long way. This one is a keeper!
Best mascara I've had so far.
So i already have pretty long lashes naturally, but this mascara triples the length. its not too pricy and its a must have!

I LOVE this mascara. It lengthens, volumizes, and makes mine look amazing. I love the brush. It does an amazing job. I just wish it came in a brown or brown black option. That would make it truly perfect. Still 5 star worthy.

Honestly the best mascara out there. I got a sample size tube from Sephora a while back as part of a points package and I've probably bought around 6 full size tubes since then. The wand is fabulous and it does not clump like most mascaras do when you apply numerous coats. I've never found another mascara that satisfies me like this one does. I've almost run out of product in my current tube and I will be going back to Sephora soon to buy yet another tube of this.

I am super picky when it comes to mascara. My non-negotiable criteria - must be deep black, lengthening (I like the fluttery fan effect), very volumizing (without clumping or weighing down), and no flaking or smearing. Buxom does it ALL and I always come back to it! I've tried most of them out there, but none have compared - Too Faced Better Than $ex (flaked and clumped), Diorshow (not enough length, dried out fast), Benefit They're Real (heavy and smeared), Ciate Triple Shot (no volume, very spidery), MUFE Smoky Extr. (smeared and clumped), Lancôme hypnose volumizing (not volumizing enough), Guerlain maxi lash (no volume or length) - the list really does go on. I use Buxom on both my top and bottom lashes, and what I really like about it is that if I want to be super super dramatic for a special night, I can layer another mascara (lately Urban Decay Pervasion) on my top lashes and it doesn't clump with the Buxom underneath. Also love that it doesn't dry out fast (or at all!) and I can have consistently nice lashes every time I use it. This is a complete win for me and I highly recommend it.

I don't get how people can rate this so low! This is the best mascara I've used in a long time, no clumps and it makes my eye lashes look so long. Ive been using the same brand for 2 years and I still love it
not worth the money. it's fine but nothing special.
No clumps, EVER. Length, volume, doesn't flake, isn't a total nightmare to remove. It's the perfect mascara! FINALLY!!!
Really love this mascara for the price. Affordable and really drags out lashes for length. Wish it added more volume.. But can't find length and volume in one.

I have been looking for a great mascara for a long time, and I finally found it! BUT the first time I used this mascara, I was not impressed. I didn't throw it out, and decided to give it another try a couple weeks later and I'm so glad I did. I have mediocre lashes, at best, and this mascara lengthens and separates like a dream. It does take a few coats, but Every mascara I have ever used takes a few coats on my lashes. They're not very full or thick. I think my lashes look almost like I'm wearing false lashes, and I don't have to deal with applying those pain in the a** things! Get this mascara!!

I always like to try new mascaras. I had seen online that this one had been highly rated. I am disappointed with this product. I find it super thin. It takes multiple (++++) coats for me to notice any change. Once it's on, it's ok, but I just do not feel that the amount of coats required is worth it.

Based on the description and the fact that it's one of their best sellers, i thought this mascara would knock my socks off, but really it doesnt do much aside from provide a nice dark color to my fair lashes. maybe adds a little definition? I certainly don't get the length or volume that i really want.

I have the straightest most ugly lashes ever and buxom does it for me! Now this is a mascara thats better than sex. I have pics on my IG of what this does to my ugly lashes. Check it out. _eye_heart_makeup_

I really wished I loved it. I have long lashes, but not a whole lot of them. I'm always looking for new mascaras, because I never seem to be completely satisfied. I read a couple of reviews and decided to try this one. As I said earlier, I really wished I loved it, but it did nothing good for me. it lengthen them all right, but they almost didn't curl and it looked like I had 10 lashes. Also, the brush is so huge, I had mascara all over my eyelids, which I usually succeed to avoid. So, this mascara was a huge disappointment to me.

This is the mascara I come back to time and again. I have long lashes that lack volume, and just one coat of this stuff gives me a medium amount of length and a POW of volume. Easily buildable for high-drama lashes. Very minimal flaking, yet comes off easily when washing my face. ZERO CLUMPS, even at the end of the tube! This stuff rocks.

this is my holy grail mascara. i have not bought any other mascara since a coworker told me to try this several years ago. i go through several tubes a year, seems to last forever probably because only 1 coat is required to get the look i want. it makes my lashes long and full. i'll keep buying again and again, i've never had any issues with it at all.

I have been looking for a good mascara for what seems like forever. I've been going through multiple mascaras that I've bought at Sephora, and this is the first one that I've bought that was well worth the price. It doesn't clump and makes my lashes long and holds up the whole day. I'm going to be using this for a long time to come! I discovered this mascara from buying the 5 mini mascaras set and came with a voucher for a full size mascara. Definitely a good way to test some new products out.
This mascara is amazing I've gone through three bottles of it and it's just so nice on the lashes and it never clumps up and it volumizes them.

I really like this product, it defines lashes and definitely makes them stand out. It's not waterproof and some does end up under my eyes by the end of the day. I'm still trying to hunt for a mascara that doesn't do that!

I bought the sample size of this mascara and fell in love with it! It really adds volume and length to my lashes without clumping, and seems to coat each lash separately. When I run out of my sample size, I'll definitely be going back to buy more!

reviews.review_title: Perfect, natural looking although BIGGER lashes
reviews.review_text: I love this mascara. It extends and makes my eyelashes longer and larger without making them clump together or look fake. Very natural.

this mascara is amazing! It volumizes and lengthens all in in one, creating nicely defined lashes. I also noticed that this mascara has some conditioning ingredients in it so it isn't harsh on the lashes like some other mascaras are. Even though this isn't waterproof, I haven't noticed any significant smudging throughout the day which is awesome.

I have short, straight, and stubbly lashes and this holds my curl all day! It doesn't do too much in terms of length or thickening but it's a great base and layering mascara. The brush really does a great job of combing out the lashes.
this mascara was just okay. i ended up returning it because it was nothing special. many other better mascaras out there. i have naturally long lashes so it might work better for short sparse lashes

My friend recently bought this mascara not knowing if it would do wonders for her eyes. When she first tried it, she loved it!! She said this is one of the best mascaras she has ever tried. She is very proud of her purchase. She insisted that I buy it as well. So the next time I go to Sephora, I will definitely buy it.

This is probably the best mascara I've ever used. The consistency is silky, it goes on smoothly and evenly without clumping, it's got dense color, it keeps lashes separated, and it lasts all day without smudging or flaking. The brush looks weird and stubby, but is actually very well-designed. What more could one ask from a mascara? I've been using a small sample for over a month and it's still as good as when it was first opened. I'm ordering a full size!

reviews.review_title: love it, but want it in brown
reviews.review_text: This is the only mascara that I consistently use and repurchase, even though I receive and try lots of samples. It's just the best for me. That said, I'm removing one star because it's only available in black, which is overkill for the fair-skinned, like me, especially for daily wear. Buxom, please make this formula in brown!

First mascara I have liked and repurchased. It lengthens and defines to my liking, which is a lot since my lashes are so short and straight. The brush is a good size and shape, but I would prefer if it was a spoon shape so it could lift the lashes higher. The formula isn't too dry or too wet, and is more effective than the waterproof version.
I've tried many mascaras....this is th best out there.
This mascara goes on smoothly, darkens, thickens, and lengthens lashes and the brush is easy to use and works well!

I've used this mascara now for 3+ years and love it! I believe I started using it after a recommendation on a blog. It's never clumpy, it lengthens my lashes, and it doesn't smudge under my eyes - ever. If I want fuller lashes for going out I just apply another coat or 2 depending on how full I want them. It lasts all day, though I typically reapply mid-day after I touch up my powder (since the powder falls onto my lashes). Would definitely recommend! Finally going to buy the waterproof!

I have bought this maskcara over and over through the years. It is fantastic, and I will never leave it. If they ever discontinue, I will have to stock up hardcore.  The mascara itself is smooth and doesn't clump easily. It really helps to warm the tube before application. (I stick it between my boobs while doing the rest of my makeup) That really helps a smooth application.  The brush is amazing. Unlike many wands, the rubber bristles on this are rather short. This makes it really easy to apply to the inside of your lashes. I've tried using this brush with other mascaras. It definitely provides a better application, but I like it best as the original.
It's the best. I've used it all. It stays put even though it's not waterproof and makes lashes look awesome.
Made my eyelashes beautiful thick and glossy but the flakes and smears made it a dealbreaker. Had to return.

Let me start by saying I'm a hard to please makeup junkie. I love trying new products, from drugstore to high end. I have long eyelashes but average thickness so I need fullnrss and volume from my mascara. I've tried MANY and this one is in the top two. (Too Faced Better Than Sex is the other). I love the brush and the formula. It finds and coats EVERY lash, separates, adds length and volume, won't flake or come off and give you awful raccoon eyes. I can work a 12 1/2 hour shift and there's nothing under my eyes. It's also very versatile and buildable without getting dry or clumpy. You can easily go from a natural everyday look to a dramatic look that's great for nights on the town or special occasions. It comes off easily with makeup remover or when you wash your face. You don't have to rip out half your eyelashes to get it off like with some I've tried either. It could also be a great base for another mascara. I've used a coat of this with Better Than Sex over it and wham! It's great and I highly recommend it to anyone. Most Sephora stores keep the trial size in stock to if you're not happy with what you're using give it a try.
I didn't see anything special about this mascara - it was just ok. It wasn't anymore volumizing than any other product.

I absolutely love this mascara. I've tried nearly every drugstore mascara and they all promise something that you rarely actually see. This mascara is amazing. It's very black, the brush gets every lash and it gives you good volume. I totally recommend!

This product is really really good at not getting clumpy on you lashes! It separates every lash & doesn't look thick. The only thing is that you need to apply like 3 coats in order to get them really long or super full! What I use this one for is natural looking lashes. GREAT FOR AN EVERYDAY LOOK! When you don't want to look too draamtic
Best mascara ever! My go to mascara. I've tried so many others and I always come back to this one. One word Amazing!!

I love mascara. I buy several to wear everyday and recently I bought this one to try. I wasn't impressed. In fact, I felt that this mascara stunted my lashes and didn't give them the length and volume that I get with other mascaras. I have two stars because the amount of mascara on the brush and the size of brush is great.

This does great on my lashes, it defines and adds volume, and it does add a great amount of length, plus I've had it a couple months and it still applies like I just got it! This would be my holy grail if it added just a touch more length, as I love length focused mascaras. However despite wanting a touch more length, I definitely recommend this product to everyone and would go back to this mascara!
I really like this mascara for the money. It's not my very fav, but it is great stuff!

I went to sephora for some designer mascara because I ran out. The buxom was on display so I thought I should try it. I have already owned a few of the Dior so I wanted to try something new. Let me tell you it is the best mascara I've ever owned. I don't have to curl my lash or clump it on, just to strokes and BAM! I will definitely purchase again!

This mascara goes on really nice, not clumpy, and lasts all day. It is not going to make your lashes look dramatic, like some people might want for night-time looks. But it is great for a natural, going-to-work look.
i experimented with a lot of products but this is by far the best.
I absolutely love this. It's perfect for a simple makeup look

Similar to the Benefit They're Real! Mascara. Stays put with no smudging and is cheaper than most at Sephora. The mascara formula seemed to last longer too than other comparable brands. Took much longer before I noticed it was getting clumpy and needed to be replaced.

This mascara is amazing! Everyone asks me if I'm wearing fake lashes when I have this mascara on. What's nice is that with one or two coats it looks really natural but you can keep layering for a more dramatic look without any clumps. I usually hate plastic brushes but this one has completely changed my mind. I'm a mascara freak (constantly buying new ones trying to find the perfect one) and this one is definitely in my top 5.

I recently bought the Lash Out mascara sampler and this is the most amazing I've tried so far! My lashes are naturally long but this really plays the length up and thickens them. The brush is great design but best part is that it doesn't CLUMP! Defiantly will be getting a full size of this when my sample size runs out.

I wanted to give this mascara a try being that it had great reviews. My feedback:  Pro: Good separator for lashes Con: Had to apply 3 coats for fullness  I already have long lashes and feel like I had to apply too many coats. I don't think I will be purchasing again.
This is not waterproof so it smudges below my eyes and makes me look really tired. It doesn't volumize though it lengthens.
This mascara is amazing!! I have never used a mascara that makes my eye lashes look curled, voluminous, and long. It is like Benefit They're Real but better!
I've been using this mascara for years. My lashes are naturally curled and this thickens and enhances their look. 2nd best to eyelash extensions for me.

I HATE this mascara. I am a mascara queen. It's really the only make up product I care to use. The wand is nice. It does separate my lashes and I don't worry about clumping at all. But the color is a very weak black. I have to apply several coatings to get my lashes dark. I also feel it did very little in the way of giving my lashes any volume or thickness. I am willing to spend money on mascara. But I am very unhappy that I spent $16 on one I literally use now to just shape my lashes after I use a different mascara.

reviews.review_title: Above Average Mascara with one caveat
reviews.review_text: I have long, straight lashes and this mascara took about half the curl out of my freshly curled lashes, which is a dealbreaker for me. In most other respects though this is a great mascara. It goes on smooth, feels lightweight, defines, lengthens, wears long. I didn't see clumps or fallout and even after carelessly rubbing my eye it didn't smudge. I didn't notice much change in volume but I have thick lashes and only apply one layer so I might have seen volume with more layers. Also, the black is a gorgeous black. I usually wear black-brown mascara during the day but when I want black I want really black, this reminded me of patent leather black but it doesn't look harsh at all. The only thing keeping this product from a must have is that it doesn't hold the curl.

Overall this is a good base for other mascara, I always top with a more volumizing mascara. This mainly gives a natural look. It separates but doesn't make them look longer or anything. It's alright but I wouldn't repurchase
I've tried A LOT of mascara over the years and this is one of my favorites. My only complaint would be that by the end of a 12 hour day it does start to flake.
I'm very picky tried everything this is my fav next to the tarte lights camera lashes both so good
Works really well. don't poke your eye.
I really wanted to love this mascara and upon application I was a fan... but hours later it had started to flake and transfer to my water line and below my brows. So back to the store it went!

First tried this the Buxom as a sample with purchase and loved it. Finally got full size and really like the brush and consistency of the formula. Best new product for me. Thanks Sephora for the original sample.
It kinda makes my eyelids really feel heavy. It's not the best I've ever had but it'll do for now.
I am in love with this applicator- it separates and lengthens lashes so nicely and easily, leaving absolutely no clumps ever. It's a nice go-to for natural looks.

By far this is the best mascara I've ever used. I've tried so many mascaras, including more expensive brands, like Lancome, and they are NOTHING compared to this mascara. It doesn't flake or clump and it adds length and volume while defining my lashes. It's so good that people often ask me if I'm wearing fake lashes! The only problem I've encountered is getting mascara on my eyelids. This is probably either due to the bristles being really long or me just being clumsy. Overall, it's absolutely perfect! I've purchased this item twice and have never been disappointed. I highly recommend this product.
I'm constantly getting compliments on my lashes using this product, makes lashes look long and thick
This is one of my favorite mascaras! It doesn't clump my lashes together, or flake off.
Makes my straight lashes curl and stretch to the max!!!
I love this mascara! I use it everyday! It separates my lashes and builds the perfect definition.
ive tried several, but this is the best. I have thin lashes and this mascara does not clump when I put three layers
Just a run of the mill mascara. Nothing special. Wouldn't recommend it.

I will admit that I had high expectations for this product. For me personally - it only slightly lengthened my lashes and while other mascaras hold a curl for me this one did not. This mascara didn't provide any volume whatsoever and it was just very average. Reminded me of a certain drugstore mascara but more expensive.

I never liked this kind of wand before but I got a deluxe sample of this product once and never looked back. The mascara is a thin liquid and I don't find it very volumizing but it darkens and lengthens my lashes beautifully without a clump in sight! I love it as a base coat and on my lower lashes then put a layer of Better Than S e x over it and bam! Gorgeous eyes! I love that it has vitamins and nourishes my lashes as well. I love my products to have benefits!
I recently bought BUXOM to save a bit of money, but it wasn't worth it. The curl in my lashes didn't last, and my lashes looked thin and just unflattering.

reviews.review_title: Best mascara I have ever used!
reviews.review_text: I have worn every mascara under the sun, this one is my favorite, without a doubt.
I have been using buxom mascara for over a year now. This is definitely a mascara for people who doesn't have long lashes. It makes mine seem like I have false ones! I definitely recommend it!!!!

This mascara is AMAZING! I've been using it for around four months and it just keeps getting better everyday. It doesn't make my lashes clumpy, which has happened a lot in the past. It holds the entire day as well. Absolutely amazing product!

I love this mascara. It gives me great length, it defines, and is separates my lashes. It has a great black color. It stays all day without flaking, which is a big deal to me. I only wish it would thicken my lashes and give me a little more volume. Other than that, best mascara I've ever used.

I've been using Buxom Lash Mascara for at least a year now, and it's definitely the best mascara I've ever used. It separates and defines my lashes very well, gives them great length and volume, and keeps them curled. Love it!

I can say is I have FINALLY found my mascara! The brush and formula are perfect. I've tried so many including department stores but they always clump, rub off on my eyelids or just don't do my lashes justice. I've got long lashes and this mascara defines them and coats them evenly. The effect is naturally dramatic!

I love the formula. It lasts all day but isn't impossible to remove. My only complaint is the brush. It always clumps at the base of the tube and leaves clumps in the corners of my lashes. I thought maybe my first tube was just faulty, but just purchased another and it does it. I'll probably switch back to Benefit Bad Gal lash.
I loved the way it made my eyelashes look, good mascara and deffinately recommend

Got this mascara in an Sephora favorites sample. It is now my GO TO mascara. As a huge lover of Better Than Mascara, this Buxom one really nails the volume, making my lashes look full and natural. Which I LOVE ! Great find. I have now purchased the full size
I've had better mascara...it really doesn't do what you think it would with how the brush looks.

I love this mascara! I am a total mascara addict and this one is definitely the best one I've tried. This mascara is lengthening and volumizing without the clumping! I love this mascara in waterproof also.

This was my first time purchasing Buxom mascara, very pleased! It's gentle on my eyes (they aren't irritated at the end of the day), looks great, and was priced reasonably. Dior got too expensive and it was time for a change, this will be my new go-to! The brush is great too, it really separates my lashes so they look long and full - and it hasn't gotten goopy yet either. Win!

ive tried so many mascaras, this is the only one that gives me the lashes i am looking for. not clumpy, but also dark and very volumized. i like that its not water proof and comes off when i wash my face. makes me look like im wearing fake eyelashes if i do 2 or more coats.
This mascara is amazing, I have used this for a number of years.

I tried this about a year ago at the suggestion of an employee. My lashes were falling out and were not in that great of shape from the products that I had been using. I switched to this and after a while saw an improvement. My lashes are healthier and fuller even without mascara. It has a tendency to come out in globs and I often will need to separate some lashes that stick together, but it worth the effort. I've used this long enough to see long term results and am hooked.

I love experimenting with mascaras. I've tried TONS...both high-end and drugstore, and I keep coming back to this one. Love the brush, formula, everything!! Every time I wear this mascara I get compliments...event people asking if I'm wearing falsies. LOVE LOVE LOVE!

I have tried mascara for years from drugstore brands and was generally convinced that price didn't matter, so I never wanted to splurge. Considering my eyes' general sensitivity (I wear glasses or contacts and have very dry eyes), I am so happy to have taken a chance on a higher quality product. Ended up being quite worth it!

I had initially got this mascara as a sample from Sephora and immediately fell in love. I purchased the larger size and it worked amazingly until about 2 weeks later. It dried out and although it had once lengthened my lashes in 1-2 swipes, it was now requiring about 5-6 layers in order to apply even one good layer. The only reason I'm giving it 3 stars is because it had initially worked so well.
Although it does add volume, most of it is clumpy and ends up giving me spider lashes. I didn't find that it added much length. Comparable to many drugstore mascaras that cost a fraction of the price

I am what you would call a mascara junkie. Whenever a new one is coming out, I've researched, and typically preordered it. Well, that may stop now. I am leaving this review based on the travel size so I feel obligated to disclose that. I like having the wand shorter for better application control. Buxom lengthens and volumizes seamlessly, and is build able without waiting for it to dry, YES. I'm serious. It's not a mile-long look, but it's equal parts classic and glam. Buy it, you won't be disappointed!
I do love the brush, I just wish the actual mascara was better.. it's good for everyday use, but I didn't notice more volume.

I got this mascara in a sample size from a friend like a year ago and it just ran out and I am literally obsessed and the happiest person ever for finding out it wasn't discontinued like I originally thought. I have naturally dark curly long lashes, and this mascara enhances that without clumping them together or making them look like I've been putting on mascara for twenty minutes in like twenty seconds. One coat turns my lashes into jet black, soft, eyebrow touching dreams.

This mascara lengthens and separates flawlessly! I rarely want to add lasts because this product works very well. It defines and lengthens almost instantly and no more than two passes required to see the differences.
This mascara goes on without clumps and leaves my lashes full and thick looking. Not clumpy and hard.

I really wasn't that taken with this mascara at first and was going to return it. However, I've grown to really like it. The brush separates rates well and I haven't had any problems with my sensitive eyes. I personally think that this is more of a day time mascara, but for that it's great.

I loved the look of this mascara and how it made my lashes separate nicely. Then, not even a half hour after applying, it was all over under my eyes. I wish it didn't come off so easily because this could have been a keeper. Returning.
This is my all-time favorite. Nice long, neat lashes - no spider lashes - and my lashes are SOFT not wirey!

I've tried many, many mascaras. Some I have liked, others were horrible. My favorite was Benefit They're Real until I found BUXOM. No clumps, no flaking, glides on smoothly and lasts me all day. Every one has their own opinion on mascaras so I may love BUXOM and you may not. I say though if your not 100% happy with your mascara, give this one a try.

I was really excited to try this mascara because I'd heard so many good reviews. I curled my lashes as usual but when I put the mascara on, the curl completely came out and my lashes were straight again (which is not a very good look on me!) Im very disappointed that my usual 8$ drugstore mascara works better than this 20$ mascara. Not sure if the formula is very heavy or what but my lashes just wouldn't stay curled with this mascara!

This is def a go to, every day type product. One of the only mascaras that actually help with volume! It gets the lashes from the bottom and spreads them out. As long as you don't just rush it on it like never clumps. I put on mascara pretty slow cause I'm a perfectionist so it'll take a few coats to lengthen but it looks very natural! However I do use it with a separate lengthening mascara when I'm doing more than everyday wear.

This is by far the best mascara I have ever used. I get compliments daily and so many people have purchased it since I bought it. I use it over Dior lash serum and it works so great. It makes your eyes look beautiful!!

This stuff is pretty incredible. I like the formula, it doesn't clump, doesn't flake off, doesn't smudge or transfer onto my upper eyelid/brow bone area at all, and it makes my lashes look amazing. It's also not hard to wash off. I keep going back to this mascara because others I try always have at least one of the aforementioned issues. This one is great, and for the price point, you can't beat it!

I'm always on the lookout for the perfect mascara. This was my favorite in the latest Sephora mascara kit and just purchased the full size tube. Love it! The bristles are softer and tinier than most rubbery bristles, so if you're having a rough morning, you won't stab your eyeball. It separates, defines, lengthens and the result is super dramatic. The formula is quite clump free and is shiny black. I picked up the waterproof, which I don't love quite as much, but I'm still a fan.
Got this in a Lash Stash set and absolutely love it! I naturally have long lashes but this goes that extra mile! Love that it makes my lashes look fuller and longer, what girl can ask for more?

This is my go to mascara! It doesn't bother my eyes like some of the others do. It's easy to apply and after few applications it gives my naturally long lashes more definition.  I would give it 5 stars but it does flake a little bit.

I love to use this by itself or sometimes even over top of a straight-up lengthening mascara. It makes my lashes so voluminous and plushy looking! Plus, it lasts for the entire day, even through my workouts! I would definitely recommend this one!

Im always nervous to buy a new mascara but BUXOM didn't disappoint. I have naturally medium/ straight lashes that are prone to stick together (especially when i add a second layer for volume) but this product does not clump. It's also smooth enough that I can glide it to the ends of my lashes then hold it for a few second for a little extra curl without clumping! Even after a 13 hour work day there are no flakes or running. I will be reordering when I run out!

This mascara is a great every day mascara. The big brush easily separates the lashes, doesn't let the product clump and doesn't take a lot of effort to remove. I've had no problems with it flaking off. It's my new favorite mascara! Highly recommend.
Wasn't a big fan of this mascara. Was all over my face within an hour
New favorite mascara. I've been using tarte amazonian clay for a while, but it always dried up too quickly. This buxom one is great-- great length, color, volume. Highly recommend!
Like the brush, but no lengthing, or volumizng effects
I like this mascara because it gave my lashes full volume but unfortunately I was looking for lengthening mascara.

reviews.review_title: Mom loves for her crazy lashes
reviews.review_text: My mom complains that as she gets older her lashes are going all different directions. She said this seems to the only mascara that fixes them. She thinks its more the brush but I wouldn't be surprised if its both. They don't carry this in the Bare Mineral Stores because its not all natural. Hopefully Sephora keeps carrying it!

I got this in a sample size and I will definitely be ordering the full-size version very soon! I love it so much. The brush is super wide and has rubbery bristles, which are great for getting every lash. Within two swipes, the formula makes my lashes super long and adds a good amount of volume so that they look natural, but definitely enhanced. Great product!

I got this as a gift on christmas hadn't used it often though. I actually just tried it this month and LOVE IT. It does NOT clump at all and gives amazing length. Doesn't look fake, has a natural look to amazing long lashes. Would recommend :) xxx
This mascara creates thick lashes. Love this product.

my lashes look beautifully long and full for about 10 minutes before the formula completely weighs them down. perhaps curling the lashes would fix this? I like the thick brush for applying to the top, although I have to use a different mascara for the bottom which is inconvenient.
Discovered the mascara as a sample. I absolutely love it. Volumizing. Non irritating. Lasts all day.
I accidentally picked this up one day
This mascara isnt clumpy which is great. It does seem to be as black or lengthening as my Chanel mascara. It almost looks like I am not wearing mascara. Would not buy this again.
I don't like the brush, it takes longer to apply and doesn't create an effect of length, volume or fullness. Will probably retire this to a back or touch up mascara.
This mascara is amazing! My eyelashes looked perfect after using only one coat of this mascara. It added length and volume and didn't clump. Definitely worth it!

If I could only have one mascara this wouldn't be it, but since I usually use two or more at a time I'd rather not be without it.  The formula is pretty fantastic, the blackest black I've found and it leaves your lashes still soft and non-itchy all day. I prefer a brush with a ball tip so I can get into the corners but this one is pretty nice. It's rubber so it's never scratchy and it does a really good job of avoiding spidery eyelashes. It's not very curling but that's what I use another brush for.  Bottom line: this is perfect for more natural fluttery looking eyelashes, and it's difficult to beat the intensity of the blackness on this one.

Love this mascara! Gives very thick, very dark & very long lashes! One of the best mascaras I have tried yet to give the doll eyed look & look of false lashes.
