It is very easy to use and it is a very very rich dark black (not like a gray-ish or matte black). I like the shape of the brush because it is easy to get the inner corners of the eye lashes. This is now by far my favorite mascara that has silicone-bristles. I used to use Benefit They're Real Mascara, I had a very very hard time removing They're Real mascara and I thought they looked more clumpy. This Buxom Lash Mascara gives SUCH a better look, separates much better and is so much easier to remove than They're Real. The formula is easier to work with to separate the lashes, as it is less sticky.  This gives the look of really intense lashes. I would not recommend this if you are looking for a natural/subtle lash look. But I Absolutely love it. Highly recommend for doll-eye and voluminous thick dark lashes!!!!!!!

I tried this mascara on a whim; I used to be a die-hard fan of Lashgasm, but wanted to try something different. Buxom works really well! It's got a funny, rubbery-shaped brush which helps to reach all my tiny lashes. It is conditioning and lengthens my lashes without giving me the spidery eye, which I hate. I put on two coats and it still looked fantastic. The only drawback is that it's not waterproof and I had to keep that in mind and wait extra time before spraying on my makeup setter.

I like this mascara, but I don't love it. It doesn't have the volume that I need for my lashes, and I end up having to apply a bunch. And it's tricky, because it doesn't make my lashes look that much longer. But, I love that it's lightweight and doesn't feel like I'm carrying tarantula legs on my eyelashes. It's good at separating the lashes and helping them curl.
I received this as a sample for my free birthday gift from Sephora because I am a Beauty Insider. I liked it so much I bought it.

Recieved a Sephora mascara sampler for Xmas..after trying all of the samples I found that the Buxom mascara was by far my favourite. LOVE the brush..my lashes are always very defined and never clumpy. I use this mascara as my go to everyday product.

i wanted to love this mascara so much, as i'm always on the lookout for a better mascara. the product does lengthen and thicken, however it clumps like crazy. it also somehow tends to get all over my the skin around my eyes, which i think has to do with the applicator. this has never happened to me with other brands of mascara, so im not impressed. will not be purchasing again.

I've tried practically every mascara and all I can say is this one is my favorite. This mascara gives great length and volume without clumps. A lot of mascaras say no clumps but this one really delivers. It also comes off easily with makeup remover so clean up isn't a hassle. All I can say is I tried many kinds and this is still my favorite. I now have a kind that was more expensive and I got it for a gift and its so bad I'm thinking of throwing it out and buying this one!

I got the travel size of this first, and fell in love enough to purchase the regular size. The pigment is gorgeous, the product makes my lashes stand out, and I could swear they look longer and fuller. I especially love the bristles on the brush: having so many of them makes it easier for me to apply the product without overdoing it.
this is my favorite mascara. i hope they never discontinue it!

I expected more from this mascara because of their many positive reviews. However, I was not blown away at all. I've used cheaper drug store brands that were better than this.  This mascara didn't give me any more volume or length than any other mascara out there. It wasn't bad but it wasn't the bomb either. I didn't get any clumping but there was a little bit of smudging and flaking.  Since I had high hopes for this mascara, the results were quite disappointing. I would not repurchase.
I started using this mascara as a sample a few years ago and fell in love. I refuse to use anything else. Gives me the drama and fullness I want!
This mascara is just ok. I was hoping to love it but i probably wont be purchasing this mascara again. Plus it flakes a bit - I'm going to stick with their lipgloss ;)

I thought this mascara was going to be exceptional based on all the reviews but it is really no better than the Clinique High Impact Mascara which is slightly cheaper. I do find that it goes on well and does not clump but seems to dry fast so harder to build upon. Not sure I will repurchase.

I was doubtful at first, but after using it, I found that this is one of the best mascaras that I have tried. I have very straight lashes. This is the few mascaras that can hold a curl after putting more than one coat on my lashes. It also separates my lashes pretty well. The mascara volumizes my lashes enough without making them look like spider lashes while lengthening them at the same time. If you're unsure about this product, you should definitely try it.

This mascara is one of my go to's. It smells good, nourishes my eyelashes, I feel like I lose less eyelashes when I use this stuff, and it gives full volume and good length. Definitely one of my top three favorite mascaras.

I've tried several mascaras and this by far is my favorite. First off, I have the typical Asian monolid, and not only does this keep my straight lashes at a curl, but also doesn't smear on my skin throughout the day, even in high temps. I also love the brush and the way it separates my lashes as well.

i have about 20 mascaras and this is the one i always come back to. i don't find it volumizing as much as lengthening and defining. it has a perfect drying time - stays wet long enough to do a few swipes but dries soon after. the brush is awesome for coating and combing through every lash so you don't get any clumps, though be aware that it's a little on the bigger side and could be slightly unwieldy if you have smaller eyes. it also lasts throughout the day and doesn't melt or flake under my eyes.
My favourite mascara, I don't know how I'd live without it. Wether I'm doing a full and fashionable look for work or just throwing some mascara on for class it really makes the look.
I've tried so many mascaras and I'm so particular with my eyelashes. This doesn't dry them out, does't clump them, and doesn't flake.
Zero Clumps, lots of black glossy shine, separated long curly lashes...what else do I need?
I work in a warehouse 5 days a week year round, through every season-Never disappointed with this mascara! My mom also loves it, HIGHLY RECOMMEND!
Love it. Very lightweight so it doesn't weigh my lashes down. I have very straight long lashes and they stay curled all day and the brush is amazing
This mascara definitely gives a spiky look, but doesn't hold up well as far as giving length, curl and volume. I like to use it for my bottom lashes but that's all.
i love this mascara. It's one of my go tos and I would recommend it to everyone.

I recently purchased a bag full of mascaras from Sephora in order to find the one, or ones, that would best work for me along with the style of application I require. This is in my top 5 out of 20 I've tried so far. It volumizes, lengthens, and lasts quite a while. I definitely believe it is worth every penny--this coming from someone who has problems with smudging and longevity in their makeup products.
I try a different mascara every month and this is by far the most disappointing. It smears and feels dry. It looks dry and fake, too! Don't know where it belongs other than the dust bin.

I've tried everything from the drugstore cheapies that everyone swears by, to the latest, greatest and most expensive mascaras and this BY FAR is the best mascara I've ever used. It's volumes AND lengthens, which I've find to be a very hard combo to find. It's totally appropriate for daytime use, and with an extra coat or two (without any clumping) can be pumped up a notch for nighttime wear. It's long lasting and seems to be good for my relatively sensitive eyes. Highly recommend this mascara!
i absolutely love this mascara. it does everything it says it does AND i don't feel like my eyelashes have a ton of product on them. it's the perfect balance
I use this as a base layer , then put Dior Show, or Chanel over top if I want a huge statement. But, the price is good for this and it's great as an everyday mascara. No flaking!
This mascara is great for day and evening. The brush is really great, gets even into the corners without smudging. Great Buy!

Just like everyone else, I have tried SO many mascaras including the recent Better Than S*x mascara (which it wasn't). I already have long lashes but during the work week I do not like to invest a lot of time getting ready. A few swipes and my lashes look fantastic.  This is my ultimate fav. Please do NOT ever discontinue this product.
I love it. Doesn't go on wet and make my lashes look super long.

I love this mascara. I got a sample of it, and I usually hate brushes that look like this one but I was SO SURPRISED by how much definition I got. It separated my lashes like nothing else. It only lost a star because it's not volumizing. I find that I have to pair it with another mascara to get thick lashes.
This is one of my favorite mascaras. It gives tons of volume and length without clumping.

This mascara does not clump or dry out. It goes on easily and looks dramatic without looking theatrical. It is perfect for sensitive eyes as it does not irritate and is easy to remove but stays on all day.

This is a great mascara if you're looking to lengthen and thicken your lashes, without looking too over the top. You can layer to create a more dramatic look, but overall its better for a more natural, fuller look. Love the brush too!

Love this mascara! Makes my thin, fairly short lashes long, thicker, and sultry. One coat is perfect for daywear, and it's easy to layer on more for a fuller nighttime look. The wand is great for covering the very inside and outside lashes. Would highly recommend!

This is the best mascara I have ever used, and trust me, I have used a LOT of mascara. It can take some getting used to since the brush is pretty big and it can be easy to transfer onto your eyelids- but once you master application, you'll never look back. Will be buying this over and over!
Never dries or clumps on me, very easily buildable. The perfect amount of vavavoom for everyday lashes, mine are medium thickness. Im on my third tube. No allergies, no lash damage
Flakes and doesn't give the volume or length that I usually get with other mascaras. Like they're real by benefit or lancome so much better.  This was a waste of money.
I liked the sample so much that I went out and bought two, one for me and one for a friend. Now this is the only mascara she'll use!
Love to use this on my bottom lashes. Its thin enough to spread out the lashes and thick enough to define them.
I am in love with this mascara. It looks great on and stays all day long without rubbing off.

I have almond shaped eyes with a double eyelid and this mascara didn't work for me because it transferred too much to my lower lid as the day went on. This is a common problem with mascara for me, but not with every mascara. I returned it. However, it looks great on my friend who doesn't have this problem.
I received a sample of this mascara. I have used every mascara out there (diorshow, Lancôme, etc.). For the price this is my favorite. Lengthens and volumizes!
This is by far the best mascara I have ever tried. Everyone should give it a try, you will not regret it. This product did everything that the description said it would do and more.

This product was not what I had expected. It did coat all of my lashes but it did not transform my lashes. This mascara is not meant for lengthening, strictly volume. You have to use second product to get length. In terms of volumizing, it was fantastic. The formula was wet which I loved so I could better separate my lashes. However, I still returned it the next day for a Tarte Mascara because this did not get the job done.
I really like the wand but the mascara always gave me raccoon eyes after only a couple of hours of wear.

This mascara provides great volume, seperation, and length. The wand is great becuae it is rubber which makes it easier to grasp every lash in one stroke. The price is great for a product like this ($19). The different ways you can build and style your eyelashes with this mascara are amazing. You can either go real subtle and natural or over the top and super thick.

There is so much that I love about this mascara that I'm actually a little stumped on where to begin... 1) I LOVE that it comes in a smaller size. I don't wear makeup every day, and mascara is one of those items that needs to be replaced often. I appreciate that I feel far less guilty throwing unused product away.  2) That being said, I LOVE how this mascara not only defines my lashes but keeps them separated in the process. I will never appreciate mascaras that clump my lashes together. That's the last thing I need when trying to achieve pretty.  Hopefully, the smaller size is back in stock by March, if not sooner. I'm going to have to survive on samples until then.
adore the brush, adore the formula. no clumping, rich black color, and cute travel size.
This is my favorite mascara. The wand is flawless. The mascara goes on easily, looks amazing, no clumping, no flaking.... it's perfect!
Absolutely in love with this formula. Amazing volume & super quick drying. Gives my lashes such great length. My mom's favorite as well. Perfect sized applicator.

I LOVE this mascara! The wand is super flexible, the millions of little bristles grab every lash and keep them from clumping (a big plus for me because every mascara makes mine clump together). It even gets all the bottom lashes without any smudging or clumping. I can use two coats without any of the aforementioned flaking/clumping/dryness, and my lashes feel like there's not even any mascara on them, they're so soft. I'll never buy another brand again!

Absolutely love it! This is the ONLY mascara I will wear now. Goes on super black and makes my lashes look really long. I love the rubber brush and won't use a fiber brush now at all. Formula lasts a very long time. I wish they had it in waterproof but I'll deal with it for now. I used to only buy waterproof until I found this formula. there isn't a lot of fallout or smudging either which is definitely a plus. Will clump eventually if you keep layering but it takes a ridiculous amount of mascara to get there.

I picked up this sample because it was so cheap and cute that I couldn't resist. I wasn't expecting a lot, but once I tried I blowed me away, it makes lashes look EXTREMELY long and defined, no chunks or dramatic volume, I wear it every single day and once I'm done with the sample I'll definitely purchase the full size.

my friend had got me the small size for christmas and i can't live with out it!!! a plus is the brush i loved it!!!!!! i honestly think this is a really good mascara. TIP: try the small one first everyone is different. and its a 23$ ish for the full size

Since I loved this mascara when I bought it for myself last year, I bought my sister the same for Christmas. I use this mascara to help lenthen and seperate my lashes, making my eyes look much bigger and brighter. I also will use this mascara or the wand after it has run out to always seperate my lashes after using other mascaras, for my finishing touch.  P.S. My sister loves the mascara now too ;-)

I bought this mascara completely trusting reviews and my gut and now, months later, it's the only mascara I use. I swear by this stuff. The brush is really large, which could scare off some people, but once you get used to it, you will never want to use another mascara again. This lengthens and separates lashes perfectly. I can't stress how much I love this mascara, and I've used a fair number of mascaras. I'm a mascara junky. Buy this! You won't regret!

reviews.review_title: love this mascara in the trial size..
reviews.review_text: I got this in a trial size and absolutely fell in love. So naturally I bought the full size, but the wand is too big. The trial size is the perfect size and applies the perfect amount of mascara to the eyelashes. The full size makes me clumpy. So I use the full size, but apply it with the trial size wand. Not ideal, but do what I have to do.

After two or three coats, you start to get a lovely volume. Does not clump, which is very nice. Compared to some other mascaras I've tried (and I gave this one two full size bottles and a sample size), it seems to be very dry when applying and like I said- use at least 2-3 coats. It doesn't help that I have blonde eye-lashes, but I've definitely had better mascara before within the same price range or cheaper.
I just don't see that this mascara does for me what the description says it should. It takes too much work to get a bold application but I will say that it doesn't clump.
This mascara leaves a few clumps & doesn't build up as fast

I really love this mascara. It does not move once it is applied and lengthens nicely. My only complaint is the brush size and the longevity of this product. The brush needs some taper as its too difficult to get at the lashes towards the inner corner of your eye and i noticed it seems to be running out very quickly? I have only been using this for a few weeks and I'm finding I need to reload my brush a lot already.

I am in love with this mascara. Normally I wear the benefits they're real which I also love but I wanted to try something different. This is just like it but I felt the brush to be less harsh. It lifts and seperates and is buildable. The color is great and it never smudged. It's very easily removed as I'm not a fan of waterproof mascaras. I think it's my new go to!

The only mascara that doesn't irritate my eyes.I have very sensitive eyes, I have tried many different types of products expensive and drugstore ones and this so far is the only one that won't make my rub or pluck eyelashes out after application. I absolutely love the wand for this product as well!

I used to just use drugstore mascara - can't go wrong with Great Lash - because I never saw a huge difference between drugstore mascara and the pricier ones I'd sampled. My aunt received this as a sample and gave hers to me a few years ago and I never went back. It doesn't clump or make my lashes look spidery when I use more than one coat. Since buying my own full size, I don't even feel the need to always wear eyeliner *and* mascara, because this does the trick all by itself. My lashes look so full, my eyes pop, and I can even use a bit on my lower lashes without looking Twiggy (unless I want to). My only regret is buying a tube of Too Faced Size Queen to 'change it up' after I ran out of my Buxom. It's great, but it's nothing compared to Buxom.
But lengthy to apply. I also wish this were a waterproof version, because by the end of the day this doesn't look so black and I barely have any on.
This mascara is AMAZING!! It lengthens, seperates, and volumizes my lashes like no other. I definately recommend to anyone

I recently purchased the mini and I didn't think the wand would've been so thick. I was reluctant to try it out but I did and it's amazing. The only problem was it took about 2-3 washes to remove from my lashes

At first I was a little hesitant to buy this mascara because I wasn't sure if I would like the formula...in Sephora I saw that the formula was very wet but the brush was to my liking (rubbery and had skinny defining bristles) so I went ahead and purchased the mini sized one. When I opened it for the first time the next day I only then realized how big the brush was which made me a little dissapointed as I prefer smaller brushes (my eyes are small). So I then went ahead and swept the mascara wand up to my lashes, sorta expecting them to clump, and was presently surprised! This mascara actually does what it claims to do! Defines, separates, and volumizes! Even after one coat I could see a difference! Although the formula is a little too wet for my taste, it doesn't clump at all. The brush size may take some getting used to for me (if you like a big brush then this mascara is for you!) but aside from that I like this mascara and I like that it separates and lengthens my lashes without having to put on many coats! I'm pretty satisfied!  Pros and cons, in my opinion...  Pros: -Defines and separates -Thickening/volumizing -Lengthening -Doesn't clump -Pigment is the blackest black I've ever seen  Cons: -Gigantic brush (hard to not get mascara on your eyelid, unless careful) -Formula is very wet

I use this everyday! It doesn't flake but it's not wet or dry! It's the perfect formula! The wand really does separate and lengthen and it looks amazing! it also isn't the most expensive mascara! I recommend this 110%!
The awesome brush is key to this mascara's success. I love the combination of volume and length it delivers. Didn't score a full 5 because there's room for improvement on the volume

not a fan.. I am huge cosmetic junkie, always on the hunt for that perfect mascara. I have light and small lashes. This product was clumpy, the brush was hard to work with . Also, the product gave me absolutely no volume. I am a huge fan of the brand, however, this was not for me.

I found this product okay, but not effective. It gives my lashes a more voluminous look but it is very difficult to put on, especially when you want to get every lash to look voluminous. I found that the brush was too big and had a weird curve to it.
Applies nicely if you really work it. Wears nicely, but out of the lash stash, not my favorite. A bit harder to apply. Not my favorite brush. I'll pass this along to my daughter. May work for her.
It's perfect. I finally found a mascara that makes my lashes thicker and longer without looking clumpy. It's not too wet or dry of a formula and doesn't flake off throughout the day.

I've tried several mascara's and this is the best one so far. Bought a full size after I received a sample size and used it all. Hardly ever clumps. Goes on thin but after a few coats it looks beautiful! Adds length and volume to my already long lashes. Will continue to buy!
I hated this mascara. I had to pump the wand several times before it did anything to my eyelashes. I returned it.

This is the best mascara I have ever used! It goes on amazing and my lashes never clump! I've tried my fair share in mascaras, spending anywhere from $6-$50 for mascara, and this is the best I've ever used.
i love this mascara, it does not clump, it's super lengthening, volumizing, and feels very light. It is my new favourite, definitely recommend.
This mascara is my absolute favorite! Separates really well and keeps my lashes curled unlike any other formula. It gives a very natural look.

I have purchased this so so so many times! I'm lucky to have long lashes and this just accentuates them like NO other. A must have if you use Shu Uemura curler (also my holy grail MUST have). No clumping with this. And I always get complements when I use this
Love this product. The brush design leaves my lashes looking fuller and longer. Great purchase!
I can sleep it in, sweat at the gym, do anything and it doesn't run. It looks the exact same from day 1 to day 3. Defining going to be my new go-to.

I am a HUGE fan of the Buxom lash. I have tried other brands recommended to me as a comparison. However, they do not compare to me... The buxom lash is by far the best mascara for my lashes. It builds volume and lengthens without clumping. Plus my eyes are sensitive and it does not cause any irritation to my eyes. Highly recommended by this mascara wearer. The brush works very well to define and reach all areas.
This mascara is clumpy and felt heavy on my lashes. The only good thing is that it does not travel down onto the corners of my eyes throughout the day and comes off easily with makeup remover.

I have tried tons and tons of mascara (both high end and drugstore) and this is the ONLY mascara that I have repurchased over and over (4 times now?...) holy grail of mascaras!!! It seperates, defines, lengthens, thickens, fans out, everything! I love love love it!! Nothing can compare.
love this mascara, got a sample in the store, it was so good I now use it all the time. for special occasions, it layer it over a mascara that lengthens my thin lashes.

This mascara is one of the less expensive at Sephora, but that doesn't mean anything. It lengthens, defines, and gives your lashes crazy volume. I love how this product isn't sticky or too gooey like most mascaras. The brush is fantastic; the ends make reaching your inner, tinier lashes a breeze. This is my favorite mascara currently and has been for the past two years!

I just tired this mascara as I was given a sample of it from Sephora and have been using it for the last 3 days. I really like the brush, and how it separates my lashes so that they look fuller and not clumpy. I also have oily eyelids and I was surprised it has not rubbed off once!! That is my favorite part. This is now my go-to mascara. Thank you Sephora, thank you Buxom!

I must have gotten this mascara as a sample more than a year ago, and I'm just trying it out now because I almost never wear makeup. I'm kicking myself for just now discovering it; hands down the best mascara I've ever used. Awesome length, definition, separation, everything, and black as night. I finally have lashes to rival my sister's; 10/10 Buxom, wonderful product.

Lashes are my favorite to play up. I especially like long, dark seperated curled lashes for going out or dressing up. Well I work a casual daytime job and sometimes my eyelashes are a little much. in a pinch for time on the way to work one morning, I grabbed my sample size buxom mascara bc I couldn't find anytas pleasantly surprised with everything about this mascara! First, the formula is light in consistency, not much room for error! The wand went through my lashes like a breeze. Didnt have any sticking or hardening. This mascara gives just the rigt amount of va-va-voom for a basic 9-5 work week. Lashes are incredibly defined, full and curled yet the formula is light enough that it looks natural.
I bought this while purchasing Christmas presents, I love it. It gives length and volume.

Reasonably priced! Love how it makes my eyelashes thicker & longer at the same time. Doesn't clump at all. Tough luck the mascara is not waterproof! On the positive side, the mascara can easily be removed with just water & soap!

By far the best mascara out there. I have long and fairly thick lashes and I HATE the gloopy look that most expensive mascaras leave in an attempt to volumize. Usually I'm all about good 'ole Maybelline great lash, but this is totally worth the higher price. It leaves beautiful long, soft, defined lashes with absolutely no clumps. And it never seems to leave the gross little flakes under my eyes that other mascaras do, even if I sleep in it. I can't day enough good things about it!
Eyelashes are a big deal for me. I used many many mascaras and this one is my favorite. It is the only mascara I use, highly recommend!

I have searched high & low, spent $$$$ on every mascara you can think of and this one I like best. I am all about brushes and the formula and brush define & lengthen my lashes. The brush grasps every eye lash, it's a must try. just remember, what looks good on one person may not work and look best on you, I am learning that lipstick now lol.
I really like this mascara. It defines lashes without clumping them together, so every lash is separated and evenly coated.
I loved big full lashes and this product gives them to me. The brush gets every lash and does not clump.

I received this mascara in last years sephora's favorites lash set that had about 12 other sample sizes. Even with other high end mascaras....this one has become my holy grail. Two of my friends used it and the went out and bought it. It separates my lashes while lengthening them and if I do a few coats also gives me volume. I couldn't live without this bad boy.

I love this mascara's brush! It is nearly impossible to get clumps while using this mascara. I ended up washing this brush and using it to comb through my lashes when other mascaras cause clumping. The formula itself is really nice, providing both length and volume. My problem was that it smudged both below my eyes and on the brow bone which is a major pet peeve of mine.

I love this mascara!!! I have bought this almost exclusively for the last 3 years. I have gotten tons of compliments on my eyelashes when I wear this mascara. It lengthens and curls your lashes without looking clumpy and sticky so it looks like you're not wearing mascara. You can layer it so much and build up for a more dramatic look. It won't make your lashes stiff, so you can add more later. It also stays on really well and doesn't fall and give you racon eyes. I've used several mascaras in my life and this is by far my favorite

Let me preface this by saying that I am a mascara FANATIC!  I have a very high energy job that keeps me moving all day and I like products that will last through all that!  I also have short lashes that are light in color and LOVE to stick to each other. It's like their favorite hobby.  This mascara did all my required things: Held the curl Volumized Defined Didn't smudge or flake or clump Allowed for layering  The brush is a big big for using on my lower lashes, those are also very short, so I did use one of my other mascaras on the lower lashes.  Will definitely be buying this again.
Tried in on the reccomendation of staff. Loved it. Lightweight and not clumpy.
Great for lengthening and lash separation, flakes a little but as long as you don't mind that it's an amazing mascara!
I love this mascara—it lengthens and adds volume without clumps!
I first tried this mascara when I received it as a sample. It goes on well and does not clump. Recommend.

I tried this mascara on a Sephora employees recommendation based on the fact that I told her I wanted a more natura-based mascara. I am so happy I listened to her! It's by far the greatest mascara I've ever used. It takes my already long lashes to a new level! Buy this. You won't be disappointed.

Buxom mascara really does what it claims and the best part about it id you can choose just how intense you want your lashes to be. One coat gives you a defined natural look, 2 coats lengthens and 3 coats thickens (giving a doll like look). I feel going beyond 3 coats looks messy. If you're looking for volume I would use a different mascara but for definition and length this is perfect!
This mascara doesn't clump and looks great initially, but I still had raccoon eyes after wearing it for 4 hours.

reviews.review_title: This is my absolute favorite mascara!
reviews.review_text: I love this mascara, even when I branch out and try new ones I always come back to it. It gives great separation, length and curl, in a super black formula. It's my staple!

I love this mascara. I have been using this for years and have tired to find a better mascara but this is the best. It make my eye lashed look fake and actually separates them! I have tried some really good mascaras that lengthen or add volume but this is the total package. Added bonus is that this mascara is great for reapplying. I bring it in my purse while I am out and if I need a touch up it will bring my lashes back to new without clumping.
I was a Kat Von D Sinful Lash fan, but she took away my mascara and replaced it with a sub-par product. I stumbled across Buxom and WOW! Love this stuff! Great purchase!!!

This is a great everyday mascara. It gives good length but isn't goopy wet. Not a lot of volume. It's easy to get off at the end of the day and doesn't make my lashes feel crunchy like the Benefit They're Real

This is a really great mascara for providing length. The formula is thin so it doesn't clump but is also not too wet, preventing it from getting everywhere. I do wish it provided more volume but as it is, it's a great natural looking mascara.

I have naturally long lashes - hit my shades when I wear them, long. It did lengthen some, but did not intensely volumize them, even though it did some volumizing. I find it does everything well at a noticeable level because the formula is thin and the brush is big. Clump resistant, darkens, thickens ... yes. It doesn't perform as well on the bottom lashes though - streaky, smudgey, and doesn't coat well (it's like the consistency can't get with the feather light texture of the lashes).
This it the best mascara I've ever used. It makes lashes look longer and fuller. All of my friends always ask which mascara I use and I always tell them buxom because it's truly the best.

I've used many different brands of mascara over the years, from drugstore to Dior. When I came across this I initially purchased the smaller trial size, only because I've been disappointed before and didn't want to be out another $20 or so for a mascara that didn't deliver.  The applicator is a plastic material, and the shape and pliability of it really makes for even application. The mad at is smooth, not clumpy. It builds well and removes easily with makeup remover.  I'm in love with this, it's fantastic.

One of my reliable, go-to favorites! My lashes are long and have a tendency to really get clumped together with most mascara formulas. Not with Buxom! It goes on smooth, dark, defining, my lashes stay separate without clump even with multiple coats, and the formula dries soft without flaking or raccoon eye smudging. A dream! I have also found that the brush easily and evenly covers all my upper lashes and even goes on smoothly to my lower lashes, which are long and sparse (definitely a mascara challenge) without smudging onto my skin. To add another detail, which personally I really like, just the right amount of product comes out with the brush when removed. I have encountered too many mascaras that deliver too much product (which probably adds to the dreaded clump--when not seeking clump--factor) so this really allows you to apply just as many layers as you'd like, though I typically find that I don't get super falsies-thick lashes even after several coats (which suits me just find unless I'm going for that look). Love this mascara, it's definitely in my bag of favorites!
makes me feel like I have pro lashes

What I like about it is that it does not clump and it is easy to remove. However, I don't find it gives me much length or volume. I would likely buy it again for an everyday mascara, but for a dramatic look, I would definitely try a different one.
The small bristles lift and separate and give you voluminous eyelashes!! Best I've ever used
Does a pretty good job of volumizing with minimal clumping, but it badly smudges within a few hours.

I first received this mascara as a sample, and I instantly fell in love with it. There isn't anything terribly special about it, but it is perfect for every day use. It doesn't clump, flake off, or make my eyelashes feel tight. It washes off easily, but it doesn't bleed onto my oily skin. I used it so much that I bought the full-size and this is my new go-to for everyday. I use the Givenchy mascara in waterproof for special occasions.

reviews.review_title: The BEST mascara I've ever used
reviews.review_text: The product description is truth. It takes my average, fair lashes and makes them look fuller and longer. It makes them show up without looking fake. I've tried many different mascaras, but I love Buxom Lash.
I have thin lashes. This has been one of the best to fill and plump my lashes and believe me, I've tried them all!
Favorite mascara of all time

I've tried soooo many different brands until I met this. Now I've been using this mascara for a couple years and I just keep buying this. I used to use an eyelash comb every single time after I put mascara on to get rid of clumps. But since I started using this Buxom mascara, I really don't need it. I really love this brush. It's awesome! (FYI, I recommended this mascara to my friend who has smaller eyes than mine, and she didn't like the brush for her eyes, maybe because the brush is quite large. So I think it really depends on what type of eyes you have :)

I am all about the LASHES!! This stuff is a great addition to my eyelash routine. It lengthens and separates without clumping. Then I top it off with my favourite thickening mascara. Hardly a day goes by that I don't get some sort of comment/compliment on my lashes :)

reviews.review_title: love! great for natural looking lashes
reviews.review_text: I love this for my everyday mascara. It defines my lashes and NEVER clumps. Been using it for years and each tube seems to last me forever before running or drying out. If you like to pack on the mascara, this probably isn't for you. But if you like natural, fluttery lashes it's a must buy!

I wish I had enough words for how unbelievable this product is. FIRST TIME USERS, LISTEN UP! The first few times I used this mascara I was super let down. I find that a new tube is always a bit hard to get in to, but I promise it is worth it. I have never received compliments the way I do when I wear this mascara. My eye lashes are thin but I have many. When I use two coats of this mascara, my eyelashes sometimes reach my eyebrows, it is unreal. I don't use the waterproof mascara, so I would recommend using a primer on your bottom lashes before applying this mascara, just as I would with any non water proof mascara. Honestly, I have tried almost every mascara at sephora and I will never go without this mascara ever again. I've been using it for almost two years with absolutely no complaints. Buy it!! You won't regret it.

Honestly, pretty disappointing. The brush is large and plastic, and looks like it would define/coat lashes well, but I think the formula is way too thin for my liking. I like how I didn't get clumps or anything like that, but it simply didn't make much of a difference. When I wear mascara, I want drama! This mascara is high-quality, but it just isn't ENOUGH. There are many drugstore mascaras I prefer over this one.

This mascara has been the best I have ever used. Admittedly, I've been a big drug store makeup user over the years as there aren't any Sephora stores in Aus (yet!). I've tried every mascara on the shelf and some high end ones too, but this is the best I have ever used. Totally lengthening, totally volumizing and totally coats all lashes evenly.
This product does very well separating the lashes ... but does not give me the volume I want and even does only a mediocre job of adding length. I wouldn't buy it again.

I have thin lashes that like to clump together with most mascaras and brushes. Enter Buxom mascara and now I have thick, long lashes that look amazing. I tend to have allergic reactions to many mascaras and Buxom has been great right out of the box. Never any problem with itchy, watery eyes or red swollen eye lids.
Best mascara I ever used, I even received a compliment about waht beautiful ayes I have!!

My 14 year old granddaughter introduced me to this mascara. I am 62 yrs old and my lashes have been thinning for years. This mascara is amazing ! Never thought my lashes would ever look good again. I highly recommend this product.

hands down best mascara i have ever used/purchased. the formula is amazing and will actually help your eyelashes grow!! what won me over was the brush which gets every lash and doesn't clump easily. if you have thin eyelashes like me then i definitely recommend to give this product a try. it comes in a travel size as well.

This is my favorite mascara. I have found that the mascara that actually looks the best is the They're Real... but it is soo hard to get off and it ends up pulling my eyelashes out. So I think Buxom is the best overall because it looks great but keeps my lashes relatively soft and it is much easier to get off. It also doesn't pull out my lashes as much as other mascaras do. Makes my lashes look longer and fuller and keeps them pretty separated.

I got to say I really like the formula because Im the type of girl who looks like she does not have any lashes and the way this mascara does my lashes it lenghtens it and i love how it so dark however the down side about it is that the wand is too big. But overall i really do like this mascara
I like the brush of this mascara! I can really see my lashes after I apply it.

I received this as a sample and fell in love the with the first use. I ordered the full size before even using the entire sample. I have downward pointing lashes and have never found a mascara that could keep them curled up...even the use of a lash curler didn't help. My lashes stayed curled up and fanned out until I washed it off...no curler needed! This mascara gives you everything you want. Length, curl, separation,volume and beautiful jet black lashes.

I thought I loved this mascara until I realized that this mascara, not my eyeliner was smudging. It only takes a few minutes for a big dark ring of black to develop under my eyes. Other than that it looks good, just doesn't last long.
good for separating lashes but doesn't add length or volume. NEXT!
I had this mascara for a good while. Honestly, it's just OK. I would wear this if I wanted just a little something on my lashes but it didn't have that wow factor.

The first thing I ever purchased when I started wearing makeup was mascara. I have have some favorites over the years, but this is hands down, the BEST one yet. I have an insane life but I can count on this mascara to make me feel closer to 100% on those days when I'm running on fumes.
The brush is easy to use and the mascara defines my lashes.

I love this mascara! It gives my eyelashes volume and makes them look long and thick. I also don't have a problem with my eyelashes clumping together when I use this mascara unlike other products I have used.
This mascara is the best. Makes my lashes sooooo thick and long, they look just like falsies! And finally a mascara that does this with NO clumping!!

I gave the wand a side-eye when I got a sample of this, since I've always thought that if I wanted my lashes to be nicely separated I'd need a wand that resembled a fuzzy, poisonous caterpillar.  Nah. This works wonderfully. Grabs each lash without letting them clomp together. No need for eyelash combs, nicely lengthens. Just an easy, reliable mascara.

I didn't think I would ever love a mascara as much as my Too Faced Better than S-x mascara, but then I received a sample from Sephora of this Buxom gem. I have very long but thin lashes, so I always put on at least 2 coats of mascara. This mascara works perfectly for multiple coats without getting clumpy of failing to blend with the prior coat. It is simply perfect. It separates my lashed, gives me volume, and never smudges. I do find that I need to use an eye makeup remover to fully remove all of the mascara, but this isn't a problem for me. Although it isn't waterproof, it has withstood hot, humid days in GA and multiple bathtimes for my son who is a splasher.

I seen a lot of review. A lot of good reviews and a lot of bad reviews. I personally love it!!! It extends my eyelashes even further. There already naturally long with a slight curl and when I apply the mascara it fans my eyelashes out. I get ally of compliments

reviews.review_title: I Always Come Back to Buxom
reviews.review_text: No matter what mascara I try (I'm currently using Benefits They're Real!), I always, always come back to Buxom. The wand distributes the product perfectly and separates my lashes nicely. It's never clumpy, dries quickly, and isn't sticky (great for us gals who curl our eye lashes after mascara). It's really just the best!
It's a simple mascara, an essientiel for everyday, but definitely not for a date night. Its a reliable mascara that i love to use and it doesn't clump!

I love this mascara. I got a travel size tube as a VIB extra and used it when I ran out of the Benefit They're Real mascara. I think the wands are pretty similar, but I love how this formula is not too thick and makes my lashes long and lean. I do like a fuller lash line, but if I prefer the lift and separation in my lashes to clumpy spider lashes which is what I got sometimes w the Benefit. I guess you could say this product gives you great lengths and definition in the individual lashes, but they're not creepy spaced out lashes.

LOVE this mascara!! I have a sample size and when I first tried it I immediately knew I had to buy the full size. The brush is amazing...it gets all my lashes and separates them without making them look spidery, just nice and lush and full. I will probably buy the waterproof version just because I want to make sure my mascara lasts all day long, but I really really love this formula as well. Holy grail mascara!!

I've tried so many different mascaras and all of them clumped my lashes together and looked very cake-y (which I hated). This one really separated my lashes and had absolutely no clumps! It was a very natural look and definitely made my eyes pop that other lashes haven't done for me before. IN LOVE with this product and I've recommended it to all my friends. A must have!!!

Best mascara I've ever owned! No matter how much product I apply there is absolutely no clumping. I feel as if it makes my lashes longer and definitely more defined. Trust me guys, this is the mascara to buy. Definitely worth the price and if you buy it I'm almost guaranteed you will fall in love with it as well.

After reading a lot of reviews I bought this mascara hoping it would work for me. However I have VERY flat lashes, which means they do not curl, at all. This mascara did not do it for me, but I will say that it does make your eye lashes appear thicker which I like! I have yet to find my perfect match of mascara though.

I've tried more mascaras than I'd like to admit, and this takes the cake every time. I have short lashes and Buxom Lash has the best combination of formula and wand: the formula is light and dries quickly, allowing my lashes to retain their curl (and not sag from heavy/liquidy formula). The wand does a great job of separating, lengthening, and volumizing: combined with the light formula, it makes my lashes lush, long, and defined. I can layer on multiple coats without accidentally smearing formula below my eyes--a huge plus! This is very affordably priced, and worth every penny. I'm so happy there's a waterproof version available now.

As someone who was once afraid of mascara, I discovered this gem in Sephora's Lash Stash a couple of years ago and fell in love. Buxom Lash leaves lashes looking naturally gifted which is really what I was going for but it can also be built up for a more striking look. Great for separating and coating lashes with no clumping issues. If you're looking for a natural look then I recommend this mascara however if you're going for a highly dramatic look then this may not be the one for you.

Awesome fullness and no clumping or flaking even with just the original brush it comes with! You can purchase other brushes (which I love) but the one in the tube is pretty amazing! One of my new favorite mascaras!

I'll try just about every new mascara that comes out but I ALWAYS go back to BUXOM. It doesn't irritate my eyes like many other mascara's do, it stays on all day without running and it makes my lashes look the fullest and longest. My only wish is that it also came in a black/brown or dark brown too.

Great mascara that gives me tons of volume and length. If I'm going to wear this mascara, I usually drop in my contact lens because my lashes get so long that they bump up against my glasses. Good job, Buxom!
It last me FOREVER without clumping up or drying out. I try the free samples of different brands, but I always go back to this one.

I was originally of the opinion that Benefit's They're Real was the best mascara, but I have been converted! This mascara is a winner for me. The formula is thin: not goopy, but not runny either. The brush is PERFECTION! I love love love how fine the little prongs are; they truly get every single lash and prevent clumping. It doesn't irritate my eyes, doesn't smudge or flake, and comes off easily with make-up remover. The price is just right, and unlike Diorshow, the mascara doesn't dry out.  The only thing that I would change is I wish there were spikes on the end of the wand, like They're Real. I will buy this mascara until the end of time.
I think it's my favorite mascara. It goes on so well and really spreads your lashes out and makes them look so good.i got it as a free sample a million years ago, and I finally have the full size!
If you're looking to help lengthen your lashes and define every lash, this is the product. It is as cask as carbon black and leaves your eyes looking bolder and bigger. Highly recommend it.
Full coverage with volume and length with very little to no smudging.

I received this as apart of the best mascara gift set and personally it was the best mascara inside better than benefit they're real (also a great mascara) it makes your eyelashes super long and defined

I have tried several mascaras before. I absolutely love this one. It doesn't flake. The brush is great because it separates my lashes; and it lengthens & gives volume to my eyelashes! it's definitely my favorite!
I redeemed some points and so glad I did. I do love this mascara. It doesn't dry out as quickly as some other mascara a and it doesn't clump! Love the wand!

Received a sample size of this mascara. Finally tried it. Pretty good, actually. Not my absolute favorite but really like the hourglass wand. Able to reach the inner corners of lashes really well. In addition, it lengthens lashes and defines really well. Similar to UD Perversion in that it is buildable without clumping. I don't get intense full volume. Instead, long and defined lashes without that clumpy built up cakey look.

Love this! It gives my eyelashes full coverage without any clumping. The brush helps separate my lashes, and it's easy to build volume at my lash line with an extra swipe. It stays put all day without any flaking. Since it's not waterproof, it's super easy to remove. I will definitely keep buying this.

I purchase this mascara for my daughter who is 18. She has been using this since it launched years ago. She/we have tried every mascara that comes out and always go back to Buxom. I use it sometimes as well. Her lashes are full and long and using it makes them crazy glamorous . My lashes are thin and sparse, but it does make the best of them. What we both like is that it doesn't clump or smudge and goes on neatly. Have purchased many , many times and will continue to until someone comes out with something better.

I'm a Covergirl lashblast kinda girl. I decided to try this based on the similarities of the brushes. It's awesome! This mascara made my lashes longer, more separated, and lasted all day with no smudging. It also didn't irritate my eyes. I would buy this again!

This mascara separates and defines my lashes. Best of all I can use this versus the waterproof and wear it all day. My work days are long and I put on my makeup at 6:30am and dont get home til after 7:30 pm. This wears perfectly throughout the day with no smudging or those horrible black dots on the browbone. I cannot get away with wearing a mascara that is not waterproof except for this one. Worth the $$$$

The main problem I have with this mascara is that it ends up below my eyes :-/ The formula is very smooth and not clumpy, but if I want to build it, I'm going over and over my lashes. I'd be a much bigger fan if I didn't have a trace of raccoon eyes after a few hours.

I've tried quite a few mascaras ranging from the drugstore Covergirl Lashblast and L'oreal Million Lashes to Diorshow and Benefit They're Real. However, I always find myself going back to this one! I've gotten compliments from both men and women on how long and pretty my lashes look after applying this mascara. It easily lasts up to 16 hours! Of course, I will continue to buy this product! :)
Got this as a free sample and was very impressed. Doesn't clump, lengthens and curls, and the brush is great. Would buy again.

reviews.review_title: Good substitute to Urban Decay SkyScraper
reviews.review_text: When UD discontinued Skyscraper I was devastated. I've been searching for a good replacement and this is the best so far. The brush offers great length and lasting formula. Won't flake or fade.

This mascara is decent. It's non-flakey and has decent lasting power. Don't expect dramatic results though, this is a very subtly defining mascara, perfect for natural looks but not for nights on the town.
Seriously LOVE this mascara! I used it and then put on my falsies and you could barely tell the difference!

This is my favorite mascara! I've tried many and this is the best consistency and wand! It does not flake (unlike the waterproof version!) and stays on the lashes well. Volumizes and lengthens my already long lashes, and make them look like I have falsies on!
I use this mascara daily for both natural and more smokey eye looks. It goes on beautifully and lengthen and volumizes my thin asian eyelashes.
Love this mascara, delivers great buildable volume and length, creates a very natural lush full lash look. I was asked twice in one day if they were falsies! Yay! :)

I wouldn't necessarily call this a volumizing mascara, although it did add some volume (as all mascaras are want to do). This is more of a lengthening mascara that adds a small amount of curl. To that end it works really well. I use this a lot, especially when I don't want to deal with clumping. Zero clumping.

I got a sample of this when I ordered the Lancome Grandiose mascara. After I tried it, I realized I made the wrong choice! This one's much better! Buxom Lash Mascara is seriously the best mascara I've ever tried. Everything else at best makes me look like I'm wearing nice mascara. This one makes me look like I was naturally born with an amazing set of eyelashes!
I applies beautifully. no clumps, nice separate lashes. rich black pigment. BUT hours later (in a dry cool environment) I came home to find I looked like a raccoon.
I picked this up on a whim and now I'm in love! Gives you lots of length and volume. No clumping and when it's time to take my makeup off for the day, easy removal.

I received a mini in my VIB sample pack. I like the formula. Its not clumpy, comes off easy, My lashes had lots of length and volume. Which is why it got 3 stars. It is a great formula. However, I think I'm allergic otherwise I would have given it 5 stars. After one day of use, my eyelids are puffy and red. After two days (because I have to make a mistake 5 or 6 times just to be sure), they itch and I can't stop rubbing them so they hurt and it looks like I took a SEVERE beating by a baby kangaroo. They water and get that sleepy seed crusty build up all around them. So I tossed the tube yesterday. On day three it hurts to blink. Now I'm eye make up free until I can touch my eyelids without wanting to cry and my boss just told me I look like I had the flu. I need a paper bag.

I am obsessed with this one. For awhile Dior was my go to, then Benefit they're real. I picked this up on a whim, my lashes have never been longer. It dries quickly and doesn't flake. The only con is that, it's incredibly hard to get off (I got the waterproof one, so that's my mistake) otherwise I absolutely adore this.

I have tried every high and low end mascara out there. I always return to this one. By far the best on the market. My sister refuses to buy high end makeup but even she splurges on this one over drugstore mascaras. Dior dries out and YSL clumps.
Never clumps, and lengthens well

My lashes are naturally long, full, and thick. My only problem? They're medium-dark brown and I prefer black eye makeup. This mascara is everything I have ever wanted... it doesn't clump, and it darkens my lashes without adding bulk or weight to them. I don't wear mascara often, but this formula is a total winner when I need some lash definition.

I finally found a mascara that lengthens but doesn't leave a ton of product on my lashes. I've been buying mascara like crazy trying to find one that makes my lashes as long as I want them without getting liquify/clumpy.  Totally worth every penny.

Got a sample of this from sephora and fell in love! I've never tried buxom mascaras but this one was outstanding. It separates my lashes so nicely and gives them curl and length Apply enough and you can get really nice baby doll looking lashes. LOVEEEE
I used to work for Sephora and tried just about every mascara in the store. Buxom was and still is my favorite! !
I've tried every brand out there and this is the best! Makes lashes long and full without any clumps. Brush grabs every lash. I love this mascara.

My lashes are medium length, so usually the right mascara makes them look decent. I've been on the hunt for the perfect mascara, and even though I found it in a high end one (Diorshow), I wanted an alternative.. This mascara makes my lashes look long, it seperates them quite nicely and gives them volume. I love the wand, it reminds me of the tarte one but this one is slightly better.

I have been using this mascara for over 3 years now. It is by far the best mascara I have ever used! I have tried so many different ones and always go back to this one. If you have medium/long but fine lashes this will make them POP! My lashes look 3 times bigger and longer and defined (NO CLUMPY MESS EITHER!)  I heard some people don't think this mascara and say that it goes on thin. Well, that is true when you buy it brand new, however it doesn't take much to build it up with a few coats.  The real winner for me is that this mascara gets even more better as it ages. As it ages the formula starts to get less thin and more thick (probably from collecting air when taking the wand in and out) as this happens I notice it can have the effect I want without adding more coats AND its does not clump on me! One of these lasts me 3-4 months...probably even longer. And I mean that. I don't have any problems with irritation or redness from this mascara. It is truly a godsend and worth every penny!  Buy yourself a sample size one and try it out for a few weeks!

This is one of the best mascaras I have ever used. It lengthens my eyelashes and does not clump. It can be used alone or paired with eyeliner, it is my personal quick fix. The only downside is that you need to use a makeup remover or rub ONLY the eyelashes to get it off while you're washing your face or it will smudge around your eyes. I do not recommend this for teary situations or anywhere with a lot of water or it will run. Please note it will RUN not SMUDGE only in water.

I love this mascara. I was looking for a mascara that had brand name quality without the price tag. The formula is more wet and doesn't flake like a lot of cheaper formulas will. It volumizes & separates incredibly, much better than than a lot of the more expensive brands.

This was almost my HG mascara. Very black, brush works great at separating and giving length. Biggest flaw for me was the formula is wet and took forever to fully dry. Curl would never hold even if I re-curled after application. So bummed.

I always get compliments on my eyelashes and get asked if they are real, as well as what mascara I use. This mascara is my absolute fave! I tried it around two years ago, and ever since fell in love. I have never used any mascara since. My eyelashes are naturally long and this is amazing at lengthening them even more, and making them more defined. I love the design of the wand and its' clump free finish. I get such a natural look with this mascara and it works very well on my lashes. I feel like this mascara works best on long lashes though. Don't be afraid to give it a try it works wonders!
By far the best mascara I've tried! It gives you amazing length and really separates your lashes! You can apply many coats without getting clumpy lashes.I just absolutely love this product.

If I was only allowed to use one mascara the rest of my life, you wouldn't have to ask me twice. Buxom lash all the way, it started with a sample at Christmas and it's been love ever since. It makes my poor stubby lashes look brilliant and it's the best I've ever used.
Bought this on impulse and so far I'm loving it! I love that with one coat it looks like I've curled my eyelashes! It's not clumpy, it defines, all around great product!

I'll be honest, I didn't care for this mascara the first time I used it. I was at a weird phase where I was wearing falsies constantly, so that wreaked havoc on my poor little lashes.. However, I gave this another try about two months ago and I am totally obsessed! It separates, lengthens and volumizes so well!! The mascara doesn't ever clump coming out of the tube which is a huge win for anyone who's as obsessed with lashes as I am. Seriously, I die. Love this so hard.

I bought this mascara one day at sephora. I expect a lot from buxom, since they are one of my favorite brands, and this mascara lived up to my expectation. Non-clumping, defining, volumizing.... It's an excellent buy!!
I've been using this mascara for a couple years now and love it. Started with a sample and couldn't change after that. It goes on so smooth and provides a dar

I LOVE this mascara. I bought a sample size, which has lasted me for a few months (!!!), and I loved it so much I went to buy the full size. I got the twist up Buxom instead of this one, but I like this brush so much better. Stays all day (and overnight!) and doesn't flake off or clump. Separates and lengthens like a dream. The brush is a great shape, if a little bit too big. All in all I would ABSOLUTELY recommend.
I have naturally long curly lashes and this just makes them even better. No clumps, lengthens, and darkens. I absolutely love this and hope they never discontinue it. TRY IT!!!!!!!
This is the best mascara I have ever used. It separates lashes and does not clump. It washes off clean.

Buxom Lash is my new favorite mascara. I randomly picked it up from the popular mascara display because it was one of the cheaper brands. I think it's a great rival for Tarte's LightsCamera Flashes mascara.

I have tried so many different mascaras and this is hands down the best I have ever used. The amount of compliments I get on my lashes when I'm wearing this is crazy. I do have big round eyes so keep that in mind since the brush is very large and may not suite those with hooded eyelids.
adds length, no clump.

Love this mascara! It separates, lengthens and DOESN'T clump! Only downside is that when it comes in contact with water, it does rub off easily BUT now when sweating or working out, more like going for a swim.
Best mascara ever better than any other on here!

reviews.review_title: My favorite. Better than They're Real.
reviews.review_text: I got 2 sample sizes of both They're Real and Buxom and alternated between the two for a few months. At first it took a bit to get used to the Buxom brush and I thought I liked They're Real better. Both gave my lashes great length and volume. However, after only a month or two They're Real started drying up and clumping where as Buxom was still going strong. Now I feel like the They're Real brush doesn't grab my lashes as well as the Buxom nor separates my lashes as well. All this to say, I now only use the Buxom!
Best Mascara Ever ! Tried so many mascara but this one does the work for mine 100% !
This is by far my favorite mascara. No flaking and it really defines my lashes. Two coats and I'm good to go. It's also really easy to remove with face wash/cleanser.
Seems to thicken with out clumping. Nice lasting power in the summer humidity.
I read the reviews on this expecting it to be great but it's just okay. I feel like I could buy a drug store mascara better then this.
great mascara!! makes lashes look dark long and separates them !!!

Makes my lashes long and full. Brings out every tiny hidden lash. It doesn't flake so safe for contact lens wearers. I have sensitive eyes and it never makes my eyes water or itch. Does not smudge yet comes off easily with soap and water.

This mascara is just ok. When you first put it on it's nice but doesn't seem to lengthen or volumize as much as it should. And after a couple hours seems to kinda die out. I was pretty disappointed overall.
Great thickening mascara. I wish they offered a water-proof option but I am overall pretty happy with my purchase. Does get flakey throughout the day.

J'ai jamais eu un mascara qui me donnait littéralement l'impression d'avoir des faux cils. C'est incroyable… C'EST FINI LES MASCARAS DE PHARMACIE… c'est le double d'épaisseur et de longueur…ils sont EXTRA curvyyy et toutes séparés. Essayer-le c'est devenir accroo!

After being disappointed by Bad Gal Lash(just not my thing), I was lucky to be given a sample of Buxom Lash from a friend. I will no longer be settling for drugstore mascara! This mascara makes my lashes look SO full without looking clumpy. Also, it doesn't smudge off during the day, and when I remove it at night, it comes off easily. Definitely worth the money!

reviews.review_title: Just the right mix of everything.
reviews.review_text: It is hard for me to find a mascara that doesn't smudge and that still wipes off easy. This one is great and gives tons of volume and length. Its a must have.
I love this mascara! It gives me big bold lashes without the crusty fiber stuff!

I really liked this mascara and wand applicator. I also enjoy that it is offered in a try me size so that a customer can try it before purchasing a regular size. More brands should offer the trial sized versions. The formula has no noticeable odor and is evenly coated onto the wand. The wand gets all of my lashes coated and looks great. Will buy again!
Buxom Mascara give body and extra length to your lashes. Well priced and one of the best around. Give it a try.
I've found this mascara to clump and not offer a bold, buxom look. I prefer They're Real.

I always used drugstore brands of mascara until I stumbled on to this one...now I'll never go back! My lashes are what I consider to be somewhat sparse. They are light brown and the ends are blonde so mascara is essential to make them stand out. The Buxom Lash mascara is awesome at making my lashes look longer, thicker, darker, and they even feel soft after applying. By starting at the roots and wiggling the wand back and forth the mascara goes on nice and thick, which even makes eyeliner unnecessary. Then I brush through to the ends of the lashes. Looks great on both top and bottom lashes. I did try the waterproof version of this before but I hate how difficult it is to remove waterproof mascara. I still love this original version the best!

reviews.review_title: best mascara on the market right now
reviews.review_text: I have tried many mascara products rated good or excellent and this is the best one I can find. Love the brush because it has many fine bristles and the shape fits the natural curl of lashes. Use one or more coats as you like. Doesn't smudge. Lasts all day and evening.
I normally have to use waterproof mascara and this stuff works wonders! It doesn't smudge or flake at all! It makes my lashes look amazing and it lasts all day and keeps a curl!

Volumizing is exactly what it does. The best mascara for super straight lashes that won't hold a curl. It's not heavy like some mascara can be and it doesn't clump, also it works great on bottom lashes. I have the sample size but I will be upgrading to full size soon!
Must have for sure!!! Love it

reviews.review_title: my ride or die must have!!!
reviews.review_text: i cannot believe this mascara doesnt have a perfect four stars. despite the rapid turnover that my makeup bag regularly incurs, i have been using this same mascara for at least 5 years now and i will never switch. it makes every lash look thick, long and glossy without absolutely any clumps, even when you apply several coats. the brush is amazing...eyelashes i never even knew i had came out of hiding the first day i used it and every day since. the black is really intense and the finish is glossy, but the product itself is super gentle and even when i fall asleep without removing it, my eyelashes dont fall out.  the best part is that this mascara can be applied woe-free to falsies too. i thought my devotion could never grow until the mini version was introduced...i keep one in my purse, backpack, and suitcase!!! BUXOM LASH 4EVER

this mascara makes my eyelashes look fuller, without any clumps what so ever! it doesn't add much volume but I use it everyday because it gives such a natural look to your eyelashes. I would recommend this any day

reviews.review_title: Not great for volume, but better in other ways
reviews.review_text: I first starting buying Buxom mascara for two reasons: I wanted to spend less than $20 and I was told for the price range this was the clear winner/favorite for adding volume and fullness. The mascara really doesn't add noticeable volume or fullness to my small lashes BUT I've stuck with Buxom because the color doesn't fade, it glides on seamlessly without ever clumping, and it lasts all day. I love the brush design in particular. It's a great mascara, but you could get better volume if you're willing to pay more.
This mascara brush has a unique shape. It added volume to my lashes ad the color is rich and doesn't look like make-up.
This mascara makes my lashes look like a pinup model's eyes. Absolutely love it. Would seriously recommend this to my friends, for sure.

I have been using this mascara for about 3 years now, i have tried others but always come back to this one. It never clumps or flakes on me and separates every lash perfectly, i couldn't live without it ! worth every penny
I've strayed a couple times but always come back to Buxom Lash. Solid product, great applicator wand.

I didn't relize how much I loved this mascara until last week when I ran out. I was near a drug store and because I hate being without Mascara, I purchased 2 pretty popular drugstore brands that made my eyelashes clump so bad it took me TWO days to REALLY get them off. Anyway, that second day, I still couldnt get to sephora so I went over to my local mall and purchased a Dior and Lancome mascara (even then after spending about $80 on mascara i still didnt get the same results I get with Buxom). I am a product junkie, but I have never since I first purchased Buxom willingly wanted to purchase any other mascara. It gives you big full long lashes. That dont flake, clump or smudge aaand.....can we talk about the price? If anyone can get away with doubling their price is Buxom, but they're selling it for $19.00 God bless their little amazing mascara making hearts.
Great product overall. Despite this product not being waterproof it holds well and does not smudge or flake off.
I have been using this mascara for a few years now, and it is hands down the best for volume, defining and lengthening. I love it... Do yourself a favor and buy this !

I'm comparing this to Dior's Diorshow mascara.  Diorshow Pros: - Similar volume - More Natural Looking Diorshow Cons: - Prone to smudges - Not as much length  Buxom Lash Pros: - More length - Similar volume - No smudges by the end of the day Buxom Lash Cons: - Less natural looking volume - More prone to clumps  Overall I think I slightly prefer Buxom, even if I prefer the 'look' I get with Diorshow more. It's nice not to have raccoon eyes going on by the end of the day. Still, it's not quite perfect...
This mascara lasts a long time! It is worth the price. It defines lashes extremely well, but if you want thicker lashes or a darker look, you need to put on more coats.
Goes on well and lasts! Produces long lashes that hold a curl better than most.

I ordered from Sephora online almost a year ago and I got a pouch full of samples and one of them is this mascara~ I finally got to wear them just this week because I thought it's been a long time and I might as well try it before throwing it away and omgosh! I think I fell in love~~ Hehehe~ I love Buxom glosses but I'm not aware of their other products~  I'm asian but I have big eyes and I'm on a mascara hunt lately so I've been observing my lashes more closely~ I don't have a straight, short lashes most asians have... I don't think it's super long or thick but I'm happy with what I have~ I don't like the doll eye look and I hate clumpy mascaras so when I tried this out I just liked it so much~!  It doesn't clump, at all! It emphasizes my lashes so much and when I remove it I noticed that it doesn't even lengthens or volumizes it that much but it makes a nice difference~ I can wear it on daily basis or when I'm going out on a special occasion~  It's just a simple and natural looking mascara and it's just the look that I like~ Definitely gonna buy the full size and might as well pick up a new gloss, I just emptied mine~ :)

I had been skeptical about using the mascaras with the silicon wand instead of the normal brush applicator because I thought it would clump easily and not distribute the product well. But this mascara makes my eyelashes very full, defined, and long! I've been using it for over 3 years now. I can add 2-3 coats in the morning and if I decide to touch up later in the day I don't end up with spider-looking eyelashes. It comes off fairly easy with a good eye make-up remover or using a washcloth with soap and water. A great product!

The mascara only added a small amount of volume, and it ran down my face within a couple of hours. I wouldn't suggest this mascara if you have oily skin, operate in humid climates, or need something that stays well all day.

This is the perfect mascara for any event. Now that it's waterproof, I can swim with it and it does not even clump up or come off. It does make my lashes look even longer and fuller than usual. I love it!!!!

I bought this mascara spontaneously because I wondered if a more pricey mascara would make a difference compared to the drug store brands. I think it does help make my eyes look bigger even on days I don't feel like getting all glammed up. I use this mascara as a base to get the amp and color that I want for my lashes and sometimes mix other mascaras depending on how much volume I want. I hate when my lashes are clumpy and stuck together. I rarely have that issue with this product. I still have to spend a little bit of time brushing the lashes, but the wand helps make it easier. This product always makes my eyes look great!

I am in love with this wand. I normally use a safety pin to separate my lashes and this wand prevents me from poking my eye out! haha I am also a grease ball so by the end of the day I find mascara rubbing off on my lids. Not so much with Buxom! It also washes off amazingly just with water. LOVE IT!!
Thickens, lengthens, always a smooth application. I have tried so many different brands (including Benefit's They're Real) and always come back to Buxom.

I really like the application of this mascara. It lengthens and doesn't clump. The problem is after a few hours, I notice it smudged under my eyes. If it had better staying power, I'd be a lot happier.

Honestly, half of makeup is mascaras, and this new addition to my collection made my lashes look just FAB, I love how my lashes look so long and dramatic <3 the long wide brush that came with it made it easy to apply

This is my all time favorite mascara in the world. I already have naturally long eyelashes and this enhances them in every way. If you put it on correctly by starting at the root and going out they become long and luscious! I get people asking me every day if I'm wearing fake eyelashes. I've been buying and using only this mascara for about 3 years now! Definitely recommend this mascara!

I loved the little sample mascara so much that I immediately ordered the large one. Sadly the big one is not as creamy and by the end of the day it's flaking off which is extremely annoying since I wear contacts. Not sure if this a Buxom problem or Sephora selling old product.

I am a mascara junkie so i have tried tons of different mascaras. When I first tried this one I was not too impressed but I went back to it after a couple weeks and it was amazing. My lashes were separated perfectly and they had nice length and volume added to them. I highly recommend
I love this mascara. I goes on very very opaque and smooth, and last perfectly all day. It volumizes your lashes without making them look cakey and clumped.
This is one of my favorite mascaras for volume. Lashes look so lush with buxom! My only complaint is that the brush bristles are a smidge flimsy and don't comb through lashes that great.

All I can say is wow! I have extremely oily skin to the point that it affects my eyelids thus causing mascara to run at the end of the day. Even though some mascara say it can only be removed with eye makeup remover, the oils in from my eyelids make them run. I have found that this mascara doesn't run at all until I take it off. Excellent product. Plus it gives my eyelashes the va-va-voom that makes it look fabulous!

I love this mascara and trust me I have tried them all. I purchased a trial size multi pack of mascaras and this was in there and I loved it. It's the only one I buy now. I curl my lashes and this mascara keeps the curl and separates. My lashes look long, full and curled all the time. I get compliments on my eyes often and I know it has a lot to do with this mascara. I love it!!! It's great value because one tube will last for about 6 months or more.
I love this mascara! It separates my lashes beautifully, and it doesn't come out in clumps. This mascara is great for a work look.

I purchased this as a recommendation from Casey Laine (from YouTube) and I'm SO happy I did! I first use a coat of CoverGirl clump crusher waterproof to hold my curl, then top with a coat of this, ZERO CLUMPS! I do have long lashes but this method lengthens and separates.

I received this mascara as part of a sample pack. I'm always on the lookout for the latest and greatest mascara that gives me all the features I want: volumizing, non-clumpy, lengthening, and curling. I would say 3 out of 4 isn't bad. This mascara definitely didn't clump, and I saw more length and volume in my lashes. However, I feel like it did smudge when I sweat, and I wish this mascara also provided curl to my lashes.

this is the perfect mascara for my beady asian lashes. the size is an appropriate size. i use it almost every day and i rarely get any flakes. it does tend to run if you apply it on your lower lashes, but i'd recommend a waterproof for your lowers either way.
Great mascara. Length and volume and separation

I have used many great mascaras, but this is my new favorite. Not only does it separate lashes, add volume, add length, but it's also clump free! It leaves my lashes looking beautiful and makes my eyes pop.
Goes on like a dream. Doesn't flake or smudge (unless you rub your eyes). Very lengthening and defining, but not crazy unnatural looking. Add a second coat for volume at night.

I absolutely am obsessed with this mascara, it makes my lashes long and full and so gorgeous. I wear glasses and I have a hard time making my already large eyes pop behind my lenses to draw the same attention they get without the frames. This mascara does it, half the time I don't even apply eyeliner I just get close to the roots and it does the trick. I recommend this product to anyone who wants a luxurious looking set of lashes for a decent price
