this is perfect for me. I like the brush, and the mascara is long lasting. Best part--no clumping.

reviews.review_title: NO RACCOON OR TARANTULA EYES HERE!!!
reviews.review_text: Love this! It doesn't clump. The wand separates lashes evenly. It does not run. It stays on your lashes throughout the day,

I really enjoy this mascara because it makes my lashes look super long. I'm not a huge fan of mascaras with a comb wand like this because it can sometimes be hard to achieve good volume and I've had that problem with this mascara. All in all, it's a good product, but if you're looking for extreme volume, look elsewhere.

This mascara gives you amazing length and volume without clumping. It is not sticky and dries quickly which is great because I like to apply 2 coats. The brush is really big which I like but can make it a little difficult for bottom lashes. Overall a really great product!

This mascara is pure perfection. It almost acts like a waterproof. I have been using this for years and it stays put through humid weather, greasy lids, and even a few tears. It comes off very easily as well. The best part is that your lashes don't feel hard or crunchy. They remain soft no matter how many coats you apply.
Awesome mascara! It's not clumpy and yet gives me long lashes.
This is a good mascara but not necessarily my favorite. It does give your lashes volume and keeps them evenly separated.

This is my go to mascara. It has a smooth consistency and can easily be built up without clumping. I have noticed towards the end of the day that it sometimes flakes, but overall I really like it. The .37 fl oz lasts me about 6 months with daily use.

This is the best mascara I've ever tried. It goes on easy, doesn't clump or flake, and is so lengthening and volumizing that it makes me look like I'm wearing fake lashes! During the first week of use, my boyfriend kept looking at me and saying, your eyes are beautiful. This mascara is awesome.
Really nice volume and staying power. Not crazy about the brush, it's too fat which makes it hard to apply to small or thin lashes.

I've tried more high-end mascaras that I can count and Buxom Lash takes the cake.  The brush design allows for almost fool-proof application; I've never gotten a clump. It goes on easy and defines and separates lashes. It is not the most voluminous mascara around; I like it best for simple, everyday looks and will add another, thicker mascara over top for a dramatic evening look.  The best part is Buxom Lash's staying power. This is one of the few non-waterproof mascaras I've found that will wear all day without rubbing off onto my skin. No raccoon eyes!  Highly recommended.

I've been using this mascara since they first launched the Buxom line; there's definitely no comparison considering I've tried them all! The only down fall for me it must be paired with Clinique's High Impact Mascara in order for me to achieve the look I'm going for. When it comes to eyelashes its really important for me to have the definition and separation (which you get from Buxom) but I also like them to look really thick and long which I get from the Clinique High Impact.
I love getting samples! I got a sample at Christmas time and its my new favorite. No clumps, just pretty long lashes.

I have super long lashes and sometimes mascara clumps on them too easily! However, this Buxom Lash gives them the perfect length, color, and volume without them looking spidery! Very natural looking!!

Great mascara. Co-workers have asked whether or not I'm wearing fake eyelashes. The hourglass brush coats and separates just about every lash. The teeny, tiny, corner lashes require additional effort. Unfortunately, this mascara isn't waterproof. Sometimes, at the end of the day, I have slight smudges under my eyes from the mascara. It's relatively easy to remove with eye makeup cleanser. There is a waterproof formula that I can't wait to try.
This mascara defines and lengthens. It also thickens. It washes off easily, stays on all day, doesn't flake or fall. It is perfect! I like to buy the small size so I have fresh mascara more often.

I picked up a mini version and I did not like it at all. The formula is very wet and while it's good at defining lashes it provides no volumizing or lengthening that I noticed. It makes lashes very crispy and unnatural.

Absolutely no clumping or flaking. The brush took some getting used to, because I'm used to combing the brush through for definition. This brush scoots over the surface, and somehow deposits the mascara evenly and with perfect definition. Magic! Stays put all day and removes easily. What more can you ask? Perfectly dainty on my fine lashes.
Words can't describe how amazing this mascara is!! Go get it!!

I was looking to buy a new mascara after the brand I was using before changed the formula in its mascara. This mascara is perfect! It separates and lengthens my lashes like no other. I haven't tried the waterproof formula but I highly recommend the non-waterproof version. Definitely worth the price!

I really enjoy this formula -- it's a little thin, but once it dries it's here to stay. I prefer mascara that's NOT waterproof because it's easier to get off, and this formula is perfect for that. HOWEVER, if you're looking to volumize, DO NOT purchase. I already have long lashes, and this mascara did a great job of making them too long for glasses wear, but does not thicken much at all. Perfect for bottom lashes, the ball shape at the end of the wand is primo. Definitely recommend, unless your main objective is to volumize.

This is the best mascara I've ever used. I love the shape of the wand and the bristles grip my lashes just right. One coat is enough for day to day, but I like adding an extra coat because it makes my lashes look so good!
A bit clumpy when I first put it on but it lasts for a long time. I usually have to work with it a bit in the morning but I love the outcome enough to keep using it:)
I didn't find this to add much volume or drama to my lashes, however, I found it very useful for a daily look. It doesn't wear off easily yet is easy to remove.
This mascara never disappoints! It thickens without flaking or smudging. This is my go-to mascara every single time.

I have really short lashes and this mascara really lengthens ever lash with each coat, the only thing is its dark but not as dark as I would like so I usually use another one layer of another mascara on top

I've tried just about every mascara under the sun (Dior, Lancôme, Estée Lauder, givenchy, Calvin Klein, MUFE, tarte, Korres, LORAC,....it goes on and on) but this is my FAVORITE mascara ever. Hands down. Absolutely zero clumping. Defines lashes like none other. I even use the brush from this one to apply some of my other more expensive mascara a so that they don't go to waste. This stuff is awesome. It might be the brush that's so amazing--seriously this thing will. not. clump. Everrrr. Even in a rush, your mascara will look great. Lovveeee it!
This mascara is amazing! It will take any type of lash and almost double it's length. Looks like you have been using some type of lash serum like Latisse. Great mascara!!!
I like the size- small. Semi-affordable. Easy to apply- no tricks. Good formula- no flakes.

The title is pretty self explanatory. It's a good mascara but it's not great. I am a mascara song and nothing compares to the one I have been using for years to lift , separate ,volumize ect.. This one is great to use as a second coat mascara. But as far as getting an open eyed look with a little bit of lift on the last this won't do just by itself. It's a good formula and I'll use it til it's done but prob won't buy it again. I would like to try the retractable brush mascara by boxom next :)
By far the best mascara I've ever used. I always get compliments on how good my lashes look!

This is an ok mascara. It's not the worst, but it's definitely not anything great. I have a hard time building up volume with this, which is usually far from my problem with most mascaras. It didn't clump for me. But it just wasn't my favorite.
It clumps up your lashes and runs down giving you the zombie look aroun 3pm in the afternoon if applied at 6am. Needless to say, I returned it!

My friend let me use her mascara and this is what she had I was in Sephora and I seen they had the travel size so I bought it. This mascara does not clump my lashes all of my lashes are fuller and longer. The brush picks up a certain amount of product. I love my benefit they're real but this comes very close to benefit's.

I have always been a fan of Dior and YSL mascara for years. When I tried this, I absolutely loved it. It volumizes, lengthens, and curls. Plus, the price is cheaper than any other Dior or YSL mascaras!
My favourite mascara! Way better than any drug store mascara.

No matter how many different mascaras I try, I always seem to come back to this one. Everything else is just too heavy for my lashes! My eyelashes are average: not long, not thick, and stubbornly straight. After curling with a Shu Uemura curler, the Buxom wand and formula really gets between every lash to lift, lengthen, and separate. I highly recommend mastering the technique detailed on the box: applying to the tips first, then to the rest of the lash. It really helps add length and definition! I seriously hope Sephora never stops selling this because I don't think I could ever find a product quite like it anywhere else.

The first time I wore it I really loved it. I like mascara to add volume, this one just didn't do the trick. If you're looking for a lightweight mascara this is the one for you but if you're looking for volume look elsewhere!
This is the best mascara I have ever used. Gives me perfect lashes every time. Doesn't clump, not sticky. Wish it came it more colors.

Yes, ladies, this is my Holy Grail. I originally got a sample in a mascara sample box called 'Lash Stash' that Sephora sold a long time ago, and this was my favorite of the samples. The brush is amazing, and I've been using it every day for MONTHS and I'm still not done with it. I can wear just one swipe each for a more subtle look or build and build to create amazing lashes. The black doesn't fade during the day, my lashes look thicker and longer, and it doesn't flake into my eyes even if I'm wearing it for 12 hours. I love this.  I bought the full size and still haven't had to crack it open. Love love love this mascara. ♥
My favorite mascara by far! love it!
Will never switch my mascara again! Defines, lengthens, separates - does everything a great mascara should!
Great brush defines, lengthens, separates.
I can't get over how amazing this mascara is.

Ever since my sister bought me this for Christmas years ago, this is the only mascara I swear by. One time I lost it and got department store mascara and it just wasn't the same. The mascara is light and makes my lashes look thicker, without the clump!

reviews.review_title: Good mascara but it's drying out quick.
reviews.review_text: First time using this mascara. I was using the sephora mascara and I liked it. I switched over and I like how it fans out my lashes without clumps like the sephora mascara. I'm a little disappointed because I've had it for 2 weeks and it feels like it's drying out.

First started tried this when I was using Latisse and it made my lashes look ridiculously long and full. I'm no longer using Latisse so my lashes are wimpy and very average looking. Buxom still makes them look full and gorgeous. No Latisse needed.

this is the best Mascara I have used in a long time. I fell in love with it at first swipe!! I will never again use M.A.C Mascara after using it this. It doesn't flake or clump together at all. I where fake lashes every day an my lashes look amazing every time i put it on them. I also love the whole BUXOM line. I stock up on all my faves every time I come in to shop. This is a must have in my makeup bag!!

The wand is incredible. It gives you the perfect, evenly-coated and separated lashes from root to tip lengthening longer than normal but not unnaturally. No flaking, no smudging here. The wand is also hour-glass shaped so it can be easily handled and give you pin-up lashes, like falsies on the ends. Really attractive and natural color.  Sadly, I want darker than jet black lashes, super thick and unnaturally long. So back to Lancome Hypnose Drama for me. But if girl-next-door is your thing, this is the very best mascara for you to use. Also very reasonably priced.
I love this mascara! I have tried everyone out there

Originally tried this a sample from a previous Sephora order; had to buy more because this is the best. Buxom is incredibly easy to apply, gives great definition and lengthens beautifully. This also builds on its self really well so delivers everything from subtle to dramatic results. Also great for sensitive eyes--most mascaras really irritate my eyes but have been using this for a couple months with no issues at all.

For the past few weeks I have been using the Boxom Lash I found that it didn't really help. It would barely make my lash look longer but after a while it got better. Definitely not my best buy, I would not recommend it.

If you curl your lashes, hold this at the base and pull straight up this gives you awesome length and separation. This really defines each lash, was given this one as a gift and I will definitely purchase the full size in the future.

Buxom Lash does it all: makes my lashes fuller, much longer and fluffy looking. The brush is amazing. It finds every little invisible lash and colors it perfectly. It separates lashes so well that I do not have to use a lash comb to separate out after applying. Hard to believe, but my lashes look great after only one application. No need to keep applying it over and over. Also, does not flake or smudge and washes off easily with soap and water. I have tried every mascara on the market, including the old time dry cake mascara, and nothing comes close to Buxom. Thank you for a truly outstanding product. If I could give it ten stars, I would.

reviews.review_title: Great Product, No flakes, no clumps
reviews.review_text: I have used the Kat Von D mascara for a while, and when my store was out of it, I tried this. Very similar results, however, I like the Buxom Lash better. This does exactly what I want for mascara, it does not come out of the tube clumpy or with too much product, perfect amount. It defines very well, and makes it look like I have twice as many lashes. Love it, highly recommend for a variety of looks, as it works for a more dramatic look with a couple of coats (and still doesn't get flaky or clumpy). Also stays on well (I have contacts and allergies, and this stands up!)

I have used this and LOVED it but being the makeup junkie that I am, I will sometimes try another in there words, better and no spider lashes mascara. But I always come back to this. No fall out at all and gives my long lashes an even longer appearance. Just bought a tube last week!! :@)
I originally got this in a sample bag at Christmas and fell in love. Hands down best mascara ever and that is largely in part to the fine bristled wand. I will never use other mascara.

reviews.review_title: Everyone but me seems to love it
reviews.review_text: This mascara has great reviews, but it just doesn't work for me. Overall my lashes are pretty average, but they have a really hard time holding a curl. Some mascaras do better than others, but I've found that this particular formula takes the curl right out and leaves them stick straight. I always heat my curler as well and still no success. The applicator is nice at separating lashes and it never clumps, but if it can't hold a curl it's pretty much useless to me.
Finally found a great mascara! Does not clump! Does not run!
This is my favorite mascara! I was on a quest last year, tried the priciest brands, the drug store ones, and the middle ones. This one is by far the best!
I have never had a favorite mascara until this one! It never clumps, doesn't irritate my eyes, and makes my lashes noticeable longer. I have started using the waterproof one since it lasts all day.

I received this product as a sample, and I LOVED it! It makes my lashes nice and long, and I absolutely love how the unique shape of the brush can reach literally every single one of my lashes without poking my eye/face. Definitely going to purchase the full size from now on!
I have tried several other brands and I really love this waterproof one. It stays on even when I am doing a brutal Zumba class. Finally no running while sweeting.
Absolutely love this mascara. A new favourite. Will buy again.
Great mascara . There are no clumps, flakes, or smudges ! A new favorite !
Best mascara ever! It makes it look like I have false eyelashes. And the travel size is perfect for on the go!

I get CONSTANT compliments on my eyelashes and I owe it all to this mascara. Usually what I like to do is first use any lengthening mascara (one coat) wait a minute then pull out this baby. MY eyelashes literally explode! Many people think I wear false lashes, but they're my natural ones. I also have pretty hooded eyes, so this really just opens up my eyes and gives me a very exotic sultry look :)

I have tried so many mascaras, drug store and high end. This is by far one of my absolute favorites! Does not smudge or flake, never clumps. I have nothing bad to say about this! Doesn't give much volume, but the length is awesome, along with it's separation. Definitely give it a try!!
This mascara is amazing! I love how it creates real fullness, length and separation. This is by far, my favorite!

The brush on this mascara is amazing. I really love the way it goes on my eyelashes. However, I find this formula flakes off throughout the day, and gives horrible raccoon eyes. I have plenty of other non-waterproof mascaras that don't have this problem.

Great coverage, doesn't flake and gives good volume. I wish it would last all day, since I feel I have to retouch it in the early afternoon while at work. It does add volume and some length to my eye lashes, but I have a good length to start, so not sure it would do lots for somebody with short lashes.It doesn't separate the lashes much. If you are looking for volume and a gentle formula it works great. Small sizes are also a plus for me.

This mascara is amazing for its lengthening and voluminous formula! I have decent length eyelashes but this mascara made them super long. The formula is also very black, which for those of us with blonder eyelashes is a plus! My only complaint is that it dries out very quickly. I had mine for about two weeks and it got a lot tackier than it should have.
I got this as a sample years and years ago and was the best mascara I've ever used. Since then, I don't cheat on this mascara because I know that the others won't make what this one does
I purchased several smaller size mascaras to compare as they discontinued my last two favorites. This is by far my favorite of the ones sampled. Does not clump which I love.
Does wonders to my lashes!!
amazing! loved so much.

Honest to goodness the best mascara EVAAAAAA!!! Keeps your lashes unbelievably soft while giving them grey length and volume. Best part is that it is singlehandedly the best build able mascara. One coat for a natural look, two or three for awesome length and volume!!!!

I have been using Buxom for a few years now and still love it! I work 12 hour shifts at the hospital and this is the only mascara that stays with me the entire shift! It doesn't leave black smudges either!

I love this mascara, I usually have this and the Dior Show in my bag at all times, they both give me big lashes but I really like the wand/brush on this one. It just works really well and makes me look like I have lots of big lashes! Love this, I am a repeat customer for sure.

If you have short lashes, this mascara is perfect for you. It literally makes my lashes at least 1-2 mm longer. It doesn't really add volume though, but if you use this mascara first then a volumizing mascara afterwards, you should have amazing results
Not too thick, not too thin. You can build it up if you want, or keep it light for day time. Highly recommend, and I've tried the all.

Perfect, perfect product. Please never change a thing! I have used this mascara for going on two years, and I am not switching. It never clumps, goes on smooth, and the brush reaches every single individual lash without ever putting on too much. I have long lashes that are pale at the ends, so as soon as I put this on it looks like fake lashes. Absolutely splendid! It also lasts a very long time, and if it gets wet, it doesn't smear unless you are vigorously rubbing your eyes. Raccoon eyes are very hard to get with this product. It's marvelous.

I buy the smaller version of this mascara that they have around the checkout counter. I use this mascara for the base of my lashes. I then use a lengthening mascara for the tips of my lashes. My lashes look awesome.

This was the first higher end brand of mascara that I picked up when I started wearing more makeup in high school. I have gone through something like 4 tubes of this stuff in the past few years. I have tried three or four other mascaras and nothing compares. It volumizes when need be and adds great length to the lashes. It initially is quite liquidy but after a use or two, it thickens up. I love the applicator because if separates lashes and gets all of them in two swipes. This is a must have!
Looks lovely at 7 and by noon flaky and all over my face

reviews.review_title: Best mascara and brush so far!!!!!
reviews.review_text: I am blond with lashes that really don't show up until the mascara goes on. This mascara is AMAZING! The unique brush finds every single lash and coats it perfectly to curl up and stand out! And then it stays until I remove it with makeup rwmover. No smudging. No clumping. No flaking. My eyelashes look like real fringe just like they're supposed too. I do not like that caked on look that some people do by wearing layer upon layer. This natural look is my fave for every day go to!!!!

I have used more expensive mascaras, but I've fallen in love with this one. It separates, lengthens, and creates a beautiful look. I don't think it creates a bold look on the first sweep, but it is buildable. I also love that it stays put throughout the day. No raccoon eyes! It may not be the most dramatic for evening, but it is a fantastic daily mascara.

I have tried every mascara out there (dior over curl, dior show, givenchy, MUFE, Marc Jacobs, Lancôme, tarte, Korres, Calvin Klein, LORAC, bare minerals, etc) but this is the BEST I've ever used. It separates, lengthens, and volumizes in the most lovely way. I loveee it

To its credit, the brush design helps define and separate lashes nicely but it takes several coats to make the lashes stand out. The problem however is that once you start added coats, it becomes flakey and little black specks fall beneath the eyes throughout the day. Fine for everyday wear if you just need a quick mascara but if you like bold standout lashes, look elsewhere.
Absolutely my favorite and I will continue to repurchase it. I definitely like how I can get every lash and the impact it delivers. So happy!

This is my #1 staple product! No other mascara compares. My lashes get clumped together really easily and always get stuck together. This is the ONLY mascara that completely separates my lashes. I love this product so much. Buxom is quickly becoming my favorite brand!!!!
Pros: Makes lashes very dark Lengthens well Separates lashes well Feels comfortable  Cons: Didn't give my lashes the thickness I like Slightly clumpy
I have tried many mascaras in my day but this one is the only one that does the trick. Strongly recommend :)
I'm in love best mascara ever

I have tried alot of mascaras and I just love buxom. It stays put and always looks great with easy application. You do have to use remover, as with all of the others. I rate this the best...I will buy this until it's not made any more. Desiree Macho

I got the regular and waterproof ones and they were both awesome. After curling my lashes and putting on the mascara, the lashes held up throughout the whole day. The formula is extremely light so it's possible to do as many coats as you'd like. This is my favorite mascara!
Best mascara I've ever used. Goes on easily and stays on; yet is easily removed. Love it! My mascara of choice.
Got this as a sample and LOVE IT! :)
This is the best mascara I have ever used. It separates and volumizes. It is also a deep black which I need for my black hair! I have also tried every mascara out there and this is the best!
The mascara goes on nice and looks great but it flakes terribly.
I have short & thin lashes & this mascara goes on smoothly without clumping adding fullness & some length. Love it!
I have tried many mascaras and been disappointed but this one totally delivers. It lengthens, thickens and does not clump or flake! Many thanks to the Sephora sales person who recommended it.
i like the wand of this mascara a lot- the actual formula is the same as any other
love this mascara! It really lengthens and lasts! especially love that it doesn't have parabens/sulfates/etc.
The first time I used this it was great. Just re purchased a month ago and it's terrible.. I don't know what happened

I've been searching high and low for a great mascara, and tried a lot of different brands...this is by far my favorite mascara. It does it all, volumizes, separates, lengthens, stays on all day, and doesn't clump. The only thing I would change is the fact that it has a blunt tip. I like wands that have a triangle-like tip so I can get into the corners and small areas real well.

I got a sample of this a while ago and just bought the full size. Nothing else compares! It doesn't clump, doesn't flake, and looks so natural while definitely volumizing and lengthening. My new fave.

this is my all time favorite mascara and i had tried everything. it stays on all day, even not waterproof, doesn't leave mascara goobers in eyes or give me dark circles under my eyes, and comes off with my face wash

I bought this mascara because it was supposed to not clump or be gloppy - this is not the case. For a product that costs this much, I would expect it to be considerably better than something I could get at the grocery store.

YES.This mascara is simply amazing! My eyelashes are thin and little, but when I used Buxom Lash my lashes became these thick full long sexy lashes! I was instantly hooked!! When I apply it to my upper and lower lashes it really makes my eyes pop! The product really last a long time, I made it last about 3 months (using it everyday too) and is still usable! Seriously, that's fantastic! So happy with this product. Will repurchase over and over again!

it's a very good mascara. better than most i've used. does add volume and clumping is minimal. I would have liked the color more profound black like it said. i still need to use another mascara over this to get the dark heavy effect. Boots no7 extravagant volume always seems to to the trick.
Absolutely best mascara I've ever used. I've gone through three of these tubes. They last a long time. No clumps and lengthens so much. I don't know how I would survive without it

So a lot of people complain about how the full size is not the best. My local sephora store was out of the mini size so I went ahead and got the full. The wand is HUGE!!!! It really grabs each lash and gives them length and volume. It doesn't flake or clump AT ALL! I really recommend this mascara who wants the  my lashes but WAYYY better look. Perfect for we middle schoolers!
This mascara is amazing! so good at volumizing lashes without clumping at all!!

I feel like I wasted my money on this mascara. It doesn't make my lashes look fuller unless I later it several times. The mascara made my lashes look clumpy, and flaky. Not at all what I was expecting for the amount of money I paid for. I rather get drug store mascara than pay for another tube like this

I love this mascara and have purchased many tubes over the last few years and I always come back to it. It never clumps and makes you look like you have a million long lashes. Very worth the price tag.

I've been using this mascara for a few years now. It works wonderfully on my eyelashes, which I have long thick lashes to begin with, It separates each lash, lengthens and gives them volume, people sometimes ask if I'm wearing fake eyelashes. I've never had a problem with flaking like some said in the previous reviews. I love this mascara, and I highly recommend it!!

This is my favorite mascara. I've been using it for two years now and it hardly ever fails me. It's incredibly lengthening and decently volumizing, which is what I look for in a mascara. However, I do recommend that you buy the sample tube. Why? After 6-8 months, the product begins to dry out. I understand that there are methods of liquefying them again, so that could be a possible solution. Anyways, I normally enjoy dryer mascaras. But this one doesn't perform nearly as well when it dries out. It becomes flaky and clumps easily. On my medium length lashes, it doesn't look very good. I say to get the sample because it has so much product in it and it lasts around 9-10 months if you don't use it too much. I wear it almost everyday, and I still have plenty in the tube and I've been using it since November. It has just began to dry out for me. But I've had three tubes of this mascara (two samples, one full size), and each time I've had to repurchase one after around eight months. So, I definitely recommend getting the smaller one. It will save you so much money, unless dry mascaras work really well on your lashes. All mascaras look differently on different lashes. Anyways, it's up to you and your preferences. I hope this review helped :)

I previously gave a glowing review based on the sample mascara I received. I ordered the full size one after I used up the sample and, boy, why does this always happen? The sample was wonderful. The full size was clumpy, flaky, everything that can be wrong with a mascara. Not good. This has happened too many times with various sample mascaras to be a coincidence. Do they do this deliberately to make a sale?

I do like this mascara if you don't like waterproof versions, but it does flake on me sometimes, and I have small eyes with long eyelashes, so it tends to end up under my eyes. I like to stick with their waterproof version.

This mascara volumizes as promised and separates as a bonus. It's great for building and combing through clumps. Love love love. I think this mascara is best when you first get it and not with extended use. Get the mini and replace often so it doesn't dry out before you're done! Apparently visene helps prolong your mascara. Have yet to try that.

At first I was none too keen on this, because it really made each individual eyelash longer from the root, and I'm used to lower quality mascaras which sort of cement them together at the roots. I like the brush shape, even if it caught me off guard at first. I find it takes a bit of building up the layers to get the fullest look, especially on the outer lashes. It doesn't deliver the big volume on the first swipe, but this makes it very versatile in some ways.
I wasn't so sure about this mascara but I love it! I was wanting something that have me definition and I got it! Love it!

reviews.review_title: always have a soft spot for this mascara
reviews.review_text: I used to use it quite a bit and I still think about it every now and then. It's a good product, very light but coats every lash. i love the wand it's slightly flexible/bendable and the bristles are condensed and .. soft. when I put it on, i almost feel like i'm doing something good for my lashes. it does feel slightly thin but it doesn't weigh down your lashes and you can build it. the only downside is that it is a little more smudgy than the other nonwaterproof mascaras.
This mascara is excellent. It really makes my eyes pop. With a few strokes my eyes look great. Highly recommend.

I am blonde/blue/fair and therefore typically opt for brown mascara over black, and in fact look much better with brown mascara than black. I got a free sample of this and for some reason this particular shade of black makes me look really pretty. It very nicely separates my long, thin lashes (being thin other mascaras sometimes clump them together a bit). The brush in the free sample was just a bit shorter and actually worked better than the full size. The full size brush is a bit overwhelming. I will advise, definitely do not wear this if your eyes water or if you will cry, sweat, or swim. The slightest bit of water makes it dramatically pour off your lashes and streak down your face. :) That's not so pretty. Less thickening than some mascaras but the super-dark shade really gives a nice pop. I like it!

One Item I usually only buy at the drugstore is mascara, however after receiving a sample of this mascara, it's going to be really hard to go back! It really does a great job at making your lashes look long, and stays all day. I also received a sample of They're Real benefit mascara and the Buxom beats it hand down!

I have tried just about every mascara out there. This one is the best I have ever used. I bought the Sephora sample box of several different mascaras, and though there are some others that were good, this one is the absolute best.

This is such a great mascara! Never runs or clumps on me and lasts my whole work day without budging. It does take a couple coats to get the full effect, but man does it pull through. Love this stuff!

I love mascara and I usually buy sample sizes to try them out. This one was a full size but on sale so I purchased it and I am absolutely in love with it. Zero clumping and makes my lashes nice and long -- I love it!!
hands down the best mascara i ever tried…i wish it cam in brown/black as well!
this is the best mascara i've ever used. It's so worth it. It's never clumpy and it always help lengthen my lashes.
This mascara is my new favorite, it lengthens and curls better than any other I've tried.

I really like this mascara. I find it quite similar to the Benefitsthey're real Mascara. This one keeps my lashes curled, adds volume, thickness, definition and length. And it still manages to look natural, not clumpy or spidery! I only ever need just one coat

The first time I bought this I loved it and claimed it was the best mascara I'd tried. Re-purchased it lately and was less than impressed. Didn't give great volume, and was super-smudgy under my eyes :( I took it back.

I have been looking to get a better mascara for my long lashes. I wanted to define and not have my lashes clump together. This does a great job, I also love how the formula does not get tacky as it dries and I can re curl my lashes as needed.
Awesome mascara! Will never change it plumps and lengthens my lashes.

I've tried all of them and this is the best. It goes on liquid-smooth and silky and dries quickly. No clumps, no flakes, great coverage, lashes look long and thick. It's not supposed to be waterproof but it DOES require make-up remover to get it to wash off. Soap and water don't do it (which I consider a good thing because that means it won't run off every time your eyes tear up or water a bit.)
i've been using this mascara for quite some time. it really does do what it says it will. and it washes off easily. i highly recommend it!

You know how there are some beauty products that you are constantly on the look out for a better version? Mascara and eye liner are my holy grails I just never have found the perfect one. While this isn't IT as far as mascara, it's really close. I use it in conjunction with the Dior show primer based on a recommendation from two Sephora employees, and I must say I am happy with the results. It stays on even through crossfit and spin and gives me longer lusher lashes. It also isn't a nightmare to get off. No crazy raccoon eyes. I'm pretty impressed. The closest I've come for eye liner is Kat Von Dees tattoo liner. Really easy to use, felt tip, has staying power, easy to correct goof ups and comes off relatively easy at the end of the day.
Love this mascara! Though it takes a couple of coats to make my lashes long, it doesn't clump and layers nicely.

Hands down the best. I love it so much! Been using it for a couple years. I curl my lashes before I put it on and then I let it dry a while and then curl them again and my lashes are to die for. It goes on wet and smooth so you do have to let it dry a bit. Absolutely life changing.

I've tried so many different mascaras-I even bought the Sephora Try It with 10 different minis, and this was the best. Don't waste you're money trying to find slightly better-this is top quality and a great price.

I got a sample of this with my purchase and it was great! I typically like mascaras that give a lot of volume and a decent amount of length. This mascara enhances my lashes but it still looks relatively natural. It's the perfect mascara for the daytime. When I change my make up for night, I apply this mascara and then I apply Benefit's They're Real because it makes your lashes extremely long but it doesn't thicken them. These two products together are perfect for night lashes and this one by itself is perfect for day lashes. When my sample runs out, I'll definitely purchase the full size version.  This mascara is also great because it doesn't flake or smudge. It doesn't clump your lashes together or make them hard and stiff. Also, it lasts all day. I'd definitely recommend it to anyone who wants enhanced but still natural lashes. When you wear this mascara, it's not really obvious that you're wearing it. People just think that you naturally have dark, thick, long lashes.
Obsessed!!! Best mascara I've ever used, it does everything..first time my boyfriend actually noticed I was wearing mascara and loved it !!!
This is the best mascara I have ever used. I have tried Benefit, Dior, drug store brands, but I always come back to this one.

Je les ai presque tous essayés en kit et Buxom les dépasse tous. Que ce soit Dior, Benefit et cie, aucun ne donne ce résultat. J'en ai offert un à ma fille à Noël et elle ne jure que par lui.Mais le Eye brightening de Smashbox demeure le meilleur illuminateur. Je n'hésite pas à l'utiliser pour une dernière touche mais tout en douceur.
I love this stuff. It's very volumizing, lengthening, and defining. MUST HAVEEEEE.

reviews.review_title: The best mascara I have ever tried
reviews.review_text: This is by far the best mascara I have ever tried. I've tried Clinique, Shisiedo, and a bunch of drugstore mascaras, but this one is definitely the absolute best. I bought it on a whim, and for a high-end mascara, it isn't too pricey. This mascara lengthens and volumizes and doesn't flake or make me look like a raccoon. If it goes on my skin while applying, it washes off easily. This mascara isn't waterproof, but I would consider it a mid-way between waterproof and non-waterproof because it stays really well. I was debating betwixt this one and Benefit's 'They're Real' and I'm so glad I bought the Buxom one, because I got a sample of Benefit's, and it doesn't compare. I would definitely recommend this, and will be repurchasing.
consistently all around best mascara ever
This mascara does it all. It gives me pin up girl lashes or hockey mom lashes depending how I apply it and it never clumps. My must have beauty product
As can be witnessed by my profile name, I'm not much into makeup. Blush, mascara, gloss. This mascara is incredible. Lengthens, volumizes, doesn't clump. It looks like I'm weaing falsies!

I have the worst lashes. They are stick straight, short and light. Pair this mascara with your Shu Uemura eyelash curler, and you've instantly added curl, length and volume. When I say I have tried every mascara on the market, I'm serious. I love this stuff. It doesn't flake, and it looks better after a few coats (doesn't clump). I keep coming back for more and have been sure to tell my girlfriends with less fortunate eyelashes to give it a whirl. :)

I only wish it was water proof. I have short, straight lashes and this stuff (with the help of an eyelash curler) makes me look like I'm wearing celeb-quality falsies. I'd definitely try it out in store with the tester because I really think everyone has their magic mascara out there, haha, but this one is totally mine so it might just work for anyone! Just be sure to have a clean wand/brush ready to comb/de-clump the tiniest bit right after applying. You might get a little fall-out after a few hours (especially if you live somewhere hot and humid), but it is barely noticeable and wipes right away. Small price to pay for awesome!

I got this as a part of my Sephora Favourites set. And I'm in love with it!!!! I've been on a search for my perfect mascara for over 10 years and finally I found it! It is both: lenghtening and moisturizing! My lashes are naturally curled, but I think, the brush curls them even more. Will be definitely repurchasing, when I run out! Highly recommend!

This is hands down the best mascara that I have ever used. It makes my eyelashes look incredibly long, full and thick without clumping or irritating my eyes. I have had many people ask me if I had fake lashes on while wearing the Buxom mascara. I highly recommend!

I have really long eye lashes, but this mascara makes them so full that they don't even look real. I have people ask me all the time if I have extensions. I normally don't buy expensive mascara but Buxom nailed their formula. Love, love, love this stuff!
I'm so glad I tried this because this is now my all time favorite mascara. It separates all my lashes perfectly and gives them volume. It's way better than any drug store and not that much more $
Hands down the best mascara ever! Makes my lashes look like I've splurged for extensions (yeah right). Always my go to eye product.
I have been using Buxom Lash for years. I love how dark and thick it makes my lashes look.

Performamce: Stays on but washes off easy. Thickens, lengthens beautifully without clumping! Any good product raises your standards, and this mascara is unbeatable. It's my go to mascara & has been for 2 years now. Love it!

I originally got this in sample size and loved it so much I bought the full size. It gives great length and fullness but without making my lashes look fake or creepy spider-like. I wear one application everyday but it could easily transform to a night look with more layers. Minimal clumping which is my biggest pet peeve with mascara. Overall it's a great product!

I am in love with this mascara. My only reason for not giving it 5 stars is because it's not waterproof!! It really has a nice staying power. It does not clump on my lashes or on the brush and makes my lashes intensify. I'm not a false lash kind of girl, so I depend on my mascara to do it's job. I'm never disappointed in Buxom!!
I like it but don't love it, not sure if I would buy it again.
This mascara holds curls very well and also separates the lashes. I use it as a base coat and then to separate any clumps I have from other mascara. Love it.

Received this mascara as a sample, and I'm in love. I normally see no difference between drugstore brands and higher end brands for mascara, but this one is really great. It lengthens, doesn't clump, and the brush gives a really even application.
One of the best mascara I've tried so far
I returned it immediately. I bought it because I heard such great reviews... But was very disappointed. I have over 20 different brands of mascara from Sephora... This is the worst

I am really weird when it comes to mascaras. I personally don't like plasticky brushes, because they irritate my eyes, but I was recommended this one and thought I'd give it a try anyway. Unfortunately, although the brush itself was okay and it didn't irritate my eyes quite as much as other mascaras with this type of brush have in the past, I'm still not happy with this. In fact, I'm pretty sure the formula gave me an eye infection. I don't want to use it anymore. It worked well enough though, so I guess everyone who is less sensible to those types of brushes should be fine!
Buxom Mascara is NOT the way to go. It rubs off throughout the day, giving you black undereyes :( I wish I had gone with a different product!

I have used a range of mascaras (drug store and prestige brands) and this is the best of them all. I have a lot of lashes but they are not very long. This lengthens and lifts them. This is also a great mascara for putting on multiple coats without clumping. You'd really have to try hard to get this to clump. This also does not flake, it stays on until I take it off at night. I sometimes veer away to different products thinking I can find better, but I always come back, it is the best.
Nice mascara but not for people with sparse lashes

i LOVE this mascara! it volumizes, and lengthens... is never clumpy...and that awesome brush totally separates your lashes. I've tried so many, and i always come back to this one. GET it! i always get compliments on my lashes when i wear this!

For me, it's all about length but the girl who worked at Sephroa recommended this product, said it was really becoming popular, and I see why. When I need a little umf to my lashes this does it. A night out on the town- I use this mascara.

This mascara does lengthen your lashes, separates well but little disappointed on the volume. Its does not intensely volumize like they said. I had to put on 3 coats to get the look that i wanted but... did not flake or smudge! Good mascara for everyday use, not so much if you want a dramatic look for evening.
I've used this mascara for years and I absolutely love it. I have long lashes but this just adds to them. Black without flaking! I have sensitive eyes and this hasn't bothered them at all. MUST HAVE!

I received this as a sample in an order & I LOVE, LOVE, LOVE this mascara! I have light brown, short, thin eyelashes & this mascara boosts them up with intense color & volume without caking, flaking, clumping or end of the day raccoon eyes. I also have extremely sensitive eyes, this has caused no issues whatsoever.

This mascara is absolutely hands-down, the best mascara I've ever used. I have naturally long, fairly thick lashes, but they stick straight down. Which I'm not a fan of. After curling my lashes, any other mascara I've ever used has weighed them down and pulled the curl straight out. This formula is not heavy, dries fairly quickly but will allow you to mold your lashes once the mascara is on to ensure they're staying curled or even curl them more! One coat of mascara for me is usually good for daytime, but this formula is very buildable and three coats has me looking like I have on false eyelashes. Another perk of this formula and packaging is that it lasts FOREVER. I'm talking 9 months with one to two coats daily. It's amazing. I've tried DiorShow, Too Faced Better Than S**. Tarte Lights, Camera, Lashes, Benefit's They're Real!, and several others by Dior, Bare Minerals, Lancome, Clinique, Smashbox, the list goes on and on. I've been using this formula now for 2 years and every now and then decide to try out something new but I always always come back to my favorite Buxom Lash! If you have trouble getting your lashes to stay curled do yourself a huge favor and try this mascara! After all, with Sephora's fabulous return policy if you don't like it, return it!

I was on the hunt for the perfect mascara and found this one in a sample bag from my Sephora order. It gets all my lashes and shows up great on my lashes. I think the magic is the brush. I will use this forever.:)

I have blonde lashes that are pretty long, but very thin. I used to love Benefit's BadGal Lash waterproof mascara, but after trying this stuff I don't think I'll ever use anything else. The brush is different from other brushes; it easily separates my lashes and makes them look thicker. The mascara itself is very smooth; it doesn't clump or flake. Only downside, as other reviewers have noted, is it is definitely not waterproof.

I bought this on a whim, because I'm addicted to mascara (I have a problem!) and I was curious. I didn't think it'd be good, but in fact it worked amazing!!!! My lashes, with one coat, look insanely long and voluptuous!!! I'm so surprised! I reccomend and will buy again! :-)
This works exactly as advertised, one of my favorite mascaras and never fails to disappoint!
I'm pretty particular about my mascara. I got this mascara as a sample and was so disappointed and not impressed. It did not add any volume to my lashes at all, which is what I look for in a mascara.

My mom and myself already have curly dark colored lashes, but this definitely works to lengthen and thicken lashes to make them noticeable and very pretty. I bought this for my mom and myself after trying it in a sample. I have tried many brands and this mascara does not look fake and clumpy AT ALL.

I absolutely love this mascara! I got it as part of the Sephora favourites mascara kit and am in love. It keeps my lashes curled and beautiful all day, while being easy to remove at the end of the night. it keeps lashes looking natural but exceptionally fanned out and long all day. love love love. Will definitely purchase the full size.

Had high expectations for this product. I am obsessed with trying out different types of mascaras, so I decided to give this one a shot considering that it has good reviews. I'm not so thrilled with it. I don't find this formula to be an intense nor volumizing mascara as indicated in the description. It's just ok. I've had much better experiences with drug store bought mascaras.

reviews.review_title: I think I found my holy grail!
reviews.review_text: Perfect mascara! Black, not too watery or thick. Smell isn't pungent, and performs like a dream. I'm constantly grabbing this over Benefits they're real, Too Faced Better than S**, and Smashbox Full Exposure. Lengthens, separates, and volumizes. No clumping or flaking. The wand bristles are soft and don't tug which feels wonderful on my eyes. I hope they never stop making this because I think I've found my holy grail!
I really like this mascara. It's not clumpy and lasts a long time. It makes my lashes look fabulous!

I originally got this in a sample size and loved it! It makes my lashes look thick and long and doesn't clump or flake, which is a problem I've had with other mascaras. It also holds a curl really well which is important since my lashes are super straight.
I love this mascara, my eyelashes are very small and this mascara really brought them out, and really finished my make up very nicely.
I was excited to try this mascara after reading all the rave reviews. I have to say I was pretty disappointed. It didn't do anything to lengthen or add volume. Returned it today.

I wear this mascara everyday and because of the silky formula and rubber applicator, it goes on smooth, making my lashes naturally look blacker and more voluminous. There's no clumping either. People regularly compliment my lashes thinking I'm not wearing any mascara. I love it for daily wear.

I found this while waiting on line and I'm so glad I didn't put it down. Makes your eyelashes pop. The brush is great at finding ask those tiny lashes you didn't know existed. Definitely will get more.
I received a sample of this mascara and it really is fantastic! I have short thin eye lashes and this mascara makes my eye lash look incredibly full and a little longer!
This is a staple mascara for me. It never flakes and makes my lashes look so full. The wand makes the product easy to apply and rarely clumps. Great price, great mascara !
I love this mascara. It's not as expensive as other mascaras, it gives amazing volume and length. The brush is rubbery but not spikey to where it pokes my eyeball. I love it!

I have tried tons of mascaras and this one is by far my favorite. It's easy to apply, very dark black (great for my blonde lashes) gives great length and volume, and you can build it up if you like. I've been using it for over a year now and I've never had a problem with it smudging or transferring to my upper eyelids. It also doesn't harden on your eyelashes so it is easy to curl them with an eyelash curler after you've applied the mascara if you need to, and it's easy to remove with eye makeup remover.
Best Mascara and Mascara brush! I love it! Use it all the time. Really lengthens and adds volume.
I love this mascara. I got a deluxe size sample and LOVED IT. So I purchased the original size. Still love my Benefit, Theyre Real. But this Buxom is slightly better.
Very nice mascara, makes your lashes look long and thick. Would definitely recommend this product and will be purchasing again.
Buxom Lash is clean going on, lasts all day and lengthens my light lashes to my heart's desire. I love this stuff!

At first I thought this mascara was smudgy, but turned out to be user error (too much eye cream). I generally avoid high end mascaras, because others, like CG Lash Blast, work well. But this is RIDICULOUS!!! One or two coats = multiple coats of others. Will repurchase.

I have WHITE eyelashes and I am always on the hunt for what will coat them without fail and offer length and volume...this does that for me without clumping. I tend to re-apply throughout the day, and it allows me to do so without looking like spiders have made my eyes their resting place....I am impulsive make-up addict and am always looking for the next best thing...but I keep coming back to this after trying others.
I'm on my second tube of this mascara and its still my favorite. It adds volume to even the smallest lash and even lengthens a bit. Also, it doesn't cost an arm and a leg and last a good while.
I am blessed with good lashes.. it does not take much to make them fluff. this mascara was lifeless.. i needed 4 or 5 coats for min. effect..

reviews.review_title: you better sit yourself down before you try this
reviews.review_text: Lemme just tell you a little about this mascara… IT HAS CHANGED MY MAKEUP GAME FOR LIFE. Upon applying this ambrosia of the gods, I transform from a 4th grade boy to the likes Katy Perry. The brush essentially separates every lash and guides it into glorious lash puberty. I don't understand why this product has made national headlines and / or made a nobel prize.
I love this mascara !!! It adds great volume and length . There's no need for any type of false eyelashes ✊

I received a deluxe sample of this in one of the Sephora holiday bags, and I'm so happy with it, I purchased a full size. It lengthens and volumizes my lashes without being clumpy or too heavy. It lasts all day without flaking, unless I rub my eyes. Washes off easily but also cries off easily.
This is my favorite mascara. It leave my lashes looking long and full.
Always get compliments about my lashes- thanks to Buxom!!!
Bought this when my other Buxom mascara was out of stock and I've been really pleased! Adds great length and volume but doesn't clump up either.

I am a mascara junkie, and would normally have a minimum of 5 different mascaras in my make-up bag at all times. This mascara has changed all of that!  Most mascaras nowadays need to be built up until the desired look is achieved, and not to let dry in between coats. This mascara DOES require you to let dry in between coats, so it makes application a little slower, but the results are so worth it! This mascara is so buildable, and I have yet to have it clump up on me. The formula + the brush work seamlessly together to create defined lashes for everyday, or va-va-voom when you feel like it.  The only con is that I do get raccoon eyes towards the end of the day, but with skin as oily as mine, this doesn't bother me. On the up side there is NO flaking.
It is long lasting, does not clump and also does not hurt my eyes- most mascaras I cannot wear since I have very sensitive skin but i have only minimal problems with this. easy to apply.

reviews.review_title: Long Defined Lashes - No Clumps found here!
reviews.review_text: I have tried literally every mascara on the market, both by purchasing myself and by the samples I'm given as a VIB Rouge Member. Thank goodness because this was a sample and I'll never use another mascara. I have very long thick lashes naturally. Yes, we have issues, too - clumping! They get so long so fast & look like tarantula legs - but not with Buxom Lash! They are even longer, defined, and wispy - each lash beautifully separated! The brush is pretty amazing, too. My search is over!

No clumps, no flakes, easy to remove. It really singles out each lash so it's not fake looking. I live the wand and the formula. I've been using this for quite some time now and am completely satisfied.
Long wearing, doesn't EVER clump, provides tons of volume to my lashes! I swear by it! No issues! And the tube doesn't dry out quickly like other brands.
I love love love this mascara! I have this one and the waterproof version. I love them both as they don't clump, even as they get older.

Love, love love this mascara. I have been searching for the perfect mascara to use with my favorite mascara base and this is it. I don't usually like the rubbery bristled wands, but this one is amazing. No clumps, gets all my lashes, with awesome volume and length! Now if only they would start making it in other colors or waterproof!
Love, love, love this mascara. I have short lashes and this gives them volume and length.
I LOOOVE this mascara! it works really good!! And actually it's CHEAPER to buy 2 baby tubes than 1 big tube... you pay just an extra dollar but you get more product...
My eyelashes look so much healthier since I started using this mascara. It's defining, thickening, lengthening, volumizing... It does everything! They even curl better!

Got this mascara as a sample, first time I use a Buxom product and I'm completely satisfied. Gives awesome length, volume, color is very black and no clumps. I will be buying the full size once I run out.
Best mascara I've ever tired. No clumps, gives volume, very easy application. No cons at all.
I got this as a sample in LashStash Box. I tried so many mascaras, and this is the BEST MASCARA EVER!
I have finally found my favorite mascara! Lengthens, volumizes, doesn't flake - it's perfect.
Great mascara!! Fills your eyelashes, makes them look very full.

reviews.review_title: love the mascara not a big fan of the brush
reviews.review_text: the mascara is actually amazing. it's really black and lasts the whole night without flaking. i've been buying this for years now because i love the product so much. the one thing that bothers me to my core is the brush. the bristle's are barley there however it doesn't stop me from buying the product. i suggest you go in stores to try it out before buying it online.
This is one of the best mascaras that I have ever used! It makes my eyelashes look fantastic. I bought the travel size because I was skeptical of the reviews. I will be purchasing the full size.

reviews.review_title: I love the way my lashes look...
reviews.review_text: It looks pretty because it lengthens and defines but it runs only after a few hours, leaving smudges underneath my eyes.

This is the only mascara I use. I have been given samples of this as well as others, and nothing compares. The brush grabs every lash , separates it and makes my lashes look flawless, without that fake lash look.

Got this as a sample on one of my orders. It's seriously the BEST mascara I've ever used. The wand is long and shaped kind of like an S. This gives ALL of your lashes lift and length. It stays on all day, no need to reapply like the brand I was using. I very highly recommend this. I now have two samples of this which will hopefully last me a looong time. But, when they run out I intend on buying more :). Not going back to the drugstore brand.

reviews.review_title: Great for my short and straight Asian lashes
reviews.review_text: It feels like I have tried every high end and drugstore brand mascara trying to find something that gives me any oomph to my short, sparse, and straight lashes. This is the best mascara so far in my hunt when used with my Shiseido eyelash curler. It really gives me volume, some length, maintains curl, and it doesn't flake or smudge. I love that it comes in the smaller trial size as well. I bought it for all my friends for Christmas.
I liked the way it looked on my lashes. I HATED the way it smeared onto my face during a workout & soccer games. Maybe getting the waterproof would have helped this?
I own this mascara & I absolutely love it. It works well ☆☆☆
Love! This is the best mascara ever! I always keep going back to it. Not so crazy about the water proof one.

I have been using Buxom lash for over 6 years. A couple of times I have tried the newer released mascaras, and ALWAYS end up coming back to this one. It lengthens, thickens and separates better than any other !

reviews.review_title: One of the Best Mascaras Ever
reviews.review_text: I was expecting this mascara to not work very well, but was very surprised when I used it. This doesn't clump. It adds volume and length while still making your lashes look very natural. Love!

I received a sample of this mascara in the Lash Stash holiday set. It left my lashes looking very natural, like they normally would without any product. However it did provide color and intensity, which I liked. I'll definitely be grabbing for this mascara when I want something quick and natural to throw on!
Great mascara that dries quickly! Finally a mascara that doesn't clump and lasts all day.

I used this the first time when I received it as a sample. It is the BEST mascara I've ever used. It really bulks up and lengthens my lashes without having to use much product. Like another reviewer, I also tried Diorshow and quickly came back to Buxom Lash.
TODAY IS THE DAY I buy this full size. fluffly long and thick lashes you get when you use this! the brush is so soft other mascara hurt when I put on this I feel like a whole another person

I stray from this mascara only to be reminded nothing else makes me happy. Doesn't clump, smudge, flake, or irritate - can't say that about too many things in life can we? This mascara is a deep black. It defines my lashes and lengthens them, with some volumizing. I've never found a product that actually volumizes the way it claims which doesn't also make my lashes look ridiculous. Solid, no fail everyday mascara here.
I've tried countless mascaras and always go back to this one. It does everything it claims it does! Love it!
This mascara is great!! I love how it gets each individual lash and doesn't clump!!

After cheating on my Buxom with Diorshow, I am crawling back and begging for forgiveness. This mascara is clump-free, non-flaky, lengthens, darkens, volumizes and doesn't smell like anything. The brush stays clean and the gel-like formula doesn't get dry. I now know just how good I had it, and I'm hoping you'll take me back.

Hands down, this is the best mascara EVER! I have tried sooo many mascaras and some were okay, or good at best. This one is fantastic! The lashes on my left eye grow in a different pattern than the ones on my right eye, and this is the only mascara that has been able to even them out with no clumps. The brush works great vertically or horizontally and this stuff lasts longer than most, too!

At first I wasn't convinced, but after trying to switch back to my regular mascara when my sample ran out, i realized how amazing this product it. My lashes look so long, but never clumpy. It is so easy to apply.
This mascara does it all, lengthens, curls, volumizes, just PERFECTS. It's the one I always come back to and I would totally recommend!!
Always consistent! Doesn't clump. Builds so wells. Can make my lashes way longer. I've tried many others but always go back to this one.

A few months ago I saw a girl review about 15 different mascaras on Reddit, and the Buxom review looked the best. I'd never heard of Buxom before - Benefit had always been my favorite - So i decided to buy the little 10 dollar tube. I am SO happy I did! it doesn't feel heavy, or sticky and it doesn't clump.  keep note that is isn't a waterproof mascara, don't expect it to be!  My only issue with it right now is the way all the mascara kinda clumps on the brush, but I think that might be a user error. I am going to try letting the mascara warm up by putting the tube in hot water, and then washing the brush to see if that helps any.

I got a sample size of this in a cybermonday bag at first i was skeptical since i only use tartes mascara but when i used this it made my lashes 10x better i love it soooo much and it makes my eyes appear wider <3 tottally will recomend this to anyone <3
I love this mascara for 3 reasons. 1. You can build on it. Long lashes to BAM lashes. 2. Doesn't irritate my eyes. 3. Isn't clumpy. At all.  It's a lovely product. Worth every penny.

reviews.review_title: One of the Best Mascaras Out There!
reviews.review_text: I recently had the opportunity to try this mascara and it was love at first use. I usually use Benefit's They're Real Mascara or Tarte's Gifted Amazonian Clay Smart Mascara and I love both these mascaras but Buxom Lash is just as good if not better. It is most comparable to Benefit's They're Real in terms of the results it gives. Buxom Lash glides on effortlessly and builds extreme volume, lenghthens, and holds all day. I haven't had flaking or anything and my lashes look beautiful and full all day long. Buxom Lash is definitely my latest, greatest addition to my mascara arsenal. It is one of the best on the market in my opinion. I will definitely be repurchasing this and recommending it to others.

For me, this mascara is by no means a holy grail for volumizing or thickening. But, like the title says, it enhances the natural shape of my lashes beautifully. It gives a really nice whispy effect and makes my lashes fuller, but at the same time like I'm not wearing any mascara, which I love for low-key days. I throw on a couple coats of this stuff when I'm not in the mood to wear much eye makeup and it wakes me right up! Looks very natural, not clumpy in the least bit.  If you're looking for something that'll give you really dark, bold lashes - I wouldn't recommend this. But it's perfect for an everyday mascara!
I love this mascara! I feel like it makes my lashes look much thicker and darker,a s well as lengthening them. I like how it doesn't make my lashes feel stiff either.

I have tried every mascara. I finally bought the lash sampler from Sephora where you get supersized samples of their best sellers. That's where I fell in love with Buxom. It makes my lashes longer and fuller and doesn't clump or flake and it holds a curl. I really can't gush enough. Even my friends have made the switch! Please don't ever stop making this!!!

This mascara is as close to perfect as a mascara can be. It's buildable and three light layers makes a very natural, yet long and voluminous look-never clumpy The brush is fantastic (and I don't like rubber brushes in mascara) and gets every lash, corner-to-corner. You can also use the end of the brush to fill-in and it works really well that way. It holds a curl pretty decently (my eyelashes are straight and require an eyelash curler).If the curl relaxes a bit as the day goes on, you can re-curl without your lashes sticking to the eyelash curler or losing lashes. Buxom Lash also does not have a nasty, chemical smell. It smells faintly pleasant. My eyes are sensitive and it does not make them red or irritated and most mascaras do. Buxom Lash is the total package!! You will never regret the purchase and if you want to try it, the .20 size still has the full-sized brush, just on a a shorter wand. It still works fabulously and seems to last quite a while. Treat yourself to great-feeling, great-looking, naturally thick and voluminous lashes that last.

I LOVE LOVE LOVE this mascara! My lashes are very little and thin without make up. BUXOM makes them look exactly opposite. My lashes look full, dark, and long. I have been wearing this mascara for years. I have tried to switch it up from time to time, but I always seem to come back to my BUXOM black mascara. I get compliments all the time when I am wearing it. I will never try another. This mascara is a must have! It is long lasting, volumizing, and lengthening. My favorite it that the tube last forever. It doesn't clump and dry out after having the mascara for too long.

I love this mascara! First, it really darkens lashes. It separates while volumizing, which is a tough combination to find! It leaves my lashes looking long and lush without looking like an overdone drag queen. Love it. I'm going to try the waterproof formula next.

WOW! Best mascara out there--and I've tried almost all of them. I bought this side-to-side with It's Real! and I ended up using Buxom way more. I love the brush--it allows for fast application, and thick, separated lashes. My lower lashes also look great with this. It has NO NO NO clumps, even after a few weeks of use. Nice fluffy result. Black. I also like that you can buy the small bottle for the same price per volume because that makes it even easier to avoid clumps (all mascaras clump after long-term air exposure).

reviews.review_title: I Can Always Count on This
reviews.review_text: I try other brands and yet I always come back to Buxom. It is great for volume and fullness and great dark color. The brush gets in all the tight places.
This mascara is my all time favorite. It gives you beautiful long thick lashes with out the dull clumpy look. The feel of the formula is smooth and flawless.
Love this mascara. Will be buying the full size next time.
I love that buxom comes in a mini size. Perfect for a stocking stuffer!!! This is a great way to try Buxom without committing to the full size.

Buxom is one of my favorite go to mascara's. It always helps my lashes look fanned out and thicker. This is not a super thick or glumpy mascara so it's great for a more natural look or for those mornings I'm in a rush and don't have time to play around with clupms. One coat is great for me, my mom does two and gets some pretty BIG lashes!

I received this in a collection set that came with some Bare Minerals makeup. My daughter's (15 & 22) discovered it and have raved about it since. Bare Minerals or Bare Escentials no longer carry Buxom so I ordered it from Sephora. This is a great product that covers well. I can't say how long it lasts since I buy it for them. This will be one of their Christmas gifts. They will each have their own.

I have tried all sorts of mascara's. this stuff beats them all! The brush isn't a typical brush, it's softer & more flexible but is still firm. The tip of the brush works bey well on my bottom lashes. It really does apply very well, does not clump and adds major volume. This stuff is better than Lancôme, Benefit They're real! And Estée. I picked up a small bottle for $10 and I'm so glad I did. Where has this stuff been all my life?!?!

This mascara is the best I have had in a really long time. I have tried many different ones including clinique, dior, sephora brand, and a benefit one, but none matcch up to this one. This one is amazing. Does not clump, does not put too much on the lash.
Love this mascara. Always used the pink/green one but this has replaced it. Will definitely continue ordering.
I've tried so many products and this one is great for sensitive eyes and does not make lashes sticky and look clumped

I have naturally long eyelashes so most mascaras work fine for me. I got this as a sample with my last Sephora purchase and will be buying the regular tube. This mascara is the BEST. It doesn't clump, makes my lashes look longer, and is easy to apply. If you're reading this....just go for it and buy it. It's worth it!

reviews.review_title: Love it- but it goes dry fast
reviews.review_text: I have tried other mascara's and I go back to Buxom. It is awesome for making lashes full and long. The only issue I have with the product is it drys out very fast.
Makes my lashes look great!

WOW. Temptalia's readers choice awards prompted me to buy this, and I am incredibly impressed. The effect is soft, luscious lashes that are long and volumized. It wears all day without smudging, and unless you cry or jump in a pool it's not going anywhere. I will repurchase forever!

I love using this mascara because it doesn't clump or make your lashes stick together. It has a curved brush that help get every little lash coated and gives you a nice, even application. Also, the price isn't too bad.
Picked up the sample size at the check out counter. It's fantastic! It's become my go-to mascara for providing defined, full lashes.
This is a nice mascara, but not worth the price in my opinion. I've used better mascaras from the drug store.

I LOVE the silver tubed buxom mascara (with all my heart, recommend it through and through). But this one pales in comparison. I guess its not bad... I originally bought it because I thought it was a mini version of the silver tube. Sad day.
My new favorite mascara! It feels very soft when applying and it doesn't appear super super excessive - it's very much like a 'your lashes but better' sort of product.
This is one of my favorite mascaras! I love how it separates and defines. If I want a little more drama I add some Dior show blackout and they work perfect together!
I really do like this - it's lengthening and volumizing. However, it's awfully messy. There are other great mascaras out there for cheaper and NOT messy. Not worth the money

i love love love this mascara. there are a lot of mascara out there in the world, when you find a good one you hold on to it and tell everyone you know because it's that kind of love. i don't have a lot in my daily makeup routine a little bit of brow liner and a little bit of mascara. I am never disappointed when i use this mascara. it gives my lashes and face a wonderful energizing lift. the best secret perk is that you won't look like a raccoon the next day if you happen to forget to take it off.highly recommend! no regrets

I got the mini size because I wanted to try out a new mascara, and a friend recommended this to me. I LOVE IT. I will definitely be buying a full size once this runs out. It does not clump, smear, run, or dry weirdly. These days I keep it in my bag all day if I want to add another later-day layer.
Hands down my favorite mascara ever. Fastest application, smooth formula, no clumping. GREAT brush. I will never stray.
My eyelashes look like false lashes. I have allergies and this mascara wears well. It is one of the best mascara on the market.
my all time favorite mascara ever. I use this in combination with my too faced lashgasm mascara. between the two of them my lashes are gorgeously lengthened, volumized, and separated. best!!
The absolute best mascara out there...hands down!
It separates, volumizes, lengthens, and stays in place all day. The brush prevents clumping, and the price is incredible.
this mascara is a great combination of separating, volumizing, and extending. I love how it gives me a dramatic but not fake look combined with my tarte eyelash curler.

This is, by far and away, one of the best mascaras I've ever used. It beats other hyped-up plastic applicator mascaras like Benefit's They're Real (terrible at holding volume unless you use like 5 coats- though admittedly an effective mascara once you do) and Tarte's Lights, Camera, Lashes (I hate hate hate this mascara- poor lengthening, even poorer volumizing, and it itches my eyelids to boot). Buxom's mascara holds curl beautifully, lengthens instantly, and provides heaps of volume. I will say it is somewhat lacking when it comes to thickening, and too many coats and you get this schwoopy eyelash effect that makes the tip of each eyelash point in different directions. That aside, it's a truly wonderful daytime mascara, and if you want thickening and extra drama in the evening, it's easy to do a layer of your favorite thickening mascara, as Buxom Lash acts as a flawless base!
Love this! I have short lashes and this creates length and volume without looking fake. Apply 2-3 coats for perfect look. Beats Benefit and Lancome 100%.
I've tried them all and this is one of the best. It lengthens without clumping.

I really like this mascara. It doesn't hurt my eyes. I was using the Lancome Hypnose for years and it started to make my eyes sting lately so I switched. Only thing is that the brush is kind of large and takes getting used to.
I LOVE Buxom mascara. I swear it makes my eyelashes grow.
Best mascara I've used and a really good price too. Not too heavy
I got a sample with my order and its the best mascara I own. It goes on beautifully and I love that is a dark black color. The price is nice to ;)
Love it!!! I have no clumps and gives beautiful volume... I totally recommend it to a friends and everybody...
I've tried so many mascaras but this is definitely my favorite of all time! It would upset me to no end if they discontinue this mascara! Here's to hoping they won't! Again, best mascara ever!!

I have tried loads of mascaras from drugstore to designer, and the Boxom Lash always comes back as my favorite. It has everything I want in a mascara...the formula is thick, yet it does not clump and it makes my lashes both miles long and full of volume. You do have to be careful to put the lid on tightly however as it dries out rather quickly otherwise.
This mascara is one of my favorites. The brush makes clumps nearly impossible and it gives my lashes a voluminous look without making them look too over the top.

I absolutely love this mascara! It goes on soft and velvety. It stays on all day long. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars was that I don't like the way the tube doesn't scrape excess mascara off before you remove the wand to use. It leaves little globs of masacara on the applicator. No biggie though - just scrape the excess off on the top of the tube and it will go back in when you put the wand back in.
I would like this much better if it were a real brush instead of plastic. Good for the price.

I bought the sample size to try and I LOVE this mascara. The brush is full and soft, and the wand has some give so that you don't poke your eyes out. The brush shape allows for a super natural looking eyelash. I have oily skin and the mascara doesn't rub off, which is nice, cuz I hate raccoon eyes!

I'm a huge fan of this mascara. The application is wonderful and it's a great price! My favorite thing about it is that it doesn't smudge under my eyes, like a lot of other mascara. My eyelashes are pretty long, and this product does a great job at further lengthening them.

This BRUSH is amaaaazing! The shape will get every lash without getting your eyes covered in mascara. The length is so different that even my friends can tell whether or not I'm wearing this one versus another mascara. I use this one for going out though because it is SO defining and my light features have a hard time looking conservative with long dark lashes. I would DEFINITELY recommend!
This is my holy grail of mascara. It's perfect. Lengthens and does not clump making my lashes look unbelievable. Stays on all day, no flakes!

I really like this mascara. It does a fantastic job of separating each lash and adds considerable length without making my lashes stiff or heavy. Even after three coats there was no clumping.
