When applying, I found I got better results from stroking up with the brush rather than doing the usual zigzag motion. It isn't waterproof, but there was very minimal smudging even after wearing it all day. The only thing that keeps me from using it more often is the fact that it takes a while to dry as compared to other mascaras so it's not something I could swipe on as I'm heading out the door without creating a mess on my face.

This product is my holy grail! I use it everyday and my lashes are SUPER long and full they looked better than my sister false lashes (the more natural looking ones) It has a very build able formula that allows you to have remarkably long lashes without it getting clumpy. I would and have recommended this product.
I found that it was difficult to grip my lashes with this wand and it sort of made a mess.. The formula is great but the brush could use some work

reviews.review_title: My one and only mascara now
reviews.review_text: I got a sample of this and was amazed. I have short dark lashes but these amplified my lash and lasted through out my work day. It does not run or smear and it does not clump. Thank you Buxom

Initially I hated this mascara. It was wet, went on my lashes sheer. But I went back to it a month later when it had a chance to dry a bit. Now I'm on my 4th tube. It lengthens without any fall out at the end of the day. It holds a curl and and does not clump. This brush is money. It's a plastic brush with unique short and long bristles that defines each lash. It's not water proof though and it's harder to work with when it's wet. But I usually layer this with Benefit It's Real until the formula had a chance to age. And the water proofing is solved with the lash genius. Also good for lower lashes. The waterproof formula is not the same.

I have very long lashes naturally, and prefer mascara that defines and volumizes more than lengthening. This mascara is great for that, and the brush design is good. I really like the formula of this, it feels light on while still getting the job done. Other mascaras i have tried (benefit bad gal and they're real, stila, tart) all seem to thicken and harden and feel like they damage my lashes, sometimes breaking the ends and are hard to get off. I do not have this problem with those. One of my other favorites is the mascara from Fresh, and this is similar to that in my opinion.
Beautiful mascara! Really defining and has no clumps! Love the brush too!
This is the best mascara I've ever tried!!! Love it! My only complaint is that it uses up more quickly than most other mascaras. Toward the end of tube, goes on really thin. But I adore I!

This is the only mascara I ever use and will ever use. I buy two at a time when I stop in to a Sephora. I have thin lashes and this is the only mascara that curls and separates, volumizes and lengthens. You have to play around with it and find the technique that works for you, I personally curl my lashes, do multiple coats at a time, dry for a few min, then extra coats for good luck loll but that's what you can do with this mascara the formula is so workable and doesn't dry stiff and flakey. GO STOCK UP.
at first i didnt really like it but i tried it again because i had t he sample size and i love it! i love the sample sizes they make!
at first i didnt really like it but i tried it again because i had t he sample size and i love it! i love the sample sizes they make!

Volumizing and lengthining!!! How could a mascara possibly be so cheap but work so great!!! It looks sooo natural on my eyes!!! I love this mascara so much!!! I don't know why this doesn't get raved reviews on youtube! It makes my lashes look long with out having to curl my lashes!

I got a sample size and i instantly loved it! It made my lashes look fuller, while keeping it looking real with no clumps! It amazing in that aspect.  However, I have stingy asian lashes that naturally points downwards, so this does not hold up curls as well as others (esp. waterproof).  I still use this, especially for my more natural looks and would still recommend :D

I received the Buxom Lash mascara in a sample size and instantly fell in love! The brush is perfect! Gives great length and coverage without clumping due to its design. I'm currently working through a sample of Benefit's They're Real Mascara and it clumps so bad I'm about to throw it out and buy a full size of Buxom Lash! Also, doesn't flake off throughout the day and lasts me through 9-5pm at work and a 3hr class after!  Great Mascara, highly recommend if you're looking for length and definition and stay power.

Just tried this today and I love it! Makes lashes fuller. The blackest black you can find. The brush is awesome and keeps the amount of mascara limited so its doesn't clump. All in all its a good, solid product.
Easy to use, nice brush, gives my eyelashes a nice, full look. love it

I'm asian American and have short and straight lashes. After curling them as much as I can and applying this sample mascara I got, my lashes are beautiful. My favorite mascara is currently Blinc but I would recommend this awesome mascara to anyone.

I got the sample today. It does not give me any volume or length and it flaked badly for a few hours until almost everything came off. There are numerous drugstore mascaras that does much better than this. I do not recommend.

My lashes are HUGE with this mascara. They are also darker than normal. They are not entirely separated and a bit sticky. The brush is very big but flexible--I like it. Overall I would buy again, but I'll apply with a lighter hand to avoid stickiness.
Nice mascara ! Goes on easily and doesn't clump. A bit hard to get off though.

I adore this mascara, and I know mascara. It's not heavy and thick, but gives good length, definition, and gets every little lash. The effect is fluttery, super-femme lashes. The only potential problem I could see is if you have small or deep-set eyes, the huge brush might be unwieldy.
I got this one in a set. 5 different mascara's to try and the one you like you get a full size. Never thought a mascara can be this good. I will buy it again
Seriously, the best mascara I have ever put my hands on. Doesn't clump, doesn't make me want to itch my eyes all day!

reviews.review_title: Bring on the long, full lashes!
reviews.review_text: The first time I used this mascara I already knew I loved this product! The brush easily gets the small lashes without having to apply numerous coats and ending up with a clumpy look. People have actually asked me if my eyelashes were real because they looked so long and full :) I highly recommend!
Best mascara out there! Totally worth the $
this is a great mascara!! I have bought it several times, I like it that much.
Just underwhelming. Not worth the money.

I like the natural separated long look, and with one coat of this I achieve that and I love it! I don't really think the description is what it is because I think its more lengthening that volumizing. I have longish lashes and this because makes them look long and separated. So if you are looking for a dramatically volumizing mascara I would look somewhere else but for lengthening and defining you should check this out!
Love, love, love this mascara! gives lots of curl and lengthens great. On my third tube, have tried benefit and other comparable brands, nothing compares.

Buxom has made my lashes look amazing- and they are straight and short with very little bend. A quick curl and coat or two of this great product will do the trick. No clumping at all- its got my vote.

I thought this would really make my lashes pop, but honestly, I feel pretty neutral about it, especially for the price. Not impressed at all and it runs to my lower lids by the end of a night and smudges at the corners of my eyes. If you want something better, go with 'they're Real! Benefit mascara. It adds more volume and stays better.

I really love this stuff. I have been buying it for a few years now. Sometimes I try something new. Before too long I find myself setting that tube aside and reaching for this one. I like it even better in the travel size.
This mascara does not clump at all and the price is excellent. Fabulous length, easy to apply.
They make my eyelash look so voluminous and long I love it. I wouldn't use any other type of mascara.
I don't like this mascara at all, sorry.. It's too watery, no volume or curl.. just no..

I have to say I loved BadGAl but since using the Buxom I find my lashes do not break anymore....longer and healthier bonus to a great looking mascara that wears well and defines. I truly didn't expect my lashes to grow while using but I will take it.(I have very fine average length lashes that for awhile were disappearing)
I really like this mascara, it really make my lashes look fuller and bigger. And its enriched with vitamins! so it really helps nourish the lashes, compared to other mascara! Does not smudge on me :)

This is a holy grail layering mascara!! You can use any mascara you like as the base mascara and then use this as the second one and it absolutely banishes clumpy lashes!! It makes my mascara perfect every time and I will continue to repurchase even though I am usually against high end mascaras!!!
I love fine bristles on this brush. It separates every single lash and when it's time for it to come off it doesn't leave residue like other mascara I've tried in the past.

I have used this mascara for about a year and when I got my newest one, it seemed super different and it clumped a lot and was not as waterproof at all (I got the waterproof version) it really disappointed me because now I have to find a new favorite. I don't know why it worked for so long and doesn't anymore.... Maybe a new formula...?

After reading all of the 5 star reviews on this mascara, I had high expectations. I'm really disappointed! The quality of this mascara is that of a drug store mascara. I feel like it goes on really thin so I have to add several layers until I get the look I normally have. Will not buy again.

What happened to this mascara? It used to be my favorite but the last 2 times I purchased it, something is different. It clumps and my lashes look awful. Very disappointed because I have been using it for years and don't know what to do now.
Okay, I've used mascara before not knowing what its purpose is. Then, I've used it purposefully, in hopes that it does what I want it to do. And ladies, this mascara does what it is supposed to do.
this is the best mascara ever! I'll never use another breand.

This mascara is awesome! It is gentle, separates lashes beautifully, and very buildable. I can apply 3-4 coats easily without it clumping. The brush catches each and every lash fanning them out to perfection. This mascara is great for day and night. Can't go wrong, seriously! I buy 2 at a time just to be safe!
By far the best mascara I have ever used. It goes on very nice and it lasts all day. I would recommend this mascara to anyone!

I like to try different types of mascaras to test out the perfect one for me. I picked up this one thinking this would be good, but all it does is separate my lashes. The mascara smears and doesn't give volume. I usually end up having to use this to separate the lashes then go over them with a different mascara to achieve length and volume. What a waste of $20.

I love this mascara I just wish it was waterproof. Also, it actually works better once it ages a bit. I find that it clumps too much when it is new. Great product though. I love a mascara that adds length and volume.

This gives my lashes length and a bit of volume. Perfect for everyday wear. I've been looking for the perfect staple mascara and this is it. Sometimes I don't want the false lash look, but I still want my lashes to stand out. This does exactly that. It's also not clumpy! Love love love!
Some people have a shoe fetish. I have a mascara fetish. This is hands down my absolute favorite, and I've tried everything.

reviews.review_title: Handsdown the best mascara out there
reviews.review_text: Love this product, it lasts all day but is gentle. Gives great volume and it is nice and dark on the lashes. Hope they never change it!
This by far is the best mascara I've used. The brush is perfect, the mascara doesn't clump and it stays on all day. Thank god for finally finding a good mascara!!

I bought a mini version of this at the checkout as I had heard great things and I figured I could use it on the go. I was FLOORED by this mascara - the brush is enormous which I love and it gave me such an open eyed look with tons of volume and length!! Will be going back to purchase the full size!!!
I love this buildable mascara. I use a couple of coats and it never clumps, makes my eyes pop an its not sticky!  absolutely recommend
Great hold, nice volume and a really good brush. This is in my top five mascaras.

I've tried many mascaras over the years, and this is one I originally purchased in the travel size on whim, thinking I'd never need it again. I finally purchased the full size, and there's no waiting period like some other mascaras (some that need to be dried out, etc). It makes my lashes look naturally beautiful. I'm a teacher and my students are sure to tell me when I look off key... this they like. I've tried drugstore and high end, and I'll be purchasing this again.
I don't see the difference between this Buxom Lash mascara & a regular mascara from the drugstore. Sorry but its the truth. Does not really give the eyelashes a volume.

I have thin and few lashes. When I was told about this product I didn't believe them. Especially for the price. But then I bought it, this mascara makes my lashes look longer thinker ans voluminous. I ran out of it and i have tried the regular ten dollar ones and I just need to stop wasting money and buy this one again.

This is my ABSOLUTE fav mascara! I have been wearing it for about a year now, since when I first discovered it. I have long lashes that are pretty straight, but this mascara does a great job of building volume, lengthing and adding shape (curl)...I have even had people ask me if I have falsh lashes on or got extensions...it's THAT good! I like my lashes clumpy (I know), so what I do is add a coat, let it dry, add another, and if I have time I'll add one more for a total of three. Even after three coats, it looks good!

This mascara does what I need it to do. It gives my lashes a good boost and stays where I put it. I hated getting raccoon eyes and clumps, so it was really refreshing when I tried this one and it worked out.

reviews.review_title: One of my favorite high-end mascaras
reviews.review_text: This is a great volumizing mascara that also provides a decent amount of length. It is one of the high-end mascaras that I go back to time and time again. However, I find that it dries out relatively quickly - unlike most mascaras, I like to use this one when it is new, when the formula is wet. It gets too clumpy for me around 1.5 months in. Still, it makes my short, straight lashes look great, and I do love it.
This is great for amazing volume. I have tried a lot of others but nothing compares to Buxom Lash!!

For the price you get a lot. It works really well, it doesn't clump or flake. The only reason that I don't give it 5 stars is because the plastic bristles on the mascara wand hurt if they touch you water line when applying,
This mascara is one of so many that I have tried in the last 6 months and is one of my favorites..it's a close second to benefits they're real..makes my lashes fuller instantly
This product noticeably makes my lashes fuller and stays on all day!

This is the BEST mascara ever!!! I have long eyelashes and this makes them even longer and doesn't clump! (Woo!) Anyways, I love this because it doesn't run off my eyelashes when it's raining, it moisturizes my lashes, and it lengthens and volumizes like it says! It's amazing mascara, everything else bales in comparison. By far the best!! :D

This mascara is one of my favorites (especially for the price). It doesn't flake, it hardly ever causes raccoon eyes (unless I've been laugh-crying), and it is easy to apply. It also does wonders for my blonde lashes! This lasts for ages before drying out and becoming unusable.
Creates volume and length. Flakes Easily. Not as black as other expensive mascaras.

I feel like my eyes look beautiful with this on them. The applicator is amazing and does a great job of seperating the lashes and fanning them out. This is very similar to Yes, they're real from benefit.
The applicator is great, separates each lash to spread them out, and never clumps! Really opens your eyes. One coat for daily use, multiple for a night look.

reviews.review_title: I like big lashes and I cannot lie
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this mascara! I stopped using it and went to benifits they're real mascara but it would irritate my eye because the application brush was just way to intense. But I'm so glad I'm back to using this!
If you're looking for length then this is the mascara for you! I love long defined lashes and buxom definitely delivered. I recommend to everyone I know!

Love love love this mascara. Doesn't clump, thickens and lengthens. I received this as a sample and used it completely up. Tried a few different cheaper and more expensive brands but eventually came back to what worked!
I'm pretty fussy about mascara. It has to do all the work for me. Separates the lashes, gives length and volume and no clumps!
This mascara is now one of my favorites! I love the brush and the deep color! Also, it makes my eyelashes look super full and amazing! Does clump sometimes, but i would definitely recommended!
love it!! love it!! love it! Loooooooove itttttt!
Whoever said drugstore mascara is always better has obviously never tried this. Only mascara I have ever used that has made my lashes look how I want them!
Finally after trying dozens of mascaras, I found one that I want to keep buying. This mascara makes my fine lashes look dramatic and it applies quicker than any other I've had. Love it!

reviews.review_title: Gives length and definition, but not much volume
reviews.review_text: I like almost a false lash look. This mascara really defines the lashes and makes them look long, but it's really more of a natural look than I prefer.

I love this stuff! If you put on tons of mascara like me, this stuff is perfect! It volumizes while separating each lash for huge natural looking lashes! I'll take this over benefits they're real mascara any day!
I've used every possible mascara from the cheap to the ridiculously expensive. I LOVE LOVE this mascara!

I picked up this travel-sized mascara recently and was impressed after my first use! I have EXTREMELY skimpy lashes and this mascara gave me total volume without feeling heavy, nor did it get clumpy or flaky after putting on 3 layers! I've always had issues with mascara formula but I am pleasantly surprised with this product. It even gave me a little length! I would definitely recommend this mascara!
Really love this mascara. Black and full and waterproof lashes all day.

I didn't notice a huge difference in volume compared to any other mascara but what I love about this mascara is the brush. I've found that what really makes the difference in a good mascara is the brush and this brush doesn't clump or give you spider leg looking lashes.

This is my Go To mascara. No matter what other brands I try, nothing makes my lashes as long and full as this one. It goes on thin, not clumping up on my lashes, making it look like I have real lashes. Love it.
I like this mascara, it makes my lashes long and lush, but I noticed it runs a little in the corners of my eye and down to the lower lash line. It's also a bit hard to remove.
I love this mascara!!! I have thin eyelashes and this definitely gives me the volume without the clumps.
Fist mascara ever you felt like you've nothing on. It's easy to apply and makes my eyes pop. I'm so in love with it.
I never write reviews and do tons of online shopping, this is the BEST mascara for the $$! Received the sample and it's been my go to in the make up bag - now buying the real deal.
This is a great mascara all around! Good brush, doesn't flake, easy on and off, looks and feels great on lashes. Well worth the sticker price.

I have tried many, many mascaras... From Loreal to Lancôme and everything in between. Until thanks to the beauty insider program that Sephora offers I got a sample of this mascara and I fell in love! I have to use an eyelash curler because my lashes have no curl whatsoever and other mascaras always either weigh my lashes down or clump horribly. This one not only does it keep my lashes curled but they also look amazingly long throughout the day. I will be definitely be purchasing this mascara over and over and hoping this line never discontinues this product!
After trying a sample size I have bought this over and over again and is my hi to mascara!

I think this is the best deal out there. This mascara isn't as expensive and works way better than many others at a much higher price. You will definitely notice a difference on your lashes. They are so black and long and don't clump. I love it. I am not a big fan of bare minerals but this product I will buy again.
love this mascara, makes my eyelashes look long, and its long lasting

First off- Am I the only one who didn't know this line was by Bare Escentuals?? In honesty, I wouldn't have purchased it if I'd known ahead of time, just because BE isn't exactly known for their mascara. I worked for them years ago, and their mascara wasn't bad, just a bit old-school. (just a generic wand, nothing great) This stuff, however, is fantastic. Glad I was fooled!  It did take a while to get used to it, the beginning couple of days were met with some goopy application, but thankfully nothing I haven't faced before even with premium mascara... it wasn't clumpy or hard upon application.  What I love about this mascara is that it defines and also bulks up my fair lashes. I have enough length, but in mascara I look for something to make my lashes dark! Period! My eyes are very dark brown, but I have naturally light hair- so if I require a lot of help from my eyeliner/mascara to open the whole eye area. This mascara delivers!!!!!  The tips included with this product says to apply to tips first, since the base of lashes are naturally thicker. I would agree IF you have darker, thicker lashes. For those of us who have light lashes, ignore that tip! Start with the base as usual, and work it, work it, work it through- base to tip, base to tip, base to tip. Start with the part of your lashes you want to add the most definition to... if you're going out for the night, work the outer corners for a sexy look, then simply fill in the mid/inner lashes. If you're like me, just a work at home mom, start on the inner corner to really open the eye to cover how darn tired you are lol  Lastly, because BE uses good ingredients, there is nothing irritating about this mascara. It comes off easily, but I doesn't smear during the day. My eyes look as great at bedtime, when my hubby & I finally get *alone* time, as they do during the day taking care of my kids & working my brains off!!! SUCCESS!!!!!
I love this stuff! I tried out several other brands (even benefits they are real) and nothing lengthens my lashes more than this one. It does not clump at all! I am in love <3

I've just recently started using mascara a lot more often, and have tried several products, and I have to say this has been the best that I have used! The brush works great, and it separates my lashes. It gives them volume and a little extra length. I recently ordered they're real by benefit, after the huge hype and I have to say I will be going back to buxom lashes!

This is probably one of the best mascaras I've used and I've tried TONS. It doesn't smudge or flake and it lasts all day. I usually don't like mascaras with the plastic bristles but this one is really good. It can be layered without clumping.
I love this mascara! I was previously using the flawless definition from bareminerals but i like this one a whole lot better. After I put it on, I noticed my lashes looked a lot fuller and longer.

I got the small tube to try it out. I love this mascara! It separates all the lashes and adds a soft texture. It does not leave my lashes feel heavy and chunky. Plus it adds some nice length. Love it.

This mascara was listed as volumizing, legthening, and defining on the top sellers unit at the store. It does not give a volumizing look. It's more natural, nice definition, but not what I was looking for.
I decided to try out some other good brands of mascara but I realized that this one is the very best for me!

reviews.review_title: THE ONLY MASCARA FOR ME!!!! Love!
reviews.review_text: I've been using this mascara for several years! And it's by far the best mascara I've ever used! I have fine lashes that are light in color. This mascara thickens, lengthens and separates perfectly. It stays on really well... And I have very oily skin! It doesn't clump or dry out in the tube. I also don't need makeup remover to remove it at night. But my favorite feature is the fixable brush that allows you to get all the to the lash line to create thick full lashes!

I am fortunate enough to have very long eyelashes, but the downside is that I can never find a mascara brush that applies mascara without smothering it on thickly. The Buxom Lash brush is so amazing though! It applies mascara so evenly and brushes through my lashes similar to a boar's hair brush for your hair. As a result my lashes look amazingly done, clean and luxuriously full, not thick and stuck together.
One of my favorite mascaras. If you're looking for something new definitely try this one! I just wish the bristles were a little bit stiffer to really separate my lashes more.
This is my favorite out of all the buxom mascaras. No clumping and lots of volume!
Lengthens and volumizes without making my lashes clumpy. I like to keep my makeup simple (BB Cream and mascara only on most days), and this makes my eyelashes pop like none other.

I LOVE this mascara. I have tried Tarte , Dior, Benefits, bare minerals..and this is by far the best..i have thin lashes but very long..this makes them thicker and gives them volume as well as making them longer!! no clump no eyelashes sticking together!! def reccomend!
The perfect combination of lengthening and thickening. Lasts through a 12 hour shift in the hospital. This is by far my new favorite.

I've been using this mascara for the last year. It's the first high-end mascara I ever used consistently. The brush is excellent for clump-free application, and it doesn't smudge during the day. I think it's a great intro to mascaras beyond the green-and-pink drugstore staples. Washes off easily with cleanser.

reviews.review_title: Good but needs a volume boost
reviews.review_text: love this, it's the only formula that I've found that I can use this type of brush with. It's really nice and does not clump. I usually do one coat of this and then top it of with a swipe of Benefit's Bad Gal thickening mascara. Best combo and lashes stay flexible and soft. I used to love the Japanese Lengthening Fiberwig and loved it until they changed the formula and gave it that lame curved brush, it's nothing but overpriced garbage now.

I wasn't expecting to love this product more than DiorShow, Shiseido, and YSL, but I absolutely do. It lengthens, adds volume, and defines lashes. It lasts, doesn't flake and doesn't clump. One of the best lash products I've ever used, and I've recently bypassed purchasing my usual Dior mascara in favor of this, which is, notably, half of the price as well as a better product.

So, I really wanted to like this mascara. The brush is a mix between Bare Minerals, and Urban Decay, both of which I love. However, this mascara just didn’t do the trick. First, it dries slowly, so if you blink, or sneeze, you’ve got a mess. The color is matte black, which is fine for daytime. It doesn’t flake or smear, but unfortunately it didn’t do much for my lashes, either. The lengthening was OK, and it didn’t clump, but it didn’t give a thickening effect at all. Perhaps not enough mascara was deposited on the brush to make much difference for my lashes. Upon removal time, more or less was removed with water, but I did get smearing under and around my eyes that required additional makeup remover. Ultimately, there are just better options out there.

I was a loyal fan of Dior Show mascara but this mascara put an end to that. While Dior makes your lashes full and long, it doesn't look quite natural as this one does. I don't know how they do it but I kid you not, lashes are fuller and longer but yet they look natural! I got it as a trial size, will be purchasing full size ASAP!

I usually love Buxom and was so excited to try this. It's not volumizing at all, I had to put on a million coats. It's definitely non-clumping, but that's because it doesn't do anything. I don't understand how this got so many great reviews...didn't work for me and I have great lashes to begin with!
Gives huge volume and makes eyelashes stunning! I have next to no eyelashes, but with this stuff they become full and very visible!
I Love this mascara. It really lengthens your lashes and never clumps!
Absolutely love this mascara, gives great volume and length and does not clump. Tried a sample of this mascara and fell in love, great job buxom!
I really like Buxom a lot. It gives you great volume at a great price. Also, it doesn't irritate my sensitive, allergy-prone eyes.

Absolutely my favorite mascara that I've ever used. No clumps, stays put, doesn't melt or chunk in the sun or anything weird. I love the precise yet easy to use applicator. And it lasts forever. Amazing product!!

This is a nice lush formula and goes on with the finest bristles, separating the lashes but still adding mascara. It stays on well all day at work and doesn't smear. Best part is that my eyelashes don't fall out with this mascara because they stay soft and it's easy to remove.
love this mascara! i bought a limited edition gift pack with several leading masaras, and ended up sticking to this one! even bought one for my friend
This mascara is so awesome. You don't even have to curl your lashes and they just look amazing and defined. Totally worth it )

I received a mini version of this in the favorites box that included some other mega hyped mascaras for $25 and a voucher for a full size AND OH BOY! I did not expect to love it this much! I have VERY straight lashes and this holds my curl ALL DAY and lengthens, separates and adds volume! I haven't used it with a primer or with another mascara bc i don't feel that i need to!! smooth formula (not too wet or too dry but just right) LOVE THIS!

This is the ONLY mascara I've found that doesn't clump for its entire lifetime. I got a sample of this with one of my orders a while back and it quickly became my absolute favorite. I also love Buxom's lip glosses (the plumping ones). I am purchasing more of their products with this order. They seem to make good products.

reviews.review_title: I wont use anything else ever again.
reviews.review_text: I was debating on buying this product, and another Dior mascara. In the end I opted for this because the cost was friendlier. I'm so glad I did. I have long eyelashes already but this multiplied them, volumized them, and there was NO FLAKING or CLUMPING! I keep getting lots of complements on my eyelashes and I will never go back to using brands that don't last throughout the day, or the ones that leave flakes on my cheeks. With eyeliner/smudging you get a perfect dramatic eye, but also it's great for a more natural look on its own.
I've tried so many mascaras over the years, but this one is the best! Large brush covers great/definitive eyes/no clumping!
I am really liking this mascara used underneath other mascaras. Right now, I use it under Too Faced Better Than S*x. Gets every lash, and the brush is easy.

I find most mascaras that claim to lengthen - do. Volume and definition seem harder to deliver. Buxom delivers all three. I have very fine lashes, and I prefer Buxom to Dior or Benefits They're Real for pretty, full lashes. What's more, after a recent 16 hour flight, the mascara stayed put, no flakes.

This mascara is more lengthening rather than volumizing, but it is quite buildable without clumping. I also really like the formula because I've had mine for a very long time and it still hasn't dried up and it also doesn't flake or make my lashes feel stiff and crunchy. I'm not a fan of waterproof mascara because of how difficult it is to remove at the end of the day, so it doesn't bother me that this doesn't come in a waterproof formula and I haven't had any problems with it holding a curl or smudging. It takes about 3 coats of this mascara to get the desired volume for me, but 1-2 coats makes for effortlessly natural looking lashes.
<3 this mascara! None of that bad stuff that's in others & it still gets the job done!  Upon first opening the formula is a bit wet but after a few uses it is perfect!
Love the product! Gives great length without clumps. Lasts all day without smudging if you follow their instructions on how to apply. It's wonderful!
It is one of if not the best mascara

I have pretty long lashes that go in a thousand different directions. Needless to say, I need major lash taming. I hate the crimped look that comes from curling your lashes, but I need a mascara that combs out my lashes and gives them a lengthened and volumized, but natural appearance. The formula is wet, so it allows for lots of build without any of the clump, and the wand (have you seen it? Its amazing!!) lets me get my lashes to the way I want without sticking them all together and giving me spidery looking lashes. LOVE this mascara!!
Makes my lashes look extra thick and long! My favorite mascara.

I absolutely love this product. I have been using this mascara for years and have experimented with others in between however this keeps me coming back. Closest thing to it was Benefit's They're Real (tried it because it was waterproof and had siimilar brush bristles). The only negative thign i can say about this is because of the shape of my eye and the hydrating eye concealer i use, it runs a bit by teh end of the day. Not enough to deter me though.
I got this mascara with a kit that I purchased, and this one stood out the most. It made my lashes sooooo long. And unlike most mascaras, it is super easy to remove. I will be getting the full size.

If asked, Which makeup accessory would you never leave home with? I would reply with this mascara in hand. Although I wish it were waterproof, it lasts a very long time and is not easily deterred by water. My lashes look more full and curve my eyelashes up with the brush. Really makes the eyes pop. I have not seen a clump on the brush. Ever.

After years of buying cheaper drugstore mascara that I was almost always disappointed with, I finally decided to splurge a little and get a more high-end one. I'm glad I did! This is a great mascara and I use it every day. It's one of the best I've ever used, though I think Max Factor 2000 Calorie mascara [my holy grail item] is ever-so-slightly better.

reviews.review_title: I wanted to like this mascara
reviews.review_text: This was recommended to me by an associate, when I was looking to start my makeup collection. I really wanted to like it but I found it clumpy and messy. It does volumize and lengthen as promised but I just don't like the formula.
I received a sample of this mascara in black, and it's fabulous. Love the formula, love the brush, love the coverage and fullness..... but I really need a dark brown color option!

I tried the sample of this in the lash stash kit and it was definitely the best of all. I've never seen my lashes so full, separated but very thick and.... it really looks like I'm wearing falsies it really does. Its incredible. I'm not the biggest fan of Buxom but this mascara has me the biggest fan of their mascara. <3 <3 <3

Just bought this and I'm really glad I did. I have short lashes and this really helped lengthen them and made them look extremely natural, which I'm all about. This mascara also doesn't smell, which is something I'm oddly particular about with my mascara. Call me crazy. Great product, definitely recommend.

reviews.review_title: I'm a buxom babe I need Buxom lashes
reviews.review_text: I'm obsessed with this mascara. It's my everyday, go-to, I-know-it-will-turn-out-perfect mascara. Every word of the product description is true. The brush is amazing and it never clumps. My lashes look long, lush, and natural. I would give this mascara 6 stars if I could.

I found the Buxom mascara in the lash stash which is also an amazing buy, and I redeemed my lash stash and got the full tube of the buxom and I am absolutely obsessed with it and have never been more satisfied with my lashes! I want to get the waterproof one too!

Time and time again, I keep coming back to this mascara. I can feel the bristles on the wand grabbing every lash, and the formula gives me length without the spider effect. The formula is also light enough to keep my lashes lifted, instead of weighing them down like some of the other brands with heavier, wetter formulas.
This mascara is fantastic! Gives great length, perfect for everyday.

This is one of my all time favorite mascaras! I am a mascara junkie & this one just does amazing with my lashes! Holds a curl great & doesn't clump at all! Really recommend to anyone looking for a new everyday mascara!

I love this mascara! I got it in a sample pack and it's amazing! The brush does a great job at grabbing each lash for a beautiful full voluminous effect. The only problem I have with this mascara is that it flakes on my lower lash line. Really wish there was a waterproof formula.
Love this mascara- it is the best- makes eyelashes full without being clumpy. Also makes eyelashes look longer. Very pleased with this purchase.

Probably the best mascara I've ever had. I'm not sure if it dries slower than other brands I've used, but I can apply multiple coats without it getting clumpy or the lashes sticking together. On the flip side, you do need to make sure if you have bangs or short hair that it stays away from the lashes until they dry, but it's not that big a deal.
Every time I apply it by the end of day it runs, it's under my eyes or on the sides. I would understand if i was sweating or wetting my face. Glad it was a gift.
I will never buy any other mascara ever again. This mascara lifts, separates, thickens, and volumizes my lashes. It's the best!

reviews.review_title: the best mascara for short lashes!
reviews.review_text: I've tried probably more than 5 mascara brands out there and Buxom is by far the best. I even tried Dior and Buxom has won for me. It's great for short lashes because it really gives you the bigger and fuller lashes you want. Other mascaras would only help to lift your lashes for a short while, but this? would stay on your lashes all day! Also it's easy to remove. No smudge, clean mascara!

I've tried many mascaras and this one is by far the best - my search has ended. It lengthens and separates my lashes better than ever. I am not sure about volume as I'm personally not even sure if volumizing a person's eyelashes is possible, but sure, I guess it volumizes. Just give this a try. You won't be disappointed. Just wish it came in a black/brown color. Oh well, still an amazing product.
This product rocks - top notch mascara. The brush never gets sticky and goopy therefore my lashes never get clumpy. I love it forever.

I love the brush that comes with this stuff! It separates as well as applies this fabulous mascara! Only wish it lasted longer.... I have noticed that I have to buy a new tube pretty often ( bc it gets thick or clumpy) compared to cheaper alternatives, but I still think it is totally worth it. Perhaps I was keeping the others way too long anyway??
My new favorite mascara.
Great product. Separates lashes. No clumping. No flaking.
I have had a hard time finding a mascara that doesn't give me raccoon eyes by the end of the day. I've found it! I love this stuff!
This mascara is great. The brush separates my lashes so well, and easily and evenly coats them all adding volume and length without clumps.

I have very sparse lashes and I really like this mascara. The only negative is that it's a little clumpier than the Too Faced Lashgasm which I also like. This one gives me more prominent, noticeable lashes and it doesn't run Down my face, which is a big plus. It just isn't as clean looking as the Too Faced but since it gives me more obvious lashes I like it for evening.
This mascara definitely makes your lashes appear bigger and fuller because it separates every lash and does not get clumpy. I will definitely buy more once it runs out.

I got a mini of this in a large set of mascaras from Sephora, and it really stuck out as one of my favorites. It looks natural and non-clumpy, the only downside being that it isn't waterproof. However I believe there is a waterproof version, I just haven't tried it so I don't know if it goes on any differently. Great for everyday use.
I LOVE the brush, it doesn't clump, goes on smooth, but every day it smudged. I wanted to love it, but it just didn't work for me.
I bought this mascara thinking it was going to be fabulous, however, it didn't measure up to what I thought it was going to claim to do, I won't purchase again.
I love this product. I have thin, lackluster lashes. This stuff really thickens and gives a great, clump-free, separated look. I'm sold on it.
This is my favorite mascara. I love the brush and it helps to make my lashes look fuller. Highly recommend!

I love this mascara because it never clumps, has a really good texture to it, and make the lashes look naturally long, gorgeous, and separated. This mascara always shoots above the rest for me because it doesn't become overbearing to the rest of my face, my eyes, or even your eyelashes. Instead, it gives just the right amount of definition, volume, and length to bring focus to the eyes and enhance your natural beauty.
I love this mascara. It looks natural, and doesn't get clumpy. It really adds length to my lashes without looking like I have tonsof makeup on.

this mascara is like magic.... it lengthens, separates, holds a curl, crazy budge proof, soft on the lashes, and makes your lashes look amazing!! The brush is also great, the curvy shape makes it really easy to get every single lash, even the tiny baby lashes that you didnt know existed. the brush also makes getting a natural winged look really easy. I especially love this mascara for my bottom lashes, the brush and formula seems to grab my lashes effortlessly and coats them evenly. Even after multiple coats, my lashes never look clumpy, it only gets more volumized! I love this mascara and I have tried many, many mascaras before, from drug store to the high end mascaras, and this is still my favourite all around mascara. plus the packaging is really cute :)

I really like this mascara overall, it's buildable and light and makes my eyelashes look pretty and girly. But for the price, I'd rather stick with my Mabelline Falsies-by far best mascara I've ever used to date.
A little clumpy. I LOVE buxom lip gloss though. The brush on this is perfect.
I keep searching for the perfect mascara and this is better than the drug store ones and no worse than the more expensive brands

This is, as I mentioned in the title, my favorite mascara. I have very long, thick eyelashes, (like venetian blinds I've been told) and this mascara accentuates them beautifully. It does not clump or feel heavy and removes easily. Every time I try any other brand I am disappointed and return to this.

I have very long lashes but they are not thick when I put this on they don't clump or stick together. The wand is fantastic, it helps separate and when I use it I don't have to sit in the mirror for 30 minutes with a pair of tweezers trying to pick clumps out. This would be near perfect mascara if it came in waterproof.
This is the best mascara I have ever tried. I got a sample of it from Sephora forever ago. I've tried a couple others in last few years and this is by far the BEST.
Amazing volume, length and definition from this mascara; no problems applying it and it goes on smoothly and evenly every time.

I have a problem with mascara running down my face. Almost every drugstore mascara does it. This one does not. My lashes are very sparse. This super dark mascara makes them visible. It's a little clumpier than my other favorite, Too Faced Lashgasm but this one gives me more noticeable lashes. It had been out of stock at my store and I was thrilled to find it was back.

I LOVE THIS MASCARA - TWO COATS AND YOU ARE READY TO GO. I AM BLONDE AND HAVE BLONDE LASHES THAT ARE THIN. THIS MASCARA MAKES THEM LOOK AMAZING!!! THE BEST I HAVE EVER USED AND I HAVE TRIED EVERY BRAND FROM GENERIC TO DESIGNER EXPENSIVE. IF YOU HAVE AMAZING LASHES LOOK NO FURTHER!

I've use to buy the expensive brands all the time but when I found this one, it was amazing!! Doesn't dry out your lashes and they make them feel full and not dry. i've been using this for about 3 years and will continue to use it because I love it!
Mom gave this to me for Christmas 2 years ago. Have been using it since. Best mascara I've ever used. :) gave as gifts last year and they loved it as well.

This was recommended for volume and length. As I have full naturally curly lashes I was more interested in lengthening. For the price, the lengthening was minimal. I've seen better quality from drug stores.

I have a few mascaras but this is the one I always go back to. I love the wand, its rubber (I think?) and it really gets between the lashes and is able to coat and give a lot of volume. this mascara does not get clumpy and is easy to remove! I like that it's not waterproof it feels easier on my lashes than the other special occasion mascaras i have

I have sensitive skin, psoriasis on the eyelids and wear contacts. You can be sure that I am super critical of eye makeup and especially of mascara. This product looks good on, comes off easily and completely with my regular face cleaner, and causes no irritation what so ever.

I purchased two of these. I have been using this product for years, as recommedned by a friend who is a model. This batch however, does not meet my expectations.The mascara that usually lasts months with a lot of defination, has absolutely none. It's like using a worn out wand. Ones I had six months ago are better than these. I expect a total refund or someone who will test the ones to be replaced to make sure they are not from the same batch as those I received.
Great coverage and wonderful fullness to my light blonde eyelashes!
One of my favorite mascaras.

This mascara is one of my favorites. It doesn't clump and it lengthens really well, I also love the brush, as it makes it easier to get to your corner eyelashes. The one downside is that it isn't as much of a volumizer as it says it is. It stays on for a long time and doesn't run easily.
I love this mascara! It gives my lashes lots of length, and the size of the brush is great. My lashes don't stick together when I put this on, they just look longer! :)
Love this mascara and I am so happy that they finally made it in a water proof version! Easy to apply, does not smudge, lasts throughout the day, and comes off easily!

I LOVE THIS MASCARA My eyelashes usually poke straight out, therefore when i curl them eventually throughout the day mascara flakes off from my eyelashes trying to go back straight. When i use this mascara it holds my curl so i am happy happy happy!
I love this mascara! It doesn't come off during the day and glides on smooth!

I loved the brush and the mascara did separate my lashes very well. However, it did not dry. For hours, every time I touched my lashes, they felt sticky and still wet. I will return it and purchase the Benefit, they're real.
This makes my lashes long and super full looking. The only issue I have is that there's a ton under my eyes the next day. But it's well worth it!

reviews.review_title: BEST MASCARA I HAVE EVER USED
reviews.review_text: My lashes are very fragile, this mascara makes them look and feel wonderful. ALMOST THERAPEUTIC!! It cleans up well and I just love love love how full and thick and long my lashes get!! this stuff is a 10++
I've used this Product for over 1 year & This is my Favorite Mascara, you cannot go wrong with this. Your Eye Lashes will look Great!
It took about 5 coats to make any difference! Not worth it!

I use different mascaras sometimes just for a change, but Buxom is by far the one I use the most. I love it -- it applies well, stays on well, and doesn't damage my eyelashes when I remove it. It is a GREAT product!
Love thsi mascara! Makes a difference on my look
I've tried numerous mascaras and this I must say is the BEST one they sell at Sephora...BUT I think the sample size is better than the full size. Too bad you can't purchase the sample size one

reviews.review_title: Looks like i have falsies on =)
reviews.review_text: i like how it lengthens and curls my lashes...it gives me a natural falsies look...however it does clumps if you layer on the coats so be gentle!

I've used lots of mascara in my 61 years, and this tops them all. It doesn't clump, adds volume without being flashy, and is just .. perfect. I keep trying others, but nothing yet has come close to this. I hope they never stop making it!
I keep coming back to this mascara. I haven't found anything I like better for the price.

This is by far my most favorite mascara. It really lengthens and thickens my lashes without clumping. It's easy to remove and doesn't bother my sensitive eyes. I have been using this mascara for more than 2 years and have been very pleased.
I love this! This is my 2nd time purchasing. Leaves lashes looking lovely and almost a natural look - not too drastic.

I have tried several mascara's. Most were waterproof as I have oily skin. This is the first masaca that was not waterproof that stays put 8+ hours a day! I love how easy it is to remove too. No clumps and holds the shape.
I got this as a sample a while ago and the brush is amazing! The brush makes it nearly impossible to get clumps, I love that!
This mascara definitely gives lenght n separates my lashes. It doesn't clump my lashes which I love.

This is my FAVORITE mascara! I keep buying it over and over again, and that says a lot! I also really like Dior show and Benefit bad gal, but Buxom is the best in my opinion. It doesn't disappoint. I like it because it isn't waterproof (although I think there is a waterproof version) and it makes my lashes look amazing, but they aren't hard and sticky like they have hair spray on them and it is easy for me to remove. I never want to switch mascaras, and I think that says a lot!
I love Boxom Lash. I was a Diorshow addict until I tried this-just as good, but costs almost half the price. The brush is great, removes clumps, allows multiple coates to go on perfectly.

reviews.review_title: best mascara I have ever found
reviews.review_text: this mascara is the best!!!! It separates the lashes as well as lengthens. It also lasts all day without smearing or running.
Best mascara ever !  Try it once you will never go back

Since receiving a sample size this has been one of my fave mascasras...no smudging or clumping. My only complaint games that it dries out quickly...or maybe there isn't much to start with in the tube?
Nice mascara, great formula, but the brush is just way too big for my eyes.

I got this mascara to share with my mom since we were going to try it out first and I'm so glad we didn't each get one because it didn't work for us at all! It made our lashes fall flat even when we had curled them and flaked too. Dissatisfied.
I don't think I'll ever use another mascara as regularly as I use this one. It amps up my lashes and gets all the short lashes I can't see. Love, love, LOVE it!
Best all around. No clumping and great brush design.
Honestly the best mascara I've ever used!
My favorite mascara. It stays put and gives amazing buxom lashes.

I will never use another mascara again! I have very thin, short lashes and nothing ever seems to boost them. Until I tried a sample of this! I only need 2 coats and I have long, full lashes that everyone compliments. No flaking or clumping and it is easy to remove.
I have a difficult time finding mascara that I actually like and that is not clumpy, etc. This is by far one of the best. I have ordered/purchased this mascara numerous times.

I absolutely love this mascara, it gives super length and fullness without clumping or flaking. What I love is that you can apply it light if you're just running out of the house in a hurry and if you decide you need to apply more for a more dramatic look later you can just add right to it and it doesnt clump up. In fact when you first apply make sure to start at root of lashes and follow all the way through to ends which I know we all do anyways right... let the first couple of coats sit for a couple minutes then proceed with the next couple coats it works better for the fullness when you let it dry a little I love My Buxom Lashes!!! The price is also great I use to buy the Blackout Dior for much more and it dried out so fast and flaked!!! SMH

I love this mascara. This is defining and volumizing. I have long lashes that are completely straight, and threfore must be curled. Some mascaras are so wet/heavy that they undo the curl, but not this one! It gives an amped up natural look, so if you are looking for the falsies effect this is not for you (but why would you want people to think they are fake?). The downside, the mascara rubs off onto my under-eye from my bottom lashes by the end of the day :(

I bought this mascara in a pack that had 10 other mascaras to try form sephora . I tried them all but this was the only one I would truly by again . It made my lashes fuller and longer , mine are spindly and weak. I love the brush . Definitely a keeper
I love how well this mascara separates my lashes and how much definition it gives them. It curls my lashes well and stays all day! Even without being waterproof it does not smudge!
I've been using this mascara for about 3 years and wouldn't use any other. It creates long full lashes like I've never had before

I recently purchase this product after desperately searching for that magical mascara. You know the ones that you hear stories about, which separate lashes, while infusing them with a sultry, buildable volume, which would make my lashes have that full, enviable look, without looking caked or smudge. After reading some of the reviews on the Sephora website about the Buxom, I decided to hesitantly give it a try, and I was not disappointed!! Wonderful for everyday use, and can easily carry over into a sexy night look as well, I personally use it in addition to my Blink, just for that extra little bit! Love, love, love! Absolutely fabulous, will definitely be buying this one again!!
Nice results - long full lashes. It does run a bit, but I haven't been able to find a mascara that doesn't. It might be my eye cream.
Love, love, love this mascara. It works the best for me!!!

I really like this mascara, results-very full volume lashes. I gave it 4 only because I wish it was a little more water-resistant. If it's sunny and eyes run water, when you touch your lashes it does come off a little. Ingredient list is great!

I've been on the hunt for years for a mascara that offers great coverage and lengthening without clumping, and this is it! The brush curves my lashes as it adds color, and the teeth of the brush make sure I'm clump-free.

I only use this mascara it is the best, it makes my lashes longer and fuller, and it lasts all day long. I have long eye lashes and this brings them out. Love Love Love Thanks to Sephora for keep buxom products in the store.

This is my absolutely favorite mascara! Before I discovered it I didn't believe in shelling out more than $10 for a mascara, and typically stuck to drugstore brands. However, I must say that the combination of the formula and brush make it super effective.  It comes with a rubber applicator that has plenty of bristles that grab on to your lashes to lengthen and separate. I apply two coats. The first is to fan out my lashes and the second to bulk them up. If I am going out or want to make my lashes look extra bold I apply a third coat.  The formula is also really nice, this isn't one of those flaky mascaras that make your lashes crunchy. When I wash my makeup off the mascara kind of melts away. This may sound scary because it may seem like it will smudge or transfer to the under eye area, but it totally stay put!  I have repurchased this mascara several times and always have a back up.

I was definitely expecting more- I have been a blinc kiss me mascara devotee for so long and wanted to try a volumiizng mascara for a change. I tried the drugstore falsies and was so excited with the results I wanted to upgrade to a higher end brand- put it this way save your money and buy falsies!

I used to wear Cargo's Texas Lash until they discontinued selling it at Sephora. I switched to this Buxom mascara and have been wearing it for years. I don't even want to try other ones on I love this particular mascara so much. My lashes look full, thick, and long. No clumping or spider looking lashes. My little sister even followed in my footsteps and wears the same one.
Second time purchasing this product amazing & absolutely love it, will totally recommend it to anyone. Leave your fabulously long , and will make a difference.
I always have a tube of Buxom Lash on hand! Conditioning, volumizing lengthening and doesn't flake.

This mascara creates full lashes without clumping. My lashes are thick to begin with and using this stuff almost makes it seem like I'm wearing falsies. I bought a tube for my sister who has thinner lashes and it works wonders for her! Love this stuff!!

After trying a slew of mascaras to make my lashes look oike the girls in the commercial - I foun the one that actually did it. What makes it even better is that over the past two years of using this mascara I have more, longer, healther lashes. I can't speak more highly of any makeup product I use.

This is my absolute favorite mascara hands down! i love brushes like this. this mascara gives me length and volume (and i dont have much lashes). it lasts all day long (even longer). i look fabulous and always get compliments on my lashes whenever i'm wearing this mascara. i highly recommend this mascara.
Really like this product!

I really like the way this mascara looks, but it smudges so easily. If my eyes watered even the tiniest amount, I would have raccoon eyes, or eyelash prints on a tissue. I don't expect a non-waterproof mascara to be able to handle a long cry, or a swim, but it should be able to handle a couple of sneezes.

I was using Lancôme mascara prior to trying Buxom. I decided to try Buxom after talking to a Sephora associate. I was impressed with the price but never expected to love the product so much! I sometimes feel the higher the price the better the quality. WRONG! This is a prime example of a great product at a great price. And I love the brush!!!!

Best mascara i have used. The description highlights volumizing but it also LENGTHENS my lashse to unreal lengths. I do find that I need to use a few coats, but the end result is great! People ask me all the time what product I use.
I absolutely love this mascara. I've tried at least 20 different types and this one is the best for my lashes by far!!
i love this mascara! it coats all my lashes from top to bottom and makes them look so long. i like the brush as well. totally worth the price and i will be buying it again.
It makes my lashes look fuller and longer. Stays on all day. No smear. I wear contact lenses and my eyes are very sensitive. This is the only mascara I can wear.

I'm usually MEH about mascaras and believe the most you can really expect them to do is darken your lashes, but I I was surprised by how much I really like this mascara.  The brush does wonders for separating lashes so they don't get all clumpy and spiky, and the formula is the perfect consistency - not too wet, not too dry, not too thick. I can apply several coats of this and my lashes still look good, not gloppy.  It is also reasonably easy to remove, which is huge brownie points for me.  With drugstore mascaras approaching US$12, for a few bucks more, this mascara is definitely a good investment.
Loooooove! Ran out and just purchased another one. Great product.
This is the best mascara on the market, hands down. It makes regular lashes look amazing.
This is the best mascara ever! I use this particularly when I wear false eyelashes to mend the lashes together, and it works fabulously.
I was given Buxom Lash as part of a birthday gift last year and now it's the only mascara I ever use. Non clumping, beautiful color and conditioning to leave your lashes looking thick, long and full.

I didn't experience any volume with this mascara. I've noticed that a lot of the so-called volume mascaras with the plastic bristle brushes don't work well for me. I would not recommend this if you're looking for great volume.

I love this mascara, it is the best. I have lots of people ask me if I have fake lashes. It doesn't bother my eyes with or without my contacts. I adore the look it gives my eyes,, I feel naked w/o it.

I usually buy Dior mascara, and love it. However, I decided to try something new because the Dior seems to get clumpy rather quickly, and the brush matted. I tried this and really like it. There is so much definition between lashes! There isn't as much volume as with the Dior, but with a second coat you're just as good. This also goes on smooth and does clump. Definitely glad I tried this.

I received a trial size of this mascara as part of a gift set last Christmas and absolutely fell in love with it. I recently bought it in its full size version and love it just the same. The wand is great for creating long lashes. I also find that it works great for lengthening my bottom lashes. Additionally, this mascara does not clump at all. My one and only gripe is that I wish it was a little bit more volumizing. It definitely takes 2 or 3 coats to achieve my desired amount of volume.
This is one of my favorite mascaras. It makes my lashes look long but also voluptuous.

I have the worst eyelashes, they are as straight as a pin, don't like to hold a curl, clump easily, fall out, and have no body. Needless to say, I have tried every mascara possible, drugstore mascara to sephoras best of pack and I always end up back with Buxom. I have found a couple others that are good (second fave is Tartes lights, camera, lashes) but Buxom lasts longer than any other without getting thick, hard, or clumpy. The brush is by far the best, like none other. Lastly, the mascara spent need to be caked on to do the job, but can be built up to make the lashes look longer and more dramatic. My lashes have never been happier, fuller, and curlier than with Buxom lash. Highly recommended.

I have been faithful to Buxom for almost three years. The past two times I bought it, it already seemed dried out and clumpy. This time the thing inside the tube that takes off extra mascara from the wand keeps coming out making it very messy. I will be sending mine back. It's not worth the mess.
I love this mascara it makes my lashes look longer and it does not give me clumps!! I am obssesed!
I love this mascara. It lengthens, defines, and volumizes. The color is great too it's a really dark, shiny black.

I love this mascara! I received it as a sample and found myself constantly going back to it, so I purchased the full size and couldn't be happier. People constantly compliment my lashes. The mascara gives them length and fullness.

Most basic drug store mascara makes it look like i'm wearing fake lashes but I still love trying new brands. If you get this one anywhere close to your lashline, it colors your eyelid, no way going around it. BUT even when you do get it close to your lashline, it doesnt curl the lash what so ever! It's very rare that a mascara wouldn't curl (my) lash when you start at the base and work it up. It also does not make the lashes thicker. Only good thing is that it doesnt clump; but if a mascara is new it generally shouldnt anyway. Maybe if you use a lash curler and then only apply it to the tips of the lashes it would work? But why would I add a lash curler when I never have to with hundreds of other good mascaras? Either way, even if you did use a curler, it would still keep your lashes very thin and sad looking.
Buxom mascara is easy to apply, lasts all day and makes my lashes, longer, thicker and black!

I love the brush on this mascara as it seems to lengthen and separate my lashes making it look like I have more. It gives a more natural look to my lashes than other mascaras as it does not get clumpy. Because of that, I would not say this is a volumizing mascara; if you like that look, I would not use this kind.
I won't use any other mascara. This one goes on smoothly, thickens and does not clump.
My favorite mascara. Gives length and volume without smudging or clumping.

I loved splurging on this mascara. It's definitely great quality but I've switched back to cheap 7$ mascaras because I don't want to spend so much. My best friend however uses this mascara religiously and I must say her eyelashes always look amazing!
I'm a Diorshow lover and been using it for few years. but after I tried Buxon mascara, I don't think I go back to Diorshow mascara. I'm very satisfied on its quality and price.

I have TONS of mascara, and I'm always looking for that perfect one. this is the closest I've gotten yet! it separates the lashes and lengthens them while also making them fuller! rarely ever clumps. definitely recommend this!

I think that this mascara is fairly exceptional. I am digging the length and volume. I'll probably have to keep playing with the wand to get my lashes full as I do with the Dior Extase, but I'm loving it so far.
This is by far the best mascara I have ever used, and I have used ALOT(Dior, YSL, Tarte, Benefit, etc) You will not be disappointed with this product!

I was worried, because when I first put on this mascara it was beyond clumpy. I took a tissue and wiped some of the excess product off the brush, I thought it had maybe been sitting too long? For whatever reason this totally worked, now as long as I use with a light hand this makes my lashes long and gorgeous. I swear the more I use it, the better it works.

I LOVE THIS !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Its amazing following the instructions on how to apply for BUXOM LASHES is 100% correct. I normally have to add 8 or more coats of mscara. But this one only one coat and one more curl after it drys. Makes it look like I hav lashes. Becasue I have lashed that very thin an light, and not very long. If I want more Va-Va-Voo lashes I add 2 or 3 more coats. It has staying power and sepeates, and does not clump or flake.

This is the best mascara I have ever tried. Been using it for a few years and have always enjoyed the large, long, voluminous lashes this tube creates. From time to time there will be samples provided by Sephora for other mascara brands that seem good, but never better. This Buxom lash mascara does not clump easily, lasts for the entire tube without drying out and is just the best. Final note is that the brush is great too.
The only mascara I use.

My eyelashes are blonde, so I absolutely have to wear mascara everyday, and this is the best one I've found, after testing a parade of about 20 of the best reviewed ones. It goes on smoothly, with no clumping, yet makes my lashes look bigger and curl up nicely. You can use a second coat - still no clumping. Lasts forever, too, without drying out.

This made my eyelashes visibly longer and held the curl better than most mascaras. It also doesn't clump, which I liked - I think the brush helps. The only thing is that it didn't do anything to volumize the lashes. They were longer and more defined but still looked pretty thin.

Simply the best mascara I have ever used. I first received a sample of this a few years ago before it came out and I have been hooked ever since. It volumizes and lengthens without getting clumpy or stiff, and the result is thick, fabulous lashes that look soft and effortless all day long. I've been asked if I'm wearing false lashes before, but the answer is no - just two coats of this fabulous Buxom mascara.

One of the better $20 mascaras I have tried. It's no YSL, but it's good for an everyday look. It's buildable and doesn't clump. I get about 4 months out of one tube, without it drying out, which is great. I recommend curling lashes first-really helps.
By far the best mascara I have ever used. I will use no other mascara. My eyelashes are blonde and stubby. After two coats of BUXOM my lashes are black and thick and long and shiny.

I've always had long, full lashes. Or did..until I got older. Now? One side is fuller than the other. I looked for something that would give me that same long, thick ,look IMMEDIATELY! And this? Oh, this is it! I've tried several, including the Volume Definition that Bare Escentuals has. Many of them smell odd, make my eyes itch or simply just don't add volume without many coats or flakes. Eww! No woman wants that! I've even thought of getting Latisse, but I don't want brown pigment to change my eye color. So? What's a girl to do? This mascara gives me such lovely volume with one coat, just one coat..it should be illegal! I will use the edge of the brush to touch up any shorter lashes on the one side, but? It doesn't take much! I wear contacts as well, so whatever I wear can't bother my eyes. I wear this the whole shift, all 16 hours and other than how thick they feel and how nice they look in a mirror? I'd never know I had it on! I've even gotten compliments from co-workers on how thick my lashes are. You really need to try this if you want the best mascara for this!

This mascara has more of a cream/mousse formula than wetter, liquid mascaras. I have straight Asian eyelashes so I need a good mascara that holds up the curl I've established with my eyelash curler. This was one of those mascaras that was too heavy for me. It uncurled my lashes in under 30 seconds so they ended up sticking straight out, perpendicular to my eyes. I also found that this mascara smudged throughout the day. I think it gave me a tiny amount of volume but no real length.
My favorite mascara of all time! I have pretty much bought drug-store mascaras most of my life, but not any more. This one is worth the money. But remember to use a good eye eye make-up remover.
I absolutely adore this mascara. I've tried several brands but this is definitely the best. Natural, super long lashes.
Love this product. The only issue I have is that the brush might be a liiiitle to big for me, but I have never loved a mascara more than this!

Love this mascara. Minimal clumps, good volume and nice lengthening power. Minimal problems with causing dark shadow on under eyes, which I frequently have a problem with since I have oilier skin. Somehow works better than the Buxom Amplified Lash in the silver tube. Not sure if the formula is different, but the extendable brush is a gimmick. Stick with the original. It's awesome.
I have been using this mascara for a couple years now and I am hooked. The brush is ideal. My lashes are separated and lengthened and there are no clumps. It even survived a sweat session at the gym.
I have fairly long lashes, but they're not particularly full. This Buxom Lash mascara gives them just what they need. The formula and applicator are terrific. My new favorite!
This is my everyday mascara. LOVE it!

reviews.review_title: Perfect everyday solution to fine lashes
reviews.review_text: My favorite mascara! I recently tried Benefit's They're Real and, while I still use it when I want extreme length or lasting power, I didn't love it as much as I though I would. Buxom gives a fuller lash while maintaining a natural quality that They're Real doesn't have. Buxom is capable of giving an everyday look or really filling out for a glamorous evening lash. Buxom feels almost moisturizing and washes off easily while They're Real is difficult to remove. My only complaint is that Buxom is not offered in brown or black-brown for an even more natural appearance.
This is the best mascara ever! Glides on easily & does not clump!

This is by far my favorite mascara EVER!! I've used many different brands from expensive to drug store and this is my top pick. My eyelashes look full and long and the mascara doesn't fall off like other brand have! IT'S A MUST BUY!!

I will never use another mascara again. This formula gives a lot of volume to my stick-straight lashes. The brush is the best part- it perfectly separates lashes. Combined with using an eyelash curler, this will make you look like you're wearing false lashes!

I like this mascara but don't think it is any better then the 7 to 8 dollar mascara I have bought at the drug store. I like the brush and the way it goes on but probably won't spend the extra money again.

I received a sample size of this with an order & I am so glad I did because I LOVE this product!! It's been the only mascara that I've found to really lengthen & add volume to my short/small eyelashes!! I get compliments all the time on how long and how full my eyelashes are!! Most of my friends are surprised to learn they are made that way with your product!! I just noticed that this comes in waterproof form & look forward to trying that soon!! Yes, I would recommend this product to a friend :)!!

I know this is pricey for mascara and you can find it for less than half the price at a drugstore BUT i have purchased this mascara three times already and it is my favorite. Your lashes become so full and amazing, you MUST give it a try. If you are on the fence about it like I was, you just need to because all of the drugstore mascaras you bought and didnt like and wasted money, you know for a fact that you will love this.

I have been using this mascara for the past 3 years and still havent found anything better, even after trying out many other mascaras. It gives me tons of length and seperation which is what Im looking for. I get tons of compliments and people always ask if I have eyelash exstensions in. If you wanted a little more volume I would just suggest adding a lash primer underneath, like the Dior one.
great brush. lots of volume. could do better holding a curl.
This mascara does not clump or flake. The brush allows the mascara to keep lashes seperate. After trying so many brands of mascara, Buxom is a lifetime keeper!
I love this it makes my eyelashes very black and long but doesnt do too much for thickening them

I recently received the sample version of this and I was blown away. It lengthens, thickens and doesn't clump. I've heard so many people say that about other mascaras but they never actually did it. This one does. I started using my sample tube over top of my Clump Crusher mascara because I'm afraid I'm going to run out! I might purchase the full sized today. It will definitely be worth it.
First time trying high end mascara and I love it Do not see the volumizing aspect but its still great for length

I did not like this at all. It did not give volume or length. I guess this is ok if you already have great lashes and just want to darken or make them a bit thicker. I put two coats on and got almost no results. Fail
Love this mascara. I previously used Lancome, but that's become so expensive!! Buxom gives me thick, long lashes. Love the brush.
LOVE this mascara. Has a rubber wand so I thought I would hate it. When I tried it out, it's the best one I've EVER used!!!!

This is one of my absolute favorite mascaras. It doesn't clump and it does a good job of defining individual lashes. I don't know that it lengthens so much. My lashes are completely blonde with out mascara so this one makes a big impact. It also has one of my favorite all-time brushes. The overall shape and size is perfect. I buy this one again and again.
Goes on nicely without any clumps they separate my lashes and make them look very black! It does not transfer at all the brush makes it very easy to get your lower lashes

This is by far my favorite mascara. It makes my eyelashes look fake. It is also really easy to put on so i'm not spending forever with my face in the mirror getting my lashes to look right. I used to always use an eyelash comb after applying mascara but this separates my lashes so well I never even reach for it anymore. Another thing I like is I can put more on later in the day and It won't clump. The mascara washes off really easily, and my lashes don't fall out at all like it has with some other brands. I definitely noticed a difference in the health of my eyelashes since using this product. I have bought this over and over, I don't have to look for my perfect mascara anymore because this is it!
I'm a makeup artist and this is the best mascara I've ever found. The wand on this is absolutely perfect for creating long thick lashes, and everyone I recommend it to loves it!

Received this as a sample months ago and just purchased my third one....best mascara out there. Didnt much care for former large brush mascara but this changed my mind. No clumping, lash lengthening formula makes my lashes look great. Recommend this without hesitation
This mascara used to come with a bristle brush that was MUCH better than the new brush. Sadness.
Amazing! i love this mascara! I would say this is more lengthening mascara rather than volumizing despite what the description says. After i use this i put on another mascara that adds more volume.

I have found my favorite mascara. I find myself scraping the bottom of my tubes in hopes I can get enough product - AND I DO. Even the tiniest bit of this mascara makes my lashes look long, numerous, and yet soft at the same time. It gives my eyes a dramatic but soft look. I love this mascara so much.

I recently returned Kat Von D's Sinful lash mascara as it did not deliver what it promised to. When I went to exchange for another mascara a Sephora associate suggested Lancôme and Buxom. I thought Lancôme was going to be it but Buxom out did Lancôme tenfold. I tried each mascara on and the difference between Buxom and Lancôme were so apparent. I have long but straight lashes and Buxom curled and defined my lashes without making them look like I have a ton of mascara on. You can layer as many coats as you want without clumping (I've layered up to 4 coats). My lashes look long, supple, healthy, and defined. The wand also separates lashes effortlessly. I had never heard of this mascara before it was suggested to me and I feel like this is a best kept secret or something. Great product and great price. I'm in love!

I am a huge believer in mascara; I always put on about 4 coats! It's ridiculous! In the past I used drug store brands and did fine with them but because of the large amount of mascara i always had to be extra careful of clumping and often needed a lash brush to separate them.
