Then I saw the Buxom brush and fell in love immediately. I can use multiple coats and it really does lengthen and thicken without clumping. This is my new favorite mascara!!

I wanted to love this mascara because it was apparently one of the best mascaras out there, according to the reviews. Firstly, the brush is a bit too large for my liking which makes applying mascara kind of awkward. Secondly, I don't think it does that much for lengthing. It is loose in consistency and doesn't really voluminze or add depth to your lashes; it makes them look thin. Lastly but most importantly, it gets all over your eyelids when you apply! It is SO annoying! I wear white eyeshadow and then I get these black marks on my eyelids, even when I am trying to be careful. The mascara is quite black, I would like to add. I am a fair, blue eyed, red haired girl and it is almost too dark for me. I think this mascara is pretty average and I could easily compare its quality to an $8 mascara from the drug store.

This is a good mascara for length but it didn't do anything else for me. It was really wet and smooth which I like, but because of its thin consistency, it didn't do much in the volume dept. I would say this is a good mascara for people who want length and a natural look to their lashes. Otherwise, skip it.

I've been using this religiously for the past few years now and have even converted my friends and family to Buxom as well ... Love the lash brush, no clumps, I apply it slowly and rotate the brush as I start at the base of my lashes and close my eyes to apply from bottom to tip... Best length and volume by far ... Must say the new birthday gift free mascara by benefit I believe is pretty darn close to this, but I'll stick to my Buxom
This mascara is clump-free and, because of the bristles, the brush catches all your lashes with the perfect amount of mascara for all!

Buxom Lash is my favorite mascara by far. The formula is very smooth and doesn't clump a lot or make dry flakes. The brush is the perfect shape and size, and the perfectly spiked rubber bristles are a dream. This mascara is a must have!!
I love the the brush it separates each lash and i can add as many coats as i like with out bunching or clumping!
I've tried them all from drugstore to the counter & I keep coming back to this one!
This is the best mascara!! I absolutely love the teddy bear brush!! Great coverage!!

I loved the way this went on. Thick and separates the lashes. Looks beautiful for day wear. However, it winds up on the lower eye area...smudge. :(  It doesn't fare well for after work gym sessions either. You'll look like a raccoon. Funny part is that it's tough to get all the way off with cleanser. I bought Sephora's waterproof eye makeup remover, did beautifully.  For the money, I like Benefit's They're Real or Lancôme's Hypnose Drama (evening).

I have tried every mascara out there and this is by far my favorite. Love the brush, thickness & how long it lasts. No flaking or crumbling off. Since I am in my 50's I don't have long lush lashes but I am complimented on mine all the time with this mascara.

I was reluctant to try this mascara I had been using Loreal for years. I got a sample tube with my points and absolutely fell in love with this mascara! It leaves no clumps and makes your eyelashes so full and long looking! I will stick with this for the long run!!

I heard this mascara was really good but it definitely not a great mascara at all. There's no thicken add to my lashes that I couldn't see my lashes at all.also, there's no volume too. the only pro about this product is give u nice length. Basically, if you want a nice natural lashes, I would recommend u for this.
I always try new mascaras because I want to try to latest and greatest but I always come back to buxom.

I have tried almost all the mascaras on the market; Lancôme, tarte, too faced, you name it-I've tried it. This mascara lasts throughout the day without flaking. It elongates and somewhat volumizes my lashes but it looks totally natural. I have very long lashes and most mascaras make my lashes look fake and clumpy. I've had a mini tube of this mascara for ages and the formula is still as perfect as the way it started. I totally recommend this to everyone I know. xx

reviews.review_title: not as volumizing as it says
reviews.review_text: its an okay mascara... nothing I would purchase again... my eyelashes are thin so I require a super volumizing mascara. had I known this was a bare essentuls product I may not have purchased in the first place... not a fan.
It is ok but nothing special, not volumizing or lengthening, ok for natural lashes. I would not buy again.

I usually LOVE this mascara and would normally give it 5 stars. I don't know if Buxom altered the ingredients or if Sephora sells really old mascara, but this time when I bought it, it was very flaky and dry. It used to be great, but I have a feeling I received one that was on the shelf for years. I sent mine back.
This product is fantastic. I have used so many mascara's over the years, and I can honestly say this is one of the best.

this isn't one of those sponsored reviews, i promise. this is truly the greatest mascara i've ever used. great volume, length, and fantastic definition. i have never had a single clump with this mascara.

When you first put on at least THREE coats of this mascara, yes it gives you beautiful thick, feathery lashes....BUT after a while they just droop and look flimsy and thin. Also, this mascara for some reason acts waterproof, very hard to wash off, after using makeup removing cloth, face wash, AND a makeup remover, I still woke up with raccoon eyes!

The only problem I have with this was the first week after buying it. It was soooo wet and I hated using it but after the first week it turned to what I expected and it lengthens, adds volume and looks totally fabulous! I ALWAYS use a spooley brush though after applying it. Overall, great mascara!!
love this. i've tried lots of others, but this is the one i can depend on. doesn't flake. good definition. the brush shape fits my lashes just right.

This buxom product is overall my favorite mascara ever! Idont think I could ever live with out it! It doesn't clump and it makes my lashes so long! Definitely a good buy. I totally recamend this to anyone that wants longer lashes. I get compliments at school from this mascara!

I have very light colored and not very long lashes. This mascara makes my lashes look long and fuller. I also wear contacts and my eyes are sensitive and I've had no problems with it irritating them and it stays all day long, but removes easily in the shower. Love it, this is my new go to!!

I had received a deluxe sample and I loved it so much I bought the full size one. I defined and gives volume without clumping or flaking. The formula is also really good and it doesn't feel dry or heavy.

Love this mascara! I like to pile on layers and it works perfectly for that. Some of the other popular mascaras are too thick and clumpy to add 5+ coats. This one makes my lashes look very thick and long without the clumps.
I got this in a deluxe sample in a previous purchase. I'm sooo in love with it. The brush applicator separates my lashes Perfectly! No clumping at all. Very impressed, will purchase full size :)

I received this mascara as a free sample a few months ago and fell in love with it at first swipe. It is volumizing, lengthening, defining, and everything else you could ever want in a mascara. I have tried many other mascaras that promise the moon but fail to deliver. This is not one of them. I repurchased yesterday in the full size and was a little on the fence about spending that much money, but it is totally worth it for perfect lashes.
does all that a good mascara should do and has a cool brush that gets your lashes all awesome
This mascara goes on very well and does not clump. The shape is great for the curve of the lashes.
Looks great at first! But before long, it flakes off and ends up under my eyes. I'm taking it back.
This mascara is fantastic. It's easy to apply, doesn't smudge and - most important, since I wear contacts - it doesn't flake.

reviews.review_title: One of the best mascaras out there
reviews.review_text: Oh. My. God. This mascara is amazing. It makes my lashes look so long and really defines them. It also doesn't clump. The brush is also great.
This mascara goes on really nice and I like the brush...better than my last mascara. It stays on all day, but it isn't difficult to get off.
This Mascara does exactly what it says - longer, fuller lashes. I always get asked what I'm wearing. I love that it is without many of the chemicals that most cosmetics use.
This mascara is never clumpy & lengthens & separates my thin lashes. I have tried almost every brand & this one is my fave!
This is my second tube of this mascara. It's perfect in every way and the price is good too.

This mascara is only used PROPERLY when you use an eyelash curler!! The lashes come out crazy dark and crazy long and volumized. Reviewers who found less than ideal results likely did not utilize an eyelash curler or just are not familiar with how to put on mascara. Yes you may need to put on more than one swipe to show results, if you don't know how to use makeup you won't be able to appreciate the results. I've probably tried about 40 mascaras in my life, some I buy multiple times, some I know to never use again. Buxom will produce the sexiest lashes, just play with it to see how many layers, what angle to use the brush etc works for you because every girls eyelashes are DIFFERENT. Best part of Buxom, check out the ingredients :) AND in my experience never leaving black stuff under your eyes throughout the day.

This is perfect for every day wear. I love how it makes my eyelashes look longer and fuller, without any clumps. Plus, it comes with tips folded up in the box. It may not seem like a big deal, but its never crossed my mind to apply to the tips of my lashes first, and then do a second coat starting at the base. Duh!
absoulutely the BEST mascara! Been buying it ever since it came out and I would never ever use a different one :) Lasts forerver and makes my lashes long and full!
I love the Buxom Lash. Put a few curls in your lashes, brush on your Buxom and your lashes look fab. No smudge.

I love this mascara. I got it for Christmas in the sephora favorites sampler mascara set and this one is my favorite out of the set. It's the best mascara I've ever tried. It volumizes and lengthens. The only thing I don't like is the crunchy, dry feeling it gives my eyelashes. But I always use an eyelash primer so it's not a problem for me :) will definitely repurchase!
Love this mascara!!!

I have used this for about a year and a half and I love it! it defines my lashes very well and it isn't clumpy at all. I bought them for my bridesmaids as part of their gifts because I have to share my find. I wish it came in a chocolate or espresso though.

Okay let me say this. This mascara is amazing for people that have curled lashes.  WIth that said, I purchased this mascara because I knew from the wand, that it would apply beautifully. Well, I was right. The bristles are amazing!!! They are the flexible ones; got rid of clumps and separated the lashes evenly. The color is jet black, so nice. Unfortunately, this is not a waterproof mascara, and did not hold my asian eyelashes. They decurled in an hour, but other than that, this is a great mascara, definitely try it out if you havent yet.

I discovered this mascara while in the US last year. The girl who sold it to me said it was the best mascara she had ever used and her lashes were fab. I bought it tried it and then bought another 3 to take home, I was going to share but ended up keeping them for myself it is so good.

absolutely love this mascara for several reasons. 1. NO SMUDGING under the eyes ! Even with morning eye gel etc! 2.You can build on it...so light coat for work, a few extra coats for evening 3. NO CLUMPS ! 4. Comes off with soap and water, (or cleanser and water) no need for special eye makeup remover !!

I've tried a lot of different mascara products and this is by far the best around! I have short, thin lashes and Buxom makes them thick & full. The brush is amazing and helps you coat even the smallest lashes. I ❤Buxom!
I absolutely love this mascara! it makes my lashes look long and full. My husband even noticed a difference when I used this mascara!
It adds volume, while keeping lashing individual. The unusual brush shape covers lashes beautifully! Less strokes to cover, means no clumps too. I *love* this mascara - its my new go too!

This mascara picks up every single lash and gives it a night on the town..It will fame your peeper with amazingly long, full lashes with no clumping. I get tons of compliments on my lashes, thank you BUXOM!

reviews.review_title: One of the best mascara's I've tried
reviews.review_text: I love the application brush in this mascara. It does a really excellent job of separating and coating each individual lash without clumping too many together and leaving crumbs. I do notice that my lashes look longer when I use this, not so sure about more voluminous though. The product itself tends to migrate somewhat...I have to check the area under my brow and the corners of my eyes because it smudges a little bit throughout the day. I am going to purchase the waterproof version next to see if that helps with the smudging. Overall, I really really like the mascara!

By far one of the better mascaras I have purchased. I have been faithful to MAC, but I wanted to venture out and try something new. The brush is simply divine. Follow the insert directions and lashes turn out picture perfect every single time. My only qualm is with the formula. I use baby wash in place of eye makeup remover and it doesn't quite get it all. MAC's Haute and Naughty mascara came off with just water, this takes a bit more effort.  As far as look, my lashes look defined, longer and more voluminous. I would highly recommend this product, it is not a staple in my makeup routine.
This mascara goes on so well and does not clump at all! It is very black and stays on. I will definitely buy this again.
The applicator brush is the reason I love this. Stays on nicely.

I have used this mascara for 3 years now. I tried many others during that time and before that. Nothing better at separating lashes, making them look longer and fuller like this one does without clumping or smudging. A must have! I use it under my two faced better than false eyelash mascara and the effect is gorgeous, super long, full, separated lashes!
Great mascara. Doesn't flake or get in your eyes after a long day. It is non-irritating, for those who wear contacts! It also lengthens and doesn't clump!
I am actually returning this. It is not one of my favorites. I will admit, I don't have the most full lashes, and, by the description, I thought this mascara would add volume. Oh well.

I've been using Buxom Lash for over a year now. I love the texture of the mascara; not too thick and not too sticky. I have long lashes already, and many volumizing products just make me look like a scary clown. This is the perfect amount of lash boost without the sticky clumpy side effects.
I've tried so many mascara and this one so far is my favorite. It doesn't irritate my eyes. It is so clean that it separates all my lashes and they look naturally long.
Very lightweight and great coverage!! This mascara is really good for a natural look. It is an everyday mascara and so easy to apply. I also LOVE the brush! I highly recommend this product

So when i was about 11 (im 14) i started out using this mascara. We were walking around in ulta or sephora i think and i saw it and begged my mom to buy it for me. She and i never realized it was a high end mascara until i ran out and settled for maybelline lash stilleto. Iforgot what it was called until now. Im SOOOOO happy i found it again because this is literally the only mascara that lengthens my very course lashes. its overall a must have will be purchasing many times more (until i find a better one of course)

I have used this mascara for several years. Like other reviewers, I have bought several of the mascara samplers that are offered usually around the December holidays. I've also tried drugstore brands, but I ALWAYS come back to this product. It makes lashes lush and long without fibers, does not flake, does not melt on hot days, and washes off completely with your average face wash. What more could a girl ask for?
This mascara is incredible! I'm so happy I bought it! The best mascara I've ever used!

this is by far my favorite mascara. It makes me look like I applied a nice pair of falsies. It does a good job of separating my lashes and I haven't had any problems with smudging. I usually don't go for mascara that's so expensive but I tried a sample of it and had to get the full size.

This is a really nice mascara. I just started using it, I got it in one of those Sephora value mascara sets, and it's lengthening, and it's not clumpy at all! I'm not sure if it's very volumizing, but it's definitely lengthening.

I have bought this twice now and I can get over how full my lashes look. I have normal length lashes regularly and thin really makes you eyes pop and looks naturally Gorgeous!! And it's great for every day use.

Every year I buy a sampler of mascaras, to see what's new, give myself an opportunity to compare, etc ... I don't know if it's the big fat wand or the mascara itself but over and over I find Buxom to be my favorite. I naturally have pretty full lashes. When I use the Buxom mascara my lashes seem to double in length and thickness. I never get clumps and I don't have to bother with a lash curler or any other products. Two coats is more than sufficient (although it's best to apply the second coat immediately as it dries so quickly!). Therefore, I do two coats on one eye and then move to the other. The brush is perfect for my needs. I can get to the short lashes in the inner corners of my eyes as well as really stroke the outer corners into long, thick curves.I can even use the brush on my lower lashes without smudges or clumping of the lashes. With my Buxom mascara and Buxom lip plumping gloss (in Gaby) I'm good to go for the day. Oh yes, and the mascara washes off almost completely with soap and water. Surprisingly, it doesn't much smudge or flake during the day so it wears very well(surprising since I tend to rub my eyes inadvertantly quite a lot)

I'm taking a break from Dior for no reason other than I wanted to see what else was out there. I'm a fan of Bare Minerals and love my Buxom lip glosses, so...yeah 300X volum claim is definatly a stretch, but I am happy with the lightness of this mascara given its actual volumizing capabilities. Dior is impossible to double coat as its prone to big-time clumping. With Buxom, double coating works, and the results are very nice.
Best mascara for the price. Never clumps or runs. Lasts a while before drying out.
I love this mascara. I have short, thin eyelashes and this product is the only that thickens and lengthens them without looking like Spider eyes!!!

reviews.review_title: HOLY MOTHER OF PEARL THIS MASCARA IS AMAZING
reviews.review_text: This mascara is the most awesome mascara to ever bless the face of the earth. It makes your eyelashes long and majestic and beautiful. It is super volumizing and makes your eyes look all Whoa-there-watch-out-gurrrl
Doesn't stay on well and does't do anything for my lashes. Will be switching to my old mascara soon!

reviews.review_title: Goes on thick and stays on all day
reviews.review_text: I love this product. I received it originally as a sample with one of my previous sephora orders and when it finally ran out (the small sample size lasted a year of almost daily use!) I had to re-order. This one goes on really thick (you'll need an eyelash comb to distribute it evenly or prevent your eyelashes from sticking together, or do like i did and save the wand from the last mascara ;)), but it stays all day. I've never really needed to reapply at night. I love it!
This mascara doesn't clump or glob like a lot of others I've tried, and I use two coats. The brush is nice because it grabs & separates lashes.
I love this mascara because it really amps up my semi-sparse lashes. It coats nicely, doesn't clump and stays on without smudging.
Nice big full lashes in one or two passes. I love the feel, not sticky or to thick. If you're lucky you can catch it in Navy :)
This didn't seem to do much for my lashes. I didn't notice any added volume, it really didn't look like I had any mascara in at all. And that was with three coats. Just not for me I guess
I love this mascara! It gives the fake lash effect. I get asked all the time if my lashes are real.

Love it! It's not one of the pricier mascara out there, but it does what you want mascara to do! It volumizes, lengthens, and defines without clumping and it doesn't wear out throughout the day. I have worn it throughout the night and fallen asleep with it on, and it still looks good in the morning!

I discovered this mascara about 3 years ago and I will not buy anything else. It separates and lengthens each lash and never clumps. Even when it's almost out, it never clumps. Most mascaras I've tried clump after being open for weeks or so but this stuff!a good til the last drop. I'm glad Sephora purchased the Buxom line cause now I've been turned on to all kinds of new products! LOVE, LOVE, LOVE
I had loved a sample of this product I had received. Full sized product is clumpy. I wont buy again.
doesn't clump, and makes my lashes darker and fuller

reviews.review_title: I don't want it to ever run out!!!
reviews.review_text: OMG I am absolutely in love with this mascara! I am grateful to be blessed with naturally long lashes but this mascara takes them to the next level. It's like putting on big beautiful fake lashes! It makes them super dark on the first pass and by the second every lash is separated and in place.

My lashes have thinned with age, and while I miss the look, I have no time or patience for falsies. I used Diorshow for several years, and was semi-happy, but not totally sold. I got a deluxe sample of Buxom Lash, and haven't used anything else since! No, my lashes don't look crazy full or long, but they do look thicker and well defined without clumping. I've actually had compliments on them, even while wearing my glasses. Love, love, love!!!

my search for the perfect mascara is no longer a priority thanks to this product. i got it in a mascara kit, probably a year ago, and never tried it. when i did, i was thrilled. lots of volume, good dark color and it separates my barely-adequate lashes better than anything has before. i love MUF smokey lash too, but this one is excellent, and no clumping. i have already re-purchased and highly recommend.

if using this Mascara then there is no need to use artificial lashes....its really good .....the only thing I don't like about it is non-waterproof,,,,where as the waterproof one is not as good ....but definitely will keep it coz it gives excellent volume and long lashes

I have been using this mascara for a couple years now, and I think the brush is the best part (even if I run out of the mascara, I use the brush in other mascaras). I bought Boxom most recently for my mom's stocking and now she is hooked too!
I got a sample so it was dried out but you can tell this mascaras very good.
I do love this mascara, it's one I always go back to, but for some reason it just wasn't working for me this time. Maybe I've out grown it
Best mascara I've ever used. Does exactly what it says.
This mascara doesn't clump or smudge. I purchased this due to the store being out of Bad Gal. I like Buxom Lash, I may just make a permanent switch.
I love this mascara! I always get asked which mascara I use and recommend it to everyone.
This Product is AMAZING!!!! I barely tried it! DOES NOT CLUMP ! Goes on smoothly . and gives the volume and length you want!
Love it! Adds amazing volume and goes on super nice! This is my 4th tube- love love !
My Sephora had this as part of a 500 point perk package and I really wanted to try this mascara and it is really nice. It doesn't clump or smudge at all. Makes my eyelashes look amazing.
great mascara that stays on without the hassle of waterproof

I love this mascara. I first tried it about a year ago. I need a rubber brush and this was the biggest I could find. I tried it and loved it from the start. It's easy to use, though the large brush does take some getting used to. I have no problems with clumping when I use this mascara. I love it. Only mascara I use!

I have tried quite few other products. Everything from drugstore to name brand, this particular product has never let me down. I have never found a brush/formula quite like this one which effectively separates and lengthens while also keeping my lashes clump free. It is super easy to clean off my lashes since it is not waterproof, it also doesn't take 1000 pumps to get enough product on the bristles. I have yet to find another mascara that will make my eyes pop like this. I'm getting everyone hooked!

This has easily become my go-to mascara. Think I'm on my third or fourth tube. Wear it on a daily basis, and triple up the application for evening. Never had to use a lash separator and can count on it each time.
wand is too bulky. mascara ran.

Love this stuff! I swear by it! You can use it for more natural looking lashes, or really layer it on to have super long but not fake-looking lashes (like realistic falsies). The bristles are very closely spaced so there is ABSOLUTELY no clumping!  The best part: it stays on all day, but comes off super easily in the shower with just water! I've never sweat it off or had a problem in the rain. I hate waterproof mascara because it's such a pain to get off every night and I usually just fall asleep with my makeup on--no skin problems from sleeping with this on.

This is the best mascara I've used! I try others but always come back to it. It gives you great length and volume and LASTS all day - no more coming home from work looking like you didn't put any on in the morning! It's fantastic.

The super-fine bristles of the brush really captures every lash for a sweet, natural day look. I have very thin, short, and straight lashes, and this really lengthens and kind of curls. It's not particularly volumizing for me, but the incredible lengthening really makes even my tiny lashes noticeable and flirtatious.
This mascara is great because it adds a nice length. The only downfall is that it smudges after about 5 hours of wear.
Love this mascara! The brush defines my lashes, and never clumps!

reviews.review_title: Love that won't break the bank
reviews.review_text: The first time I purchased this I was in a scurry and randomly selected it for its cheaper price. But boy am I glad I did it is non-flakey, lengthening, and doesn't clump a bit! It adds some volume but is defiantly more to lengthen and it sure does that. This is now my favorite mascara and worth the price over drug store products and saves you money compared to other high-end mascara.
I love that this mascara does its job for its price.

I was really happy with the performance of this mascara. I will be getting it again. I feel better that it doesn't have all the additives. It definitely works better than the regular store bought brands. I use a primer with it as well. Finally found a winner. Good bargain too.
Fantastic mascara that doesn't clump! Gives volume & length... Defines lashes too... Doesn't flake. Totally recommend.
I swear by this mascara! I have the shortest eyelashes ever and it definitely lengthens them to an extent. It makes them look much more full! I would recommend it to anyone.
I've tried every drugstore mascara in the world... got this as a free sample. Never going back. Ordered a full size in my last order and love it even more!! Never clumps, great lengthening.
I really love this mascara. No clumping and does not flake.
This mascara looks great, doesn't clump and you don't have to apply more than once. It's the only one I use now.
The BEST mascara I have ever used. Not thick or clumpy, not spidery or flakey!. If lashes could be rich, this is it. Smooth and velvety you will not regret purchasing this product.
Great mascara! The brush picks up every little lash, making the eyes pop.

Best mascara I have tried at the $20 price range. Haven't tried anything about that amount so can't review on that. But my lashes are very elongated with this mascara. Works great. Does not clump. Washes off easily. Favorite.
Really loving this. I have long lashes but this makes them even longer. Would repurchase.
The best mascara i ever had :)
really elongates my lashes!

This is my go to mascara whenever I am out or have wandered away in hopes of finding another that can top it. It does wonders at lengthening and separating my lashes, making my eyes pop and looking awake. I cannot say that it volumizes much, because I do not notice my lashes looking fuller, but it is fantastic in terms of length and definition. It is also great quality for the price point. I would recommend this to anybody looking for an everyday mascara that does the job!
This has become a staple! Adds length and fullness to lashes!
It is easy for me to apply this mascara evenly on both sets of eyelashes. The brush doesn't tend to have clumps or deposit clumps on my lashes. Makes my lashes look big and amazing!

Most natural looking mascara I've ever used. Lashes are individually defined instead of clumped together. However, I have incredibly straight lashes and it didn't really curl at all (which isn't surprising to me... mascara rarely does). Didn't see too much added length but if you want a mascara that gives you the look of naturally beautiful lashes, this is it. For more drama but the same non-clumping brush, try benefit's They're Real!
I was hoping that this mascara will not smear.. But it does. Too bad :(

For me this is the best mascara. I have long lashes but almost no volume. This mascara make my lashes look like fake lashes. I love this product. In my opinion the secret is the brush. Just wonderful.
Not best mascara like I had hoped. Very difficult to remove. Doesn't lengthen as well as promised

Mascara is my favorite makeup item out there. I love trying new ones and testing them out. So I bought Buxom Lash, and I was not disappointed. This mascara worked great with my lashes. It did not clump at all, even when I put on a fourth coat of product. But you should know a few things about this mascara before purchasing, that I've learned to look when when shopping for mascara: 1. It's a wet formula. It's similar to Benefit's They're Real! Mascara. (if you don't the difference between wet and dry mascaras, a dry mascara example is either Benefit's BadGal Lash or Urban Decay's Big Fatty mascara. 2. It does not clump, even when you apply multiple coats. Either way, I love this mascara, and I will definitely repurchase Buxom Lash.
Best mascara ever. The brush is magnificent and the size is massive. Totally worth it.

This is the best mascara I have ever used! I'm really picky and mascara is probably my favorite item to buy and this stuff is amazing. It makes your lashes look so much longer and they stay that way for the entire day

I have long straight lashes that I curl every day before applying mascara. Some mascaras are too wet and they undo my curl. This didn't. It went on very smooth without clumps and I could do multiple swipes without problem. Very nice.

This mascara is absolutely fabulous! It is great for making your lashes look both fuller and longer, usually a mascara does one or the other but this one does both so perfectly. No it is not the best lengthening mascara, but the fact that it can do both lengthening and thickening with one product makes it a winner for me!
I absolutely love this mascara! It works wonders for my short, sparse eyelashes. Doesn't clump, or become dry & flaky like most.
I have used this product for over 2 years now and love it. It makes my lashes very full without looking clumpy.

I've tried everything over the counter there is, my standard favorite used to be L'Oreals LashOut for the lengthening without clumps but it lacked thickening. THIS, does it all and THEN some! It lengthens in one coat, but it also thickens and adds volume. I can do one coat for light days, or 5 coats for dramatic coverage and NEVER get clumps! This is by far THE best mascara I have ever used! And something about the shape of this odd brush works exceptionally well, I can get all the little corner lashes inside and out, but still get a good even coat across the middle without 5 extra strokes. Love. It. Can you tell?!! <3
This is my almost absolute favorite mascara. the only on above is the waterproof version!! Talk about volume, volume, volume. This better be in my stocking this year. *hint hint

I bought this over the summer due to a recommendation by a friend. I loved it but wanted to try some other ones. I bought Benefit's They're Real and had to return it for this one. Benefit's made my lashes feel rubbery and heavy while this one made them feel natural while extending my lashes. And the brush is amazing.

I purchased a Sephora sampler mascara pack and used EVERY SINGLE TUBE of mascara in there. I tried it all, and this is the one I finally purchased in a full size. It was my absolute favorite. It lengthened and the applicator made it not clump; it's a very interesting hourglass shape that works really well.  I'm not 100% loyal, though. I do have to say that it's not so amazing that I won't try other things that weren't in that sampler pack. One thing I don't adore about it is it doesn't really volumize as it advertizes. I didn't find that it thickens, either. But it did lengthen and didn't clump.

I've been using this since high school and haven't switched to anything since! Sephora is the exclusive carrier of this mascara. This mascara lengthens your lashes while volumzing. Also if you have trouble keeping your lashes curled this mascara doesn't weight it down at all. I have straight lashes so this is the best mascara for my type. Best EVER!

I've been using this mascara for a couple of years now, and I'm still impressed with it! I've gotten samples of other mascaras or tried them out in-store, and even though all the other mascaras are more expensive, this one is still the best. The applicator separates all of your lashes, and the mascara is very black and lengthening. I hate clumping, and this never clumps. Sometimes in an older tube the mascara starts to dry out and gets a little too thick, and then I add a drop of distilled water and it's back to being wonderful again for months and months. I adore this product.
I love this stuff! My new staple mascara
I like this product. I hate clumpy mascara. This one has a nice contoured brush that deposits the product evenly. So far so good.

After many trials and errors, I have landed on Buxom mascara - quite thankfully. I first tried it as a sample and loved it, and now have switched to buying full size. It should be applied slightly differently than regular mascara for proper effect, but as long as you do several *very light* coats, your lashes will look thick, curled, and very natural, with no clumping. I'm very pleased.

I have long eyelashes but could never really show them off until I found Buxom mascara. I have learned that in order to get the best eyelash results it is important to use two mascaras. One for volumizing and one for lengthening. I use Buxom as my first coat, let it dry a little bit and follow up with a second mascara for length then finish with the Buxom. The Buxom brush is perfect for grabbing and separating the lashes. I get compliments all the time about how perfect my lashes look.
I've tried many other mascaras. THIS one stays put! I'm never trying anything else

I have tried may highend mascaras, and this by far has been my favorite. The brush is amazing, and the formula is great too. It definately makes my lashes look their best. I would definately reccommend this to anyone wanting their lashes to look AMAZING!!
I LOVE this mascara! I've tried many others, but this one is GREAT!! Try it, you'll LOVE it too!

I got a sample of this mascara last winter, and even though I use it almost every day, I just finally ran dry. I purchased a full size and couldn't be happier. This mascara gives great coverage, extending my lashes and making them much thicker. It doesn't flake or smudge, and applies effortlessly.

This is a perfect blend of volumizing and lengthening. I apply this twice to get the perfect eyelashes to last me through the day. Does not clump my lashes together at all even when applied multiple times. When applying, the big brush allows me to get every eyelash. I love this mascara!!!!

This is absolutely the best mascara I have ever used. I wear mascara everyday and feel naked without it. Buxom definitely thickens, lengthens, and makes your eyes so much sexier than before. It doesn't clump or flake either which I love. I found my new favorite!

This is my absolute favorite mascara. After growing up using L'Oreal, I tried Dior and then Armani thinking that it might be nice to have a higher-end mascara, however I was sadly disappointed by both. Then on a whim I tried Boxom and I'll never wear any other mascara ever again. It wears all day long without smearing or smudging, and at the end of the day not only does it still look like I've just put it on, but it also doesn't feel dry! Absolutely love it, and for as good as it is, the price is reasonable.

This is hands down the best mascara I've used. I recently got some samples of other manufacturers' mascaras and I tested theirs on one eye and Buxom on the other. EVERYTIME, the Buxom looked better. Longer lashes, curlier, thicker, better. No prep materials needed. USE THIS ONE.
Best mascara I've found so far. No flakes, no residue after a long day, great volume if you layer it a couple times.

This mascara works well: it adds volume and some length to my short lashes, and it also doesn't clump or flake at all! My one problem with it is that it doesn't hold my curl, so although I'll gladly finish the tube, I won't repurchase it.
I've tried dozens of mascaras and always come back to this one...full, no clumping, lasts great. I do have fairly long lashes already, but this really makes them pop.
I LOVE this mascara. I used to have to use 4 drugstore mascaras on my eyelashes to make them look amazing, but now alls I use is this one and it's So amazing and SO worth the 20 bucks that it costs.

I have tried a number of mascaras , and this is by far my favorite !! Will be purchasing this again, I have no flaking , smudging , and it separates each lash , almost looks like false eyelashes ! Very conditioning and I love the fullness I get ;)
My favorite mascara! Makes it easy to make your eyelashes look long and dramatic but not at all like spider-legs. Will never use anything else ever again.
personally...my fav mascara out there.

Not the best I've tried, but not the worst either. I have very short lashes and this mascara, although very easy to apply, needed several coats for me to even start seeing my lashes. You may have better luck.

This mascara does it all. I have thin, sparse, short lashes and this mascara defines, lengthens, and volumizes my lashes more than any other mascara I've tried. QUICK TIPS: try the waterproof formula for the lower lashes, and look down into a mirror below you when applying this mascara, wiggling it at the root combing through the tip for best results.
Personally, I found this masara to be the best I have ever used! It's great. And dosent make my lashes clumpy or stick together. Overall, it's my favorite.
Makes my lashes long and dark! Doesn't flake. I had been using Tarte Lights, Camera, Lashes! but I have found that I prefer Buxom Lash.
There are no words to decribe the awesomeness of this mascara. I have tried a few in between, but always come back. No clumps, no smudging!

I picked this mascara up because I love the benefits products and I just thought I would try this. I am a big fan of doing my lashes, if I had to choose 2 items that I could only use in the morning it would be lipgloss and masara. I always used the typical pink mascara from maybeliene. I have NEVER in my life saw a BETTER mascara then Buxom! I have to travel a distance to get this mascara and I do it every so many months but I would NEVER use anything but this mascara! I tried them all, even more expensive brands and nothing tops this mascara! I don't know what it is but it doesn't clump, it never gives me problems, it instantly lifts my lashes and I am a big fan of the eyelash curler as well, you don't even need one with this mascara but I use it anyway. I'm constantly getting compliments on my lashes ;) I will never use another product! Its worth every penny!
I've used this mascara for a few years now and would never switch. It lengthens my lashes and makes them look fuller without clumping. I would definitely recommend it!

I've been using this mascara for a few years now. LOVE IT! Goes on smooth. Doesn't clump or flake. Builds like a dream! Word of warning though...if you're going to watch a movie that you KNOW you're going to cry at...go au naturelle. This is not waterproof and will follow any and all tears down your face! LOL P.S. Buxom does make a waterproof version that is not worth trying.
good coverage but doesn't make them as tull as i'd liked

I am really disappointed in this mascara. I used to use BE's and it was good but I was looking for something more dramatic and this one got great reviews I figured it would live up to all the hype. I was wrong =(. I will say it gave my lashes volume and it was very black which is what I was looking for but that's about all it did for me. I have thin long lashes already. So I wanted something that would give me volume and this did not do it. It either grouped my lashes together that it looked like I had fewer lashes or since I have thin longer lashes already it made them look like spider long black spider legs. Which is not an attractive look. Really was hoping this would be my new go to mascara but sadly its not. I also felt the formula was very liquidity and because of the type of brush too much was on it would be on the brush. It's going back and it looks like I'm going back to Benefit.

After trying many brands of pricey mascara (Dior, Benefit, Clinique) this is hands down my favorite. It provides great volume without clumping or feeling sticky/heavy. Some of the other brands felt so heavy on my eyelashes that I would rub them throughout the day...not so with this mascara! It defines the lashes and also provides good length. Although it's not waterproof, I don't have a problem with it staying put - no racoon eyes here!
This is the only mascara that i will ever use. No clumping and really lengthens with extra volume. Worth the price.

I would totally marry it. Thickens and lengthens my pukey - puney lashes. The trick is that this product plumps and lengthens my lashes in a graceful manner. There's no vulgar clumping during application nor annoying flaking off throughout the day. A tube lasts a long time, too. I cant remember when I bought my old one.

You can sit here and listen to me talk about how awesome this mascara is, or you can go out and buy it and see for yourself. It's absolutely perfect. My problem in the past was finding a mascara that didn't wear off shortly after I applied it. It always seemed like I'd put it on and then 15 minutes later I'd come back and my eyelashes would look like they did when I didn't have any on at all. But this mascara lasts forever! People always tell me how amazing my eyes look when I'm wearing it and some even ask if I'm wearing false lashes. It's just that good. One coat is good for a daytime look, and even just two coats is really dramatic. I have never had to put on more than two coats, even for a night out.

I've gone through two or three tubes of Buxom but lately I decided to try DiorShow to see if there was a difference. Buxom is so much more superior than DiorShow! DiorShow was so clumpy! But what I hated most about DiorShow was that smell! It smells exactly like the relaxer I put on my hair! Gross! Back to Buxom, I pair it with the Tarte primer and both these products together give me a false lashes effect. The Buxom doesn't irritate my sensitive eyes and it goes on so smoothly. I've never had any problems with flaking or the tube drying out before its time.

I love this mascara! I've tried a lot of more expensive ones and always come back to buxom. It is just the right consistency and is very black. I love the brush too, doesn't leave clumps and lets me get every lash. I highly recommend!

I've used Buxom blackest black FOREVER and I've tried em all! The brush separates better than any, and it never clumps when pulling from the tube, therefore not wasting any product. It never smudges and it stays soft all day. Love!!! <3!
Hands down one of my favorite mascaras. It coats each lash without clumping. It elongates my lashes, making my eyes pop. Love it!

Yay no clumping! I purchased this after trying a free sample. It took a while to use up since it never dries out. It is smooth and the brush is easy to use. I was worried since I didn't buy the waterproof version but this lasts just fine.
I love this mascara for a non-waterproof. It doesn't clump. Rich back that adds fullness to my thinning lashes. Applies smoothly. Washes off easily. No irritation.
I love this stuff, you need to separate the lashes after, but you cant get more volume from anything else, i've tried.
I tried Bare Essentials newer mascara last time and have come back to Buxum. It goes on better and last longer. I am sticking with a winner

I absolutely love this mascara. I have tried it in waterproof as well and they are both great. The shape of the brush makes lashes look fuller and longer. The teeny bristles also help to separate and define lashes.

reviews.review_title: goes on beautifully, no clumping or smearing
reviews.review_text: I love the applicator for this mascara - unlike some others, it doesn't go all over my eyelids as I apply several thick coats. It doesn't clump and makes my eyelashes look gorgeous. Highly recommended!
While this isn't my favorite base coat or stand-alone coat (tarte is), it is an excellent top coat that enhances the volume and length without clumping my lashes or making them seem too pointy

reviews.review_title: Not as good as I remembered
reviews.review_text: I first tried this last year when I got the holiday mascara sampler from Sephora with about 12 different mascara brands. Buxom was in my top two favorites so I recently purchased it. The brush seems to be a little big and unwieldy--I just can't get the same control as I have with other mascaras. I couldn't get my lashes to separate without some clumping. It hasn't been awful, and I'll finish the tube, but it just wasn't as stellar as I remembered. Perhaps because the actual packaging and brush is so much bigger in the full size. It does stay on all day and I haven't had any trouble with smudges.

I am a mascara JUNKIE. The only 2 ultra great mascaras I haven't personally owned are the Lancome definicils line and the YSL super fabulous mascara. Gotta draw the line somewhere! I have, however, sampled something like 50 mascaras from all price points, and I can confidently attest that Buxom knocks it out of the park, leaving everyone else far, far behind in the dust.  Buxom is MEGA lengthening, VERY GOOD volumizing, and EXCELLENT at defining lashes. My eyelashes are of average length and density, but they're very light as I am naturally blonde. This mascara--in just one coat, by the way--separates, lengthens, and makes my lashes pop to perfection. I haven't had to resort to a lash brush or to declump the mascara from the tube or on the wand -- it's simply perfect.  For the $19 price tag you really have your pick of premium Sephora mascaras. In my experience, this mascara is far better than its competition, and it is worth every penny. It also lasts a really long time (doesn't flake off), and each tube has enough goop in it to give you over a year of daily use (though technically, mascara has a 6 month shelf life). I cannot say enough great things about this product!!!
Buxon Lash makes my lashes look so long and beautiful, it does not clump up and every lash is cover nicely. I love this product.
I received this as a free sample and fell in love. The brush is wonderful. Will definitely recommend.
Love, love, love this mascara! Best mascara I've ever used!
This is a really good mascara. It gives volume and separates the lashes. You could even use it on the bottom lashes.

I heard a lot of good things before trying this, and I was impressed. It really separates and lengthens. I'd say it lacks on the volumizing side. The tiny brushes really gets into each of your lashes, and it makes your lashes looks natural. And I always only use the waterproof versions, but this worked just fine and kept my lashes up. Even a friend of mine who doesn't spend money on expensive mascaras bought one! Definitely worth trying out!

LOVE this mascara!! I have tried others and nothing really compares. Totally makes me look like I have fake lashes on. I do have long lashes to start with, but I haven't found thefullness & length this mascara gives me in any other brand I've tried.
Bought this product because it was touted to be great for volume and length. I got neither even after numerous coats.

Tihs mascara has done wonders for my lashes. My lashes are long when I apply regular store bought mascara, but I wanted a change & decided to try this when recommended. When I purchased it & tried it on I was amazed on how long they had become & full. I love this mascara & it's always on my list to buy.
My favorite mascara of all time! Washes off easily with face wash or soap.
This is the only mascara I will use. It doesn't clump and you can later it for a natural look or for a stand out one!

I used to use Diorshow, but I got this in a sampler kit and I'm hooked! The formula isn't too dry, and it lengthens, provides volume, and defines lashes so well! I also like the rubber brush - it helps the mascara coat all of my lashes while preventing any clumps.

i have really long lashes but they are not very curly, so i raelly need a mascara that will curl them and hold the curl. this mascara was ok, but nothing special. it was also very wet and smeared which was annoying when i just wanted to throw mascara on and run out the door.
My lashes are not naturally long and this makes my lashes look longer and fuller. I get so many compliments.

I like this mascara a lot and the fact that it has some vitamins does seem to help my lashes--maybe I'm crazy, but they seem softer. However, I was using a L'Oreal False Lashes x2 Intensity (the name was something like that, can't recall what it was exactly) and that seemed to give me a more dramatic look that I like. This is a really nice mascara and it is the only one I feel comfortable putting on my bottom lashes without fear of it smearing down. Great purchase for the cost, and just because I know that drug store isn't necessarily the best quality, therefore not the best for my lashes I will probably stick with this one!

This has been my favorite mascara for the last few years. It doesn't clump. It does add volume and length. I use it with Lancome's Cils booster and have been asked more than once if I was wearing fake eyelashes.

After trying just about every mascara out there this is THEE ONE!! It makes my lashes just beautiful always get compliments on my lashes. This mascara makes your lashes longer, adds that curl and thicker looking. Sometimes people think I'm wearing falsies but I tell them they're all mine! I say try it, try it, try it you'll love it. You can also put on 1, 2, 3, 4 even 5 coats and it never looks to clumpy.
This is the only mascara I use, it's perfect for my lashes and adds tons of drama.

The brush was actually what I like most about this mascara. I normally love the big, natural type brushes like benefit's badgal but this brush was a pleasant surprise. It didn't hold an excessive amount of mascara, so clumping wasn't an issue. Nor did it smudge.
It doesn't feel heavy and it does a thorough job

MY all time fav. Mascara. I have tried plenty of others, but i always come back to this one!!!! It is great. Get it if you need length on your Lashes. I already have a lot of lashes i just need them to be longer, then i would be the happyiest gal in the world. Check it out!!!
very good mascara! slightly volumizing, dries quickly and long-lasting. excellent quality for the price.

I've been using this mascara for years and absolutely love it! It gives me long, full, voluminous lashes. The brush is awesome, the mascara goes on smooth and thick yet it never clumps. I absolutely love it!

I like trying out mascaras, from high-end to the ones you can get at Wal-Mart, still looking for my perfect one. This one is the one I always come back to. My mother swears by it, so do many of my friends. Simply, this one is the best. Brush separates lashes just right, mascara is indeed back (not grayish like some other ones (Lancôme for example)), doesn’t smear, or leave marks on eye lids, if you lashes are long enough to touch it during the day, like Yves Saint Laurent Volume Effet, and it comes off easy. In other words definitely try it, it’s great.
Good mascara. Had to layer more than I wanted, so took it back. If you have thicker lashes (I don't), this is probably a great selection.

I dont know what is wrong with you people who said negative things but this mascara is FANTASTIC! I got a sample from Sephora and I cant wait to purchase a full size. It volumizes, lengthen, detangles...you name it! Well done Bare Essenctuals!
Best mascara I have ever worn, but I can't rate it perfect because I don't think it lasts as long as it should. Beyond that though, amazing for length, definition and thickness.
I'm really not a fan. I love the waterproof version of this mascara, but this one does little more than tint your lashes. It lacks volume or length. A waste of money.
This mascara has a great volume and color quality but can be chunky so make sure to only apply once!
This is by far the worst mascara I have ever used. I tried to take it back but they wouldnt take it. It just clumped like no other. And when it was on, it felt really wet, like it wasn't drying.

This mascara is by far the best I have ever used. Love love love! I have sensitive lashes (that will fall out when they don't agree with my mascara) and wear contacts and this stuff goes all day without irritating my eyes or lashes. Actually, my lashes are the longest and thickest they've been in a while. Worth the money! And lasts quite a while. Granted I've probably used this mascara a little longer than you're supposed to for one tube but I haven't had an issue.

I got this mascara as a sample a few years ago when I was hunting for the perfect mascara. This is it. It doesn't clump, leave black rings around your eyes, or flake. I love it and it's well worth the money.
I love how long my lashes get and the thickness. Buxom is a terrific mascara. I've been using it for years now.

I am an Asian and I have stubbornly straight and fine lashes. I have tried more than 10 high-end mascaras but not a single one that was made for my lashes, until I met this mascara. The gaps of the bristles are just about right for my lashes, and my lashes stay fully volumized and curled all day long! Most importantly, it doesn't cause any clumps like the many mascaras in the market. Thank you Buxom!

reviews.review_title: The Crème de la Crème of Mascaras
reviews.review_text: I have reviewed this product before, but wanted to update with a photo of it in use. The Buxom Lash mascara is a miracle in a bottle -- and that's no exaggeration. I don't foresee myself using any other product, unless by some unfortunate circumstance, it is discontinued.  For the photo, please note that I use a crazy number of layers (which should be pretty obvious).  Good luck finding a great mascara! You won't be disappointed if you buy this one. :)

reviews.review_title: The Crème de la Crème of Mascaras
reviews.review_text: I have reviewed this product before, but wanted to update with a photo of it in use. The Buxom Lash mascara is a miracle in a bottle -- and that's no exaggeration. I don't foresee myself using any other product, unless by some unfortunate circumstance, it is discontinued.  For the photo, please note that I use a crazy number of layers (which should be pretty obvious).  Good luck finding a great mascara! You won't be disappointed if you buy this one. :)

I received this product as a sample when I purchased DiorShow mascara. When my DiorShow ran low, I gave this mascara a whirl. I love it! The brush is much better at defining, and it doesn't clump anywhere near as much as my previous favorite mascara. Bought one for my Sissy too!
This is my all time favorite mascara. I feel like this is one that lives up to the hype - with just a few sweeps it DOES give me amazingly full lashes. LOVE IT!
This mascara is amazing!!!!!!! it doesnt clump and it is almost waterproof and it lasts all day!!!!!!!!!!! I love this and getting this again
This is the best mascara ever! Can't live without it!

I've been buying this mascara for a couple of years now. It does what it promises to do. You can build up the volume without messy clumps. It's great for a natural or a vampy look. I'm also allergic to a lot of mascaras. I've never had a reaction to this, so to me, it's worth every penny.

I love this mascara. I have thin fine short lashes and tend to get it all over, but this is easy to apply. Before Buxom, my mascara was always smudged and flaked by the evening. This is a very long wearing product. I love this mascara!
This mascara is awesome! I use it every day! i love the brush it coats my lashes perfectly! i barely ever have clumping. this is very volumizing! i recommend this to everyone!

This is the most amazing mascara I have ever applied. I have very sensitive eyes, so most other mascaras cause my eyes to burn after a couple of hours. I have tried other mascaras for sensitive eyes, but this one makes my lashes look AMAZING! The only downside is it does run after wearing for a few hours, so I just apply Lash Genius on top. So worth the price.

I absolutely love this product. My eyes are very sensitive and this is one of the very few mascaras i have found that do not irritate my eyes. I use this or Tarte Lights Camera Lashes Splashes, although I prefer Buxom because it's less clumpy. I have long lashes and love this because it provides nice color but doesn't thicken or clump.

I love this mascara and never leave home without it. The mascara makes my lashes look thicker and fuller. I usually use 1-3 coats. The trick is to not let the coats dry completely before applying more.
The brush is really big and hard to use. The formula doesn't do anything to my lashes.

I've tried at least 20 different mascaras and this one is truly the best I've ever tried. It creates volume, length, and definition in one swipe. You can also easily add coats and build volume for a more dramatic look without your lashes becoming clumpy or weighed down.

reviews.review_title: Great Mascara, But Very Difficult to Remove
reviews.review_text: I really like this mascara! It fans my lashes as well as thickens and lengthens without clumping. I only gave 4 stars because it is EXTREMELY DIFFICULT TO REMOVE, even with an oil based remover. The residue sets into the creases under my eye, aging me from 22 to about 30. Make sure you take the extra time to completely clear product away from eye.
Buxom mascara lasts a long time, does not dry out, and it makes lashes look great. It does not clump, flake or smear. I recommend!
Best Mascara ever!! There is nothing that I have found better than this!

This is by far my favorite mascara! No other mascara has lengthen and thickened my lashes all at the same time! Usually takes 2-3 different types of mascaras. Has a dramatic look & is well worth every penny. I tried using a cheap mascara & couldn't deal w it had to stick w my BUXOM!

This mascara is my go to mascara. Its wand defines each individual lash, resulting in a very natural and sultry look. The mascara is worth every penny, and is personally the best one I have tried so far. I know that many people say you shouldn't waste your money and that drug store brands are just as good, but the best drugstore brands pale in comparison. Many of them define, but after a few weeks the mascara gets clumpy and gross. I have had this buxom mascara for 4 months, and there has not been a change in quality or definition. This product is highly recommended.
After trying many higher end mascaras this has been by far the best! It really lengthens and defines each lash and stays on all day. I'm also in love with the brush.

I absolutely adore this mascara. If you're looking for nice definition and clear separation this mascara is a great choice (think thick Italian lashes and lots of em!) It took me a few tries to get used to the brush, I'm used to the pull you feel when using a normal bristle brush. This brush is great though and keeps nicely -> no clumpy mess! Long lasting too! :)
Lengthens the lashes but doesn't really volumize.

I have kind of long lashes naturally, but they aren't very thick. I've tried a TON of mascaras and even Lancôme mascaras make my eyelashes clump and look like spider legs. This mascara separates my lashes wonderfully and creates awesome volume.

This is by far one of the best mascaras I have ever had the pleasure of using. I would call myself something of a mascara junkie, I only just recently starting spending real money on other makeup, but have always been willing to shell out a lot for a good mascara. This is the best one, just before Benefit's They're Real! mascara. I found that Benefit's mascara dried out pretty quickly in its tube, but not Buxom's! I have been using the same tube for quite some time (bad, I know) and it still works pretty much just as well as when I first purchased it. I am lucky to have long lashes, but with this mascara, I get an extra boost that really opens up my eyes. If you're in the market for a great mascara, this is the one!

Buxom Lash is by far the best mascara I have ever used. I consistently come back to it. It volumizes and lengthens, and the brush provides clean separation on the lashes. It does not flake like many of it's competitors. Cleans off easily.
This is seriously this best mascara i have ever used. So awesome!

reviews.review_title: I wish I could have tried this.
reviews.review_text: I bought this and it looked like it was either used or old. This was before I knew of Sephora's return policy so it just ended up in the trash. Seriously so upset because I wanted to a cheaper yet still high end mascara. Guess I will just stick to my 50 dollars mascara. :(

reviews.review_title: Just about everything that I want in a mascara
reviews.review_text: I wanted a mascara that wouldn't flake or clump and be easy to apply to my lashes. I already have thick long black lashes; I use mascara to help keep the curl and define my eyes a bit better. After all day wear there is minimal flaking on my bottom lid, it does not clump my lashes nor are there clumps in the application, and it holds the curl well. I only apply one coat and I am happy with the result. If I accidentally rub my eye there is no noticeable smudge and it does not burn my eyes. I will definitely purchase in the future.

reviews.review_title: Lashes that go on for miles!
reviews.review_text: I am extremely picky about mascara and find myself changing brands every few times I buy mascaras because it's almost as if my lashes get used to a certain brand and no longer respond to a certain brand's formula. I know, sounds weird, but it is true! However, I recently decided to buy the Buxom Lash brand and so far I am loving it. It seems to have a lot of staying power, doesn't flake or smudge, and washes off fairly easily in the shower (could be a bit better in that department, but overall not bad). It really lengthens, defines, and volumizes my lashes. I think it's hard to find a brand/formula that does all three without making you look like you have spider lashes or clumping terribly. I get very few clumps with this mascara, if any, and when I do they are easily brushed out with a lash comb or removed with a q-tip. I do use a lash primer underneath this mascara to really bring out my lashes (I use Tarte's lash primer). I really like the thick brush as it coats every lash very well. It is just a tiny bit tricky to get the tinier lashes in the corners of my eyes, but with a little practice it's manageable.

reviews.review_title: must have for people with unnoticable lashes
reviews.review_text: I always has an issue with my very thin and short lashes and was never able to make them pop as i would have liked. This mascara changed that and now i always have noticably longer and fuller looking eyelashes! love this!!!
Great mascara. When they say blackest black, they mean it!
I've been using this mascara for over a year and keep coming back for more! I have sensitive eyes and wear contacts and I've never had a problem with this brand.

At first I purchased this and didn't really like it, as I have very fine lashes that aren't thick at all, I was looking for a product that would make my lashes stand out but still look natural. After giving it another go I fell in LOVE! I had to pair it up with a darker mascara because my eyelashes are dark brown and my hair is black so they look kinda invisible in comparison. But the result was long, full, dark, lush looking lashes! I love it, the brush is great and also is able to reach my bottom lashes and make them stand out as well. This will be my favorite mascara for a looong time!

After doing some research for on awesome mascara I decided on this one based on the reviews. I have been using a primer and a Lancome product...but it seems they have changed the formula from the last time I bought it. Extremely disappointment in the lack of volume. I realize a brand new mascara is always lacking at first, but it seemed like I wasn't getting anything on the brush. After 3 coats and layering with my old product, I finally nearly achieved the results I was looking for. I have been hearing about people layering up to 3 different products, but was hoping Buxom Lash would give me the volume I was looking for all it's self. WRONG!
this is my favorite mascara and its good for you!
At first it was pretty clumpy, but that was because I was just waking up and putting it on. Once you curl your eyelashes it does wonders to lengthen and define your eyelashes.

I have two favourite mascaras - and believe me I've tried a lot! - and theyre both buxom. I've repurchased this countless times, and keep going back to it. The formula is amazing, my lashes just look gorgeous. Not a single more high end mascara that I've used comes close.
My new favorite mascara. The brush is rubber and so it doesn't clump at all and you need to do very little after you put it on (in the way of separating your eyelashes etc). Really love it.

I love this mascara! Its definitely one of my favorites and I have tried a lot. My lashes look really long and thick and I usually only need one coat. My lashes don't look clumpy. I like to use a lengthening mascara and then the Buxom on the outer lashes only. It looks like I put on false lashes!

I wanted a mascara that gave me full, dramatic lashes, without costing too much. I tried this particular mascara in-store with the test mascara brushes, and it clumped immediately. I looked at the brush that comes with the Buxom mascara, and decided that would make the difference - and it definitely does. It makes my lashes appear longer and darker, and separates them well. Unfortunately, the one thing it doesn't do is really make them appear that much fuller. I have long, dark skinny eyelashes. It looks great, to be sure, but it isn't quite what I was going for.

This was my first time trying a Buxom product. I usually was a Two-Faced Mascara girl but when they changed the formula to the Lash Injection I was left to find an alternative. I was surprised actually at how amazing the Buxom mascara was. With even just one coat, I had full flirty lashes but with two it's comparable to falsies. I absolutely LOVE this mascara. It even comes with an application guide inside for optimal lash results. I use it every day, and it is long lasting. Depening on if you are a glass half full or glass half empty kind of gal the long lasting feature could be a downside to this product. It takes a decent eye makeup remover to fully take off. Overall though this is an excellent product, and I definitely recommend it!
This mascara really makes my lashes pop! It doesn't smudge and lats all day long.

I got this in a gift bag.....and i remember tell my friend i hope this don't work because then im going to want to buy it.....an sure enough!! it the best mascara i have tried to date!!! my lashes are little and short an but when i put buxom on they look like falsies and i get complimented on them all the time!! i absolutely love this product!

I love this mascara I've ever used. I have been disappointed with other brands because they will either clump together or I will put way to much on so they look spidery. The applicator on this mascara however prevents that from happening. I even forget to take it off when I go to the gym or running, and I've never had it smudge or wipe off. This is the only mascara I use and trust!
I LOVE mascaras and this is my favorite. It has a very defined natural look at the end. It separate, defines and voluminizes my eyelashes in a beautiful natural looking way! LOVE

I have LOVED this mascara for over two years, but for some reason, this tube doesn't seem as good as it's been in the past.  The mascara dries very quickly, a little too quickly, and it hardens, so it becomes difficult to work with. I'm not sure if the formula has changed, or if I just got a tube that had been on the shelves a little too long, but I thinik it's time for me to try something new.
This is lengthening, but not volumizing. I was hoping it would make my lashes appear fuller. It is a good mascara though. It is not clumpy and does not make my lashes stick together.
Not that crazy about it. Esp. for the price of it. Didnt do anything to volumize my eyelashes.
I have tried no less than 20 mascaras looking for the best. By far this is it! Lengthens without clumping! makes your eyes pop!
This is fantastic. It will make you look like you have a million long lashes. I wear it everyday.

I keep coming back - I'll never stray again! Best mascara. I like trying new things, but have not found anything close to the quality - glossy, never ever clumps, can be cleanly layered for length and intensity.
Been using it for almost 2 years. Love it! Great price! I've tried many different mascaras meanwhile as testers, none of them came close to this one, absolute favorite and it's gonna be hard to beat!
I strayed to two other kinds and came back. Did not realize how much i liked until gone! no clumping or spider eyes:)

Buxom Lash is the best mascara I've tried for the price. Lengthens, curls, and accentuates the eyes. Mascara needs to be replaced more frequently than most makeup and at less than $20, it's a great value. The brush is a good size and is easy to use. Great basic mascara! Sephora is one of the only places you can get it!

I bought this same mascara for a couple years. I loved it. It was like it was formulated just for me. Then something happened. I ordered it online and was only able to use it for about a week before it went bad. I assumed it might have gotten too hot in shipping. So I dropped into my local Sephora store and purchased another one. Same thing. I don't know what to do. I have tried numerous other mascaras and none of them work as well as this one for me. I gave 4 stars because it is still my fav...but there is something that isn't right with it anymore.

I have no idea what these other reviewers are talking about. This is the worst mascara I've ever gotten from sephora or maybe ever. The brush is terrible. It barely seems to get any mascara on and if I use the slightest bit of pressure it gets all over my eyelid. This has never happened to me before. Do yourself a favor and don't buy.
I have tried a lot of Mascara. This is by far my favorite and I will never go back. It's volumizing and doesn't clump.
I absolutely love this mascara it don't clump , gives great volume , and looks amazing !!!!

I ABSOLUTELY HATE this mascara! I bought it because on the employees told me it was a really good one.. I was looking for a simple on coat mascara that will not run.. This isnt it. It requires numerous coats and by the middle of the day, I have raccoon eyes. It ends up all over my eyelids and under my eyes.. I hate it and will not purchase it again.. Im only giving it one star because I have to otherwise, no star!

I have tried Dior, Definicils, and abOut 15 others. While some didn't clump, none gave me the volume my sister was born with! Buxom truly gives me feathery, long THICK looking lashes. At half the price of the others. I have NEVER had any clumping. All I Can say is BUY BUY BUY!
i find this comparable to bad gal lash except that it is less dry and more seprating i like the voulme it gives and the brush makes it easy to apply to all thoes puney lashes
I love this mascara. I feel that it seperates my lashes very well and with a few extra brushes can get them longer. I don't lose a lot of eyelashes or feel like it is damging them.
Makes my lashes look full and thick without clumping. And NO ugly spider spikes!

I have tried virtually every brand of mascara for my sparse, short lashes and this is my absolute favorite! It's inky but not messy, defines and separates, lengthens and volumizes!! It's the best and I I love the brush. By layering this mascara, you can go from natural to full lashes. I also have extremely sensitive skin around my eyes, and this is one of the few products that doesn't irritate. If I want a more dramatic look, I top this with DiorShow. Thanks Buxom!
An excellent mascara! It gives lots of volume without clumping at all.

reviews.review_title: Best ever! Just use a top coat to set it.
reviews.review_text: I keep going back to this mascara. Trust me, I've tried them all! The only catch is, it will smudge off . I recommend using a top coat to set it. Anastasia makes a clear one that rocks!
Not great coverage and wand is so big it actually puts the mascara onto my eyelids. Also I'm not a huge fan of the formula, it's okay, but not worth the $.
I loved it. It really made my lashes stand out! No clumping!! amazing
I tried this as a sample and really liked it, so I just bought the big size. It covers the lashes well without being clumpy, gives great volume. It does not hold up very much around water.

I had literally never had a compliment on my eye lashes until I started using this mascara. It comes through without clumps (I do have to wipe a little excess off) and makes them look so much longer. I like using it at the corners of my eyes to give my lashes a wider span.

This TRULY is the best mascara ever. Incredible color deposit with no clumping, lengthening and thickening to the Nth degree. Whenever I use Buxom people always ask if my lashes are real. Isn't that what we all secretly want to hear? Get it NOW, actually buy 2 or 3 (like I do) so you never run out!

My favorite everyday mascara. Goes on quickly and easily and requires little to no additional separating. Perfect balance of volume and length, and it even seems to keep my lashes healthy. Never clumps or flakes. The only tiny negative is that I have to use a different formula for my lower lashes. The Buxom, no matter how little I use, seems to smudge under my eyes if I use it on the lower lashes.

I love this mascara but it is pricey, it does volumize and it doesn't flake but it does smudge but that's after along time.I have long days when I have work. I'll have this on for 14-15 hours and I don't see it smudging under my eye until towards the end. I have Badgal Lash Mascara as well and I like this one over it.

This mascara has been my HG mascara for the past 3 years. I've tried other mascaras in the past and this one is always the mascara I run back to. It lengthens my lashes to extreme lengths. This mascara never makes my eyelashes clump and I have never experienced any dry flakes from this mascara.

reviews.review_title: Not what I was hoping for
reviews.review_text: I've been trying to replace all of my cosmetics with parben- and pthalate-free products. I do appreciate that this mascara is formulated without a fair number of damaging and potentially dangerous additives. But it added virtually zero volume to my lashes, which is what I look for most in a mascara. It also became a little sticky and gloopy with a second coat, and flaked a bit when I tried to comb out my lashes.  It is a good, deep black, and if you're looking for length, it will provide. Just not the mascara for me.

This is my my absolute fav mascara & I wouldn't be able to live without it! It makes my lashes super long & volumizes like nobodies business lol just a couple swipes & you're good to go! No flakes the whole day, lasts even when I sleep with it on, & easily comes off! What more could you ask for? Not sure how it would work in super humid weather as far as smudges but I live in AZ & we have 120 degree weather! I would recommend this to anyone & everyone!
Buxom Lash is hands down the best mascara. I love it so much, and I couldn't imagine using any other formula or wand. My lashes don't feel as beautiful without using Buxom Lash!!

This has been my go-to mascara since I received the mascara sample kit for Christmas over two years ago. My lashes are naturally thick, but this adds an extra ommph in thickening and elongate as well. One coat is perfect for daytime, and up to three coats to make a big impact at night. The brush is great, and I never get clumpy bits.

I heart this stuff. It applies so well, smooth, no clumps, doesn't dry in a mili second so I can actually get from root to tip and angle as I please. It lasts great. The brush is awesome. For over a year this has been the only mascara that I've bought. I like how if I want to apply a light everyday coat, it works and then if I need a bolder look, I add more coats and it still looks amazing.

This mascara is good at thickening, blanckening, and curling (sort of). Before this I was using Lancôme definicls, which did a much better job at lengthening and defining. However, buxom has more natural ingredients which is a huge plus factor for me. And because of this I really like this mascara, despite the fact that I get much better length and oomph with Lancôme.

I love this mascara, it's my third tube! My mother also love its, she steals it half the time anyways. Haha This really makes your eyelashes long, not to thick but long. Non-clumping and super black. I LOVE THIS MASCARA!
I love this product and will not switch to another mascara.
