I absolutely LOVE this mascara!! I used to have a problem with my lashes always breaking and/or falling out. I made sure to always wash off my old mascara before I went to bed. The mascara from drug-stores, I learned, was the cause. It was drying my lashes out causing them to break and/or fall out. Not to mention some mild eye irritation. I started using Buxom and I totally notice a difference! My lashes are longer and fuller and they don't break and fall out anymore! My eyes don't get irritated like before either. This is definitely worth the money!

I have been using Buxom Lash since its come out. I still have yet to find a mascara that does everything, but this one pretty much does. I have very long and very straight lashes. This mascara does coat with out clumps, perfect for everyday and at work. To go out, I usually add a different brand to make my lashes appear fuller.

I own this in the black colour and I am really impressed. This Mascara really curls the lashes, and separates the lashes.  This mascara has yet to make my lashes spider - leggy or clumpy. It keeps the curl for a few good hours, and it doesn't flake.

The only store that carries this mascara that I know is Sephora so when I have ever bought another brand (Benefit, Dior) due to not being able to get to Sephora, I always regretted it! This mascara volumizes, lengthens and separates lashes. It's great.

Simply the best. I will never use another mascara. Makes my short lashes actually look medium-long. Curls wonderfully, separates beautifully without clumps. I am completely infatuated with this product.

I absolutely love this mascara. While it may not give you an over the top night time look, it's definitely perfect for everyday use. It gives just enough length and definition to lashes. It's not clumpy... Lashes are perfectly separated every time!

I seriously think this is the best maskara ever. I live in Mexico and i cannot find it here anywhere so i wait till i have a trip to the States to buy it and have enough supplies and wait for the next trip. My lashes look wonderful as if they were fake because of the lenght the reach. Amazing product
This mascara is amazing! I would suggest buying this, you wont regret it:)

I liked the formula, it didn't clump and it was a really rich black. The brush is HUGE though and I found that I couldn't prevent mascara from getting all over my eyelids. I spent more time cleaning up after applying it than I did putting it on. Returned it.
Not bad. it does make fuller lashes and it does stay on well. the curvy brush I had to get use to as it is oversized. I would purchase again.

I am super critical when it comes to mascara, and this is hands down my favorite of all time. The color is beautiful. One coat looks great, but you can pile on as many as you want without having to worry about clumps. Doesn't smudge or flake, perfect for minimal daytime looks or dramatic party eyes. I can't think of a popular mascara I haven't tried, and this one is a consistent best.
Dior to Buxom, Lancome to Buxom, Tarte to Buxom... you get the idea. Great price for a great product. Love the shape of the brush.

reviews.review_title: The mascara I keep going back to
reviews.review_text: This has been the only mascara I've used for two years now. I keep repurchasing and haven't found anything better yet. It volumizes, doesn't clump, has great pigmentation. It's a large brush so watch out for eye poking, it took me awhile to get used to it. The product is pretty wet at first, I like it better after the first week when it's dried out a bit, but that's more personal preference than anything. I really really love what it does to my lashes.
When I find a product that works I become very loyal. This mascara works for me. I also have all my friends hooked on it as well.

I really like this mascara. I use a electric Panasonic eyelash curler then a regular one. Then one coat of Buxom and my lashes are curled sky high all day! And I have long lashes too so other mascaras usually just weigh my lashes down in a couple of hours. This one doesn't! If I'm feeling extra boom boom pow that day or it's the weekend I may add another coat, after the first dries, to avoid weighing them down.

I am really liking the Buxom mascara. The brush is really easy to use and lengthens and separates my lashes. I don't however think it has increased the volume of my lashes. If you are looking for an intense dramatic mascara, this would not be my pick. I use it for my everyday, going to the office mascara

I love this mascara. It is a natural looking mascara for every day. It was a bit wet when first opened so I let it sit open for a few days to dry it out a little. I love this mascara and I will keep buying it.

reviews.review_title: This is the BEST mascara I have found!
reviews.review_text: I am a former Lancome vibrating mascara user and this Buxom product is better than that! It lengthens, defines and makes your lashes fuller. I am a convert! Even my 25-year-old daughter loves this.

I received a mini one of these with a 500 point perk, and I am so glad that I chose it! I have long eyelashes, but they're quite thin and this mascara definitely fattens them up and adds that va-va-voom factor! I will be buying a full sized one when my mini runs out!

This product seperates and elongates lashes with just a thin coat and looks amazing. It doesn't give a lot of volume and it doesn't curl them very well, but using an eyelash curler can quickly remedy this. I was not convinced I'd like it at first but I'm not a Buxom convert.

After having a horrible experience using the supposed #1 best selling/quality mascara from Sephora, I was ready for a change. I did my own research and am so happy with this product! It's not clumpy, the brush is clean and separates lashes, and it doesn't flake! I had trouble w/ tons of excess mascara coming out of the tube w/ my last mascara (Dior), but this doesn't waste any! The brush comes out with the appropriate amount of mascara on it each time.
I would have given this no stars if possible. Save your money....I have tried every mascara out there and this is so ho-hum it's not even worth a mention...definitely not up to BE usual quality!
Love this mascara! Lasts all day with no flaking or smudging. Makes lashes appear thicker and longer!

I already have long lashes I bought this because a Sephora representative aid its good for separation and thickening. It gave me Spider Leg Lashes. Which I don't like at all. I don't recommend this for someone who has long lashes.

I love this mascara. Recieved it as a sample years ago and im still using it. I have sparse lashes and short. This mascara makes them appear much fuller and longer and I love that the brush doesnt make them clump.

I've tried pretty much every mascara out there, cheap to expensive, and this one I keep going back to. The brush is awesome and really separates lashes so they don't clump. This mascara has become a staple in my makeup case :)

I love this mascara! With one coat, your lashes look long, seperated, and natural. Wit two or three coats, they look like long, volumious, doll-like lashes, but not clumpy, or spidery. It's like purchasing 2 mascaras in 1. The only complaint I have is that after a few hours, I start to get racoon eyes, which requires touch ups to my concealer (Erase Paste). Other then that, this mascara is a great buy, and worth the money.
This mascara is amazing. It turns my lashes into exactly what i need them to be, easily with out spending a super amount of time applying the product.
I usually apply 1 layer - a more natural look. For a bigger fuller look I'll add 2 layers (if I have time) Not flaky, easy to wash off

As with all mascaras, this one takes time getting used to. The brush is huge with long plastic spikes. I would nick myself in the eye in the beggining, but once you get used to the brush, you're golden! The plastic brush works better in my opinion to define, separate and lengthen lashes. The size is great for volumizing, and the hourglass shape helps keep your curl in check!  Really is a wonderful mascara! I would repurchase this one :)
I LOVE the Buxom lash mascara. Not only are my lashes fuller, but they are out-of-this-world LONG!
I love this mascara! It is so great!

Buxom Lash is, by far, my favorite mascara. I am blessed with dark, thick lashes, so most people would think mascara isn't important to me, but that isn't true. Most mascaras make my lashes clumpy and just way to heavy. They look horrible. This mascara, however, makes my lashes look very full and bold, without weighing them down. My boyfriend, who isn't a huge fan of makeup, even commented on how beautiful my eyes looked. I love this mascara!
The best mascara ever! Tried every mascara out there and nothing compares. I even tried a couple Lancôme mascaras and they do not even come close. I'm hooked.
My favorite mascara, and believe me I have tried a lot of them. I have short lashes so I tend to look for more defining mascaras and this does the job. Easy to take off as well.
This is my favorite mascara! I have used every mascara out there and I always go back to buxom! It makes my eyes pop!
I love the lip gloss so I thought I would try the mascara! It works great! Not clumpy and gives your lashes a great thick long look!

I am in my 40's and my lashes have started to look thin and sparse. Believe me when I say that I have tried all kinds of lash thickeners and almost every brand of mascara on the market. I got this mascara as a gift in one of the Buxom gift sets in December 2011, and I fell in love. It's everything you want and expect from a mascara. It goes on effortlessly, it doesn't clump, it makes my lashes look luxuriously full without looking heavy or fake. And whatever is in this formula has improved the thickness and condition of my lashes, because evn on days I don't wear makeup my lashes look fuller and thicker than before. It's also long-wearing and doesn't smudge or flake, but removal is so easy with soap and water or makeup remover cloths. I am a contact lens wearer and this doesn't irritate my eyes. I've found my dream mascara and I'll never use another brand.

OMG after all the horrible reviews I just wrote about all sorts of lame products I wasted my money and life on, I never thought I'd write a good one. I absolutely LOVE this mascara. I don't rave about anything... But this mascara is great. It does exactly what it says it does. The black is super black, love it! Volumizing, defining, lengthening... the works! No flaking, No smearing and washes off great. I recommend this to anyone who's in search of a good mascara. Seriously, buy it... NOWWWWWWW!!!!!!
Love this mascara , it adds a ton of volume with out being think and heavy . No clumping or flaking during the day .

I've bought this mascara lots of times. I love it. I use the black color and it makes my eyelashes look thicker and it applies easily. I have not found a better brand yet! When I have tried others, I have always returned here.

By far the most lenghening and flattering mascara. Everyday my friends compliment how long and perfect my lashes are, when really I never thought my lashes were great at all! First I curl, then apply a couple coats. It is a bit pricey for a mascara, BUT so worth it for gorgeous eyelashes. :)
I'm constantly looking for a new favorite mascara and this one might be it! Gives great length which I love! Plus it doesn't clump easily!
When i first got this, i didn't like it, but then it grew on me! it's amazing! i have short eyelashes so this made them longer and voluminous but it also looked natural!
This is by far my favorite mascara! It separates my lashes, and actually does what the description says! I would highly recommend!

I got this mascara along with 9 others (I think) in the Mascara Deluxe Sampler a while ago. This one was by far my favorite and the one I am going to stick with.  I have light, difficult to see lashes and this one lengthens them the best. Great color, no smudges or clumps. The only thing is I wish there were a waterproof formula because I wear this all day then go workout. I don't get raccoon eyes with this 99% of the time, but every once in a while I do.
It works great to make your lashes thicker darker and longer.

I love this mascara and I have been using it for years. I have tried samples of other products, but I keep coming back to my tried and true. I don't shed eyelashes with this, it stays put and it goes on great. I love that it is healthy for your lashes too.

I love the size and shape of the brush! I use it with my lancome vibrating primer first FYI. The thing I really like about this mascara is that it sweeps up the outer corner of your lashes better than any other mascara I have used. I felt like I had wingy baby doll like lashes! I wish the bristles were a little stiffer but other than that its a winner!

I have never been one to stick with a mascara. I've always grabbed any volumizing brand on sale at the drug store....until now! Once again Sephora is adding to my make-up addiction! I LOVE this mascara. It does what it says, it make my lashes bigger, longer and fuller. The only reason I gave it 4 stars is because it does tend to be flakey. If for any reason I touch my lashes during the day, it does flake off some. Other than that, it is by far the best mascara I've tried.

This mascara has an awesome brush! I have short lashes with no volume but this mascara makes them look full and long. This is my new go to mascara. I love that is doesn't feel clumpy at all or feel heavy on my eyes like other mascaras.

I feel in love with mascara as soon as I bought it. I always use a lash primer, and then a mascara. This mascara doesn`t clump over the primer, it effortlessly applies. The brush separates lashes and lengthens them. And adds VOLUME! By far my favorite lash product!!

I got this as a sample originally and fell in love. It adds crazy volume and separates each lash. i had people asking me if i was wearing fake lashes. the brush is great, and leaves a soft finish with no heavily coated feel. this has been my go-to mascara for months now. i will buy again and again!

I have very long lashes and this mascara makes them look nice and full with out clumping. I have tried many mascaras but this one is my favorite. I got it as a trial version in a gift set and immediately purchased the full size when the mini one finished.
This mascara definitely lives up to its name. It makes my lashes, thick, long, and luscious without ever looking clumpy.

Creates beautiful, lush, natural looking lashes! Best mascara I've ever used! And I swear it helps my lashes grow longer or become healthier. The only thing that could be improved, you only have about 4-6 weeks of great lashes before you need to buy a new tube because the formula starts changing or drying out. But I continue to buy it because I love it so much!

This is the best mascara that i have ever used!  I use drugstore mascaras because they are more affordable and work almost the same as higher end mascaras. (depending on which one you use)  But after using this mascara I am willing to pay $24. It works amazing and lasts a really longtime :) it literally never clumps and gives a really natural look. i have pretty thick and long eyelashes and this is almost the only ,mascara that catches all my lashes! TOTALLY WORTH IT AND HIGHLY RECOMMENDED.

I bought this mascara a few years ago and hated it. It was so sticky and all of my lashes clumped together. Trying to curl them was a nightmare, BUT I bought the mini version of it recently and it is so different. This stuff is awesome, with just two coats, it gives me extreme volume and length and the brush works really well to fan out the lashes. Lashes are also nicely defined and the curl holds very well. I already bought the full sized product and I couldn't be happier. I don't have super fine lashes, I have an okay amount, but normally they aren't very curly and aren't visible. This mascara works great for this lash type.

I have tried a lot of different mascaras before but this is definitely one of my favourites! I have naturally long lashes, but this product lengthens them even more, and gets in between to give them volume as well. I wish it came in waterproof, but other than that an amazing product!
I love this mascara! It lengthened and gave me volume and it was not clumpy at all. My eyelashes looked fake when I wore this. It's amazing!

I tried the sample size of this and absolutely fell in love! It has the best mascara brush style I have ever come across in over 25 yrs of wearing makeup. The full sized product is a little pricey, but unless it dries out really quickly it should be worth it.

I first tried this mascara when I received a free sample of the smaller tube. I like it a lot, it separates my lashes and makes them full and long. The only thing I would change is for them to make this mascara in the smaller tube as well, as I prefer it that way.

Love this product! It does not clump (which happens a lot with mascaras I try). I wear it everyday to work and if I'm going out, I just apply a little more than usual and it's perfect! This product is way better than higher end mascaras (like Dior Show) and you can't beat the price!
I like this because it gives my lashes volume and length without clumping. I would have given it 5 stars, but I can't use it on my lower lashes, it transfers to my face, so I use another mascara,

The formula has a great consistency, a bit on the wetter side. I love there are so many thin bristles, it separates and coats my lashes with 0 clumping for a super-natural look (which I love) but buildable. The brush is a bit large and awkward, after using benefit's They're Real, but I'm sure I'll get used to it. Definitely a repurchase!

I have short brown lashes, and this stuff makes them look long and dark. They always feel nicely separated, and even though I don't use waterproof it seems to stay on long enough not to be a nuisance. The only drawback is the price; when i need a cheaper alternative I usually use Maybelline Lash Stiletto (I like it for the same reasons), but Buxom always worth it!

I previously was using Fairy Drops and although it was giving me insanely thick and full lashes, the fibers were annoying me. I decided to give this one a try to see the difference. The wand is great at separating my lashes, but in order to attain that same full thick look I have to apply several coats. I would for sure pick this over Fairy Drops. I have deducted 1 star because i do have to apply 3-4 coats to achieve the thick full looks i like.

I first got this product as a sample, which I absolutely loved! It had a smaller tube and shorter brush. It did such a good job keeping all my lashes separate and they even looked a little longer. I purchased the full size hoping for the same results, but it's just not as good at separating the lashes. Maybe the smaller brush on the sample made a difference? I don't know. I still like it, it's just kind of clumpy. I do like how lightweight it feels too.

For the money this is the best mascara I've found. I've tried some of the other top rated mascaras and this one still comes out on top. This one has the best shaped brush and does a great job of separating your lashes. In my book I haven't found another mascara to beat out Buxom yet.

This mascara just didn't work for me. Although it did provide some length, but the cons far outweigh the pros.  There are 3 issues I had with it: 1) It smudges TERRIBLY. Within hours of application, there were dark, black smudges beneath my eyes that made me look like a racoon. Not cute. Plus, I couldn't remove the smudges even with a damp tissue. Who wants to carry makeup remover around wtih them so they can clean up after it it? (not to mention the need to reapply concealer and the like... it's just too much trouble.)  2) It doesn't hold curl at all. I curl my lashes, apply, and the curl is gone almost immediately. The resulting look is lashes that stick straight out from my eyelids, which doesn't make my lashes look long and beautiful.  3) It is not volumizing. In fact when I apply it, my lashes group up into families so it looks like I have FEWER lashes than I aleady do; and I personally could use all the help I can get. Plus, it makes the lashes look like spider legs.  I wouldn't recommend this mascara. I've found better ones at the drug store.

This is a good mascara. I have it in a sample size. It took a few days to get used to the bigness of the brush, but it's fine now. One thing - Don't use eyedrops while wearing this mascara, you will have smudges everywhere. Formula is not waterproof at all. That would be my only complaint.

I got this as one of the deluxe samples in Sephora's Lash Stash. It's a pretty good mascara in terms of what it does for lashes, but it leaves a serious smudge on my lower lid (and a less annoying one on my upper lid) and face around my eyes, giving me a raccoon look. I used this for three days and I have to stop because of the smudging issue. I'm surprised other reviewers didn't have the same problem- maybe because it's very humid here right now?

reviews.review_title: GREAT mascara after a few uses
reviews.review_text: I have long eyelashes but they are thin and I am very picky about my mascara. I keep going back to this one because it just does better than any other I have tried, all around. For the first couple of uses it is very wet and doesn't build very much but after a few days it is AMAZING. Also, I like that you can use all of the product - meaning that it doesn't dry out in the tube and get clumpy before you use it up.

reviews.review_title: Best Best BEST Mascara I've Ever Used
reviews.review_text: I've repurchased this mascara several times and I'll never buy another brand ever again. It elongates, volumizes, and separates all at the same time. It doesn't clump unless you really pile it on, but I only use one coat so I never have that problem. Keep an eye out for it on Black Friday because this past year I bought it in a duo with a liner for just $10. I wish I had gotten more as I don't know if they'll continue that deal this year (but I certainly hope they will).

This is my all time favorite mascara!! Gives tons of volume and length and does not flake off. It doesn't irritate my eyes either like so many other mascaras do. I will buy this as long as they keep selling it!!

I usually struggle with clumping, spider lashes and an inability to be able to coat my thin bottom lashes without coating my under eyes. This mascara provides length and volume, and the brush is wonderful. They thought of everything, even for a beginner with the in box instructions. If you use a few coats you are ready for a night on the town, if you use just one you are ready for a simple day at work. Also, I always smudge my mascara, no matter what, I have slept with this mascara on (not recommended!!) and woken up with nothing under my eyes. True to all its claims. I would say try it, as this is my new product.

Not completely wowed by it's uniqueness, however, it does allow for multiple coats without clumping and makes my already long lashes look like falsies. Noticed it doesn't really hold a curl so that coupled with the price, I probably won't repurchase but will enjoy it while it lasts.
I found this to be too wet and wasn't buildable. Didn't seem to lengthen or volumize. This wasn't for me.
Very dark color, makes my lashes noticeably fuller. Not overly lengthening, but that's alright. I like the brush. Only slight downside is that it smudges under my eyes after a long day.

I enjoy this mascara. I would prefer if the wand was a bit shorted and the tip smaller. Sometimes it seems a little to large for optimal control. I got this in a sample size and love it. The wand was perfect.
I love this mascara! It's not too wet and really volumizes my lashes. Wears well all day long and the tube doesn't seem to dry out as quickly as other brands I have tried. Highly recommend!

When I think of the word buxom, I think plump. While the brush is curvaceously attractive and versatile, it does nothing for my lashes. The only good thing about it is it doesn't clump easily -- then again how could it when you have to layer up so much just to get it to look like it's actually working. Too much effort, definitely would not purchase again.

I do tend to like mascara with a thinner formula like this one has because it doesnt tend to clump as much (on me). This is a very nice black mascara that doesnt clump or flake off and enhances my eyelashes nicely. I took one star off because there are others I like better for this price.
This is the best mascara on the market!
This products cost 19 but the I do like it. If you like full lashes then this is a good product to use. will probably buy again. just with is was not so expensive.
By far one of my favorite mascaras, hands down. It volumizes and enhances my lashes, what's not to love? Waterproof would be fantastic too though :) The minerals is always a plus too of course
It volumizes and lengthens alright but it smudges, not as bad as Diorshow with racoon eyes, but still it smudges. For that price I don't want to put up with any smudging. So it has to go back.
Love this mascara. Gives length, volume, gets every lash and doesn't clump. Good stuff!

I LOVE the brush. This mascara is not lumpy either. Goes on very smoothly, just make sure you apply thin layers, don't glob it on. It washes off fairly well, but I still have to use a bit of eye make up remover after washing my face, so I have a feeling it might stand up to a few tears quite well. It thickens lashes and lengthens lashes - all wrapped up into one product.

I have been hearing about this mascara for a really long time, and I myself love mascara. It's a good mascara, great brush. However I didn't get the results I thought I would, and would think that a mascara that is almost 20 dollars would be worth a bit more.

This is definitely the best mascara I have ever used. It doesn't clump or flake off in to my eyes. It makes your lashes long and thick, and makes them feel conditioned. I have tried a few other brands in the past, and have had to return them, as nothing compares to Buxom.

I had high hopes for this mascara based on it's reviews, however it is very clumpy and flakes off only face which then leaves marks I have to touch up...so annoying. I've used plenty of drug store brands that were better and not to mention cheaper!
Buxom is my favorite mascara - it shows off the length of my lashes and makes them appear thicker

Best mascara ever. I try tons of different mascaras and this one is absolutely amazing. It separates well, doesn't clump even with multiple coats and the wand gets all the tiny little lashes at the corner. A great buy!
When I wear this mascara I get asked what brand it is or if I am wearing false eyelashes! So I just bought my second tube.

I just got this this morning and I was quite impressed. This volumized and defined my lashes with the first coat. With the second coat they became even more dramatic. When I first opened the tube, I was a little concerned with the plastic bristle brush because I've had some mascaras that literally scratched my eyelids. Even with a genle hand. Not so with Buxom. It was very gentle. I'm very satisfied so far.
love this mascara!!! you can soooo tell the difference!! I've tried many mascaras but this is the one i am sticking to.

I have very thin, med to long lashes. I LOVE this mascara!! It makes them look fuller, longer and curls without an effort. I use this mascara with or without wearing eye liner and some days without eye make up around the house!

This does a great job of making the lashes fuller. I like the instructions inside b/c there was a technique for application that works great for me. I need a curler to help compliment this mascara. Love the brush.

Best mascara i've ever used. Brush, formula and wear is all perfect. Only wish it came in dark brown too. I have blonde hair and blue eyes and like how natural brown mascara looks for daytime and use black at night.

I really liked this masacara. I lost it though =(. But I plan on ordering a new one. It goes on nicely for natural everyday use. You can also apply thicker layer to give it good volume. It lasts and doesn't get clumpy.
I love this mascara because it lengthens my lashes gives me that fake lash affect without me having to go and get fake lahes
This mascara was just a little too clumpy for me. I'd find myself taking out large chunks after applying it. Once the large pieces were out, though, it stayed well and looked fine.
I find that the brush is a bit too big and bulky for my liking but the mascara itself is good. It coats well and does not flake off.

I received this as a sample and I must say I am impressed. The color is a deep, inky black. It does not smudge, flake or irritate my eyes. I'm not crazy about the silicone applicator and its short little bristles, but the formula tends to not clump, which is great. This mascara won't work miracles or give that false lash look, but I really struggle to find mascaras that are dark enough, non irritating and will stay put throughout the day. This one fits the bill nicely. I will keep DIorshow on hand for special occasions, but I'll definitely repurchase Buxom as my everyday mascara.

I ended up returning this mascara because it was so liquidy that it ended up all over my face. I liked the brush, but I have long eye lashes and it came off above and below my eyes before it could dry. I also couldn't get much volume out it.
I absolutely love the brush and its formula doesn't irritate my eyes, especially since I wear contacts all day.

I've tried every mascara possible, including the top seller Dior. But without a doubt, THIS ONE IS THE BEST! It is dark, light-weight, does not clump, and makes your lashes super long. The brush works really well, and doesn't miss a lash. DEFINITELY RECOMMEND THIS MASCARA!

reviews.review_title: Hands down best mascarra on the market
reviews.review_text: I love, love, love, this product. I have tried Dior Show as well as other high end mascarra's, and this one works the best. Paired with a shu umera eye last curler, you get the longest, most lucious lashes. I've been using this for the past two years. Great products!

Dark, thick and full...the unique brush on this mascara helps you get them all. It wears well - definitely no flaking or smudging. It's only shortcoming is that reapplication later in the day does cause some clumping.
The best mascara I've ever owned. When I have a new bottle I often have people ask if I got eyelash extensions. Its amazing. Get it.

i've been looking for the perfect mascara for EVER, and let me tell you, this one comes pretty close! It doesn't clump, it goes on very smooth, and has a plastic applicator for perfect application. HOWEVER, it is not waterproof- the only downside.

I absolutely LOVE this stuff. It's incredibly lengthening and defining which turned me off at first, but now it's my favorite mascara. The brush is rubber and very big which helps it grab and define every lash. The stopper on it is really strong so it's not clumpy at all and has the perfect amount of product. I like to top it off with clinique high impact mascara to make it more volumizing and my lashes look perfect! If you want them to look super thick I wouldn't reccomend this but its perfect to layer under a thick mascara.
This is my favorite mascara, and I have tried quite a few of them. No clumping, no smearing. I won't be switching soon.

I used to be a drugstore mascara kind of girl but after receiving a sample of this with one of my sephora purchases, I don't think I could ever go back. This mascara is absolutely amazing. My lashes are pretty short, and these do a great job of bringing them out and making them look so much longer. I have never had a clumping problem with buxom lash and the result is beautiful, evenly coated, voluminous lashes!
very clean feel. no clumps, and not too thick. leaves my lashes elongated and highlighted but not sticky or bunchy. love it!

ive tried everything from lancome to dior and cover girl, but ive never found a mascara at such a great price! this mascara is amazing and makes my eyelashes look 100 times longer and fuller. im in love with this product and i cant wait to run out of it and buy more!
My favorite volumizing mascara. I've purchased many others but none compare. Doesn't clump or flake at the end of the day.

I love buxom!! I have tried a million different kinds of mascara and none even come close. It isn't clumpy and makes them look much fuller and longer. I used to get eyelash extensions once in a while and when I use this mascara my friends think I just got my lashes done. Love, love, love it!!
I love the Buxom lash! makes my eyelashes that I barly have every noticable! Makes them look long and black! Must have product!

After reading some great reviews, I tried this mascara. It's not for me...I returned it. I feel like it didn't do anything for my lashes, and even after I curled my lashes the mascara seemed to straighten them out...

I have been using this mascara for years now and do not have a single complaint. Ever since I started using this mascara, I've been getting compliments on my lashes -- by friends just as frequently as absolute strangers. Whatever formula they have come up with here, the product works excellently, applies evenly, and both lengthens and volumizes better than the 10+ mascaras I've tried in the past. Highly reccomended.

The best mascara I have ever used! It lengthens and defines my eyelashes without any clumps, and I love how they leave my lashes feeling soft, not brittle or flaky. The only downside is that it is not at all waterproof, which I found out while chopping some onions. I wear contacts which can make me tear up a lot, so I cannot wear this mascara while wearing contacts. It will run and smudge like no other when in contact with water. I'm going to try using this with Anastasia's Mascara Top Coat and hopefully, that will waterproof this mascara.

My eyelashes are long but very thin and they clump very easily and can look pretty spidery at times. This mascara is perfect it adds just the right amount of volume without causing my lashes to clump. The brush is quite large with a lot of bristles that comb through each lash. My eyelashes look amazing with this mascara. Adding additional coats creates a dramatic effect that can be worn on its own.
Great mascara for lengthening and defining - the first mascara I've used with the rubber bristles. So great at preventing clumping and spider lashes.

This has been my favorite mascara for the last few years. I have tried others, but I always return to this one. I have no problems with clumps and the mascara thickens and adds extra length to my lashes. Also washes off easily with eye makeup remover.

This is my all time favorite mascara, and I will continue to repurchase it. Just so everyone knows, the tube lasts forever and a half. This was the first full size tube I bought, prior to that I used a trial size, and I kid you not it lasted me for MONTHS. The mascara doesn't clump, and it goes on very evenly. I love the brush, I find that the synthetic rubber brushes apply much better. Also, I have no idea how it does it, but it makes your lashes extra long. It definitely is a lengthening mascara, over a thickening/volumizing one. This plays into the whole lack of clumping thing. If you are interested in more volumonous lashes, think PLLs girls lashes, you want a mascara that clumps and is targeted for volumizing. However, I personally love lengthening mascaras because it makes your lashes just seem naturally really long. I get comments all the time about how long my lashes are, they don't need to know that I am wearing mascara. ;) Overall I highly recommend anyone who is considering this mascara to just take the leap and get it, the price isn't bad considering how long it lasts and compared to other highend mascaras that do not preform anywhere near as well.

I just wrote a review, but I want to add something.  My eyes are usually pretty sensitive to eye makeup, in general. But this mascara handles it with style. I usually don't have a problem with it, unless I accidentally stick myself in the eye!  Thanks, BUXOM!

reviews.review_title: Have tried them all, and this is it.
reviews.review_text: I am a brunette with short and fine lashes. Because of this, I've always a hard time finding mascaras that can reach those tiny lashes on the inside of the top lid, where I'm able to get root to tip coverage, and decent addition of length and volume. Also hard to find, are ones that don't flake, make your lashes fall out, smudge, or are so thick that most of the mascara in the bottle comes out with the brush.  I am able to get all of the above with this mascara from BUXOM!! The rubbery, hourglass-shaped brush feels as though it's getting in-between every single lash! It has almost no clumping, either!  NOTE: If you rub your eyes while wet, it will smudge. This, in my opinion, is not necessarily a negative! (Meaning, if you don't rub your eyes, the next morning they still look amazing!)  Buy it!
I've been on a hunt for a mascara that will not smudge. I've tried so many and had high hopes for this one, but didn't live up to its standards. Within a couple of hours I had raccoon eyes.

I didn't think I would like this because of the brush (I have always preferred mascaras with the big, fat brushes and have never liked the rubbery new brushes). When I finally got around to trying the deluxe sample, I was completely shocked, to say the least and within a week of using the sample decided to order the full size. It is very defining, volumizing, and lengthening. It does not clump or flake. The brush makes it very easy to get all the way to the root of the lashes. I love, love, love it. Plus, I had been using Benefit's BadGal mascara for several years, and had resigned myself to a certain degree of smudge under my eyes because I have long lashes, top and bottom, to begin with. Well, Buxom fixed that problem. No smudges all day. I also wear contacts every day and have had no stinging, irritation or other contact-related problems I've had with other mascaras. Best of all - it's not stiff and doesn't make your lashes feel brittle. I'll be buying this again and again and again.
The best mascara I've used! This is one of my most used mascaras and I would definitely repurchase this. So definining, non clumping, and lengthening. Love it.

I tried so many mascara in my life; I was trying to search for the perfect one and Buxom mascara is definitely the best one! Th shape of the wand/brush makes it easier to get the lashes in the corner, my eyes are almond-shaped, so it was always difficult to get those lashes. It makes your lashes fuller and longer and even though it's not water proof, it doesn't smudge unless you rub your eyes while it's wet. I love, love, love this mascara!
I love this mascara! It makes my lashes long and it doesn't clump. Definitely my new favorite.

I was talked into this mascara by a sephora clerk in the store. She said she loved and and everyone does. I looked at her lashes and was not impresses but tried it anyway. Very disappointing. I told the clek I wanted length and not as worried about volume. This mascara offers no length at all. Did plump lashes but they were still short. I prefer Tarte or Bare Escentuals mascara to this and quite frankly most mascara's to this one. Not a good value and not a good mascara. Also leaves black under eyes by end of the day. If you are looking for length, try elsewhere. Even cheap brands are better than this one.
This is great!!! Never clumps!!!
this mascara is amazing it separates and lengthens its wonderful.
Love it love it love it. I have never had nice lashes, they are short blonde and thin. This product gives me beautiful lashes!!!! I LOVE IT!
Just the right balance of thickening and lengthening, easy to apply, no clumps, doesn't flake or smudge. Stop searching! This is the one you want.

After you buy Buxom Lash you will wonder why other mascara's are still being made. It is amazing! The brush is wonderful and creates very thick lashes. The formula is thick (after a few weeks) and I love that it stays put and my lashes don't look wet. I am an eye lash snob and this is the only mascara I will ever buy!
This mascara is great! The wand is nice and thick and it made my lashes look amazing!

I have used this mascara several times in the sample and full sizes. I like that the brush is large with small bristles, but that means that you have to be careful. It is easy to get mascara on your face or eyelids with a large brush.  When the mascara is new and fresh, the formula is thin and does not clump. It does give both length and volume. The formula does not work well on lower lashes because it will smudge and run underneath the eye. It is a very moist formula, and you must let this mascara dry. (I once sneezed right after applying this mascara, and it transferred under my eye. It was a mess!) This mascara works well for layering with other mascaras, and I like it as the base for that. I also like it over a lash primer.  The only problem that I really have with this mascara is that it always dries out too quickly. When it begins to dry out, the formula begins to clump and flake. It's just so difficult to work with when this happens. If you go through mascara very quickly, then maybe this won't be a problem for you.
Love it! It is the best mascara I have ever used and I won't go back to my old stuff

I usually don't buy expensive mascara because I go through them so quickly, but I was looking for something that would give me more volume and I was tired of my usual drugstore mascara. I read prior reviews and noticed that this one was for volume and length, and came highly recommended so I went ahead and purchased it. I have long eyelashes naturally, and they can be pretty dramatic ith just a couple coats of mascara, but this mascara didnt do anything for them. It looked as if I wasn't wearing any mascara at all, even after a couple of coats. I ended up just going back to the regular drugstore mascara, and I'm pretty upset I spent $20 on a tube of mascara that yielded no results.
I love this mascara - it lengthens, separates, and totally fluffs up my light and lame eyelashes. It's the best I've ever used.

I am incredibly happy I bought this. FInally, a perfect mascara that doesn't flake or smudge and has a nice rich, black color. This makes me lashes look super long and separated!! The formula and brush are perfect. I like the packaging too. Will be purchasing again.

I always used the black, but decided to give the blue a try since I have dark lashes, and it wouldn't be a dramatic difference for me.  I LOVE it. Got so many compliments when outside. Guys and girls both noticed, but said it wasn't crazy looking but rather pretty cool!  The formula is a little drier than the black, so it's a little heavier on the lashes (I recurl after the dry and also mid-day), and it's harder to add some coats after it's already dry. I still love it though because it thickens and lengthens my lashes A LOT, just like the black did for me.

By far my favorite mascara! I would say it is more lengthening than volumizing, but maybe thats just me. I love that i can wear this very thin just to add some length and hold my curl, or i can pile it on REALLY heavy for full lashes and it does not clump. the soft fibers on the wand make it easy to coat every lash. I also have pretty oily skin and usually have a problem with my mascara giving me racoon eyes, but this hasn't ever smudged on me and it always a plus when products are made without parabens and what not (:

I have kind of long lashes and i do not like the clumpyness of most mascaras and i end up always going back to this mascara because it seperates every eyelash! no extra work needed, and it makes them look vibrant, long, and fierce! I LOVE! this mascara cannot find anything better

The higher the lashes the closer you are to heaven. Buxom volumizes my lashes like crazy, thickens, darkens, all while keeping clumps at bay. And don't even get me started on the amazing brush, it's definitely my favorite brush of all the mascaras I've used. I find that the more product I apply the more dramatic they look. Good thing it does that cause with a name like Buxom you expect sexy lashes that are worthy of batting.
i've had this for a couple months now and it's a great mascara, looks really good. but i've been noticing more and more clumps of mascara around the ends of the wand which is really annoying.

The wand for this mascara is brilliant, however and it's a big however, the formula is dreadful. The mascara runs, especially on your lower lashes and clumps almost immediately. I wish they could put the wand on a new formula.
Probably my second favorite mascara (theyre real by benefit is the best). Does a good job of reaching every lash and volumizing.
I LOVE this mascara. I love the big wand...the bristles really get in between those lashes! Gorgeous!

I have extremely fine eyelashes and it is really hard to find a mascara that I like. I have tried tons of mascaras and this is the only one that has given me volume, length, and separation. Definitely my favorite mascara. FYI I always curl my lashes before using it, which with the volume and length a lot.

I like this mascara; it volumizes, lengthens, and defines my lashes well, but not as well as Fairydrops. Also, I noticed that after 2 weeks of using this mascara (and only this mascara), the formula did not condition my lashes at all. In fact, it dried them so much that my lashes started falling out all over the place! Needless to say, I stuck with Fairydrops!
Love the shape of the brush and it's vitamin enriched formula doesn't break my lashes if I wear it daily.

When I first bought this and I saw the HUGE brush I was so excited because i thought it would give me a ton of volume. Boy was I disappointed. I had to put on like 3 coats of mascara to see the volume and by then my lashes stuck together. I DID notice that it separated my lashes extremely well, but this wasn't enough to make me happy so I put it away and used my Dior Iconic mascara instead.  Then, one day I CURLED my lashes (which I used to only do for special occasions) and decided what the heck let me try Buxom with my lashes curled WHAT A DIFFERENCE. My lashes were BAM in your face, separated, super long and if I let them dry and put another coat on they had VOLUME. I was extremely excited and I now curl my lashes every day and use this mascara.  What this mascara is great for: Every day, separated, long and natural-looking lashes  What I would not but this mascara for: Extremely voluminous, dark and fake eyelash-looking lashes. (which is a nice look for going out at night but not an every day look)  So don't give up on this mascara! Just curl your eyelashes and see the TREMENDOUS difference

ok, well at the very least 20 to 30 different brands. For me, this works the best in volume and lengthening my lashes. I still have yet to find a brand that curls my lashes upwards, so for now I am forsaken all others and Buxom is it for me!
I love this Mascara. It does not clump up. I love how it looks on the lash, so pretty. Not supper volumizing but can be built up.

I love this mascara. I does what it says. the brush is clean and does leave any gulps on eyelashes. This mascara is perfect for the night life. It last all night and does not smear. Lashes look long and sexy thick.

I got this mascara as a sample and I was not sure I would like the think brush applicator. Once I got used to using it it is great. My eyelashes do see thinker and fuller. I don't have to got over them as much to get that long full look every lady loves so much. I got the full size version to replace my sample. Nice surprise....the handle is longer for easier use. Thanks for the great samples.

i have fairly thick, long lashes, but it's always nice to have a little extra. this mascara REALLY adds length and gives volume, too, and the brush is good at separating lashes BUT this stuff is hard to apply! i don't know why, i think the brush is just too big or something, but i almost always end up getting mascara on my lid, which is a hassle if i'm wearing eyeshadow. the verdict? if you want length and volume, this mascara works - but you have to be very careful when applying it. luckily, it removes with water.

I love this Mascara! I have stubborn eyelashes that are all over the place and don't just all point in one direction. This product really works great because the brush is big and the bristles are long so they catch all the hairs. As some other reviews state it is a bit watery but works in my favor because you can actually build layers of mascara without it clumping which in the end gives you what you want which is long and voluminous eyelashes. It's amazing and I love it and will continue purchasing. REALLY want to try the Blue Mascara.

I do like this mascara, I like the rubbery brush (seems to get all my lashes) I like how you can layer the mascara with out have your lashes look clumpy. It takes me about 2-3layers to get my lashes looking as full and long as I want. Over all I like this mascara but I will most likely go back to my previous mascara (loreal double extend) I love that mascara and its formula and would pay as much for the Loreal and I did for the Buxom.... try it if you haven't ... have yet to find a mascara that I like more than the Loreal Double Extend..
I love this mascara!! Sampled it once and now I'm hooked! Its worth every penny! Definitely makes your lashes long and defined

This is a really good mascara. I did not need to use a lash curler before using this mascara. There were no clumps, didn't flake, lashes were coated evenly, and I found that my lashes looked more voluminous. I wasn't too fond of the brush in the beginning tho - I like fatter brushes. I got use to it after poking with it my eye twice!

This is the best mascara ever. I'm a product junkie so I keep trying mascaras even though I'm in love with this one and nothing comes close to this one. This mascara will not end up smudged under your eyes like so many others. This is a must have in your beauty bag.

I'm a mascara junkie and have tried a number of mascaras, both cheap and expensive varieties. This mascara has a great brush and really defines my lashes, which creates length. This is a perfect mascara for a natural look and does not clump.

Absolutely in love with this mascara! I recieved a sample size with a purchase and will definitely be purchasing a full size tube. It lengthens, volumizes, and darkens my lashes. I'm the type of girl who will wear 2 or 3 different mascaras at once, yet I feel comfortable walking out in just this.

reviews.review_title: A little clumpy, wears off a little
reviews.review_text: With all of the effort put into make up these days, I expected more from this mascara. It definitely deepens, darkens, and thickens, but the formula is quite thick and the hourglass shape seems unnecessary and I actually stay away from the ends because of how much product resides there: clump city. Even so, usually too much product ends up on my lashes and I have to wipe a bit off to prevent clumping.  Good enough that I'll finish off the one I purchased but I won't be buying this again.

I love this mascara! I've used all different types from $40 and less. This one so far has been one of my favorites. I have light short lashes. I purchased this in black and they make my lashes long and full. The brush is nice and covers from root to tip. Great product!

This mascara is really nice, it does not flake or smudge at all! It lengthens, adds volume to lashes without clumping, and lashes do not appear too over done. This mascara is a bit pricey, but it lasts long, and I use it almost everyday. I recommend!

I was excited to find a mascara that could increase volume and didn't have all of the horrible chemicals in it. Unfortunately I can't agree with the not smudging claim. The mascara didn't dry real fast, so with having really long lower and upper lashes it was way to easy for mascara to get in my skin. Then throughout the day under my eyes would get darker and darker to the point that I could visibly see black on my hand or tissue if I wiped beneath my eyes. I will be returning this product. :(

I was strictly a diorshow mascara girl, until I got a sample of this. WOW! it makes your lashes long, thick, and glossy. it doesnt clump or run down your face. the best part is the brush....big enough to get all the lashes, and its flexible so it really coats the whole lash. i really love this mascara and when I run out of the sample I will purchase a new tube. its even cheaper than dior! I am very impressed

I love this mascara. I first received it as a free sample this winter, and I loved how voluminous it made my lashes appear without making them look clumpy. This is probably the best mascara I have ever used, and I probably will continue to use it for a very long time.  My one complaint, though, is that the brush is rather large, which makes applying mascara to the lashes on the outer and inner corners a bit difficult--but it's still manageable.

I went in the store to get Are they Real by benefit. The makeup artist talked me into buying the buxom.  When i first tried it on, all it did was lengthen my lashes. My lashes are already long, I want volume! I was a bit disappointed. I hate returning things, so I gave it another try. Same thing, no volume. By the 4th or 5th time, I got volume! It's great, better than so many other mascaras I've tried. Even better than Dior!

I received the sample of this product from Sephora and this is the first Mascara that I have used that really does glide on and didn't clump. I am a heavy user of mascara and the 3rd coat was just as clean looking as the first. Wish it came waterproof.

reviews.review_title: I'll never buy another mascara again!
reviews.review_text: Please, Buxom, NEVER discontinue this gem! I tried this on a friend's insistance and I am on my 3rd tube with no intentions of buying anything else. When I first started using it, several people asked if I'd gotten extensions!!!! HIGHLY recommend this.
This is my daily go-to mascara, it is definitely lengthening and defining. I've also had it for quite some time now & it hasn't dried out yet. I'm very impressed with this product.

Once upon a time, there was a princess who thought she was happy with her bargain basement mascara in a pink and green tube. Then, one day, Buxom Mascara came and swept her off her feet. She and her unbelievable lashes slew the dragon, tamed the lion, found the Prince and lived happily ever after. The End.
I love this mascara because of its shiny, glossy texture. Plus it never clumps or flakes. I've tried so many different mascaras but I always go back to this one.
The initial after application look is nice.. Lengthens and volumizes. However, the effect doesn't last. This mascara flaked and smudged on me after an hour.

This mascara lengthens and defines my lashes, making them look longer & fuller than any other product Ive tried. I bought the Gimme Some Lash kit with several different brands & Buxom was by far my favorite. Great coverage but comes off easily at the end of the day with warm soapy water, doesnt damage lashes by staing on overnight, clumping & causing breakage. BUY IT!

So I got this mascara after a bad series of events where I lost all of my make up.. BUT got this and I fell in love, I have blonde lashes and they are short fall out all the time and are difficult to curl so I spend a while with mascara curling separating the lashes tan applying mascara and seprecating the lashes again and this mascara didn't clump and handled the whole process and wasn't too expensive and looked amazing! I highly recommend It
great mascara, not clumpy at all. lengthens and thickens and separates. perfect

It's my multipurpose go-to mascara everyday :)  I hate the caked-on mascara look, it looks so... self-absorbed. What I do like, are big, separated lashes that look like you were born with it; like movie-makeup mascara. Not all crazy clumpy and but not so natural that it looks like your normal lashes are just wet or something.  This mascara does it all for me, and the big brush just gets to every lash perfectly.  One coat for daytime at school and two coats when I want it more dramatic or at night.

This is by far my favorite mascara I have ever used. This mascara goes on light and even and can be built up to achieve that full look. But the reason that I love it so much is because you can use the entire tube! it does not clump up in the tube. So it's a great value too. I have tried so many that I like to start then they get clumpy and unusable so quickly. I am so happy with it! Have gone back again and again!

In my opinion, I feel this mascara is the best out there and I have tried them all. It doesn't break my lashes and my eyelashes look great and are in great shape because of this mascara. I highly recommend.

This mascara is hands down, the best mascara I have ever used! It lengthens, volumizes, and makes my eyelashes look almost as if I were wearing fake ones! I have never experienced an issue with clumping, fading, or flaking (even when wearing glasses when my lashes rub against the frames/lenses).  I highly recommend this mascara!

I received this product as a free promo, and I'm so glad I did! I normally don't see much of a difference in my lashes when I use a volumizing mascara, but this mascara made my lashes look really, really full, yet still natural. It didn't look like I had a lot of product glopped on them. I will definitely buy the full size product!
This is one of my favorite mascaras. I've tried others and always returned them and bought this instead. My makeup case will never be without a tube.
The brush creates full beautiful lashes. much better than I expected and it layers wonderfully.
True to it's name my lashes did look great, but it was not waterproof by any means. I had to continuously check my make-up in the mirror....

I have tried a zillion mascaras (not drug store brands), and Buxom is by far the best. It is great for my sensitive, contact wearing baby blues. It does not irritate my eyes, stays on great, comes off easily when it's time, doesn't clump, lengthens and volumizes! It does it all and does it well. This is probably about my 5th tube and I hope they never stop making it!

This mascara is great at lengthening and defining. It doesn't clump or smear, which is a bonus as well. It looks great when I first apply it, but as the day goes on, I feel like it fades away. The staying power isn't very long, and after 7 hours of school, its like I hadn't put on any mascara in the morning.
The formula is smooth and not heavy at all. It gives the lashes good volume and length. I wear even at the gym. No smudges!!!

I purchased this because of the great reviews for this, but I didn't much care for this mascara. I have really long lashes and this clumped and flaked on my lashes. It tended to give me spider lashes instead of lush lashes. It also didn't really hold the curl on my lashes, and it took a while to dry. Perhaps this just isn't for those who have really long lashes.

First mascara that delivers a fuller lash with out flaking off!. It has worked great for both my daughter and me. Reading the directions helped with knowing how to put it on to get the most uniform coverage.

I absolutely love this mascara! I have used a lot of mascaras from drugstore to high-end. And I was debating whether to repurchase my Benefit's They're REAL Mascara, but I decided that I wanted to save a few bucks and try something new so I got this baby! I am telling you that I am very happy about my choice.  This mascara really separates my lashes and really makes the look fuller, and at first this didn't really WOW me because my Voluminous Million Lashes could do the same at a cheaper price. But what Buxom does and Voluminous didn't was that it didn't smear or run or anything! I mean sure, you can always buy the waterproof version of Voluminous Million Lashes but it's hard to take off. Buxom doesn't run and it isn't waterproof. I wore this in the pool (on accident) and it didn't budge. I was so surprised that I didn't have raccoon eyes.  I have this in both blackest black and blue noir. The blackest black is really good at defining your lashes, but blue noir really makes your eyes pop. It doesn't matter what color your eyes are. It just manages to makes your eyes pop and it's super pretty.  All-in-all, you should definitely buy this product. It is amazing and is my favorite mascara ever.
I love this mascara because it lengthens beautifully and it doesn't clump. The definition it provides is awesome too!! I am very picky about my mascara and this one is great in my book.

My mom bought this and stopped using it, so I tried it and it is DEFINITELY my new favorite mascara! I always buy mascara based on the brush and this one is perfect. The bristles are the perfect length to comb through your lashes so there isn't any unsightly clumping, and it goes on very smooth. It also lengthens very well and gives the perfect thickness. If you want a mascara that is extremely functional for both everyday wear and more dramatic makeup, this is the one to get!
I love this mascara. It makes my lashes look really full and does not flake off during the day. I have tried so many brands of mascara, and have been very happy with this one.

I was extremely disappointed in this mascara. It didn't flake nor did it clump, but honestly it didn't do anything at all. It did not volumize my lashes at all and basically once I was finished trying to layer it on, it looked like I had just put black gloss on my lashes but nothing else. I didn't feel as if it lived up to its BUXOM name well at all.

I won't switch to another mascara ever again. I started using this Buxom Lash Mascara a couple years ago and in comparison to Dior, Badgal, and a few others I've purchased from Sephora, this one has made it out on top for sure. Best way to apply this mascara to really see its full potential: curl eyelashes for a reallly long time (i reccomend the shu eumara eyelash curler), take the wand out and apply 1 coat to the very tops of eyelashes, let it dry and apply 1 coat to the bottom to middle of eyelashes, let this dry, and repeat the process until it looks as desired. Add more to outer corner eyelashes as well, it makes it look a lot more dramatic!
This mascara is amazing! Makes my lashes look so much longer!
This mascara is by far one of the best Ive ever tried and I've tried alot. I wish they would make it in brown~ it doesnt clump and always looks great
I love the way this product glides onto my lashes. It doesn't clump and does NOT cause a dark discoloration on my skin as the day goes on. I've tried lots of mascaras and this is my FAVORITE!!
I received this in a set - the Samantha smoky eyes. I really like this mascara! It makes my light and thin lashes look fantastic. My only complaint is that it does flake a little.

I got this mascara as a sample and wasn't really expecting much of the tiny thing...however, it truly is a little workhorse. The mascara is supremely lengthening and defining. The wide brush might feel huge to handle, but I can get all my lashes in two swipes. I find just one coat is enough for daytime, but I wouldn't call this a volumizing mascara, ...perhaps if you layered coats a bunch. That's my reason for only 4 starts. However...the best part is that this non-waterproof mascara DOES NOT BUDGE. At the end of the day, I find no black flecks on my cheeks and it comes off cleanly with my facial cleanser. Very pleased and will buy again.

Got this as a sample, and glad I didn't have to pay for it. The spaces between the bristles are too wide for my lashes. I end up with long but skinny and sparse looking eyelashes. It does stay on relatively well on my oily lids though.
The best mascara I have ever used!

I have been enjoying using this product for the past couple weeks! I read the reviews before buying and was convinced this was the mascara for me, but it didn't do what everyone said it would. This being said I am not disappointed. I found that it is very lightweight, and it washes off very easily. I can wear it for about 6 hours before I start looking like a raccoon. I do not wear eyeliner, and when I put Buxom on it looks as though I have put on a small amount of liner. It looks really good! MY lashes don't look any longer, but they aren't clumpy which is a big plus!! I will buy this again!

This is my second time purchasing Buxom Mascara. In the past I have used DiorShow Mascara and for a long time used Lancome's Definicils. I have yet to find the perfect mascara that can be used alone. I like Buxom Lash because of it's creamy formula that doesn't seem to dry out and the thick yet defining brush. Sometimes I use this alone but generally I use a lash primer underneath. Either way, I have no problems with clumps!
its a good mascara, a bit expensive pretty much does what the other mascaras do at your local drug store. but overall good

People always ask me if my lashes are real. They are!!! This mascara is beyond amazing. My lashes are always perfect. I have tried possibly every mascara out there and this is the only one that offers the extra long lashes/fake lashes look.
This mascara is great. I love how smooth it goes on and doesn't smudge through the day. I will definitely be purchasing this mascara again.

My lashes are thin and sparse and this mascara makes them look longer and fuller. What else can you wish for? It also stays on. No smudging. No caking either and lashes feel silky and soft with the mascara on. I like this one!
I love this mascara for every day wear. I can apply layers of Buxom Lash Mascara for a wide-eyed doe effect without risk of clumping or flaking.

This is by far my favorite mascara and I've tried Dior, Lancome, MUFE, Loreal, Maybelline, etc. It is easy to apply, love the rubber brush. It gives and conforms to your lashes, unlike the hard plastic brushes. The color is fabulous, it's a shiny black. It also lengthens and defines. I do use a primer underneath which helps the lengthening. This doesn't run, even when crying or in the rain.
Love this mascara! Does not clump and makes your lashes full and long. I've been searching for a new, better mascara, and I think I've finally found it with this
I have been using this mascara forever. Whether you want light and simple or dark and dramatic, BUXOM is good for you!

I love the shape of the brush -- it is a normal wand with a ball shape at the end that allows you to go in and apply mascara to the inner and outer corners of your eyes, creating FULL, yet DEFINED, eyelashes. The wand is soft rubber that coats the lashes nicely. I get tons of compliments on my eyelashes since discovering this mascara. It is also long lasting and doesn't flake or smudge by night's end. Can not live without this! Priceless.

I am very picky about my mascara because I have naturally long lashes but they don't curl at all. I do not like buying new mascaras because they are usually too liquidy and cause my previously curled lashes to uncurl and then the top to tangle with the bottom. This is the first mascara that doesn't do this. My lashes stay curled and seperated all day. The only downfall is that it doesn't layer well so if you got dressed for work this morning and are refreshing your makeup before a date tonight make sure you don't try to add another coat, it clumps
Lengthens lashes, and does not smudge. Did not do much to thicken my lashes, which is fine because i like the natural finish. Good for everyday use. I would buy this again. Great mascara.

Love this mascara! It defines and plumps up my lashes without looking fake or too made-up, and it doesn't flake. Lash-lengthening mascara makes my lashes hit the lenses of my glasses. Buxom mascara really highlights my eyes without overdoing it. Have tried other brands when I can't get to Sephora, but I always come back to Buxom. It's worth the trip.

Love this mascara. Got a sample from Sephora and have been using it ever since. I think the brush is what makes it so great for me. (BTW, something I have read - it seems most mascaras are made by 2 or 3 factories in Europe, so the mascara formulation isn't that different among all the various brands, but the brush - that's what makes different ones, well, different.)  I have the stereotypical thin-lash issue. They're long, but just not thick. So I prefer the plastic brushes and wetter formulas, because they separate my lashes better and the wetter formula doesn't clump them together so I don't end up with sparse, funky spider legs for lashes.  For those wanting a volumizing formula, this isn't really one of those (although the description says so) - you really have to layer it on to get it thicker, and even then it doesn't really get that thick. But that's what I love about it, because for my lashes, the thicker formula makes them look worse. It's just thick enough for me, without the clumpiness of a lot of volumizing formulas. The brush also has a slight dip in the middle, which is good. Oh, and the brush part is really long, longer than the ones I'm use to, and I think that is also a plus, because it covers so many lashes in one swoop.  I think this may be my favorite mascara yet! :-)

Yes, this mascara will not flake because the formula is so moist that it smudges under the eye. I do not wear mascara on my bottom lashes, therefore after one week I returned to find a formula with a better balance. It really bothers me to have black under my eyes from dripping mascara.
I've not really encountered any high-end mascaras that really worked, but this stuff is AMAZING! It's nice and black, and doesn't let my lashes droop if I'm out in the heat.

I have been on a mascara rampage since I have stubby lashes and really want something that makes them stand out but not too much. I had been using a Smashbox mascara that made my lashes long but had a tendency to clump. Buxom Lash gives you defined non clumpy lashes that aren't dramatically longer but very pretty. For longer lashes I apply a primer by Lancome and then the Buxom over it....it really does the trick! This formula also washes off nice but doesn't run during the day and end up under my eyes.

Based on the reviews, I ended up purchasing this mascara. It seemed ok, but it didn't look any better or worse than any of my drugstore mascaras so I ended up returning it. I have sparse Asian lashes and I was hoping that it would volumize and lengthen my lashes. I did lengthen and define my lashes, but didn't really notice any volumizing action. It worked pretty decently when I paired it with the Dior primer and a volumizing mascara, but not enough that I would justify keeping the $19 mascara. On the other hand, my cousin loves it, go figure.

Perfect mascara, despite the price. Does not clump. No spidery lashes. VERY natural which I love. Doesn't irritate eyes (I wear contacts). Lengthens lashes a lot and provides a tiny bit of volume. My lashes are already a little long and with this people think I'm wearing fake lashes. Makes lashes so long that lashes more than touch lense of sunglasses. Adds a little shine, lashes don't look dull/dry. Not a makeup person, but this is awesome. One tube lasts awhile. Bought in Blackest Black.

I have a lot of different kinds of mascara. This is the best. It lengthens, volumes, and doesn't clump. My lashes are long (thank you Latisee) and most mascaras make my lashes clump together. This is the best.
Very good for thickening and lengthening without clumping. Smudge resistant and better than many more expensive brands.
I have tried several top brand mascara's and I keep coming back to this one. It stays on all day, does not flake or clump. My lashes look longer and fuller. I love it

This mascara is amazing. I've tried several other brands of mascara ranging in price from $8 to $50 and this one is by far the best one yet. I keep coming back to it over and over again. It defines and lengthens while adding incredible volume and I only need one coat! I've had many people ask me if my lashes are even real when I use it! Worth every penny!

I really like this mascara, but wish it was waterproof. I have long lashes already and was looking for something to make them appear more full. This is one of the best mascaras that I've found that doesn't clump on application. Great buy.

The Best eye mascara ever BUT just wait till you try the all NEW LIP STICK VIP you need to be to get this........sephora +pantonne universe ITs the BEST moist .cant wait till they put it in the store and more colors happy face cant wait !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
this mascara applies beautifully and looks great, but it smudges under my eyes. i'm pretty prone to this so maybe it's my eye shape or something.

This was the first time I spent over $10 on mascara. I'm not sure it was worth it. At first, I found this mascara to be super liquidy, and would end up wiping it off my eyelids when applying (I have long eyelashes and they would hit below my eyebrow when applying). After a few applications, I got the hang of it. I find that I have to curl my eyelashes, then apply once, allow it to dry for a minute or two, then immediately apply a second coat. Usually this gives me length and the curl stays. Stays on all day and comes off very easily with water. My biggest dislike with this mascara is that it does not define the lashes at all but rather causes many lashes to come together (it doesn't necessarily look bad). Overall, nice mascara but I'm still debating whether it's worth $20.

This mascara is great.. if you're looking to evenly separate your lashes. I didn't notice any change in volume or length. I was actually fairly impressed with the trial size I received, however, the full size, for whatever reason, was nothing like the smaller version.

I have tried many mascaras in my day but this mascara by buxom is the best. I do not have the longest, fullest lashes but the buxom black mascara does them proud. Doesn't clump, makes them voluminous and lasts all day. Love it!
I have always been a fan of this mascara. It enhances my natural lashes like no other mascara!
Comparing this to Benifits They're Real I would choose this mascara anyday. I have minimal eyelashes and this product helps make them look longer and does not weight down my lashes. Great Mascara!

I bought this based on all the great reviews - but I guess with my thin straight lashes, it didn't look any better than any of my other mascaras - drugstore or more expensive. I ended up returning it. I mean it was an OK product, but I didn't like it enough that it would warrant me keeping the $19 mascara when that $19 can be used towards other goodies.
I was not blessed with naturally thick eyelashes but using this mascara no one knows! Looks like I have long, think healthy lashes. Love it in the blackest black

This stuff is great! I've been looking for a long time for an alternative to DiorShow since it always dries out and clumps. This stuff does the trick. The brush is similar to Dior but it defines lashes perfectly, adds volume, doesn't clump, washes off easily, and doesn't leave residue. Have found my dream mascara :-)

I've tried a gazillion mascara brands - from Chanel, Lancome, Benefit and Too Faced to cheapo Maybelline - but have been going back to the same L'oreal product for nearly 10 years. This is the first mascara I've tried that is as good. Highly recommended.

Currently, this is my favorite mascara. This separates my lashes the best making them look extremely lengthy and in unison. I like it just as much as the Tarte Lights, Camera, Lashes but my complaint with this is that during the application, although I try to be careful, I get some of the product a little bit on my lids which drives me nuts. Because I only wear this when I'm not wearing eyeliner, it looks pretty noticeable. I think it's because I have relatively small Asian eyes and the brush it too large for me personally.

I really liked this mascara, I think I got a sample size or sephora associate suggested to me (anyways), its not hard to use, brush is easy to handle, and stays on and comes off when needed. I naturally have long eye lashes so I don't need much but when I wanted my lashes to be noticed I put this on extra thick. I have purchased it twice. I love experimenting with different brands and am currently on to something else but I will definetly recommend this product.

reviews.review_title: Good, but ends up underneath eye.
reviews.review_text: This is a good product, it had very minimal clumping, which i love because I cannot stand spider eyelashes, but it is not waterproof so it eventually melted to my under eye area. I alreay have a dark circle problem, so I do not need help from my mascara. It works tho, I just had to keep checking and wiping the residue off from my under eye area. Over all good product, but not perfect.
Makes my lashes look great. Not waterproof but made it through a rainy day. Rarely clumps - but I think that's more about the brush than the product.

For someone who does not have much lashes, this mascara will give you full beautiful lashes without clumping or smudging. It wears all day. I know this because I am a registered nurse who works 12-13 hours a day and by the end of the day, it is still on!
Only mascara I will use. It is almost impossible to get clumps and it makes my lashes long and full!
I have received soooo many compliments on my eyelashes!!! This product leaves my eyelashes just that, BUXOM!!! I am ordering more for a stock pile!!!

I really love this mascara! There's really only one downfall... the brush. I usually have to wipe off a few parts of it, but I don't mind. This makes my lashes so long, and it doesn't clump them up in pairs like some other mascaras. I definitely reccomend this!

reviews.review_title: No glob of uck on my Lashes !
reviews.review_text: I tried this as a sample, which lasted a long time, I had purchased another just now, I have to say, Us woman are strongly sided with waterproof mascara, this is not, I'm not sure if they have a waterproof version, but I don't care, this is really nice, I've teared up from my contacts and It didn't smudge, It's not clumpy, big lashes, love it.  Only Flaw? The price is a bit much I suppose. However. Never been disappointed by Buxom, so it's worth it.
This mascara makes my lashes look longer and fuller. I love the glossy black color too. It is the most reliable mascara and the price is reasonable.

reviews.review_title: Super full and lengthy lashes without the clump!
reviews.review_text: I first received this mascara as a sample...I tried it and I instantly fell in love! I get super long lashes and most importantly, it's not clumpy. The brush is awesome too because if you use the tip of it, you can wing out your lashes to make them look even fuller.
This is great mascara. It really goes on smooth and separates your lashes. It also makes them look long and thick. I love this mascara!

I love the brush on this product. I received a sample as a perk and I just bought the full sized product. The brush gives perfect lashes that get fuller toward the outer corner. The formula lasts all day and doesn't create a raccoon eye by the end
