Love this mascara - it holds curl all day, darkens and thickens my lashes. The brush wand is easy to use and the mascara doesn't clump at all. But I do agree with another reviewer - it would be perfect if it were waterproof. While it doesn't run too much I do have to clean up a bit under my eyes as the day goes on.

This mascara was recommended for me by a store associate when I was looking for a mascara that was ~$20 and was good for volume/definition and didn't clump. She was absolutely right. This is an amazing product, I have been using it for a month now and I love it. I've recommended it to all my friends.
This mascara was recommended to me by a friend and I am just not that thrilled with it. I think it is a decent mascara but I think there are better ones out there that give more volume and length.

I had been looking for a mascara that did it all and i'm happy to say this looks like it. I love this stuff. just one coat and my lashes look good but after a few coats, following the instructions that came with it, my lashes look full, long and beautiful. I think the price is reasonable for all it does.
When I use this I have Hollywood eyelashes. I have been asked while wearing this mascara if I was wearing fake lashes, NO! Defined, long reaching, bold lashes!
Overall, amazing coverage that adds volume to my lashes. I like the formula which does not clump and goes on smoothly each time.

reviews.review_title: Best mascara I've purchased to date
reviews.review_text: I actually discovered this mascara as a free deluxe sample from Sephora. I started using it and loved it. When it was all gone and I went back to my old mascara I realized how much I missed this kind. This mascara is perfect for high definition lashes. The brush glides on nicely and it does not clump. I've gotten many compliments on how long my eyelashes look.
I have tried many mascaras but this is the far most best one yet. It separates your eye lashes individually. The Blue is amaziingly gorgeous. So worth it...
I have good longer eyelashes. However, they aren't thick. This does the trick. Thickening, separation, fullness, no clumping & doesn't flake off.

I looove Buxom mascara. Its washes cleanly with out giving you racoon eyes. Should i forget to wash my face before goung to bed it wont stain your pillow. Applies clean, little clumping and no tranchula eyes.
I love that this mascara doesn't clump--it goes on smooth and lasts the whole day. I personally like that it's not waterproof, but some may not. It is also good for lengthening.

I bought this one online after reading the reviews. I tried it on and I simply love it. The mascara gives you instant volume and does not clump at all! What I also love is the fact that it defines the lashes, even the small ones.
I have been using this Mascara for a couple of yeas now and I dont feel the need to even consider looking for another. Goes on easily and easy application. Everything it says is true!

I have straight, light, and short lashes. But this mascara paired with an eyelash curler makes me have beautiful, full and almost false looking lashes! I have tried others and always come back to this. All my friends ask me what kind I use, and plenty of people ask me if I wear fake eyelashes. Nope Nope Nope. Buxom just knows how to make the best mascara ever! I'm on my fifth. Please, never stop making this mascara!

This is my all time favorite mascara!! It is not waterproof, so do not wear it in the pool or at the beach. I have compared it with soo many mascaras (Diorshow included) and nothing comes close. The closest thing is Loreal the orange mascara. I keep try others and always come back to this one!

This is a great mascara that is a little less expensive than similar products. Though I have long lashes, they are of low/medium fullness and I feel that this mascara makes them look nice and full.  Cons: It clumps a bit if you aren't careful and can be hard to get the outer lashes.

really good mascara, especially for the price. It probably not the best on the market, but perfect for me for everyday use (i use it with the diorshow maximizer). I'll definitely continue to keep buying it

This mascara does just about everything it boasts to do, minus the claim that it doesn't smudge. I love the style of the brush. I love how it applies evenly and doesn't clump. The only qualm I have with it is the way it smudges under my eyes. I live in the south, so maybe the humidity has something to do with it. I just wish they would make a waterproof version of it.

I have been testing out mascaras since I first started wearing it and I received this as a sample and I fell in love! My lashes look so long and I've always got compliments on the length since wearing it. It's honestly the best!

reviews.review_title: Sample was amazing, the full size not so much...
reviews.review_text: I hate to give a poor review of this mascara, since I really loved it the first time I used it. I bought the Sephora Favorites Give Me Some Lash, and this was by far my favorite mascara out of the bunch. It lasted for weeks! I bought the full size recently, and it is not the same as the sampler. It clumps up and is not as silky, and I've only used it about a week. I gave it four instead of five, because the mascara is still much better than many brands I've tried. It definitely builds full, long lashes. I just wish it was as great as the sample!
Brush has refined bristles, so you hit every lash. Not clumpy-you can layer on as much as you want. I like a light coating for day time, and then add more for evening.

This product does everything that it says it does: It lengthens, defines, and volumizes. The only thing is that my lashes NEVER hold a curl and I hate curling them. So I usually just apply a mascara that lifts my lashes a little (Usually hypnose by lancome when I'm going out or bad gal lash by benefit for every day) and then go over that with this.  This has never given me any problem. I actually like the thin, watery kind of formulation and the application wand is fantastic. I'd reccomend this to anyone who wants amazing looking lashes.  It doesn't clump either. Only if you put on a really signficant amount would it ever clump (another plus to having a thin formulation). :)

I bought this because I was wanting a really *dramaticly* different mascara. I wanted something to thicken, add length, and just all around my my lashes pop.. Well, I have to use several strokes of this, because it will get clumpy, and I have to keep going over it to get the clumps out. Also, I don't know why, but I can't use this on my lower lashes, it ALWAYS gives me spider lashes. It's really black, and once I get the clumps out, it does look good. It makes my lashes thicker, fuller, and longer, but I do have to use another mascara for my lower lashes, because I just can't the clumps out with this one. I don't think I will buy this again, but it's decent enough that I won't run out and buy a new mascara right away. It will work until it runs or dries out.
This is a great mascara that goes on easily and evenly. The only thing I would improve upon is its longevity. I find a reapplication is necessary for extra long days.

I don't know why, but my mascara was not silky smooth like everyone else reviewed. I found it thick and clumpy. Everytime I put it on there are particles that stick to my lashes and I have to keep brushing to get them off. Sometimes it gets to be so thick that all my lashes stick together. I don't know why mine is different than everyone elses.
Love, Love, Love this mascera!, i've been trying to look for a mascara that'll make the works & this one does the job! love it!
Excellent brush, really separates lashes. Love it!
always buy it and always love it but dries out quickly. But I never have clumps and it pumps up your lashes nicely.
The best mascara on the market. Perfectly spaced bristles, rarely clumps, and stays on all day.

This mascara by far is the best I ever have used. It lengthens, adds volume, defines and also does not have petroleum in the ingredients which clogs the pores. The Brush has perfect bristles and I can never miss with this mascara. The best!
Great mascara. Makes my lashes look long and voluminous and isn't too heavy. I love it!
I THINK MY LASHES GREW MUSCLES THANKS TO THE VITA PACK FORMULA IN BUXOM ;)

This is a good everyday mascara. You can have the nice dark lashes without too much drama so it's ok to wear during the day or to work. My lashes were darker, fuller and I didn't feel like it made my lashes stiff

reviews.review_title: A little wet, but worth the wait
reviews.review_text: I have both the black and the blue, and love them both! This is a little wetter than most mascaras that I have used, but it's worth the drying time. This really makes my lashes look long and separated, and my eyes look bigger. The blue makes them brighter too.

I love this mascara! I've bought this mascara at least four times already and never been disappointed! It lengthens and adds volume.... and it you can keep adding and adding and it never gets too clumpy! Love it! :)

I previously had a sample size of this from a Sephora gift bag. I like that this makes your lashes fuller, and best of all doesn't flake off and give me raccoon eyes. It lasts all day. I have tried all sorts of high end mascaras as well as drug store brans, and this one is by far the best.
Makes my lashes long and seperated....no clumps

This mascara really does make you lashes look fuller but it's just okay. It didn't give my lashes a wow factor but if you are not looking for that and want something more natural than this is perfect.

i got a sample of this in one of my orders a while back and it is amazing. definitely the best mascara i've ever had. it goes on smooth and doesn't clumb. it defines my lashes so well and makes for a very dramatic eye. the wand is long so it gets almost all your lashes at once.
i have sworn by Diorshow for YEARS- until I discovered this! It is The Best mascara ever! Can't say enough good things about it!
This is my daily mascara. It separates and lightly coats my lashes. It's subtle but makes me feel put together.

This is THE best mascara. Like others, I've gone through several mascaras, and this is my all time favorite. I always curl my eyelashes, and this doesn't weight my lashes down and helps maintain the curl. It really does lengthen and define the lashes. A make-up bag must!
I have this in a sample size and I really really love this product. It lengthens and defines my lashes. One of my all time favorite mascaras. I will keep buying this till they stop making it.
Great thickening and lengthening mascara.
Love this mascara. Does what it says and comes off easily with any cleanser.

I like this a lot. The black is super dark, it defines each lash, adds volume and doesn't make my lashes dry and flaky. I have long, light brown lashes that need a lot of volume to make them stand out. I would not, however, recommend this mascara for people wanting a great lengthening mascara. This adds volume but It really doesn't add any extra length so either layer it with another mascara or don't buy this one.
I keep trying other brands but this is my go to which I always return to. Volumizes, lengthens and doesn't flake. Love

I have used just about every expensive mascara you can think of and this mascara is by far the best one!!! Twenty dollars really isn't that bad and it makes your lashes look amazing!!! FULLER LONGER AND THICKER!!!! Every woman should know about this product!
I got this mascara for christmas and I have been in love with it ever since Definitly going to repurchase this when its finished
I did not think this mascara provided any volumizing effect. it was a nice rich, black color and it did provide some definition but zero volume.

I'm slightly mascara obsessed but usually find that the drug store products do the job. This product proved me wrong and definitely pumped up the volume without appearing caked on. To really do the trick I suggest applying a couple layers.

reviews.review_title: Great mascara for a great price!
reviews.review_text: I am loving this mascara and I have tried a lot of different ones...from the doll lash to the applicator with the ball tip and this one really holds it's own for a great price :-)

my fav. does what i want mascara to do. and my lashes really do seem very healthy. i had a lash the other day that i couldn't believe how long it had gotten without falling out. i use boxom eye liner too.

I honestly don't know how i survived without this mascara! the bristles are soooo amazing with one swipe my lashes were doubled in size and volume, with no clumpiness at all! My lashes continued to feel weightless after many many layers. It did smudge a little bit on my bottom lashes throughout the day, but it was easily fixable. Overall, BUY THIS PRODUCT! YOUR LIFE WILL BE CHANGED! I HONESTLY WISH THERE WAS 1000000000 STARS!!!
I've purchased this time and time again and it still amazes me of how great my lashes look. No clumping, holds a curl and easy to take off!
I REALLY LIKE THIS MASCARA, IT MAKES MY LASHES LOOK FAKE LONG. BUT IF YOU WANT VOLUME YOU MIGHT NEED TO USE AN ADDITIONAL MASCARA WITH THIS OR TRY SOMETHING DIFFERENT ALLTOGETHER..

I have tried almost every mascara, and this is my hands down favorite. I have sensitive skin and this does not irritate. It never clumps, separates every lash, volumizes and lengthens. You can start with a natural look or build layers for more drama.
this is my favorite mascara ever. love the brush and love the way it goes on, never gets clumpy ever. i've used this for months and months replacing about 4 or 5 times and will continue to do so!
easily the best mascara i've ever used. crazy volume. smudge-proof. looks incredibly dramatic over false lashes, as well. converted fa life.

reviews.review_title: Great mascara but not enough in the tube
reviews.review_text: This mascara goes on great, stays on great, looks terrific. I like it a lot. But it runs out very quickly. It seems they do not put enough in the tube. I have to replace this faster than any other mascara I've used. But I keep doing so because it does look so good.

I love this mascara!!! It is the one i refuse to go with out. I am constantly trying other mascaras but i've been using this one since they came out with it and nothing works nearly as well. It is my favorite Mascara ever.

I like this mascara a lot overall. When I first tried it, I got it as a sample. I was in love. It gave volume, while also giving me a more feathery- fanned out look. So of course I bought the full size. I don't know why, but for some reason, the full size seems to dispense differently because I need to blot every time I use it, otherwise my lashes are more clumped and less fanned. It's still nice, it's just not quite right, and I'm very finicky with my mascara, as many days I don't wear anything but mascara or will just have mascara and blush or lips on. I think it's worth trying, so long as volume is one of the qualities your looking for. Personally, it's not balanced enough between voluminzing and defining.  By the way, I have naturally long lashes, so I don't need a ton of lengthening (but they all add some), though this does add some length.  So I'm still searching. I'd buy this again, but I'm still gonna try others and try to find that perfect one.

I have been looking for a great mascara that would give me volume and long lashes without clumping—this mascara was recommended to me. Although it was does not clump at all, I found that it gave me no volume and no length and smudged all over my lash line upon application. I have been meaning to return this product and find a mascara better suited for my lashes. This mascara has a seemingly great formula and may be better suited for someone wanting a daytime natural look.

This mascara is the best by far I have ever tried.It makes your lashes perfect and not dry or full of clumps.Your lashes will be long,thick,and your eyes will pop!!! I used to use a famous brand for years then I got a sample of this mascara and I have been hooked ever since.
No smudging, easy to apply, seperates lashes while adding volume.

I bought this mascara on a whim. I'd been using Loreall and had major issues with clumping and smearing. I was looking for something that wouldn't make my lashes stick together. I opened up the sample of this, looked at the brush and immediately bought it. I haven't had a problem since, it doesn't clump or run, it's extremely lengthening and very good for layering, which keeps lashes defined. I'd definitely recommend this as a top mascara pick

the applicator and formula of this mascara are perfection. when applying makeup, i always accentuate my eyes because they are my favorite feature, and no product makes my lashes look as good as buxom lash can. with this product, you can build layers onto the lashes without making them clumpy or spidery (which some people like, but i try to avoid). i've tried many other kinds of mascara, but i always return to buxom lash because nothing can compare.

Get gorgeous clump-free lashes. I've tried loads of mascaras and this is the BEST by a long way.  Its my go to mascara. Gives a wide eyed look and gets right in to each lash. A lot of mascaras claim to give you a false lash look this one actually does and it lasts all day. Plus its made without any harmful additives or chemicals.  10/10
I think this mascara is ok... But I was expecting something more so I was disappointed. It didn't really make my lashes look any thicker...

I received a sample of Buxom's mascara, and it is fairly good. However, I agree with another reviewer that the brush is kind of big and awkward. I also received a sample of Clinique mascara , it is nice too, and has a better size brush. I think that I will stay with Clinique, but I really like Buxom's lip gloss!

I've tried several mascaras - from grocery store to department/specialty. I LOVE the brush on this one and have no problems with flake/smudge. This might be the first mascara I buy more than ONE before moving on to the next marginal option.

I have been using this mascara for almost a year now and I love it!! Its the only mascara ill use. The application is great, I love the brush, it really defines each lash, combs them out, and never clumps. My lashes are naturally long, but I have noticed that since I started using it my lashes are even longer, thicker and healthier. Sometimes ill just curl my lashes without applying mascara and people think im wearig mascara. Bottom line, this mascara is perfect :)

I was very disappointed. The brush does not grab lashes and make them thicker and fuller. It's also an awkward brush, too big. Does not live up to what it's advertised to do, which is make lashes look bigger and fuller.
This mascara, hands down is the best mascara I've ever used! It separates my short lashes and makes them so full and long! I've tried others and this is tried and true!
Very disappointed. Liked it as a sample, but my full size is clumpy and very messy-- the end result not worth the extra effort
good price and doesn't clump like most I have tried
I tried this mascara and LOVE the brush, however the mascara itself isn't dramatic enough for me considering it is supposed to be blackest black.

My eyelashes are a lot like my hair: very, very fine, but a whole lot of it/them. This makes mascara really annoying for me, as it tends to make my eyelashes stick together and look very spidery; however, using this--especially doing some of the hints that they suggest, such as applying to the tips of lashes first before doing the whole length of the lashes--really defines them. It also lengthens them quite well, and volumizes pretty decently.  This was also my first upper end mascara purchase, and I figured I'd start out on the cheaper end of that spectrum (especially since I always have a difficult time finding mascara that doesn't cause clumping) and I'm so glad I did. I really like this stuff. Plus, the fact that it has vitamins in it helps keep me from getting worried that I'm going to yank out my lashes when I remove it.

I love this mascara! It leaves my lashes so pretty! They looker fuller, longer, and have a lot of volume. Sometimes they get those little 'spider ends', but I just gently pull that off and my eyes look fabulous!

This is a great mascara: I am very picky and I loved the dark color and the length it gave my lashes. The volume factor is good, but i think that Covergirl volume blast (orange tube) does a better job with that. I personally layer those two products for the best looking lashes I have ever seen :)

This mascara volumizes and lengthens for me. Every time I wear it I get complements on my lashes..this and Lancome's Hypnose mascara are my go-to's for amazing lashes. I also really love the brush as it keeps my lashes from clumping together.
just one swipe and it puts just the right about on and doesn't clump. : )

I have very thin lashes with normal length. Buxom mascara thickens, and lengthens my lashes, without having to use much. It even gives my lashes a curl (and holds it) without the need of an eyelash curler. Making my eyelashes look good/, doesn't take forever anymore. I love this buy, its worth the money, and I highly recommend it!!
This is by far my favorite mascara right now. It creates volume, length, and thickness so that your lashes look rich and dramatic. Layer it for even more drama!!!

reviews.review_title: Love the brush, wish it had better staying power
reviews.review_text: I'm picky about mascaras because I like my eyelashes to be separated and not clumpy. This brush is PERFECT for that, but I've noticed that the mascara smudges really easily on long days and I'll end up with a little raccoon eye

I can't even begin to tell you how many people have asked me if I've gotten eyelash extensions after using this mascara throughout the years! I have made converts of almost all of them. This is the best mascara I've ever used and will continue to do so-no flaking, smudging, clumping or stiffness. Just big, beautiful, luscious lashes ladies!
Doesnt flake, doesn't clump, comes off easily, no fragrance, doesn't irritate my sensitive eyes

I really love this mascara! It didn't clump at all for me. The only issue I had was that it wasn't volumizing enough for me, but as I have REALLY STUBBORN LASHES, that's a problem I have with nearly every mascara (Except for Clinique's high definition volumizing mascara). I really love the brush on this because it separates really well.  I only wish it was a little bit thicker. :)
I love the brush on this mascara. I love to buy new mascaras and the brush on this one is the one to beat. I can get it really close to the lids on top and make for a nice full long lash. Love it!

This mascara is really great! Even though the brush is a bit big, it manages to get every lash. It lengthens and defines. Best of all, it doesn't clump or flake! I don't find myself having to take the time to wipe off excess mascara off the brush, which I find myself doing with other mascaras. It also holds a curl. I really have nothing negative to say about this mascara. One of my favorites.
This mascara is really great, very black and really volumizes my lashes. It also stays on all day which is huge!

reviews.review_title: No Clumps and lasts all day :)
reviews.review_text: This is another winner from Buxom! I love their mascara and I have tried so many in the last couple years. It doesn't clump if you put it on slow and staedy with a bit of force. It's also easy to remove and doesn't feel heavy on my lids!
This is it, the best mascara for quality and price and amazing looking lashes, now I just need this in waterproof! :)
Best mascara ever. I will never use any other brand again. Does not irritate my sensitive eyes and it lengthens and defines my lashes.
Awesome. I use this after I use another mascara and it declumps everything. Its almost acts like a comb for your eyelashes
Love this stuff! Reasonably priced, too.
my eyelashes are short and thin. this is the best mascara I've ever tried! my eyelashes almost look fake! i love it!

This mascara gives you wowza eyelashes, and I think I might have reviewed it before but I could never stop complimenting it. It makes my eyelashes huge!! If your looking for a very natural subtle increase to your lashes this is probably not for you. But if you want big baby doll lashes, free of harsh chemicals btw, this mascara is the best!!

I have been using Buxom Mascara since Sephora gave me a sample. What I really like is the flake free formula that glides on beautifully via the thick brush. I love the way my lashes look dark and full and long-great for flirting!

Buxom Lash Mascara is the best mascara. Not even needing to apply numerous amount of times to get the full lash look 2 strokes in every angle and your done, usually i have to apply ALOT on to make them look longer and keep that full look but with buxom it gives me the look i want in a less time and work. I love buxom and will keep buying this product. With buxom just applying mascara and heading out to local store mall exc still gives me a pretty bout natural look but when it comes to nighttime buxom is there to do the job as well!
Buxom Lash mascara is the best! It makes your lashes intensely thick and big. My favorite by far!
I love this product. It definitely makes your lashes look longer and fuller. Love it!!

I received and LOVED a sample of this a couple months ago and finally bought it. However when I finally bought it, I was so disappointed because the product is clumpy and hard to remove : not satisfied.
Great lengthening & separation, no clumping. Worked well with 1 coat for daytime and a few coats for nighttime.
I got this product as a free sample and I LOVE it! The brush is so nice and big, it reminds me of a caterpillar. It really gets every lash nicely! I just wish it was waterproof.

reviews.review_title: DO NOT GET CAUGHT IN THE RAIN!
reviews.review_text: When I first tried this product I absolutely loved the way it made my lashes look. The mascara wand made it easy to apply to my upper and lower lashes, and the formula made it easy to apply multiple coats with out all my lashes clumping together. However I got caught in the rain without an umbrella and let's just say it WAS NOT pretty. I literally had mascara running down my face. SCARY!

I recently purchased Sephora's Give Me Some Lash kit that included multiple mascara's and the Buxom was my fav!!!! This is the only mascara I would purchase full size from the kit. I'm in love with this mascara. It's perfect for a girl's night out!! The rich black color is perfect. The brush is amazing, it grabs every lash the first time so there's not really any need for multiple coats.
LOVE Buxom mascara! Coats the lashes well without clumping!

I had asked the sales clerk for a mascara that gave the illusion of false eyelashes. This product did not do the trick so I returned it. It had a thin coating, and I was unable to add additional layers easily.
Gives extreme volume and flare. I have thin blonde lashes that need a lot of help getting noticed. This mascara is perfect for me, since it can be layered without the ugly clumps.
I like how the brush separates the lashes so that they don't all clump together, however this product doesn't add volume as it claims to.

my first time using this mascara i didn't love it. i bought it again, as I'm a 3-strike policy user and it has grown on me. A little definitely goes a long way, which i think i overlooked in my first use assuming it was like previous mascaras i had used that required multiple layers. i only need two of this one, but one swoop accomplishes the coat.

Love this mascara! It adds great volume and length to my lashes. I have sensitive eyes to and this does not bug them. I have also slept in this mascara a few times and have woke up with of course some flaking, but my lashes still look pretty and soft :) not all stiff and clumped up from sleeping on them. Amazing mascara! Washes off well to. I use it everyday and it makes my lashes and eyes so pretty! Very satisfied.

This mascara is the ONLY one I have found that will actually hold my curl, define my lashes and not flake off! The brush really gets all my lashes. It can come out a little gloppy with too much on the brush, but that might just be a flaw in my tube. I would have given it 5 stars, but I REALL want it to be waterproof.

This is my second tube of mascara, which is saying something, as I am not someone to repurchase mascara since I'm still looking for my HG mascara. This one is soo close! If it just lengthened a little bit more, we would be in full business! Other than that, I love the buildable formula and the volume I get from this baby!

I have never been partial to a mascara before using this one, but I absolutely love it. It definitely gives volume as the packaging claims (which is great for people like me who are not especially gifted in the eyelash department), and also comes with a fun insert with mascara-application tips to make sure you get the most out of your mascara.

The mascara formulation is awesome for lengthening and this does not flake into my eyes. I have thin lashes and experienced length as opposed to volume with this mascara. The brush makes me remove a star due to its jumbo sized head which makes it hard for me to coat my outer corner lashes without getting this on my skin. Overall good, but I would not repurchase.
does not smudge, feels creamy going on & no clumpy looking lashes----Love it!

I got this as a sample with my last order, otherwise wouldn't have tried it. It could very well be my next mascara go-to. I currently use They're Real! But I really like this. It seems rich, soft, intense all at the same time. I love the applicator, which looks like a big soft brush. You'll get soft, full lashes.

I was equally shocked by all the good reviews and by the fact that Bare Escentuals is a brand I normally trust, but this mascara is terrible! I asked the consultant for a mascara that would leave my lashes soft, but that's about all it did. It gave my lashes no volume or enhancement at all and worst of all, after a few hours it dripped down under my eyes and gave me raccoon eyes. Gave it a few chances but it is just so disappointing!!
It is a good mascara and a lot of people seem to have luck with it, but it just didn't do it for me. Made my eye lashes look sloppy. I'll stick to my laura mercier long lash.
Live this mascara. The brush is amazing. Makes application flawless and eyes pop!!

I went to sephora and asked what mascara WON'T clump and connect my lashes. they introduced me to this amazing product.. :) It does everything, volumizes, lengthens, and defines your eyelashes.. and lasts all day long! you won't be disappointed!
Mascara was great! It had no clumps at all and went on smoothly. The one drawback I find is that it doesn't give a ton of length but it definitely adds to the fullness of your lashes.

This is hands down the best mascara I've tried. It separates, lengthens, and volumizes without clumps! Yay! It also is the only mascara that lets my eyelashes stay curled after I apply it. I have stick-straight lashes normally, and I have to use an eyelash curler. Most mascara straightens them right back out the instant it touches them, unless it's dried out. But who wants dried-out mascara? This stuff rocks.
Gives full lashes without any clumps
I love this mascara. It gives you volume with only a few applications. Gives your eyes a great pop.
I already made a review on how much I love this mascara but I thought I should add a picture to convince people to get a mascara that's awesome!

This mascara has its pros and cons. It's a very smooth formula that never clumps or gets flaky. It's really ideal for using in low humidity, when other mascaras might do those things. However, in even slightly humid weather, it's almost *too* moist with a thin consistency, causing my lashes to stick together and not hold a curl very well. Also, I wear contacts, and when when I have to use eye drops, I find this runs very easily.

This mascara lengthens, volumes and defines my lashes. It's everything a girl wants from their mascara, not to mention it's very long lasting and does not smudge. It is THE best mascara I have ever tried.

One of the best mascara's I've ever used. While it does clump a little bit towards the tip, it provides great coverage and this brush is AMAZING. I feel like my lashes are so much longer when I'm wearing it.
I love this mascara. It never gets clumpy and it actually dries quickly on your lashes
I liked the results I got from the product however it seemed a little dry and hard to get on the brush and didn't go on my lashes very smooth. I like Cliniques lash doubling mascara better. .

I love this mascara! I usually use Too Faced Lash Injection mascara and tried this one based on a suggestion from a store associate. I was promised this mascara would give me volume, and it certainly does! It goes on wonderfully and, even though it washes off easily with make-up remover, it stays put through out the day. Definitely give this mascara a try.

I love this mascara. It's really hard for me to find a good mascara for my short eyelashes. This mascara lengthens and defines every lash! I love it and will be returning to buy another. But the only problem is that I would like it to hold the curl more since my lashes are straight.

My sister had recommended this mascara to me. I found that it worked well at defining my lashes and was non-clumping, but I didn't see any improvement in volume. I get better volume using cheaper department store mascara. I'm disappointed it didn't live up to its description.

reviews.review_title: Great Mascara... Most of the Time
reviews.review_text: I love how intense this mascara makes my lashes look during the day, without making them too dramatic for daytime use. However, sometimes the mascara does not glide on my lashes well and I have to separate small clumps of product that make my lashes stick together in bunches. So, mostly a good product.
I didn't think it it all it promised. I'm not a fan of the wand, it didn't feel like it really coated all my lashes. I took it back and got the Clinique one that I've used and liked in the past.

This mascara adds drama and length to any eye. It provides absolutely no clumps at all. The only reason I gave it a four star rating is because you may need to comb your eyelashes afterword with an eyelash comb or a toothbrush because your eyelashes may stick together. It works very well on bottom lashes as well.

I was so excited to try this mascara, but when I did, I was so disappointed. It left my lashes looking extremely thin and life-less. It did not do any of what it claims it will do, which is odd considering this is a Bare Escentuals product.
It is unfortunately expensive, but this is the best mascara I have ever used! It defines and volumizes my lashes perfectly! Never clumps!

I love love love this mascara. I never get clumps with it. I just wish that each bottle lasted longer or they were a bit cheaper, but until then I'll fork over the bills because the difference is way noticeable.

I have short, fine Asian eyelashes that do not exist unless I wear mascara. I've tried many brands, but Buxom has to be one of my favorites! They make my lashes visible, in a natural-looking way. I hate when lashes clump together, and this does not happen at all with Buxom. The only issue that I've noticed is that the mascara tends to flake and drop little specks onto my cheek...but it usually happens when the mascara is running out. Otherwise, I love love love Buxom!!!

I absolutely LOVE this mascara. Its lengthening, thickening & it separates lashes very well. And, it doesn't clump. The wand is flexible so you can actually add some definition & curl to your lashes. I don't even use my eyelash curler anymore & I have big eyes & what you call camel lashes anyway, but now people are always asking if my eyelashes are real, lol.

This is my new favorite mascara! I received the sample version from Sephora and had to go buy the full size. It lengthens, volumizes, separates each lash perfectly. The brush is great and is never clumpy!
Makes my lashes look too separated, but does not make them stiff like other mascaras. It is fine

i bought this (by that i mean by parents did ha) and i was expecting wonders but it's just alright. I thought it would give me thick eyelashes but it didn't really give me that but it made them really black. It's nice. :)

I hate that it takes so many layers to get my desired look; It's rather time consuming. It doesn't clump or weigh my lashes down, which is amazing, but it takes me about 3-4 layers of mascara to get the length and volume that I like. Usually I don't like applying more than 2 coats of mascara but with this formula it is a MUST to apply at least 3 layers.

I was hesitant to try this product because I have not liked other mascara wands that were made from plastic, but this one is relly good. It gives good even coverage and minimal clumping. The tube seems to last me longer than a dept. brand.
Thickens and lengthens lashes without clumping. The wand works well on corners and buttom lashes. I will buy again.

Works miracles with my short curly stubby eyelashes. I reach for this product every time I do my make up or others. it works with every type of eyelash situation. It does everything a mascara should do and more.

It is so hard to find a mascara that does it all. I tried the Buxom sample and it did not disappoint, so I bought the full product immediately. This mascara adds volume, length, and definition! And it's made with ingredients that nurtures your lashes. It's great for everyday use and for nights out just add a fewextra coats for a more intense look.

I had a sample of the volumizing mascara and was looking forward to buying the full size. The store didn't have any left and I was disappointed. The clerk recommended the buxom and I am very happy with it.
This is honestly one of the best mascaras I have ever used. It gives you everything you want: length, volume, no clumps. It's perfect! I don't know if I'll use another one again!
This is amazing mascara! My eyelashes look incredible after using it. I completely recommend it!
This mascara makes your eyelashes look amazing and your eyes pop. It is defiantly worth the extra money. It is the best mascara i have ever used.

I love this mascara! It has lengthens and keeps eyes fairly curled. I would have given this a higher rating except for my eyelashes don't stay completely curled. It washes easily and rarely clumps. I like the formula and the brush! A good buy for a great price!

I have used Dior mascaras for about two years now. I have used DiorShow, Iconic, and Blackout. I still love them, but I have a new love. I got a sample of this mascara, and I was shocked! This is most natural (and by natural I mean makes my lashes look way better than really natural, but doesn't make them look brittle or spidery) mascara I have found. It's brush is similar to the Diorshow Iconic brush. There are a few reasons I will be purchasing this from now on opposed to the Dior. 1. Less expensive 2. Washes off easier at the end of the day (I don't have to tug at my eyes which is important since I'm trying to keep wrinkles at bay for as long as possible) 3. Makes my lashes feel better. 4. It's very close to being completely natural  I would not choose this mascara if your eyes water a lot or you are planning on crying. Also, I would not use this mascara for pictures. It's pretty up close, but I find in pictures it doesn't give much drama to the eye. I would either wear falsies with it or layer another mascara on top.

I almost threw this mascara away. I used it twice and was very disappointed. Gave me no length whatsoever. Made my lashes fall flat. I gave it a third shot today. I'm old enough to know how to apply mascara. However, I read the directions that this came with. It tells you to keep applying layers until you are happy with the results. I never apply more than one layer of mascara but thought I would give it a try. I must say it seemed to work. It gave my lashes length and they look pretty darn good. If you're not happy the first time you use it give it a second and maybe even a thrid chance.

You know how when you put most mascaras on, you brush it on a few times, and then you have to use your comb thingy to separate your lashes? Yea, well not with Buxom Lash, the rubber brush is awesome at keeping your lashes separate while super pumping up your lashes. Also this mascara is rich & creamy so it doesn't flake all over your face! For the record I've tried & had the following issues with these mascaras: DiorShow: flaky; Lancome Doll Lashes: Smudgy, MUFE Smoky Lash: uber uber clumpy; Clinique High Definition Mascara: meh, just so-so. Buxom lash is AWESOME.

I love this mascara formula, but I'm not a fan of the rubber brush. My lashes are rather long and dense and they would stick together the first few times I used this product. I had to go over my wet lashes with a clean bristle applicator from an old mascara to get the look I desired. I found that layering the mascara by applying less product with more strokes allows more control and separation for my lashes. I love how the formula goes on very black and smooth. I have no problems with clumping and the lack of additives is fabulous! My old mascara used to make my eyes itch from fragrances and other chemicals but I didn't realize that was the culprit until I swapped to this product. Overall, I'm a big fan of this mascara. The rubber applicator took getting used to, but I would still prefer a bristle brush for better lash separation.
Love that I don't get tarantula eyes with this one. Lashes are nicely separated.

This mascara is really versatile. The brush is really fantastic, but the formula is really buildable. I can use just a few small strokes and obtain a very muted, natural eye or I can add several layers for a dramatic looking eye. It's also easy to wash off, which is a big plus for me when I get off work in the morning and have to rush through my cleansing routine. I don't have to scrub my eyes raw to get the darn rings out from under my eyes.

I really do like this mascara. It does everything it says it made my short lashes long and defined plus it holds the curl pretty well. It does give a bit of volume but it does more lengthening. Does NOT flake. You can layer this mascara with others or add as many coats as you want & it won't clump which I love about it. And for the price you cant go wrong.

Great mascara. The black is very black. I give it 4 out of 5 stars because I feel that it is just average until you put on a few coats (which isnt a problem because I do that anyway) But for someone who doesn't, that is the only set back I could see. LOVED the little leaflet that came with it with application tips. Nice touch.
I received a free sample of this a few months ago, and I loved it so much I bought the full size. This is the best mascara I've ever used.

I have naturally long lashes but am always looking for a mascara to add some much needed volume. This mascara delivers on the volume. The mascara doesn't clump in the brush and applies very nicely. I definitely recommend to anyone looking to add some umph to their lashes!

This is a personal favorite! It gives you the darkness, definition AND volume that you need, but it does smear after a long day. I used a Japan-Taiwan exclusive Shiseido mascara as a first coat before applying the Buxom and it gives the perfect lashes. This mascara can also be applied just a couple of coats to achieve a natural look. Personally, I do not apply this mascara on the bottom lashes as it does smear after several hours.
I simply adore this mascara; it does what it says. I have itty bitty lashes and this product makes them, well, for want of a better word, BUXOM!

I can honestly say this product is worth the money. I've been using this wonderful item ever since it came out. I would never ever get any other mascara because it's just that phenomenal. I have pretty long and thick eyelashes naturally but this makes my lashes seem as if they're fake (in a positive way). Everyone always comes up to me and ask what I use and I always recommend this product to them. I am being 100% honest when I say that EVERY girl should have this mascara in her make up bag.
Buxom is the best...esp. the brush, and no clumping!

Sales associate suggested I try this because they were out of the Bare Minerals mascara I love. It's a good mascara but I wasn't crazy about the brush shape. As rare as a problem as it is, people with a ton of eyelashes, can't use just any mascara. I'm using this but I am still using my brush from my other mascara to get off the excess and cover what this one missed.

Ample & Plump. This mascara does exactly that. Separates, lengthens, volumizes & manages to maximize the tiniest lashes with out clumping. You do not need to re-apply, therefore it lasts longer. You get numerous applications. Extra benefit is that it actually is good for your lashes. Easy on Easy off. Its my Favorite.
I really fell in love with this mascara!:)

I got a free sample and was hooked. I was not happy with a mascara that I had ordered. Lucky for me, I had gotten a free sample of this mascara with my original order. I love it!!! I returned the one that didn't work out and got a tube of this instead.
Not really a fan of this mascara. Unfortunately, I now have 2 tubes of it as I purchased a couple of value sets that included them.

I have been in the lookout for a mascara that does not clump, lengthens AND keeps my lashes curled. This definitely is the one for me! I'm soo happy to finally find a mascara that works for my long but straight lashes. No need for falsies with this one :)

First tried this mascara as a sample, and ultimately fell in love with it. I normally don't wear mascara and would never buy it, only ever using the tiny tubes I got as samples. After my Buxom sample ran out, I used others, but never got the same wow result. It looks natural, but still makes an impact, doesn't clump and is fairly smudge resistant. Not waterproof, if that's your thing. Definitely lengthens and defines. Not sure that it volumizes. I mean, it makes your lashes bigger, but I don't know about thicker. But really, how thick can eyelashes get without looking like you have some weird eye condition?  Bottom line, best mascara ever. Seriously. Buy it right now.
JUST THE BEST. LOVE IT.

I bought my daughter a christmas gift. The mascara as a bounus FREE. Going to give it to my daughter, but i keep it. Iwas so gald i did this is the BEST mascara i have ever found. It goes on so nice and looks great. I'm coming back to order more. Every woman should try this mascara. You will LOVE it,hope my daughter don't come on here and see i keep her mascara. LOL

It never clumps and makes my eyelashes look naturally longer. I really like this one. The only thing is, it doesn't really make my eyelashes any thicker, which might differ for others, but it helps when I'm going for that no-makeup/natural beauty look.

This mascara does a really great job of lengthening lashes. It doesn't clump which is a plus. However, I really dislike the fact that it isn't waterproof, so I will be trying out a different brand next time.
I recieved the sample siz and I'm just in love with it. I've tried high end to low end mascaras and this is the best one so far. I'm definitely going to but the full size when I run out.

Bare Escenutals and Buxom are the only two brands of Mascara that I have tried that do not irritate my sensitive eyes. Other mascaras and eyeliners cause my eyes to burn, so much so, that I often times had to remove them all together. This product doesn't smudge and stays put from application to removal at the end of the day. I did not get the intensely volumizing effect for bigger, fuller lashes. Thus, the 3-star rating.

I have never settled with one mascara. I've tried tons, drugstore and department store brands, but I'd never found one worth sticking with until I tried Buxom. FREAKING AMAZING. Makes lashes look bigger without making them look fake.
This mascara does not clump and makes your eyelashes look fuller and longer.

Love this product! It makes my eyelashes look so full, and long. it is by far the best mascara i have ever used in my life! My eyes are very sensative to mascara, and this is also the only mascara that doesn't seem to make my eyes swell. I recommend this product 100% ! Definately worth the $20
My favorite mascara! I have short thin lashes naturally but when I put this on I have really nice long lashes! I just wish it was water proof..... however it does everything as promised :-)

reviews.review_title: This has become my favorite mascara
reviews.review_text: Wonderful, deep black. Layers well so I can build it up for more drama or use less for daytime wear. No problems with my contacts. Sometimes can be a bit hard to wash off. I love the smooth formula. Defines and doesn't cause lashes to get clumpy!

I love this mascara. It is great for any lash. The brush is amazing and if you need extra coats it's extra helpful for separation of the lashes. I would recommend this to anyone. I use this for bridal application every time!

I've tried probably 40-50 different mascaras. Pretty much every one out there, and this is my favorite. It's all about the brush and its ability to get every nook and cranny in just a few sweeps. Love it!  Don't bother with the blue shade, though, it flakes.
brush is awesome and the formula is awesome. So far its the best for volume, that ive found. No clumping even when its getting old.

This is by far my favorite mascara! It lengthens and volumizes without ever getting clumpy. It's not waterproof, but it doesn't smudge, so at the end of the day it looks just as good as it did when I put it on, and it's super easy to get off.
nice, eyelashes look nice without looking fake

I bought this mascara just in need of a knew one. I never expected to love it this much! Its amazing! It DOESN'T flake whatsoever and doesn't clump. It lasts all day and throughout the night. After curling my eyelashes, I apply a few coats. Even after one coat this mascara lengthens while at the same time also gives definition and volume. I've convinced a good 4 of my friends to buy it and they have also Loved it.. IM NEVER GOING BACK (:

This mascara is extremely volumizing. It makes my lashes look amazing with no smudging or flaking later. You only need one or two coats because it is thick, and can clump if you try to apply too much.

reviews.review_title: I've tried countless mascaras, this is a winner!
reviews.review_text: So many mascaras that I've tried, but this is great & definitely a keeper! If you have absolutely no lashes, like myself, this is for you! Makes your eyes dramatic, thick, long and lush! Best used after curled lashes. Amazing hour-glass shaped brush gets full lash coverage and is guaranteed no clumps.
I have fairly long, thick lashes...slightly more than average. This mascara didn't work any better than the $5 stuff I get at the drug store.

I have tried a LOT of different mascaras. They all promise your lashes will look fuller, longer, like false eye lashes, etc. Meh, they are all OK, but I have to say that Buxom is the best I have used. It makes my lashes look fuller and doesn't run or smudge all over the place. This is the only mascara you need.
I have very long lashes as it is, but I was hoping for more volume and added length. Like the Kirkland Mascara way better for less than half the price.
This is my favorite mascara, it does exactly what its suppose to do!

I wear contacts and a lot of mascaras have bothered me in the past. I've been using this for over a year now, and haven't had any problems! I love the way it looks and doesn't even feel clumpy. I'm a big fan! It's definitely worth the $20!
I got this because I like most Buxom products. I expected to like this mascara but it is honestly the best one I've ever tried! It volumizes, lengthens and separates lashes! It isn't clumpy at all

This mascara is great! I was using the Dior Iconic but found this and it gives me the same results and it's like $10 cheaper! It gives great length and volume. I do wish it was waterproof like the Dior one though.

reviews.review_title: By far the best I've used
reviews.review_text: I've been using Buxom for almost a year now and I believe it's the best mascara I've ever used. It lasts for hours and doesn't give me racoon eyes. The definition I get it outstanding. My one complaint is that it doesn't come in brown.
i got this mascara free and i LOVE IT!!!!! its perfect!!!
wow long thick looking lashes, a must have! I love that it's natural also.

Love the brush, it makes the mascara go on so smoothly and doesn't clump. Really defines lashes, good for everyday use. Not what I consider a very volumunous mascara. It's my favorite mascara for everyday use though. Only drawback is that it is NOT waterproof whatsoever.
Best mascara I've used yet. It really does separate your lashes and boosts them up to va-va-voom! Reccomend to everyone! :D
I get a nice long lash and all my lashes are in line without any clumps. I bought my second one when I thought I had it for quite awhile, it wasn't because it didn't perform any longer.
its the best mascara ive ever had. its very good at getting all your lashes. and it isnt clumpy. only bad thing is that is isnt waterproof.
very breathable, pretty and simple leaving your lashes with a nice curl c: This is my main homie when it comes to mascaras...

Bottom Line: It's the best ever from a girl that's tried about 25 different Mascara brands/types over the years! I love it because it really defines my eyelashes, it doesn't CLUMP AT ALL! The brush is perfect....overall, you can't go wrong, the name is perfect..buxom lashes for sure!
My favorite mascara. Stays on all day and adds volume and length! Also a great price!

I consider myself to be a mascara junkie and I've used my fair share of good and bad products in the past but I think this might be one of the worst mascaras I've ever used. I didn't find it to be volumizing AT ALL. Even after two coats it barely looked like I had mascara on. Lengthening? Not really. The only reason I'm giving this two stars instead of one is because it made a decent primer for my Givenchy Phenomeneyes mascara.
It's gives me some volume without being too much. So, far no clumping or flaking so there has been no bad reaction with my contacts.

I recently tried the deluxe sample that came for free online. I didn't expect to be so pleased with it, and was surprised to consider it as one of my new favorite mascaras.  My lashes are asian lashes that typically go straight down if not curled, and are nothing special without mascara. These make my lashes look great: definitively separated, black, and full of volume.  I typically do not buy higher end mascaras, in my opinion, since you're supposed to through them out every 3 months, it's not worth the money. But after using this one, I'm actually kind of hooked and might consider purchasing once my sample runs out!

I have very long eyelashes and I have been looking for a good mascara for a long time and I just found one! this mascara is great and it is lengthening, volumizing, and defining. usually when i put mascara on since my eyelashes are so long that the mascara makes them clump and my eyelashes just look all over the place, but this mascara has solved that! The mascara brings out my eyelashes and no clumps! absolutely love it

i got this as a mini in the mascara sampler. i love it. the brush is great at getting all your lashes. i don't have a lot of time in the morning so i barely pay attention to what i am doing, but i haven't had any clumps yet!
This mascara is great for every day wear. It's not too dramatic, but it does lengthen and define lashes really well. Using an eyelash curler makes a huge difference.
I always get asked if I am wearing fake lashes when I wear this mascara!

I love this mascara!!! I have thin lashes ... not too short, just very sparse and thin individual lashes. Because of this, I take a lot of time applying mascara very carefully to insure that each lash is coated well without being clumpy - otherwise it will look like I have 2 lashes- haha. I really love this formula and the brush. I am so impressed that I doubt that I will ever buy another mascara ever again! I have tried many mascaras in the past - including tarte's lights camera lashes (which I HATED) so loving this mascara speaks volumes! I love to couple this with the Dior lash primer. It's a fabulous combo for thin lash gals like myself.
I am in love with this mascara! I got it as a deluxe sample but I will definitely be buying the full size. It adds volume and goes on so smooth. No clumping!
Great mascara! Lengthens without clumping or flaking!
first mascara I bought from sephora that was not clumpy! it does make my lashes look fuller, and separates the lashes.

This mascara is fantastic! It separates, volumizes, doesn't clump, and is blacker than black (I haven't tried the blue one yet). The one problem before it dries it has a tendency to get everywhere, so be careful and make sure to let it dry before you walk out the door. I wish it came in a waterproof version or was cheaper but this is still well worth buying if you like to emphasize your eyes!

this mascara is so great! i wear it almost everyday and it makes my lashes voluminous and lengthened. the only issue is that if i forget to wash my makeup off before bed in the night the mascara makes my eyes itch.. its a minor problem, but other than that glitch it is wonderful!

I just received this today for Christmas, and I love how it separates my lashes. The brush is great, and it combs through my lashes super well so it doesn't get clumpy! Definitely one of my favorite mascaras!

In my quest for the perfect mascara I have tried all the best sellers...Diorshow, YSL Faux Cils, Benefit They're Real, Tarte Lights Camera Lashes. So many different mascaras, and none of them lived up to my expectations. They were either too clumpy, too runny, too hard to get off, too this, too that...you get the idea. Then a couple weeks ago I purchased the Sephora Favorites set, which includes Buxom mascara. And I must say, this is THE MOST PERFECT MASCARA I have ever tried! No clumps, no raccoon eyes, no difficulty removing. One coat is beautiful and wonderful for daytime; it's noticeable without being too dramatic. But adding a second coat definitely adds the drama I'm looking for in the evening. And no matter how many coats I add this mascara refuses to clump, which is awesome. I am so incredibly pleased with Buxom, and I am so happy that I came across this mascara pretty much by accident! It's a winner in my book and will be a staple in my makeup bag for years to come.

I must admit, I am a hater of alternative mascara wands. I feel like most of them lead to clumping and don't provide enough definition. I love this wand, though! The formula is very clump resistant - pretty wet and slick, but provides a fair amount of volume. Probably not the MOST volumizing I've used, as I think definition is really sacrificed when you add multiple coats. I try to stick to 1 coat and it looks really pretty.

i've scoured for my favorite mascara for a while, and i've been using Buxom for over a year and a half now, and i've never been disappointed, however i absolutely recommend re-purchasing the product around 4-5 months (which is typically recommended anyway). definite favorite for sure! always volumes and lengthens. LOVE IT!
I LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS. This is the only mascara I use. It works so well, though it gets clumpy after a few coats.

This mascara is one of my favorites because within just a few strokes it gives you longer, fuller, defined lashes without any clumps at all. It is not a very buildable formula but you can put as much as you want on and there still won't be any clumps. The only thing I do not like about this mascara however is the size of the brush. The hourglass shape is great but I think that the brush size itself is too big. I get mascara on my eye lids all the time because the brush is hard to control. All in all I would recomend others to try it because the formula is awesome and you can wear it all day without any smudges.
If u want full, think lashes, get this mascara
AWESOME mascara!!! It doesn't smudge or flake.... definitely boosts the lashes. And you know when it needs to be replaced because it will start to flake.

My first try of this mascara was a sample. I normally use drug store brands. This is way better than my usual brands. I didn't realize that till I used up my sample and moved back to my old mascara brands.
I don't even consider using anything else but buxom mascara in black. That's it... plain and simple

Wow, I was wrong! I thought most mascaras were mostly the same--give or take. I just tried some of this and it gets every single one of my lashes covered!! I actually look like I have long lashes now!!! I love it. First time I've used it, so Ill have to see how long it lasts... but so far i'm sold!

reviews.review_title: Pretty awesome ... just needs more staying power.
reviews.review_text: This mascara definitely does what it says ... makes your lashes bigger and fuller! The only reason I did not give it 5 stars is because it does not hold a curl for very long. Due to this, I pair it with Benefit's They're Real mascara, and it is an awesome combination!!! The downside is the cost. :(

This mascara is so great because it lengthens and divides your lashes. The brush is great and it helps coat and divide each lash instead of clumping them all together! I wouldnt really say it volumizes the look of your lashes it just divides them well, but i love this mascara!

reviews.review_title: I can actually see my lashes in photos!
reviews.review_text: * A quick description of my lashes: Average in length, but so straight and sparse that they look microscopic.  Breakdown of the mascara  - It lengthened my lashes nicely (no spidery effect); it wasn't a huge difference, but good enough.  - Very natural-looking volume if I apply only one or two coats. If I want a dramatic, false-lashes look, I would need at least three coats. The mascara was very buildable, and I didn't experience any clumping even after four coats.  - The brush did just what the description said in that it coats and thickens all the lashes evenly, including those hard-to-reach ones in the corners of the eyes. The formula is a true black color (no grayish tint at all).  - The definition was amazing. It gave my lashes a pretty, fluttery look, and they felt soft even after four coats.  - The formula was decent in holding a curl. It straightened out my lashes a little when I applied the first coat immediately after curling my lashes. But what was left of the curl stayed even after the second, third, and fourth coats, and the curl lasted all day.  - I didn't experience any flaking or smudging with this mascara for 12 hours.  - The mascara washed off pretty easily in the shower. I use Olay's Gentle Foaming Face Wash.  Overall, this is a near-perfect mascara for me. For the first time I actually look like I have eyelashes in photos, including the ones where I'm not standing very close to the camera. Highly recommend.

this product is amazing! the brush is really nice and the product itself lengthens your eye lashes. in the box, they include tricks and tips for using the product which i found really cool. this is a must buy.

I was so impressed by how beautiful my lashes looked after using this. I subtracted one star only because I did notice some flaking (I'm beginning to think this is an unavoidable problem with mascaras). Also, if you're a sucker for cute packaging like I am, this mascara will not disappoint.

This is a pretty good mascara! For years now I've shied away from black mascara but I don't think this blackest black is too dark for my very fair complexion. I do love the volume. I've only seen smudges on one occasion. I don't think it lengthens very well however, and it does clump. So for me, although this is pretty darn good, Buxom doesn't live up to the hype that surrounds it.

This is a nice mascara. I've noticed lashes tend to stick together more with this mascara, it's pretty liquidy, so you have to be more careful with application, but if you get it on right it makes the lashes super black and long and gives a nice effect to the eyes.

I love love love this mascara! I have tried them all...my next fave is Lancome Hypnosis but the Buxom wand really hits all of my lashes and adds major length. The only thing I have to be careful about is minor clumping. I highly recommend!
This product is AMAZING. I LOVE it. the brush is hourglass, so it works with the lases. It makes my eyes so full and long. The only con is that it does not come off that easy.
This product is AMAZING i got a sample of it when I ordered something else and I LOVE it.!!!! The length it gives is awesome!! the only thing that is bad is that it is hard to get off.

I absolutely love this mascara. It makes my lashes look longer and thicker without excessive clumping. I can put multiple coats on, and it still looks good. I've had lots of compliments since I started wearing this mascara, with people asking where I bought my lashes.

reviews.review_title: I'd give this 4.5 -just needs a little more volume
reviews.review_text: I was really excited to try this as part of the Sephora Bestsellers kit, and overall it is a great mascara. The brush is rubbery and defines your lashes well, lengthens, doesn't clump after several applications. It also lasts all day and doesn't smudge at all.  That said, I was expecting more volume - I wouldn't say that it is intensely volumizing as the description states. I needed 3-4 coats to get the volume that a mascara like Diorshow would give in one application. But I can see why people keep coming back to this one and I might buy it again.
I'VE TRIED PLENTY OF MASCARA'S AND THIS IS DEFINETLY MY FAVORITE. I AM CONSTINTLY GETTING ASKED BY MANY WOMEN WHAT TIME OF MASCARA I USE AND I ALWAYS TELL THEM BUXOM BLACK MASCARA FROM SEPOHORA

This mascara is the best of the best in my book. The color is dark and rich and makes you lashes look long and thick. This is a people notice you product. Soap and water do work to take this product off but since the collor is so intense I do suggest though you use make up remover to help take this product off as it is easier on your eyes and takes less time.

This mascara is to die for it is amazing, i had baught it for my mom as a present and tested it out. Well i had looked in the mirror and it made me look like a million bucks it was incredible! so when my mom put it on it made her lashes look to the fullest and beautifuly colorated it was amzing and it was a fab price too. So those of you who just cant find the right mascara and have tried hundreds like my mom has this 1 is the 1 for you you will be astonished by it. go to your local sophora and buy it now

reviews.review_title: Buxom Buxom Lash Mascara Blackest Black
reviews.review_text: The BuxomLash Mascara is the mascara that I was looking for for long time. Gives you volume, lengthening.It is amazing.

Well, until today I always used Maybeline Great Lash, so maybe I'm easy to impress, but I think this mascara is the best thing that ever happened to my face. Holy smokes, no clumps, just beautiful thick lashes.

reviews.review_title: The BEST mascara on the market!
reviews.review_text: I had been a die-hard fan of Chanel's inimitable but now all I'll use is Buxom! This mascara lengthens, separates and volumizes without clumps or flaking during the day. The brush applicator is perfect for volume and separating. It's long wearing but it it's not impossible to wash off at the end of the day. The Bare Minerals cleanser removes it easily. It works best with an eyelash curler. I have yet to find a mascara that beats this one!

I have been using this mascara for over 3 years now and I have very thin, blonde eyelashes. This mascara really gives you thick and lush eyelashes. I don't even have to use an eyelash curler to get a great look.
Have also used Dior Show and I like this better and it's cheaper. I usually switch around but I bought this winner again

Impressive mascara that is natural yet glamorous! Brings more volume to the lashes, lengthens, doesn't flake, doesn't clump, long wearing, easy to apply, and is just very pretty on. I am impressed enough to purchase another. A+ product!

Pros: it's pretty good at separating lashes. It grabs those tiny, hard to reach lashes. It hasn't clumped so far.  Cons: The brush is really, really big so it feels a bit awkward. I personally didn't notice any lengthening or volumizing. Not as black as I like my mascaras to be.  Overall, it's not a mascara I'll be purchasing again because I think there are better ones out there.

I love this product! It does not irritate my sensitive eyes and it doesn't flake. My lashes look perfect with every application, and they never clump together. I used to use Dior Show, which is also another amazing mascara, but this is a better value for the money.

This mascara is amazing! I love the tapered brush! This mascara defines my lashes and is very lengthening. I also find that this layers very nicely as well. No matter how many coats you put on it does not clump and stays perfect! I definitely recommend this product!
Used Lancome waterproof for years. Buxom is better & cheaper!!
The holy grail of mascaras. Goes on easily, adds length and volume. Love the brush, covers all lashes well and separates. Big plus, NO clumps!!!

I used this mascara for a couple months and really liked it, but then I started to notice that the tube doesn't last that long and the brush is really awkward. The brush is HUGE. It takes a few applications to get used to. I felt like I was constantly getting the mascara on my skin. It's not aweful, but I think I can do better. It does leave your lashed fairly soft and not brittle like some other mascaras can.
LOVE this mascara. Makes my lashes look like feathers and SUUUUPER long. love it!

It goes on pretty easily, but isn't very volumizing or lengthening. I've only tried it for one day and I think I may get a lash curler to help my lashes out. I just didn't think it was as effective as DiorShow. I switched from Dior for ethical reasons, but their mascara was my favorite.

A coworker friend recommended this to me. After years of trying different brands, it's great to finally have a mascara with no globs, doesn't make raccoon eyes, washes off easily with water, doesn't flake off and irritate the eyes, and lasts all day! I highly recommend it!!!
love love love this mascara!! defines and lengthens and i swear it thckens my tiny asian lashes. you must try this!!!
love this mascara!! Glides on beautifully. Will def buy again.

This mascara is the best mascara I have personally ever used. It works so well it almost appears as if your wearing fake lashes. It also doesn't clump or flake like other volumizing mascaras. It is definitely worth the price.
It's amazing, it makes my lashes visibly longer and thicker.

Pros: Does not clump or flake whatsoever.  Cons: MESSY. Once it dries it almost looks like a dusty black. I prefer a true almost inky black. Irritated my eyes, which usually never happens with any other mascara. Didn't lengthen as much as others I've used. Also, I hate those rubber bristle brushes, which I suppose is just personal preference, but, I won't be buying again.
This mascara was great out of the box and that lasted for about a week. After that, it got dry and flaky and didn't go on smooth at all. I will finish out the tube, but won't purchase this on again.
I received this mascara as a free sample, and loved it. It didn't cake or flake after a long day. It isn't ideal for lengthening, but it works great for making lashes look fuller.

I have tried a lot of mascaras in the past, all of which either made my lashes brittle, flakes, or transfers, even if its waterproof. This mascara does an incredible job at lengthening and adding volume to my lashes, and it also holds my curl. it is the ideal mascara. Definitely a must have item.

I cannot live without this mascara. I have been using it for almost three years, and my lashes will never be the same! The brush is amazing and unlike anything else I've ever used. The product lengths and my lashes whild holding a curl...and it NEVER clumps. Everyone should own this prodcut. (I also like to layer it under a more volumizing mascara, such as Clinique or Lancome!)

I have tried mascara after mascara looking for an every day mascara that will make my eyes stand out. Mascara and eyeliners tend to bleed down my eyes, get clumpy, or cause me to have a reaction. After real simple reviewed it I gave it a shot. A year later my eyes are so thankful I did. My lashes stand out all day and it comes off with soap and water. Best make-up find...EVER!

This mascara is really something! The hourglass shape brush is densely packed with rubbery bristles to grip onto and coat every lash. Not only does it define each lash, it plumps them up, giving an amazingly intense, dramatic look! This is fantastic for someone like me who has short, sparse lashes. I would actually give this product 4.5 stars but I have one minor issue. After a long day or maybe for those with oily skin, the mascara smudges just a little! Aside from that I have no complaints! :D Definitely give this mascara a try!
Amazing mascara. It makes my lashes long. I can use it to fan them out and make my eyes pop open. It works well on bottom lashes too.

This mascara looks amazing when you first put it on.... then a few hours later it somehow winds up on my lower lids and makes me look like a raccoon. Perhaps this is not a day mascara, only a night one that one wears for 4 hours or less!

This mascara really plumps your lashes and makes them pop. it goes on nicely with no clumping. But I've noticed it tends to run by the middle of the day and I need to clean up with some eye make-up remover under my eyes. (I only put mascara on my top lashes)

I was looking forward this good deal on black friday since it was time to replace my regular mascara (Dior Show). Unfortunately this mascara gives you a look of old dry mascara that makes your lashes stick together. This product did not work for me
I have bought this mascara over and over again. Great for contact wearers and I love that it does not have all of the bad chemicall junk in it.

I love the BE products and this is no different. Goes on very smooth and doesn't clump like some mascaras. I love the price. If there is one thing, as it ages, it tends to dry out. But I am bad about hanging on the mascara past the recommended 3 months.....or is 6 months? Oh well, not sure that is a product flaw. Could be a user flaw.

This mascara does exactly what it promises with just a few quick swipes. No flaking or smudging, just great natural looking lashes. I'm sure with a second application, the effect could get quite dramatic. I love this stuff and will remain loyal forever.

I tend to have mascara ADHD and I have remained loyal to this product. I admit, I use Latisse, but this mascara makes my lashes look thick, full, dramatic, and does not flake, which is a huge pet peeve for me. LOVE.

I'm a mascara addict, constantly searching for the blackest,lengthiest lashes ever! Anyway, this mascara fits the bill. The want separates so you don't get spider lashes and clumps. The formula adds volume and length. I'm now a fan and will be buying more in the near future!
This is the only mascara I use. If I don't have enough money to buy it, I don't get any other brand.

I have tied many mascaras, and I was so happy when I found this a few years ago. I have continued to try others, but keep coming back. I love bare escentuals products in general, no animal testing, quality ingredients, no parabens, etc. If this mascara starts clumping or your lashes stick together, it's time for a new one. And the brush rrreally defines and grabs all the little lashes...

If i want thick lashes, this is what I reach for, which is always! If I want waterproof I have begin to layer that over this! It works! I love this stuff. It comes off easy with sesame oil which is my remover of choice.

I've been on the hunt for a mascara that defines but doesn't rub off and is easily removed at the end of the day. This is pretty good. The brush is very big but it does provide definition and doesn't rub off a lot. It's still pretty difficult to get off at the end of the day but I guess 2/3 isn't bad.
This is my favorite mascara, and I've tried so many. I keep coming back to this one! The secret is in the brush. Something about the shape gives you huge clump-free lashes.
By far, the most amazing mascara I have ever used...
Love this mascara! Makes your lashes full and long without clumping. And, although it doesn't run on your face throughout the day, it washes off easily with soap.

I am a Dior mascara addict but recently tried this when I got a sample of it. Wow, this does wonders for my lashes! Totally blows me away! I LOVE the shape of the brush- it is optimal for getting all my lashes and making them look super long! However, I desperately wish this came in a waterproof version because it has smudged a few times. This is what kept me from buying a full size.

I bought this because the salesperson was raving about how well it worked, and because it almost got a 5 star rating. When I tried it on at home, I had to brush it on several times to deposit product on my very thin lashes. I'm a person on the go, and I can't spend 10 minutes trying to get mascara on. And even after all that application, I still didn't see a dramatic difference in voume! I ended up returning it the next day. If you want mascara that goes on in few swipes, this is NOT the one to pick.

I love this mascara, and I think I had tried them all before I found this one. It goes on smoothly and easily, doesn't need tons of coats to make an impact. It wears all day, doesn't smudge, and never clumps. I make sure I never run out of this one!

By far my favorite mascara. Beautiful brush, great volume. Maybe not the best for very short lashes but medium to long lengths, this is a great defininer! And makes your lashes fat with just 2/3 coats. No gimmicks, just a great product

I have a sample of this little beauty, and it worked so well that I'm about to take the plunge and order the full size!  It lengthens, separates, and coats my eyelashes beautifully without any clumps or smudging. It's absolutely perfect for achieving a natural look, but I wouldn't count on it when trying to achieve dramatic eyes. It's also perfect for the bottom lashes because it keeps them separate and natural, but still adds volume.  If I could give this product ten stars, I would. I just wish they made more colors and a waterproof formula!
It volumized a little, but nothing that was quite noticeable.After a month or so it started burning my eyes.The blue on did the same but in about two weeks after using it.

This is literally the best mascara. The shape of the brush makes it easy to apply to lashes (I have never had it smudge while putting it on) and NEVER clumps.
