I've had my bottle for over 5 months now and I use it daily: it still gives me nice long, thick lashes that aren't spidery. I'd recommend this to anyone who loves black eyelashes! I can't wait to try the blue next.

This mascara makes my eyes look gorgeous. I already have pretty long lashes but this completes them. It makes them look much plumper and fuller. It really just makes my eyes pop and it is the best mascara I have ever bought.

reviews.review_title: I love this, and I hate wearing mascara
reviews.review_text: This is the best mascara I've ever used! I absolutely adore it. I'm not a heavy make-up wearer, never have been, and mascara is one mystery I've never mastered until now. My eyelids are oily and my eyes water easily, and every mascara I've ever used has given me raccoon eyes within hours, but never with this stuff at all. I even wore it through an intense dance class in a room with a heater on way too high, and though I was soaked and melting, my mascara didn't even smudge a little. I can get a gorgeous and very youthful, natural, daily look with just one coat of Buxom, or I can use multiple coats (or one coat over a primer) to glam it up on special occasions. The brush is brilliant and makes application so quick and easy. I seriously LOVE this stuff. I was a mascara hater, but this mascara is now my very favorite thing in my make-up kit.

I have tried a lot of mascaras but this one is THE BEST! It makes my lashes look like I am wearing false ones! If you try any mascara, PLEASE TRY THIS ONE! The only draw back is that it isn't waterproff, but even with my eyes watering due to wind or weather, it doesn't run!

I LOVE this mascara. I read a review on another site that stated that this mascara was great for sensitive eyes. NO JOKE. My eyes get very irritated by many commerical eye products (I can't even wear eyeliner because of it). Though pricey, I bought this and have NO REGRETS. Last month I thought I'd try a drugstore brand again to see if I noticed the difference, and my eyes burned the minute I applied it. Nine bucks down the tube. I should've just put that $ toward a new Buxom Lash! LOVE LOVE LOVE
this was great at frist but after a while it became dry but this is one of my favorites!
I got this as a sample in one of my orders and I fell in love with it. It's the best mascara I have ever used so far, so I bought the full sized version.
This is my favorite mascara because it gives my lashes more volume. The mascara wand is large and it deposits a lot of product onto lashed without clumping.

This is an awesome mascara. It took me awhile to get used to the plastic applicator, but now that I am I can put mascara on like a pro (and coming from someone who can't stand stuff going in/near my eyes this is a miracle). It comes with an instruction sheet that tells you how to get the buxom look but I haven't been able to achieve that look, just spiderly looking lashes which I then have to clean up before work. I can even use the applicator to apply mascara to my bottom lashes with minimal black stains on my face.

I have been searching (and will likely continue) to find the perfect mascara. In the meantime, I keep coming back to this one every time I experiment with another. It does an excellent job of volumizing and lengthening. The only downsides are that it seems to fade throughout the day, and can leave flakes under your eyes at the end of the day. But, since I'm mostly looking for volume, this is very good mascara for that.

This mascara is conditioning, it lengthens, and there is nice even coverage. My lashes feel like they are being massaged by a thousand bristles whenever I put this on. Good separation of lashes, no clumping even with multiple coats. I am very pleased and get loads of compliments when I wear it. Overall, I feel amazing with it on!

This mascara is different because of the wand. The wand is actually made up of rubbery bristles instead of the typical brush-like ones. The actual Mascara is thin and goes on nicely without clumping- and is easily buildable for a more bold look. One thing I noticed is that it took the curl out of my lash. I typically curl my lashes and then apply mascara but when I did this the curl immediately left- no harm done because if you curl after you apply the mascara they curl fine and stay :) I've tried Dior Show, YSL and other but d definatly buy this again for the price and the results.
A forever fan of this mascara. I'm a huge mascara person, who has tiny barely there lashes. This mascara DELIVERS! IF you want full, long eye lashes --- Buxom is the way to go!!

As long as this mascara is being sold, it will be the only one that I will ever buy. The brush is perfect for my thinner lashes and the formula is flexible, long lasting, and never clumps. By far my favorite mascara I've ever used.
Best mascara I've tried...does not clump, goes on easy and stays all day. Since it's not waterproof it will run if you cry or eyes get teary.
I have tried every brand on the market and this is the best mascara out there. I have thin lashes and this makes them look full and long. I highly recommend this product
My daughter thought I had the fake eyelashes on. Makes 'em very long and pretty, no clumping, no smearing. LOVE IT.

I wish I could do 4.5 stars but can't, so I'd rather give it 5 than 4. I swear by this stuff. The only reason I want to give it slightly less than 5 stars is because it's hard to get the volume I would like from it. I end up going through the tube faster than I'd like in order to get the volume I want. However, I've stuck with this stuff for years and continue to go back to it whenever I try something new. I'm trying a new mascara now and hoping it works better but, if not, I'm perfectly happy to continue using Buxom Lash.
Very dramatic. Really opens up my eyes if I use them on my lower lashes. Isn't good for curls.

looked great when I pulled the brush out of the tube. The first application was great too. The brush is very big so I thought I'd like that, problem is when there are globs they hit your skin much easier. I found it messy
Good Product that works well. Great product when used in combination with Benefit They Are Real mascara.
This is the best mascara I've found! I love the wand!

This mascara satisfies so many needs. Quality coverage, no clumping, and my lashes look longer and thicker. They feel healthier - no breakage and no under-eye smudges - even after hours of wear my lashes feel soft/supple and still look fresh. No problem with my contacts either. And it cleans off with minimal effort. It's a Top Performer.
My daughter suggested I try this mascara. What a difference from anything else I've used. It goes on smooth...no clumping and makes my lashes look fuller and longer. I love this product.

Basically, this mascara trumps all others. I have tried pretty much every single brand and type of mascara, and this is by far the best. It doesn't clump (unless your over-layer) it can be layered, and I swear to God it makes my lashes stronger, thicker, and naturally prettier over time. It wins, that is all.
this has become my favorite mascara, love the way it looks on!!
Makes my lashes look much longer and thicker than they really are. I generally only need one coat. And it doesn't make them look all spidery. No flaking either, even if it's been on for 18 hours.
I have really thin, short, and light eyelashes but this mascara lengthens and adds volume to eyelashes without making them look fake. Best mascara I have ever worn!

I didn't know what I was missing until I bought this! The wand has so many tiny, little bristles that it grabs each lash! It also lengthens your lashes, so much, defining each one and it looks so real! I'm not sure if it's the mascara, or my imagination, but I feel like my lashes are longer now, even without the mascara. This is a classic mascara that you should just swipe on when you're running out of the house, or just want a simple, but sexy look.

I was frustrated with drugstore mascaras. Therefore, I bit the bullet and went into Sephora asking a salesperson for their best mascara. She brought me right to Buxom. I paid more, and gave it a whirl. However, I discovered that part of the problem is that my eyelashes are thinning and getting more sparse. Therefore, if you are in the same boat, don't spend the extra money for this product. Additionally, it is difficult to remove leaving stained eyes the next morning even after using Sephora's waterproof eye makeup remover.

reviews.review_title: BEST MASCARA EVER. THERE IS NONE BETTER.
reviews.review_text: I think my title says it all :P

I got this as part of the Lash Stash kit orginally, then bought it again full sized because I loved it. The brush is really nice and manages to apply the right amount of product. What I love most about this product is that it does not clump at all, totally defines my lashes and I dont have to use a zillion coats to get the look I want. Definitely a winner and for less than the Dior shadows and a better performance.

One of my favorite mascaras, it separates, lengthens, and thickens. The applicator wand is wonderful! Not a very dramatic mascara, but all you need to do to fix that is apply a second layer or use some sort of primer.

I have short, thin eyelashes and no mascara was really given me longer and fuller lashes so I was kind of skeptical about this mascara. Boy was I wrong! This mascara made my eyelashes look so full and so long; even my boyfriend noticed! It doesn't clump and I love the brush. It's definitely worth the money because it does exactly what you want it to! I just wished they had a waterproof formula so I don't have to worry about my mascara running during allergy season. Other than that, this is the best mascara a girl could ever ask for!
i have short Asian lashes and this mascara did wonders for my eyes. my eyes looked huge and doll like. my lashes looked much longer and thicker. my friend even asked me if i was wearing fake lashes.
This mascara is truly amazing. My lashes look so long and defined. If you want long lashes, pick this mascara!
I absolutely love this mascara. It volumizes and lengthens but does not seem too thick on my lashes. Looks natural, no clumps, easy to apply. Can't ask for anything more from a mascara.
i like it, and MOST IMPORTANTLY, i will buy it again.

LOVE this mascara. Probably one of the best I've used. It creates fuller, darker and longer lashes better then any other mascara I've tried. Will def be buying this again and recommending it to my friends.

This stuff goes on like a dream! The formula is smooth and totally bumps up my lashes. With one coat they looked fluffy, long, voluminous, and were slightly curled. As far as I have experienced, it does not flake, though if you put it on your bottom lashes it gives just a tiny bit of a raccoon eye. Oh, and the mascara comes with cute little directions and tips for better application ;) I definitely recommend it.
I've tried pretty much all of the mascara's on the market, and this is the BEST one out there. Give your lashes a little curl- and then apply the mascara for all day volume and glam.

The minute i heard about the Buxom Lash Mascara i was a little iffy until I went to my friend's house to try it out and I was sold. My favorite part is that it is only $19. I mean where else can I find a mascara as good as that for that low of a price! The Buxom Lash Mascara definitely provided me with great coverage and lasted me through every single day. I definitely recomend this mascara and I have not yet had any problems with it. If you are looking for a good priced high end mascara this is a great a choice.
This is the best mascara i have eve used. Its so defining and volumizing and it makes my lashes look fake. Fantastic

Two years ago I was talking to a girl who had beautiful, long, perfect eyelashes so I didn't hesitate to ask her what she used. She pulled out Buxom, I looked up where to buy it, and have sworn by it ever since. I love this mascara! I get compliments very often, highly recommend!!

Really disappointed with this mascara. It clumped my lashes together, looked cakey and uneven. Also did nothing for the lenghth of my lashes. I've found $5 mascara that looks and goes on better than this one.

I got the sample size of the black with my past order. My lashes are pretty much straight unless i curl them. Many mascaras weigh my lashes down including this one. I gave it 4 stars because i find the brush very nice. It separates the lashes nicely ( i have very thick lashes) and gives them a very dark color. If you already have curly lashes, this mascara will be great for you.  **If you wear contacts, this mascara is NOT waterproof** If the mascara I use isnt waterproof, I usually just layer a waterproof mascara on top of it, hope this helps you decide if you want to get it!

BEST mascara in the world, i have tried sooo many other brands and products and have been dissatisfied each and every time, this mascara doesn't give me 3 big lashes, but lots of little lashes, and if i apply more, it will thicken and volumizes but still keeps them separate, i love this stuff!!!

I had been using tarts lights, camera, lashes for about 4 years now, but after getting a deluxe sample of the buxom mascara i think it is my new fav! It goes on super black and doesn't flake. It more lengthening then volumizing but you could defiantly build it up.
I have long lashes naturally and this stuff never gives me tarantula eyes but separates and lengthens beautifully.
This mascara is better than my Doirshow, my Tarte, and my YSL mascara (also a whole lot cheaper!) I don't know whats in this precious little tube, but I'm in love.
This mascara does everything it promises. I absolutely love it. However, I will say that it can get a tiny bit runny.

I've used this mascara since it came out. It goes on simply, covering every lash, but if I happen to accidentally get it on my skin, it is easy to get off. My lashes are naturally long and curved, but as a blonde, no one can see them without mascara. This mascara looks natural, yet intense. Some gals at the office say, Must be nice! A couple of people have asked me if they are real. This formula does not clump upon application or flake off during the day. The number of coats one uses determines how long and lush they look. I usually use two coats for a striking effect. In my oppinion, this can only be made better by making it in waterproof, although it does not come off quickly if you happen to shed a tear. So I continue to order it again and again.

This is one of the few mascaras I have stuck with for more than a year. It stays on, keeps my lashes separated and doesn't smudge a ton if i touch my eye. I just wish it would come out with a better water resistant version. I love this so much but i want one i don't have to worry about when i have to put in eye drops.
Thickens and separates my thin lashes without spider eyes! Beautiful, soft texture. Doesn't lengthen as much as other formulas I've used.

I received this as a sample. I was very skeptical, because I rarely find a mascara that works on my baby-fine lashes. It looked like it would clump, but to my surprise, it perfectly defined and lengthened my lashes. Furthermore, it did not clump or smear. It comes off with Dove soap. Needless to say, I ordered the regular size. It's a keeper.
This the best mascara I have ever used! It thickens your lashes, and extremely lengthens them. Thanks sephora!

This mascara did very little for me in the way of bigger, fuller lashes. I did find it to be very good at not clumping - but no matter how many coats I applied it did not give me dramatically volumized lashes. Also, my makeup remover was powerless against it so it was a major battle to take it off every day. Returned it!

It was great going on; the wand separates the lashes so they don't get clumped. However after 3 hours of wear, the mascara started bothering my eyes. My eyelashes started feeling heavy and I felt like I needed to get the mascara off ASAP. It looks good, but if you want breezy, happy eyes for longer wear, you might want to consider something else.

reviews.review_title: The Only Mascara That Works for Me
reviews.review_text: I never used to wear mascara. Every time I'd try it I'd get raccoon eyes. Then I tried Buxom Last Mascara as part of a Bare Escentuals eye kit. It opens up my eyes making me look more awake & finishes my look. I have been buying & wearing this for over a year now. I usually buy it as part of a kit so I can try some other products at the same time.
it didn't create the volume i expected with the brush being as big as it is. I have to put three coats on and it's still not as volumizing as i would like.

I just tried my deluxe sample of this mascara today and I LOVE it! The rubber wand defines every lash and it didn't even clump. I cried a lot today (I had a bad week) and the mascara didn't even smudge! I will most definitely buy the full size product!

I wanted to like this mascara. I like that it is non-clumpy, and defines every lash, but within 5 minutes of applying this mascara, it uncurls my eyelashes! I have short eyelashes, so this does not help them look lengthened! I tried this several times, and have even tried to hold my eyelashes in the curled position with my fingers while the mascara is drying to help them stay curled with no avail. Will have to return it.

Probably the BEST mascara I have ever used. Every lash get coated and it looks EXTREMELY natural!  I gave 4 stars because it seems to flake quite a lot. But besides that it works wonderfully! Highfly reccomend!

reviews.review_title: Nice Jet Black, Soft Lashes! Buildable!
reviews.review_text: I am SOLD on both Buxom Black Mascaras, This one my lashes are softer and I could build this with a few layers. I have Straight , Long, Sparse Lashes but makes them look and feel great!
The wand of this mascara is simply amazing! It creates fuller, longer lashes in seconds. Love it!

I adore this mascara. I got a sample of it and was completely wowed by it. The brush took me a few days to get use to, but once I did I really liked it. The shape allows me to get to the smallest lashes. Since I've been using this product I've gotten so many compliments - even at 7:00 pm after 12 hours of wear!

This is the BEST mascara I've ever used. It is thickening, lengthening, and moisturizing. It does not flake or cake. Better that any clinique or lancome mascaras. Also better than the more expensive Dior Show.

I won a full size tube of this mascara through Sephora, and I don't know how I will ever go back to my old brands. (thanks, Sephora!) Holy cow, this stuff is incredible - it makes my eyelashes look aMAZing; very long, very full, and very defined. I don't really even need eyeliner with this. The eyeliner lasts all day, doesn't clump, and hasn't made my eyelashes break.  One of the best things about the product, too, is the applicator; it's flexible, which keeps the product from going on your eyelids versus your lashes.  Love it - I wish it weren't $19, but I love it.

I absolutly love this mascara. It's so glossy in black. It makes my eyes look so wide awake, even after the longest of nights. It doesn't weigh down my stick straight lashes, but it still manages to volumize so well. It plumps up every individual lash without clumping at all. Wonderfull!

This mascara is excellent. I've tried many other brands at higher prices and this one beats them all.  My sensitive eyes are not bothered at all and my lashes are fuller and longer. I definitely recommend!
wish it was water proof.
I'm very picky about mascara but don't like to spend a lot on it. Buxom is worth it, but I would REALLY like to see a waterproof version developed.

I love it! The brush takes some getting used to, but it's so worth it. I find that the volumizing/lengthening properties tend to wear off by the end of the day... it doesn't stay as WOW as when you first put it on, but it does last a long time. Highly recommended.
I love this mascara! t separates each lash but doesnt look too fake. worth a try!

I get a lot of compliments on this mascara. Mascara is so personal, it's like picking out the right fragrance. I naturally don't have thick or lengthy lashes, but this mascara can create god-given lashes, and not crazy tarantula lashes.

This mascara is AWESOME! I have pretty sensitive eyes when it comes to eye make-up and, with most, by the end of the day my eyes would be blood shot and itchy, but not with this! I've also used the regular bareminerals mascara, but the Buxom is MUCH better. Love it!

This mascara makes my lashes look instantly thick and beautiful! I've tried a LOT of different mascaras, because no matter what they say, they all seem to just clump my lashes together into a sticky mess, but this one is great. It's not completely clump-free, but I've found it's much, much better than other ones I've tried. It lasts all day on my top lashes, but I've found that I absolutely can't use it on my bottom lashes unless i want it smudging off and giving me dark mascara circles under my eyes, which makes me sad. It's almost the perfect mascara, and I would absolutely still recommend it to anyone- the wonders it works are awesome.

I've tried so many mascaras, but I always find myself coming back to this one. It does everything-lengthens, adds volume and stays all day long! The best part is at the end of the night, it comes off quickly with water and my face cleaser! Defenately my favorite mascara
Great mascara + Great brush + Rich, deep black color = Great, full, thick lashes.

I really like this mascara. The brush separates your lashes while volumizing and lengthening them but preventing that clumpy look. However, I've found that after a couple weeks use, my lashes seem to be brittle and break off easily. This hadn't happened until I used this mascara. I really wish it wouldn't dry out my lashes so much because other than that, it's definitely one of the best mascaras I've used.
Makes my lashes look SO much longer! The best mascara I have used.

I have to admit that this is one of the best mascaras I have ever tried. The color is rich, and it lengthens and volumizes beautifully. I use it with a primer--either UD or Tarte--and I get the most spectacular long lashes that last all day. It's up there in quality with Tarte's mascaras...I'm hooked!
this was a great mascara but its a bit pricey its worth it though if you have the money
This mascara is wonderful. Love the brush and how it lengthens your lashes. Goes on easy and lasts a long time. Gives you sexy lashes!

you know, this had GREAT ratings. but personally, i like a thin, small brush. this is a HUGE brush and it's easy to miss and make a mess on your eyes. ok, so i'm getting older and i'm not as steady perhaps but still. it is a good color and makes pretty lashes.

I got a deluxe sample of this and I will definitely be getting the full size when it runs out. Mascara is the only makeup item I buy at a drug/grocery store (Lash Blast by Cover Girl is my favorite), but I might have to switch and splurge for this one. I've tried other pricy mascaras and my drug-store brand always outshone them... until now! I absolutely love the flexible brush, I've never seen anything like it. I have long lashes but they are thin and this mascara fills them out perfectly without clumping.
The brush on this mascara is great and it applies really great. Doesn't stay on as well as some other products I've tried.
I got this in a sample size and I absolutely love it! My new favorite mascara. I never have any clumps at all! I plan on getting a full size soon!

I got this as a sample and was so surprised by how great it was! It really does volumize, lengthen and define all in one. It is slightly on the wetter side, so I need to wait for it to dry a little before I blink or do anything. It really is a great mascara and I can't wait to buy a full size.

I have used a lot of mascara's over the years & this is by far my favorite! Not sure if it is the brush or just the product itself but there is no clumping and since I have very short eyelashes it does a great job of coating them so they look great!

This is a great mascara! I have long lashes naturally and this mascara gives them a nice boost. It defines and gives a lot of volume without clumping or flaking. Looks very clean on the eye. I also really like the wand. It's not the typical wand that you find on most mascaras; it's rubbery and separates the lashes very well.

Hands-down this product belongs in the Top 3 mascaras any mascara-loving person should own! Long-lasting, buildable color and thickness that makes any set of eyelashes, no matter how short and sparse, full, thick and absolutely lush... Somewhat hard to remove though ;-)
i do like this, it does define my short eyelashes, but with two to three layers i got the spider look.

just got this product as a free gimme from the beauty spinner and I am hooked. I never though i would ever give up my old classic greatlash, but this is amazing. doesn't flake or leave black gunk under my eyes, and the brush design coats every lash with no clumping. only reason i wouldn't give this 5 stars is because the brush, while awesome, is really long. i have to concentrate pretty hard in the morning to avoid poking myself in the eye or smearing mascara all over my face.

reviews.review_title: My Top Pick of all time. simply AMAZING.
reviews.review_text: I have used many mascaras, they all promise to give you fuller, radiant lashes. Every time i purchase one of these mascaras, they always end up causing every lash to stick together (not natural), clumps of unwanted residue (fake), and is never spread out completely. THis however, is my FAVORITE mascara, i repeatedly buy this. It evenly coats your lashes, leaves not a clump in site, and doesn't not cause your lashes to stick together. I have absolutely no complaints. and thankful there is such a mascara that really does what it says. The formula, is not thick, neither light, a very happy medium that goes on like silk! I am excited to possibly try the similar buxom beauty mascara that twists to different sizes. I have high hopes! Ending decision. 10/10.

I would never have bought this mascara on my own, so I'm very glad I got it as a Sephora beauty gift. Buxom goes on so smoothly and clumpless it allows you to choose how thick you want your lashes to look. I have thick but blond lashes so I need a mascara to make them show up, but don't always want to look like I'm wearing falsies. This mascara lets me set a natural tone for day and build volume for a night out. It also lets me end the day perfectly by not smudging when it's on and not refusing to leave when I wash it off.
Love this mascara. Makes me look like I have false lashes on and it holds the curl. I love it. More than two coats gets clumpy though so be aware of that - however that twiggy look is back in...
Really good mascara, Even if you have very little lashes it makes them look bigger and fuller! Only thing is its not waterproof

I really like what this does to my lashes, it lengthens, volumizes and is a nice dark black.I really HATE how when i do the wiggle motion to get it close to the base of my lashes, it smears on my eyelid. Then i need to go back with a q-tip to fix it, and that makes my lashes clump. If I'm really careful or use black liner on the the top, it either doesnt happen or doesnt show because the black liner hides the smears.
Great Black color.Did not add as much thickness to my lashes as I had hoped.Nice brush, evenly distributes mascara. Needed to apply numerous times.Very water/moisture sensitive.

reviews.review_title: Keep coming back to this one
reviews.review_text: I am always searching for the best mascara. I have tried over 20 probably. I always return to this mascara. It provides natural, yet dramatic lashes. It doesn't clump and doesn't flake, therefore is great for a contact lens wearer like me.
I was expecting this mascara to perform better. As a basic mascara it's fine, but if it's meant to marginally thicken and lenghten, then it does not.

I have been searching for the past few years for a mascara that coats well, doesn't clump, and doesn't run but also isn't impossible to get off. I was impressed by this mascara overall. I've been using Urban Decay's curling mascara and this one is definitely a more subtle formula, taking several coats to achieve the look that I was going for. However, I really like the brush and how this mascara makes my lashes look naturally long, lush, and dark. I'm still a little torn over which mascara I ultimately like better, but this is definitely a good mascara.

I've used the pink & green Maybelline mascara for years and decided to give Buxom a try. Wow, I love this mascara because it makes my lashes look so long & thick. People have asked me if I use a lash lengthening serum but I do not.

I have been using this for a few days and was so unimpressed. I gave it 2 stars because it is very black and didn't smudge. It lacked volume and every time I tried to do a 2nd coat I got clumps on my long lashes, which was embarrassing, I prefer a top drugstore brand than this.

Love this mascara! The brush picks up just enough so it applies perfectly to my eyelashes and never clumps. I have tried other products since I bought this and I keep going back to this one, it is soooo much better than anything else I have used!
I absolutely LOVE this mascara, the brush really makes the difference! Only downsize is it doesn't come in waterproof and it can run easily, which can be troublesome when a person has allergies!

Love my new mascara! When you follow the Buxom instructions, it makes your lashes look amazing- long and thick- almost like false lashes! I would recommend this mascara to anyone. Not only does it stay put all day but it's healthy for my lashes which makes me very happy. =)

I have tried a lot of different mscaras from cheap to very expensive. I have oily lashes and most mascaras run waterproof or not. This one stays and my lashes look a mile long and doesnt flake at all.

I tried most department store brands (Dior, Lancome, Urban Decay, etc.) and practically every drugstore brand. Usually, the drugstore brand beats the department store brands, but not this time. I received this as my free beauty perk and it is amazing! It gives you long and full lashes. On top of that, it separates your lashes. Formula is thin and clump free. However, since the formula is thin, it takes a few extra coats than usual. But, that doesn't bother me!
The mascara goes on very smoothly, not clumpy. Does a good job of lengthening and volumizing.
Got this as part of the beauty roulett gifts & it is awesome!! I will buy again when this one is empty. Makes lashes look longer,fuller & just plain glamorous.

The formulation of this mascara is light and smooth and goes on easily but perhaps my most favorite thing is the brush. I buy so many different mascaras in search of the right bright and this one is perfect!
this is the best mascara ever!!! I have 3. Its perfect <3

I have long eyelashes and I've been trying to find a mascara that wouldnt weigh my lashes down after i curl them but still give me a full popped look.I love this mascara! It gives me the length and fullness I've been searching for without having to turn to fake eylashes. Thank you BUXOM!!!

So great! I have been through so many mascaras, about 25! And i just about gave up and got used to this is as good as its gonna get feeling. Great definition, fine comb without hurting or being to abrasive. Great moist coating without being to wet. Very buildable. Overall I have med/long lashes, almond shaped eye, but not much volume. LONG STORY SHORT ITS GREAT!

reviews.review_title: I only wish it was waterproof.
reviews.review_text: This is a fantastic mascara. I'm so pleased with it. My only complaint is that I wish it was waterproof.
Bought this in desperation one day. I hated this product. It clumped big-time and it was impossible to get the small lashes near the inner eye. After 2 weeks, it went in the bin.

I received this as a free sample with one of my purchases and it works better than other mascara I've used so far! I wish it was waterproof so it didn't come off when I woke up in the morning, but it looks natural on my eyes and gives them the luscious look I've been looking for. It gives my lashes the volume and length they need. And it doesn't clump them together.

what a great product ! i have skimpy lashes and keep trying new mascaras that dont delivery I COME BACK TO BUXON EVERY TIME . you have got to try this products whether you need volumne or length its great

reviews.review_title: One Of Best Mascara I Have Uses
reviews.review_text: One of the top mascaras I have uses. Buxom has a great formula product and the bottle is HUGE. Only problem is that I had a hard time getting the baby lashes and I don't think it is waterproof. 9/10

I just got this mascara & I love it! Doesn't get clumpy, can use a little for a more subtle look or a couple of coats to get really dramatic lashes. Doesn't burn my eyes or irritate my contact lenses.
When I wear this mascara, people always ask me where I buy my false eyelashes!! it is so thick but never chunky and my eyelashes always look long and thick without sticking together.
I really liked it the brush helps separate my lashes and it looks really good. I would buy it again.

I got this as a sample, and it is the best mascara I've ever used. I am very picky about my mascara because I want it to volumize and lengthen at the same time. I've tried all sorts of different kinds, from department store brands to drugstore brands and I've never been fully satisfied with any of them. But this mascara is amazing! It works wonderfully, and I'm never using anything else.

reviews.review_title: Looks like I have black eyes
reviews.review_text: I really liked the way this mascara looked when I applied it. It is perfect for day, separated my lashes nicely, and wasn't clumpy. However, after a couple of hours it would wear onto my under-eye area. I ended up looking really tired with black bags under my eyes. Bummer.

I love this mascara. I got a free sample from Sephora last week, and I will now switch permanently to this Buxom Lash mascara. Only downside is I'm a brunette with brown eyes, and I prefer brown eyeliners and mascara. Wish Buxom offered brown.

reviews.review_title: From eh to Can't live without!
reviews.review_text: At first I wasn't very excited about it. Even though my sister raved about it like a maniac. I like my mascara to give me a lot of thickness. My sister had told me it was very defining so I thought that would mean no thickness/fullness. I got it because if I didn't like it Sephora is great about returns. It is totally buildable without clumping, or flaking! It just GLIDES on! This mascara is the definition of perfection. It has turned into my favorite part of doing my make up. Every time I put it on I feel like I'm coating my lashes with gold. It makes me think of happiness, rainbows, and unicorns. Everyone needs this. I may be a bit dramatic, but SERIOUSLY! I will most definately repurchase for the rest of my existance! I loooooove BUXOM!

This is my third time coming back for this mascara. The formulation on it is simply perfect! My only qualm is that the brush is a little too fat. I wish they'd make it thinner, yet retain the same hourglass shape.

..maybe it's because the testers in the sample kit are smaller and don't go bad as quickly; i don't know. i REALLLLLLY liked the tester, hence me purchasing the full-sized, but i'm not in love with it. :(  it's okay. i like that my allergic self can handle its ingredients; i like the fat, volumizing brush. it clumps, though.
This stuff is fabulous. No clumping, no sticking, just lovely, precise color to define your lashes. Perfect!

I love this stuff. And the thick, fat brush with the widely spaced bristles makes applying it a breeze. You're able to get every single lash with this brush. And the product is great, too, it really does what it says: creates thick, fat, full, long, curled lashes!  This stuff is a DREAM. I just wish it was all-natural and wasn't tested on animals...
This mascara did define my lashes but it flaked off in a matter of hours and would give me racoon eyes. has no staying power. What's the point in defining my lashes if it's going to fall off so soon?

reviews.review_title: best mascara I have ever used!
reviews.review_text: I am in love with this mascara, everyone compliments my lashes and asks what I'm using, but they end up buying it even with its high (low for some sephora mascaras) price and end up loving it as well. I havent repurchased in so long because I had so many other mascaras to use, but I got a deluxe sample as a beauty roulette thing, thank god. My lashes sure missed this one!!
I have been trying to find a mascara that gives length and volume and this is it! I use Latisse and my eyelashes are stupidly, wonderfully, long. This mascara shows them off the best.

For years before this, I had been a faithful lover of Diorshow mascara. The only reason I even tried Buxom Buxom was because of the Sephora hatbox set, and even then I left it sitting in my makeup tray for a couple weeks before I even bothered to use it. I was NOT expecting it to beat Diorshow as my favorite, but it did! I love how it separates and lengthens instead of just clogging on more product. It does run a lot if you don't get it all off at night (why isn't everything waterproof by now??), but I love it and when I'm done with my hatbox sample I'll be buying this instead of a new Diorshow.

I don't know how I feel about this product just yet. It makes my lashes long, BUT it thins them out.  If I want long lashes, I want them to look fuller and thicker and this didn't do that for me.  I used this mascara once only to go downstairs and my mom tell me to put on mascara. Hence, the thinness. She obviously couldn't tell that I put it on!  I gave it four stars because it does work. I just wish it would make my lashes thicker.
The best mascara for my baby fine, skimpy lashes. Doesn't leave black stars on the lids or clumps either! :)
best mascara ever!!! well worth the $19!!!

I love this mascara. I am very against clumping in mascara, so I was very pleased with this product. It made my lashes look miles longer and with a second coat, thicker as well. It really makes my naturally dark lashes look even darker and really stand out. I will definitely buy it again when I run out!

I love this mascara so much! The wand it perfect and makes my lashes look amazing. Ever since trying this product a few years ago I haven't stopped buying it. It is a bit pricey for mascara, but it is a big tube that lasts a while, so worth it!
The consistency of the mascara is really thin and it does not add volume. It takes quit a few coats to actually cover the lashes. Would not recommend. I ended up returning it.

I absolutely LOVE this mascara(: After putting it on, my eyes are more eye-catching but still looks natural. It's good for when I want to look more awake but I don't want to put on anything else (i.e. eyeliner, shadow and etc.). I use this and little bit of Buxom's lip polish and I'm good to go! I definitely recommend this product.

I have 2 mascaras that i use to get perfect eye lashes. This and my L'Oreal Million Lashes. When I use both i get the maximum effect out of my eyes. To me mascara is the one product i could NEVER live without so I needed to find the bes mascara for me and I've found it in this product!

This is one of the best mascaras that I have ever tried! And I have been through drug-store brands to Chanel & Dior. It stays on (even through grueling work-outs), and doesn't flake or smudge. It washes off with my facial cleanser, no need to use extra eye make up remover. Bottom line... buy this!

I have pretty long lashes to start. Not looking to lengthen, just fill and define. This product does it with ease. Best wand, best staying power. A couple of swipes and I'm done, no messing around, no clumping, no reapplying. I've tried others and always come back to Buxom!!

I've been using this mascara daily and exclusively for almost 4 years now and these are my conclusions: 1. My lashes are thicker and longer than ever. 2. They don't clump. 3. The brush does some serious work! I mean seriously, it volumizes and defines like it's nobody's business. 4. It's cheaper than all the other over-hyped and chemical laden mascaras (dior *ahem*) 5. It lasts forever. THANK YOU BUXOM
If you want natural, but voluminous lashes, this is the mascara for you! I wish they had a water proof formula of this because then this would be the perfect everyday mascara.

reviews.review_title: AWESOME MASCARA! Does the work of 3!
reviews.review_text: This mascara is FANTASTIC. I am crazy about mascara and used to use 3 different mascaras on a daily basis. A thickening, a lengthening and a separating mascara. This mascara does all 3! It's a little runny, so you have to work with it the first couple swipes, but then it starts separating. I will do about 4 swipes on one eye, then switch to the next eye to allow the previous eye to dry, then I will go back to that eye for about 3 more swipes. then repeat on the other eye. Works like a charm! HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!
I bought this for the first about a year ago, and havent found a better volumizing mascara since. People sometimes ask me if my lashes are real lol

I just got this today and I am a big fan already. The brush is very unique looking. I love how the bushy tip part works on my inner shorter lashes. It defiently made them more profound. It doesnt flake or smear. I love how it made my lashes feel and look. I will defently buy it again!
Finally a mascara that does what it says it does!
Does a great job separating and lengthening my lashes. I usually use an eyelash curler but do not need to with this mascara. Definitely my go to mascara now.
Really gives a full look to your lashes without clumping. I love that you can feel the extra mascara being removed from the brush as you take it out of the tube. Makes me feel like a 70s movie star.
Amazing! my new favorite mascara!
I absolutely love it! I've tried others and I always keep this on hand.
Very average for an above average price, except for the ingredients, the look on the lashes is the same (or worse) as most drugstore mascaras. I returned mine to Sephora.
I decided to try this mascara on a whim lately. I'm usually a die hard dior show fan. Buxom does a great job with volume, length, and separating. Especially length! This is definitely my new mascara.

I have somewhat thick lashes already but love to have dramatic eyes, and i find if you layer this product accordingly it looks so bold and voluminous. Never has any mascara done what it does to my eyelashes, quite amazing!

I love this mascara. I received it as a sample in the store and have been in love with it ever since. The brush is large and flexible so it coats every lash. I have fairly long and thick eyelashes and this mascara makes them flawless. I have no clumps, just extremely long voluminous eyelashes. It is a little pricey for a mascara, but definitely worth it. When applying, you need to apply several coats because it is pretty thinly applied. This is my new favorite mascara and is amazing. A definite must have in my makeup collection.
This is the best mascara I have ever used! I use it every day in my makeup routine.

This mascara is the best and believe me, I have tried them all!! It lengthens and volumizes with NO clumps!! I have converted numerous friends and family members to buxom happy buxom lash mascara users. It really is the best!
It's the best mascara I have used! Definitely will recommend to others.
Goes on smooth without clumping and layers evenly for extra volume. Wish it came in other colors - like Brown/Black.
Goes on smooth and looks amazing. Natural but with a kick. Adds length and doesn't clump. Only downside is it smears under your eye after a long day.
Favorite all time mascara. No complaints.
I am about to get this mascara and it looks good , but I hear about clumping issues???

reviews.review_title: Love this mascara for length and volume!
reviews.review_text: This mascara works great for both volumizing and lengthening my lashes. The wand really allows you to lay down an even coat of mascara and works well if you want to put on an additional coat without getting a flaky or clumpy look. During the day, I put on just one coat and at night I love to use this mascara to build up glamourous looking lashes. It is a little pricey for a mascara but it's a great buy for those who love to splurge on eye makeup.
Love this Mascara, it's the best even after trying many other brands. Makes the lashes stand out without clumping!

This mascara is pretty good, not great but pretty good for the money compared to others at S. Although it's debatable if I like it better than my cheapies--- didn't return it and feel good it's vitamin-enriched but I still layer it with another....

I have very short, naturally curly lashes so finding mascara is always a challenge for me. I really only use 2, one from the drugstore and one high end brand. Well, this has been added to the list. I love the way it lengthens my lashes and defines without touching any part of my eye. And this is by far the true blackest black mascara I've used.  I'm hooked for life.
I absolutely love this mascara. It doesn't clump at all and makes my lashes very noticeable. And the tips and tricks included are so helpful!

This mascara applies well and looks great on lashes. However, it only stays on my lashes for about an hour before it is just dark circles around my eyes. If it actually stayed on my lashes I'd love it, but never do because I don't want to look like a raccoon.
Buxom Lash Mascara outshines all of the rest by FAR. It does everything you would want it to do plus more. Love Love Love this mascara!!!
This is my second favorite mascara and I feel like I have tried them all! Love the brush, lashes don't clump up!
This makes it look like you have more lashes then you do. Not very clumpy and makes your lashes nice looking.

Although this mascara does occasionally get thick and clumpy, if you scrape off the access product on the wand, then it is an AMAZING mascara! I love to pair this over Benefit's Bad Gal Lash in black and its the perfect combo of length and volume :)
I got the blue noir, the color is great! My lashes look fuller, the brush is great, doesn't clump, but after a few hours I have blue around my eyes :(

This mascara doesn't clump if you don't see clumps on the brush before touching it to your lashes. I put it on at 6:45am and when I'm taking my makeup off after 7:00pm, it still looks as good as when I first applied. I curl my lashes before applying and boy does it keep those puppies curled! SEPHORA, PLEASE DON'T EVER STOP CARRYING THIS STUFF!!! I love it so much and don't buy ANY other mascara anymore.

I bought this because it got great reviews. I am not as impressed as I thought i would be. It goes on a little clumpy and I had a tiny bit of flaking. I do like the brush though and the tips that come inside the box. I was hoping it would provide more volume. It does great for lenghening.

This is my absolute FAVORITE new mascara! I tried it in the trial size w/ a buxom kit- and fell in love. I'm an absolute mascara junkie I've tried them all- this is well worth the money. It lengthens, thickens amd its just plain AWESOME!!

This mascara is great to create a natural voluminous effect. It is great for every day, however I feel that for a night out, a more voluminous effect would be desired. Overall, I feel that this is an excellent mascara for work or school, but not for nights out on the town. It does however, leave your lashes very conditioned. A very good choice in mascara if you need to give your lashes a break! Another thing I noticed is absolutely no clumps with this mascara. Try to run your lashes through the middle area of the brush!
Love this! It was a great suggestion since I hate clumps and want an all-in-one mascara. No clumps and full separated lashes in one coat.
I've tried a multitude of mascaras and this is the only one I have found that truly defines each of my lashes. I love it! Although it doesn't lengthen as much as I expected.
I love this mascara!! It's velvety yet washes off easy. Love it, love it, love it.
it totally does not clump
I got a sample of this mascara and I loved it. It doesn't clump and separated my lashes so they looked more natural.
add volumes and length~~~soooooo thick and curly~~~worth the price!!! but looking forward to a waterproof one since i m wearing contact lenses and need to be eye-dropped often~~~

This mascara is absolutely wonderful! It really thickens and lengthens lashes to give really great volume. I bought this for my mom for Christmas after falling in love with it and she loves it too! She also said she doesn't even have to curl her eyelashes and after one swipe with the wand her lashes are already voluminous!

I love this mascara sooooo much! It lengthens, adds volume, and doesn't flake or clump. What more can you ask for? It was part of a kit I purchased and now I am hooked on it! I use it daily. If you want pretty eyes, buy it!
Really like how this mascara went on, long lasting, decent price. Had a little bit of trouble with flaking but nothing like some of the others I've tried. Good buy.
I have been using this mascara for about 4 years now and I absolutely love it. Makes your lashes long, full and natural. Highly recommend.
This doesn't clump or run and does make the lashes look buxom/full. I am on my second one and that says it all.

I have thin, unimpressive eyelashes and have routinely been disappointed by mascara promising volume and length. However, Buxom was referred to me by a friend and I was blown away! My lashes have never looked so full, long, dark.... I could go on and on! I felt glamourous all day that first time and I'll never go back! Plus- the price can't be beat!
I've tried LOTS of mascaras before I fell in love with this one. It does exactly as it says without ever clumping. Love it love it love it!!

I used MAC mascara forever and loved it. I tried Buxom and was skeptical, but I haven't looked back since. This mascara lengthens your lashes without clumping them up. They look long and beautiful! I highly recommend you try it.. you'll have a new favorite!
I got this as a set with a Buxom Lip Polish. It's an okay mascara. I like that it doesnt clump. But ...meh. I wouldnt pay $19 for it.
Move over BadGal...now Buxom is my favorite mascara! I have thin lashes and this mascara really lengthens and adds volume to my lashes. Looks like I am wearing faux lashes.
This is seriously the best mascara I've ever used. It separates the lashes and makes them look bold and long. The brush is pretty much perfect.
This mascara has good seperation and lengthening. All though it doesn't seem to do much for fullness. It's a good mascara and I would buy again, but probably not the best I have used.

the best part about this mascara is definitely the brush. i have very sparse, short and unruly eyelashes but with this brush i was able to coat every lash individually and create a fanned out effect-- something i could never achieve after years of using various dior mascaras. the product itself is smooth and deeply pigmented and adds a lot of length to my eyelashes, especially on the bottom. i did notice black flakes under my eyes by the end of the day, but i managed to add a LOT of length and fullness i didn't have with this mascara so i expected it. i'm going to try using a mascara primer with it to see if i can get a longer wear without the flaking. another thing i love about this mascara is that it doesn't get dry and goopy if you don't use it all within a month or two. i never get to use an entire tube of mascara before it gets clumpy and no longer works the same, but i've had my buxom lash for 4 months and it works as well as ever. i will definitely purchase this again.

I love mascara....that is my #1 thing...big bold lashes (and i don't care how many coats I have to put on). I saw all of the reviews for Buxom and was excited to give it a try. First off, the brush is HUGE! Bigger than Dior's DiorShow's brush. The only thing, is that Buxom completely flakes on me, and it gets in my eyes. It's a good volumizing mascara...but I want BOTH volumizing and length....didn't get it with this one. Guess I will go back to doubling up on Lancome Definicils and then a second coat of Dior Show.... ((sad face))
Love how it makes my eyelashes look longer and with more volume.

I love the BE brand and wanted to love this mascara. Unfortunately its not waterproof, not even close. I'm not talking about crying and your mascara runs - I mean sneeze and my eyes watered a tad and I had streaks down to my chin.  I ended up tossing out the brand new Buxom mascara I had for 2 days, What a waste.........

Saw this product in a YouTube video, thought it would be great but I was rather disappointed. I wouldn't say this product is terrible, but I really didn't see much of a difference. Perhaps this product is better for simply lengthening, but certainly did nothing for volume personally.
i absolutley love this mascara!!! its amazing it gives me everything,length volume and great coverage!!! highley recommend it!

Received a sample of Buxom Lash and I am impressed! Even after a few weeks of use, it's still not clumping plus one good coat looks as luxe as 2 or 3 of other brands!  I've finally found a great mascara!
does its job well, looks very natural on eyes and make them attractive. I think it suits my eyes.

I had a sample of this mascara a long time ago and when it finally ran out I had to buy it. I usually dont like rubber wands because they dont seperate lashes very well. But this one was amazing I dont know what it could be maybe because the made the brissles really thin so that they can fit a lot more than regular ones but it works amazing. And the mascara it self is great too I hate mascara that always seems to leave clumpse and that it dries out so fast but this one is like and smooth also doesnt make me look like I have clumped up or fake lashes on its just right.

I like this mascara. The formula is great, I generally don't buy volumizing mascaras because they just clump. This formula and brush are great for defining and lengthening lashes without clumping or making them look fake. Just long, black, defined lashes. Very nice. I also love that the bottle lasts forever. Even though it's expensive, a bottle lasts me at least 6 months.

reviews.review_title: Just OK, not worth the Price
reviews.review_text: I bought this mascara about a year ago from an employee recommendation. It was alright, it made my lashes appear thicker but it didn't really do much else. It was snowing here last winter and I noticed that a few people were staring at me. I went to the ladies room an hour later and my mascara had somehow smeared all over my eye area and it looked like I had been sobbing. I stopped using this mascara from then on. It doesn't even make your lashes look longer.

I have tried lots of mascaras and always ended up going back to my cheap mascara from the drug store. I recieved this as a sample and love it! It makes my lashes look fuller and does not get clumpy! Will be buying this when my sample runs out!
BEAUTIFUL LASHES WITH NO FLAKES OR SMUDGES. I AM HOOKED AND WILL NEVER BUY ANOTHER MASCARA!

i seriously recommend this mascara to like everyone.it works miracles and makes your eyelashes look amazing. i was looking for a good mascara that doesnt make your eyelashes clump and i finely found it!!o. and it also is great because it lasts forever,it doesnt use up so quickly as other ones.

reviews.review_title: Great for showing off what you already have!
reviews.review_text: I have naturally full, lengthy lashes and this formula is by far my favorite! It never clumps, goes on like silk, and doesn't flake. It tends to smear a bit, but I'd take that over specks in my eyes any day!

While I honestly didn't notice my top lashes looking and longer or fuller, the bottom lashes did and, quite frankly, the only reason I have decided to stick with this mascara is because it's the only one I've used that doesn't transfer or smudge onto my upper lid or under my lower lashes (racoon eyes), so that alone make it worth the purchase for me.
it smeared within the first few hours and wore off during the day.

I am a long time Lancome user and have used Dior mascara in the past as well. This mascara blows them both out of the water! Lengthening, voluminous, HOT! Gives a very sexy, long look to the lashes...
My eyelashes are short and sparse. Without mascara, it looks like I have no lashes. Buxom gives me lashes!! They are longer, fuller and look great.

I am a single lidded, and every morning, doing my mascara and my eye make-up can be a hassle. I bought this in blue, because I thought that it would look neat, and since I usually wear blue eyeshadow, I thouight it would be clever.  This mascara is a great lengthening, volumizing mascara and it gave a great color. I thought the formula is great. It doesn't flake, clump, or glob on me. I love it! I'm going to get this in black. The brush for this is a great, and it helps add to the intense volume from this mascara.This also didn't smudge on me. A lot of the people that sits near me asked me what I was wearing for mascara, and the next day they bought this in black. Everyone thinks this is amazing stuff!

I am surprisingly impressed with this mascara. I am a mascara fanatic, and always looking for the next best thing. After trying Dior, Chanel, Lancome, MUFE, YSL, etc., I was quite skeptical about what a mascara half the price of most high-end brands could do. Everything I want in a mascara I get with Buxom, and then some. I want beautifully long, voluminous lashes that don't look cakey at all--very hard to find! This mascara coats my lashes evenly and lengthens with one coat, and with a second coat, I get the volume I'm looking for. It never looks cakey! And for those reviews that talk about the lack of volume: you really need two coats at least to get the full effect. One coat won't cut it. An added bonus is the mascara's longevity. I've been using the same tube everyday for a month and it hasn't caked up or dried out AT ALL. Every swipe is like a fresh bottle. What a money saver! I can't recommend this mascara more. Follow the directions (two coats at least) and you will have beautiful lashes!
For perfect lashes :) love it
This mascara is very lengthening and gives your lashes lots of volume. I wear it everyday and it is my favorite mascara! Definitely worth $18!!
I got this as a sample size and I am impressed. You either going to like the hourshape brush or not. but i like it. plus it is a dark mascara and free of some chemicals.

It thickens alright but not better than some I've used. It also starts to smear within a few hours. I kept having to wipe it off of my upper lids and from under my eyes. It works like a cheap mascara, not something premium. I would never buy it again.

I received a tester of this product and didn't like it much the first two times I used it as it seemed very runny. I don't know what happened but by the third use, the product must have thickened up or mixed up a little because the end result was fabulous! My fine, short lashes were completely transformed to long, lush, feathery lashes. I have tried every mascara under the sun trying to find the very best-- my searching stops here. This is bar none the best mascara out there!

I love this mascara! Doesn't clump, doesn't smear, doesn't run off during the heat of the day. Does thicken and lengthen lashes and has tremendous staying power. What I really like is that it performs as promised, but you don't look like a clown. If you need to be taken seriously at your place of employment, but still want to be a girl, this is a great product! Some mascaras are so dramatic that they are better saved for evening events. You won't be disappointed with Buxom!

This is the first high-end mascara that I've thought was worth it. It adds plenty of volume and definition. While it's not waterproof and won't withstand showers, it otherwise, lasts all day. The brush makes for easy application and adds more definition.

LOVE this mascara. Please note that the first few times you use a new tube it won't perform well. After a few times it creates long and thick lashes, but at first it is a bit thin like liquid liner. BUT it is well worth it anyways!! I have used every thing from Chanel to Loreal and this is tops. Plus who wants to put something on their eyes that has a warning that it can make you go blind. Yes, they have a warning on regular mascara. (something I never noticed until switching to more natural makeup)
Definitely worth the price! Darkens, lengthens and separates my lashes & looks very natural.
The best that I have ever used!! The brush definitely pushes it over the edge. Love!

The mascara says it all! Ive tried countless different types of masacaras and this one is my fav! I love how it is NOT clumpy and it evenly gives that dramatic yet full lash look. As a casual artist, Ive used this on my friends all the time and they truly have seen the difference. Really good for all the chicks looking for a dramatic look but dont wanna wear fake eye lashes. Also for those who feel they have small eyes, this mascara does the trick! <3
This mascara is the best I have used. I have paid up to $30 for some other brands and they do not top this. I really like the big wand. The mascara does not flake or run. It will last all day.

I have really small and sparse lashes. I got Buxom in a variety pack of Mascaras from Sephora and it quickly became my most favorite mascara ever. It makes my wimpy lashes look full and long. I don't think I will ever use a different mascara again! It is absolutely fantastic!

It's an average good mascara.I bought it because of the vitamin-enriched claims. Although I do enjoy that it makes it look very thick, my problem is that I always have to clean the brush with a tissue so I can fix the clumps. After that it looks great but for me is a waste of time. I naturally have long eye lashes so when I don't use a waterproof mascara some tend to bring my eye lashes down and this is one product that by the end of a long day it doesn't look so good. I guess this a tip. If your eye lashes don't look curled and nice by the end of the day try the waterproof version, 99% of the time it looks like you just applied mascara.

I love this mascara so much! It doesn't clump, or dry out quickly. I'm not really into putting a ton of make up on, so this mascara does a good job at making my eye lashes look like i have just the right amount I would suggest everyone to buy this!
This is my all-time favorite mascara! A lot of my friends think its to much money to pay for mascara, but its worth it!
This is one of the best mascaras ever, the thing that got me was the cool designed brush. It gives you a natural look, but you can definitely make it more dramatic.
Love, love, Love this mascara.

I really wanted to love this product, but it really doesn't seem to do anything that the average mascara couldn't. It has a tendency to clump, even when applied lightly. I have to rub my lashes after application to spread it out and remove all clumpyness. Other than that I have no complaints. This is a good/average product. I LIKE it but I definitely don't LOVE it.

I like this mascara as it lasts a long time, applies pretty smoothly, and is flattering to my lashes (thicker and longer) without being obvious. My only wish is that it had a traditional brush rather than the rubber-type ones that seem to have become the new style. I think it causes more lumps than a regular brush would. All in all a nice priduct.
I've gone through MANY mascaras, and this one has truly come out on top. It gives volume, length, and very rarely does it clump. Once you go Buxom Lash, you never go back!

A few weeks ago I got a sample of this mascara during my purchase in store &I've since been using it &I think its amazing how it does not clump my eye lashes like most mascaras do. I already have long lashes so I love the way the mascara makes them more noticeable
This was not that great. The brush didnt do anything for volume.
This is a great mascara. It adds length and volume without clumping. However, it does flake a little over time.
Great product, last me 3 months and I use it almost daily.
After trying many mascaras, I found this one...perfect. By far my favorite. No clumps or flakiness.
This Mascara does not work on my long lashes. It weighs them down and for some reason takes time to set. Its Clumpy as well. Not for me. I will keep searching. Ugh!

I love this mascara and have been using it for over a year. I travel a lot, and when any of my friends borrow it, they love it too. The applicator is great, and the product more or less does all it promises to, especially when applied correctly. Recently, my sister came to visit and forgot her drugstore mascara. She loved mine so much that I gave her my old tube. Her comment was, I think Drew Barrymore lied to me.

I recently chose a deluxe sample size of this masacara with an order during a promo and loved it. It defines my lashes beautifully. Without any mascara and being a red head, my lashes are pure blond and do not even look as though they exist!! They are also very fine. I used this for the first time and found that it defined and curled my lashes really well without clumping. I think the secret is partially because of the shape of the brush....it is shaped in a hourglass and it seems to get even the skinniest of my lashes. The other part would be because BE just rocks it out and Leslie has an amazing product line. Thanks Buxom for fattening my almost non-existing lashes without making me look like a raccoon part way through the day!!
I love this mascara, it gives full coverage & is not clumpy. The brush is excellent at separating my eyelashes. They look done but not caked.
I now love the buxom lash mascara!! The brush seperates my lashes and makes them look longer and fuller!

I only used to wear mascara when going out at night, never to work on a daily basis. That all changed when I got a free sample of this mascara. It is not my go to mascara for any occasion, and the length and volume it gives is simply amazing. I've tried a ton of other mascaras, but Buxom will always be my favorite!

Not a huge fan of this mascara, I have long lashes and when I use mascara that is more on the liquidy side the ends of my lashes get mascara on my eye lids. I think this mascara is too heavy for my lashes. Also, when I pull the brush from the bottle clumps are left on the brush and I always have to wipe it off before applying. I have a friend who has thinner and shorter lashes than me and she swears by this mascara.

I was really looking forward to having a lot of volume in my lashes but it really didn't do that for me =[ It definitely did give me length though but I got alot of clumping on my eyes. I'm so sad I was really excited about this product seeing all the great reviews on it! Unfortunately...I don't know if I will try buying this product again =[

This is a great mascara for all you natural beautys. I think it's the most natural looking mascara I've ever tried. It's not as glamourous as others I've tried and LOVE (Laura Mercier Volumizing Mascara/Stila Glamourous Eyes) but if you're looking for day to day wear, this is a perfect choice for you. It also does a great job separating lashes, and does NOT clump.

This mascara is by far my favorite! Trust me, I have tried A LOT and this outshines all of them. I am not a fan of the super thick, clumpy looking mascara so if that is what you like then don't bother buying this product. This a great lightweight mascara that separates, defines and lengthens your lashes, but in a natural looking way.

reviews.review_title: one of the best mascaras out there !
reviews.review_text: volumizes, lengthens, and defines without clumps ! i have short thin lashes, and this truly transforms them!

This mascara is great for everyday. It has a great brush that allows for you to really make your lashes long and pretty without the clumps. For evening, I use this mascara after using a volumizing mascara. It really helps separate your lashes.
This does everything a good mascara is supposed to do, but I don't like the brush. It's too big and too awkward for me to use, especially on my lower lashes.

This is my all time favorite mascara. I have got several people using it because it is so awesome. I have somewhat long lashes and it goes on smoothly without clumping. You can also do several layers of this w/out clumping.

It's tough to find a mascara that adds length and also defines lashes. This mascara is great. Goes on without clumping and doesn't flake. Don't need many coats, in fact just one is probably great for an everyday look, just add more to get TONS of length and volume. Best mascara I've used. Love the little tip booklet that is included in this as well.

This mascara makes your lashes HUGE but they still look natural. The only problem is that it is a little messy and clumpy so its not as easy to apply as other mascaras but once you get the hang of it, it's amazing. highly recommended.

It gives you those dark, long, defined eyelashes you want! I've tried so many mascaras, but this one is the best so far. Follow the tips it comes with! The only problem is I wish it had more of a volumizing effect, but I just buy primer to solve that.

I have always been a dedicated Great Lash (maybelline) user. I decided to spend a little more and give this mascara a try. I have tiny, blonde lashes and it definitely makes them look longer. Also, you don't get the little specks that fall on your cheeks after wearing it all day!

I love this mascara. Not only does it really make your lashes pop, it stays put and doesn't flake like other mascaras do.  The only thing I wish they would offer is different colors and a waterproof formula. In the Winter I prefer to use a dark brown mascara because I'm so far skinned. Waterproof might pose a problem because of the ingredients needed, but it would take this product from a 5 to 10 stars. Nothing worse than getting thrown in the pool and coming up a raccoon.
Love this mascara. Doesn't clump or flake and can make it through the day. One tube will last forever without drying out and I use it everyday.

Great mascara at a decent price. The rubber brush is not too stiff and separates the lashes and deposits the product well. It's very good at volumizing the lashes without weighting them down too much, making them soft and natural-looking/feeling. Very easy to build up and take off at the end of the day, too. Minimal smudging on the bottom lashes after a long day, but that's expected since it's not waterproof. I wish it held a curl better, though!

i LOVE this mascara , i love long lashes and it makes my lashes look like i have FALSIES on ! its very black and volumizing , its lengthing and it DOES not flake or smudge! perfect mascara and worth teh invenstment
I love this mascara. And I've tried so many different ones. This one makes them longer and thicler and it feels natural not all stiff or clumpy. And I wear contacts and it doesn't bother my eyes.
This is the best mascara for wispy lashes like mine. The brush never globs on, seems to put the right amount everytime!
its the best mascara

Loveeeeee this mascara. I'm really picky; some people can use drug store brands but for me they're always too flaky or melty or dry out too quickly. They never give me that definition and length that I'm so desperate for. However, Buxom takes my thin and light eyelashes and turns them into long, full, sexy lashes every single time. LOVE. It does tend to melt a little bit under my eyes, but so does every single product I've ever used, so I wouldn't let that deter you.

I've been using the mascara for the past year and a half and can't imagine switching. The brush is really easy to use and the result is dramatic lashes that won't overpower your work-wardrobe but can layer-up for evening.

I've been using Buxom Lash for a little over a year now, and it is BY FAR the best mascara I've ever used. I'm a mascara junkie- I love eyelashes- and using Buxum, I regularly sport the best lashes I ever have. I'm half Chinese and half caucasian, but thankfully I got my mother's eyes- larger than your regular asian eye, with long eyelashes. However, because of the Chinese, my lashes tend to be straight, and not as thick as some others'. Using Buxom, not only do they look ridiculously long, they also look incredibly thick!  My one quibble with Buxom is how wet the formula is. This quality has both pros and cons. Because it takes so long to dry, it's realllly hard to ever get clumps in my lashes, which means you can pretty much put on as many coats as you like without the fear of looking like there's spider legs poking out of your eyeballs. On the other hand, after I finish applying the mascara, I have to super careful for the next hour or so to avoid touching my eyes or brushing against my lashes, as they'll stick together. What I've found works the best is applying one coat, letting it dry for 10 or 15 minutes, then applying two more coats at that time. The dry first coat allows the next two coats to stick much better, making the process faster and allowing me to use less mascara to get my desired look.  Another GREAT thing about Buxom is the brush- the rubbery wand grips and coats every single lash, allowing for fantastic definition. Because the bristles are so small, I can get even the tiny lashes on the inside of my eye, as well as the ones at the corners that are harder to get at. The brush works fantastically, it even curls my lashes. I don't even need to use an eyelash curler if I don't want to!  I love Buxom lash!
This mascara gives great length and pretty good volume. it also separates my lashes. Use one coat for the day and two coats for night. The more coats, the more dramatic. Does not flake!!!

I'd been looking for a mascara that would give my medium/thick eyelashes a dramatic look without clump so after reading the reviews online I went to the store and picked up a box. A sales clerk saw me with it in my hand and told me it's her current favorite mascara. Sold. The wand is super thick and long and the formula coats each eyelash making them look long, thick and voluptuous. I will buy this mascara again and again!
I had high expectations on the product which were not met. I've gotten more from secondary brand than what I did with Buxom.

1st being DiorShow Iconic mascara, but this comes in close 2nd - it's great for days when you want a little less coverage. And the hourglass plastic comb brush is perfect for definition and no clumps.
i have no eye lashes and this works wonders and it doesnt feel too heavy and not clumpy at all.. very good for building
I was a Diorshow addict for years until trying the sample of this mascara...went out and bought it immediately. It lengthens and adds volume without clumping.
I wanted SmashBox DNA mascara, which has been discontinued and a Sephora lady suggested Fresh, but I prefer this. It is a very nice mascara for lengthening and the innovative brush works great.

I have long lashes and this is my favorite mascara. Doesn't clump, defines perfectly. The brush is great because it separates every lash. Its the only mascara Ive used for 3 years, I recently found Bad Gal lash by benefit and it might be a contender but I'd still recommend this one.
This is my absolute favorite mascara. I love the big, hourglass shaped brush. It really coats all the lashes without clumping. It makes my lashes look longer, thicker, darker and all around AMAZING!

I purchased a mascara test-pack of about 13 different mascaras. I still have about five of them. Buxom Lash caught me in mid-sampler and made me an addict for life. Layer some Lancome primer under this and your lashes will feel naked anytime you are not wearing both. It's a deadly combo, trust me. :-)
LOVE this mascara. My lashes look so full, it looks like I'm wearing fakes!

reviews.review_title: Lengthening but not a great Value
reviews.review_text: This mascara is pretty good. It is dark black and does lengthen my lashes but I didn't see any volumizing or thickening. This is a good mascara but not a great value. To be honest Lash Blast Mascara by CoverGirl makes my lashes look better and thicker than Buxom and costs about $8 Canadian versus $22 Canadian for Buxom. That being said, if you have the extra cash it is pretty good.

This is great mascara! I especially love the blue color. I don't know that I'd wear it every day because it does tend to smudge a bit by the end of the day, but for a night out or a special occasion, it's exactly what that special outfit needs.
I have naturally long, but not very thick lashes. Product made lashes longer, which was not needed, but DID NOT provide any thickness. Smears a little too easy until it dries on lashes.

I was a huge fan of this mascara. I started using it when it was first introduced and was hooked, but lately, something has been different. I think the formula has changed because I am no longer able to achieve the fake lash look that I used to be able to get. In fact, this now either clumps on my lashes, or I can't even get it to show up at all. It also destroys the curl on my lashes and really weighs them down. I'm very disappointed in this product, maybe it is just slip ups in quality control, but the last thing you want in the morning is inconsistent quality of your mascara. I'm giving 3 stars for what it used to be, but Buxom has lost a formerly very loyal customer.
This give you the thckness and length that I was looking for. Great mascara!!

This mascara, in black, is the only one that I will ever buy! It lengthens, volumizes,defines, and helped nurish (think Latisse) my lashes. It nver clumps as well. I only wished that the black color cam in a waterproof formula!

This mascara is my favorite ever. it's perfect for every occasion! I usually try to stay away from mascaras that have thick brushes because it just makes my eyelashes get all clumpy and they're a mess to use, but NOT THIS ONE! :) I will certainly be sad the day that this runs out, but will be back for another! Money well spent. The perfect mascara. I highly recommend.

reviews.review_title: If only I could find you in waterproof and brown
reviews.review_text: Hands-down this is the best mascara I have ever used. I get compliments all the time. Thanks Buxom!

Makes my lashes look great. BUT during this year's heat advisories, I noticed it melting during the day. Not just coming off, but melting my lashes together. Great stuff, but I may look for a lighter summer mascara.

I've been using this for over a year and it works great. First off, this has never given me raccoon eyes. I wear this for my 8 hours of work and come home free of any flyways or smudges.  This mascara is GREAT for long lashes. One coat makes them long, yet natural looking. Two coats make them long and stunning. If you curl your lashes after applying, they look like fake lashes. LOVE that! Not the best for volume, but still will always be in my makeup drawer.

I was prepared to be wowed by this since everyone seems to love it. The product seems a little runny and messy.
