If i get any on my eyelids during application, it takes a lot more effort than most mascaras to remove. It also doesn't come off very cleanly at the end of the day, but somehow ends up under my eyes all the time so I look like a raccoon. So it comes off when I don't want it to, and doesn't come off when I want it to. I could forget about these flaws if it made my eyes look great, but it doesn't! it's mediocre at best. I've used drugstore mascaras that were so much better :(
By around 4pm, I look like a racoon as this mascara ends up under my eyes. I am not a fan.
The only mascara I use anymore. It makes my lashes look great and it doesn't clump.
I love this mascara; I just wish it came in a waterproof formula. This mascara does an excellent job of defining and lengthening lashes without leaving you with spider legs.

The other day after applying this mascara I actually said to myself, You look like you're wearing fake lashes! I have pathetically thin lashes, so they didn't look as great as the women in mascara commercials (who I am convinced are wearing fake lashes), but the brush lenghtens and separates exceptionally well. This is my new mascara!
No flakes, no clumps, defined and curled lashes that look gorgeous! Brush even has nub at the end to Separate lashes on outside edge without mascara all over lids.
Best Mascara ever, love the brush. No clumping
Big brush very bad mascara
Mostly good. I have oily skin and notice it tends to smudge by the end of the day but there is no flaking. So far, so good.
I have very short and sparse eyelashes and this makes me look like I have long and full eyelashes. I have been using it for the past 2 years and don't see me switching brands anytime soon!

reviews.review_title: If I were only Buxom like my lashes
reviews.review_text: If I were Buxon like my lashes are after applying this mascara, I probably would not need the Boyfriend perfume I just wrote a review on :-). The brush is amazing and so is the formula. I swipe on 2 coats of Buxom and BAM ---Mega Lashes. This is worth the $18.

reviews.review_title: USED BLUE NOIR TO CREATE DRAMTIC LOOK...
reviews.review_text: Last year, I created a very specific look for a party, wearing mostly blues and silvers, and choosing my makeup in the same tones. I had completely forgotten about it until a friend reminded me recently how good it had looked. I was able to recreate the same look again, wearing clothes in silvers and blues, and then matching with my eye makeup. I was able to create a somewhat dramatic glamorous look. My skin is very pale, so I used that to my benefit, omitting the tinted moisturizers or tinted primers I usually use. I opted not to use blush. Like last year, I used Buxom Lash Mascara Blue Noir on my lash tips, It worked well over the other mascara.. I used a blue liner, rich intense silver shadow (DIOR 1-Colour Ultra-Smoothing High Impact Eyeshadow in Chrome), black mascara, and then this Buxom Lash Mascara Blue Noir on the tips. When I did this last year, it was quickly apparent that the Blue Noir was the extra touch needed to make the look have some oomph because it was sort of bland until I added the blue. What's interesting is that, while the blue isn't terribly obvious when it goes on over black (plus I have black lashes), it adds a really nice finishing touch and definitely some drama. I can't define exactly what happens, but it really makes a difference. I could see this after adding the Blue Noir to the first eye, and then comparing it to the eye I hadn't applied the Blue Noir. The reminds me sort of a Cleopatra look, but done with a much lighter hand, as compared to the heavy blacks (liner,lashes, shadow) that are shown in Cleopatra movies. It might be a good idea for a Halloween costume, too, although that's thinking ahead.
I love this mascara. It actually volumizes without clumping.

I am searching for a mascara that wows me for my upcoming wedding. I was hoping this would be it! It is an okay mascara. It clumps on the brush, and often leaves smudge marks on my eyelid if I am not super careful. My lashes look good, nothing really that much better than drug store mascara though.
I love this Mascara! It does not dry out like Dior Show tends to do.

I have thin eyelashes and an average amount, but this mascara makes me look like I have long, thick fringes around my eyes!  My favorite thing about it is that it never ever clumps (like every other mascara I've tried does) and although it's not waterproof, I haven't had it run on me even during a full day out in Antelope Valley, CA on the race track.  I use this every morning on my lower and upper lashes for daytime and when I want it more dramatic I layer my Dior Iconic on top. I like that I can layer with this mascara and not have to worry about the top layer just clumping even more.  I say give it a try ^_^ I wasn't a mascara lover until I tried this.

reviews.review_title: If you have problems with mascara, this isn't 4 U
reviews.review_text: Oddly, ALL mascara to date flakes off and ends up in my eyes. This stuff is WAY better than your drug store mascara, but it also flakes and causes irritation. It doesn't smudge or clump which are bonus. If you have no problems, this is could be a great product for you.

At first I loved this stuff, until I noticed the black under my eyes about 20 minutes later. It's not waterproof, but the brush does make using it pretty easy. It seems I have to stand in front of a fan for the mascara to dry before I can continue putting on the rest of my makeup. This is not cool.
I absolutely love this mascara! It never clumps, and I swear my lashes look twice as long. It makes me wish I didn't waste 15 years wearing department-store products.

I absolutely love this mascara. But there is one think that every woman should know: all mascaras are not applied the same way. For this one, I followed the instructions that came with it and I got spectacular results. Beatiful lenght and volume, but just enough. It does not hold curl at all, but my lashes are super-straight and no mascara ever managed to hold a curl on me. So don't mind that. The only thing is that it smudges at little bit, but just a quick swipe of a wet finger under the eye takes it off. I realised though that it will never smudge if I don't put any mascara on my bottom lashes. So I use a waterproof mascara (Diorshow Iconic Extreme for now) and my eyes are beautiful and perfect. I have tried lots of mascara, and this is one of the best quality for the price I have ever found, and it lasts a very long time without drying. I have had it for at least 3 months and the results are the same as the first time I tried it.

This mascara is average, it did nothing for my lashes in terms of volumising or length. I felt like within 2 hours of wearing my eyelashes were drooping and the lashes didn't hold in place. I tried using this mascara with an eyelash curler as well but still wasn't happy. This product didn't clump or smudge but there are several others that don't either that produce greater results.

I seriously am a mascara junkie and pretty much have tried everything. I always come back to this mascara. It's lengthening and thickening and really defines your lashes.. It's also very pigmented which I like so in 2 coats you have long, jet black, glossy lashes..Use this with an eyelash curler and you'll be amazed..Love!
This mascara is rockstar. I am on my third tube. I like it better than Dior Show. It gives you thick, believable, non-clumping lashes. Best of all, it doesn't flake. Love, love love

i have been using this for years, and every time i try a new mascara, i end up coming right back to this one. it has very rich color and great lash separation. it makes my lashes very long. the one thing i wish was that it also worked well to thicken, but if you use several coats you can make them alot longer and thicker. still my favorite!

I am in love with this mascara! I love trying the new mascaras all the time and my previous fave was BadGal Lash, but I like this better! It does not dry out in the tube quickly and has an amazing chunky brush to coat all your lashes in the luscious formula. It also does not flake off on your cheeks after a long day so this is a keeper!

I have used many mascaras from cheap, drugstore brands to expensive brands that retail for $25 and up. Buxom's is one of the best! It does not clump and lengthens and defines lashes with just two applications. You don't have to use a lot of product to achieve nice results and the finished look is very pretty. I highly recommend this product!

I've tried scores of mascaras over the years and was convinced that Estee Lauder's mascaras couldn't be beat--but I was wrong! Buxom is terrific. It lengthens and defines without globbing your lashes. But take care when the tube is new: be a bit spare in loading the brush or you'll end up volumizing more than lengthening, which is a no-no in my keep-it-real book. This mascara lasts all day and doesn't flake or smudge. The black is very black, indeed, and I wish a brown were in the pallet for very fair skinned folks, like me. (Are you listening, Buxom?) But nevermind, I'll keep using it no matter what because it's truly the best mascara I've ever used.

I tried Buxom Lash back in December/January as part of the Lash Stash set. It's not the best mascara out there, but it is good for what you pay for.  I like the hourglass shaped silicone brush which does a good job reaching the corner lashes and doesn't clump. I can build volume quickly (perfect for when I am in a rush). The definition and lengthening are good with Buxom lash as well.  It does smear and flake just a little bit after a long day. You get a lot of product for what you pay for and it doesn't dry quickly. Of the 10 mascaras in the lash stash, this is the best mascara on the cheaper end.

reviews.review_title: Gets a bit clumpy, but makes my lashes long!
reviews.review_text: I really love the buxom mascara. It makes my lashes look amazingly long. I use it (usually) just on the top lashes. They end up looking great. My only complaint is that I have to be super-vigilant about wiping mascara off of the top of the wand because it has a tendency to get super-clumpy.
Everyone thinks I'm wearing falsies but not overly dramatic, I love it with some accent lashes it hard to tell where your lashes and falsies mix. no clumping you can see each lash worth the money.
Loving this mascara...just need a waterproof version now.

It seems like I'm constantly on the hunt for a great mascara. This one is definitely the best one I've ever used. It volumizes and defines. Does everything it claims to do. Be sure and follow the application tips that come with it because that does make a difference.

I've used this mascara for over a year and absolutely LOVE IT! I've gotten my sister and friend hooked on it as well. I can't wait to try the new blue color. Best Mascara I've ever had. I'm never gonna switch!
Excellent product...one of the better mascaras I've tried in years.
My favorite mascara for all occasions.

reviews.review_title: Hands Down the best mascara I've ever owned.
reviews.review_text: I'm not sure if it's the wand, the mascara itself, or the combo, but this is my favorite mascara in the world! I am usually pretty sensitive when it comes to eye makeup, especially eyeliners and mascaras but this stuff might as well be air. My eyes never bother me and my eyelashes separate beautifully without clumping.

I got this full size mascara In a Buxom kit. I was glad to try it because of all the hype....It isn't my favorite mascara, but it's not bad either. The formula is nice, but I don't enjoy using the brush....This one has the rubber bristles instead of the traditional bristles which I prefer. I don't think I will ever buy this again, but it was goodto try. I'm sticking with my Clinique High Impact mascara which works better and is cheaper!
Mascara is great, very volumizing! I got it as a gift and just bought my second one.
I love this mascara! It makes my lashes look longer and fuller. The brush is excellent! The only thing I would change it to give the brush a small tip for the lower lashes.

This is a great lengthening mascara, it makes my lashes look super long and was even accused of wearing fake ones. This product doesnt thicken lashes though which is the only negative that bothers me. This is because the bristles are rubbery and short, but there is a lot of them on this large brush so it is able to catch almost all lashes with ease. If you are going for a natural look (long and seperated lashes) this is great, it only brings subtle drama but don't expect thickness from this mascara because it will not do that.

No words can describe how amazing this mascara is!! It coats every lash and really does separate but give good volume. The mascara holds curl and doesn't flake. The only downside is that it does smudge a bit and it gives a slight raccoon eye effect.
I love this mascara. It separates my lashes and hardly clumps.
not clumpy, heavy, or ridiculously unnatural looking
This mascara is AMAZING!

reviews.review_title: Does what it says it will
reviews.review_text: I recieved this as a bonus sample and it is by far my favorite name brand mascara. It doesn't irritate my eyes, doesn't slime off mid-day, and doesn't clump.  The brush is a bit fat but was easy to get use to using.  Plus when I say it stays where you put it I really mean it... be very careful doing your lower lashes because if you are like me, some mornings my aim isn't as good as it should be and I end up with some under my lashes instead of on my lashes. When this happens I have to get a q-tip to wash it off or it won't come off otherwise.

This mascara is great. The unique brush allows you to really coat every lash, so each last is long, full, and dark. I have tried a lot of mascaras and this is a really great mascara. I am now hooked on it.
It goes on smooth and it does give my lashes length and volume. It also smells better than drugstore mascara but I've bought drugstore mascara that worked just as well or better for half the price.

love love love this mascara. i have very fine lashes and this mascara adds tons of volume without giving me clumpy spider lashes. It goes on super smooth and seems to last way longer than other mascaras. I've tried a million and this is my current fave.

reviews.review_title: Good, not great, but not a go to mascara in a rush
reviews.review_text: I have heard amazing things about this mascara, but for some reason it just doesn't blow me away. It is not an effortless mascara, I feel like I have to comb my lashes and it doesn't hold the curl if you curl your lashes before application because the mascara is very wet. I have to wait a couple minutes between coats or else it doesn't build properly and just takes forever to dry. If you are up for the work, then it is good, but if you are in a rush and need an everyday mascara, this might not be your best bet. Also, it takes eye makeup remover to get it off and even then it might take a couple tries. The color is rich and that is awesome, but it lingers.

My eyelashes look SO full with this mascara!! I will only use this from now on. I adore it. Haven't had issues with it flaking off onto my cheeks at all, It goes on SO nice. Gives me full, long, dark lashes!!
Love this product!!! I will not use anything else, I am on my third purchase. Gives thick lashes without clumps and it lasts for a long time.

I first purchased a mascara sampler from Sephora and this was in the box!! I loved it from the start! I have naturally long lashes and it does not clump or crumble throughout the day like other mascaras. It is long lasting and easliy washed off with warm water and a cloth.
I am finally getting the hang of the applicator brush. It is a nice mascara. My lashes look good without clumps. I also like the mascara does not have parabens and sulfates. I would try it again.
Love this mascara! Goes on smoothly, no clumpies, lashes do not stick together.... I have tried lots of brands and I will def get this again!

reviews.review_title: PERFECT Mascara for a Natural but Defined Look!
reviews.review_text: I highly recommend Buxom if you've had mascara woes and problems in the past like clumping, smudging, flaking and getting the undesirable 'spidery' lashes look. I've tried the top selling DiorShow Mascara and found that it made my short-medium lashes clump together resulting in uneven and varying lengths of my lashes. The lovely lady at Sephora recommended Buxom to me and it is WONDERFUL! There is literally a FLAWLESS look to my lashes now. It adds volume to make my lashes look fuller and adds even length and definition while keeping them separated. This mascara is especially perfect for those of us who aren't blessed with naturally long lashes as it helps to define the lashes to create a full and complete lashline. This lasts all day without smudging or flaking and is also great for any occasion, even if you're going for an everyday natural look for work. This adds a hint of wow factor to my everyday look. I've finally found the perfect mascara that I can wear confidently knowing that I my lashes won't look unnatural or 'spidery.'

I purchased after recommendations and raves from a couple of friends. Big disappointment. I have thin barely visible lashes and this did nothing to help them. The brush is large and clumsy. Also, it doesn't wear well. I ended most days with raccoon eye and if it was an especially steamy day, i even had smudges on my upper lids.

This mascara is amaziinng! It has a huge brush so it covers all lashes in one sweep! It can be a natural or very dramatic and full. I thought i had weak, dull, and unfixable lashes.. but this proved me wrong! LOVE IT!

I got this as a mini once. And i loved it! I thought I found the best mascara ever, soft lashes with volume and length! It looked amazing too! Except i couldnt use it on my lower lashes because it would smudge after a few hours. And it was a little bit of a hassle to get off, probably need more than regualr soap and water to make it come off all the way. And after a month or two i noticed that it wasnt working as well and becoming alot more clumpy but maybe that was just me.

I have sensitive eyes and wear contacts, this mascara is one of the few I can wear and not get tears all day. In addition, I am a water buff, if I forget to take it off it doesn't 'smudge' off and cause raccoon eyes. LOVE IT!
This is the best mascara I've found to date, it looks natural, doesn't clump and volumizes great.

I never write reviews. But I must write one about this mascara. I was a (and still am) a lover of Diorshow Iconic mascara. It was the only mascara I would use but I decided to try a new one out of curiosity. I am a lover of good mascaras and am obsessed with finding the best one. A saleswoman at sephora recommended I would like Buxom if I am looking for a new one and love diorshow iconic. I have to say after using this mascara a few times I have fallen in love. It thickens, lengthens and separates. It may definitely be my new favorite mascara. Although I still recommend using a primer before hand. I recommend the diorshow primer.
four letters .... LOVE!!!
I absolutely love how this mascara goes on! It plumps up your lashes for a brighter, fuller look and does it without clumping. It also lasts a long time so don't have to replace it often!

I've been trying Mascara for years! Expensive or Cheap. This was is great!!! I tried the sample size. But I'd spend the money on this one for sure without a doubt. I put 3 coats. Non- Flaky, or clumped. Super Volume and lashes are separated. I usually have to use a comb and or needle or toothpick to separate lashes that get stuck together, but not with this mascara. AWESOME!! BUXOM LASH YOU ROCK!!! A+++++!

I got this as part of the Hot Ticket kit. I have teeny, sparse, light lashes, and was afraid that this big brush was going to leave me a mess. But you know, it is wonderful! I apply two coats to the top lashes (without combing between), and let those dry, then apply one coat to the bottom, holding the brush almost horizontally. This works great to get all those tiny little corner lashes. I then go back and add one more coat. Believe it or not, no clumps. None. The black is rich and dark and makes my lashes look really nice. It lasts all day, doesn't flake, smear, or wear off. This might be my new favorite. I've tried them all, from Lancome to Maybelline, and THIS one is wonderful.
After hearing so many people rave about it, I needed a new mascara and got it! No clumping whatsoever! No fallout. Just wish it came in a waterproof version!
I love this mascara, the wand is absolutely the best I've ever used. It's lasts a long time and doesn't flake. I've tried others and I always come back to this one.
This mascara is just average. Decent, but it didn't create lashes as big and bold I had hoped.
This is my new favorite mascara. I love the brush, the mascara doesn't clump and it separates my lashes. I'll be buying it again.

After trying many mascaras this one is by far my favorite. It makes my lashes look thick and long and not clumpy while being long-wearing. I really like the design of the brush. Now I just wish they had a waterproof version!

Pros: It's easy to remove, very easy. This mascara did add volume to my lashes.  Cons: I found the wand bulky and the formula clumpy. It also added no length to my lashes. Overall the biggest disappointment was how fast it ended up smudged under my eyes. It was a mess within an hour.

When I tried this mascara I threw away all my other mascaras. This makes your lashes have so much volum and length and docent flake to my cheeks when it's humid. Overall this mascara is the bomb!!!!!!!
I wear it everyday! Can put it on light or make it thick for an awesome lash
My daughter told me about this mascara. It is awesome! I now have eyelashes! I can see them and they are long and thick.
I wore this mascara for 5+ hours at a barbecue in 95 degree weather today and it didn't give me raccoon eyes!
This is the absolute best mascara you can find on the market. If you want long, and voluminous lashes definitely give this mascara a try. It is worth every penny and more!

This is the best mascara out there. It nourishes my lashes while making them look long, thick, and curly! I've been through all the mascaras and this one is the winner! I think it even makes them grow!

I love everything about this mascara, especially the brush. It goes on easily and naturally. I was looking for a new mascara and the consultant at Sephora recommended Buxom. I was a little unsure at first...but it was a great purchase. I have since bought it agian.

Love this no-clumping mascara! It doesn't smudge once it's dry. It goes on easily without flaking. I think I have tried every mascara at every price range, and this is the one I return to with confidence every time.

When it comes to lipstick I am a Buxom girl, hands down. I will barely even consider buying a lipstick from another company/brand. It was that intense love and loyalty that drove me to Buxom Lash. Unfortunately, Buxom Lash just didn't live up to the high standard that the big & healthy lipsticks had built.  The Buxom Lash is the clumpiest mascara I've ever owned. I get clumps of the actual mascara on my lashes on top of it fusing my lashes together in odd little groups. The formula dried quickly which would be lovely if I wasn't trying to comb out the clumpy mess this creates. On the odd occasion the mascara goes on without unfortunate congregation of lashes ensuing it's gorgeous. My lashes are thicker, longer and not nearly as stiff as they are with cheaper pharmacy type cosmetic brands. The problem is that the mascara rarely goes on that well. I still try it out of a vain hope sometimes (because I've still got it thanks to holding out hope past the date I could return it by) but overall Buxom has let me down this time, which is a shame.

I received this as a Beauty Insider sample, and this product AMAZED me. I'm not an avid mascara user, and so I usually settle for drugstore brands ... but I have to say, after using Buxom I can't go back! The brush is huge and I think has a lot to do with how great the product is. Zero clumps, super easy to apply, fairly long lasting. It definitely volumizes, which I love; I don't get the spider-y look that always seems to happen, since my eyelashes are sort of on the long side to begin with. I now have the black and the plum, and didn't find the plum to look too different. I have brown eyes and black hair.

has the best volume and lasts forever... even if you reapply later in the day (for the evening), it doesn't clump up! will never buy another mascara.. except if they come out with waterproof for the summer :)

I'm always wavering between Diorshow and Lancome Definicils mascaras so this time I decided to try something else. This mascara is easily as good as the others and it has a lower price tag. I've gotten numerous compliments on the length of my lashes while wearing Buxom and the brush gets every lash. The only reason I gave it 4 out of 5 stars is that it smudges easily until it's fully dry. I usually have to clean up with a little makeup remover. But, overall, excellent!
Love how it lengthens my lashes BUT It tends to smear at the bottom of my eye :(

My favorite mascara ever. Purchased this right after trying DiorShow BlackOut (which I hated). The wand is wonderful, product goes on smoothly and easily. No clumps. Will most definitely be sticking to this mascara.

I've never written a review before, but I had to for this product.I love this mascara!! It doesn't clump, or run, and it makes my lashes thicker, and longer. I love it! I highly recommend this product. .

I bought this mascara thinking that it would be better than a drugstore brand, boy was I wrong. This is by far the worst mascara I have had the misfortune of wasting my money on. The first time I tried it I swiped it on as I usually do and looked in the mirror, my lashes were so clumped together it looked like I only had five huge eye lashes! I believe part of the problem is that there is way to much product on the wand. However, even after wiping excess product off the formula itself is not all that volumizing. I would return it, but I bought it in-store and the closest Sephora is two hours away. Overall, the worst product I have ever purchased from Sephora.

I have very long lashes naturally so I was beginning to get annoyed with all the lengthening mascaras out there and came across this one. It definitely is now my go-to. Completes a look perfectly. The end of the brush does get a bit backed up with the mascara but i just wipe it on the end of the tube and poof problem solved :]
The mascara product itself is great BUT the tube needs a smaller opening to removed extra mascara from the brush. The end of the applicator brush tends to be clumpy.
This mascara has a great natural look, but intensifies lashes. I use this on a daily basis to complete my look. My lashes look fuller and more defined, but not clumpy.
EXCELENT PRODUCT!! I really liked a lot how my lashes look
By far my favorite mascara. I love it! Lengthens without clumping and looks beautiful every time!

This is great mascara for eyes that tend to be too sensitive for drugstore brands (sorry, Maybelline). I have sensitive eyes and allergies, and this mascara never bothers me. It goes on without ever clumping, and it stays on! The only problem I ever have is that it can be difficult to remove. Still awesome stuff!
This mascara volumizes and lengthens lashes, to the point that some of my friends thought I was wearing false lashes. But it smudges quite easily, which is a pretty big negative.

This is hands down my favorite mascara. It enhances my lashes by making them appear thicker and gives it great definition while seeming natural. Best part? It doesn't smudge! Put it on your top and bottom lashes.
Love it so far. I like the brush and the volume you get from it.
I tried this mascara in a sample set, it is good mascara - adds volume and defines my short lashes.
Literally the only mascara i will use. I've used alot of brands from sephora and other companies and nothing compares to this stuff. it totally transforms my eyes. i'll never use anything else.
This is absolutely my favorite mascara... It defines my lashes well without clumping; lengthens and slightly volumizes. Overall this is a great product! ~Kit =^..^=

I found that after using this a few times that the mascara clumps when applied and I had to use another brush to remove the clumps. Also, this is the worst part, the mascara melts and appears as a dark area under the eye. I give this 2 Thumbs Down.

This is by far the best mascara I have ever used. I have very small, thin lashes, and usually when I try to find a volumizing and lengthening mascara I end up with clumps. This mascara makes my lashes look full, but extremely defined; it has an amazing wand that does not deliver any clumps! It is very buildable as well. It's an amazing product!

even when this mascara runs out and i have to use another cheaper brand before i can buy this again , i use this brush over the regular mascara because i love it so much. once you learn how to use it , its magic ! no clumps and it definitely makes them appear longer and fuller :)

I am a mascara guru.... I got a free sample of this and FELL IN LOVE! Great brush, once you get used to its thickness, and great definition! My lashes look amazing and they are so black! YAY to Buxom!
I love this mascara. It makes my lashes thicker and longer without clumping. This is the 2nd time I've ordered it. This is the only mascara I use now.

I am a mascara brand-jumper. For a long time, I only wore Diorshow. For my money, Buxom is as good or better than DS -- I am really impressed by the lengthening I get with this product. My only issue is that it tends toward clumping; I always have to use a lash brush after I apply it.
The brush takes a little getting used to if you're not used to using a thicker brush, but once you get used to it, it's amazing - does what it promises :)
I wanted a mascara that would make my eyelashes look dark and thick... and a little punk... and it does. So I appreciate that.
this is by far my favorite mascara to use. I love the way it thickens and separates my lashes- and if you follow the instructions on how to apply...no clumps!
ok, yes its not waterproof, but i love how light this mascara looks and feels... it gives my eyelashes color and length without looking fake, so it is a must have in my purse!
This product is amazing it is very volumizing and you get the perfect amount of product in one swipe. It also doesn't clump. I will continue to buy this product.
I love Buxom Lash. I sort of have a mascara obsession and I love trying different mascaras but I always come back to this one. No other mascara has been as great as Buxom Lash.

I have tried pretty much all of the popular mascaras at Sephora and this is definitely one of my favorites. It is so easy to apply and doesn't take a billion coats to get a dramatic look. My lashes stay soft and the product doesn't budge all day. Just wish it was easier to take off at the end of the day!
I love this mascars, it really catches all the little tiny eyelases and lengthens so awesome.

absolutely in love with this mascara! this is my second time buying it and it is totally worth the money. it adds the perfect amount of volume and length, usually i'll just wear this and it makes my eyes look great!

I have tried every mascara under the sun - every Dior version, Lancome, stila, MAC, Trish McEvoy, etc. This is by FAR the best one. Every time I wear this mascara people ask what I use on my lashes and I get countless compliments. Worth every penny and much better some of the more expensive brands.

I love this mascara. I was using BadGal Lash for a long time, but when I discovered this one, I haven't went back. I will say that I do use a curling wand, and several coats of this stuff, but it makes my eyelashes look AMAZING. Also, no panda eyes where I have the running of the mascara from being hot, or greasy.

I have a love/hate relationship with this mascara. It is amazing and defines wonderfully, in addition to making my lashes sky-high, but it unfortunately makes my lashes crunchy and is so runny, and hard to get off. It still makes them look great, though. I am on the fence right now, but I may come back to using this mascara one day.

I have tried pretty much every mascara that you can get in the drug store. I finally took the chance and spent a little more money on a mascara. The girl who helped me at Sephora told me to try this mascara. I love it! Best part about it is that it doesn't ever clump. My lashes always look natural and full. A beauty must!
It gives good volume and length like it better than ALL dior mascaras. They need to start making WATERPROOF mascara

I have been a huge fan of the DiorShow mascara for a couple years now and felt as though I was cheating on it when I bought the Buxom Lash. I must say, I was shocked after my first application of Buxom Lash. This mascara separates, lengthens, and defines flawlessly. I asked the sales lady, despite my love for Dior, if there was another mascara she could suggest for those of us with long lashes already and who only wanted to define. Buxom was suggested and I think I have found the one for me, at least until the next eyelash-changing mascara comes out on the market. Worth the money but I still alternate between Buxom Lash and DiorShow.

My daughter told me about this 'new' mascara she'd tried and loved because it DID NOT CLUMP. This mascara truly is clump free. It is a bit thin, but I'm not a fan of thick, waxy mascara. This mascara leaves lashes looking natural, long, and full...so if that's what you are looking for, give this mascara a try. You won't be disappointed.

This is about the 3rd purchase of Buxom Lash and I don't need to try anything else. I use the Lancome lash primer first and my lashes are long and curled. I also use the revitalash at night and the only complaint about using these 3 products is that it is a bit spendy...but...long, luscious lashes are very nice to have!

I first tired the Bare Excentuals Buxom as a mini; it was included in Sephora's lash sampler kit. It was by far my favorite out of all the mini mascaras. Something about the big brush and how it makes my lashes REALLY big without clumping and looking messy. Worth it!

reviews.review_title: Best mascara, I get so many compliments!
reviews.review_text: I have long eye lashes to begin with but I LOVE this mascara because it lengthens and helps stand them up but doesn't have all the clumps!
It was okay. The product was too thin and liquidy for my liking though. Definitely not volumizing. It didn't extremely lengthen my lashes either.

reviews.review_title: One of my top mascara choices!
reviews.review_text: I have stubborn eye lashes that are not naturally full. When I use this mascara It solves all my problems. I highly recommend this product to anyone!
I have tried about 20-30 different kinds of mascara but this on is the best. I love the brush because it doesnt clump!

I love, love, love this mascara...I have tried about every mascara there is...I was all about Diorshow Iconic for years...I only used buxom to blend false lashes, as it wasn't too heavy...I always thought it wasn't quite enough on my natural lashes, being a natural blonde with 'clear' lashes...after giving it a few tries, I fell in love, and will use nothing else..it keeps the curl better than anything...never clumps or flakes...and feels soft...is this even possible? every now and then I decide to use one of my other 10 mascaras...only to prove why I fell in love with Buxom
I was so impressed with this mascara. The wand shape and flexibility is perfect, and the formula is just right. Stays on forever and works well on bottom lashes.
...for me, this mascara works like no other. Volume, length, it does it all. I've gone through the brand spectrum via samples and sampler packs, but this is where I end up, every time.
I love this mascara! It defines and lengths my lashes perfectly. I never knew my lashes could be this long! It also doesn't clump or flake off the way other mascaras do.

It works amazingly! My eyes are really sensitive so I can only use certain types of mascaras, but most of those end up clumpy. The Buxom does not make my eyes have an allergic reaction, and it is really lightweight, and does not clump at all! I love how big and full it makes my eyelashes look! This is my new favorite mascara!!!
Nice long and thick lash magic. A fabolous product.
second time purchasing, good product. Does what it says it will volumizes your lashes. The wand is larger than most... it takes a time or two to adjust to that. Otherwise really like the product.

At first I didn't like this mascara cause too much product was coming out on the brush. After a few attempts at using it, the product was coming out the way it's suppose to. I really like this mascara now. It volumizes and lengthens my lashes, without clumping them up and making them look like tarantula legs. 4 stars because of the troubles i had when i firsst purchased the product
Wow - lash curler and Buxum Watch out the lash is back!

I'm so disappointed with this mascara. As far as mascaras go, it's AMAZING. My lashes have never looked as good as they do with this mascara--it makes them full and long and lush...gorgeous. Unfortunately, for whatever reason (perhaps b/c I have oily skin?) it ends up running down my face within a matter of hours. I've never used a mascara that runs and smears as much as this does....so frustrating!

reviews.review_title: fabulous mascara! a definite price performer! :)
reviews.review_text: ditto to what all the other reviews say. i alternate between buxom and dior mascaras, but buxom is cheaper and just as good. i have short, thin eyelashes, and buxom definitely gives them much-needed va-va-voom without making them look fake. it's one of the few mascaras out there that does what it says it will do (i'm pretty sure, if not 100% convinced, that drugstore mascara brands use fake eyelashes in their advertisements). definitely give buxom a try if you haven't already! :)

whoever invented this mascara is genius. it's like the perfect mascara that actually does what it says. i love it so much because it does not flake(which is my number one pet peeve) and it volumizes like no other. this is my first review and i never have the time to do reviews but after using it i just had to let everyone know of this amazing product. this is really a Five star product!!
What can I say? I love this mascara! Thickens and lengthens.

I absolutely love this mascara, it's the best I've used so far. It doesn't take a lot of coats to make my lashes look great. My only complaint is that it feels very wet once it is on but it dries in just a couple of seconds.
LOVE this mascara! It lengthens and volumizes better than any other mascara I've tried!

I first tried Buxom last two years ago, then I moved overseas and wasn't able to purchase it anymore. I've returned and this was one of my first purchases. No other mascara has ever been as fantastic at building volume and creating just the perfect amount of length that I need. Can't say that I will ever buy a different mascara again.

I have been using this mascara for the last 3 months and I love it! it doesn't flake or rub off all day whcih i love. It applies easily and the brush doesn't clump my lashes. I do multiple coats which allows me to control how much products I put on. I will say that it takes a minimum of 3 coats before there is any volumn - but that works for me.

reviews.review_title: The BEST mascara I've ever used!
reviews.review_text: I will never buy another brand again. The price is a little high, but the tube is larger than most.

This mascara catches your lashes and really makes them longer. I have the blue and black one and I live them both. I have had this mascara for awhile so I don't use it that much anymore but the blue shade is fantastic! It's the perfect shade of blue,not to dark and not to light or neon.

great product, but if your eyes water, its gonna go all over your face. it does what its supposed to do and stays where it should unless your a cryer. good stuff, but please make it waterproof. thank u...

I love this mascara. It feels great going on, not thick and clumpy, and my lashes stay soft.. I have very straight eyelashes and curling only helps a little bit, but after the second coat, my lashes are curlier and stay that way all day. I will definitely continue to buy this mascara.

reviews.review_title: I really wanted to love this...
reviews.review_text: After all the rave reviews i'd heard, I really wanted to love this mascara. But, the wand is awkwardly long compared to others I have used and makes application difficult on lower lashes. Also runs quickly in humidity (drug store brands have better staying power, sadly). I will say it is an amazingly intense black though. I will use what I have left but I will not repurchase.
It doesnt work like it says [no mascara does].. its pretty watery and messy. I dont like it to much. But I've used alot worse. So this mascara is decent, but not worth $19..

This is one of my daytime go-to's. It's a softer, more natural look than I would go to for a weekend night off, but in my opinion it's ideal for daytime - doesn't clump up or look overboard. Lasts well for a while without drying out.

I have very . . . interesting eyelashes. They're very dark at the base, and almost blonde at the tips. They're not too long, but they're not short either. Hence, I need mascara to really make them pop. I've tried them all, ladies. I've tried the pink tubes, and the black tubes, and the purple tubes, and the gold tubes . . . nothing, at all, has come close to this formula. Every time I put this mascara on, it's like I'm wearing false lashes. Something about the brush just picks up your lashes, sweeps them away, and manages to coat every single one without making them look clumpy. WITHOUT A PRIMER, mind you. I used to be bent on mascaras with primer, so I could get the fullest lashes possible. Never again will I ever by any other mascara. LOVE IT. <3

I'm in love with mascara and i'd heard awesome things about this, so i tried it. the first time i used it, i thought it was great! really defining, love the brush, and really volumizing. to get the lengthening effect, though, it helps if you let the first coat dry about 1/2 way before you put on the second coat.But other than that, love this product!

reviews.review_title: Excellent Purchase and worth the price
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this mascara. I normally have to use 3 mascaras to achieve the effect that I love. I first tried Buxom as a free gift and fell in love with it. I can use this product alone but it is awesome in combination with another volumizing mascara.

I am a mascara junkie and have tried lots, higher end and drugstore. I have long-ish eyelashes and usualy look for a seaparating mascara that gives a bit of volume, i work long days so it cant smuge at all. This mascara does all that and is super black. No funny smell, great brush thats big but can use the end to get in the corners. Its not waterproof, but i would say almost water resistant. Didnt smuge walking in rain, humid weather, or at the gym, though it is a bit tough to get off at night and definately need a eye make-up remover. Its up there in price for a macara though the longivity of this product and look it gives were worth it to me. My next favorite masara was Laura mercier though too expensive, love maybline one by one minus the funny smell and it smuges a bit. I found Benifit bad gal smuges a bunch and like this one much better. Overall one of the BEST ive ever tried!

I was so excited when i bought this product because it had some really good reviews.. i am OBESSED with mascara, but this one really suprised me with how bad it was.. it doesnt volumiz at all, and i didnt want to believe it at first so i tried putting more on and it still didnt do anything. So im just giving you a heads up and not to waste your money.

Great volume, length, gentle on irritable eyes, no smudging, promotes lash growth.  I love that the brush a really big, this saves a lot of application time; just wiggle it at the roots a few times and roll through from root to tip a few more times and you've got gorgeous, separated, long and voluminous lashes.  If you can't afford this, go for CoverGirl's lash blast (the water resistant or original)

This mascara is lengthening, and voluminous, but all my lashes clumps together, and make me look like a witch, and that isnt my favorite thing to look like. Even when using a lash separater, it doesnt budge. When i tryed to take it off it came off fairly easily. I wouldn't recommend this.
This mascara did nothing better to my lashes than a drugstore mascara would. The brush is hard to work with
Great product!! Love , LOVE the brush and tip!!!
This stuff looks amazing. I like the way it separates my lashes, and gives lots of volume. Too bad it runs like crazy, and stings my eyes! Will not be using this one anymore.

After I tried the mascara in the store and read the reviews i bought it excited about the results i got in the store. But when I applied the mascara with the Buxom brush it made my lashes look stuck together and instead of actual volume i got longer but lesser lashes. PLUS it's extremely not water proof, and when it gets on the skin it's IMPOSSIBle to get rid of it unless you care a make-up remover on you (which I don't). I think I'll stick to Clinique's mascara I usesd before

I usually use and love Bare Escentuals flawless definition because it has zero clumps and some lift to it, but so many people were raving about this I decided to try it. I was not impressed. It is clumpy rather than volumizing, and simply is nothing to write home about. Half of it ends up on my lid, and the general effect is not worth the clean up work.

I got this as a sample and I love how it went on and the way my lashes looked. But I wish, wish, wish they would make a waterproof formula of it. I had such bad raccoon eyes after wearing this for an hour at work.  If they ever make it waterproof I will definitely by it!

I have this as a sample and LOVE it! Once I run out of my Clinque mascara I plan on buying this because it gives my lashes volume and length and does not flake yet it is easy to remove with eye makeup remover. AWESOME!
Good value for the price. Volumizing and plumping but does not curl. My lashes end up curling down into my eye and irritating it.
most of my make up is from Bare Mineraals so thought I would give it a try. I loved the brush and how it went on but within the hour it was running and leaving streaks

As a makeup junkie, I have tried just about every mascara out there from cheap to the most expensive. Buxom Lash actually delivers all it says it does and my lashes are amazing! The brush is huge but surprisingly easy to use. and delivers just the right amount of product (no wiping). A little clumpy if you aren't careful but easy to comb out and get a soft look. I will never buy another brand!
I have been looking for a new go-to mascara for a while now, and after trying tons, I found this. Completely loving it so far!!

This is a great mascara. It really leaves my eyelashes feeling condtioned, it does not flake (which is huge for me!), and it really does thicken and darken my lashes. It's a great mascara and I will certainly be using it from now on.

I have incredibly long eyelashes and found that this only lengthened, but did not really add much volume, which is more what I'm interested in. It also sometimes got a little too much mascara on the brush which would show up a little clumpy, though fairly easily fixable due to the comb-like brush. Great length, but not as much volume as I'd hoped for.
I love this mascara! super lengthining and thickining! I love it and it lasts a while. Always change your mascara every three months! this is so worth it!

reviews.review_title: MY FAVORITE MASCARA OF ALL TIME
reviews.review_text: I have short, straight, blonde eyelashes. With the help of Tarte's eyelash curler and this product (I use black), my eyelashes look way better than they ever have before!  The design of this brush allows for great individual lash separation, which in turns make your eyelashes more full. The formula isn't goopy and hasn't ever flaked on me!  If you found this review helpful, check out my blog: addicted-tomymascara.blogspot.com
looking for a mascara that would not run... First time user and very disappointed in product Will not purchase again

i've never used a higher-end mascara but this is probably the best i have have used so far! the brush is super easy to use, the formula is long lasting, and both of them together makes really defined and long lashes. i though the covergirl lash exact was the best in defining lashes, but this is like 10 times better!

The mascara looked good when I first put it on, but it started flaking off after only a couple of hours! Not worth the money I spent, and I returned it the very next day. Thank goodness for Sephora's return policy!
great mascara just need it in waterproof

I bought this after first trying Dior Black Out mascara, which I returned because it made my lashes clumpy and flakey and didn't really do anything for me. The Buxom mascara is fantastic, it goes on SO easy. I wear it over top of DiorShow primer. The brush gets all my lashes, lengthens and thickens, and most importantly does not clump at all. I seriously love it. It looks great and goes on quick and easy.
The best mascara I have used without any irritation to my eyes and making my lashes full and beautiful.
What a true disaster my lashes are. Clumps lashes together when you try and add a second coat. Will NOT buy this product again.
After I curl my lashes I applied this mascara and it intensified the length and volume. I love how it is dramatic and not clumpy. This is one of my favorites besides Smokey Eyes by Make Up Forever.

I have tried SO MANY mascaras...was about to give up and deal with the best of the worst. Then I found Buxom Lash. I received the small sample version but LOVE the brush...goes on evenly with no clumping and no irritation to my contacts. Also separates and adds volume without looking garish. My new regular!

Buxom Lash, in Blackest Black, is an excellent mascara. It's currently available as a full size mascara in Buxom's Hot Ticket, and has been available in many of the Buxom multi-product and Sephora Mascara collections. Buxom Lash defines well, and has an excellent brush that can find smallest lashes. It's an excellent day to day mascara. It doesn't smudge and stays in place until removed. While it doesn't seem to give me any length or volume, I like how well it defines. I have long thick lashes, but it may be better for those with shorter lashes.

reviews.review_title: Not Impressive; Def Not Buying Again
reviews.review_text: This mascara was a disappointment. I was truly hoping it would be my new go-to mascara based on the load of good reviews I read. However, that said, I am INCREDIBLY picky and I am obsessed with mascara...and I've got 20 years experience. I think I like the brush other than the fact it was a bit sharp at the edges and hurt a bit, : it was a fantastic shape and size. The formula is very wet and weak. Color intensity is good (it's a nice true black), but ZERO bang for your buck. This volumizing mascara has NO VOLUME. I also found that by the end of a day it has disappeared from my lashes....it didn't flake off, it didn't smear off, it just sort of was barely there by midnight. Weird. So, I'm sad to say, this is not earning a place on my shopping list. :(

I had used Benefit BadGal Lash (which I still love, to be fair) for a few years now, so I decided to switch it up and try something new. I settled on this mascara, since it seemed like it had the volumizing properties plus the deep black I like.  At first I was really really disappointed in the product. The first couple of uses were terrible (even more than the first few days with other mascaras); runny lashes, spider lashes, you name it -- all very unappealing.  But, about a week in the product started working much better for me, and I have to say it does a really incredible job of making my lashes look naturally gorgeous. It definitely lengthens and volumizing, but without clumping at all or having obvious signs of heavy mascara.  You *definitely* have to change up how you apply it, though. Don't wiggle the wand back and forth, just sweep up straight. Also, curl your lashes beforehand because the wand won't help in that department.  This mascara lasts me throughout a 10 hour work day + gym session. It almost even lasts throughout an hour long boxing session, which is very impressive! I highly recommend if you want defined but not OTT lashes that look fuller and longer.
This mascara is great. Provides volume, length and definition without clumping. I have used this product for over a year now and I have tried other mascaras, but i always come back to this!

reviews.review_title: Returned product two days after buying
reviews.review_text: This is the first time I have submitted a totally negative review. I really like Buxom lip products so I expected to like the mascara equally well. The mascara got everywhere but on my lashes. I have used all different types of brushes and never had such a mess. I tried to put on a few coats and it never seemed to enhance my lashes. Very disappointing.
Love it very good wonderful product

reviews.review_title: Best Mascara Ever! I wish it were WATERPROOF...
reviews.review_text: This is the best mascara I ever tried. I just wish it were WATERPROOF! PLEASE MAKE IT IN WATERPROOF!
I love this mascara !! It works wonders for my awkwardly short blonde eyelashes!! Although dont put on to much cause it will clump !

This is my FAVE mascara, who needs falsies when you have this great mascara, My lashes are thick already but I feel this mascara takes them to the next level! They come out super black and really thick, well buxom if u will! I will continue to buy this mascara, I think for the price and the size, it is a super value. this is one thing I will splurge on!!

my drugstore mascara volumizes my lashes just as well as amplified lash, and separates WAY better.  even though the formula is wet and heavy (which creates clumps), this mascara is worth buying because it's extremely dark black in color and creates a dramatic *combination* of length and volume that you normally only see in false lashes.  Bottom line, i'll apply a few coats of amplified lash and then comb through it with my trusty drugstore mascara to separate.

I've been using this mascara for the past week and I wanted to give it a few days before I made my decision, however I loved it from the start and still do! The wand was what attracted me to it, and it applies the mascara perfectly. I also love it because I can make my left eyelashes fuller by applying two or three coats, and I only have to apply one coat to my right eyelashes to even them out (for some reason they're thinner and more brittle on my left eye), so it looks even, full, and incredible! It also leaves my eyelashes feeling normal after I take it off; they don't feel brittle or itchy. :) I definitely recommend this to everybody! My only concern is that it doesn't come in the color that I want, which is brown... So I ordered some Flawless Definition in brown, and I'm just going to reuse the wand from Buxom for when I need a day time look. :p

I have pretty decent eyelashes, but the tips are blonde. I use this stuff and it looks like I wear extensions. I never have to wipe formula off of the brush, either! It does a good job of curling my lashes, and the formula really doesn't flake off or smudge.  It takes me a while to apply it because (a. I'm meticulous about mascara; (b. to get the result I want, I have to coat it on. Even though I coat it, it doesn't clump!  I used this when I was using Latisse, well. Random people would stop me and ask me what kind of mascara I used and where they could get it. You'll get compliments on your pretty lashes!  LOVE IT!
Instantly made my lashes long and full with one stroke. Can make them even fuller by adding more layers without it getting clumpy.

I received this a few day ago.. and I LIKE it! The brush is a good shape.. leaves for lots of brush to apply without having to redip the mascara for more.. and yet it is not clumpy in a sense that leaves you a mess. I still have to use my fingers a little to wipe off any excess but maybe i just apply too much at one time. I like how it stays on all day and gives my eyes a much brighter and defining appearance.
I love how it comes with instructions! One of the best brushes I've come across and I consider myself an mascara expert.
The brush is very good for my fine type lashes. It grabs easily. Product does not flake and stays on well. This is my second purchase of the product.

This blew me away and I have tried everything from Lancome to Dior 360. I find this long lasting, does not clump and really makes my lashes look so long that it is like I am wearing extensions. Lifts, defines and separates.

I do like this mascara. It does give your lashes a fuller look while lengthening. I also like that it lasts the entire day. It doesn't fall flat after a few hours. You can put it on once and your good to go the rest of the day.

I bought this because I loved the way the lady at Sephora described it to me: non-flaky, volumizing and lengthening. It did all of that and more. I wear contacts and it totally helped with the amount of definition it gave me without getting anywear. I adore the brush too! This is one of my favourite mascaras! Plus it helped that my eyelashes are long and thick... just blonde (heheh) !

I had tried almost every mascara out there until I found Buxom. I have the blue and the black and love them both!! I wear glasses, so any clumps would be magnified - not a problem with this wonderful mascara!
I absolutely love this mascara. Gives you great length & volume. This is my 2nd purchase of this mascara and I also have the Blue color one as well (which gives great color, volume and length too).
I love this mascara and it is the only mascara that I will use. It is great for adding length and it does not clump!

I love this mascara!!! I didnt really want to spend $22 the day I bought it but Im glad I took the salesgirls reccomendation. I love this mascara, it doesnt clump and makes lashes look super long. I last used dior show but I like this one much better :)

a sales lady at Sephora suggested this when I told her i wanted a mascara that wouldn't irritate sensitive eyes with contacts but would still be able to provide me with length and volume. i was somewhat happy with this because, as promised, it doesn't flake so i don't have to worry about black flecks getting stuck on my contact lens. they also did not irritate my eyes when applied very close to the lash line.  but besides that it is pretty mediocre. there are some drug store brands that also do not flake and offer the same type of definition. alright product, but will not buy again.

Heard amazing things.. I should've known $18 was too good to be true for its promises. Did not lenghten, volumize, perhaps just define. I have long lashes and I was really looking for volume. Instead with that rubber brush, it just seperates; no thanks. Returning tomorrow.

I bought this, because a sales associate talked me into it, and I saw the popularity. I loved how big the brush was. Now I know it was just to lure people in. I HATED THIS. It made my lashes look like sticks. It smuged all over my eye. I have long, but few eyelashes. This just made them look hard, straight and ugly. I'm returning as soon as I can!

I have sensitive eyes so I love that this mascara does not make my eyes itch. I used the clinique high definition mascaras before, which in my opinion volumized my lashes a litlle more, but I did not like how it would get hard, clumpy and flaky after a while. This mascara does not, it feels light and smooth.

I first tried this product when I received a sample from Sephora, and I've been in love ever since! Fairly affordable, and worth every penny! Works best with pressed and pigment shadows (it tends to smudge with cream-based eyeshadow). Use with an eyelash curler, and you have lashes for DAYS!
goes on gloppy; takes FOREVER to dry; really didn't make my lashes or eyes stand out in any way whatsoever; the huge brush makes it hard to get to the small lashes in the corner

i was recommended to buy this mascara by one of the consultants, but I think I'm going to take it back. It's nothing like they describe it, and I see no difference between the Buxom and a cheap drugstore brand .....

This mascara is definitely not one of the best that I have used. It gives you no volume, but it does give you a lot of length. The other good thing is that it doesn't clump at all and it is easy to take off. Overall, this mascara would be great for the day, but for night I think a mascara with MUCH more volume would do the trick.

This is the best mascara ever, and I've tried approx. 18? maybe more, from different brands and different types. This mascara does everything, separates lashes perfectly, GREAT VOLUME, and really great length if you use an eyelash curler first!! It is a little pricey, but it's not like cheaper drugstore brands that get clumpy and dry out within 2-3 months. This stays like new for up to 6 months! It will last for a long time even if you use it every single day! I love it so much that I just bought my second one, and I don't usually buy the same make up twice I like to mix it up. But this mascara is just my dream mascara, so I know it will be number one unless something better is even possible.
I did not like this at all. It was dry and did not make my lashes voluminous. I have another bare esecntuals mascara that I do actually like I forget the name of it however I will NOT buy this again.

reviews.review_title: The one I always come back to
reviews.review_text: I buy a ton of mascaras, but if I'm in a rush and need a mascara that will work well always I use this one.  I love how big the brush it and it does an amazing job at defining each lash.  My lashes always look natural and never clumpy.

I recieved a coupon for a free sample of another type of mascara. The store was out and they substuted with Buxom. I must say, I collect mascara. I am very picky haven't found one yet that gives me what I want. This one delivers! I have long thick eyelashes and this coats each lash, lasts all day and helps hold the curl. love it!

I usually only use Dior Mascara, but I love this one. My lashes are not quite long and curly but I have a lot,.. this mascara perfectly seperates my lashes and makes them look a lot fuller and volumized :) Love it <3

This does amazing things for my lashes! I have long thick lashes but they are very blond so a great mascarra is a must-this coats and defines each lash perfectly! With 2 coats I have lush black fringe for everyday and an extra coat is perfect for upping the volume for going out or more oomph- layers really well even if I add more later in the day. No flaking, clumping or chemical smell either! Comes almost all the way off with face wash but make up remover really takes everything off.
Great brush, non-irritating for soft contacts. Does migrate throughout the day; slight racoon eyes. Probably due to excess eye oil so if you have normal to dry skin, you should be fine.
i have huge and thick lashes by nature and this mascara is the only one that makes them look beautiful. I guess there is nothing else to say.... love it
This mascara is the best. Everything else I've tried always left my lashes clumped together. This keeps them separated and my lashes look awesome with this!

I actually really like this super black mascara. The brush is HUGE and it's bristles are really defined to prevent any clumping. I have really thin sparse lashes so I need a formula that will allow me to continuously build and layer it. Whenever I wear this mascara my bf always asks if I'm wearing fake eyelashes! :) I usually wiggle the brush at the base of the lashes then brush it out in one sweep and do it over and over again, building layers on top of each other. The result is more formula at the base of the lashes and less at the tips, which makes them look super voluminous and feathery.

IM A MASCARA SNOB SO I TRY NEW MASCARA ALL THE TIME. I WAS A LITTLE SKEPTICAL LOOKING AT THE BRUSH BUT THIS MASCARA WAS A WONDERFUL SUPRISE! IT SEPERATES EACH LASH AND ADDS TONS OF VOLUME. VERY HAPPY WITH THIS PURCHASE. I RECOMMEND IT!

I love to try new products, so I have tried many mascaras over the years. I feel like this is the best one I have ever tried. I also love that it is paraben free and not tested on animals. The product is great in both the brush style and the quality of the mascara itself. The brush seems to be able to find any eyelashes you have, no matter how small or thin. And then, it coats them with the rich product that is not sticky or clumpy.

at first i didn't like this mascara. it was too runny, weighed down my lashes and i felt like it never dried. now i love it. i think it has dried out a little over time and it is so great. lasts forever and ever. never flakes. never clumps and it's super black. great mascara i will buy again.

I like the brush and the fact that it is paraben free, however the only thing this did for me was give a lot of definition. It gave the same amount of volume and length any other brand did; nothing special at all. I have pretty decent lashes too. So if you're looking for definition and separation, this is for you.
I have been a die hard fan of Lancome waterproof mascara for over 25 years, but this is great competition! No flaking, great durability, nice lash coverage!

I like this mascara a lot! It does wonders for my lashes. The only problem is that, I feel throughout the day it gets under my eyes and like leaves dark residue, making my dark circles look more apparent. This is helped when I use a finishing spray! I liked it, but probably will not repurchase for everyday use.

I was about to buy another mascara after seeing it on an online shopping network butafter reading the reviews, decided that someone's suggestion of Buxom might be better. I've been relatively happy with it. It doesn't make lashes brittle, yet they are thicker and longer, once I've applied two coats. I like that it is easily removed with facial wash and doesn't cause you to fight with your eyelashes to get it off. I would recommend it for sure.
I have very thin lashes and have been having trouble finding a volumizing one. Like Dior Show but someone told me to try this and so far so good. Goes on easy and stays on my lashes.

Would give it 5 stars if it came in waterproof! This product is amazing, but runs fairly easily because it is not a waterproof mascara.... to help keep it on I apply a coat of waterproof mascara over this (DiorShow Waterproof). This mascara is great for length, volume, and definition and nicely seperates my lashes which is what I was looking for.

This is the worse mascara I have ever been talked in to by a sales associate! It smears so bad, my expensive and inexpensive face cleanser couldn't remove it off my face. RUN to something better... anything!

This mascara does everything all the reviews say, it is volumizing, lengthening, and does a great job of separating the lashes. The only down side is that it smears so bad. I have tried hundreds of mascaras, none of which are waterproof, but have never had racoon eyes like I do with this. Please BE, make a waterproof version of this and it would be perfect!!
Great brush, separates and builds upon lashes. Great for lengthening

I came upon this as a 'gift with purchase' and I have been addicted ever since. This gives a thorough and not gloppy coating while seperating all of your lashes and making thin ones, such as mine, look longer and fuller. Oh, did I mention it doesnt smudge on eyes that tear? Couldn't love it more!
Great, lush mascara! No spider lashes here.
it's nothing special, but it does seperate lashes and doens't clump them up. it doesn't thicken it isn't dark enough, but it's good just not much better than drug store mascaras.

This mascara doesn't smudge nor transfer and the brush are nice and big BUT, it does NOT hold curl. I've always thought my lashes do not have a nice curl until I use this mascara. It was worst than my natural lashes.  Yes it does give okay volume and good separation. But seriously, drugstore mascara can do better than this for half off the cost.
I have tried SO many mascaras, and this one truly is one of my favorites EVER. It really helps to make your lashes look full.
This really makes your lashes pop... you can build it up to be quite dramatic. I also love the brush.
I love this mascara, even over DiorShow. It's defining, buildable, the brush is easy to work with, and it helps hold that just-curled-lashes look ALL DAY LONG. It can't be beat!
This mascara makes my lashes look extremely long and full. It lasts all day and you can really have different looks by how many coats you apply. I absolutely recommend this product.
From the beautiful packaging to the handy instructions included with this mascara, I am now a full blown Buxom believer! My lashes have never looked better!

If you're looking for a high-end mascara, you may want to try this one over the more expensive ones. I've tried all the popular designer mascaras and this one is better than most of them. I was disappointed with Inimitable, Diorshow, Definicils, etc. This formula is better in that: a) it does not clump, b) it builds amazing length and volume, and c) it's somewhat water and smudge resistant, even though it doesn't claim to be. Plus, it doesn't have harmful chemicals. This is my new favorite mascara. I feel like many reviewers are a little prejudiced towards a brand name, but this one is better than most. I'm glad I bought it.
mascara EVER. I don't think I will ever change..

I really like this mascara. I have very light and thin lashes and this mascara makes them thicker and longer. It does not add as much volume as I would like, but it is perfect for work. It also does not flake off but yet is easy to remove.
This is the ONLY mascara I use. It is wonderful, non-flaky and long lasting. It is easy to double-coat, so that your lashes are very defined, and it does not clump. Awesome stuff.
This is the best mascara I have ever used! It pops your lashes out!
This is simply the best mascara I have ever used in my life, and I've been using mascara since junior high school.
I have very sparse, straight lashes, but this mascara really plumps and lengthens them. Wonderful!
After trying 22 different mascaras I found this to be the best of the best!!!!!!!!
Disappointing- will return... the brush is too large- my drugstore brand delivers better coverage and performance.

I don't understand the hype with this mascara. It is hands down one of the worst I've ever tried! It did absolutely nothing for my lashes. The end of the wand begun to collect product 'goop' as well. This junk is going BACK!
I am siked that this is paraben-free. Really good stuff.

I'm one of those people who were not blessed with long eyelashes so I have been in search of a mascara that gives my lashes volume, length, and definition and this is it!  I first got this as a part of the 500 point perk during the 2010-11 holidays. Initially, I didn't think too much about the mascara just that it looked like one of those new, overhyped mascara brushes that comes out once and a while. I was wrong! I found for me that this mascara coats every single little lash and absolutely zero clumping! I also notice it doesn't weight down my lashes like other mascara's do and it makes them easier to curl with my eyelash curler. It also washes off easily at night.  All in all, best mascara ever (for me anyways) :)
Doesn't clump, lengthens well. I really like the brush, it gets all your lashes. Worth the investment over drugstore mascara, and I think it's better than DiorShow and badgal.

I had been using the Bad Girl mascara by Benefit but wanted to try something new and more natural. I was excited to try this Buxom mascara by Bare Escentuals. The brush is different than your typical brush. I found it hard to get the little eyelash hairs on the insides of my eyes with this type of brush. Compared to the Bad Girl mascara which is great at volumizing, this one is a great lengthener. Also, the formula seemed more watery, not as thick as others. Which led to the next problem, the biggest prob, in my opinion. Smudging! :( It smudges all over the place. Thank goodness Sephora has such a great return policy. I returned and went back to my Bag Girl mascara.

I love Buxom Lash! I have tried a number of mascaras, and finally found that this one is the best for me. I dye my lashes, but quickly start seeing light roots, so I'm looking for dark, lengthening, volumizing and non-clumpy. This one is perfect. I replace it every 2 or 3 months and it is my one must have for make-up.
Love the Buxom Lash Mascara...It is the best one I have found in years!!

i really like this mascara. usually i go with the same mascara when i run out but this time i decided to mix it up and i really like it! the brush is perfect for avoiding clumps and it gives lots of volume!
I really feel like this mascara does add volume and length to my eyelashes, and it's not super clumpy. I really like it!

reviews.review_title: not as great as i had hoped
reviews.review_text: The brush comes out like a cadillac and its a very lush mascara, but I see the writing on the wall...the brush is not very good at separating/defining lashes. I usually have to go over my lashes after applying to keep them from clumping. I like the lengthening and the volumizing - i just wish it would also lift and separate!

My all time favorite mascara! I am a complete mascara junkie, I've tried them all (diorshow, badgal, lancome, etc) and I keep coming back to this. One coat is perfect for everyday wear, but it builds super easily to give dramatic volume. My lashes have a hard time holding curl, and this does not weigh them down (like diorshow does), even after 2+ coats, so they stay curled all day. I use it in Black, and the color is rich and dark. The brush is really neat, too, it defines every little lash and the mascara doesn't get clumpy at all. I love this stuff!
I LOVE this stuff. It doesn't make your lashes TOO long, just long enough. And the color is perfect. My only problem with it is that it isn't water proof. But besides that I absolutely adore it!
This is the best mascara I have EVER purchased!! It glides on perfectly every single time. The unique shape of the wand helps define each lash and promotes volume.

reviews.review_title: Could be better, could be worse
reviews.review_text: Bought this on in-store beauty's advisor's advice after she said it was top selling mascara and the price was right. I wanted, thickening, lengthening, while not damaging my lashes. It definitely lengthens but no much thickening. I think it conditions my lashes because they aren't falling out as much as when I use others and they feel soft as opposed to hardened. Major negative is it flakes off. Wish I could find a mascara that doesn't leave flakes under my eyes after two hours!!! Probably won't buy again.

I tried this mascara about a year ago as part of a package deal. It's a great, economic alternative to the more expensive one I was using before. I love the brush! It keeps your eyelashes separate and doesn't get all clumpy. Stays in place throughout the day.

So I'm one of those I'll buy it when I can afford it people when it comes to makeup...But I love this mascara and will make sure I fit this into my budget! Although, it does last a long time! I love how long it makes my lashes look and how great they look all day. Can't beat that :)

This mascara creates a fan of full, defined, darkened lashes. The brush is great for seperating ad creating volume bit by bit. So you can go crazy with coating your lashes without getting clumpy. It does give almost a false lash effect and thickens a whole lot. I also like the formulation of the mascara. It's not too runny or too thick to work with.  I want to add that this mascara stays in good shape for the whole 3-4 months (mascara life span). Most mascaras dry out or harden in between but this one doesnt' at all.

I usually buy Dior Show but wanted to try something else because it dries out so quickly. I love this wand and how it applies to my lashes. It isn't flakey and washes off easlily at night. I have had it for 2 weeks and it isn't clumpy and hasn't dried out. I am really happy with it!
I hate to talk anything up to much, however .....I get tons of compliments on my lashes when I wear this. Its super black and sexy. It is completely worth every penny.
This is my 3rd tube of this I switch between the blue and the black . I really like both colors. Makes my lashes longer and fuller.

This is a great product if you are looking for volume and length on your eyelashes. The brush is the key component to this product it seperates and coats evenly. My lashes look fantastic and I have compare the look using cosmetics you find at your local drug store and believe me there is a difference. I highly recommend this product!!!
makes eyes look dramatic...separates each last without feeling gunky...the only mascara I will use
Love it, its light , but you have to put at least 2 coats for more volume.
I have tried several mascaras and this is one of the best I have used. It does not clump together and it one tube lasts a long time. It separates lashes and makes them look nice and long.

reviews.review_title: not as great as i hoped
reviews.review_text: with all the reviews on this mascara i thought this would be so great, well i was kinda wrong. it doesn't volumize like i hoped and in fact it makes my kinda clumpy and separates my lashes weird.
best ive ever tried. lengthens and thickens w.o looking clumpy and too much.

AWESOM!! i have tried them all and this one beats them all! i does it all. where as, others only promise one thing. this one difines, volumizies, and give great length! no flaking or smudging. first, try the small one like i did. you will never look back!
The mascara is volumizing compared to others, but nothing special, just ok.

I do try out quite a few mascaras but no matter what I always come back to this one (black). Whether it be to wear alone or get rid of the clumps another one made. The brush is awesome (which i think is what really makes the mascara) giving length, curl, definition, volume etc. It's easy to use (some brushes/wands can only work a certain way and feel awkward to use). The mascara formula is great as well, it's very dark, doesn't clump, flake, or become stiff to where it LOOKS like your wearing mascara (i hate that thick, clumpy, dry look) this makes your lashes look soft and real, as if your lashes have always been this lush.
