Also love the instructions that come with it lol I think Buxom's instructions always have the cutest diction (plus cute product names and i love the illustrations of the buxom line!) the mascara instructions also come with an easy-to-understand illustration of an eye to help lol Along with some tips i didn't know to do! Love Buxom!
I love this mascara and I love how black it is but sometimes I want a brown or a brown/black mascara and there are no color options aside from black and blue!
So I was having the hardest time trying to find a good mascara that would not clump after I applied it. This stuff gives you a natural look without clumping. I highly recommend trying this product.

I have to say, I was never really big on mascara, whatever I got I used, but I really really like this one! And as a person who wears contact lenses, and glasses, sometimes my eyes get irritated by quite a few mascara formulas. It is volumizing, lengthening, and defining, and it dries quickly which is great since I never have the patience to sit still and wait for a long time. I also like the effect- before I was using Givenchy's ball brush mascara- and I think this is much easier and cleaner to use.
I wanted something that didn't flake like my last mascara. Which sadly was a sephora waterproof mascara that had been discontinued apparently. The associate recommended this and I'm in love!
Great volumizing mascara for sensitive eyes like mine!
I enjoy wearing this mascara because I love what it does to my eye laces. I only hear good things about this product and I share with others about the good things.

This mascara washes off easily and doesn't dry out my lashes or irritate my eyes. I received my first tube in a Sephora promotion and liked it so much, I've recently purchased a second tube. The Blackest Black color isn't theatrical, rather, it enhances.

reviews.review_title: First mascara I've bought more than once...
reviews.review_text: Like a lot of people I've been on a quest for the perfect mascara for over a decade. My friend got me a tube from mac, which I liked and wore till it ran out. At the time, I just got a sephora card and prefer to shop online, reviews were great so I ordered. My quest is complete!!! In one coat, it outdid three coats of the mac, and its even easy to use on my LOWER lashes! It grips on coats, defines, rarely a clump. I could never do this on my lower lash before. This is my number one. If there were ever a time they factory stop producing, I may go back to that mac mascara.
I wish I saw as much of a difference as everyone else! I found it to be smudge prone and was raccoon-eyed after a few hours.
Finally I have found a mascara that does not clump or rub off. Make my lashes look longer.

reviews.review_title: Gives you the lashes you want
reviews.review_text: Doesn't clump, makes them big and long. The brush really does the job. Lasts all day.
this mascara is beautiful and very defining!
The pros are that it is volumizing and does not clump. The con is that I end up with faint raccoon eyes since it is not water resistant/waterproof.

Buxom Lash mascara is everything I look for in a mascara! It creates longer, fuller lashes that look absolutely stunning with any look. If your eyelashes don't seem any longer the first time you use Buxom Lash, wait a few days to break into the brush and you will find that they do look longer. Like it says in the mascara instructions, turn brush vertical to ensure maximum length. The best part about the brush is that no matter how many times you brush it over your lashes, there is no clumping. Have fuller, longer lashes in no time!

this mascara is awesome! the first time i tried it on i thought AMAZING ! it gives GREAT volume and length but the only drawback is that it clumps and i almost never get clumps. i find that a little strange because all the other reviews said that it doesnt clump but it does clump with me? idk but otherwise this really is an awesome mascara i will keep using it to see if the clumping is not just an illusion of my eyes!
pretty good mascara, but a little pricey. I do love the way it separates and lengthens my little lashes.

This is a really nice mascara and it does what it says. It lengthens lashes and gives volume. I only gave it 3 stars though because in my opinion, I could get the same results from a cheaper mascara found at a drugstore. I will still use this but probably won't purchase it again.
it's ok..I think there are better mascaras out there. I still think that clinique is the best.
This mascara gives moderate lift but the biggest advantage is that your lashes don't become completely stiff and clumped. It leaves them separated and soft while still lengthening

reviews.review_title: Never Satisfied, but came close with Buxom
reviews.review_text: I really do like this mascara, but I can't find a huge difference between this and the Sephora Lash Advance Formula, which I really like as well. The brush never clumps, my lashes never clump, I guess I just got the impression from the sales woman that it would make my lashes look like falsies. It does a great job of perfecting what I've got, but I'm really into the drag queen lashes right now...which no mascara can do. I wish I'd gotten it in the blue, but this really is the blackest black ever.
Seems to lengthen and separate lashes..beautifully black but it smears

This mascara is the best ive used! i had just finished using NARs mascara and it was just terrible for the price, Buxom is cheaper and just wonderful! it doesnt clump at all and define lashes perfectly. you can layer great too! absoultely love it!

for a while I was having a very difficult time finding a good mascara. I have naturally long lashes on both my top and bottom lids, so all the others I used would smudge all over the place. And then i tried Buxom, and i am so happy i did. I usually curl my lashes before applying mascara, and they usually fall flat. But with Buxom they stay curled!!! It does not clump or dry too fast which gives me the opportunity to build up as much as i want for my desired fullness.

reviews.review_title: One of the worst mascaras I have ever used!
reviews.review_text: I keep getting this mascara in the sephora sampler and it is horrible. I have to throw it away everytime. It does not do anything for my lashes. It makes them look horrible. I think that bare essentuals really screwed up this one. I hope that they make a better mascara soon. It does not lengthen or voluminize. I DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS PRODUCT!
The best I have tried!
Lenghens, defines and lifts lashes from the roots. It's super black. But doesn't give as much volume as I'd like, anyway, love it! :)
To be honest, I don't know that this adds much volume. But it DOES add some volume, and it's definitely lengthening and more defining than other volumizing mascaras. I'm happy with it!
I love the black. Excellent mascara, doesn't flake or dry.
Buxom Lash is truly the Best Mascara EVER !!! The huge brush catches every lash, making your eyelashes really thick and long.......never flaky.......absolutely LOVE it!!!

I really like this. I have long lashes and oily skin, this stuff doesn't end up all over my face like other mascaras. The only thing I don't like is how product collects at both ends of the brush and you have to wipe it off before you use it

I can not see how anyone could write anything bad about this product. It is the BEST mascara I have EVER used (and I've used alot) I've tried Dior and others but I just can't and won't use anything but Buxom Lash in blackest black.....it changes my whole look of my face!

Buxom Lash is top notch. It doesn't clump, but thickens. I feel like it is keeping my lashes healthy. You can layer it on or just use one coat depending on your look. I only wish it came in waterproof!

I've bought quite a few tubes of this stuff and I'm always happy with the effect on my lashes. It lengthens, defines and adds volume. I find that the volume isn't as extreme as definition, but still very good. I LOVE the brush, it gets every lash and even works well on my lower lashes because it grabs all the lower ones well. The formula is also quite good. It stays on all day without flaking and smudging but washes off easily with soap and warm water. I also love that it doesn't irritate my sensitive eyes, which is essential during this brutal allergy season! This will be a mascara that I will continue to buy!

I got this as a Beauty Insider sample gift, and was pleased by how dark the black really is, as well as the lengthening and definition it gave my lashes. However, I don't find it volumizing at all, and it uncurls my lashes if I use it by itself. Therefore, I apply it as a top coat to my drugstore volumizing mascara, as Buxom is 'wet' enough to go on over that mascara without clumping. I find it stays on all day without smudging, although occasionally I do notice it flakes a bit.
love this mascara. no clumps no flakes, even after recurling!

reviews.review_title: a good over all mascara that does it all
reviews.review_text: Light weight, natural mascara that does not weigh your lashes down or make them brittle. A breathable mascara that gives a lot of volume and also lengthens. Does not smudge or flake off during the day. Best mascara I've found in a while. If you don't get enough volume from it, you could apply a different mascara underneath and then use this on top. It looks amazing! Big volume but the formula is not drying or hurtful to your eyelashes. I liked it better than Dior Show, better than Tarte Light Camera Lashes, and better than Lancome's mascaras. Was worth 18 bucks.
It is by far the best mascara I have ever used. It does not smudge. Is easy to apply(if you know how). And at the end of the day it is easy to remove.
I do love how this mascara makes my lashes soft and they look beautiful and a little dramatic. The downside is that it smudges quite a bit :( I found it to be fair.

I bought this, and I thought I'd really love it. It would make sense that people loved it so much because it was amazing. The sephora employee even said it was great. I tried it at home, and I was really let down. It's nothing special, at all. It made me look like I had 5 eyelashes, total. They all stuck together, and gave me that stick for an eyelash look. It made me look older, and I don't want that at age 14! As a side note, It did make my lashes look longer, but even after I curled them, they kinda drooped down.

I actually love how this mascara lengthens and separates my lashes, but if you're someone with oily eyelids this will smudge a lot. When I first applied it I was shocked at how well it defined my lashes, if there was a waterproof version I would definitely purchase it.
Best overall mascara I've found yet. I have naturally long lashes so this one really volumizes them and gives my eyes that sultry look.

I've been using this mascara for about two years. It's not the only one I like, but it definitely delivers big, bold lashes! The brush is enormous, which is great for the top lashes, but difficult to neatly apply mascara to the bottom lashes.

This mascara is amazing! I bought the blackest black and it definetely adds alot of length and volume to my eyelashes without raccon or panda eyes. However my eyelashes are naturally dark, long and, they are pretty thick. This mascara just adds drama so thats why I love it! I put to coats on my top eyelashes and a little bit on my bottom lashes( when doing bottom lashes put mascara on vertically!) and this mascara never clumps! I will definetly be buying some more in the future!
I LOVE the definition and volume the brush provide. The formula is too wet for my liking; smaller eye gals like me tend to get under eye smudges 2-3 hours into the day...

I LOVE this mascara. Defined, lengthened, dark lashes that are perfect. No flaking, last all day. My only problem is this: It seems to dry out after 4-5 months. I know Mascara should only be kept 6 months, but I do buy this more often than other brands. However, it is worth it and I always look for the mini-sizes in combo kits. Those are a steal.
This mascara truly does what it claims - if you have decent length lashes. the more you put on the better!!!

I receive this product as part of my 500-point VIB perks amongst other goodies, and I'm so glad I did! I haven't come across a mascara that I truly love, and this is quite close to it! It definitely does not flake at all, stays on well, is not harsh on your lashes, and it lengthens and separates my lashes. I use it part of my daily regimen - whether with my makeup or without. It's a great product, you won't be disappointed.

Overall I really like this mascara. My lashes are long and thick when I use this. I have to apply it just so to make sure it doesn't clump up (and it usually does a little anyway) but I do like it and I love that it's good for my lashes. :)

Buxom Lash is suppose to be volumous full thick lashes and when I think of the buxom line, i think bold, dramatic, and volumous....ironically my lashes are not volumous, bold, dramatic nor thick, however I do like them. My lashes are feather-like, open-wide-eyed, and a softened black, not dramatic or volumous what so ever but lenghthening and pretty. The product would recieve 5 stars if the description was more accurate and if the mascara was a bit more bold, although if you like pretty not so noticiable lashes, or maybe you wear a bright lip color, I would deffitnitly reccomend this product!
This is a good for your lashes formula. Brush is awesome, very little clumping.. but it flaked on me pretty bad and weighed my lashes down :(

This mascara is fantastic, I unfortunately have short thin eyelashes and this tube manages to extend my lashes and give them a little bit of thickness without clumping. I also love that it is made without the chemicals that are found in other mascaras. Definitely a steal in terms of price and quality.
Where have you been all my life! This mascara is absolutely awesome! I love it and recommend it.
Love it ! I finally found MY mascara .

My absolute favorite mascara! It really makes your lashes stand out. Very volumizing and does not dry your lashes out. Also easy to wash off unlike the too faced mascara. No clumping or flakes. Get it!

My lashes are long, but aren't noticeable without mascara on. This wonderous mascara lengthens AND thickens my lashes. It seperates them beautifully with the wand and the curve of it is pretty nifty. When I'm applying it, I rotate the wand so that it seperates the lashes evenly and it comes out great. This is the best mascara I've ever tried. One tube of this lasted me 6 months used on the daily.
The best mascara I've ever used! I love this product and the whole Buxom line! Thank you for cosmetics like this!

This mascara is good for when you want something EXTREMELY natural. Sure you can coat and coat and coat your lashes, but that makes them too clumpy and thick. This is for when you want long lashes without that volume.

I would have never picked this mascara out on my own, but I received it as a gift. Now, I swear by it! I also use Latisse to grow my eyelashes. When I wear this mascara with the lengthened lashes, it looks like I'm wearing fake eyelashes (but they are all real!). Love this mascara.
This mascara is pretty good, but nothing overly special. Not too wet, not too dry. You can build on the coats to get the amount you want.
Love this stuff! Can layer, doesn't clump and does a nice job separating, lengthening and adding volume

I've tried them all and this one is my favorite so far. I think it lasts a lot longer than cheaper brands without drying out or clumping and the brush is really great for separating lashes. It is a good combination of lengthening and thickening. I still sometimes top it with Black Out (Dior) or a little glitter mascara (L'Oreal - just the glitter, not their icky mascara) but alone it's still really great for day or night.
Finally, a mascara that doesn't clump on the brush and then on your lashes. Color is nice and I haven't suffered any racoon eyes from it. I'll buy this again and again.
It looks really pretty to start with but as the day went by it there were a few fallouts which made my circles more noticable
I really like this mascara. I have fairly long, thick lashes, and this defines them beautifully without any clumping. I do wish it was slightly more volumizing, but it it a terrific product.

reviews.review_title: My new everyday go-to for serious lashes
reviews.review_text: Big big fan of this one. I am constantly on the lookout for the perfect mascara that goes on easy in the morning and looks fabulous all day long. Finally found it. Great volume and length, but more than that, it takes me five seconds to put on, and it stays put with no flaking and no slow disappearing act like I've seen with a lot of brands. I have two kids and zero time, but I still want to think I look pretty on a regular basis, this product helps a whole lot with that. I wear it alone with a neutral lip for day, throw on some liner and red lips for evening. Done! Love it.
I have very short lashes and this mascara is definately lengthening.
I like my cheaper mascara better. Nothing special and it was really hard to apply with that big brush.
I dislike mascaras that clump up when applied and with chunky brushes, this one I love because it seperates each lash and its doesnt clump up at all, has to be my favorite.

This is my second favorite mascara. It is ALMOST as good as my Inimitable Intense Chanel mascara. Gives great volume. My only real issue is that I use it a few times and it somehow does not work as well.
This is one of my favorite mascaras it gives me great volume and because of the brush it also gives me great definition to my lashes
I sell Avon, but could not find a mascara there I liked. Love this one. It lasts all day, and the tube lasts longer than any other brand I've tried.
I've tried many many different kinds of mascaras, save your money with this one. It works great if you have very fine or very little lashes.
I am absolutely ADDICTED to this mascara. Everyone asks me what I wear and I am faithful to the Buxom Lash!!!!

I have been searching for the perfect mascara for years, and I finally found it! I have naturally long, relatively thick lashes, but they are blonde on the tips. This mascara takes my lashes to falsie lengths without clumping, flaking or smudging! I'm in love.

I am always searching the my HG mascara. This comes close. It is a great brush and it does not smuddge on me. I do wear it sparingly on the bottom lashes though. Has held up through exercise and CA heat. Got a sample in the Lash Stash and now bought the full size.

Brush does not allow clumps. You can get a little coverage or a lot for a subtle or a dramatic look. Doesn't end up under my eyes at the end of the night, but is much easier to wash off than other water-resistant mascaras I have tried.  The only thing I would change is make the brush a little smaller, or provide an additional smaller brush inside the cap or something, but even as-is, it's a great brush.
I've used many mascaras but they all pale in comparison to to Buxom. Goes on nice and smooth and stays that way all day. Not clumpy at all AND makes your lashes long very long and thick.
The best mascara I have EVER used, hands down. And trust me, I've tried plenty.

For years I have used the same mascara and sworn up and down that I would never consider another one. I had even converted a couple of makeup artists into loyal users. This one had so many great reviews that I tried it, and it puts my old stand-by to shame!! If you start at the base of your lashes with this brush you really only need one coat, but you can keep piling it on for more intense drama. It's really unbelievable how much better this is than anything else I've used. My lashes have not clumped, flaked, or gotten that weird stiff feeling....they've just looked straight-up awesome. My only complaint is that I wish they made this in brown or black-brown as well. I'll be buying this again and again. You won't regret this one!

It's been a long search, but I've finally found my perfect mascara. I like a mascara that evenly defines each individual lash for a more natural finish, and Buxom delivers. The formulation is more like a thick liquid instead of a paste, like most mascaras. You have to be careful when applying to avoid smearing, because it takes a few seconds to dry, but it's the only mascara I've had that never, EVER flakes on me.  It adds volume without making my lashes look like tarantula legs, and the rubbery hourglass applicator is perfect for creating definition.  It's the perfect mascara for me. If it were available in brown and plum, it would be even more perfect.

reviews.review_title: great for lengthening, not so great for thickening
reviews.review_text: I prefer a mascara that makes my lashes fat. This does a great job of making lashes longer. Don't buy if you want to make your lashes thick.

reviews.review_title: Leaves my lassages full & dark... but...
reviews.review_text: I loved the way this left my lashes super thick, velvety & very black... re-applying it over the first coast didn't leave it clumpy like other mascaras. Unfortunately I started noticing my eyelashes falling out. I can't find any other contributing factors (stress, diet, etc) so I can only assume it's this mascara. After the third day of waking up with eyelashes flecked on my lids, I've stopped using it :(

I like the look of the mascara, even though it doesn't add volume at all.  Like most mascaras do to me, ended up with racoon eyes after a day at work. I got this in Dolly does Amsterdam pack, was a smaller size ; I will finish it, but I don't plan to buy it again afterwards. I'll stick to my Lancome Definicil.  I also hated the HUGE brush, not very handy.
I was skeptical at first, but it is true, not one clump. Went on easily and washed off that way too, I would recommend this mascara to anyone and would buy it again

I have very thick and black lashes to begin with. I feel that this product is very heavy looking if you have already such strong features on the eyes. I would suggest this product to anyone that has light eyelashes and slim eyelashes. This product works okay but is not my ultimate favorite product. Thank you Sephora for shipping this item to me!

I love Bare Escentuals products and was very excited to try this product. I was very disappointed. The formula was thin and almost watery, and on the occasions that it got under my lash line it stung very badly. Also, while it did lengthen my lashes, it did not add any volume to my lashes. Honestly, I prefer drugstore mascaras to this product.

I got a sample of this from Sephora a long time ago and fell in love with it. Not only does it make my lashes longer and fuller, but it goes on very easily with no clumping. You can put it on heavy or light and it always looks great.
Since discovering this mascara I will never go back to anything else.
wont use any other mascara ever again!!!
I used to be a Bad Girl Lash devotee - but I'm converted. Best ever! Is not waterproof though, if you're looking for that. Doesn't clump (at least not when new.)

As a beauty insider, I received a full size of this mascara with a 500 point Bare Escentuals perk. I will say that it does a really good job at lengthening and defining, but I wasn't that satisfied with its volumizing ability. It's not a bad product at all, but since I mostly look for a volumizing mascara, I would not purchase this myself. I still plan on using it up, but I just layer it with another mascara for the desired volume; since this product really does not clump, it's good for layering!

reviews.review_title: Perfect length and definition, but not volume
reviews.review_text: It's a shame BE did not choose to market this product's strengths instead of choosing the misleading buxom label. Although it doesn't do so great at volumizing, it does an exemplary job of lengthening and defining with not a clump in sight. It holds the curl in my lashes well and doesn't flop after a few hours. The end results are very pretty. It absolutely beats the snot out of Benefit's Bad Gal, which I presume is one of its direct competitors. Buxom's effects are extremely similar to Diorshow Iconic; I would highly recommend this product as a more economical alternative.  Some negatives... It does not have perfect staying power. I notice black starting to build up under my eyes (note that I do not apply to the bottom lashes) after as little as 8 hours, but other times as long as 12. The brush is extremely large and can be cumbersome. At the end of the day, it's also more difficult to remove than the average mascara.  Overall, for its price range, this is an excellent mascara. While I think I still prefer Sephora's Atomic Volume and MUFE's Smoky Lash for their volume and durability, if you're looking for a moderately priced mascara that gives gorgeous length and definition, this is where you'll find it.
This mascara is the best! It makes my lashes even longer than they normally are. With just a few swipes, your eye lashes are instantly longer! I highly reccomend it!

I received a full size of this mascara with a 500 point Bare Escentuals perk. I will say that it does a really good job at lengthening and defining, but I wasn't that satisfied with its volumizing ability. It's not a bad product at all, but since I mostly look for a volumizing mascara, I would not purchase this myself.
I agree with the description of buxom Lash, it volumizes indeed. I recommend this product.
Buildable, but does give some flaking by afternoon.
This is the only mascara I will use and I've tested over 40. It evenly coats lashes and even lengthens. Worth the money
Best mascara ever- lengthening and volume!
i ususally use dior show and i am looking to switch it up. this mascara is awesome, instant volume. very noticeable, i also like the little instructions that came with it

I really like this mascara. It does not clump and it gives great volume while separating the lashes. The only draw back of this product is that is difficult to completely remove, even using make-up remover meant for eyes, there black pigment left around the eye.

So far I like this mascara! It gives great length, and the brush is a great mascara brush! it seems to reach all of your lashes! The only thing that I do notice is that after a few hours it seems to fade?? It just doesn't look as amazing as it did when I first apply.. So I feel like i have to reapply throughout the day.. Then it just doesn't look as pretty with the extra layers. Could be better at volumizing!

This is a great product. It truly makes your lashes appear longer the only down fall is that after a few hours it is hot (I live in Los Angeles) the mascara easily smears. They need to make a waterproof version.

I have thin eyelashes so I would spend money on multiple different mascaras trying to find one that I loved and sometimes I had to use two different mascaras to get the full, volumous eyelashes that I wanted. I went out on a limb and purchased this mascara and am SO HAPPY that I did. I love it so much. You can layer it and it does not flake!! Definitely worth the money and it lasts a long time. Finally found a mascara that I actually like!
This mascara makes my eyes stand out and my lashes very full and long. The big brush makes it extremely easy to apply! LOVE it!!!
I have searched hi and lo for a mascara. I'm on my third tube of this stuff. it's AWESOME! It is the only mascara I use

I bought this mascara as a part of a set and wasn't expecting too much, but I love this. I just curl my lashes, put this on, and my lashes look great all day. They look longer, fuller, and separated without the fake lash look.  I haven't gone with more than two coats, but I haven't had any problems with clumps when applying a second coat. No problems with smudges either, but I use a different mascara for my bottoms lashes. And for not being waterproof, this mascara has very good staying power - and I even have problems with itchy, watery eyes due to allergies.

Love the brush, love the product, love the way it goes on! And, it's smuge proof! Seriously, all mascara should have a brush like this. This brush separates each lash and the little bulb on the end makes it so easy to get every last little lash coated. It builds to make your lashes long and thick. This mascara is the best!

I've tried almost every mascara out there and this definitely falls in my top 5. It feels lightweight, doesn't make my lashes feel hard and can handle application of several coats. It doesn't flake or rub off under my eyes either, which has been a problem in the past with my oily skin.

OBSESSED!!! I have been using this mascara for over a year and I can't live without it... I refuse to use anything else! I have long lashes to begin with but Buxom Lash makes them look incredible! Waterproof would definitely be a plus though :)

I like the formula a lot! It is really silky and layerable. It makes my eyes pop and it stays all day even through sweat and tears. My only complaint: The brush is built so that when I take it out of the tube there are clumps of product on the brush. It is annoying. But the formula is great!

I have been using this mascara for a few months now. So far, I am quite happy with it. It is definitely better than most of the other products I have used. My only complaint is that it isn't waterproof. I suppose though, this hasn't been a huge problem--it seems to stay on my lashes really well despite (I never have circles of mascara under my eyes at the end of the day as with other products). Also, I have really long, thick, dark lashes and other mascaras tend to make them look like spider legs while this product coats them perfectly making them really pop without clumping. Love it!
The brush was a little awkward to use, and it clumped a bit, but it did give me big shiny black lashes like it promised!
I actually ended up returning this mascara because I wanted something that provided lots of volume. This mascara is to wattery.
I loooooove this mascara! Lengthens, thinkens, no clumping! Great! Great! Great! =)

I've tried expensive, I've tried cheap, and this is the best mascara I've ever used. I have very long lashes, but a bit pale and thin. This just powers them on and my eyes look fabulous! It stays on for me, but I don't use any on the bottom lashes, so no raccoon look at all.

I love this mascara. It defines every lash and never clumps them together. I like how it's not obvious and it looks natural when I wear it, and I can also layer it with other mascaras if I'm going out. I have tried other mascaras since using this one but none compare!

I love mascaras and when read about Buxom Lash have to try it and let me tell you is really nice and it's true to it's description. It give lenght,volume and a great stylish look to your eyes. It open my eyes in such a way that I don't realy need to use eye liner. Try it you'll love it.

Favorite mascara overall. It is very defining. It makes your eyelashes look thicker, darker, and longer. But in a natural way. Wouldn't really reccomend for a person with very light hair or really thin and short eyelashes as it won't be flattering and/or do much. Love it for stage makeup and using every day. Can be applied in layers or over other mascaras.

I love the way the this mascara goes on; a really good brush. It looks good the first couple of hours but after that I seem to get that racoon sort of look under my eyes which makes me a little crazy. Good but not great.

After trying dozens and dozens of designer and drugstore brands of mascaras, I've come to the conclusion that Buxom lash gives the best overall separated, lengthening, and voluminous look. Plus, this formula gives lashes a rich black color and doesn't flake.
my favorite mascara EVER! it defines every single lash and is absolutely amazing  my one little complaint..... it doesn't hold curl too well, so i normally use another mascara underneath this one

reviews.review_title: Still the best mascara I've used...
reviews.review_text: Love love love Buxom. It makes your lashes longer, fuller and generally healthier. Holds a curl beautifully, and doesn't clump at all. I'm going to stop trying other mascaras because this is it! Get it, ladies!
This is my absolute favorite mascara ever! I love how with only one stroke it is applied. It really makes my eyes stand out.
I have tried ALL different kinds of mascara and I love this one the best. The brush is incredible and the stay is wonderful. Highly recommended!

my love affair with this mascara started when i received a sample size of it a year or two ago. i loved the oversized spiky brush and how great the mascara made my lashes look - super black & long! my only complaint is that if you accidentally apply too much to bottom lashes they will definitely look strange and clumpy, like, immediately. other than that...love this mascara and at 18 bucks, it's a steal
This mascara smudges within a few hours for me. On the plus side, I really like the blackness of my lashes with this mascara.

I've been searching high and low for the perfect mascara, and I think I've FINALLY found it. I've been looking for one that volumizes, gives me va-va-voom lashes, and most importantly, KEEPS THE CURL. I have tried so many that straightened out my eyelash-curler-curled lashes (Givenchy Phenomen'eyes, Clinique High Impact Curling, and many more). That is my biggest pet peeve! This does everything I want it to do and then some. It gives me gorgeous lashes, with some drama, keeps the curl AND they don't feel hard or sticky. I have also had no clumping. I seriously couldn't be happier!

Honestly, I've been searching for this mascara my whole life! Haha. It makes my lashes thick, defined, and just really pretty. I'm obsessed with this product right now. There's not much I can say, except this is probably the best mascara I've used in a LONG TIME.
I LOVE THIS MASCARA!! Goes really well, no clumps,lumps or blobs. Doesnt make my eyes look like spiderwebs.And really opens my eyes and makes em POP! BUY IT BUY IT you will love it

This mascara has a plastic brush that keeps it from being clumpy, and does a good job separating lashes. One coat is plenty, but it layers well if you want a more dramatic look. It also comes off easily with makeup remover. I gave it four stars because I'm not sure it's worth the price, but I had a coupon from one of Sephora's mascara samplers that gave me 100 Beauty Insider points if I bought a full size mascara. (BTW, that mascara sampler is definitely worth it if you don't already have a favorite mascara, or just like trying new ones.)

Buxom Lash mascara allows me to have long, sexy lashes with every application! I would recommend it to anyone who doesn't already have a favorite mascara. And $18 is a steal for such a fantastic product!

Wow I can't say enough, I got this as a deluxe sample and feel in love. My lashed looked like I had just applied false lashes. The brush is awesome it grabs every lash. I have tried a lot of mascara and this is by far the BEST!!
I am very happy with my purchase of this mascara!! I love love what it does for my lashes, it makes them separated and stand out!! I highly recommend this brand!!
I like it. The only thing is I still need to use my mascara comb. I'm on the search for a mascara where I won't need the comb to separate and take the clumps out.

i loved the mascara ! it was perfect it was exactly what the description say! i like it because the formula was very silky and creamy and i haven't have mine for a long time but i haven't had any clumping happening and i don't think its going to happen and i know its 18 dollars and a little pricey but it is totally worth it.i dont regret buying it at all!
I have very fine hair and this works wonders on my lashes.

I am so impressed with this product. It's just fantastic! I've actually seen a difference in the length of my lashes, after only using this product! I will repurchase and look at other Buxom products!

I've tried them all- Dior, Chanel, Lancome, Stila, Urban Decay, every drugstore brand, etc. etc. and this one is still my all time favorite. It separates and plumps and gives me really big but clean and clump free lashes. No complaints and it never smears or runs even in the summer.

Tried this randomly a year or so ago and has been my favorite ever since. I have small eyes and small lashes. This is the only one that draws them out and doesn't clump. I love the brush which seems to be the key to this mascara! I have given it as gifts to friends and everyone loves it. It's a great price and I used the pricier one for years- this wins!
i loved this mascara at first but i realized that after wearing it all day it would flake off really bad and smudge under my eyes. also its not waterproof which stinks :/
It's the only mascara I will use

I think buxom would be good for a minimal make- up look. It didn't volumize my lashes like I thought it would. It did lengthen somewhat and the mascara does not clump. Probably because the formula is so thin. I would not buy again or recommend to a friend. Dissappionted because I love buxom lip gloss.
I was expecting a little more from this mascara. It just doesn't seem to make my lashes as full as I had expected. I do love the size of the brush, just wish it gave a little more oomph

I have been using BUXOM Lash for over 3 years now and I love it! It lengthens my lashes and defines them wonderfully. Even,when I'm short on time, I make sure to use BUXOM, because it opens my eyes and makes them appear bigger and brighter! I've tried other brands that claim to seperate and lengthen, but they clump my lashes together. I have been afraid to try anything else because I love BUXOM so much. I'm sure there are other mascaras that deliver the same benefits and great results, but I'm sticking with what I know works!

I tried finding a natural or close to natural and/or healthier option for a mascara since its hard to get mascara off and I don't like to be to rough on my eyes to prevent wrinkles. This one I found after a few tubes of light, something, lashes from Tarte, that one dries out kind of quick though.  Buxom Lash is AMAZING! It doesn't clump and it leaves the right amount of product in while the brush defines the lashes evenly, it looks super neat and clean. The tube doesn't dry out quick! (in comparison to natural ones and convetional ones like lancome and clinique)

I think this is great for your everyday mascara. It actually keeps the curl in my lashes which for me is rare, because my lashes only stay curled when using a waterproof mascara. Buxom lash also leaves my lashes feeling conditioned. It's super easy to wash off, you don't even need to use makeup remover.

I am still deciding if I really like this mascara. I like the idea that it is good for my lashes. There is a lot of product in the tube and that seems to cause a bit of clumping together of my lashes. But after two weeks that has improved. It stays on very nicely, and keeps my lashes curled which I like. Maybe I will buy it again...

I really love this product, however it has a tendancy to smudge and or flake. Also, the product is not available in waterproof, which would probably alleviate my two complaints above. But this mascara works wonders, it lengthens the look of my lashes and creates tons of volume. Not so defining, but again I believe a waterproof version would fix that.

This is the best mascara I've ever used! I have bad allergies and am sometimes even allergic to mascaras that are hypoallergenic, but this one doesn't bother my eyes at all. Also, it doesn't clump. The brush makes it easy to get the tops of my lashes for a real dramatic look. I love this mascara!

My biggest complaint with this mascara is that, even though it has a brush that looks like it would separate the lashes very well, the formula is so moist and thick that it creates clumps. If this performs like most of my drug store mascaras it will get better as the liquid dries out a little, but as of now I'm not thrilled with what I got for the price.

I have been using this mascara for almost two years now and I love everything about it! It is easy to apply and lasts throughout the day. I have tried allot of others and always seem to come back to this one.

I do love this mascara, but I can live without it. I have really long lashes, so I am always looking for a mascara that will give me volume. Boxum lashes does give you tons of length, so if that is what you want out of your mascara, I'd for sure recommend this! But if you want lots of volume, look somewhere else! The formula is more runny, not thick. It is also great when it comes to clumping, after putting on more than 3 coats, there wasn't a single clump on any lash!  I'd say this mascara is good for subtle drama.

reviews.review_title: The only mascara I've ever re-purchased
reviews.review_text: ...this is quite simply the best mascara out there. Although I've always been a makeup junkie, I never really wore mascara until this year, because I have naturally long and dark lashes and I thought it would be overkill. This mascara changed my mind, though--it doesn't clump, the brush is fantastic, and while I can't tell if it's moisturizing, it certainly doesn't make me lose lashes. Highly recommended!

Yes, I am Chinese-American, and yes, I whine about my less than fabulous lashes. They're decently long, but they're so thin and sparse that without mascara, they are virtually invisible. However, as of late, my lashes have looked very good. All it takes is an eyelash curler, two coats of Buxom, and I'm good to go. Not only does this mascara hold a curl really well, despite not being waterproof, but it also separates and defines lashes, coating each lash, with the result that my lashes seem longer, thicker, and less sparse. Don't attempt more than two or three coats, though. It will clump and weigh down your lashes. Trust me. You don't want weeping willow lashes.

This mascara is one of the best mascaras I've ever used. The formula is thick so it grabs every lash and thickens and lenghthens them. You can put on as many coats as you want without having clumping. The only minor downfall for me is the brush is a little too big. But even them is compensated for because it actually grabs the lashes which I LOVE!

reviews.review_title: forgot to add this to my review
reviews.review_text: I love this product, but please note that it does not work great the first few applications per tube, not sure why maybe it thickens due to air. However, after about the 3rd application it is amazing!!!!

This mascara actually creates length and volume. when I put it on in front of one of my girlfriends she mentioned how perfect they look. I am a perfectionist when it comes to my eye lashes and through out all of my years of wearing makeup Buxom is the best. If they were to ever stop making it I would have to go postal :-)

I was in the Times Square Sephora over the holidays and really wanted to find a new mascara. I love how it looks on my eyes, but I've never found one that stays put. The Buxom sales associate put this on me and it was love at first sight. I've never been able to get my lashes this full and separated--they look almost as good as my falsies!  ...unfortunately, the mascara isn't waterproof. No matter how hard I try, I always end up with raccoon eyes. I even tried it with the Urban Decay Eyelash Primer and couldn't keep it on my lashes. I also find it really hard to remove; I always have residue under my eyes the next day. If they made this in waterproof, I'd probably never wear another mascara again. As it is, I'll just save it for special occassions and stick with clear mascara.

Awesome mascara. I was a little unsure at first, the formula was a little watery but now I love it! Its volumizing, lenthening, defines well, the only drawbacks I can think of is it doesn't hold a curl as well as I hoped it might and it doesn't come in waterproof. Other than that its wonderful!

I have tried almost every mascara under the sun, from brands in CVS to department stores like lord and taylor. this mascara is very nice. it doesnt clump, run, or flake. i would give it 5 stars if it volumized a tad bit more, but overall i am very satisfied with what it does.

Ladies, this product is not to be passed up. I have tried every single mascara on the market, looking for the wow factor for perfect lashes. My search is over. Buxom lash creates the most amazing, flawless, plump lashes you can imagine. The price is unbeatable, and it blows the much more expensive, higher end mascara's out of the water.
I really like this mascara! Doesn't flake or smear. Wished it volumized a little bit more, but overall it does a good job.

I was deciding between this and a Sephora brand and decided to choose this instead. I have a huge problem with masacaras smudging and this one doesn't. I like the brush, the depth of the black and the fact that it really doesn't smudge, but it does come off easily.

I love this mascara. People think I'm wearing fake lashes when I use it. It does provide a very dramatic look and takes more time to apply than a normal everyday mascara....but it's perfect for going out or when you want to add that extra va va voom.

I've used Dior show (both waterproof and non) for years, however I decided to save 7$ and try this one out. I'm so glad I did! Between the two, I will say Diorshow is a smidge lighter and airier. If you really like to build it to high heaven and want waterproof then I'd check that out. However this one separates and curls much better. It gives a full looker without feeling chunky. Both are non flakey and dry. Both stay on all day and doesn't feel heavy. I think it's a personal preference and worth getting the smaller versions to pick which one best works for you. However, it defiantly is a show down between these two. I personally pick this one, plus it's cheaper!

I really can't express how much I love this mascara.  It goes on evenly and doesn't clump. The unique brush makes application pretty much fool-proof. I can even get an even coat on my teeny-tiny bottom lashes without raccooning myself. It lasts pretty much all day without flaking or rubbing off around my eyes.
this mascara is awesome! the brush is great and seperates and coats each and every eyelash
at first, i was tentative about this product, but ended up buying it, i have to say that it's one of the best mascaras i've ever used, it doesn't clump, and reaches every lash i have

This is a very nice mascara overall. The brush is very good for separating lashes. I would say Buxom is more lengthening than volumizing but that can be fixed with multiple coats. I normally use Lancome Hypnose and this is more product for less money and that is also a plus.
I have been loyal to this mascara for about 3 years, its awesome. Makes me look like I have fake lashes on.

I have a hard time finding a mascara that I really love that is free of junk (parabens, sulfates, etc), has not been tested on animals but still gives some oomph to my puney lashes. This is it! This mascara gives nice, full lahses with lots of definition and volume. The best mascara I've found yet : )

I am constantly trying out new mascaras and this is the best I have found. I use it with Dior lash Maximizer and get great results. I have fair, short, straight lashes and these two products make me have long, thick, celebrity lashes!
I like the brush alot, my lashes are always seperated. On a bad note, its a littl heavy on the lashes so I have to use the eye curler before and after application.
I love the mascara, except I wish it was a bit more waterproof as it winds up being below my eyes by the end of the day.
lengthens, thickens, non clumpy

reviews.review_title: Best Mascara I Have Ever Used
reviews.review_text: I love this mascara! It doesn't clump or get sticky. I live in Tucson, Az and it doesn't smudge or smear in the heat. It is layerable, and yet silky. My only complaint is that it is kind of hard to get off. But it is still the best and most versatile mascara I have ever tried. :)
I have discovered my new favorite mascara and this is it! It does it all and with out clumps!
I love this mascara!

reviews.review_title: Lots of volume without the spider lashes
reviews.review_text: Really like the look it gives, you can also build the coverage. I like being able to put on a little for work than do a touch up to add lots of volume and length without it clumping. Works well for me, the bulbed tip it perfect for corners and bottom lashes. Gave be better results than Maybelline's Falsies mascara.
i can't say enough great things about this mascara. i love it! elongates and thickens my lashes perfectly. it's my all time favorite! comes off your face pretty easy too.
I love this mascara! I have short and thin eyelashes and it really elongates them! I use a second mascara to make them more full sometimes, but most of the time Buxom does it perfectly on its own!

reviews.review_title: Best mascara I've used in 50 years
reviews.review_text: I sell Avon, and couldn't find one I liked. This one has everything I wanted. Light, no clumps, long lasting on. And I bought it last November, and it is just running out. Such a deal!

I honestly did not like this as much as I thought I would. Don't get me wrong, it's a good mascara, just not for me. Doesn't do anything for my sparse lashes (but make it more noticeable! UGH! >_<). I think it's more catered towards those with already thick lashes and want a mascara with a wand that separates. This mascara separates beautifully and doesn't clump often. I don't know what the name of this mascara should be, but 'Buxom' is definitely not it. Sorry BE; good product - misleading name!
Gives great definition, volume and length. Loved the wand. Worked really well on my blond-nonexistent lashes.
This is exactly the mascara I was looking for. Doesn't clump, separates the lashes making them appear longer and is light for daily use. I'm in love!
I wish this existed when I just started to use eye makeup!

Though I don't use this mascara anymore on a daily basis, I love it. It doesn't clump, it's volumizing, legnthening, and it separates the lashes well. Also, it doesn't leave your lashes feeling crumbly or hard.

my friend uses this and her lashes looked fabulous. so i needed a mascara for the time being and decided to give it a whirl. the guy who worked there said it was one of his faves (he apparently did makeup for like 10 years+ or something) so i went home to try. it was so gloopy. it took forever to try and messier than any mascara i've tried. but after a few clean ups, it looked good. it lengthened and volumized but it does flake just a little.  since its not water resistant/proof, u will possibly get raccoon eyes. especially on a windy and cold day when your eyes get watery, it made me wonder if my mascara was gonna run. other than these tear-inducing days, i like it. but i dont love it either.
Love the wand & the color, doesn't flake
Liked the brush and the way it makes my lashes look. But I do find it smudges after wearing it all day.

I have really long eyelashes and expect to see them be insane with a mascara. This didn't do much for me...it's more subtle than I wanted but, I agree that this is a good quality product and great for some.

I've been using this mascara for about a month and it is probably my favorite. I've tried a lot of drugstore mascaras, but they would often feel like something was in my eye, or they would smudge, flake, or lose the eyelash curl.  This mascara is very dark, which I love. It does not clump, and once I've curled my lashes, it holds them. It is buildable, and unlike other mascaras, Buxom Lash feels light, like you're not even wearing it. It does not give me the false-eyelash volume I would like, but it is very good nonetheless.  It seems rather expensive for mascara (that is supposed to be tossed after 3 months), but worth the splurge.
So glad I tried this product. I'm always in search of a great mascara at a reasonable price and this certainly fits the bill.

reviews.review_title: Not what I was hoping for
reviews.review_text: I was excited to get this because of all the good reviews that I had read, but I still need to use my mascara comb for my lashes afterwards to get the small clumps of mascara that is left behind. It does make my lashes a little stiff and it does flake. Let me clarify, as long as you don't touch your eyes, it's fine and doesn't flake. I was hoping that I wouldn't need my mascara comb. Other than that, I like it. It does separate and makes my lashes look longer. Overall I think it's good. But it didn't wow me,

I've been using this mascara for awhile now, ever since the beginning of October for my senior pictures at school. I really like it! It lengthens my lashes nicely and makes them pretty dark. It's pretty buildable too. What I like is that this mascara does not clump on me and makes my lashes look naturally long. People can't tell I'm wearing mascara. However, I wouldn't recommend this for the bottom lashes; I noticed slight smudges when I would use it on my lower lashes. It doesn't exactly thicken the lashes much either. Overall, it's still a great mascara and one of my favorites now for making my lashes look natural long and curled!

I really wanted to like this mascara, but after several uses, I just want to throw it out. My lashes don't get noticeably longer than with drugstore mascara -- and I do spend the time trying to apply it correctly, as the pamphlet it comes with shows. After a few hours with it on I get raccoon eyes. I understand that it's not waterproof, but I've never had such a problem with mascara that I have to go to the bathroom halfway through the evening to clean up the mess left on my lower eyelids!

reviews.review_title: Best Aplicator brush I have ever used
reviews.review_text: the brush is great, but the mascara is a little sticky

I originally got this as a sample and loved how it made my lashes look- longer, fuller, yet natural at the same time. I finally bought the full size and could not be happier! They need to make it in brown! (hint hint)

This item really works! The first time I used it, I was a bit disappointed because it didn't add volume to my lashed. I started searching for another mascara and was about to buy zoomlash by mac but I decided to give buxom another try. This time I followed the steps that came with the product and I was impressed! I just had to do it right. I'm happy with this mascara and won't be buying zoomlash.

This mascar is great! It does give you lenght and Volume, just learn how to apply using the instructions that come with the box (great tips to use with any mascara), use your eyelash curl, and Voila !!!

I expected to love this, but it was just okay. It volumizes pretty well and doesn't clump which is great, but it doesn't hold curl very well. I have very straight lashes so I need something that's like BAM, but oh well.

I love this mascara. Its the second time I've bought it and I feel it makes my lashes look fabulous. For the price, I would recommend it to my family and friends. Give it a try if you want a great mascara.

I purchased the Lashstash sampler & tried this mascara first. I now know that I would never purchase this product. I have never had racoon eyes until this mascara. Yes, it went on with ease but it also smeared with ease!

reviews.review_title: best. mascara. ever. (and i'm SO picky)
reviews.review_text: i've been reading some of these reviews and i don't get people who are saying this gives them raccoon eyes or clumps.  there is literally nothing i can do to make this mascara clump. it's buildable, so depending on the look you want, you can just keep applying. i've even reapplied this after hours of wearing it and it still didn't clump at all. the formula is so smooth and the brush gives great control.  i LOVE that it's also good for your lashes. it's paraben free and if you care and pay attention to what you're putting on your face and on your eyes, that is a BIG DEAL. when i take the mascara off my lashes still feel soft and look healthy. it's not waterproof, but i hate waterproof mascaras because you can damage or remove lashes trying to get them off. but unless you're splashing water on your face and then wiping your eyes, this mascara doesn't budge. i've worn it out in the rain and just made sure not to go rubbing my eyes afterwards and it still looked perfect. it also doesn't flake EVER.

This is my absolute favorite mascara! I've tried Dior Show (which was just 'eh' for me) and Lancome Definicils (which I liked a lot) as well as a bunch of other mascaras over the years, but Buxom Lash is the only one that really makes my almost non-existent lashes pop!  I wish I could rate it 4.5 stars instead of 4. The half point off would be because it isn't waterproof. I wish Buxom made a waterproof version of this...

This mascara is wonderful; the only mascara I've tried that lengthens, creates volume and defines lashes simultaneously, without turning them into a clumpy mess.  However, the applicator is rather large and I have difficulty applying this without smudging it on my eyelids.  Applying the mascara carefully and patiently solves this problem :].
I loved it, except it took forever to dry. I don't have time to wait. I was sad. I returned it. I've tried tons of expensive mascaras, but the best one always seems to be my $8 Covergirl Lash Exact.
I liked this mascara but it didn't do much for my short thick eyelashes. I gave it away to my friend who enjoys the spirdery eyelash look and she adored it.

I purchased the Lashstash sampler & tried this mascara first. I now know that I would never purchase this product. I have never had racoon eyes until this mascara. Yes, it went on with ease but it also smeared with ease!
